label: Galaxy Core
Sentences:
FIRST OF ALL, I APPRECIATE THE BUYERS WHO TAKE THE TIME OUT TO WRITE A DETAILED REVIEW WHICH HELPS US BUYERS TO MAKE AN INFORMED DECISION BEFORE INVESTING IN A PRODUCT.
      
      NOW, ABOUT THE PRODUCT-
      
      THERE ARE PHONES WITH BETTER SPECS AT THIS PRICE IN THE MARKET BUT MY CHOICES WERE RESTRICTED SINCE I WANTED 1.) GOOD AFTER SALES SERVICE AND 2.) A PHONE WHICH IS NOT TOO BIG, NOR TOO SMALL, I.E, 4.3 TO 4.5 INCHES.
      
      MOTO G WAS A STRONG CONTENDER BUT THE WAITING PERIOD WAS 20 DAYS WHEN I BOUGHT THIS PHONE AND ALSO, MOTOROLA JUST RE-ENTERING THE MARKET WITH IT, THE AFTER SALES SERVICE WAS A BIG QUESTION MARK AS WELL.
      
      FROM THE REVIEWERS ON FLIPKART IT WAS APPARENT THAT IT DOESN'T HAVE A GREAT BATTERY LIFE AND SINCE I NEED MY CELL TO NOT DIE ON ME BEFORE MY DAY IS OVER AT 7 PM (ABOUT 12 HOURS OF MODERATE USE), I TOOK MY TIME GOING THROUGH THE OTHER PHONES BUT FINALLY DECIDED TO GIVE IT A SHOT AND WENT FOR SGC (SAMSUNG GALAXY CORE). I COULDN'T WAIT FOR 3 DAYS FOR FLIPKART TO DELIVER IT DUE TO THE PATHETIC CONDITION OF MY PREVIOUS CELLPHONE WHICH WAS BARELY HOLDING UP, SO I BOUGHT THIS HANDSET FROM A RETAILER TWO DAYS BACK.
      
      AS OF NOW, WITH 5/6 APPS INSTALLED, ITS GIVING ME A BATTERY LIFE OF ABOUT 15 HRS (TWO/THREE HOURS OF 3G USAGE AND AN HOUR OF CALLS WITH AN HOUR OF MESSAGING THROWN IN) WITH ONLY ONE SIM SINCE I DON'T NEED TWO EXCEPT WHEN I AM GOING OUT OF STATION AND TWO SIMS DRAIN BATTERY MUCH FASTER.
      
      NO LAGS TILL NOW AND WORKING FINE. GOOD NETWORK THOUGH YOU NEED A REBOOT ONCE IN A WHILE FOR SWITCHING BETWEEN 2G/3G WHICH, FOR ME, ISN'T MUCH OF A DEAL BREAKER. WILL UPDATE THIS REVIEW AT REGULAR INTERVALS AFTER INSTALLING MORE APPS AND USING SOME BATTERY SAVING TIPS TO GIVE FELLOW BUYERS A MORE COMPLETE PICTURE.
      
      AS OF NOW, THE VERDICT IS- 4 STARS/ 5STAR
      
      GO FOR IT IF YOU WANT GOOD AFTER SALES SUPPORT AND DON'T MIND CHARGING EVERY 16 HOURS.

label: Galaxy Core
Sentences: HI I AM USING THIS MOBILE FROM LAST 20 DAYS .ALL THE FEARURS ARE GOOD ,AND ITS MAIN DRAW BACK IS BATTEY BACK UP ,I NEED TO KEEP TWICE A DAY FOR CHARGING (WITH A USE OF MP3 2 HR ,WIFI.USE OF 4-5 HR PER DAY  ).REMAINING ALL IS OK...

label: Galaxy Core
Sentences:
HI IAM WRITING THIS MY FIRST REVIEW WITH MY OWN EXPERIENCE TO HELP BUYERS OUT THERE TO MAKE THEIR CHOICE.IN THIS REVIEW IAM NOT GOING TO COMPARE IT WITH ANY OTHER PHONE BUT ONLY HIGHLIGHT WHAT YOU CAN EXPECT FROM THIS MOBILE.I BOUGHT FROM A LOCAL STORE ABOUT 3 MONTHS AGO FOR 13000.AS THE TITLE SUGGESTS REVIEW WILL BE DETAILED AND COMPLETE,SO DON'T SKIP ON PARTS.
      
      
      DESIGN AND BUILD QUALITY :
      
      NOTHING NEW HERE SAME DESIGN AS ALL THE GALAXY OUT THERE.I REALLY THINK SAMMY BOYS SHOULD IMPROVE ON THIS(SPECIAL MENTION SONY).MY PHONE WAS MISTAKEN FOR SAMSUNG GALAXY S DUOS AT FIRST GLANCE.EVEN THOUGH ITS ALL PLASTIC BUILD QUALITY IS GOOD ,I ACCIDENTALLY DROPPED MY PHONE FACING SCREEN GLADLY NOTHING HAPPENED.SO I MAY ASSURE YOU THAT IT CAN HANDLE SOME OF THAT ACCIDENTAL DROPS BUT FROM A FAIR DISTANCE.
      
      
      DISPLAY :
      
      NOW COMES THE MOST IMPORTANT PART OF REVIEW THE DISPLAY.I HAVE SEEN LOT OF SAMSUNG PHONES WHETHER LOW END OR HIGH END THEIR DISPLAY IS TRULY CLASS LEADING. THIS HAS A TFT LCD DISPLAY AND A PIXEL DENSITY 217PPI.THE DISPLAY LOOKS GREAT INDOORS WITH EQUALLY GOOD CONTRAST AND BRIGHTNESS LEVELS. VIEWING ANGLES THAT WE CAN EXPECT FROM THIS PHONE IS GOOD (CANNOT BE COMPARED WITH AMOLED HOWEVER). NOW THE SAMSUNG HAS SKIPPED ON AUTO BRIGHTNESS SENSOR SO YOU WILL HAVE TO MANUALLY ADJUST THE BRIGHTNESS WHICH BECOMES PROBLEMATIC OUTDOORS, GLADLY THE BRIGHTNESS CONTROL IN NOTIFICATION PANEL COMES TO RESCUE
      
      
      HARDWARE AND PERFORMANCE:
      
      NOW COMES ANOTHER IMPORTANT ASPECT.IT COMES WITH ANDROID JELLYBEAN.4.1.2(MAY GET A KITKAT UPGRADE).IT HAS SNAPDRAGON S4 PLAY 1.2GHZ DUAL CORE ARM CORTEX A5 PROCESSOR WITH ADRENO 203 GRAPHICS(ABOUT 1.5-2 TIMES POWERFUL THAN ADRENO 200) 1GB OF RAM,8GB(4.75 GB FOR APPS INSTALLATION) OF INTERNAL STORAGE NOW LOOKING AT SPECS ONE THING THAT MANY EVEN I THOUGHT OF LETDOWN SURELY WILL BE THE "CORTEX A5",YES ITS AN OLD ARCHITECTUREBUT THE PERFORMANCE IS NOT THAT BAD AT ALL.IN GENERAL USAGE PHONE PERFORMS FAIRLY SMOOTHLY.PEOPLE WHO ARE INTO GAMING CAN ALSO EXPECT ACCEPTABLE  FRAME RATES EVEN IN SOME OF HIGH END GAMES LIKE ASPHALT 7,NFS,NOVA ETC WITH MEDIUM GRAPHICS (PLEASE SEE GEEKYRANJIT YOUTUBE REVIEW) GAMES LIKE SUBWAY SURFERS,TEMPLE RUN OZ RUNS WITH MINOR LAGS.DO NOTE THAT POWER SAVING MODE IS DISABLED BEFORE GAMING.YES PHONE GET LITTLE BIT WARM(NOT EXTREME) IF YOU GAME CONTINUOUSLY FOR MORE THAN 30-40 MINUTES.OVERALL ITS A NICE PERFORMER FOR THE PRICE..
      
      
      CAMERA:
      
      IT HAS A 5MP AUTOFOCUS CAMERA WITH A DECENTLY BRIGHT LED FLASH.CAMERA PERFORMANCE IS DECENT,I HAVE SEEN MUCH BETTER 5MP SHOOTER FROM MOBILE PHONES(SPECIAL MENTION NOKIA N82).I WILL SUGGEST YOU TO READ GSMARENA REVIEW FOR SOME DETAILS ABOUT CAMERA PERFORMANCE.VIDEO RECORDING MAXES OUT AT D1(720 X 480),THATS WHAT THE CHIPSET IS CAPABLE OF.THE DETAILS ARE AVERAGE,SOUND RECORDED IS MONO AND LACKS AUTOFOCUS AND VIDEO ZOOM TOO
      
      
      AUDIO AND MULTIMEDIA:
      
      THE AUDIO QUALITY AS EXPECTED FROM A SMARTPHONE IS GOOD.THE ONLY CON HERE IS THE LOUDSPEAKER,THOUGH THE QUALITY OF SOUND IS GOOD THE VOLUME LEVELS ARE AVERAGE AND IN OUTDOORS ARE BARELY HEARABLE .THE MUSIC THROUGH HEADPHONES ARE GOOD TOO.
      
      NOW COMING TO VIDEO PLAYBACK IT MAXES OUT AT 480P,THOUGH SOME LOW BITRATE (LESS THAN 2MBPS) 720P VIDEOS LIKE MOVIES ARE PLAYABLE IN SW DECODER MODE IN MX PLAYER.
      
      
      NETWORK AND CONNECTIVITY :
      
      I MUST HAVE TO SAY THAT SIGNAL RECEPTION WITH BOTH SIM ON IS ABOVE AVERAGE(MY NOKIA CAN DO BETTER THAN THIS),THOUGH I HAVE NOT FELT ANY MAJOR SIGNAL DROPS.THE VOICE QUALITY IS VERY GOOD (EVEN WITHOUT NOICE CANCELLATION).EVEN IN NOISY ENVIRONMENTS YOU CAN HEAR WHAT PEOPLE AT OTHER END ARE SAYING.
      
      IT OFFERS GOOD SPEEDS IN 2G AND 3G ALSO.ALSO DO NOT THAT IT HAS 3G 7.2MBPS DOWNLINK SPEED.ITS GOOD FOR BROWSING HOWEVER IF YOU WANT TO DO HEAVY DOWNLOADING YOU WILL HAVE TO SPEND SOME TIME(SPECIAL MENTION:SOME PHONES ARE CAPABLE OF 21MBPS DOWNLINK IN ITS PRICE RANGE).
      
      ANOTHER THING WORTH MENTIONING IS THAT DURING WIFI TETHERING THE PHONE BECOMES INSANELY HOT ( AT ITS PEAK OVER 50C) AFTER 20-30MINS,HOWEVER I HAVE SEEN WORSE IN MANY ANDROIDS.
      
      
      BATTERY LIFE:
      
      ITS THE MOST ARGUED PART WHEN IT COMES TO SMARTPHONES.THIS PHONE HAS A DESCENT 1800MAH BATTERY.NOW THE TWO POWER HUNGRY TASKS ARE GAMING(GRAPHICALLY INTENSIVE) AND INTERNET(HEAVY DOWNLOADING).NOW IF YOU DO ANY ONE OF THE ABOVE TASKS CONTINUOUSLY THEN BATTERY WILL COME FROM 100 TO 10% IN 3-3.5 HRS SURELY.DURING IDLE STANDBY WITH BOTH SIM ON IT CONSUMES ONLY 1% IN 1 HOUR,THAT MEANS YOU CAN EXPECT AROUND ONE WHOLE DAY WITH MEDIUM TO HEAVY USAGE (WORTH MENTION:SOME LENEVO PHONES IN THIS PRICE RANGE).
      
      ALSO DO NOTE THAT PHONE WILL BECOME HOT IF HEAVILY USED DURING CHARGING.
      
      
      VERDICT:

      LOOKS:

      DISPLAY:

      PERFORMANCE:
      
      THE PHONE HAS A DUAL CORE SNAPDRAGON PROCESSOR(MSM 8225) WHICH SOUNDS GOOD BUT THERE IS A CATCH-THE ARCHITECTURE IS CORTEX-A5 WHICH IS OLD,OUTDATED EVEN.THE PHONE CAN STILL RUN MOST GAMES SMOOTHLY IF NOT KEPT IN POWER SAVING MODE.
      
      THE SPEAKERS ARE AWFUL OUTDOORS BUT LOUD ENOUGH INDOORS .ALSO THE PHONE CANNOT PLAY HD VIDEOS EVEN THOUGH THE SOC SUPPORTS HD PLAYBACK.

      CONCLUSION:IF YOU REALLY WANT A PHONE  FOR CALLS,TEXTING AND MAILING WITH LIGHT GAMING

      SLIM
      
      TOUCHWIZ
      
      DISPLAY

      SPEAKER QUALITY

      MY REVIEW GIVEN BELOW IS PURELY PERSONAL BASED ON MY USAGE OF THIS PHONE AND NOT RESEMBLING TO ANY PHONES LIVING OR DEAD!!!!(LOL)
      
      
      SINCE I'M AN ADVANCED USER OF ANDROID(ROOTING, FLASHING, MODDING, TWEAKING), MY PERSONAL OPINION ABOUT THIS PHONE IS GIVEN BELOW:
      
      
      NORMAL(DAILY USAGE)/BASIC USER'S: VFM(VALUE FOR MONEY)
      
      ADVANCE USER'S(TWEAKERS): WOM(WASTE OF MONEY)
      
      
      GOOD FOR INTERNET(BASIC USE LIKE FACEBOOK, WHATTS APP) AND FOR DAILY CALLS AND MSGS... NOT RECOMMENDED FOR HEAVY USAGE LIKE WATCHING MOVIES OR HEAVY DOWNLOADING EVEN IN 3G.
      
      
      13240 FOR DUAL CORE??? ALWAYS NO NO... LOOK OUT FOR BETTER ALTERNATIVES LIKE SONY FOR ANDROID AND NOKIA FOR WINDOWS.
      
      
      FOR SAVING BATTERY: USER BATTERYGURU APP FROM PLAYSTORE RELEASED BY QUALCOMM SPECIFICALLY FOR THEIR CHIPSETS... IT SAVES BATTERY CONSIDERABLY....
      
      FOR ROOTED USERS: USE GREENIFY....
      
      
      DISPLAY: IPS PANELS ARE VERY BRIGHT, WHEN USED IN COMBINATION WITH QUALCOMM PROCESSOR'S EATS MORE BATTERY... AMOLED DISPLAYS ARE SHARP AND SATURATED BUT WILL STRAIN UR EYES... SO, LCD IS OPTIMUM FOR DAILY FREQUENT VIEWING USAGE AND FOR THIS PRICE TOO....
      
      
      I'M NOT REVIEWING ABOUT OTHER THINGS, SINCE ALL ARE ALREADY DISCUSSED, REVIEWED AND RATED HERE....

label: Galaxy Core
Sentences:
HI ,
      
      
      I BOUGHT THIS PHONE 2 MONTHS BACK AND HERE IS MY FINDINGS.
      
      
      PROS:
      
      1. 4.3 INCH SCREEN
      
      2. BRAND NAME SAMSUNG
      
      3. TEMPLS RUN 2 RUNNING GOOD.
      
      4. DUAL CORE PROCESSOR
      
      5. 8 GB INTERNAL MEMORY
      
      6. HEADPHONE SOUND IS GOOD.
      
      7. CAMERA QUALITY IS KIND OF OK. 6/10
      
      
      CONS:
      
      1. PROCESSOR:
      
      THOUGH THE PROCESSOR IS DUAL CORE AND 1.2 GHZ BUT THE ARCHITECTURE OF THE PROCESSOR IS VERY POOR. ARM5 IS KIND OF PROCESSOR WHICH IS USED BY CHEAP COMPANIES AND NOT SO POWERFUL WHEN COMPARED TO EQUIVALENT SNAPDRAGON PROCESSOR.
      
      
      2. GRAPHICS: ADRIONO 203 - COMMON IN THIS PRICE YOU CAN GET MUCH BETTER GRAPHICS PROCESSOR. CHECK XPERIA M.
      
      
      3. ONLY 4.75 GB OUT OF 8 GB INTERNAL MEMORY IS ACCESSIBLE.
      
      
      4. SOUND ON SPEAKER SUCKS. BELOW AVERAGE.
      
      
      5. VIDEO PLAYBACK:
      
      VIDEO PAYBACK OF THIS PHONE REALLY BAD. YOU CAN'T PLAY ANY 720P VIDEO. NOT EVEN WITH MX PLAYER AND SOFTWARE DECODER MODE. EVEN THE VERY OLD MODEL PHONES WHICH DOES NOT SUPPORT 720P VIDEO PLAYBACK CAN PLAY VIDEO WITH MX-PLAYER USING SOFWARE DECODER BUT THIS ONE CAN'T. THIS IS REALLY BAD. EVEN FOR 480P VIDEO IT GETS BLURRY FEW TIMES AND ALL THE VIDEO HAD SOME EXTRA REDDISH COLOR.
      
      
      6. YOU CAN'T DO PRECIOUS/ NEXT SONG WHEN THE PHONE IS LOCKED. I USED HTC AND SONY PHONES AND THEY HAVE THIS OPTION BY DEFAULT.
      
      
      7. DISPLAY: KIND OF OK. PPI IS LOW.
      
      
      8. BATTERY BACKUP: NOT GOOD WHEN YOU ARE NOT USING POWER SAVING MODE AND USING DUAL SIM.
      
      
      GO FOR SONY XPREIA M. THAT'S A FAR BETTER PHONE WITH RESPECT TO PROCESSOR/ GRAPHICS/ VIDEO PLAYBACK/ CAMERA/ SOUND QUALITY/ BUILD QUALITY.

label: Galaxy Core
Sentences:
HI,
      
      
      THIS IS A VERY BASIC PHONE FULFILLING BASIC DESIRES SUCH AS BRANDED SAMSUNG MOBILE OWNER, 3G, DUAL SIM, 4.3 SCREEN, CAMERA FLASH & FRONT FACING CAMERA.
      
      
      BUT FOR REST OF PURPOSES LIKE WATCHING A HD & FULL HD VIDEO, USING SYGIC NAVIGATION, GOOD GAMES, THEN THIS DEVICE IS NOT CAPABLE OF PLAYING IT.
      
      
      NOTE: NAVIGATION(GPS) IS FINE & ACURATE, ONLY HEAVY GRAPHICS NAVIGATION DISPLAY IS GIVING PROBLEM BECAUSE ITS GPU IS VERY WEAK.
      
      
      HEAVY GRAPHICS GAMES ARE NOT EVERYBODY'S TASTE BUT IF YOU WANT TO PLAY THEN THIS IS NOT THE DEVICE YOU ARE LOOKING FOR.
      
      
      BACK CAMERA IS AVERAGE BUT THE THING WHICH MAKES THE CAMERA CLARITY MORE WORSE, IS THE TFT DISPLAY. TFT DISPLAY ALWAYS RUIN THE CLARITY & DETAILS OF VIDEO/PICTURE THAT IS WHY I HATE ALL SONY PHONES. EVEN 40000 SONY MOBILE HAS TFT DISPLAY. SUCKS.
      
      
      WHATEVER IF YOUR DISPLAY IS HD OR FULL HD OR TRILUMIOS DISPLAY, TFT WILL BE WORST DISPLAY.
      
      
      MY SAMSUNG GALAXY S(I9000) DISPLAYS BETTER IMAGES/VIDEO THAN SONY 24000 CRAP.
      
      
      I PURCHASED THIS PHONE FOR MY MOM WHO WILL NEVER USE NAVIGATION, WILL NEVER PLAY GAMES, WILL NEVER WATCH HD MOVIES, WILL NEVER TAKE GOOD PICTURES. SO THIS PHONE COMPLETED MY REQUIREMENTS.
      
      
      ALTHOUGH NOW DAYS YOU HAVE A VERY GOOD OPTION OF MOTO G. GO FOR IT.
      
      
      A SURVEY CONDUCTED BY HINDUSTAN TIMES, 95% OF SMARTPHONE USERS WILL NEVER USE 95% OF ITS CAPABILITIES.
      
      
      PEOPLE HAVE THE MOST EXPENSIVE PHONE IPHONE 5S, & WILL NEVER USE NAVIGATION BUT ALWAYS ASK DESTINATION BY LOWERING DOWN THEIR CAR WINDOW, WILL NEVER USE BANKING ON PHONE BUT WILL ALWAYS GO TO BANK FOR TRANSFER MONEY , WILL NEVER USE DROPBOX & RELY ON DVDS, WILL NEVER USE ONLINE RECHARGE & ALWAYS WAIT FOR SHOPKEEPERS TO RECHARGE THE PHONE, WILL NEVER USE PASSWORD MANAGEMENT APPS BUT ALWAYS STRUGGLES TO REMEMBER PASSWORDS, WILL NEVER USE CALENDER & BIRTHDAY/ANNIVERSARY REMINDERS BUT ALWAYS FORGOT MOM/DAD/BORTHER/SISTER BIRTHDAY , WILL NEVER BOOK MOVIE TICKETS ONLINE BUT ALWAYS STAY IN QUEUE TO GET TICKETS.
      
      
      SO STAY PROUD & BUY THIS PHONE BECAUSE MOST USERS FALL IN 95% USER CATEGORY. :-).

      NOW ABT THE PHN. DISPLAY IS GOOD, PROCESSOR IS GOOD, CAN SUPPORT HEAVY GAMES WITHOUT ANY LAGS (I HAVE DOWNLOADED GAME SIZED UPTO 1.4 GB), METALLIC BLUE LOOKS PRETTY ELEGANT AND THE TEXTURED BACK PANEL ADD SOME MORE STARS TO ITS APPEARANCE.       NW ABT PROBLEMS WHICH I FELT AND FACED.
      
      BIGGEST PROBLEM IS OVERHEATING WHILE CHARGING AND PLAYING GAMES (EVN THE SMALLER GAMES LIKE TEMPLE RUN ETC, WHICH WAS WORKING FINE ON MY HTC EXPLORER)
      
      
      BATTERY BACKUP IS VERY POOR. INITIALLY WHEN I BOUGHT I HAVE TO CHARGE IT TWICE A DAY AS I WAS USING IT HEAVILY FOR DOWNLOADING AND TRYING DIFFERENT GAMES AND APPLICATIONS, BT NW SUM HW I'M MANAGING TO GET 18 HRS WITH NORMAL USAGE (15-20 MINS CALLS, 2 HRS MSGING, 2-3HRS WIFI, 1 HR MUSIC AND 1 HR GAME) ND BELIEVE ME I'VE TRIED ALL THE WAYS AND TYPES OF BATTERY SAVERS.
      
      
      TAKING ABOUT HEADSETS. INBOX HEADSETS ARE NT GOOD. I WAS EXPECTING IN EAR BT ITS A NORMAL ONE ND THT ALSO HAVING SUM AWKWARD KIND OF DESIGN BY WHICH MY EAR STARTS PAINING AFTR 10-15MINS.       720P VIDEO PLAYBACK IS NT SUPPORTED IN THE PHN, I'VE TRIED MANY APPS BT ALL GONE WASTE. VLC PLAYER WAS WORKING IT WAS GETTING STRUCK FREQUENTLY SO I UNINSTALLED IT.
      
      
      OVERALL THE PHN IS QUITE GOOD BT THE 1ST TWO PROBLEMS ARE UNACCEPTABLE AFTER SPENDING 13K.
      
      
      I WOULD STRONGLY SUGGEST NOT TO BUY THIS PHN IF NY ONE IS PLANNING.

label: Galaxy Core
Sentences: I HAVE PURCHASED THIS PHONE LAST WEDNESDAY I.E. 31.07.2013. THE FIRST DAY OF PURCHASE WAS GONE EXPLORING THE VARIOUS FEATURES OF THE PHONE. THOUGH I AM NOT A TECH GEEK IN THE REAL SENSE OF THE TERM, YET I SAY THAT THIS PHONE IS SURELY OVERPRICED, GIVEN THE VARIETIES AVAILABLE TODAY. I SHOULD HAVE BEEN IDEALLY PRICED BETWEEN RS. 13,000/= TO RS. 14,000/= GIVEN THE CONFIGURATION STANDARDS OF TODAY, OR EVEN A LITTLE LESS. ITS DISPLAY IS GOOD, AND THE SCREEN RESPOND TO TOUCHES WELL. INTERNET SURFING IS DECENT. I AM NOT AN AVID GAMER, BUT MOST OF THE GAMES CAN BE PLAYED WELL. ACCEPTS ALL KINDS OF MESSAGES AND CAN BE OPENED WITHOUT ANY GLITCHES. HOWEVER, ONE MAJOR NEGATIVE ASPECT IS WHAT I AM CONSTRAINED TO POINT OUT IS THAT FOR A MOBILE OF THIS CONFIGURATION, ONE 1800 MAH BATTERY? IT SHOULD HAVE BEEN IDEALLY AT LEAST 2100MAH ONE. I FAIL TO APPRECIATE WHY SUCH MISERLY TREATMENT IN CASE OF BATTERY CONFIGURATION. MOST SMARTPHONES, ON ACCOUNT OF A LARGER SCREEN SPACE CONSUMES MORE BATTERY WITHIN A SHORT TIME. HENCE, IT SHOULD HAVE BEEN SYSTEMICALLY PROGRAMMED TO CONSUME LESS ENERGY AND, MOREOVER, THE HIGHER CONFIGURATION BATTERY SHOULD HAVE BEEN IDEALLY INSERTED, THIS SHOULD HAVE SOLVED MANY ISSUES WITH THIS MODEL. ALL THE PROSPECTIVE PURCHASERS, I WOULD SUGGEST TO BE CAREFUL ABOUT BATTERY ISSUES OF THIS MOBILE. THE OTHER ASPECTS MIGHT BE OKAY. BUT BATTERY IS WOEFULLY WEAK, SINCE IT SUCKS ENERGY JUST LIKE PARCHED LANDS TAKE TO WATER. NO AMOUNT OF BATTERY DOCTORING HAVE HELPED. SO BE CAREFUL ABOUT THIS BATTERY ISSUES. OTHERWISE, IT HAS A DECENT DISPLAY, A DECENT INTERFACE, GOOD WORKABILITY, DECENT GAMING CAPABILITIES, EDITING DOCUMENTS, AND MISCELLANEOUS OFFICE WORK IS TRULY A BREEZE. BUT BEING LEFT IN THE LURCH, WITH MOBILE SWITCHED OFF DURING PEAK HOURS IN THE EVENING (SINCE AFTER WHOLE NIGHT OF CHARGING YOU HAVE GONE OUT FOR WORK AT 9 AM IN THE MORNING AND IS NOT SLATED TO RETURN BEFORE 9 PM AT LEAST, AND THE MOBILE HAS GONE OFF AT AROUND 6 PM AND YOU ARE NOT AMONGST THOSE WHO CARRIES A POWER BANK WITH YOU) IS SURELY A TURN OFF FACTOR. IT CLAIMS TO HAVE A BATTERY LIFE OF AROUND 9 HOURS, BUT FOR HEAVY USERS LIKE ME, THE FIRST DAY ITSELF, AFTER CHARGING THE BATTERY FULLY, I GOT NOT MORE THAN 3 HOURS. FOLKS, I MUST SAY THAT THE ENERGY CONSUMPTION IS AN ISSUE. LASTLY, THE LOOKS DEPARTMENT DISAPPOINTS. MY EARLY MOBILE WAS E-63, SO BEING USED TO USING A MOBILE PHONE WITH SUCH A SOLID BUILD QUALITY, THIS TYPE OF LOOKS SURELY SUCKS, POOR BLAND CHEAP PLASTIC, WITH A LITTLE GLOSSY LOOK. ONE ASPECT, SAMSUNG SHOULD CONSIDER GIVING THE FLIP COVER FOR FREE FOR ALL MODELS ABOVE RS. 14,000/= AND SHALL MAKE AVAILABLE FLIP COVERS FOR ALL SMARTPHONE MODELS COSTING LESS, WITH SUCH FLIP COVER BE SOLD AT A NOMINAL PRICE. SUCH FLIP COVERS ARE ESSENTIAL FOR PROTECTING THE PHONE, SINCE THE SURFACE OF DISPLAY REQUIRES IT TO BE PROTECTED WITH CARE (MUCH MORE CARE IS NEEDED THAN YOU TAKE FOR YOUR BEAUTIFUL, RATHER SIZZLINGLY BEAUTIFUL WIFE), SINCE NONE OF THESE MODELS COMES WITH GORILLA GLASS, AND, HENCE, SCRATCHES (NOTWITHSTANDING SCRATCH GUARD) WILL BE IMMINENT, SANS A SCREEN GUARD AND A FLIP COVER. SO FOLKS SINCE THE SAME IS NOT BEING SUPPLIED GRATIS, MAKE SURE YOU BUY, EVEN IF THE SAME IS OF A CHEAPER VARIETY, IT IS REQUIRED TO KEEP THE DISPLAY LIFE OF THE PHONE INTACT. 1GB RAM IS DECENT FOR A PHONE OF THIS CONFIGURATION. IN MY OPINION, THOSE WHO LOOK FOR FRILLS (THOUGH I DID NOT EXACTLY LOOKED FOR IT, FOR MY CHOICE OF LUMIA 720, BUT I MADE THE MISTAKE OF GOING FOR THE SLIGHT PRICE DIFFERENCE AND OPTED FOR THIS MODEL, I PERSONALLY DID NOT LIKE LUMIA 62, AND, HENCE THIS CHOICE), IN ADDITION TO UTILITY, THIS IS THE RIGHT PHONE, NOTWITHSTANDING THE WOEFUL BATTERY DEFICIENCY, BUT THOSE WHO LOOKS FOR QUALITY - BUILD QUALITY, SUPERIOR SOUND, AND STABLE PERFORMANCE EVEN AFTER YEARS OF USAGE (EVEN THOUGH USERS TODAY BUY MOBILE PHONES AT THE DROP OF A HAT), THESE SERIES OF PHONES SHOULD NOT BE CONSIDERED. BUT THOSE WHO ARE FREQUENT BUYERS, TRY THIS ONE, THIS WILL AT LEAST NOT DISAPPOINT YOU AND SHALL KEEP YOU SUCKED WITH THE NOVELTY ELEMENTS AT LEAST TILL SIX MONTHS AFTER PURCHASE, UNLESS YOU ARE EXASPERATED WITH THE WOEFUL BATTERY. PLEASE DON'T TRY TO PLAY ONLINE GAMES AND NEVER GAMES WITH 3D INTERFACE, SINCE THIS WILL SLOW DOWN THE PHONE AND THE BATTERY WILL BE DISCHARGED WITHIN NO TIME, MAY BE WITHIN AN HOUR. SO FOLKS BE CAREFUL. ALSO THE DISPLAY GLASS IS NOT OF SUPERIOR BUILT, SO PLEASE TAKE CARE OF IT. I AM WRITING THIS REVIEW WITH LIMITED KNOWLEDGE OF TECHNOLOGY, ON THE CONTRARY, THIS REVIEW SHOULD BE CONSIDERED AS MORE OF AN USER'S REACTION TO SUCH DEVICE. I HAVE MERELY EXPRESSED MY OPINION BASED ON WHAT I HAVE FACED USING THIS MOBILE.

      BUT THEN I SAW LG NEXUS 4. THIS PHONE HAS DEADLY SPECS. 2GB RAM, GORILLA GLASS, 1.5 GHZ QUAD CORE PROCESSOR. ITS PRICE IS AROUND 20K NOW.

      * INTERNAL MEMORY-- NEARLY 5GB.

label: Galaxy Grand
Sentences:
ALRIGHT. I BOUGHT THIS PHONE (NOT OFF FLIPKART, UNFORTUNATELY) AND WAS SURPRISED TO SEE THAT IT BEHAVED NOTHING LIKE ITS REVIEWS. SO I'LL BEGIN WITH AN HONEST PROS AND CONS LIST:
      
      
      PROS:
      
      
      LARGE, EXPANSIVE SCREEN IS SEXY. SURE, NOT SAMOLED, BUT SEXY NEVERTHELESS. I HAD SOME TIME WITH A MICROMAX CANVAS HD AND YOU COULDNT TELL THE DIFFERENCE IN SCREENS. HONESTLY.
      
      
      ZIPPY AND LIGHT, AND LOTS OF OPTIONS WITH JELLYBEAN. HOWEVER THERE ARE VERY RARE CASES WHEN IT STUTTERS JUST A BIT, AFTER YOU END ALL THE PROCESSES TO FREE UP SOME RAM.
      
      OTHERWISE, ITS FAST AND FLUID
      
      
      NATUREUI: THE PHONE ROCKS SAMSUNGS NATURE UI, AND ALTHOUGH BEAUTIFUL ITS ALSO PRETTY CONVENIENT, LIKE PULL-DOWN TOGGLES FOR BRIGHTNESS, ETC
      
      
      CONS:
      
      
      SCREEN COULD HAVE AT LEAST BEEN 200 PPI, BUT AS I GOT THIS BEAST FOR ONLY 17500 I CANT COMPLAIN.
      
      
      COULD HAVE BEEN A LITTLE THINNER.
      
      
      CAMERA COULD HAVE BEEN SHARPER.
      
      
      AND TO ALL THOSE WHO WHIP UP THE MMX CANVAS HD, I CAN UNDERSTAND THAT THE PHONE STACKS UP PRETTY WELL TO THIS. JUST TO MAKE SOME STUFF CLEAR, THOUGH: THE HD'S PROCESSOR IS BASED ON THE CORTEX A-7 ARCHITECTURE WHEREAS THE GRAND'S IS CORTEX A-9. SO THERE IS A DIFFERENCE, AND MORE CORES MAY NOT ALWAYS BE BETTER- THE SOFTWARE NEEDS TO USE ALL THE CORES EFFICIENTLY. BUT SURE, SOMETIMES QUAD CORE IS BETTER.
      
      
      AND ONE LAST THING, THE GRAND IS A GREAT OPTION AS A 'BRANDED' CANVAS HD, IF YOU LIKE. I'M JUST SAYING THAT IF YOU WANT A PHONE WITH FEATURES ALMOST THE SAME AS THE HD BUT BRANDED AND WITH RELIABLE CUSTOMER CARE, THE GRAND IS YOU OPTION. I ALSO RECOMMEND YOU TO CHECK OUT AN S3 OR S2 OR SOMETHING ELSE AS WELL, IF YOU FIND THE SPECS  LITTLE DULL.
      
      
      HOPE NOBODY THINKS OF ME AS A SAMSUNG FANBOY, WHICH I AM NOT. :D

I GOT THE GALAXY GRAND A MONTH AND A HALF AGO. SO FAR THE PERFORMANCE HAS BEEN VERY GOOD AND AT PAR WITH WHAT I EXPECTED.
      
      
      I DID NOT GET THE PHONE FROM FLIPKART, I BROUGHT IT FROM A SAMSUNG SMART CAFE STORE ON THE OWN NOW SCHEME.
      
      
      DEAR FLIPKART, PLEASE BAN REVIEWS FROM PEOPLE WHO HAVE NOT USED THE PHONE.
      
      
      THINGS THAT MATTER:
      
      
      BATTERY: I HAVE HAD DAYS WERE I HAVE GOTTEN 20 HRS. ONCE TO MY DISMAY I USED IT FOR A WHOLE 33 HOURS. AND I ONCE I FOUND I WAS DONE BY 11 HOURS OF USAGE. ON AN AVERAGE I GENERALLY GET 14 15 HOURS ON MODERATE USE.
      
      (MODERATE USE - MOBILE DATA (OR WIFI WHEN AVAILABLE) ON ALL THE TIME, GTALK AND WHATSPP FULL TIME ON, 5 TO 8 CALLS AVERAGE OF 5 MINS EACH, 2 EMAILS FULLY SYNCED, 15 MINS OF GAMING, 30 40 MINS OF BROWSING.
      
      
      PERFORMANCE: PEOPLE MUST STOP FUSSING ABOUT THE PROCESSOR SPECS AND SUCH. OUTPUT PERFORMANCE IS A COMBINATION OF MANY FACTORS.
      
      
      ON A GALAXY GRAND, THERE IS ABSOLUTELY NO LAG WHILE OPENING APPS OR MOVING BETWEEN HOME SCREENS.  I HAVE NOT USED 3G SO FAR ON THE PHONE.  I DO WATCH VIDEOS ON A 2G NETWORK AND IT IS FASTER THAN ONE WOULD EXPECT.
      
      
      DISPLAY: SPECS ARE FOR ALL TO READ. BUT ACTUALLY IT JUST DEPENDS ON WHETHER THIS PHONE IS AN UPGRADE FOR YOU OR ARE YOU MOVING DOWN FROM A HIGH END PHONE. THE DISPLAY LOOKS BRILLIANT TO ME AS I HAVE UPGRADED FROM A SMALLER PHONE. YES THE DISPLAY RESOLUTION IS LESS FOR A 5 INCH SCREEN BUT THERE IS NO VISIBLE PIXELATION EVER. UNDER BRIGHT SUNNY CONDITIONS THE SCREEN IS STILL BRIGHT ENOUGH AND CAUSES NO INCONVENIENCE WHATSOEVER.
      
      
      THE LARGE SIZE MEANS READING ONLINE IS A DELIGHT AND SO IS THE VIDEO WATCHING EXPERIENCE.
      
      I DONT THINK I CAN EVER GO BACK A DISPLAY SMALLER THAN THIS.
      
      
      VIDEOS: VIDEO WATCHING EXPERIENCE IS OBVIOUSLY NEXT ONLY TO THE NOTE/NOTE 2. LOVE THE LARGE REAL ESTATE AND CAN WATCH A MOVIE WITHOUT THE FEEL OF WATCHING IT ON A PHONE.
      
      
      SIZE AND TEXTING: A LITTLE INCONVENIENT COZ OF ITS SIZE. BUT ONE GETS USED TO IT. GREAT THING IS THERE IS A ONE HAND OPERATION OPTION THAT ONE CAN SWITCH EASILY TO (CAN SWITCH INSTANTLY WHILE TYPING). THE KEYBOARD SHRINK TO A SMALL SIZE AND ONE CAN TYPE WITH ONE HAND AND CAN MOVE IT TO LEFT OR RIGHT SIDES OF THE SCREENS FOR USE WITH EITHER OF YOUR HANDS.
      
      
      ALSO ITS A TRADE OFF BETWEEN EASE OF TEXTING AND VIDEO AND GAMING EXPERIENCE ON A LARGE SCREEN.
      
      
      GAMING: NOT MUCH OF A GAMER, TEMPLE RUN 2, COMMANDO D DAY, FLICK FOOTBALL, REAL BASKETBALL WORK LIKE MAGIC. NO LAGS NO ISSUES.
      
      
      CAMERA: VIDEO RECORDS IN FULL HD AND IS BRILLIANT(LOWER RES AVAILABLE TOO, CAN BE CHANGED IN SETTINGS) PHOTOS ARE OKAY, BUT AS THE LIGHT GOES DOWN THE GRAINS CATCH UP REAL QUICK.
      
      A CAMERA HARD KEY WOULD HAVE BEEN VERY USEFUL. THIS PHONE DEFINETLY NEEDED ONE, BECAUSE OF ITS LARGE SIZE IT BECOMES A BIT CUMBERSOME TO CLICK INSTANTLY, ESPECIALLY IF YOU ARE USING A FLIP COVER.
      
      
      THERE ARE A LOT OF OPTIONS AVAILABLE OUT THERE IN THE MARKET, REALLY DEPENDS ON WHAT YOU NEED.
      
      
      THE ONLY THING THAT ITCHES ME A BIT IS THE LARGE SIZE. IN A TIGHT JEANS IT BECOMES A LITTLE INCONVENIENT. BUT THEN I REPEAT, ITS A TRADE OFF.
      
      
      GET A GRAND IF YOU NEED: A LAG FREE EXPERIENCE, A LARGE SCREEN, DUAL SIM AND A BATTERY LIFE THAT STAYS THROUGH THE DAY.
      
      
      REALLY A GRAND EXPERIENCE, THANKS SAMSUNG. ITS A 4.5 STARRER. HALF A STAR DEDUCTION FOR I JUST WISH THE BATTERY STOOD OUT FOR A TAD LONGER.
      
      
      PEOPLE WHO DO NOT USE THE PHONE, HOW CAN YOU REVIEW IT?

label: Galaxy Grand
Sentences:
HELLO EVERYONE,
      
      
      I CAME ACROSS THIS PHONE FROM ONE OF MY FRIEND WHO EXPLAINED IT EACH AND EVERY AMAZING FEATURE. THEN ITSELF I DECIDED TO GET ONE OF THIS FOR MYSELF..
      
      
      THESE ARE THE OBSERVATIONS BY ME AFTER USING THIS FOR A MONTH.
      
      
      PROS:
      
      ALL THE FEATURES ARE COOL.
      
      
      THE MUSIC-PLAYING QUALITY IS HIGHLY WORTH-NOTICING EVEN WHEN PLAYED THROUGH MUSIC SYSTEM AND HEADPHONES.
      
      
      THE CAMERA IS SO GOOD THAT IT CAN CLEARLY TAKE HIGH QUALITY PICTURES WITHOUT ANY TIME-DELAY. RECORDING VIDEO IS FUN.
      
      
      THE TOUCH WORKS SO PERFECTLY THAT WE CAN SURF THROUGH THE MOBILE WITHIN NO TIME.
      
      AND THE SCREEN SIZE IS VERY GREAT FOR VIEWING VIDEOS AND PICTURES. EVEN THE 1080P VIDEOS ARE BEING PLAYED VERY SMOOTHLY (EVEN IN THE MINIMISED MODE).
      
      
      THE FRONT CAM ALSO HAS A GREAT QUALITY OUTPUT THAN MANY BIG SMART PHONES.
      
      
      CONS:
      
      ANYWAY, I'M LITTLE DISAPPOINTED WITH THE UI THAT IS PROVIDED BY SAMSUNG FOR CALLING AND MESSAGING.
      
      
      THE PHONE APP (WHICH IS USED TO MAKE CALLS) LACKS SOME OF THE BASIC FEATURES LIKE VIEWING LAST DIALED NUMBERS WHEN IT IS IN THE DIALER MODE, ONE HAS TO MOVE TO THE TOP OF THE SCREEN AN PRESS 'CALL LOG' FOR VIEWING THEM. THE PRESENTATION OF THE LISTS IS ALSO A BIT MORE HISTORIC.
      
      
      I DONNO WHY THE 'CALL LOG' RECORDS THE HISTORY OF INCOMING AND OUTGOING MESSAGES, MAKING THE CALL LOG PAGE A BIT MORE HEAVILY LOADED. ALSO, IT DOESNT GROUP THE LOGGED ENTRIES, EACH LOG MAKES A NEW ENTRY IN THE 'CALL LOG' PAGE. (FOR EXAMPLE, IF I MADE SUCCESSIVELY 10 CALLS TO THE SAME PERSON, IT RECORDS AS 10 ENTRIES INSTEAD OF GROUPING).
      
      
      COMING TO THE MESSAGING PART, THE TEXT EDITOR HAS NO T9 MODE. IT DOESN'T CHECK FOR SPELLING MISTAKES EVEN IN ENGLISH. THE INTERFACE FOR TYPING AND SELECTING TEXT ARE NOT WELL DESIGNED. (NO SETTINGS FOR VIBRATION FEEDBACK WHILE TYPING EACH ALPHABET OVER KEYPAD)
      
      
      SO, OVERALL CONCLUSION IS THAT- THIS MOBILE IS ENRICHED WITH MANY NEW FEATURES, BUT I FEEL SAMSUNG FAILED TO UPDATE ITS OWN VERSION RELATED TO THE FUNCTIONALITY OF THE MOBILE.
      
      ANYWAY, THESE CALLER AND MESSAGING FUNCTIONALITIES CAN BE SUBSTITUTED BY APPS FROM PLAY STORE.
      
      
      (I WAS PREVIOUSLY A HTC MOBILE USER AND THESE CALLING AND MESSAGING FUNCTIONALITIES ARE EXCELLENTLY DESIGNED IN HTC, AND THAT IS WHAT MADE ME FEEL THIS...)
      
      
      FINALLY, I WISH TO SAY THAT IF U R ACCUSTOMED WITH THE INTERFACE PROVIDED FOR SAMSUNG FOR CALLING AND MSG'ING, THEN THIS IS A VERY GOOD CHOICE OF MOBILE IN THIS PRICE RANGE...

MOREOVER, THEIR SELF-ESTIMATED DELIVERY DATE WAS 8TH APRIL, WHEREAS, ON NOT RECEIVING THE DELIVERY TILL 8TH APRIL 1600 HRS ALSO, I HAD TO CALL THEIR CUSTOMER CARE TO EXPEDITE THE DELIVERY. FINALLY, GOT DELIVERED ON 9TH APR- NOON TIME.
      
      BTW THIS WAS PURCAHSED AS GIFT FOR MY WIFE, AND PEOPLE WHO ARE MARRIED WOULD BE ABLE TO RELATE HOW EMBARRASING IT GETS WHEN YOU CAN'T MANAGE TO HONOUR A GIFT ON RIGHT DAY & TIME..!!!
      
      HOPE IT'S AN EYE OPENER FOR ALL THOSE WHO SWEAR BY FLIPKARTS SERVICE.
      
      
      NOW COMING TO THE HANDSET; WELL IT'S A PRETTY DECENT HANDSET, EXCEPT ONLY FOR ITS BATTERY PERFORMANCE, AS THE CHARGING TIME IS HIGH, AND THE BATTERY DOESN'T LAST TOO LONG EVEN ON IN-BUILT POWER SAVING MODE. IT DOESNT LAST EVEN A DAY WITH EVEN MODERATE USE, SAY 30-45 MINS OF BROWSING, 20-30 MINUTES OF VIDEO STREAMING (3G), 3 HR OF TALKTIME, PROBABLY 30-45 MINS OF GAMING AND SOME WHATS APP CHATTING & SHARING. I THINK THAT'S QUITE MODERATE USAGE.
      
      APPARENTLY, TO SUPPORT SUCH USE ALSO,I HAD TO INSTALL BATTERY SAVER APPLICATION, SO THAT IT LASTS A FULL DAY.
      
      OTHER THAN THIS, ALL FEATURES ARE GOOD. CAMERA IS QUITE OKAY, THOUGH YOU CANNOT COMPARE IT WITH A 8MP SONY OR IPHONE CAMERA. JELLY BEAN IS VERY SMOOTH, NO LAGS FOUND IN BROWSING/ MULTI-TASKING. MULTIPLE WINDOW FEATURE, PARTICULARLY FOR VIDEO VIEWING IS GOOD.
      
      ALSO, DUAL STAND-BY OF TWO SIMS (FORWARDING OF CALL TO OPERATIONAL SIM) WORKS WELL IN THIS HANDSET, WHICH IN MOST HANDSETS DOESN'T REALLY WORKS, AND PROMPTS THE CALLER THAT THE NUMBER IS NOT REACHABLE.
      
      HAVE UPGRADED ROM THROUGH A 32 GB UHS MICRO CARD, WHICH IS WORKING PERFECTLY FINE.
      
      OVERALL I WOULD HAVE GIVEN THIS PHONE 4 OUT OF 5. 1 POINT TO BE DEDUCTED FOR BATTERY AS WELL AS PRICING OF THIS PHONE. (DONT FORGET WE HAVE MICROMAX CANVAS HD3 AND KARBONN TITANIUM ETC PRICED BETTER FOR SIMILAR FEATURES. I FEEL AFTER THIS 15% CASH BACK & OWN NOW SCHEME ENDS, SAMSUNG MAY BRING DOWN THE PRICE OF THIS PHONE BY 15%).
      
      BUT CONSIDERING FLIPKART'S LOUSY SERVICE, I WOULD LIKE TO CORRECT DOWN MY RATING TO 3.5/5. (4 STARS ARE ONLY FOR HANDSET).
      
      
      I HOPE THIS REVIEW HELP BUYERS TO DECIDE.

I BOUGHT THIS PHONE FROM RETAIL STORE..
      
      THE CONFIGURATIONS ARE FINE.. BUT PERFORMANCE IS LOW.
      
      RAM IS 1GB BUT ANDROID OS AND AUTOSTART APPS EATS UP THE ENTIRE RAM

label: Galaxy Grand
Sentences:
I BOUGHT THIS PHONE ON 3RD MARCH AND SINCE THEN I DON'T REGRET MY DECISION OF GETTING THIS ANDROID PHONE FROM SAMSUNG. AS THE NAME SAYS.. THE PHONE IS INDEED 'GRAND'.  THIS IS MY FIRST ANDROID PHONE AND I RESEARCHED A LOT BEFORE ZEROING ON THIS ONE. THE PHONES I COMPARED WITH THE GRAND WERE MICROMAX CANVAS HD A116, HTC ONE S, SONY XPERIA SL, HTC DESIRE X AND SAMSUNG GALAXY S2. WELL TO BE HONEST, THE CANVAS OFFERS ALMOST THE SAME OR SLIGHTLY BETTER FEATURES THAN THE GRAND BUT IT DOESN'T HAVE A PREMIUM FEEL. ALSO I READ ABOUT THE ISSUES WITH THE AFTER SALES SERVICE OF MICROMAX AND SO DIDN'T BUY IT. THE ONE S IS A DECENT PHONE BUT THE LIMITED 16GB INTERNAL STORAGE (12GB - USABLE), THE S3 PROCESSOR AND A SLIGHTLY HIGHER COST (24000) DISAPPOINTED ME. EVEN THE DESIRE X DIDN'T IMPRESS ME MUCH. I WENT TO THE STORE FOR GETTING MYSELF THE SONY XPERIA SL. I LOVED THE FEATURES - 1.7GHZ PROCESSOR, 32GB INTERNAL STORAGE(26 GB - USABLE), 4.3 INCH SCREEN AND THE 12MP CAMERA. THE ONLY CONS WERE A BOXY DESIGN AND A MICRO-SIM (ADD NO DUAL SIM TO THAT). MORE ON SONY HAD NO IMMEDIATE PLANS FOR A JELLY BEAN UPGRADE. FINALLY IT WAS THE GRAND THAT HAD ALMOST ALL THE FEATURES IN IT. A 5 INCH SCREEN (187PPI - SO WHAT ? I NEVER FELT THE SCREEN WAS BAD), 8GB INTERNAL STORAGE (4GB USABLE - I WISH I HAD 16GB INTERNAL STORAGE), JELLYBEAN (IT IS BUTTER-SMOOTH) , 1GB RAM (SHOWS AROUND 800MB) DUAL CORE PROCESSOR, DUAL SIM (3G+2G), EXTERNAL EXPANDABLE MEMORY SLOT UPTO 64GB, 8 MP REAR AND 2MP FRONT LED FLASH CAMERA AND THE PREMIUM FEELING.
      
      CONS -
      
      1. YES THE BATTERY DRAINS OUT PRETTY FAST.
      
      2. CAMERA IS GREAT BUT NOT AWESOME.
      
      3. I WISH THE INTERNAL STORAGE WAS ATLEAST 16GB.
      
      4. NO GORILLA GLASS AND AMOLED SCREEN.
      
      5. DISPLAY PROBLEMS WITH GAMES LIKE SUBWAY SURFER.
      
      
      BUT THESE ARE NOT SERIOUS PROBLEMS AND I HOPE YOU WILL LOVE THIS PHONE.

label: Galaxy Grand
Sentences:
I HAD USED THIS MOBILE FOR MORE THAN A MONTH NOW. THE MOBILE IS JUST FANTASTIC - TRUST ME, I HAD BOUGHT THIS MOBILE AFTER A LOT OF RESEARCH BY READING EXPERT REVIEWS.
      
      
      MOST OF THE USERS COMPLAIN ABOUT THE MOBILE PHONE GETTING HANGED - IT'S JUST BECAUSE RAM IS ALMOST FULL (YES, MOST OF THE PRE INSTALLED APPS EAT UP A LOT OF RAM; GOOGLE AND SAMSUNG APPS FILL UP MOST OF THE RAM CAPACITY).
      
      BUT THERE IS A WAY TO KEEP IT UP AND RUNNING. NEED TO INSTALL ANY THIRD PARTY APP TO MANAGE THE STARTUP APPS AND ALSO NEED TO KILL UNWANTED APPS AS AND WHEN REQUIRED.
      
      
      BATTERY: BATTERY LASTS GOOD ENOUGH FOR 2 FULL DAYS FOR ME. USE WIFI CONNECTIVITY WHEREEVER POSSIBLE AND SWITCH OFF THE 'MOBILE DATA' OPTION, IF NOT REQUIRED. ALSO THERE ARE CERTAIN TWEAKS AVAILABLE TO ENSURE GOOD BATTERY BACKUP, BY TURNING OFF UNWANTED MOTION SETTINGS.
      
      
      DISPLAY: I HADN'T FOUND ANY ISSUE WITH THE 480 X 800 PIXEL RESOLUTION DISPLAY. EVERY TEXT IS READABLE OR EVERY VIDEO IS ENJOYABLE, EXCEPT FOR VERY VERY MINUTE PIXELATION EFFECTS THAT ARE  NOT ALWAYS NOTICEABLE.
      
      
      THE ONLY MAJOR ISSUE I FOUND IS THE DELAY IN OPENING THE CAMERA APP - YOU NEED TO WAIT FOR 4-5 SECS (OR EVEN HIGHER SOMETIMES) TO OPEN THE CAMERA APP AND START CLICKING PHOTOS..
      
      
      OVERALL IT'S A WORTHY MOBILE WITH THE DISCOUNTED PRICING AVAILABLE IN FLIPKART (I BOUGHT IT WITH 15% CASH BACK OFFER).

label: Galaxy Grand
Sentences:
I WANTED A DUAL SIM PHONE WITH A BIG DISPLAY AND WITH USEFULL FEATURES HENCE, I BOUGHT SAMSUNG GRAND IN MONTHS OF MARCH AND TILL TODAY I HAVE TRIED OUT ALL ITS FEATURES, PLAYED HARDCORE GAMES, WATCHED FULL LENGTH HD MOVIES BACK TO BACK TILL THE BATTERY COMPLETELY DRAINED OUT. I HAVE USED PHONE'S CAMERA A LOT AND I HAVE ALSO DONE FULL HD VIDEO RECORDING  AND  I MUST SAY THAT I AM SATISFIED WITH THIS PRODUCT.
      
      BUT, THERE IS A NEVER A PRODUCT MADE WITHOUT ANY KIND OF FLAWS. :) HERE ARE THE FLAWS THAT I HAVE EXPERIENCE TILL NOW:
      
      THOUGH THE DISPLAY IS GREAT PRODUCING SATISFACTORY COLOURS AND CONTRAST, BUT THERE IS A SATURATION PROBLEM. I MEAN IF THERE IS AN IMAGE WITH RED COLOUR ON IT, THEN THE RED BECOME TOO  SATURATED.
      
      WHEN YOU ARE ON THE STREETS DURING DAYTIME, THEN IT BECOMES LITTLE DIFFICULT TO SEE THE DISPLAY UNLESS YOU INCREASE THE BRIGHTNESS TO 70%. NOW, IF YOU KEEP THE DISPLAY BRIGHTNESS TO 70% ALL DAY LONG, THEN ITS GOING TO DRAIN PHONE'S BATTERY A LOT FASTER.
      
      I'M NOT SURE IF THIS IS A PROBLEM WITH OTHER ANDROID PHONES, WHEN I CLICK ON THE GREEN LOG ICON ON THE HOMSCREEN, IT TAKES 2-3 SECONDS TO SHOW THE CONTENTS OF THE LOG. I APPROACHED THE SAMSUNG SERVICE CENTRE AND INQUIRED REGARDING THE SAME, HE SAYS THIS IS COMMON FLAW WITH THE SAMSUNG PHONES.
      
      WELL, SAMSUNG CLAIMS THAT PHONE HAS AN INBUILT MEMORY OF 8GB BUT WHEN YOU USE THE PHONE, YOU'LL BE SHOCKED TO SEE THAT IT OFFERS ONLY 4 GB OF USABLE MEMORY. SO, YOU ARE FORCED TO BUY AN EXTERNAL SD CARD IF YOU NEED TO STORE LOT OF SONGS AND MOVIES.
      
      THE BUILD QUALITY IS THE AREA WHERE SAMSUNG REALLY NEEDS TO IMPROVE A LOT. WITHIN 2 WEEKS OF USE, I STARTED TO SEE SCRATCHES ON THE BACK PANEL. WHEN YOU HOLD THE PHONE, IT FEELS FLIMSY. STILL, THE METALLIC PAINT ON THE BACK PANEL DOES LOOK UPMARKET.
      
      THE CAMERA OF PHONE IS GOOD BUT EVEN WITH THE ANTI-SHAKE FEATURE ACTIVATED, STILL PHOTOS DO COME SLIGHTLY SHAKY. LOW LIGHT PHOTOGRAPHY IS NOT ITS STRENGTH AT ALL. THE COLOUR RE-PRODUCTION IS GREAT AND EVEN THE HD VIDEO RECORDING IS GOOD.
      
      
      OVERALL, EVEN THOUGH WITH THE FLAWS, I FEEL RS. 19,000 PRICE TAG IS WORTH IT WHEN YOU COMPARE IT TO MICROMAX CANVAS HD. IF YOU ARE LOOKING FOR A DUAL SIM PHONE AND IF YOU ARE READY TO COMPROMISE A LITTLE. THEN YOU WILL HAVE SMILE ON YOUR FACE. :)

label: Galaxy Grand
Sentences:
I WON'T TALK ABOUT ANY TECHNICAL SEPCS OF THE PHONE. ONLY THE IN HAND EXPERIENCE OF THE PHONE
      
      FIRST OF ALL GOT THE PHONE FOR 19800 IN BANGALORE.
      
      
      ALL THE  CONS THAT I COULD FIND ON THIS PHONE
      
      * RESOLUTION IS LESS YES, WVGA , IF YOU ARE A USER OF  PHONES LIKE XPERIA S,SL,SOLA, P. SAMSUNG S2,S3,IPHONE 4,4S  AND OTHERS U WILL IMMEDIATELY NOTICE THE DIFFERENCE IN THE SCCREEN,THE ICONS,FONT,WIDGETS ETC. ARE BIGGER AND UGLY ELSE U WONT FIND A DIFFERENCE
      
      
      *YES THE PHONE HANGS (OR I MUST SAY FREEZES), IT FROZE THREE TIMES SO FAR,  MOSTLY WHEN U DO MULTI TASKING. WHEN IT FREEZES U DONT HAVE ANY OPTION BUT TO DETACH THE BATTERY AND RESTART (REMEMBR IT DIDNT LAG OR HANGED IN ANY CONDITION ,IT FROZE)
      
      
      * INTERNAL MEMORY IS A DISSAPOINTMENT , ONLY 4 GB OF AVAILABLE MEMORY. AND SINCE IT COMES WITH JELLY BEAN  YOU CANT REALLY TRANSFER UR APPS/GAMES TO SD CARD. SD CARD IS JUST FOR MOVIES,VIDS,MUSIC,PICS. (YES U CAN SOLVE THIS PROBLEM BY ROOTING IT)
      
      
      * CAMERA IS OHKAY, NOT THAT GREAT BUT ABOVE AVERAGE.
      
      
      *YOU ARE LEFT WITH  AROUND 680 MB OF RAM AFTER RESTARTING OF YOUR DEVICE
      
      
      * FEW SIMPLE GAMES ARE NOT COMPATIBLE LIKE LINE RUNNER 2, VECTOR ETC
      
      
      * NO NFC, MAKES IT AN OLD GRANDPA :(
      
      
      *DON'T BUY THE ELEGANT WHITE VARIETY OF THE PHONE, THE FLIP COVER LOOKS DIRTY IN ONE WEEK :( UNLESS LIKE GIRLS U KEEP IT IN A PURSE/ OR BAG
      
      
      *EAR PHONE QUALITY NOT THE BEST (IF U R A MUSIC LOVER, U'LL NOTICE IT INSTANTLY)
      
      
      NOW THE REASONS I LIKE THIS PHONE
      
      *IT GIVES A GRAND FEELING, MOST OF THE PEOPLE WILL MISTAKE IT WITH NOTE2, S3. TRUST ME IT FEELS GUD
      
      
      *THE PROCESSOR IS QUITE FAST, IT NEVER LAGS ,HANGS, (OTHER THAN FREEZING THRICE SO FAR), RAM IS SUFFICIENT TO LISTEN TO THE MUSIC, SURF INTERNET AND AT THE SAME TIME DRAW SOMETHING IN SMEMO (USING MULTI WINDOW)
      
      
      *MULTI WINDOW, DIDNT REALLY USE IT SO FAR, OTHER THAN WHILE SHOWING OFF TO MY FRIENDS, BUT TELL ME HOW MANY PHONES IN THE MARKET HAS THIS FEATURE IN THEIR DEVICE.
      
      
      * CAMERA IS FAST. THE SHUTTER SPEED IS QUITE GOOD, NO LAG  . THE LED FLASH IS THE BEST IN THAT RANGE. THE VIDEO RECORDING IS ONE OF THE  BEST IN THE MARKET
      
      
      * THE UI OR THE TOUCHWIZ IS THE BEST PART OF THE DEVICE. YOU FALL IN LOVE WITH THE UI ASA U WILL HOLD THIS PHONE. EVERYTHING IS SO OPTIMIZED FOR ENHANCED USER EXPRIENCE. I M SURE THERE ARE LOT OF CHEAP PHONES WITH BETTER HARDWARE SPECS BUT SAMSUNG GRAND DEFEATS EVERYONE WITH ITS INTERFACE.
      
      
      * FEATURES TAKEN FROM NOTE2,S3 LIKE SMEMO, SVOICE, BUDDYSHARE, ETC ARE A GOOD INCLUSION
      
      
      *THE SCREEN DESPITE OF 187 PPI, LOOKS GREAT, THE COLORS WITH AMPLE SATURATION MAKES ITS SCREEN QUITE AWESOME.
      
      
      * LOVE WHAT THEY DID WITH THE MUSIC PLAYER, U NEVER HAVE TO DOWNLOAD ANY 3RD PARTY MUSIC PLAYER.
      
      
      SO , I CONSIDER GALAXY GRAND IS DECENT BUY, CONSIDERING YOUR NEEDS,
      
      IF YOU ARE NORMAL STUDENT OR FRESHER IN INDUSTRY AND CANT SPEND ABOVE 30 K TO GET THE PREMIUM SMART PHONES, AND IF YOU LISTEN TO THE MUSIC, PLAY ALL THE  POPULAR GAMES, CLICK AND INSTAGRAM/FB POST YOUR PICS, DO A LOT OF GOOGLING AND WIKIPEDIA, NEED MAP DIRECTION EVERY NOW AND THEN AND ARE INTO MESSAGING AND WHATSAPPING
      
      AND WANT TO CARRY A  PREMIUM LOOKING DEVICE WITH YOU, THAT GRABS ATTENTION EVERYTIME YOU CHECK YOUR PHONE
      
      THEN THIS IS THE PHONE FOR YOU .
      
      
      ALTERNATIVES : GHOSTLY MMX CANVAS HD(ALTHOUGH LESS INTERNAL MEMORY AND NO UI LIKE TOUCH WHIZ) , AND MAY BE XPERIA ION( WITH SERVER PRO WARRANTY)

label: Galaxy Grand
Sentences:
ACCOLADES FOR FLIPKART - TIMELY SHIPMENT, GOOD PACKAGING AND SMOOTH DELIVERY OF THESE ITEMS.
      
      
      STRAIGHT FACTS -
      
      
      POSITIVISM:
      
      
      1.DISPLAY, EVEN THOUGH NOT AMOLED OR IPS, IS REASONABLY DECENT- THAT'S WHERE CUSTOMERS COMPROMISE WHICH I FEEL IS FAIRLY JUSTIFIED.
      
      
      2.SNAPPY WITH LITTLE OR NO LAG ON A DUAL CORE PROCESSOR - GOOD ENOUGH FOR MULTI-PROCESSING AND TASKING.
      
      
      3.HANDLES 1080P VIDEOS SMOOTHLY WITHOUT THE NEED OF HARDWARE ACCELERATION - THE UNIT COMES WITH A BROADCOM GPU, DOING A HIGH FRAME RATE.
      
      
      4. HAS THE HARDWARE TO SUPPORT GLONASS ALONG WITH A-GPS, HELPS TO PIN POINT LOCATIONS EFFICIENTLY AND ACCURATELY.
      
      
      NEGATIVISM:
      
      
      1. BATTERY COULD HAVE BEEN BIGGER, DRAINS OUT QUICKLY, EVEN AFTER OPTIMIZING BATTERY PERFORMANCE.
      
      
      2. PRIMARY CAMERA 8MP - PICTURE QUALITY NOT THAT GREAT (OBJECTS AND NOT SUBJECTS AT TIMES ARE OUT OF FOCUS), 2MP SECONDARY CAMERA (FRONT) NOT CAPABLE OF HD RECORDING (NOT EVEN AT 720P).
      
      
      3.AT THIS PRICE, THE PHONE COULD HAVE BEEN EQUIPPED WITH A MICRO/MINI HDMI PORT.
      
      
      4. 8GB INTERNAL MEMORY - DON'T GET ELUDED - OUT OF THE TOTAL DEVICE STORAGE, 4GB IS UTILIZED BY ANDROID OS, USERS'  HAVE ONLY 4GB (LESS THAN 3.84GB IN PRINCIPLE) BUT THEN AGAIN YOU ALWAYS HAVE THE OPTION OF EXPANDING IT UPTO 64GB.
      
      
      AS PART OF THE COMBO OFFER - THE TRANSCEND 16GB MICRO SDHC CARD HAS A POOR WRITE SPEED, THEREFORE, COPYING FILES TO THE STORAGE MEMORY FROM AN EXTERNAL SOURCE OVER THE DATA CABLE PROVIDED IS GROSSLY SLOW.SLIGHT PERFORMANCE ENHANCEMENT COULD BE SEEN IF THE CARD IS USED IN THE CARD READER SLOT OF A LAPTOP OR DESKTOP.
      
      
      ON A WHOLE - GOOD PHONE WHEN PRICE TO PERFORMANCE RATIO IS CONSIDERED.
      
      
      'BUILD QUALITY'  OF THE PHONE MIGHT BE GOOD..WHY I AM SAYING THIS AS I HAVE NOT USED ANY OTHER NEW GENERATION SMARTPHONES, BUT OVERALL QUALITY WOULD HAVE TO COUNT THE AFTER SALES SUPPORT THAT A COMPANY ASSURES A BUYER  EVEN AFTER END OF WARRANTY PERIOD..KEEPING MY FINGERS CROSSED ON THE SERVICE...AS I HAD A BITTER PAST EXPERIENCE WITH ONE OF THE SAMSUNG SERVICE CENTRES IN KOLKATA.

label: Galaxy Grand
Sentences:
HI,
      
      
      I DON'T OWN THIS PHONE BUT WRITING THIS TO TELL A FEW FACTS ABOUT A GRAND.
      
      
      FIRST THING I WANT TO ASK IS HOW EVERYONE WAS ABLE TO REVIEW EVEN WITHOUT USING IT.
      
      I AM NOT SAYING IT IS A BAD PHONE BUT PLEASE BE CAUTIOUS BEFORE BUYING THIS PHONE AND READ THE BELOW FACTS ABOUT THIS PHONE THAT I KNOW WHICH NOT EVEN SAMSUNG IS NOT SAYING IT.
      
      
      DISPLAY: WVGA RESOLUTION. THIS IS THE SAME RESOLUTION AS ON GALAXY S2. BUT THIS PHONE HAS 5 INCHES VERSUS 4.3 ON S2.
      
      DUE TO SAME RESOLUTION ON LARGE SCREEN THE DISPLAY WONT BE SHARP. QUALITY WILL BE DEFINITELY LESS COMPARED TO 2 YEAR OLD S2.
      
      THIS IS NOT SUPER AMOLED. THIS PHONE HAS JUST LCD DISPLAY. QUALITY OF LCD DISPLAY WILL BE VERY BAD. UNDER SUNLIGHT SUPER AMOLED IS NOT GOOD BUT GOOD IN INDOOR USAGE.
      
      LCD WILL BE WORSE IN BOTH SUNLIGHT AND INDOOR USAGE.
      
      
      PROCESSOR: ALL SAMSUNG IS SAYING THIS PHONE HAS 1.2 GHZ DUAL CORE. IN S2 IT HAS ITS OWN POPULAR EXYNOS PROCESSOR.
      
      GRAND HAS BROADCOMM PROCESSOR. THIS IS PROBABLY THE FIRST PHONE WITH THIS PROCESSOR. I HAVE NEVER SEEN A PHONE WITH BROADCOMM PROCESSOR. I AM NOT SAYING ITS BAD BUT WE DON'T KNOW UNTIL ITS REVIEWED.
      
      THE REASON FOR USING THAT PROCESSOR MUST BE CHEAP PRICE. OTHERWISE WHY WOULD SAMSUNG USE OTHER COMPANIES PROCESSOR INSTEAD OF USING ITS OWN PROCESSOR.
      
      
      TWO MOST IMPORTANT SPECS OF ANY PHONE IS PROCESSOR AND DISPLAY. THESE TWO THINGS ARE BAD COMPARED TO 2 YEAR OLD GALAXY S2.
      
      
      THE ONLY REASON THIS PHONE GOT ATTENTION OF PEOPLE IS BECAUSE OF ITS SCREEN SIZE (5 INCHES).
      
      
      SO BE CAREFUL AND THINK A LOT BEFORE BUYING.
      
      
      I AM GOING TO RATE THIS PHONE 2 STARS BECAUSE SAMSUNG IS HIDING THE FACTS ABOUT DISPLAY AND PROCESSOR.

label: Galaxy Grand
Sentences:
I, HAVE REALLY UNDERSTOOD THE FACTS ABOUT GRAND AND THEY HAVE JUST SHOCKED ME. PEOPLE ARE NORMALLY EXITED BY THE SCREEN ; BUT THEY DONT KNOW WHT IS BEHIND IT, WHAT SECRETS SAMSUNG IS HIDING. ASK URSELF->SCREEN OF S3 IS SMALLER THAN GRAND,AND S3 WAS OUT FOR 40K AND GRAND FOR 20K;STILL YOU THINK GRAND IS BETTER,HOW IDOTIC....! GRAND USERS ARE NOW EXPERINCING PROBLEMS. I SUGGEST NOONE SHOULD BUY A GRAND FOR FOLLOWING REASONS:-
      
      
      NEGITIVISM:-
      
      
      FIRSTLY:- GRAND'S ALL OUTTER LAYER OF WHATEVER COLOUR IS MADE OF PLASTIC. SO USERS BEWARE OF CRACKING IN THE PHONE OR DISPLAY BREAK + ITS DUAL SIM, WHICH GIVES A KINDA CHINA LOOK TO THE PHONE! ACTUALLY IT GIVES ME A LAUGH...HOW PEOPLE GET CRAZY AND BUY THE PHONE WHEN THE PRICE IS LOW!
      
      
      1.DISPLAY: WVGA RESOLUTION.A NORMAL XPERIA PHONE WORTH 12K HAS BETTER DISPLAY RESOLUTION(FWVGA) THAN GRAND! DUE TO SUCH RESOLUTION ON LARGE SCREEN THE DISPLAY WONT BE SHARP AT ALL! QUALITY WILL BE DEFINITELY VERY LESS COMPARED TO 2 YEAR OLD S2. GRAND IS NOT AMOLED. IT IS JUST LCD! LCD WILL BE WORST IN BOTH SUNLIGHT AND INDOOR USAGE. NOT WORTH PRICE!
      
      
      2.PROCESSOR: ALL SAMSUNG IS SAYING THIS PHONE HAS 1.2 GHZ DUAL CORE. GRAND HAS BROADCOMM PROCESSOR. THIS IS PROBABLY THE FIRST PHONE WITH THIS PROCESSOR. I HAVE NEVER SEEN A PHONE WITH BROADCOMM PROCESSOR. PROCESSOR DOESNT MATCH WITH THE SCREEN! BEWARE:MINOR/BASIC APPLICATIONS LIKE GOSMS ETC WILL GIVE A LAG.THE REASON FOR USING THAT PROCESSOR MUST BE CHEAP PRICE. OTHERWISE WHY WOULD SAMSUNG USE OTHER COMPANIES PROCESSOR INSTEAD OF USING ITS OWN PROCESSOR. NOT WORTH PRICE!
      
      
      3. BATTERY SHOULD HAVE BEEN BETTER. 2100 MH DRAINS IN 4 HOURS ONLY WITH ABOVE AVERAGE USE IN DOWNLOADING, GAMING, TEXTING. AGAIN A NORMAL XPERIA PHONE HAS 2X TIMES BETTER! A PHONE WORTH 20K MUST HAVE ATLEAST 9HRS BACKUP! NOT WORTH PRICE!
      
      
      4. FLIP COVER IS LOOKS OK BUT NOT A MAGNETIC COVER TO SWITCH OFF / ON THE DISPLAY AUTOMATICALLY WHEN CLOSED / OPEN. NOTHING INTERESTING IN IT!
      
      
      5. PRIMARY CAMERA 8MP - PICTURE QUALITY NOT THAT GREAT (OBJECT AND NOT SUBJECTS AT TIMES IS OUT OF FOCUS), 2MP SECONDARY CAMERA (FRONT) NOT CAPABLE OF HD RECORDING (NOT EVEN AT 720P).NOT WORTH PRICE!
      
      
      6. 8GB INTERNAL MEMORY - DON'T GET ELUDED - OUT OF THE TOTAL DEVICE STORAGE, 4GB IS UTILIZED BY ANDROID OS USERS' HAVE ONLY 4GB (LESS THAN 3.84GB IN PRINCIPLE).SAMSUNG WILL GIVE SOME JUNK DEFAULT USELESS APPLICATIONS, WHICH WILL OCCUPY HALF OF THE PHONE MEMORY. PEOPLE WHO HAVE GRAND CHECK FOR URSELF.
      
      
      7.PLUS - ADDITION TO THIS USERS ARE EXPERIENCING TOUCH PROBLEMS, AUTO TURN OFF, AND A BUZZ SOUND DURING CALL AFTER USAGE OF 9 TO 10 MONTHS !
      
      
      SO... HERE WE COME TO THE CONCLUSION...COMPARED TO THE PRICE GRAND IS NOT WORTH THE PRICE. I GIVE 2 STARS OUT 5 ( MAYBE 2 OUT OF 10) ABOVE POINTS GIVE A FEELING OF A CHINA PHONE ( ITS DUAL SIM) BETTER BUY AN XPERIA  ..IT WILL DEFINETLY SERVE BETTER!

label: Galaxy Grand
Sentences:
HI,
      
      
      I HAVE BEEN USING THIS PHONE FOR A WEEK NOW. LOTS OF CONS, SOME PROS.
      
      CONS:
      
      HANGS. A LOT. AND CANNOT BE RESET THEN WITH POWER KEY...YOU HAVE TO PULL OUT THE COVER AND REMOVE THE BATTERY. BUT YOU WILL HAVE TO DO THIS ONLY ONCE IN A DAY. IF YOU ARE LUCKY, THIS MAY NOT HAPPEN IN AN ENTIRE DAY. IF YOU ARE UNLUCKY, YOUR PHONE MAY NOT RECEIVE CALLS FOR SEVERAL HOURS BECAUSE YOU DON'T KNOW IT HAD HANGED IN YOUR POCKET. THIS DID NOT IMPROVE EVEN AFTER I DID THE LATEST FIRMWARE UPDATE USING KIES.
      
      
      CORPORATE EMAIL SYNCING PROBLEM: THIS I HAVE REALISED IS A COMMON PROBLEM WITH SAMSUNG HANDSETS. EMAIL DOESN'T SYNC WELL. SOMETIMES IT SYNCS ONLY WHEN YOU HIT THE SYNC KEY MANUALLY, THOUGH YOU HAVE SET IT TO AUTO SYNC. SOMETIMES IT DOESN'T UPDATE FOR 3 OR 4 HOURS; SOMETIMES A FEW EMAILS NEVER COME (THOUGH THIS IS RARE)
      
      
      SCREEN: THIS IS NOT A DISAPPOINTMENT--ITS A GOOD SCREEN, BUT FEELS A BIT BAD IF YOU REALIZE THAT MICROMAX A110 HAS THE EXACT SAME SCREEN--YOU WANT SOMETHING A BIT BETTER AT THIS PRICE. BUT IS GOOD BY ITSELF, IF NONE OF YOUR FRIENDS HAS A MICROMAX A110 CANVAS2 (NO, ITS NOT COMPARABLE TO A116--ITS TOUCH AND FEEL AND PERFORMANCE IS LIKE THE A110, WHICH A CLOSE RELATIVE IS USING AND HAS NO PROBLEMS WITH)
      
      
      DATA NETWORK DOESN'T GET CONNECTED MANY TIMES, AND OTHER SAMSUNG PHONES TOO SEEM TO FACE THIS ISSUE. THOUGH THIS IS NOT AS SERIOUS AS EMAIL SYNC. MY OFFICE IT SUPPORT SAID THIS ISSUE CROPS UP MANY TIMES, BUT IT HAS NEVER COME ON A NON-SAMSUNG PHONE.
      
      
      ALARM DOESN'T RING SOMETIMES--SOME NOTIFICATIONS IN THE MORNING SHOWUP ONLY WHEN THE PHONE ALARM RINGS, EG. SOME WHAT'SAPP NOTIFICATIONS OR LOW BATTERY NOTIFICATIONS, CAUSING THE ALARM TO JUST STOP IN 2-3 SECONDS, THUS CAUSING YOU TO SLEEP. SIMPLE SOLUTION IS TO SET TWO ALARMS EACH MORNING. YOU WON'T FORGET TO DO THIS THE FIRST TIME YOU GET LATE FOR OFFICE DUE TO THIS BUG. SAW ANOTHER USER ON A FORUM FACING THE SAME ALARM PROBLEM. ALARM IS AN IMPORTANT FEATURE FOR ME, SO HIGHLY DISAPPOINTED. IF YOU CAN'T DEPEND ON AN ALARM, ITS AS GOOD AS NOT THERE.
      
      
      FACED THIS THREE TIMES ON THE FIRST TWO DAYS OF USE: CALL COMES IN, BUT YOU DON'T HEAR ANYTHING. BUT HASN'T HAPPENED FOR PAST FEW DAYS; MAY HAVE BEEN FIXED BY THE FIRMWARE UPDATE, THOUGH I THINK IT HAPPENED ONCE EVEN AFTER THE UPDATE
      
      
      THIS ONE IS THE LEAST OF A CON--SCREEN IS OVERSENSITIVE, CAUSING THE DELETE BUTTON (ONSCREEN) TO BE PRESSED WHEN YOU TRY TO USE THE 'BACK' BUTTON AT PHONE LOWER RIGHT CORNER (IN THE ACTIVESYNC EMAIL APP).
      
      
      ANOTHER ONE: THE WALLPAPER DOES NOT MOVE LEFT OR RIGHT WHEN YOU MOVE THE HOMESCREENS. THIS HAPPENS FOR ALL CHEAPER NON-SAMSUNG PHONES, SO NO REASON WHY SHOULD NOT BE GIVEN BY SAMSUNG, ESPECIALLY WHEN ITS UI IS WHAT PEOPLE LOOK TO
      
      
      ALSO, SAMSUNG DISABLES YOUR ABILITY TO MOVE APPS TO SD CARD. BUT THIS APPLIES TO ALL SAMSUNG PHONES (S3, S4, NOTE II). ALL YOU CAN USE IS THE INTERNAL MEMORY. MANY HAVE A DOUBT ABOUT HOW MUCH THE GRAND HAS. WELL, IT HAS AROUND 3.9GB AVAILABLE TO THE USER, SO IT DOESN'T MATTER WHETHER SOMEONE SAYS IT 4GB OR 8GB. YOU GET THE FULL 3.9 GB.
      
      
      SCREEN FADES OUT WHILE READING, AND THEN AGAIN BECOMES FINE IN A FEW SECONDS. THE 'EYES' DETECTING FEATURE KEEPS THE SCREEN ON MOST TIMES (BUT FADES IN BETWEEN AS MENTIONED), BUT DISAPPOINTS SOMETIMES, ESPECIALLY IN LOW LIGHT, OR SOMETIMES IF YOU ARE WEARING SPECS
      
      
      PROS:
      
      LOOKS GOOD, LIKE A HIGH-END PHONE
      
      IS NOW AVAILABLE AT 18.2K IF YOU USE THE MONEY-BACK -EMI OFFER (ON STD CHARTERED AND ICICI BAND CREDIT CARDS)
      
      SMOOTH OPERATION. OUT OF BOX, I FELT IT LAGGED A BIT, BUT SINCE THEN, SOMEHOW I AM IMPRESSED BY SMOOTHNESS OF OPERATION. YOU WILL LOVE THE PHONE'S FEEL.
      
      HANGS ONLY ONCE IN A DAY. ONCE YOU GET USED TO REMOVING ITS COVER AND BATTERY, ITS A CHILD'S PLAY TO DO ONLY 30 TIMES A MONTH (HANGING IS NOT SPECIFIC TO CERTAIN UNITS--JUST DO A GOOGLE SEARCH FOR 'GALAXY GRAND HANGING PROBLEM' AND SEE HOW MANY RESULTS YOU GET)
      
      
      BOUGHT THIS THOUGH ON A TIGHT BUDGET, SINCE I HAD READ MICROMAX IS BAD IF YOU ARE UNLUCKY TO HAVE A FAULTY HANDSET, SINCE THEY HAVE BAD SERVICE. SAMSUNG HARDWARE IS GOOD, AND THIS ONE IS NO EXCEPTION. THE SOFTWARE ISSUE (HANGING, ETC) IS POINTED OUT SO COMMONLY ONLINE THAT SAMSUNG WILL EVENTUALLY ATTEMPT TO FIX IT IN THE NEXT FIRMWARE (UNLESS THEY AREN'T ABLE TO, OR THEIR SUPPORT TEAMS MOVE ON TO FOCUS ON THE NEWER MODELS).
      
      
      PLEASE RATE THIS REVIEW HIGHLY IF YOU FEEL IT IS USEFUL, SO THAT OTHERS MAY BENEFIT FROM IT. I FEEL NO ONE SHOULD FEEL THE PAIN THAT I FELT AFTER STRETCHING MY WALLET MORE THAN I COULD, ONLY TO GET RELIABILITY OF SAMSUNG OVER MICROMAX. NOW I THINK IT WASN'T WORTH IT...WILL BE BLESSED IF OTHERS ARE SAVED SOME PAIN.

      LET ME TELL YOU THE REASONS FOR WHICH I DIDN'T LIKE THIS MOBILE, AFTER I CHECKED A DEMO PIECE AT UNIVERCELL SHOP:

      I RECOMMEND S3 INSTEAD OF THIS PHONE, IF YOU ARE READY TO SPEND 6-7 K MORE.

Sentences:
I WAS LOOKING FOR A SMARTPHONE AT 20K RANGE FOR MY FRIEND, AND SHORTLISTED SAMSUNG GRAND DUOS AND SONY XPERIA ION. I FOUND OUT THAT XPERIA ION IS MUCH BETTER THEN GRAND DUOS THOUGH AT SAME PRICE.
      
      
      ION IS A 4G PHONE WHILE GRAND DUOS IS 3G.
      
      
      ION HAS 1.5 GHZ QUALCOMM SCORPION, DUAL CORE PROCESSOR, WHILE DUOS HAS 1.2 GHZ UNKNOWN BROADCOMM PROCESSOR. BOTH HAVE 1 GB RAM.
      
      
      ION HAS 4.6 INCH HD 720 X 1280 PIXELS WITH 323 PPI DENSITY WHILE GRAND DUOS HAS 5 INCH 480 X 800 PIXELS WITH JUST 187 PIXEL DENSITY. GRAND DUOS DOES NOT HAVE SUPER AMOLED SCREEN, AND DISPLAY QUALITY IS FAR LESS THEN XPERIA SERIES PHONES. WHATS THE USE OF BIGGER SCREEN WITH LOWER QUALITY?
      
      
      ION HAS 12 MP CAMERA VS 8 MP GRAND DUOS HAVE. FURTHER, SONY CAMERAS ARE FAR SUPERIOR THEN SAMSUNG. EVEN IPHONE AND NOKIA USE SONY CAMERA LENSES.
      
      
      ION IS ALSO UPGRADABLE TO ANDROID 4.1.
      
      
      ION HAS INTERNAL MEMORY OF 16 GB (12 GB FOR USER) VS 8 GB (4 GB FOR USER) IN GRAND DUOS. FURTHER, U CANNOT TRANSFER APPLICATIONS TO SD CARD IN SAMSUNG, WHILE U CAN IN SONY.
      
      
      ION HAS HDMI PORT WHICH GRAND DUOS DOES NOT HAVE.
      
      
      THERE IS NO SIGNIFICANT DIFFERENCE IN BATTERY SIZE.
      
      
      BUILD QUALITY OF SONY PHONES ARE ALWAYS SUPERIOR THEN SAMSUNG PHONES. NO EXCEPTION HERE.
      
      
      SO IN ALL MAJOR FACTORS, ION OUTPERFORMS GRAND DUOS BY GRAND MARGIN. IN FACT ION OUTPERFORMS SAMSUNG S2 AND ONLY S3 IS COMPARABLE WITH ION (THOUGH S3 ON HIGHER SIDE).
      
      
      FINALLY I WOULD SUGGEST, DONT BUY JUST BECAUSE YOUR FRIEND HAS BOUGHT. COMPARE PHONES, CHECK YOURSELF AND THEN TAKE DECISION.

label: Galaxy Note
Sentences:
I BOUGHT THIS PRODUCT ON 2ND FEB 2013, AND I'M WRITING THIS REVIEW BASED ONLY ON MY PERSONAL EXPERIENCE OF 1 WEEK OF USAGE, AND NOT BASED ON ITS SPECIFICATIONS ON PAPER.
      
      
      FIRST UP, THE THING THAT IMMEDIATELY CAUGHT MY ATTENTION WAS, HOW BEAUTIFUL THE DISPLAY IS - ITS ABSOLUTELY GORGEOUS! FULL HD VIDEOS & HIGH DEF IMAGES LOOK GREAT ON IT!
      
      
      THE  CAMERA IS ALSO REALLY GOOD. I MEAN, I'M NOT COMPARING IT WITH ANYTHING (READ, IPHONE 5, LUMIA 920, ETC); ALL I'M SAYING IS, ONE CAN'T BE DISAPPOINTED WITH THE NOTE 2 FOR ITS CAMERA. BESIDES, I FOUND THAT LOW LIGHT PHOTOS ARE ALSO VERY GOOD (AGAIN, NOT COMPARING WITH ANYTHING); THEY ARE MORE THAN SATISFACTORILY DETAILED ENOUGH, FOR ME AT LEAST - MUCH, MUCH BETTER THAN THE 5 MP SHOOTER ON MY PREVIOUS PHONE (MOTOROLA DEFY).
      
      
      THE PHONE HAS NO LAG. BE IT BROWSING, GAMING, OR SIMPLY DOING THE BASIC FUNCTIONS - NONE OF THEM SHOWED ANY SIGN OF LAG.
      
      
      AN IMPORTANT POINT TO NOTE HERE: A FRIEND OF MINE HAS A GALAXY SIII, AND AFTER HE INSTALLED THE JELLY BEAN UPDATE 4.1.1, HIS PHONE WAS LAGGY. I MEAN, HE COMPLAINED ABOUT IT ALL THE TIME, AND I CHECKED THAT OUT PERSONALLY - THAT PHONE JUST LAGGED IN JUST ABOUT ANYTHING, SOMETIMES LESS, SOMETIMES FOR LONGER DURATIONS. WHEN YOU HELD IT IN YOUR HAND, IT DIDN'T APPEAR THAT THIS PHONE HAS A QUAD CORE CPU INSIDE! IN FACT, HE TOLD ME THAT HE RESTARTS THE PHONE EVERY MORNING, COZ OTHERWISE THE LAGGYNESS BECOMES JUST TOO MUCH TO BARE. I SIMPLY COULDN'T UNDERSTAND IT - I MEAN, AFTER ALL, JELLY BEAN IS SUPPOSED TO ABOLISH LAG, ISN'T IT? AT LEAST, THAT'S WHAT THE TECH GURUS SAY. NOW, ONE FINE DAY, HE CALL ME UP & TELLS ME, ALL EXCITED, THAT HE GOT THE JELLY BEAN 4.1.2 UPDATE ON HIS PHONE THAT DAY, AND HE INSTALLED IT, AND THE LAG HAS JUST VANISHED! HE SAYS HE DOESN'T RESTART HIS PHONE ANYMORE.
      
      
      MY NOTE 2 CAME INSTALLED WITH JELLY BEAN 4.1.2 OUT OF THE BOX. BUT, IF ANYBODY IS FACING ISSUES WITH THE NOTE 2 (OR, WITH THE GALAXY S3 ALSO, FOR THAT MATTER), DO CHECK IF YOUR PHONE IS RUNNING 4.1.1 OR 4.1.2 - APPARENTLY, IT MAKES A HUGE DIFFERENCE (IT DID WITH MY FRIEND AT LEAST).
      
      
      LASTLY, I'M GONNA SAY TO PEOPLE CONSIDERING THIS PHONE, OR PEOPLE WHO ARE CONFUSED WITH WHAT PHONE TO BUY IF THEY HAVE A BUDGET UPWARDS OF 30K, SEE WHAT YOUR PRIORITIES ARE. THE QUESTIONS YOU'VE GOT TO ASK YOURSELF ARE, DO I NEED A BIG PHONE (AND THEREBY A BIG SCREEN) THAT ALLOWS ME TO BROWSE PAGES WITHOUT ZOOMING IN (MOST OF THE TIME), OR DO I NEED A MORE POCKETABLE PHONE? DO I NEED A DEVICE WHICH GIVES FLAWLESS PERFORMANCE & ADDED FUNCTIONALITIES OVER OTHER PHONES (READ, S PEN), OR DO I NEED A LIGHTER PHONE WHICH IS MORE SUITED FOR ONE HAND OPERATION? THERE ARE LOTS OF OTHER QUESTIONS YOU CAN FORM, BUT I'M SURE YOU GET THE IDEA. I KNEW WHAT I WANTED, I RESEARCHED FOR A MONTH, I GOT THIS PHONE, AND I AM HAPPY. AS LAST THOUGHTS, JUST IN CASE YOU DIDN'T NOTICE, THIS IS THE MOST HIGH END (1.6 GHZ QUAD CORE EXYNOS CPU, 2 GB RAM), AND THE MOST EXPENSIVE ANDROID DEVICE IN THE MARKET... CHEERS! :)

Sentences:
PRODUCTS COMES AND SETTLES AND GOES AWAY, FEW MAKES THEIR MARKS AND FEW JUST FADES AWAY. NO DOUBT EVERY SMARTPHONE YOU BUY TODAY WOULD BE FEELING LIKE OUTDATED IN 6 TO 12 MONTHS AND THAT'S THE CURRENT TREND OF MOBILE INDUSTRY! BUT EVEN AFTER THIS ONLY FEW PRODUCTS MANAGES TO CREATE HISTORY AND NO DOUBT GALAXY NOTE 2 IS ONE OF THEM. I AM NOT GOING TO TALK ABOUT RAM, PROCESSOR SPECS, BENCHMARKS ETC. THEY ARE INCREDIBLE FOR BEING FUTURE-PROOF FOR AT LEAST 1.5 YEARS. WHAT I WANT TO TALK ABOUT IS USER EXPERIENCE. 5.5" SCREEN MAKES IT SLAPPING ANY OTHER DEVICE IN MARKET. SINCE I  BOUGHT THIS MOBILE I DON'T REMEMBER WHEN WAS THE LAST TIME I SWITCHED ON MY LAPTOP! ANDROID 4.1.1 (WAITING FOR OFFICIAL UPGRADE TO 4.1.2) GIVES YOU THE BEST OS THIS LEGEND COULD CURRENTLY HAVE. TOUCH EXPERIENCE SMOOTHER THAN BUTTER. YES, PROJECT BUTTER SHOWS ITS STRENGTH! S PEN IS FANTASTIC INNOVATION. YOU CAN USE IT FOR S PLANNER, S MEMO, S NOTES AND EVEN FOR QUICK COMMANDS, CLIPPING ETC. MORE S PEN APPS IF INCREASES IN MARKET WILL MAKE S PEN TO SHOW ITS FULL STRENGHT. OPTICAL CHARACTER RECOGNITION LITERALLY FETCHES OUT 99% TIME CORRECT TEXT FOR WHATEVER WEIRD YOUR HANDWRITING IS. IT FEELS SUCH A WONDERFUL WHEN DEVICE WITH AMAZING HARDWARE RESPONDS WITH AMAZING SOFTWARE. CAMERA INTERFACE GIVES YOU LOT OF OPTIONS TO PLAY WITH BUT I DOUBT IF ONE HAS SLR HE/SHE WILL NEVER LIKE THIS CAMERA. BUT THIS DEVICE'S CAMERA IS REPLACEMENT FOR FOR MOST OF POINT N SHOOT. OVERALL CAMERA IS NOT GREAT BUT  GOOD WITH SO MANY OPTIONS, SOFTWARE TWEAKS TO PLAY WITH MAKES IT POWERFUL. DEVICE WITH DEMON SPECS HAS TO COME WITH GOOD FUEL TO SUPPORT ITS STRENGHT AND GALAXY NOTE 2'S BATTERY IS REALLY GOOD AND GETS YOU THROUGH 1.5 TO 2 DAYS OF NORMAL USAGE. SCREEN COLOR REPRODUCTION IS OUTSTANDING CONSIDERING THE FACT THE RGB MATRIX USED WITH 12 SUBPIXELS. MOST OF MY PICS WHICH SHOT WITH DSLR LOOKS GREAT ON THIS DEVICE RATHER THAN ON LAPTOP!
      
      LOT OF TALKS ARE GOING IN MARKET REGARDING 440PPI ETC. GALAXY NOTE 2 HAVE 275PPI BUT YOU HAVE LARGER SCREEN AT THE SAME AND THIS MEANS THIS DEVICE GIVES PERFECT COMBINATION OF SHARPNESS AND VISIBLE REAL ESTATE OF SCREEN WHICH NO OTHER DEVICE IN CURRENT MARKET GIVES YOU! AFTERALL 275PPI DEPTH IS MORE THAN ENOUGH. MUSIC PLAYER AND SOUND QUALITY IS ONE OF THE GREATEST I HAVE SEEN LONG TIME AFTER SONY'S WALKMAN SERIES. SOFTWARES LIKE MUSIC SQUARE ARE JUST AMAZING AND IT WORKS - ALLOWS YOU TO TAP SQUARES ON GRID ACCORDING TO MOOD AND IT SELECTES SONGS AUTOMATICALLY (MINIMUM 25 SONGS ARE NEEDED TO WORK THIS).
      
      NOW LET ME TALK ABOUT FEW CONS OF THIS DEVICE :
      
      1) THIS MAY NOT FIT YOUR POCKETS AND HANDS BUT YOU WILL NEVER WANT TO HIDE IT IN YOUR POCKET!
      
      2) FROM HARDWARE PERSPECTIVE BATTERY LIFE IS GOOD BUT FEW SOFTWARE GLITCHES IN ANDROID (LIKE RUNNING MANY BACKGROUND PROCESSES, CACHING UNWANTED APPLICATIONS) MAKES IT HARD TO UTILISE BATTERY'S FULL POTENTIAL. I BELIEVE SAMSUNG WILL FIX THESE WITH UPDATES IN FUTURE. DEEP SLEEP OPTIMISATIONS NEEDS TO BE OPTIMISED MORE. IF YOU ARE IN POOR NETWORK AREA BATTERY JUST VAPORISES.
      
      3) FACEBOOK INTEGRATION IS GOOD BUT NOT GREAT. SAMSUNG SHOULD HAVE BUILD THEIR OWN FACEBOOK INTERFACE INSTEAD OF RELYING ON STANDARD ONE.
      
      4) N7100 MODEL DOES NOT SUPPORT LTE. REMEMBER THIS. LTE MODEL IS N7105 AND I DOUBT IS IT IS AVAILABLE IN INDIAN MARKET.
      
      5) BUILD QUALITY COULD HAVE BEEN A BIT BETTER FOR DEVICE WITH 37K PRICE. MAYBE THEY COULD HAVE USED SOME THIN STEEL PANEL INSTEAD OF PLASTIC AT BACK. BUT PLASTIC AT BACK EVEN LOOKS GOOD ESPECIALLY WHITE LOOKS GREAT.
      
      
      ABOUT FLIPKART : GOOD SERVICE. ACTUALLY THIS TIME IT WAS REPLACEMENT FOR ME AS ORIGINALLY ORDERED DEVICE HAD DISPLAY ISSUE. FLIPKART NEEDS TO IMPROVE UPON THEIR REPLACEMENT SPEED. AFTERALL NOBODY JUST WANT TO PAY 37K AND SIT N WAIT FOR NEW PRODUCT BEING AVAILABLE IN 6 DAYS. YES IT TOOK 6 DAYS TO REPLACE IT WHICH IS LONG TIME.
      
      
      OVERALL THIS DEVICE IS GREATEST ONE CURRENTLY PRODUCED BY SAMSUNG AND WILL BE REMEMBERED IN HISTORY FOR ITS INNOVATION AND INSPIRATION TO NEW GENERATION OF PRODUCTS.
      
      
      THANKS,
      
      MAYUR LANKESHWAR

label: Galaxy Note
Sentences:
USEFUL INTERESTING FEATURES OF GALAXY NOTE 2, RATHER THAN THE COMMON FEATURES
      
      
      FIRST TO MENTION, BEFORE BUYING THIS BEAST: GALAXY NOTE 2, I HAD READ A LOT OF REVIEWS HERE IN FLIPKART ON THIS MOBILE, BUT MAX OF THEM WERE ON THE COMMON FEATURES THAT ALMOST EVERYONE KNOWS FROM LIKE THE:
      
      
      -5.5 SCREEN
      
      -QUAD-CORE
      
      -2GB RAM
      
      -SUPER AMOLED CAPACITIVE TOUCHSCREEN
      
      -16GB INTERNAL
      
      -64GB EXTERNAL EXPANDABLE
      
      -CAMERA: 8MP(MAIN), 1.9(FRONT)
      
      -NFC
      
      -OS: ANDROID JELLY BEAN
      
      -GPU: MAIL-400MP
      
      -STYLUS PEN
      
      
      YES, I AGREE, THESE ARE THE EXCELLENT FEATURES WHICH OTHER PHONES CANNOT COMPETE EASILY,
      
      BUT, THERE ARE LOADS OF OTHER INTERESTING STUFFS THAT ANY TECH SAVY PERSON WILL LIKE A LOT!!!
      
      
      AFTER BUYING THIS GALAXY NOTE 2 LAST WEEK, I HAD BEEN TRYING TO FIGURE OUT THE EXTRA FEATURES THAT THIS BEAST OFFERS IN EXCESS TO THE MENTIONED ABOVE ONES.
      
      SOME OF THEM ARE AS FOLLOWS:
      
      
      -FIRST OF ALL, THE MOST ATTRACTIVE FEATURE THAT I REALLY LIKED WAS THE MOTION SENSOR CAPABILITIES THAT THIS BEAST IS OFFERING.
      
      LET ME NOTE DOWN SOME OF THEM AS TESTED BY ME:
      
      
      1) TO UNLOCK THE DEVICE WITH MOTION, TAP AND HOLD A POINT ON THE SCREEN, AND THEN TILT THE DEVICE FORWARDS.
      
      2) WHEN YOU PICK UP THE DEVICE AFTER IT HAS BEEN IDLE FOR SOME TIME OR WHEN THE SCREEN HAS TURNED OFF, IT VIBRATES IF YOU HAVE MISSED CALLS OR NEW MESSAGES.
      
      3) WHILE VIEWING A CALL, A MESSAGE, OR CONTACT DETAILS ON THE PHONE SCREEN, SIMPLY PICK UP AND HOLD THE DEVICE TO YOUR EAR TO MAKE A CALL TO THAT NUMBER.
      
      4) TAP AND HOLD AN ITEM ON THE SCREEN, AND THEN MOVE THE DEVICE TO THE LEFT OR RIGHT TO MOVE THE ITEM TO ANOTHER PANEL ON THE HOME SCREEN OR THE APPLICATIONS SCREEN IN THAT DIRECTION.
      
      5) WHEN AN IMAGE IS ZOOMED IN, TAP AND HOLD A POINT ON THE SCREEN, AND THEN MOVE THE DEVICE IN ANY DIRECTION TO BROWSE THE IMAGE.
      
      6) WHILE YOU ARE CHEKING MAILS OR CONTACTS IN A PAGE AND YOU REACH THE MIDDLE OR THE LAST OF THE LIST, SIMPLY DOUBLE-TAP THE DEVICE TO MOVE TO THE TOP OF A LIST OF CONTACTS OR EMAILS.
      
      7) WHILE THE SCREEN IS LOCKED, TAP AND HOLD THE SCREEN, AND THEN ROTATE THE DEVICE TO LANDSCAPE ORIENTATION TO LAUNCH THE CAMERA.
      
      8) TURN OVER THE DEVICE(MAKING IT LIE DOWN WITH BACK-SIDE UP) TO MUTE RINGTONE, PAUSE MEDIA PLAYBACK, OR MUTE THE FM RADIO.
      
      9) SHAKE THE DEVICE TO SEARCH FOR BLUETOOTH DEVICES.
      
      10) SHAKE THE DEVICE TO UPDATE THE LIST OF EMAILS OR INFORMATION FROM YAHOO NEWS, YAHOO FINANCE ETC.
      
      11) SWEEP YOUR HAND SIDEWAYS ACROSS THE SCREEN FROM RIGHT TO LEFT TO CAPTURE A SCREENSHOT.
      
      12) COVER THE SCREEN WITH A PALM TO PAUSE MEDIA PLAYBACK. MOVE IT AWAY FROM THE SCREEN TO RESUME.
      
      13) TAP AND HOLD TWO POINTS ON THE SCREEN, AND THEN TILT THE DEVICE BACK AND FORTH TO ZOOM IN OR OUT.
      
      14) WHEN THE TOUCH SCREEN IS TURNED OFF, MOVE YOUR HAND ACROSS THE PROXIMITY/LIGHT SENSOR TO
      
      TURN ON THE SCREEN LIGHTLY AND VIEW THE NUMBER OF MISSED CALLS AND NEW MESSAGES, THE BATTERY
      
      POWER LEVEL, AND MORE.
      
      
      THE ABOVE ARE THE SPECIAL FEATURES THAT THIS PHONE PROVIDES IN RESPECT TO VARIOUS MOTIONS.
      
      
      - SECONDLY, LIKE THE GALAXY S3, IT HAS THE SMART STAY, WHICH ENABLES THE PHONE TO KEEP THE SCREEN ON AS LONG AS YOU ARE LOOKING AT IT.
      
      WHEN YOU CLOSE YOUR EYES OR MOVE AWAY FROM LOOKING INTO THE SCREEN, THE PHONE SCREEN WILL AUTOMATICALLY TURN OFF.
      
      
      - THIRDLY, WITH THE QUAD-CORE PROCESSOR AND 2GB RAM, GAMERS WILL REALLY LOVE THIS PHONE SINCE SOME VERY HIGH RESOLUTION GAMES ARE JUST RUNNING WITH NOT A SINGLE POINT OF LAG IN THIS PHONE.
      
      
      - FOURTHLY, YOU WOULD LUV TO WATCH VIDEOS IN THIS PHONE DUE TO ITZ BIG SCREEN AND THE VERY GOOD QUALITY VIDEOS RUNNING SMOOTHLY.
      
      
      - FIFTHLY, MUSIC QUALITY IS REALLY VERY GOOD AND DESCENT. RADIO WORKS PERFECT.
      
      
      - SIXTHLY, SAR (SPECIFIC ABSORPTION RATE) LEVEL IS RELATIVELY LOW(THE LOWER THE BETTER) FOR THE SAMSUNG GALAXY NOTE 2 IN COMPARISION TO OTHER PHONES:
      
      
      GALAXY NOTE 2: 0.171 W/KG
      
      GALAXY NOTE: 0.39 W/KG
      
      GALAXY S3: 0.342 W/KG
      
      GALAXY S2: 0.338 W/KG
      
      IPHONE 4S: 0.98 W/KG
      
      IPHONE 5: 0.951 W/KG
      
      HTC ONE X: 0.909 W/KG
      
      
      APART FROM THE ABOVE MENTIONED FEATURES:
      
      - I HAVE NOT TESTED WITH THE CAMERA YET SINCE I ALREADY HAVE A DIGITAL CAMERA.
      
      BUT AS READ FROM REVIEWS, THE CAMERA IS QUITE GOOD IN ITS CAPABILITIES, WITH 1.9 FRONT CAMERA IS JUST GREAT.
      
      
      - ALSO NOT TESTED WITH THE FULL CAPABILITY OF THE STYLUS PEN, SINCE IT HAS LOADS OF FUNCTIONALITIES THAT HAS TO BE CHECKED IN DETAILS :-)
      
      
      SO SIMPLY AFTER EXAMINING WITHLOTS OF SUCH EXCITING FEATURES, IT SIMPLY STANDS OUT TALL IN THE MARKET.

Sentences:
HI , I WAS USING HTC WILDFIRE S PRIOR TO THIS DEVICE AND HAD SOME REAL INTERNAL MEMORY ISSUES. AS A CUSTOMER WE TEND TO BE SMART AND WANT MAXIMUM OUT OF THE MONEY WE PUT INTO SUCH THINGS. TO BE HONEST I ALWAYS THOUGHT SPENDING MORE THAN 10-12 K ON A PHONE WAS A WASTAGE. AS I HAD TO CHANGE MY DEVICE COS THE OLD ONE WAS GETTING ON MY NERVES. I DECIDED TO GO FOR A DECENT SMARTPHONE LIKE HTC , SAMSUNG , MAY ME HIGH END MICROMAX. AS I GOT A DECENT EXCHANGE OFFER FOR MY OLD DEVICE I PUSHED MY LIMITS AND BOUGHT THE SAMSUNG GALAXY NOTE 2. I AM A CONTENT BUYER :)
      
      
      PROS FOR THE DEVICE
      
      
      1. BATTERY BACKUP (3100 MAH) IS REALLY GOOD UNLIKE A SMARTPHONE (RUNS 1.25 DAYS OR MAY BE MORE)
      
      2. CURRENTLY RUNNING 88 APPS INCLUDING HEAVY GAMES AND STILL LEFT WITH AMPLE MEMORY TO DOUBLE MY APP COUNT.
      
      3. S PEN IS REALLY COOL !!
      
      4. NOT TO MENTION TECH SPECS : I GUESS YOU KNOW IT ALL BY NOW.
      
      5. LARGE SCREEN SIZE AND DISPLAY. TRUST ME I HAVENT USED MY IPAD SINCE THEN :)
      
      6. DECENT CAMERA AND AMAZING PICTURE QUALITY. BEST BUDDY FOR TRAVEL.
      
      
      CONS (WORK IT OUT):
      
      
      1. THE EARPHONES THEY PROVIDE HAVE A GOOD SOUND QUALITY BUT LOW OUTPUT. YOU PROBABLY HAVE THE GOOD ONES ALREADY.
      
      2. HAVENT TRIED MOVING APPS TO SD , I GUESS ITS SOMEWHAT NOT POSSIBLE.WORKABLE COS, 16 GB IS MORE THAN ENOUGH FOR APPS AND YOU CAN GET 64GB FOR OTHER STUFF LIKE MUSIC, VIDEOS AND PHOTOS.
      
      3.
      
      
      I WOULD SUGGEST YOU TO GO FOR THIS DEVICE IF YOU ARE READY TO SPEND 20K OR MORE COS OTHER SAMSUNG MOBILES IN THIS RANGE REALLY SUCK !! (GRAND, GRAND QUATTRO, MEGA(VERY LOW PPI AND STUPID SCREEN SIZE))

label: Galaxy Note

label: Galaxy Note
Sentences:
I'M A FIRST TIME USER OF ANDROID AND SAMSUNG DEVICES.  I MUST SAY THAT I'M HAPPY WITH THE DEVICE SO FAR.  DEVICE IS PRETTY SNAPPY, THANKS TO GOOD HARDWARE SPECS AND JELLYBEAN.
      
      
      WHAT I LIKE:
      
      - DEVICE IS PRETTY SNAPPY
      
      - CUSTOMISATIONS ( I DID TONS OF CUSTOMISATIONS USING TASKER AND OTHER APPS).
      
      - GOOGLE INTEGRATION
      
      - HANDWRITING
      
      - LARGE SCREEN
      
      
      WHAT I DON'T LIKE:
      
      - DEFAULT ANDROID PHONE APP.  THIS IS MY BIGGEST CONCERN.  YOU DON'T GET A CONCISE VIEW OF PHONE LOGS, SMS APP UI IS VERY MEDIOCRE).  ALL THAT YOU CAN SEE IS ONE LINE WHEN YOU START REPLYING TO A MAIL THOUGH YOU HAVE SUCH A BIG SCREEN)
      
      
      I DON'T LIKE MOST:
      
      - POWER BUTTONS ON THE RIGHT SIDE OF THE DEVICE.  YOU "ACCIDENTALLY" RESTART THE DEVICE 2-3 TIMES MINIMUM WHILE HOLDING THE PHONE.
      
      - VOLUME BUTTONS ON THE LEFT.  YOU CAN HARDLY ACCESS THEM IF YOU REPLACE THE BACK COVER WITH THE FLIP COVER.
      
      - NO MUTE BUTTON.  ITS HARD TO PRESS THE TOUCH SCREEN EVERY TIME YOU WANT TO MUTE THE LINE.

SO, I THINK THE MANUFACTURER AND CUSTOMER ARE EVEN.

label: Galaxy Note
Sentences:
I AM NOT A SAMSUNG HATER OR AN APPLE HATER AS MY PARENTS OWN A IPHONE 5 AND S3, AND I HAVE A IPOD TOUCH 5 AS I'M JUST 14, BUT YOUR REVIEW WAS  COMPLETELY BIASED AND POINTLESS AND WRONG.
      
      
      YOU SAID:
      
      
      GOD HAS A NEW NAME - NOTE-2
      
      MISTRIO'FAB "DAY COUNTING", NO SHIT,STRAIGHT TO D POINT :D
      
      
      MEGA PRO'S :-
      
      1) GIGANTIC PROCESSOR 1.6 QUAD (APPLE 5 :- 1GHZ DUAL N SLOW AS GRAND PA)
      
      
      ME: IPHONE 5 HAS AN A6 (1 GHZ DUAL CORE) BUT IT IS IOS OPTIMISED SO IT GIVES A MUCH MORE FLUIDIC PERFORMANCE THAN EVEN 1.6 QUAD CORE.
      
      
      2) 2 GIG RAM TO KILL ANY APP MADE ON THIS EARTH OR OTHER DIMENSION OR EVEN BY GOD HIMSELF .(APPLE 5 :- STILL WID 1 GIG N LAGS BEHIND BENCHMARK)
      
      
      ME: APPLE HAS APPS (MUCH MORE THAN ANDROID APP STORE) SPECIALLY MADE FOR IT SO IT CAN HANDLE ANY APP FROM ITUNES EASILY.
      
      
      3)MALI 400 CAN RUN ANY GRAPHIC INTENSIVE APP LIKE BUTTER, WID NO HANG OR LAG OR STUCK OR WHATSOEVER LIKE IN APPLE.
      
      
      ME: PLAY FIFA 13, OOPS ANDROID DOESN'T HAVE IT YET, SO GO PLAY FIFA 12. YOU'LL OPEN YOUR EYES TO AN APPLE WONDER.
      
      
      4)S-VOICE ,CAN DO WHATEVER U COMMAND, WEATHER/CALL/TEXT/ALARM/MEETING ETC. NO LIMIT.
      
      
      ME: SIRI, MUCH AHEAD THAN S-VOICE, THOUGH S-VOICE IS KILLER TOO.
      
      
      5)S-PEN ,STILL D KING;STILL INCOMPARABLE. WID AIR VIEW ,10 YRS AHEAD OF SO CALLED APPLE.
      
      
      ME: IPHONE'S SCREEN IS SO EASY TO HANDLE THAT YOUR THUMB CAN DO WONDERS.
      
      
      6)BATTERY :- IT LASTS FOR 3-4 DAYS IF U JUST USES IT FOR CALL ON WCDMA/GSM . PLAYING GAMES IS IN UR LIST THEN IT WOULD LAST FOR A DAY.
      
      
      ME: YOUR ON THE SPOT WITH THAT THOUGH IPHONE HAS THE SAME CALL.
      
      
      CONS :-
      
      
      1) STILL LOOKING FOR CON'S ,SORRY BUT THERE ISN'T ANY.
      
      
      ME: SIZE, FOR SOME IT IS VERY UNCOMFORTABLE TO HOLD.

Sentences:
IF YOU ARE LOOKING FOR THE BEST ANDROID SMART-PHONE CURRENTLY AVAILABLE(AS IN TODAY 8TH FEB 2013) IN INDIA, THEN NO DOUBT THIS IS THE BEST PHONE(IF YOU ARE OKAY WITH THE SIZE).

ALSO AFTER A FEW UPDATES THEY FORGET THEIR FORMER FLAGSHIPS AND THE LOYAL CUSTOMERS WHO PAID NEARLY 40K OR UPWARDS TO BUY THEM..
      
      
      IN THIS SCENARIO, WE HAVE ROMS LIKE CYANOGENMOD , WHO CREATE THEIR OWN VERSION OF THE LATEST ANDROID OS VERSION FOR THE BEST AND THE MOST POPULAR ANDROID HANDSETS. IF YOUR ARE WILLING TO TAKE THE RISK, YOUR FORMER ANDROID FLAGSHIP CAN ENJOY THE LATEST VERSION OF ANDROID WITH ALL ITS GOODIES AND EXTRA FUNCTIONALITIES. THERE ARE CYANOGENMOD ROMS AVAILABLE FOR MANY POPULAR MODELS FROM HTC, SONY, LG AND SAMSUNG(IN MOST CASES WHEN THE MANUFACTURERS DECIDED NOT TO UPDATE THEIR DEVICES TO THE LATEST ANDROID VERSION).
      
      
      BUT SAMSUNG'S GALAXY S2 I9100 DOESN'T HAVE A FINAL JELLYBEAN VERSION AVAILABLE(THERE IS A BUG FILLED VERSION AVAILABLE). IT SHOULD HAVE GOT A FINAL WORKING ROM BY NOW RIGHT, IT WAS ON SALE IN JUNE 2011 AND ITS FEBRUARY 2013 NOW. YOU MAY WONDER WHY...AND THE NOT SO SECRET BUT NOT SO PUBLIC ANSWER IS GALAXY S2 I9100 CONTAINS SAMSUNG'S EXYNOS PROCESSOR(AN UPDATED EXYNOS PROCESSOR POWERS THE GALAXY S3 AND NOTE2) AND SAMSUNG IS VERY HESITANT IN PROVIDING THE REQUIRED PROPRIETARY SOURCE CODES FOR THE CYANOGENMOD TEAM. AND HENCE THEY HAVE VIRTUALLY KILLED THE POSSIBILITY OF A WORKING USABLE CYANOGENMOD ROM FOR THE GALAXY S2 I9100.
      
      
      THE DEVELOPER COMMUNITY HAS TIME AND AGAIN REQUESTED SAMSUNG TO RELEASE THOSE CODES BUT THEY HAVE ONLY RELENTED PARTIALLY. THERE ARE NUMEROUS POSTS ON THE ISSUE ON THE DEVELOPER FORUMS ON INTERNET.
      
      
      IN MARKED CONTRAST TO THIS ARE THE PHONES POWERED BY QUALCOMM'S, TI'S AND NVIDIA'S PROCESSORS WHICH HAVE BETTER CHANCE AT CYANOGENMOD ROM'S AS ALL OF THESE PROCESSOR MANUFACTURERS ARE OPEN TO PROVIDING THEIR SOURCE CODES TO THE OPEN DEVELOPER COMMUNITY.
      
      
      SAMSUNG MAY HAVE THEIR OWN REASONS TO NOT RELEASE THEIR EXYNOS SOURCE CODES; BUT FOR YOU AND ME; WHO PAID TOP SHELF MONEY TO GET THE LATEST AND BEST ANDROID SMARTPHONE; WE NEED TO BE TREATED BETTER THAN THIS.
      
      
      WE NEED TO PROVIDED EVERY OPPORTUNITY TO EXPERIENCE THE LATEST ANDROID VERSION IN THE DEVICE WE BOUGHT; ESPECIALLY WHEN IT WAS A FLAGSHIP. AND SAMSUNG SMART PHONES WITH EXYNOS PROCESSORS ARE NOT GOOD AT THIS.
      
      
      SO IF YOU ARE A GEEK AND YOU LIKE TO EXPERIMENT WITH THE LATEST ANDROID OS ON YOUR FLAGSHIPS, SUGGEST YOU WAIT FOR FLAGSHIPS WHICH ARE POWERED BY QUALCOMM PROCESSORS.(CURRENTLY SNAPDRAGON S4, 2013 JUNE ONWARDS SNAPDRAGON 600, SNAPDRAGON 800,). THESE PROCESSORS WILL POWER FLAGSHIPS FROM HTC, LG AND SONY. CHECK FOR THESE NAMES IN THE PROCESSOR COLUMN AND YOU MAY GET A BETTER DEAL...
      
      
      HACKING/FLASHING YOUR PHONE WITH ANY ROM INCLUDING CYANOGENMOD ROMS HAS A CHANCE OF BRICKING(MAKING A USELESS  BRICK OF YOUR PHONE) YOUR PHONE. SO PROCEED AT YOUR OWN RISK.NOT ADVISED FOR NOVICE USERS.

      CALL QUALITY IS HIGHLY IMPRESSIVE BUT  JUST AFTER STARTING THE CALL WE HAVE TO WAIT A SECOND OR TWO (NEVER MORE THAN THAT) FOR OUR VOICE TO BE HEARD AT THE OTHER END.THE GPRS AND EDGE CONNECTIONS ARE GOOD AND I GET A DECENT SPEED ON MY INTERNET CONNECTION. 3G SPEEDS ARE TOTALLY IMPRESSIVE AND 720P VIDEOS PLAY SMOOTHLY OVER 3G.THE BLUETOOTH CONNECTION IS DECENT AND ACHIEVE GOOD SPEEDS FOR FILE TRANSFER.

      BATTERY LASTS FOR ONE DAY  FOR SERIOUS GAMING 3G SWITCHED ON THE FULL DAY AND HEAVY VIDEO PLAYBACK . LASTS FOR 2-3 DAYS FOR JUST SMS AND PHONE CALLS
      
      
      SOUND AND MUSIC :  THE SOUND QUALITY IS AWESOME ON SPEAKERS AND THE HEADPHONES SOUNDS LIKE IN A THEATRE IN LOW BACKGROUND NOISE(INDOORS) , OUTDOOR HEADPHONE MUSIC LISTENING IS GOOD AND IMMERSIVE
      
      THE MUSIC PLAYER HAS BUIT IN TIME OUT ,FOR THOSE MUSIC SLEEPERS : ) BUILT IN EQUALIZERS,VISUALIZATION,LYRICS SYNC,SOUND EFFECTS ETC.
      
      
      SENSORS  :THE PHONE BOASTS ACCELEROMETERS FOR MOVEMENT SPEED,PROXIMITY SENSORS FOR SWITCHING DISPLAY OFF DURING PHONECALL,LIGHT SENSORS FOR AUTOMATIC BRIGHTNESS,GEOMAGNETIC SENSORS FOR DIRECTIONS(NORTH,EAST,SOUTH,WEST) AND GYRO SENSORS FOR ORIENTATION CHANGE
      
      
      DISPLAY: (RESOLUTION:480X856 PXL | SIZE: 4INCH | PIXEL DENSITY :233 PPI)

THE DISPLAY HAS HIGH PIXEL DENSITY FOR A MID RANGE PHONE,SUPER CLARITY AND IT ALSO HAS AUTO BRIGHTNESS SO U DON?T HAVE WORRY ABOUT DIRECT SUNLIGHT VIEW , MAN ITS IMPRESSIVE, TWO SECONDS AFTER YOU GET INTO SUNLIGHT THE DISPLAY AUTOMATICALLY ADJUST TO A HIGHER BRIGHTNESS WHICH VIEWABLE.
      
      
      TOUCH: (SUPER RESPONSIVE| UP TO 10 FINGER TOUCH /ZOOM SUPPORT)

THE PRIMARY CAMERA IS GOOD WITH DECENT VIDEO CALL QUALITY(IT IS GOOD TO GET A SECONDARY CAMERA EXACTLY 1 MP NOT LESS AND NOT MORE AS THE INTERNET CONNECTION OF THE CONNECTION PROVIDERS IN INDIA DOESN?T PROVIDE HIGH SPEED INTERNET SO A LOW QUALITY VIDEO IS SUITABLE FROM A FRONT CAMERA, IF YOU HAVE A 3G CONNECTION ITS OKAY)
