label: Galaxy S Advance
Sentences:
IF YOU DO A FACTORY RESET JUST BEFORE AND AFTER INSTALLING THE JB OR ANY OTHER MAJOR UPDATE, EVERYTHING'LL BE FINE.
      
      MAKE SURE YOU HAVE BACKED UP ALL YOUR DATA BEFORE DOING SO.
      
      
      THIS PHONE IS AWESOME AT 14000 PRICE BAND.
      
      NO OTHER COMPANY IS GIVING AWAY A DUAL CORE A9 AT THIS PRICE AND OTHER FEATURES.
      
      ONLY LUMIA 620 MATCHES THE HARDWARE AND SPECS WITH ITS DUAL CORE KRAIT.
      
      OTHER COMPETITORS :
      
      
      XPERIA U : LESS RAM, NO EXPANDABLE MEMORY,LESS INTERNAL MEMORY VGA FRONT CAM, BATTERY ISSUES, MEDIOCRE CAM.
      
      XPERIA GO : LESS RAM, LOW-RES SCREEN, BATTERY, NO FRONT CAM
      
      
      LG OPTIMUS L9 II: HIGH PRICE (17K), BUT BETTER CAMERA AND MORE RAM
      
      
      LUMIA 620 : BUYER'S CHOICE.. I CONSIDER WP A LIMITED OS. SO THAT IS A CON FOR ME. FAST PROCESSOR, LESS RAM(BUT ENOUGH FOR WP)
      
      
      TECHNICAL EXPLANATION:
      
      
      A9: 2.5 DMIPS/MHZ, WHEREAS A5: 1.6 DMIPS/MHZ
      
      DMIPS = DHRYSTONE MILLION INSTRUCTIONS PER SECOND.
      
      
      THEREFORE,A DUAL CORE A9 IS 160% FASTER THAN A DUAL CORE A5 AT SAME CLOCK SPEED(THAT'S WHAT ALL OTHER HANDSET AT THIS PRICE OFFER).
      
      
      PUTTING IT SIMPLER, 1GHZ A9 CORE = 1.5GHZ A5 CORE
      
      AND 1GHZ A9 CORE = 768 MHZ KRAIT CORE (KRAIT IS FASTER)
      
      AND 1GHZ A9 CORE = 1.2GHZ SCORPION CORE.
      
      MAKE THIS COMPARISON BEFORE MATCHING PRODUCTS WITH DIFFERENT CPU ARCHS.
      
      
      THE VERDICT:
      
      
      SO GUYS THIS IS THE BEST ANDROID DEAL AT 14K.
      
      SUPER AMOLED, MALI 400 GPU, HD RECORDING @30FPS, DLNA, 16 GIGS OF ONBOARD STORAGE (11.31GB + 2GB(APPS) = 13.31GB USABLE OUT OF 15GB, WHEN U CLEAR CACHE AFTER UPDATE THROUGH BOOT MENU, THEREFORE OS AND PREINSTALLED STUFF/TUTORIALS TAKES 1.7 GB SPACE).
      
      
      AND AFTER JELLYBEAN UPDATE, THE CAMERA WILL GET A 4X OPTICAL ZOOM TOO :) , U'LL GET THE FULLEST EXPERIENCE OF TOUCHWIZ, THANKS TO PROJECT BUTTER, AND ALSO THE WONDERFUL GOOGLE NOW.
      
      
      MAY 9TH 2013:
      
      RECEIVED WITHIN 24 HRS OF ORDERING (8 MAY'13) VIA COD.
      
      IT IS A MADE IN VIETNAM PIECE, MANUFACTURED IN MARCH'13, AND IMPORTED BY SAMSUNG INDIA IN MARCH, MRP IS 16300.
      
      
      MAY 10TH 2013:
      
      NO DEFECTS FOUND SO FAR! SOUND IS AWESOME!, GAMING TOO. TOO SNAPPY OF A DEVICE OF THIS PRICE. I'LL RUN GINGERBREAD FOR A COUPLE OF DAYS BEFORE UPDATING TO JB.
      
      HOPE ITS NOT A DEFECTIVE ONE. OR ELSE I WONT GET A REPLACEMENT AS IT WILL BE OUT OF STOCK SOON. ALREADY OUT OF STOCK IN LOCAL MARKET IN PUNE. :(
      
      
      MAY 11TH 2013:
      
      COULDN'T RESIST TASTING JELLYBEAN ON THIS DEVICE, SO UPDATED IT VIA KIES TODAY. AS MENTIONED , I WIPED THE CACHE AND USER DATA BEFORE AND AFTER THE UPDATE.
      
      
      MAY 13TH 2013:
      
      AWESOME IS THE WORD FOR THE PERFORMANCE AFTER JB UPDATE. ALL HIGH-GRAPHICS GAMES RUN SO SMOOTH ON THE DEVICE. BUT THERE ARE SOME LAGS IN GOOGLE NOW.
      
      SAMSUNG'S TOUCHWIZ NATURE UX IS BEAUTIFUL, FEATURE PACKED, YET SIMPLE. FAR BETTER THAN THE SENSELESS HTC SENSE OR THE SONY'S TIMESCAPE.
      
      KEEP IN MIND THAT EXITING AN APP WITH BACK BUTTON STILL KEEPS IT RUNNING SO MAKE USE OF TASK MANAGER TO KILL THE USELESS APPS. RESTARTING THE DEVICE IN THE MID-DAY WOULD BE A GREAT BOOST FOR PERFORMANCE.
      
      AFTER INSTALLING 50+ APPS WITH APPS LIKE FACEBOOK, WHATSAPP, GOOGLE NOW, GMAIL, NIMBUZZ ETC ETC RUNNING IN BACKGROUND, IT SHOWS 465MB OF RAM USED AT STARTUP OUT OF 625 MB AVAILABLE. WHICH IS PRETTY DECENT. I HAVE NEVER SEEN USED RAM GO BEYOND 600 MB EVEN AFTER RUNNING 10+ APPS INCLUDING A GAME.
      
      
      MUSIC OUTPUT IS MIND-BLOWING. SPECIALLY THE VIRTUAL 7.1 PRESET. (GINGERBREAD HAD ONLY 5.1 CH. VIRTUALIZATION). LOUDSPEAKER PERFORMANCE IS JUST AVERAGE(LOW VOLUME).
      
      
      CAMERA IS GOOD FOR GENERAL PHOTOGRAPHY. DON'T EXPECT GREAT LANDSCAPES OR EXTREME LOW LIGHT PHOTOS TO LOOK GREAT. FLASH IS AVERAGE IF NOT GREAT. ISO RANGES FROM 50(IN FIREWORK AND SPORTS PRESET) TO 400, BUT MANUALLY YOU CAN SELECT BETWEEN 100, 200 AND 400. FOR BEST RESULTS IN LOW LIGHT USE HIGH ISO AND STANDARD EXPOSURE. IT WILL PRODUCE NOISY PICTURES, BUT POST PROCESSING SOFTWARE CAN REMOVE THE NOISE EASILY WITH NEGLIGIBLE LOSS OF DETAIL.
      
      VIDEO RECORDING HAS DECENT FRAME RATE BUT LIL BIT NOISE CREEPS IN IN LOW LIGHT. BUT HEY THATS OK AS ALL OTHER A5 HANDSETS ONLY GIVE 480P RECORDING.
      
      NO LAGS IN KEYBOARD EVER NOTICED.
      
      
      YOU ALSO GET SOME GALAXY SIII'S MOTION FEATURES LIKE DIRECT CALL, PAN ZOOM AND SCROLL, MOTION UNLOCK ETC, AND ALSO THE OLD AND GOOD TURN OVER TO MUTE AND SHAKE TO UPDATE,  WHICH ARE DECENT ADDONS.
      
      
      GPS TAKES LOCK IN A MINUTE OR SO. AND IS PRETTY ACCURATE, WITH LESS THAN 2 SECONDS DELAY IN TURN BY TURN NAVIGATION.
      
      
      UNDOUBTEDLY YOU GET THE BEST DISPLAYS AT 14K WITH THIS PHONE. IT BRINGS ALL OTHER DISPLAYS TO SHAME, WHETHER IS IPS OF LG OR CLEARBLACK OF LUMIA 620 OR SONY BRAVIA, NONE CAN BEAT SAMSUNG'S SUPER AMOLED IN THIS PRICE RANGE. THE PHONE HAS GREAT SUNLIGHT LEGIBILITY, THANKS TO THE SIMPLICITY OF THE NATURE UX TOO.
      
      
      YET TO CHECK BATTERY LIFE ON CELL RADIO, BUT ON CONTINUOUS SURFING/DOWNLOADING OVER WIFI, IT LASTS FOR 10+ HOURS, WITH OCCASIONAL GAMING AND MUSIC, WHICH IS PRETTY GREAT FOR A 1500MAH RUNNING A DUAL CORE A9.
      
      
      MAY 14TH 2013:
      
      OMG PRICES SLASHED. IM IN A LOSS :P. HAD I WAITED FOR A WEEK I WOULD HAVE SAVED RS 800 :(

      I PURCHASED THIS FOR MY FRIEND WHO WANTED AN ECONOMIC MOBILE WITH BETTER PROCESSING SPEEDS. ALSO ADVANCE IS GETTING JELLY BEAN 4.1.2 UPDATE SHORTLY THAT WOULD MAKE IT UP TO DATE WITH THE ANDROID OS.
      
      
      I OWN A GALAXY S3 THAT ALSO HAS A MALI 400 GPU.
      
      
      THE ONE FOUND ON THE S ADVANCE IS A 1 GHZ DUAL-CORE ARM CORTEX-A9 PROCESSOR AND SINGLE CORE ARM MALI 400 MP GPU WITH LP-DDR2 MEMORY MODULE ON A NOVATHOR U8500 CHIPSET.
      
      
      I TRIED SEVERAL GAMES ON IT AND IT WAS QUIET FASTER. THE GMAIL APP ON THE GINGER BREAD HAD SOME ISSUES, BUT OVERALL IT IS A FASTER PIECE OF DEVICE.

label: Galaxy S Advance
Sentences:
ITS NICE BUT PRICE IS TOO MUCH... -_-
      
      I WAS CONFUSED WHETHER TO TAKE MOTO ATRIX 2 OR S ADVANCE.THE REASON WHY I WENT WITH S ADVANCE IS THAT DUE TO LACK OF PROPER SUPPORT FROM MOTO IN INDIA(SAMSUNG ARE HAVING A GOOD TIME IN INDIA AND ARE RELEASING PHONES EVEN BEFORE US) AND 16 GB INTERNAL MEMORY.
      
      
      BUILD QUALITY:
      
      IT IS USUAL SAMSUNG DESIGN,MAY BE ALL PLASTICKY BUT VERY LIGHT WEIGHT,AND THERE IS NOT SUFFICIENT GRIP AND LITTLE SLIPPERY ON THE SIDES(AN CASE WOULD SOLVE THIS AND OF COURSE YOU WOULD DEFINITELY BUY A CASE TO PROTECT YOUR NEAR 20000 BUBBLE).
      
      EXCEPT THE HOME BUTTON ALL PHYSICAL BUTTONS ARE HAVING GOOD TACTILE RESPONSE AND ARE PLACED WELL.
      
      NOTICE THAT 3.5MM AUDIO JACK IS PLACED AT THE BOTTOM OF THE HANDSET AND SOMETIMES IRRITATES WHEN YOU ARE LISTENING MUSIC YOU NEED TO KEEP THE PHONE IN BOTTOM UP POSITION AND THEN IF SOME NOTIFICATION COMES UP AND WHEN YOU TAKE IT OUT YOUR POCKET AND YOU WILL BE CONFUSED A LITTLE.
      
      
      TOUCH RESPONSIVENES:
      
      AS EXPECTED FROM SAMSUNG,DELIVERS THE GOODS.
      
      
      NO CONNECTIVITY ISSUES WITH EITHER NETWORK(DIDN'T USE 3G) OR WIFI.
      
      
      DISPLAY:
      
      AT THIS PRICE RANGE,THE BEST DISPLAY YOU WILL GET.
      
      BUT THE SUNLIGHT VISIBILITY CAN BE IMPROVED(EVEN WITH FULL BRIGHTNESS,THE DISPLAY SEEMS TO BE DIM,TYPICAL OF AMOLED DISPLAY).
      
      INDOORS ZERO BRIGHTNESS IS ENOUGH.
      
      
      SOUND:
      
      FORGET THAT EXTERNAL SPEAKER IS THERE,THE OUTPUT IS VERY LOW.
      
      THE PROVIDED EARPHONES ARE GOOD,MAY NOT HAVE BASS,BUT CLARITY IS NICE.
      
      
      PERFORMANCE:
      
      ANDROID 2.3 RUNS WITHOUT ANY ISSUES.HAVE DOWNLOADED MANY APPS BUT DIDN'T LAG AT ALL,TILL THE USER ACCESSIBLE 512 MB RAM IS FULL.
      
      I AM NOT MUCH INTO GAMES,BUT I PLAYED DEAD TRIGGER WITHOUT ANY ISSUES.IT'S GPU IS SAME AS THE S2.I SIDED WITH S ADVANCE BECAUSE THE PROCESSOR IS LATEST COMPARED TO ATRIX 2 OMAP 4430 AND NOVATHOR ARCHITECTURE ARE VERY SIMILAR TO EXYNOS.I AM SATISFIED WITH THE PROCESSOR AND THE PERFORMANCE OF THE PHONE.
      
      PINCH TO ZOOM AND DOUBLE TAP ARE WORKING IN THE BROWSER WITHOUT ANY ISSUES.
      
      
      MULTIMEDIA:
      
      11 GB IS USER ACCESSIBLE,AND IT SPOILS YOU,IT SUPPORTS ALL MOST ALL CODECS.INSTALL MX PLAYER AND YOU ARE GOOD TO GO WITH EVEN .WEBM FORMAT
      
      I DIDN'T CONVERT ANY VIDEOS AND I DIRECTLY COPIED THEM DIRECTLY AND PLAYS ALL 720P WITHOUT ANY HICCUP,IF ANY FORMAT IS NOT SUPPORTED USE MX PLAYER SW DECODER(H/W DECODER SAVES YOUR BATTERY LIFE).
      
      WATCHING VIDEOS ON THIS SCREEN IS A JOY.
      
      DEFINITELY IT EXCEEDED MY EXPECTATIONS.
      
      
      CAMERA:
      
      GOOD PERFORMANCE IN SUNLIGHT.
      
      MEETS THE EXPECTATION
      
      THERE IS NO ZOOM FUNCTIONALITY(MIGHT BE RECTIFIED WITH THE NEXT FIRMWARE UPDATE..SAMSUNG HOW LONG WILL IT TAKE TO UPDATE THE PHONE TO ICS,ALREADY JELLY BEAN IS OUT THERE)
      
      
      BATTERY:
      
      DON'T EXPECT MIRACLES HERE,IT CAN LAST ONE AND HALF DAY OF MODERATE USAGE.ON SYNC CONTINOUSLY IN 2G,IT WAS DOWN TO 30 TO 35% FROM MORNING 8:00 TO EVENING 8:00.I USED 2X BATTERY SAVER AND IT IMPROVED BATTERY PERFORMANCE A LOT.
      
      
      MISC:
      
      I DIDN'T FIND ANY PAGE IN XDA FOR THIS DEVICE,AND STILL NOT POPULAR IN THE MODDING COMMUNITY,GIVEN THE PROCESSOR CAPABILITY DEFINITELY MODDING WILL START FOR THIS PHONE).
      
      IF YOUR HAVING A WIFI CONNECTION DOWNLOAD DROPBOX,AND INSTANT CAMERA UPLOAD IN DROPBOX IS AWESOME.
      
      I DIDN'T KEEP ANY MEMORY CARD,IT USES MTP TO CONNECT TO THE COMPUTER AND DON'T RELY ON KIES TO LOAD MULTIMEDIA ON TO THE PHONE,IT IS AS USUAL CRAPPY.JUST DRAG AND DROP.
      
      
      I WOULD DEFINITELY RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT

label: Galaxy S Advance
Sentences:
THIS ANDROID SMARTPHONE IS MY FIRST ANDROID DEVICE AND ITS GREAT.
      
      -THE TOUCH IS SMOOTH JUST LIKE AN APPLE DEVICE
      
      
      -THE PHONE COMES WITH GINGERBREAD AND THERE ARE NO LAGS WHATSOEVER
      
      
      -WITH MY 4 DAYS OF USAGE I HAVE NOT NOTICED ANY HANGS OR SHUT DOWNS
      
      
      -THE 5MP CAMERA IS SUPERB, TAKES NICE AND SHARP PICTURES, THE PICTURES LOOK VERY SHARP ON THE MOBILE BECAUSE OF THE SUPER AMOLED SCREEN, BUT ONCE TRANSFERRED ON COMPUTER U WILL NOTICE A COLOUR CHANGE, LIKE THE COLOUR FADES, BUT THE QUALITY IS NOT COMPROMISED, THE IMAGES ARE SHARP, ZOOM IS UNAVAILABLE IN GINGERBREAD BUT AVAILABLE IN JELLYBEAN UPDATE
      
      
      -THE LOUDSPEAKER IS GOOD, MUSIC OUTPUT ON THE SPEAKER IS VERY GOOD, AND THERE IS GOOD AMOUNT OF BASS IN THE EARPHONES PROVIDED BY SAMSUNG, THE SOUND IS CRYSTAL CLEAR
      
      
      -VIDEO RECORDING IS 720P HD AND DOES THE JOB WELL, THE QUALITY OF THE SOUND IS GOOD TOO
      
      
      -BATTERY IS GOOD, WITH MODERATE USE, AND WIFI ON THROUGHOUT IT LASTED 35HOURS, WHICH INCLUDED WEB BROWSING, 15-20 OF 2G CALLING, A FEW PICS AND VIDEOS, LIL MUSIC, INSTALLING OF APPS, TEMPLE RUN GAME, FACEBOOK AND FACEBOOK MESSENGER THROUGHOUT, DECENT BATTERY
      
      
      -MAPS AND GPS WORK GOOD, THE WIFI CONNECTS QUCIKLY AND HAS A GOOD RANGE, BLUETOOTH TRANSFERS ARE QUICK
      
      
      - THE AVAILABLE RAM IN GINGERBREAD IS 555 OUT OF WHICH 250-300 IS ALWAYS FREE. BUT WHEN U UPGRADE IT TO JELLYBEAN THE RAM GOES UPTO 625 (I DONT KNOW HOW MUCH IS AVAILABLE FOR USE AS I HAVE NOT UPDATED IT TO JELLYBEAN YET BUT I HAVE READ IT ON THE INTERNET)
      
      
      -THE SECONDARY CAMERA WHICH IS 1.2MP IS GOOD AND VIDEO CALLING ON SKYPE IS FUN
      
      
      -THE BUILD OF THE PHONE IS DECENT BUT THE BACK BATTERY PANEL IS VERY THIN, THE PHONE ITSELF IS VERY LIGHT, A SCRATCH GUARD AND A HARD BACK COVER IS A MUST
      
      
      -I DID FIND THE NETWORK ISSUE WHEN THE NETWORK WAS ON DUAL MODE, AFTER A CALL THE NETWORK WOULD GO BLANK FOR 5SECS AND COME BACK, BUT NEVER GOT DISCONNECTED DURING THE CALL, SO THE SWITCHED TO GSM ONLY MODE AND SINCE THEN THERE IS NO ISSUE WHATSOEVER
      
      
      FINAL VERDICT:
      
      A VERY GOOD ANDROID PHONE, ITS THE BEST PHONE IN THE 10K-16K PRICE RANGE, FOR PEOPLE WHO LIKE BIG PHONES WITH HUGE DISPLAYS CAN BUY LG L9 AND HTC LOVERS CAN BUY DESIRE X, BUT THIS SAMSUNG GALAXY S ADVANCE IS BETTER THAN THE LG AND HTC MODELS I JUST MENTIONED.
      
      MAJORITY OF THE SONY XPERIA MODELS IN THIS PRICE RANGE HAVE 3.5INCH SCREEN AND JUST 512MB RAM, SO ITS BETTER TO BUY SAMSUNG.

      BUILD QUALITY: DEFINITELY ONE OF THE BEST MADE DEVICE IN THE MARKET. I DROPPED THIS PHONES WHILE RIDING ON THE BIKE, STILL THE PHONE ESCAPED WITH JUST ONE SCRATCH. TRULY AMAZING!!
      
      THIS PHONE HAS PREMIUM FEELING WHICH EVEN SOME OF THE MUCH HIGHER PRICED PHONE LAGS. SAMSUNG HAD DONE A PHENOMENAL JOB ON THIS.
      
      
      SOFTWARE: IF YOU ARE SOMEONE WHO WANT TO HAVE PHONE FOR SOME BROWSING AND LITTLE BIT OF LOW END GAMING, ITS A GREAT CHOICE. ANDROID 4.1.2 JB WILL SIMPLY BLOW YOUR MIND. ITS SO MUCH BETTER THAN ITS PREDECESSORS. HOWEVER IT MAY MARGINALLY SLOW DOWN YOUR DEVICE.
      
      ON THE OTHER SIDE, IF YOU ARE A HARDCORE GAMER, I GUESS YOU MUST BE READY TO SPEND ANOTHER 12K AND GET NEXUS 4(I WOULD HAVE DONE THAT). IN FACT EVEN A SIMPLE 3D GAMES LIKE SUBWAY SURFER, TEMPLE RUN 2 SKIPS SOME FRAME AT TIMES.(BUT YOU CAN ALWAYS CLOSE ALL THE APPS, STOP BATTERY SAVING AND HAVE A MUCH BETTER GAMING EXPERIENCE). HOWEVER, 2D GAMES ARE VERY SMOOTH.
      
      
      CALL QUALITY: THE VOICE IS CLEAR AND THERE HAS BEEN NO SIGNAL ISSUES. ITS THE MOST FUNDAMENTAL FEATURE OF THE PHONE AND GOOD TO SEE SAMSUNG HAS NOT OVERLOOKED AT IT.
      
      
      BATTERY: IT CAN EASILY LAST A DAY EVEN AFTER A VERY EXTENSIVE USAGE. NO COMPLAINTS WHATSOEVER.
      
      
      CAMERA: WELL, IT ISN'T BAD BY ANY MEAN, BUT DONT EXPECT A LOT ON THIS FRONT EITHER. ITS FAIRLY DECENT I MUST SAY.
      
      
      VERDICT:
      
      WELL, I AM AN APP DEVELOPER MYSELF. ALL I CAN SAY IS JUST DON'T BOTHER YOURSELF BY LOOKING AT THE SPECS OF ALL THE PHONES. IF YOU WANT TO DO THAT GRAB A MICROMAX. ITS THE OVERALL PACKAGE WHICH MATTERS. AND I MUST SAY, IF YOU ARE LOOKING FOR A SMARTPHONE AT ANY PRICE POINT AND YOU ARE NOT A HARDCORE GAMER, AND 4 INCH SCREEN SIZE CAN FILL YOUR APPETITE , GO FOR IT.

label: Galaxy S Advance
Sentences:
I GOT THIS MOBILE IN JUNE 2013 AFTER REVIEWING IT FOR A WEEK WITH ITS PROS AND CONS. I BOUGHT IT WITHIN 2 DAYS AFTER IT WAS RELEASED IN CHENNAI FROM A DIRECT DEALER.
      
      1. SCREEN QUALITY IS DAMN GOOD IN THIS PRICE. IT HAS GOT SUPER AMOLED BETTER THAN LED DISPLAY.
      
      2. SPEAKER IS NOT THAT MUCH BUT WE CAN HEAR THE VOICE OUTSIDE WHEN YOU HAVE SWITCHED NOT LOUDSPEAKER.
      
      3. IT HAS DUAL CAMERA FOR THE VIDEO CALLING WHICH IN INDIA IS NOT POSSIBLE WITH PACKET DATA, ONLY WITH FAST WIFI ON BOTH MOBILES ITS POSSIBLE. REAR CAMERA HAS NO ZOOM BUT HAS AUTOFOCUS. FRONT CAMERA IS 1.3 MP, WHICH IS GOOD FOR SELF RECORDING. REAR CAMERA HAS LED FLASH ALSO.
      
      4. DEFAULT SAMSUNG LAUNCHER IS NOT GOOD WHEN COMPARED TO SONY AND GO LAUNCHER AND LAUNCHER 7. U NEED TO DOWNLOAD ANY OF THE LAUNCHERS FROM PLAY STORE.
      
      5. THE NOTIFICATIONS IS BETTER WHEN COMPARED TO OTHERS WHERE WE CAN SWITCH TO WIFI, GPS, SILENT MODE, AUTO ROTATION. ALSO BLUETOOTH WHICH SHOULD BE MADE VISIBLE ONLY THEN FILES CAN TRANSFERRED.
      
      6. INBUILT MEMORY IS QUITE LARGE I.E. 1.97 GB APPROX. THAT IS GOOD NEWS. INTERNAL STORAGE IS 16GB WHERE 11.31GB IS ONLY USUABLE BY BUYER. WE CAN ALSO INSERT MEMORY CARD UPTO 32 GB.
      
      7. HEATING IS A NOT A MATTER WHILE CHARGING. ONLY WHEN HEAVY APPS ARE USED WHILE HEATS THE MOBILE TO 40 DEGREES. IF NOT NO PROBLEM REGARDING HEATING.
      
      8. OS IS 2.3.6 (GINGERBREAD), NOT ICS NOR JELLY BEAN WHICH IS DISAPPOINTING TO ME.
      
      9. COMING TO BATTERY, ITS 1500 MAH SAMSUNG BATTERY, WHICH STANDS FOR 8 HOURS WHEN USING PACKET DATA 3G NETWORK CONTINUOUSLY.
      
      OVERALL ITS GOOD MOBILE TO BUY WITHIN 20000. BUT WHEN I BOUGHT IT WAS 23K.

      THE STOCK VIDEO PLAYER IS SIMPLE BUT IT SUPPORTS ALL FREE FORMATS INCLUDING THE MATROSKA I.E. .MKV FORMAT WHICH IS THE LATEST AMONG ALL OPEN STANDARD FREE FORMATS.
      
      THE BIGGEST PLUS POINT OF PHONE IS ITS DISPLAY. I HAD COMPARED IT WITH MICROMAX CANVAS HD(720P HD RESOLUTION), THE S ADVANCE'S COLORS ARE CRISP AND CLEAR UNLIKE CANVAS HD'S WHITISH SCREEN.
      
      THE BATTERY BACKUP OF PHONE IS GOOD. USING THE PHONE MODERATELY (ABOUT 32MIN OF CALLS, 2HRS. OF MUSIC, 30MIN OF 2G INTERNET, 10MIN OF GAME) THE BATTERY LASTED FOR AN ABOUT 28-30HRS. BUT ON THE CONTRARY SIDE THE PHONE TAKES ABOUT 2-2.5 HRS. TO FULL CHARGE.
      
      DESPITE 1GHZ DUAL-CORE PROCESSOR AND 768MB OF RAM, THE PHONE IS SLUGGISH TO EXIT APPLICATIONS AND RETURN TO THE HOME SCREEN WHEN COMMANDED.
      
      THE SPECS CLAIM THAT THE PHONE HAS 768 MB OF RAM BUT I HAVE FOUND IT ONLY 555 MB.
      
      OTHER NOTABLE FEATURES/APPS INCLUDE CALCULATOR, ALARM, GOOGLE MAPS. ALL ARE INTEGRATED NICELY ON THE DEVICE.
      
      
      IF YOU ARE CAMERA FANATIC THEN PLEASE DON'T BUY THIS PHONE BECAUSE
      
      1. THE PHONE DOESN'T HAVE ZOOM MODE.
      
      2. THERE?S NO SETTING TO CHANGE DEFAULT NAME OF THE IMAGES TAKEN BY CAMERA.
      
      3. AFTER CLICKING SNAPS YOU?LL NOTICE THAT THE IMAGES ARE QUITE CLEAR, BUT BELIEVE ME IMAGES LOOK CLEAR BECAUSE OF SUPER AMOLED DISPLAY NOT BECAUSE OF CAMERA. HENCE IF YOU WANT TO CHECK ITS IMAGE QUALITY THEN COPY YOUR PHOTOS TO YOUR PC YOU WILL GET TO KNOW THE COLORS AREN?T RICH AND DEEP. ALSO THE PHOTOS LOOK GRAINY. BUT ONE THING WHICH GOES IN FAVOR OF CAMERA IS ITS LED FLASH; YES IT?S POWERFUL AND VERY BRIGHT.
      
      
      ADDITIONAL INFORMATION & SPECIAL FEATURES:
      
      THE PHONE HAS 10 POINT MULTI TOUCH DISPLAY.
      
      SOC: NOVATHOR U8500 (SAME FOR GALAXY ACE 2, S3 MINI, XPERIA GO, SOLA, P, U)
      
      CPU: ARM CORTEX A9 DUAL CORE (SAME FOR GALAXY ACE 2, S3 MINI, XPERIA GO, SOLA, P, U)
      
      GPU: ARM MALI 400 MP SINGLE CORE (SAME FOR GALAXY S2, XPERIA U)
      
      SEMICONDUCTOR TECHNOLOGY: 45NM
      
      SAR VALUE (SPECIFIC ABSORPTION RATE MAX SHOULD BE 1.6W/KG. BY FCC): 0.543 W/KG.
      
      (BETTER THAN ALL OTHER NON-SAMSUNG PHONES)
      
      SYSTEM STORAGE MEMORY (FOR INSTALLING APPS): 1.97 GB
      
      USB STORAGE MEMORY (FOR STORING DATA): 11.31 GB
      
      EVERYONE WANTS HD RECORDING & SO DOES THE CAMERA CAPTURE VIDEO VERY WELL BUT THE PROBLEM HERE IS SOMEWHAT DIFFERENT. FOR 10 SEC. VIDEO (.MP4, 720P HD) IT CONSUMED 14.5 MB OF MEMORY.
      
      
      BENCHMARK SCORES:
      
      IN BROWSER MARK & SUN SPIDER IT MANAGES TO BEAT GALAXY S2 BUT IN OTHER BENCH MARKS ALSO IT PERFORMS ABOVE THE AVERAGE THAN ITS COMPETITORS SUCH AS XPERIA P AND DESIRE X.
      
      
      TURN OVER TO MUTE:
      
      IF SOMEONE IS CALLING YOU AND YOU DON?T WISH THAT THE PHONE SHOULD RING THEN JUST TURN OVER YOUR DEVICE, RINGER BELL OF YOUR PHONE WILL BE AUTOMATICALLY MUTED.
      
      
      TILT TO ENLARGE PICTURE:
      
      WHILE BROWSING IMAGES. IF YOU WANT TO ZOOM IN WITHOUT USING DOUBLE TAP & PINCH TO ZOOM ACTION THEN JUST TOUCH TAP & HOLD AT ANY TWO POINTS OF IMAGE AND THEN TILT THE DEVICE BACK AND FORTH TO ENLARGE OR REDUCE IMAGE SIZE.
      
      
      SCREENSHOT CAPTURE (ONE OF THE FEATURE OF ICS):
      
      PRESS AND HOLD THE HOME BUTTON AND PRESS THE POWER BUTTON. DO NOT PRESS AND HOLD HOME BUTTON FOR LONG TIME OR ELSE YOU WILL GET TASK MANAGER OPTION.
      
      
      POP-UP PLAY (ONE OF FEATURE OF GALAXY S3/S4):
      
      USE MOBO-PLAYER TO PLAY VIDEO AND PRESS HOME BUTTON AND THERE YOU GO FOR POP-UP PLAY.
      
      
      SCROLL ALL HOME SCREENS IN ONE SWIPE:
      
      THE NUMBERED DOTS (EACH BELONGING TO 7 HOME SCREENS) SERVE AS A SCROLL BAR TOO. PRESS AND HOLD ON THE DOTS LETS YOU SCROLL SIDEWAYS IN ONE GO RATHER THAN SWIPING MULTIPLE TIMES TO GO TO THE REQUIRED HOME SCREEN.
      
      
      FOLDER ON HOME SCREEN (ONE OF THE FEATURE OF ICS):
      
      YOU CAN CREATE FOLDERS ON HOME SCREEN AND ADD SHORTCUT TO APPS IN AN ORGANIZED MANNER.
      
      
      FINALLY IF YOU'RE WILLING TO BUY THIS PHONE:
      
      MAKE IT AS EARLY AS POSSIBLE SINCE THE DEVICE IS DISCONTINUED FROM SAMSUNG INDIA, HENCE THE PHONE IS AVAILABLE TILL THE STOCK ENDS AND THEREFORE I THINK THE PRICE HAS BEEN SLASHED TO FINISH THE STOCK.
      
      UNIQUENESS OF THE PHONE IS ITS DISPLAY. IT?S CURVED AND MADE OF CORNING?S REINFORCED GORILLA GLASS EXCEPT ONLY GALAXY NEXUS, S ADVANCE HAS CURVED DISPLAY. EVEN THE GALAXY NEXUS? IS NOT GORILLA GLASS.
      
      DO NOT USE FLIP COVER FOR YOUR PHONE SINCE THE DISPLAY IS CURVED, DUE TO WHICH THE COVER WILL START BENDING DAY BY DAY. INSTEAD USE SILICON COVER.
      
      SCREEN GUARD: USE ROUGH SCREEN GUARD INSTEAD OF SMOOTH ONE. SMOOTH WILL FEEL LITTLE STICKY TO FINGERS & ITS FINGER PRINT FRIENDLY.
      
      
      SUGGESTION:
      
      PLEASE DO NOT UPGRADE TO JELLYBEAN OS, SINCE IT'S NOT OFFICIALLY RELEASED FOR INDIA YET. EVEN IF YOU'RE GOING TO UPGRADE IT'LL VOID YOUR WARRANTY.
      
      
      EXCEPT CAMERA & GINGERBREAD OS, I LIKED MY PHONE IN EVERY WAY.
      
      BUY YOUR PHONE CAREFULLY BECAUSE IT'S A DEVICE WHICH YOU'LL KEEP 24X7 WITH YOU.

label: Galaxy S Advance
Sentences:
I DO NOT KNOW WHERE FROM SOME OF THE PEOPLE HAVE GOT INFORMATION THAT S ADVANCE WILL BE UPDATED TO JELLY BEAN. ALL THE SHOPS SELLING SAMSUNG MOBILE EVEN SAMSUNG SMART CAFE THEY SAY THAT S ADVANCE CAN BE UPDATED TO ICS TILL NOW. BUT WHEN I ASKED SAMSUNG SERVICE CENTER AND ALSO THEIR CUSTOMER SUPPORT THEY SAID THEY DON'T HAVE ANY INFORMATION REGARDING JELLY BEAN UPDATE AND ALSO S ADVANCE CAN NOT BE UPDATED TO ICS.
      
      ONE MORE THING I HAVE HEARD THAT SAMSUNG IS GOING TO LAUNCH S3 MINI IN COMING MONTHS ALTHOUGH THEY DO NOT HAVE OFFICIAL INFORMATION WHICH WILL BE A JELLY BEAN 4 INCH PHONE PRICED AROUND 20-22K, OTHER FEATURES ARE ALSO SAME AS S ADVANCE SO I DON'T SEE ANY REASON THEY WILL GIVE S ADVANCE A JELLY BEAN UPDATE.

label: Galaxy S Advance
Sentences:
I GOT THIS PHONE TO SATISFY MULTIPLE CONSTRAINTS AND OBJECTIVES. I WAS NOT INTERESTED IN A SUPER LARGE SCREEN PHONE. WANTED SOMETHING THAT COULD BE OPERATED WITH A SINGLE HAND FOR MOST USE CASES. SO 4" WAS THE MAX SIZE. WAS ALSO INTERESTED IN A PHONE WITH SUFFICIENT MEMORY TO RUN MULTIPLE APPS - MAIL, MAPS, GOOGLE NOW, VIBER, WHATSAPP, SCHEDULER, TALK, CAMERA, TUNEIN, WITHOUT HAVING TO BOTHER ABOUT MEMORY. 1GZ DUAL CORE, 1GB WOULD HAVE BEEN IDEAL. ANOTHER IMPORTANT NEED WAS TO HAVE ALL 5 SENSORS, WEIGHT UNDER 130GMS AND PRICE LESS THAN 15K. BUT THERE IS NO PHONE MAKER INTERESTED IN MAKING A 4" PHONE WITH SUCH SPECS. IT WAS VERY HARD TO LOCATE A PHONE WITH MORE THAN 512MB. FINALLY I OPTED FOR SAMSUNG GALAXY S ADVANCE BECAUSE IT HAD 768MB AND THERE WAS AN EXPECTATION THAT IT WAS GETTING A JELLYBEAN UPGRADE VERY SOON. I GOT THE PHONE IN MY HAND ON APRIL 25TH. THE VERY SAME DAY THAT JELLYBEAN WAS OFFICIALLY LAUNCHED IN INDIA.
      
      
      WITHOUT TRYING OUT THE STOCK GINGERBREAD FOR EVEN COUPLE OF DAYS, I UPGRADED TO JELLYBEAN OVERNIGHT. IMMEDIATELY AFTER UPGRADE I FOUND THE PHONE WOULD NOT REGISTER WITH THE CELLULAR PROVIDER. FINALLY I LEARNT THE HARD WAY THAT ONE HAS TO DO A FACTORY RESET IMMEDIATELY AFTER UPGRADE. THEN I LOADED ALL MY CHOICE APPS AND LOOKED FORWARD TO SOME GOOD TIMES.
      
      
      SADLY THE PHONE WITH JELLYBEAN HAS BEEN A HUGE DISAPPOINTMENT. THE PHONE STARTS LAGGING WITHIN 2 DAYS OF USAGE. IF YOU DO NOT REBOOT THE PHONE IT IS IMPOSSIBLE TO WORK WITH THE PHONE. IN COMPARISON MY OLD TRUSTED HTC LEGEND RUNNING FROYO SINGLE CORE 600MHZ, 384MB RAM WAS A BEAUTY. NO LAGS - EVEN WITH ALL THE ABOVE LISTED APPS IN USE FOR WEEKS.
      
      
      THE SAMSUNG TOUCHWIZ DIALER AND SMS APPS ARE PRIMITIVE. ON A 3.2" SCREEN THE HTC LEGEND DISPLAYED FAR MORE TEXT THAN THE GALAXY ADVANCE ON A 4" SCREEN. I HAD NO CHOICE BUT LOAD CHOMP SMS AND DIALER EX. THE STOCK CLOCK WIDGET IS CRIPPLED. UNLIKE SENSEUI'S WIDGET YOU CANNOT ACCESS CLOCK SETTINGS AND ALARM SETTINGS FROM THE SAME WIDGET. OH! HOW I MISS THE SENSEUI.
      
      
      OVER THE WEEKS AND LOTS OF GOOGLING AND DOING FACTORY RESETS TWICE, I HAVE COME TO REALIZE THE 768MB MEMORY IS JUST INADEQUATE. OUT OF 768 ONLY 624 IS ACTUALLY AVAILABLE. AFTER A FRESH REBOOT THE PHONE BEGINS WITH 400MB OCCUPIED. AND PRETTY SOON IT HAS 50MB FREE. AND IF THE USAGE PATTERN CONTINUES THEN IN 2~ 3 DAYS THE PHONE WILL HAVE 6~7MB FREE. YES ANDROID IS SUPPOSED TO MANAGE MEMORY SMARTLY ETC. NONE OF THAT IS SEEN IN ACTION. FIDDLING WITH DEVELOPER OPTIONS ALSO PROVES TO BE OF NO HELP.
      
      
      THE ONLY WAY TO MANAGE THE PHONE IS TO ACTIVELY KICK OUT APPLICATIONS (THE BACK BUTTON DOES NOT EXIT THEM) USING THE BUILT IN TASK MANAGER LAUNCHED VIA LONG PRESS OF THE HOME BUTTON. USING THIRD PARTY TASK MANAGERS/KILLERS HAS BEEN UNHELPFUL - IN FACT THEY MADE THE PHONE WORSE.
      
      
      BOTTOM LINE I HAVE COME TO REALIZE I SHOULD ROLL BACK TO GINGERBREAD. THE ONLY ADVANTAGE OF JELLYBEAN IS HAVING GOOGLE NOW. SO SHOULD I WAIT FOR SAMSUNG TO FIX THE MEMORY USAGE IN A 4.2.1/2 UPGRADE OR DO THE ROLL BACK ASAP ! (THEIR DALVIK CACHE SETTING OF 256MB FOR A 768MB RAM PHONE IS THE KILLER) (I DON'T WISH TO ROOT PHONES)
      
      
      PHONE BATTERY LIFE IS AVERAGE - WITH WIFI/GPS/MOBILEDATA/SYNC ON ALL DAY (AND I HAVE WIFI COVERAGE MOST OF THE TIME EXCEPT WHEN MOVING ON THE ROAD), THE PHONE TAKEN OFF CHARGER IN THE MORNING SHOWS 50% CHARGE LEFT AT THE END OF THE DAY AFTER 13/4 HOURS WITH A DECENT AMOUNT OF CALLS AND SMS AND BROWSING/MAP/FACEBOOK. I DON'T USE THE PHONE FOR GAMES.
      
      
      ERGONOMICALLY THE SONY EXPERIA P IS MUCH EASIER TO OPERATE WITH A SINGLE HAND THAN THE SAMSUNG GALAXY S ADVANCE - EVEN THOUGH BOTH ARE 4" SCREENS - THE SONY IS 5 MM LESS WIDE. THAT HELPS A LOT.
      
      
      I GOT A MOLIFE SILICONE CASE WITH FREE SCREENGUARD. THE SILICON CASE IS OK. THE POWER AND VOLUME SWITCH INDENTATION SHOULD HAVE BEEN MORE PRONOUNCED. IT IS HARD TO LOCATE THEM BY FEEL. THE SCREENGUARD IS AN UTTER FAILURE - HUGE FINGER PRINT MAGNET.
      
      
      OVERALL THE PHONE HAS BEEN A LET DOWN. I WISH I COULD GET BACK THE HTC LEGEND EXPERIENCE ON A LARGER SCREEN.

label: Galaxy S Advance
Sentences:
HERE ARE MY OBSERVATIONS FOLLOWING 30 DAYS AFTER BUYING THIS PHONE:
      
      
      PROS:
      
      1. HD RECORDING IS REALLY GOOD.
      
      2.DUAL CAMERA IS A PLUS FOR VIDEO CONFERENCING
      
      3.SCREEN RESOLUTION AND COLORS ARE VERY FINE.
      
      
      CONS:
      
      1. NOT SO HANDY. UNIMPRESSIVE BUILD MAKES IT TOUGH TO GRAB COMFORTABLY. PRONE TO SLIP OFF.
      
      2. 5 MP CAMERA IS AWFULLY DISAPPOINTING WHEN TAKING PICS (ALTHOUGH GOOD FOR VIDEO RECORDING......DONT KNOW WHY). PIC SIZE IS GREATER THAN 1 MB BUT QUALITY IS BELOW PAR. MY PREVIOUS NOKIA 5233 2MP WAS WAY FAR BETTER THAN THIS. PICS QUALITY IS FINE ONLY IF THERE IS PLENTY OF DAYLIGHT AND ARE TAKEN WITHIN 2-3 METRES.
      
      3. ANTENNA RECEPTION POWER IS VERY POOR. SIGNALS GET LOST OFTEN (TO BE NOTED I RESIDE IN SOUTH DELHI, SO NO EXCUSE GRANTED)
      
      4. AUTOMATIC SCREEN LOCK IS EXTREMELY TEDIOUS. WILL LOCK/UNLOCK ON ITS OWN WILL, NOT YOURS. NEED MORE THAN FEW ATTEMPTS SOMETIMES.
      
      5. BATTERY OF COURSE IS A BIG DRAWBACK. SHOULD HAVE BEEN ATLEAST 2100MAH INSTEAD OF 1500MAH.
      
      5. WOULD START HANGING OFTEN ONCE YOU INSTALL LIKE MORE THAN 10 NICE APPS OR SO, OR EVEN WHEN YOUR STORAGE STARTS RUNNING OUT OF SPACE. INTERFACE NOT SO SMOOTH AS WOULD HAVE EXPECTED.
      
      6. NO JELLY BEAN UPDATE TILL DATE.
      
      
      FINAL VERDICT:
      
      I DONT RECOMMEND THIS PHONE AT ALL. OVERLY PRICED (WORTH NOT MORE THAN 15K) AND LOW PERFORMANCE PHONE DESPITE HAVING DUAL CORE ARM CORTEX 9. FOR CONNOISSEURS OF QUALITY TECHNOLOGY PRODUCTS, I RECOMMEND STRONGLY TO GO FOR SONY OR NOKIA ONLY - TRIED, TRUSTED AND RELIABLE.

label: Galaxy S Duos
Sentences:
GOOD PHONE AT THAT PRICE
      
      I HAVE BEEN USING THIS PHONE FOR A MONTH NOW AND FOLLOWING ARE THINGS WHICH YOU SHOULD KNOW ABOUT THE PHONE:-
      
      
      PROS:
      
      1) EXCELLENT BATTERY BACKUP (WITH MODERATE TO HEAVY USAGE, IT LASTS FOR ATLEAST 15 HOURS)
      
      2) SNAPPY INTERFACE. WORKS LIKE A CHARM. (I AM USING IT ALONG WITH A 8GB MEMORY CARD-CLASS 6)
      
      3) MOST OF THE APPLICATIONS WHICH A REGULAR ANDROID USER WOULD REQUIRE CAN BE USED ON THIS PHONE (WHATSAPP, GMAIL, GTALK, FACEBOOK, FLASHLIGHT, DROPBOX, INSTAGRAM, GOOGLE MAPS, CRICBUZZ, NEWSPAPER APPS, LINKEDIN, MARKET APPS, SOUNDHOUND, SWISS ARMY KNIFE, M-INDICATOR, FREE SMS INDIA AND MANY MORE)
      
      3) 3GB INTERNAL MEMORY. OUT OF WHICH YOU GET AROUND 1GB DEDICATED FOR INSTALLING APPS. YOU WILL RARELY RUN OUT OF MEMORY. (OTHER PHONES WITH LESS INTERNAL MEMORY KEEP ON DISPLAYING ANNOYING POP UP MESSAGES AND EVEN BLOCK BASIC CALLING/TEXTING FUNCTIONALITY IF INTERNAL MEMORY IS FULL)
      
      4) DECENT RAM (289MB) IS AMPLE ENOUGH FOR MODERATE MULTITASKING (LIKE MUSIC PLAYER+GOOGLE MAPS+MESSAGING/WHATSAPP)
      
      5) EXCELLENT FOR MESSAGING EVEN WITH BIG FINGERS (USING IN BUILT SWYPE FEATURE, TEXTING IS REALLY QUICK)
      
      6) MUSIC PLAYS DECENTLY IN THE HEADPHONES. NOT VERY LOUD ON THE SPEAKERS.
      
      7) CALL QUALITY IS FANTASTIC. LOUDSPEAKER DURING CALLS IS LOUD ENOUGH AND IMPRESSIVE
      
      8) VOICE TO TEXT FEATURE CAN BE USED FLAWLESSLY.
      
      9) GPS LOCKS YOUR POSITION WITHIN A MINUTE
      
      
      IN SHORT, IT HAS MOST OF THE ADVANTAGES OF A SAMSUNG PHONE. I'VE USED HIGHER END SAMSUNG PHONES INCLUDING GALAXY S2, GALAXY S PLUS, GALAXY S, ETC AND THE FUNCTIONALITY IS QUITE SIMILAR
      
      
      CONS:
      
      1) DISPLAY SCREEN IS NOT VERY IMPRESSIVE. VIEWING ANGLES ARE RESTRICTED. COULD HAVE BEEN BETTER.
      
      2) CAMERA IS 2MP. NO FLASHLIGHT, NO AUTOFOCUS. POOR IMAGE QUALITY (THOUGH U CAN USE FLASHLIGHT APP AND USE UR SCREEN AS A TORCH)
      
      3) NO PROXIMITY SENSOR. BUT THE PHONE IS SMARTLY DESIGNED TO LOCK THE SCREEN AS SOON AS U MAKE A CALL. U HAVE TO DOUBLE TAP TO UNLOCK. THE BACKLIGHT GOES OFF WITHIN A FEW SECONDS WHILE ON CALL
      
      4) NOT UPGRADEABLE TO ANDROID 4.0 ICS. I DON'T THINK THERE IS MUCH NEED FOR THAT AS THE DEVICE RUNS SMOOTHLY ON THE CURRENT 2.3.6 ANDROID
      
      5) NOT ALL GAMES WORK. FOR EG: TEMPLE RUN DOES NOT WORK.
      
      
      OVERALL:
      
      I WOULD RATE IT 8/10 (2 POINTS DEDUCTED FOR THE DISPLAY & LACK OF AUTOFOCUS)
      
      THIS IS AN ULTRA LOW BUDGET ANDROID PHONE WHICH WILL FULFILL YOUR BASIC ANDROID NEEDS. NOTHING FANCY. NOT AT ALL A CAMERA PHONE.
      
      
      STURDY PHONE WHICH REALLY FITS IN YOUR POCKET & NOT TOO HARSH ON THE POCKET ;)
      
      EXCELLENT VALUE FOR MONEY PRODUCT!
      
      GOT THIS PHONE FOR AROUND RS 5700. THE PHONE HAS HARDLY ANY COMPETITORS IN THIS PRICE RANGE UNLESS YOU ARE WILLING TO COMPROMISE ON THE BRAND NAME.
      
      HURRY UP AS SAMSUNG HAS LAUNCHED THE DUOS VERSION OF THIS PHONE(WHICH IS PRICED HIGHER) AND HENCE IS DISCONTINUING THE SINGLE SIM MODEL.

label: Galaxy S Duos
Sentences:
DEAR ALL,
      
      
      I WANT EVERY PURCHASER OF THIS MOBILE TO TEST THIS SPECIFIC FUNCTIONALITY ON THIS PHONE.
      
      
      BEING A DUAL SIM PHONE, YOU CAN INSERT BOTH THE SIM CARDS.
      
      
      1. START YOUR DATA NETWORK ON SIM 2 AND TRY CALLING YOUR SIM 1. YOU WILL GET A MESSAGE : THIS MOBILE NUMBER IS SWITCHED OFF. THIS SHOULD NOT HAPPEN.
      
      
      2. IF YOU HAVE ACTIVATED SMART DUAL SIM FEATURE AND FOLLOW THE SAME PROCEDURE THEN YOUR CALL ON SIM 1 WILL BE DIVERTED TO SIM 2 AS A FORWARD CALL. IN THIS CASE, YOUR SIM 1 OPERATOR WILL CHARGE YOU FOR EVERY FORWARD CALL.
      
      
      3. IF YOU CALL SIM 2 NUMBER WHERE YOU ARE USING DATA NETWORK THEN THERE IS NO ISSUE AND THE PHONE WILL BE RINGING FOR SIM 2.
      
      
      THIS SHOULD NOT HAPPEN WITH DUAL SIM PHONE AS BY DEFAULT THEY ARE SUPPOSED TO BE ACTIVE AT ANY POINT OF TIME.
      
      
      PLEASE LET ME KNOW YOUR CONCLUSIONS.
      
      
      THANKS,
      
      SAGAR MEHTA

HELLO EVERYONE,
      
      I'M HERE TO GIVE YOU A TOP TO BOTTOM REVIEW ON THE SAMSUNG S DUOS PHONE. I HAVE BEEN USING THIS PHONE FRO LAST 2 WEEKS. ME AND MANY OF MY FRNDS WERE SURPRISED TO SEE CHOTA S3 ON MY HAND.. THE BUILD OF THE PHONE IS NICE.. OF-COURSE THE PLASTIC IS A BIT CHEAPER.. BUT IT IS NOT HURTING THE STANDARD OF THE PHONE.
      
      
      THE BATTERY BACK UP LIKE OTHER ANDRIOD PHONES IS ONLY FOR ONE DAY. CHARGING OF THE PHONE IS SUPERB. IT TAKES LESS TIME.
      
      
      NOW LET ME BRIEF YOU THE SOFTWARE BUILD AND STUFF. THE PHONE UI IS AWESOME. TOUCH IS NICE. THE PHONE FEATURES ARE OK. BUT THERE IS A MAJOR ISSUE IN THE PHONE. IF U KEEP THE POWER SAVING MODE ON THE PHONE HAS LOTS OF LAGS EVEN WHILE ACCESSING THE CONTACTS . THIS LAG IS SERIOUSLY VERY IRRITATION. SOMETIMES EVEN WHEN WE GET CALLS IT ONLY VIBRATES WITH A BLANK SCREEN.
      
      
      ANOTHER MAJOR ISSUE I WOULD LIKE TO SHARE IS THAT THE PHONE INTERNAL MEMORY IS ONLY 2GB AND ALL THE APPLICATION SHOULD BE INSTALLED IN IT. WE CANNOT MOVE THE APPS TO SD CARD. THERE IS NO OPTION TO MOVE TO SD CARD. EVEN I TRIED INSTALLING APPS TO MOVE ,BUT AINT WORKING. THIS IS THE MAJOR CONCERN HERE. BECAUSE WHEN I INSTALLED FB IN MY PHONE. THE PHONE WAS GETTING STUCK AND I HAD NO OTHER OPTION THEN UNINSTALLING THE FB APP.
      
      
      THERE IS ALSO ISSUE IN THE NETWORK. THE CLARITY WHILE ON CALL IS ALSO BAD. IF WE MAKE A CALL. WE CANNOT HEAR PROPERLY AND WHEN WE RECEIVE A CALL THERE IS LOT OF DISTURBANCE. THIS ISSUE WAS SEEN WHEN I HAD FULL NETWORK RANGE.

      THANK YOU
      
      SHUVAIS

I DON'T WANT TO DISCOURAGE ANYBODY BUT IM SURPRISED TO SEE THAT THIS PHONE DOESN'T REVEAL THE WONDERS IT HAS PROMISED.
      
      I AGREE IT HAS GOT THE LATEST ANDROID JELLY BEAN 4.1 , BUT THE TOUCH ISNT TOO GOOD. FURTHERMORE SAMSUNG ARE SO DUMB THAT ON 1 GHZ PROCESSOR THEY HAVE LAUNCHED AN UPDATE OF JELLY BEAN.
      
      
      I TESTED THIS PHONE IN VARIOUS CATEGORIES ,, YOU CAN CHECK THOSE BELOW :-
      
      
      1. MULTITASKING -
      
      YES, THE MAIN FEATURE EVERYBODY WANTS IN THEIR PHONE. THIS PHONE CAN ONLY RUN UP TO 4  APPS (I OPENED G MAIL, G MAPS, FACEBOOK, HILL CLIMB RACING) WITH MEDIUM LAG. IF YOU OPEN MORE APPS THE PHONE BECOMES SLOW AND DULL, THAT'S A BIG DRAWBACK
      
      
      2. BATTERYLIFE-
      
      DONT BE TEMPTED BY THE INFO PROVIDED BY SAMSUNG THAT THE PHONE HAS A GOOD BATTERY LIFE.
      
      THE BATTERY GOT OUT OF ACTION AFTER 2 HOURS OF BROWSING. WITHIN FIRST FIFTEEN MINUTES OF MULTI-TASKING THE BATTERY REACHED TO 73% FROM 100%. YOU CAN GET GLIMPSE THAT HOW THIS PHONE DRAINS THE BATTERY POWER. IF YOU ARE READY TO CHARGE THIS PHONE ATLEAST TWO TIMES A DAY, YOU MAY GO FOR IT.
      
      
      3.CAMERA -
      
      CAMERA  IS GOOD IN LIGHT OF WHAT CAN BE EXPECTED OF  A 5MP SENSOR.
      
      
      4. DISPLAY -
      
      DISPLAY ISNT TOO BRIGHT AND YOU WILL HAVE A HARD TIME READING IT SUNLIGHT. INDOORS IT IS FINE.
      
      TOUCH IS I WOULD SAY IS AVERAGE, NOTHING HOT SHOT THERE, IF YOU THINK IM WRONG, GO TO A MOB DEALER AND ASK HIM TO SHOW YOU THE TOUCH OF LUMIA 620. ITS TOUCH IS RIVAL TO S3 AND IPHONE.

label: Galaxy S Duos
Sentences:
BEING A LOYAL SAMSUNG CUSTOMER, I DECIDED TO OPT FOR THIS PHONE WHEN I LOST MY HTC WILDFIRE. I WANTED A PHONE AROUND 12K AND I THOUGHT THIS WOULD BE A BEST FIT CONSIDERING IT HAD THE LATEST ANDROID VERSION AND 1 GB RAM AND OF COURSE THE SAMSUNG LABEL. BUT, I NOW REALIZE IT WAS A HORRIBLE DECISION. AFTER USING THIS PHONE FOR 4 MONTHS, HERE'S WHAT I THINK:
      
      
      PROS:
      
      + GOOD DISPLAY
      
      + GOOD SOUND
      
      + CAMERA (IF YOU CAN GET IT TO OPEN WITHIN A REASONABLE TIME)
      
      
      CONS:
      
      - HANGS ALL THE TIME. SOMETIMES IT WILL NOT EVEN LET YOU PICK UP A CALL. I DO NOT KNOW HOW COULD SAMSUNG GET THIS SO WRONG. THEY SHOULD HAVE DEDICATED RESOURCES FOR THE BASIC CALLING FEATURES.
      
      - WITH 1 GB OF MEMORY, I THOUGHT I COULD AFFORD TO INSTALL AT LEAST THE BASIC APPS (FB, OPERA, GOOGLE DRIVE). SADLY, WITH SUCH A POOR PERFORMANCE, I HAD TO UNINSTALL ALL OF THEM.
      
      - THE 1 GB MEMORY IS AN EYE WASH AS THE MEMORY AVAILABLE TO APPS IS ONLY 645 MB, AND WHENEVER I SEE THE MEMORY STATUS, I SEE APPROXIMATELY 600 MB ALWAYS IN USE.
      
      - ONE WOULD THINK I HAVE MANY APPS RUNNING IN THE BACKGROUND WHICH IS SLOWING DOWN MY PHONE, BUT HERE'S THE LIST AND I THINK THESE ARE JUST THE BASIC ONES YOU WOULD NEED FROM A SMARTPHONE:  EXCHANGE, GMAIL, GOOGLE DRIVE, WHATSAPP.
      
      
      OVERALL:
      
      I'M COMPLETELY DISSATISFIED WITH THIS PHONE AND IT DOES NOT LIVE UP TO THE SAMSUNG BRAND. I DO BELIEVE THEIR HIGH END PHONES ARE TOP OF THE LINE, BUT THIS ONE REALLY DISAPPOINTS. AT FIRST I THOUGHT IT WAS ONLY ME WITH THIS PROBLEM, BUT MY FRIENDS WITH THE SAME PHONE COMPLAIN ABOUT THE VERY SAME PROBLEM. MY SUGGESTION: BEFORE YOU BUY, ASK SOMEONE WHO HAS USED THIS PHONE FOR A WHILE WITH THE SAME APPS THAT YOU INTEND TO USE.

label: Galaxy S Duos
Sentences:
I BOUGHT THIS MOBILE (NOT THROUGH FLIPKART) AFTER SOME INVESTIGATION AND RESEARCH, BUT I SHOULD SAY I AM DISAPPOINTED NOW.
      
      THE MAIN PROBLEM OF THIS DEVICE IS THAT ITS VERY VERY SLOW. I DO NOT EXPECT A DEVICE IN 13K RANGE TO BE SUPER FAST, BUT THIS IS NOT ACCEPTABLE AT ALL. WITH 1 GHZ AND 768 MB RAM, I DO NOT GET PERFORMANCE WHICH MATCHES MY OLD MOBILE WHICH DO NOT HAVE ANY COMPARABLE CONFIGURATION WITH THIS PHONE. THIS PHONE LAGS IN EVERY THING THAT YOU DO, IT TAKES LONG TIME TO OPEN THE DIAL PAD, MESSAGE APP, CALENDAR, CLOCK, SETTING WHICH ARE VERY BASIC THINGS AND SHOULD NOT TAKE THAT MUCH TIME. THE MOST ANNOYING PART IS THAT THE SCREEN GOES BLANK WHEN A CALL ARRIVES. YOUR MOBILE WILL BE RINGING, BUT YOU CANNOT ACCEPT THE CALL OR DO ANYTHING FOR THAT MATTER. ONLY THING GOOD ABOUT THIS PHONE IS LOOKS AND DUAL SIM.
      
      I THINK WHOEVER HAS WRITTEN GOOD REVIEW ABOUT THIS PHONE ARE EITHER DOES NOT INSTALL ADDITIONAL APPLICATIONS OR JUST USE THE PHONE TO MAKE CALLS. THE BATTERY LIFE IS ALSO VERY POOR
      
      
      PROS:
      
      1. GOOD LOOKS (DECEPTIVE)
      
      2. DUAL SIM
      
      3. PRICING
      
      
      CONS:
      
      1. DEAD SLOW - THE MOST DISAPPOINTING FACTOR OF THIS PHONE
      
      2. YOU CANNOT ATTEND CALLS SOME TIME AS SCREEN GOES BLANK AND MOBILE WILL BE RINGING
      
      3. POOR TOUCH RESPONSE WHEN PHONE IS HEAVILY USED DURING GAMES
      
      4. POOR BATTERY LIFE
      
      5. UNWANTED FACTORY APPLICATIONS JUST START AS SERVICE AND EAT UP MEMORY AND BATTERY
      
      6. LIMITED STORAGE AND NO APP TO SD
      
      7. POOR GPS RECEPTION, DOES NOT LOCK BY DEFAULT, EACH TIME YOU NEED TO CLEAR AND UPDATE A-GPS DATA WITH THIRD PARTY APP. REALLY ANNOYING
      
      8. POOR SIGNAL RECEPTION, MY IN-LAWS NOKIA X2 GETS VERY GOOD SIGNAL WHEN THIS PHONE DOES NOT EVEN SHOW SIGNAL.
      
      9. LOW QUALITY MUSIC PLAY BACK AND SUPPLIED HEAD PHONE IS ALSO NOT GOOD.
      
      10. LOUD SPEAKER VOICE LEVEL IS TOO LOW, YOU WILL NEVER WAKE UP IF YOU SET AN ALARM IN THIS :P
      
      
      OVERALL, I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS PHONE. BUY IT IF YOU GET IT FOR SAY 8K MAX.
      
      CORRECTION, DO NOT BUY THIS PHONE EVEN IF SOME ONE GIVES IT FOR 3-4K, THIS IS TOTALLY USELESS. I THINK IT IS BETTER TO GO BACK TO GOOD OLD NOKIA 1100, ATLEAST WE CAN MAKE AND RECEIVE CALLS WTHOUT ANY PROBLEM.
      
      
      SAMSUNG ARE YOU SEEING ALL THESE 1 START REVIEWS? WHY DON'T YOU RELEASE SOME SOFTWARE UPDATE WHICH CAN MAKE ATLEAST THE BASIC FUNCTIONS WORK SMOOTHLY. YOU HAVE RELEASED JELLY BEAN FOR MANY CHEAPER PHONES, WHY NOT FOR THIS. I THINK THE ATTITUDE IS JUST A SLAP ON CUSTOMERS WHO TRUSTED YOU.

      THE SAMSUNG GALAXY S3 IS A CHIC SMARTPHONE THAT OFFERS COMPELLING NEW WAYS OF COMMUNICATING AND SHARING AND IS MEANT FOR PEOPLE WHO ARE LOOKING FOR A SMARTPHONE THAT DELIVERS POWER AND SPEED.

label: Galaxy S3
Sentences:
I HAVE BEEN USING THE SAMSUNG GALAXY S III SINCE IT'S LAUNCH. AND BEING A BLACKBERRY AND NOKIA SYMBIAN USER BEFORE, THIS PHONE IS HEAVENLY TO USE! SO HERE IS AN EXPANSIVE SUMMARY OF MY EXPERIENCE:
      
      
      1.DISPLAY:
      
      THE DISPLAY IS VERY SHARP AND VERY VIVID AND ENTIRELY CUSTOMIZABLE FOR ENHANCING OR DEGRADING THE VIEWING EXPERIENCE. SAMSUNG PROVIDES FOUR CUSTOMIZABLE SETTINGS IN THE SCREEN MODE OPTIONS IN THE DISPLAY SETTINGS. THE DISPLAY AS EXPECTED CONSUMES MOST OF THE BATTERY POWER, WHICH ALSO DEPENDS UPON WHICH SCREEN MODE HAS BEEN SET. SUNLIGHT VISIBILITY IS AVERAGE.
      
      
      2.BATTERY:
      
      THE PHONE BATTERY AFTER CHARGING TO THE 100% MARK RUNS ABOUT A DAY WITH HEAVY PHONE CALLS AND TEXT MESSAGING. WITH THE DATA CONNECTION ON, IT RUNS TILL 06:00AM IN THE MORNING TO 05:00PM IN THE AFTERNOON, WITH DESPERATE ATTEMPTS TO SAVE BATTERY THOUGH. BUT UNDER MODERATE USAGE AND OCCASIONAL PHONE CALLS AND TEXT MESSAGING, THE BATTERY LASTS MORE THAN A DAY AT TIMES. BUT AS EXPECTED, I HAVE NOT YET HEARD OR SEEN HD ANDROID PHONES HAVING KILLER BATTERIES AFTER ALL. THEREBY THE BATTERY LIFE DEPENDS ENTIRELY UPON THE USAGE PATTERN OF AN INDIVIDUAL.
      
      
      3.GRAPHICS:
      
      THE S III COMES EQUIPPED WITH A 1.4GHZ MALI-400MP QUAD CORE PROCESSOR AS HIGHLY OBVIOUS. THE PHONE SUPPORTS PRACTICALLY EVERY VIDEO FORMAT YOU MIGHT WANT IT TO PLAY. FOR INSTANCE, IT SUPPORTS WEBM, FLV, AND SO ON. AND I HAVE NOT USED ANY UNUSUAL VIDEO FORMAT YET, SO EXCUSE ME IF YOU FIND THIS INFORMATION INCORRECT. AND THE DEVICE PLAYS FULL HD FILES AS VERY MUCH EXPECTED OUT OF THE BOX. AND POINT TO BE NOTED, WHEN CONNECTED TO A PC AND COPYING VIDEO FILES TO THE EXTERNAL SD CARD OR THE DEVICE, A MESSAGE APPEARS SAYING,'
      
      WOULD YOU LIKE TO CONVERT THE VIDEO FILE BEFORE COPYING?' I ALWAYS CHOSE TO IGNORE THAT AND NEVERTHELESS ALL VIDEO FILES PLAY EFFORTLESSLY. BASIC GAMES ARE A PIECE OF CAKE FOR THE DEVICE, BUT HIGH PROCESSOR CONSUMING GAMES HAVE NOT BEEN TESTED BY ME, THUS NO COMMENT ON THAT.
      
      
      4.INTERFACE:
      
      THE DEVICE USES SAMSUNG'S CUSTOMIZED TOUCHWIZ 4.0 ICE CREAM SANDWICH PLATFORM. WHICH IN MY OPINION IS A FAR MORE ELEGANT AND BETTER LOOKING INTERFACE THAN THAT ON THE HTC ONE X AND ONE X+, WHICH HAS OPAQUE MENU BACKGROUNDS AND A DULL INTERFACE. SO, IF THE INTERFACE LOOK MATTERS TO YOU, YOU WILL AND SHOULD OPT FOR THE S III WITHOUT A HINT OF DOUBT.
      
      
      5.CAMERA:
      
      THE PRIMARY CAMERA IS AN 8MP AUTOFOCUS CAMERA, WITH CMOS AND A NOT VERY BRIGHT LED FLASH, IT CAPTURES PHOTOS IN BROAD DAYLIGHT EXCELLENTLY AND HAS A 1.3MP FRONT FACING CAMERA WHICH IS RATHER GOOD FOR SELF SHOTS. THE CAMERA IS AN ENTIRELY SOCIALIZING FEATURE OF THE DEVICE, WHICH IS CERTAINLY NOT MADE TO REPLACE A NORMAL CAMERA AFTER ALL. SO, BY PERSONAL OPINION EXPECTING A 12MP CAMERA ON A ALREADY WELL EQUIPPED DEVICE IS RATHER ABSURD.
      
      
      6.BUILD QUALITY:
      
      
      THE ONLY NOT SO IMPRESSIVE FACTOR OF THE S III IS IT'S BUILD QUALITY WHICH DOES NOT FEEL PREMIUM OR VERY LONG LASTING. IF COMPARED TO THE IPHONE 5 IN TERMS OF BUILD QUALITY, THE S III FEELS VERY FLIMSILY BUILT. BUT, THAT IS DEFINITELY A MATTER OF PERSONAL OPINION ENTIRELY, SINCE INDIVIDUALS PURCHASING PHONES IN THE PRICE RANGE OF THE S III AS PER MY EXPERIENCE DO NOT KEEP THE SAME PHONE FOR MORE THAN 1 YEAR, SO THAT REALLY SHOULD NOT MATTER TO YOU IF YOU DO NOT PLAN TO USE IT TOO ROUGHLY OR MORE THAN 2 YEARS.
      
      
      7.PRICE:
      
      
      WHEN I PURCHASED IT, THE PRICE WAS AT IT'S PEAK AT APPROXIMATELY 35000/- INR, BUT ACCORDING TO IT'S CURRENT PRICE OF AROUND 29500/- INR AS OF FLIPKART, IT IS VERY MUCH WORTH BUYING, IT IS A VALUE FOR MONEY PRODUCT ACCORDING TO MY OPINION. IT IS BOUND TO PROVIDE BOTH VERY SEAMLESS, 'BUTTER-SMOOTH' USAGE AND ALSO VERY EXCELLENT BRAND VALUE FOR CUSTOMERS WHO ACTUALLY CARE ABOUT IT. PERSONALLY I VERY MUCH DO CARE ABOUT BRAND VALUE THAT IS. JUST SAYING THAT THE HTC ONE X IS CHEAPER WITH THE SAME FEATURES IS PREPOSTEROUS. THE ONE X AND ONE X+ LACKS THE MUCH BETTER VISUAL INTERFACE OF THE S III, SO PAYING SOME EXTRA MONEY FOR THAT IS JUSTIFIED, FOR PEOPLE WHO CARE ABOUT HOW THE INTERFACE LOOKS.
      
      
      8.CONCLUSION:
      
      
      THE PHONE IS A PERFECT BLEND OF EVERYDAY USABILITY WITH EXCEPTIONAL FEATURES. I MYSELF NEVER REGRETTED BUYING THE S III. APART FROM THAT, IF THE SCREEN OF THE GALAXY S III SEEMS SMALL, THE SAMSUNG GALAXY NOTE II WILL BE A MORE ATTRACTIVE PHONE FOR THAT INDIVIDUAL. AND IF EVEN HIGHER SPECIFICATIONS IN TERMS OF CAMERA ARE REALLY VERY NECESSARY, THE SONY XPERIA SL IS WORTH BUYING WITH IT'S 12MP CAMERA.
      
      
      THE SAMSUNG GALAXY S III IS A PRACTICALLY BUILT PHONE WHICH HAS A VERY JUSTIFIABLE PRICE TAG NOW. SO IF YOU LIKE IT OR LOVE IT, DO NOT WAIT AND JUST GO FOR IT.

label: Galaxy S3
Sentences: I HAVE BEEN USING THE SAMSUNG GALAXY S3 FOR 6 MONTHS NOW, AND NEEDLESS TO SAY, I AM REALLY IMPRESSED BY THE MOST POPULAR SMARTPHONE OF 2012. I AM NOT GOING TO BLABBER ABOUT SPECS AS IT HAS ALREADY BEEN COVERED BY MANY OTHERS. THE DISPLAY IS CRISP AND THE COLOURS JUST POP OUT. I PREFER A BIT OF SATURATION. SUNLIGHT LEGIBILITY IS NICE TOO. I AM A TECH GEEK AND RUN 155 APPS ON MY DEVICE. NO LAG AT ALL. AND THE S3 IS ROOT FRIENDLY TOO. ANTUTU FETCHES A SCORE OF 15582 WITHOUT OVERCLOCKING. THE ONLY CON PERHAPS IS LOW AUDIO OUTPUT WHILE LISTENING TO MP3. SONY PHONES ARE THE LOUDER MUSICIANS. YEAH, I WOULD HAVE LOVED A LITTLE JUICIER BATTERY. SO NO COMPLAINTS REALLY. AND THOSE WHO SAY THAT THE NEXUS 4 IS BETTER AT THE SAME RANGE, YES IT HAS GOT A SNAPPIER PROCESSOR, MORE RAM; BUT NON-EXPANDABLE MEMORY, NON-REMOVABLE BATTERY AND AVERAGE SERVICEABILITY IN INDIA FOR GOOGLE DEVICES MADE ME OPT FOR S3 INSTEAD. BOTH ARE GOOD PHONES THOUGH, ITS A MATTER OF INDIVIDUAL PREFERENCE. AND STILL, IF U WANT MORE, XPERIA Z MIGHT BE AN OPTION.

label: Galaxy S3
Sentences:
I LL JUST JORT DOWN THE CONS OF THE PHONE WHICH I FOUND FROM MY PERSONAL EXPERIENCE RATHER THAN BOASTING ABOUT ITS PROS, WHICH YOU CAN GET FROM YOUTUBE REVIEWS AND OTHER WEBSITES.
      
      
      1) THE PHONE BACK IS PLASTIC AND SHINY, WHICH MAKES IT SLIPPERY
      
      2) IF THE PHONE FALLS FACING ITS SCREEN, ITS ALMOST SURE THAT IT LL SHATTER, SO THE FIRST THING YOU NEED TO DO AFTER BUYING IT IS TO GET A GOOD CASE THAT PROVIDES ROUND THE BODY PROTECTION, WELL SOME GOOD CASES ARE AVAILABLE  FROM EBAY AND FLIPKART.
      
      3) BATTERY LIFE IS NOT AS GOOD AS I VE EXPECTED FROM A 2100 MAH, FOR MY USE IT LL LAST FOR NOT MORE THAN A DAY(I USE GPS, 3G, CAMERA AND WATCH COUPLE OF HD SONGS EVERYDAY).
      
      4)THE PHONE IS INFACT A BEAST IN TERMS OF PERFORMANCE, BUT AT TIMES, IT CAN BECOME LIL SLUGGISH WITH MULTIPLE APPLICATIONS RUNNING TOGETHER. SINCE I VE NOT COMPARED IT HAND TO HAND WITH OTHER PHONES IN ITS CLASS, I M NOT COMMENTING MUCH ABOUT IT
      
      5)SCREEN SIZE COULD BE AN ISSUE FOR SOME PEOPLE WITH SMALL HANDS, BUT I WOULD SAY, ITS ALL ABOUT GETTING USED TO !
      
      6)THE PUSH-IN SIM CARD SLOT CAN SOMETIME CREATE PROBLEMS, IF YOU HAVE PUNCHED YOUR OLD MINI-SIM TO MAKE IT INTO A MICRO SIM.
      
      
      THESE ARE THE CONS I PERSONALLY EXPERIENCED. APART FROM THEM, ITS  JUST A AMAZING PIECE OF ENGINEERING. I WOULD RECOMMEND IT TO THOSE OF WHO THINK SMARTPHONE IS LOT MORE THAN JUST PHONING AND MESSAGING, AND USE IT WORTHWHILE!

label: Galaxy S3
Sentences:
THOUGH I DID NOT BUY THIS PHONE FROM FLIPKART, I HAVE BEEN USING THIS PHONE SINCE NOVEMBER,2012.
      
      HOPEFULLY, MY REVIEW CAN CLEAR ANY DOUBT ONE HAS REGARDING THE PHONE.
      
      
      THE REVIEW HAS VARIOUS SEGMENTS. SO IF YOU LOOKING FOR SOMETHING PARTICULAR, YOU CAN SKIP DIRECTLY TO IT.
      
      
      THE NEXT GEN FROM SAMSUNG IS ALREADY HERE. THE GALAXY SIV HAS ARRIVED AND IS PRICED AT RS. 41500. BUT THE SIII IS EVERYTHING YOU NEED IN A PHONE.
      
      
      LOOK & DESIGN:
      
      THE SIII HAVING A 4.8" SCREEN IS CERTAINLY NOT COMPACT, BUT IT NEITHER IS TOO HEAVY WEIGHING JUST 133G. SO IT CERTAINLY WILL BE FELT IN YOUR POCKET.
      
      THE DESIGN TAKES A THING OR TWO FROM THE DESIGN OF THE GALAXY NEXUS BUT HAS BEEN GIVEN A REALLY SLIM WAISTLINE WHICH IS IMPRESSIVE. THE MATERIALS USED GIVE IT A STURDY BUILD BUT HAS A DELICATE LOOK. HAVING DROPPED IT A FEW TIMES, I HAVEN'T HAD ANY DAMAGE ON THE PHONE TILL NOW. THE HYPERGLAZE COATING ON THE BACK PREVENTS SOME FINGERPRINTS AND ALSO GIVES A DECENT GRIP.
      
      
      SCREEN:
      
      THE 4.8" SUPER AMOLED 720P DISPLAY IS AMAZING. THE IMAGE QUALITY IS AGAIN IMPRESSIVE WITH PERFECT BLACKS. THE DISPLAY IS CRISP AND THERE IS ALSO AN OPTION IN THE DISPLAY SETTINGS IF YOU WANT THE COLORS TO BE MORE DYNAMIC AND COLORFUL.
      
      SUNLIGHT LEGIBILITY IS REALLY GOOD TOO, SO PEOPLE CAN SEE THE SCREEN QUITE CLEARLY ON THE SUNNIEST DAY.
      
      
      BATTERY:
      
      AS THEY SAY "KITNA DETI HAI?" WELL THE ANSWER IS NOT THAT BAD. I GET AROUND A DAY WITH MODERATE USE. FROM LISTENING TO MUSIC, MESSAGING, WATCHING VIDEOS ON YOUTUBE, CALLS ETC. THE PHONE IS GOOD AND ALSO HAS AN OPTION OF A REPLACEABLE BATTERY. SO YOU CAN CARRY AN EXTRA BATTERY.
      
      
      PROCESSOR, RAM ETC.:
      
      SAMSUNG USED ITS OWN EXYNOS 4412 QUAD PROCESSOR FOR THE GALAXY S3, A QUAD-CORE CHIP. IT'S CLOCKED AT 1.4GHZ AND IS BASED ON THE ARM CORTEX-A9 ARCHITECTURE. THE CHIP COMES WITH 1GB RAM WHICH IS GOOD COMPARED TO THE OTHER PHONES AND A MALI 400 GPU WHICH IS GOOD ENOUGH TO PLAY MOST GAMES OUT THERE WITHOUT ANY HICCUPS
      
      
      USER INTERFACE:
      
      SAMSUNG WITH THEIR TOUCHWIZ INTERFACE HAVE DONE A GOOD JOB, IT IS NOOB FRIENDLY AND ALSO HAS QUITE SOME ADVANCED OPTIONS TOO. THE INTERFACE IS GOOD COMPARED TO OTHER PHONES.
      
      
      PHONEBOOK, CALLING, MESSAGING:
      
      THE PHONEBOOK IS SIMPLE & EFFICIENT. SWIPING LEFT ON THE CONTACT ALLOWS YOU TO SEND A MESSAGE WHEREAS SWIPING RIGHT ALLOWS YOU TO CALL. IT IS THE LITTLE THINGS WHICH MAKES THE DIFFERENCE.
      
      CALL QUALITY IS GOOD. NOTHING TO COMPLAIN ABOUT. CONTACTS CAN BE ASSIGNED CUSTOM VIBRATION PATTERNS . SO DIFFERENT VIBRATION PATTERNS CAN BE ASSIGNED TO DIFFERENT PEOPLE.
      
      MESSAGING IS A BREEZE ON THE PHONE. HAVING A GREAT SCREEN, SAMSUNG HAS DONE A GREAT JOB WITH THE KEYBOARD WHICH ALSO HAS A FUNCTION LIKE SWYPE(THE KEYBOARD APP) AND IS VERY ACCURATE. THE KEYBOARD ALSO LEARNS FROM YOUR STYLE OF TYPING WHAT WORDS YOU USE MOST AFTER CERTAIN WORDS AND PUTS RECOMMENDATIONS BEFORE YOU TYPE THE NEXT WORD, WHICH IS VERY IMPRESSIVE.
      
      
      MUSIC PLAYER:
      
      DOES A VERY GOOD JOB OF A MUSIC PLAYER, HAS EQUALIZER PRESETS INCLUDING A CUSTOM ONE AND ALSO USES SOUNDALIVE TECHNOLOGY.
      
      ALSO HAS SOMETHING CALLED MUSIC SQUARE WHICH SORTS MUSIC ACCORDING THE THE MOOD OF THE USER.
      
      
      VIDEO PLAYER:
      
      THE BEST STOCK VIDEO PLAYER THERE IS. I HAVEN'T SEEN A DEFAULT VIDEO PLAYER THAT HANDLES SO MANY FORMATS EFFORTLESSLY. THE GRID MODE IN VIEWING VIDEOS IS JUST BRILLIANT WHERE THE THUMBNAILS ARE ACTUALLY BEING PLAYED INSTEAD OF A SINGLE IMAGE. THE PROPER USE OF THE PROCESSOR.
      
      
      CAMERA:
      
      I DEFINITELY LOVE THE CAMERA. IT'S NOT THE BEST IN THE MARKET BUT IT IS GOOD ENOUGH. LOADS OF CAMERA MODES OUT AND THE 4.1.2 UPDATE INCLUDED A LOW LIGHT MODE WHICH DOES A REALLY GOOD JOB OF CLICKING IMAGES IN LOW LIGHT. THE DEFAULT CAMERA IS NOT THAT GREAT BUT USING APPS SUCH AS CAMERA 360 ULTIMATE AND PUDDING CAMERA MAKE THE CAMERA EXPERIENCE AN AMAZING ONE.
      
      BUT IF YOU WANT A PHONE FOR THE STOCK CAMERA, THE LUMIA 920 IS THE BEST I HAVE SEEN.
      
      
      VIDEO RECORDING IS ALSO TOP NOTCH, THE CAMERA IS CAPABLE OF RECORDING FULLHD VIDEOS WITH 30FPS AND YOU CAN SNAP PHOTOS WHILE VIDEO RECORDING.
      
      
      OTHERS:
      
      
      THE WEB BROWSER IS BRILLIANT. NO NEED TO DOWNLOAD ANOTHER WEB BROWSER FROM THE PLAY STORE.
      
      APPS SUCH AS POLARIS OFFICE WHICH IS AVAILABLE FOR FREE IN THE SAMSUNG STORE MAKE EDITING WORD, EXCEL FILES A REALLY EASY THING.
      
      THERE IS AN S-MEMO APP WHICH ACTS LIKE A STICKY NOTE FOR THE SMALL LIL THINGS.
      
      
      WITH THE RELEASE OF THE 4.1.2 UPDATE, FEATURES LIKE MULTI-WINDOW( SCREEN SPLITS INTO HALF AND TWO TASKS SIMULTANEOUSLY CAN BE USED) AND PAGE BUDDY HAVE BEEN INTRODUCED.
      
      
      CONSIDERING CUSTOM ROMS, GALAXY SIII IS ONE OF THE MOST SUPPORTED PHONES ON XDA DEVELOPERS WITH ALMOST A NEW CUSTOM ROM BEING RELEASED EVERY DAY.
      
      
      COMPARED TO THE SIV, I PERSONALLY WOULD STICK WITH THE SIII SINCE I HAVEN'T COME ACROSS ANYTHING WHICH FULLY UTILIZES THE QUAD CORE. AND THE FEATURES OF THE SIV SUCH AS SMART SCROLL ETC. ARE SCHEDULED TO BE IN THE NEXT UPDATE FOR THE GALAXY SIII.
      
      
      CONCLUSION:
      
      I DON'T THINK YOU CAN GO WRONG WITH CHOOSING THE SIII. IT STILL IS ONE OF THE BEST PHONES IN THE MARKET EVEN TODAY.

label: Galaxy S3
Sentences:
BOUGHT A PEBBLE BLUE S3 FROM A LOCAL RETAILER AT 28K (WITH BILL :) )
      
      LOOKS:
      
      NOT MUCH CHOICE IN THE COLOUR DEPARTMENT COZ THERE IS VIDHWA WHITE OR GAY GARNET RED....
      
      ALTHOUGH THERE IS NO PREMIUM UNIBODY LIKE HTC OR DELUXE LOOK LIKE SONY XPERIA,LOOKS ARE ACCEPTABLE....
      
      
      PERFORMANCE:
      
      SLICK.COMES WITH ANDROID 4.1 OUT OF BOX.GORGEOUS AMOLED SCREEN.REALLY GREAT EXCEPT FOR SAMSUNG BLOATWARE LIKE CHATON,SAMSUNG APPS ETC. WHICH EAT DATA ON PRETEXT OF UPDATING...HAVEN'T FACED A SINGLE LAG THOUGH.WILL CONSIDER ROOTING IT AFTER WARRANTY ENDS.NO SWYPE KEYBOARD.WALLPAPERS CAN ONLY BE SET AT A PARTICULAR HEIGHT AND WIDTH OF IMAGE..SMART FEATURES LIKE DIRECT CALL.GREAT PERFORMANCE
      
      
      CAMERA:
      
      GOOD.IS SATISFACTORY.
      
      
      BATTERY LIFE:
      
      DEPENDS ON USAGE.LESS THAN SATISFACTORY FOR HEAVY BROWSING OR GAMING.AMOLED TOO HOGS A LOT OF BATTERY ESPECIALLY AT FULL BRIGHTNESS.
      
      BUT IF YOU USE IT FRUGALLY BY USING MINIMAL OR AUTO BRIGHTNESS AND TURN OFF THINGS LIKE MOBILE DATA,WI-FI,BLUETOOTH ETC. UNLESS REQUIRED AND STOP APPS LIKE S-VOICE IN BACKGROUND AND TURN ON POWER SAVING MODE IT CAN EASILY GET THROUGH AN ENTIRE DAY (TRIED THIS AND ONLY 2% WAS DISCHARGED IN 2 HRS)
      
      PHONE GETS HEATED UP IF YOU INDULGE IN HARDCORE GAMING AND BATTERY DISCHARGES QUICKLY.IN THAT CASE KEEP A POWERPACK OR SPARE BATTERY HANDY
      
      
      NOTES:
      
      YOU HAVE TO BUY A PROTECTIVE COVER OR CASE. IF YOU DROP IT THAT IS THE END.SEE THE DROP TEST VIDEOS ON YOUTUBE FOR YOURSELF.I BOUGHT A MUSUBO RUBBER BAND CASE.SOME RECOMMEND FLIP CASES BUT I DNT THINK THEY PROVIDE DECENT PROTECTION.
      
      SCRATCH GUARD MANDATORY..
      
      BUY A POWERPACK OR BATTERY IN CASE YOU ARE A HEAVY USER.
      
      16 GB INTERNAL MEMORY SHOULD BE ENOUGH AND YOU CAN EXPAND IT WENEVER U WANT
      
      ALSO KEEP A MICRO SIM HANDY BEFORE YOU BUY IT
      
      
      CONCLUSION:
      
      IF YOUR BUDGET IS AROUND 40K-50K LOOK FOR SONY XPERIA Z OR IPHONE OR HTC BUTTERFLY.BUT IF YOU ARE LOOKING FOR A DECENT PHONE AT AROUND 28K,LOOK NO FURTHER.......

label: Galaxy S3
Sentences:
BOUGHT THIS PHONE FOR 28.8K FROM FLIPKART ABOUT TWO WEEKS AGO. GOT THE 16GB MICROSD AND SAMSUNG BLUETOOTH HEADSET FREE WITH THIS OFFER WHEN I BOUGHT. FLIPKART SERVICE WAS GOOD SINCE THE PRODUCT WAS DELIVERED WITHIN THE DESIGNATED TIME.
      
      
      THE PHONE IS GOOD. I HAVE USED THIS FOR ABOUT TWO WEEKS NOW, AND I REALLY LIKE THIS DEVICE. THE SCREEN CLARITY (TRUE HD) IS BRILLIANT IN MY OPINION. THE SOUND CLARITY IS GOOD. THE LITTLE FEATURES PROVIDED BY SAMSUNG ARE NICE AND REALLY HANDY. AN UPDATE TO ANDROID 4.1.2 IS READILY AVAILABLE, AND ONCE UPDATED IT GIVES A NEWER LOOKING GALLERY AND ALSO THE "MULTI-WINDOW" OPTION LIKE NOTE 2 WHERE YOU CAN SPLIT YOUR SCREEN INTO TWO APPLICATIONS AT A GIVEN TIME. ONLY PROBLEM IS NOT ALL APPS SUPPORT THIS FEATURE AS OF NOW (LIKE WHATSAPP DOESN'T).
      
      
      CAMERA IS GOOD, BOTH FRONT AND REAR. VIDEOS CAPTURED ARE EXCELLENT AND IN HD THEY ARE JUST BRILLIANT. BATTERY IS DECENT, GIVES ME ABOUT 10-11 HOURS OF BATTERY TIME WHICH I THINK IS DECENT FOR A SMARTPHONE THIS SIZE.
      
      
      ONLY PROBLEM I HAD WITH THIS PHONE IS THAT IT'S REALLY SLIPPERY. IT NEEDS A BIT OF CARE TO HANDLE. BUT BECAUSE OF ITS SLIM SIZE AND LIGHT-WEIGHT, THIS IS A BREEZE TO FIT IN YOUR POCKETS UNLIKE THE NOTE 2 WHICH IS VERY BULKY (UNDERSTANDABLY SO GIVEN ITS 5.5" SCREEN!).
      
      
      OVERALL, DEFINITELY RECOMMENDED!

label: Galaxy S3
Sentences:

label: Galaxy S3
Sentences:
EARLIER TO THIS PHONE I WAS USING IPHONE 3GS AND THIS PHONE IS A GREAT UPGRADE IN TERMS OF DISPLAY (SIZE AND RESOLUTION), THE OS AND IN GENERAL. PEOPLE STILL KEEP SAYING THAT THE MAIN ADVANTAGE OF IPHONE LIES IN THE APPS, BUT I DON'T THINK THATS TRUE ANYMORE. ITUNES STILL HAS LARGER COLLECTION BUT THE NUMBER OF FREE APPS ARE GETTING LESSER DAY BY DAY. WHEREAS IN GOOGLE PLAY STORE THERE ARE STILL LARGE COLLECTION OF FREE APPS. THIS MATTERS A LOT TO ME.
      
      HOWEVER THE HARDWARE/SOFTWARE OPTIMIZATION IS STILL NOT UP-TO THE MARK COMPARED WITH IPHONE. EG: PLAYING CONTRACT KILLER IN IPHONE 3GS IS STILL MUCH MORE FLUID AND SEAMLESS COMPARED TO GALAXY S3. AND PULLING UP PHONE CONTACT LIST TAKES WAY TOO LONG. ALSO THE VOLUME ON THE MUSIC PLAYER THAT COMES BUNDLED WITH THE PHONE IS TOO LOW. IT'S NOT EVEN COMPARABLE TO GALAXY ACE.
      
      
      ALL IN ALL A GREAT PHONE, WITH FEW HICCUPS. BUT I STILL LOVE IT.

label: Galaxy S3
Sentences:
FEATURES OF BOTH THE PHONES ARE ALMOST SIMILAR. NOTHING MUCH TO DIFFERENTIATE, COS MOST USERS WILL NEVER BE ABLE TO EXPLOIT THE PROCESSING CAPABILITIES OR OTHER HIGH END FEATURES.
      
      
      ONLY THING THAT MAKES GALAXY S3 BETTER IS BATTERY, COS THAT'S WHAT MATTERS TO EVERY PHONE USER. IT'S REMOVABLE UNLIKE HTC. HAS MORE LIFE UNLIKE HTC.
      
      
      YOUR PHONE IS OF NO USE WITHOUT BATTERY BACKUP. THINK ABOUT IT.
      
      
      SECONDLY, HTC'S AFTER SALES SERVICE IS NO WAY NEAR SAMSUNG. THINK ABOUT THAT AS WELL AND THEN CHOOSE A PHONE :)
      
      
      HAVING PHONE LIKE THESE TWO FOR MOST USERS WILL BE SIMILAR TO HAVING A FERRARI ON CROWDED INDIAN ROADS. YOU WILL OWN THE BEST CAR, BUT WILL NEVER BE ABLE TO EXPLOIT ITS SPEED IN THOSE CROWDED CONDITIONS. SO DON'T COMPARE 1.4 WITH 1.5 PROCESSOR COS MOST USERS WILL NEVER USE THAT MUCH PROCESSING POWER. FOR THAT MATTER CAMERA AS WELL.
      
      
      I WOULD PREFER SHELLING OUT 2-3 THOUSAND EXTRA FIRST UP AND BUY AN S3 WITH REMOVABLE BATTERY AND TOO WITH LONGER LIFE INSTEAD OF HTC. BATTERY IS LIFE FOR PHONE'S

label: Galaxy S3
Sentences:
FIRST OF ALL ACKNOWLEDGMENT. KUDOS TO FLIPKART DELIVERY WHICH DELIVERED PRODUCT IN MY HAND ON JUNE 7, THE DAY IT WAS LAUNCHED IN MANY RETAIL CHAINS SUCH AS CROMA AND THAT TOO, 100 BUCKS COSTLIER. NOW, I DO NOT THINK THERE IS ANY ADDITIONAL BENEFIT WHICH RETAILERS WERE GIVING AT THE SAME PRICE AS FLIPKART SO WHY NOT GET IT HOME DELIVERED AND CHOOSE FROM A VARIETY OF PAYMENT OPTIONS? :-)
      
      NEXT, TWO THUMBS UP TO SOUMYADEEP AND AKSHAY PUJARI TO WRITE SO ELABORATELY ABOUT SGS3, ESPECIALLY THE TECHNICAL ASPECTS OF ITS EDGE OVER OTHERS. IT WOULD STAND USEFUL TO THOSE WHO STILL WONDER 1.4 IS MORE THAN 1.5!
      
      NOW COMING TO A FEW POINTS ABOUT THE PHONE BY ME, I AM NOT A AVID CELLPHONE CAMERA USER SINCE I USE D-SLR FOR PHOTO SHOOT BUT THE SGS3 CAMERA HAS SOME PRESET COLOR SETTINGS SUCH AS HUE AND TEMPERATURE. IF SHOT IN TUNGSTEN LIGHTING WITH FLASH INDOORS, IT GIVES BLUE TINGE. NO SUCH THING IF ALREADY FLUORESCENT LIGHTING EXISTS BUT THEN THE EFFECTIVE NATURE OF FLASH IS LIMITING. STILL, OKAY FOR A 8MP CAMERA.
      
      THE GOOD POINT ABOUT SLEEK BODY WHETHER ONE CONSIDERS PLASTIC TYPE 'FEELING' ON THE BACK OR NOT IS THAT WITH 4.8" SCREEN SIZE, ANY THICKER BODY WOULD HAVE MADE IT BULKY AND COULD HAVE MADE IT STAND OUT LIKE NOKIA. I AM CONSIDERING STAND-OUT WITH DIFFERENT SENSE IF YOU COULD GET THE WIND OF IT. ;-) NOT ONLY IT IS DAMN SLEEK, IT APPEARS THE SAME TOO, WHEN IN HAND. BEST SIZED TO WATCH HD VIDEOS AND GOOD SUPPORTING VIDEO TYPES GIVES PLEASANT EXPERIENCE. A FEW VIDEO TYPES DEMANDING SEPARATE CODECS DO NOT RUN ON THE PRE-INSTALLED VIDEO PLAYER. BUT SO WHAT, I INSTALLED VPLAYER AND IT RUNS ME EVERYTHING.
      
      SO, YOU MAY ASK THAT WHAT THIS PHONE IS OFFERING IF ONE NEEDS TO GET APPS FOR RUNNING DIFFERENT TASKS. MY ANSWER TO THIS LIES IN FLEXIBILITY WITH SPACE AND THAT SHALL ANSWER FOR ALL THOSE WHO WERE COMPARING 16 WITH 32 OF ONE-X. WITH 16 GB INTERNAL MEMORY, YOU'LL NEVER RUN OUT OF SPACE AS FAR AS INSTALLING APPS IS CONCERNED ESPECIALLY IF YOU INSTALL WHAT YOU USE THE MOST. BUT, WITH ADDITIONAL MICROSD CARD NOT ONLY ONE CAN SAVE THE SET-UP IN IT THUS FREEING EVEN INTERNAL MEMORY, IT IT GIVES A LOT OF FREEDOM WHEN DECIDING YOUR MEMORY REQUIREMENTS, ITS ALLOCATION AND USAGE. I PERSONALLY, LIKE THAT CONTROLLING CAPABILITY DELIVERED THROUGH SGS3.
      
      SAME FLEXIBILITY GOES FOR BATTERY. NOW, CHARGING CONDITIONS VARY IN INDIA IF YOU TRAVEL TO DIFFERENT DESTINATIONS ESPECIALLY INTO RURAL INDIA. CHANCES ARE BRIGHT THAT DUE TO DIFFERENT CURRENT-VOLTAGE PROVISIONS, THE BATTERY MAY NOT LAST THAT LONG AS PROMISED BY THE MANUFACTURER. I AM TALKING ABOUT THE OVERALL PERFORMANCE IN AGE RATHER THAN DAILY CHARGE-DISCHARGE HERE, BUT YES, IF BATTERY GOES POOR THEN I HAVE THE CAPABILITY TO BUY A NEW ONE AND REPLACE IT MYSELF!
      
      I AM NOT SAILING THROUGH DEEP WATERS OF TECHNOLOGY AS IT IS ALREADY DONE BRILLIANTLY BY SOUMYADEEP AND AKSHAY PUJARA BUT I DO NOT UNDERSTAND WHERE COMES THE ISSUE WITH PRICE?
      
      WHEN HAS IT HAPPENED THAT PRICES OF ONION AND GARLIC HAVE TURNED INDIANS INTO THOSE SECT FOLLOWERS WHO SHUN ONIONS AND GARLIC IN THEIR FOOD? WHEN HAS THE PRICE OF PETROL LED TO SHIFT TOWARDS USING BICYCLE IN INDIA? AND WE ARE TALKING ABOUT TOP OF THE LINE COMMUNICATION AND MULTIMEDIA DEVICE. ASK AN APPLE SUBSCRIBER ABOUT THE PRICE IF ONE STILL PURCHASES 4S IN INDIA. I THOUGHT WITH ITS CURRENT FEATURES, THE PRICE WOULD BE AROUND 40K AND IT ENDED THAT WAY. IF ONE WANTS TO SETTLE FOR ANYTHING LESS, IT AIN'T THAT SAMSUNG HAS NOT PROVIDED WITH OPTIONS AND THEREFORE, US COMPLAINING ABOUT THE PRICE IS NOT JUSTIFIED. WITH ONE TIME PAYMENT, WE ARE IGNORING THE FACT, THAT THE POWER OF USING ANDROID ENABLES US TO SAVE A LOT DURING OUR USAGE FOR DIFFERENT FILE TYPES ASSOCIATED WITH WORK REQUIREMENTS. SO, I CONSIDER THE PRICE OF SGS3 AS A CONSOLIDATED PRICE FOR HIGH-TECH SOLUTION AND IF SAMSUNG + GOOGLE ARE CHARGING ONE TIME HIGHER PRICE THAN ONE-X THEN IT IS MORE LIKE THEY ARE DECLARING THE WORTH OF THIS PRODUCT OVER ONE-X THROUGH ALL ANGLES. THE BEST IS ALWAYS COSTLIER THAN THE BETTER!
      
      ITS A GOOD PHONE TO LAST LONG. I FOUND 2 CHALLENGES SO FAR AND SO HAVE RATED 4 OUT OF 5. ONE IS THAT THE MESSAGE ICON SHOWS INCORRECT UNREAD MESSAGE ALERT SUCH AS 1 OR 2 AND IT GOES AWAY ONLY WITH RESTART. ITS IRRITATING BUT NOW I AM SETTLING WITH IT. SECOND IS ABOUT THE 'FACE DETECTION' S-APP WHICH IS ILLUMINATION DEPENDENT AS DESCRIBED BY MY FELLOW REVIEWERS. S-VOICE HAVING GLITCHES SIMILAR TO SIRI WAS EXPECTED AND THUS, IT HAS MET MY EXPECTATIONS. SO, I WOULD RATHER NOT COMPLAINT BUT NOT USE IT TO AVOID THE FRUSTRATION ON SPEAKING THE NAMES! :-P
      
      THANK YOU FOR PATIENT READING.

label: Galaxy S3
Sentences:
FIRST OF ALL THANKS TO THE FLIPKART TEAM FOR THEIR SERVICE WHICH IS USUALLY THE BEST. I GOT IT IN GOOD SHAPED WRAPPED WELL. THANKS GUYZ YOU ARE DOING A GREAT JOB!
      
      
      THIS ONE WILL BE A LONG ONE AND MOST PROBABLY ALL OF YOU HAVE READ MOST OF THE REVIEWS BUT EVEN THEN I'LL SHARE MY EXPERIENCE WITH YOU.
      
      
      THE PHONE IS ONE POWERFUL MACHINE AS WE ALL KNOW IT HAS QUAD-CORE 1.4 GHZ PRCR. HAS THE SMOOTHNESS OF APPLICATIONS WHICH I WAS LOOKING FOR, AS WE ALL KNOW THAT SAMSUNG HAS THE RECORD OF MAKING MULTI TASKING EASIER THAN ANYTHING, IT STANDS UPTO IT'S REPUTATION AND DELIVERS IT QUITE WELL. THE 1 GB RAM IS QUITE GOOD AND MAKES SURFING, TEXTING AND PLAYING MUSIC AT THE SAME TIME A PIECE OF CAKE. REST YOU WILL KNOW FOR YOURSELF WHEN YOU USE IT.
      
      
      AHEAD WE MOVE TO TINY DETAILS-
      
      THE 4.8-INCH SUPER AMOLED DISPLAY MEANS WATCHING MOVIES WILL BE A BREEZE AND THE ADDITIONAL GORILLA GLASS OFFERS GREATER DURABILITY AND PROTECTION.
      
      8-MEGAPIXEL CAMERA ALONG WITH 1080P HD VIDEO RECORDING AND SKPYE VIDEO CALLS A GOOD FEATURE TO USE TO. ALLTHOUGH DIM LIT PICS WILL BE A BIT UNCLEAR, BUT WELL THAT'S JUST IN FEW CCASES.
      
      ONCE YOU'VE TAKEN LOTS OF PHOTOS AND VIDEOS, THERE IS AN IMAGE AND VIDEO EDITOR ALONG WITH 16GB INTERNAL MEMORY (WHICH CAN BE BOOSTED TO 64GB VIA THE MICROSD CARD SLOT) TO STORE THEM ALL.
      
      OTHER FUNCTIONS OF THE S3 IS THE VIDEO POP FEATURE WHICH GIVES YOU PICTURE-IN-PICTURE SO YOU CAN WATCH YOUR FILMS OR VIDEOS ON THE GO WHILE STILL BROWSING - PERFECT FOR MULTI-TASKING..!!
      
      
      NOW FOR THE CONS AS WELL ALL KNOW IT COMES WITH THE PRICE.
      
      - TERRIBLE BATTERY LIFE. (SORRY PEOPLE BUT THAT'S TRUE, SO ALL YOU TEMPLE RUN USERS/TEXTING AND MUSIC LOVERS, IT WILL BOTHER YOU SOMETIMES TO CHARGE THE PHONE AFTER EVERY 5-6 HOURS OF HEAVY USAGE)
      
      - 4-5 HOURS (IF YOU'RE LUCKY) OF BATTEY LIFE WITH MINIMAL USE.
      
      - NO SD CARD INCLUDED
      
      - S VOICE NEEDS UPDATING
      
      - IT WOULD HAVE BEEN WAY BETTER IF IT CAME WITH A 2GB RAM, BUT THAT'S ONLY WHEN YOU HAVE TO PLAY REAL HARDCORE GAMES LIKE N.O.V.A.
      
      
      MAYBE THERE'S AN ISSUE WITH WHAT RUNS IN THE BACKGROUND OR HOW IT SLEEPS - I DON'T KNOW - BUT THE BATTERY DRAINING ISSUES WITH THIS PHONE MAKE IT EXTREMELY IMPRACTICAL - AS YOU NEED TO CARRY YOUR CHARGING CABLE WITH YOU AT ALL TIMES AND HOVER NEAR POWER OUTLETS SO YOU DON'T LOSE YOUR ABILITY TO USE THE DEVICE IN 4 HOURS !!!
      
      I JUST GOT RID OF MY WINDOWS PHONE SO THIS ONE IS A GOOD CHANGE ALTHOUGH THE WINDOWS WINS OVER ANDROID ANY DAY IN THE FIELD OF BATTERY PERFORMANCE.
      
      
      OVERALL I WAS PLEASED WITH THE SPEED OF THE PHONE, APPS LOAD UP INSTANTANEOUSLY AND THE PROCESSING LOAD IS INSIGNIFICANT WITH THE SPEED OF THE S4 CHIPSET AND THE 1GB OF RAM. THE OVERALL DESIGN OF THE PHONE'S EXTERIOR IS BEAUTIFUL WITH THE EXCEPTION OF THE BACK COVER. BESIDES MAINTAINING A THIN SLEEKER PROFILE THAN ITS PREDECESSORS THE BACKING FEELS CHEAP AND PLASTICKY. LOOKS CAN BE DECEIVING WHEN YOUU FIRST SEE THE BACK OF THE PHONE. BTW, THE OVERALL PHONE IS GLOSSY AND IS A HUGE FINGERPRINT MAGNET. IT WOULD PROBABLY BE LESS NOTICEABLE ON THE WHITE S3. THERE IS A BIT OF STURDINESS WITH THE PHONE AND IT IS PRETTY LIGHTWEIGHT BUT NOT TO THE POINT WHERE YOU FEEL LIKE THE PHONE WILL BREAK IN YOUR HANDS. GRIPPING THE PHONE IS ALRIGHT AND THE SCREEN AS USUAL IS SMOOTH AND VERY TOUCH FRIENDLY. THE SCREEN IS BEAUTIFUL AND LOOKS HAS THE GLOSSY FINISH!
      
      SAMSUNG HAS DONE A GOOD JOB WITH ITS UTILIZATION OF AMOLED DISPLAYS.
      
      
      SO MY RATING FOR THIS PHONE WOULD BE 4. (-1 FOR BATTERY)

label: Galaxy S3
Sentences: FIRSTLY KARAN SINGH'S REVIEW ISNT CORRECT IN SOME ASPECTS ...FIRSTLY, THE GRAPHICS HAVE BEEN IMPROVED A LOT....ALTHOUGH IT IS CALLED MALI 400MP , ITS SUPER POWERFUL...IT BEATS THE GRAPHICS OF ALL PHONES - EVEN THE IPHONE 4S AND THE ONLY OTHER SMARTPHONE /TABLET THAT CAN BEAT IT IN THE GRAPHICS DEPARTMENT IS THE IPAD 3...SECONDLY THE PROCESSOR ON HTC ONE X IS 1.5 GHZ AND THAT ON S3 IS 1.4 BUT THAT DOESNT MEAN HTC ONE X IS FASTER...THE PROCESSOR ON ONE X IS BASED ON A OLD 45NM MANUFACTURING PROCESS WHEREAS THE S3 IS BASED ON 32 NM ...WHAT THIS MEANS IS THAT THE S3 WILL EASILY OUTPERFORM THE ONE X AND CONSUME LESS POWER  AND BE SIGNIFICANTLY COOLER THAN ONE X WHICH CONSUMES MORE BATTERY, IS LESS POWERFUL, AND HEATS UP FASTER ... THIRDLY, S VOICE RESPONSE IS QUITE FAST AND IT CAN BE LAUNCHED USING VOICE , NOT BY LONG PRESSING ON A BUTTON AS KARAN SAID...AND ITS NOT JUST USED TO OPEN APPS...IT CAN BE USED TO BROWSE THE WEB , SEND TEXT MSGS, AND ALSO THE FEATURES LIKE SMART DIALING, AND SMART STAY ARE VERY USEFUL...AND REGARDING THE DISPLAY, ITS GOT THE BEST SUNLIGHT LEGIBILITY( CHECK REVIEW IN GSMARENA.COM )...AND LASTLY, ALTHOUGH BOTH PHONES ARE SAID TO HAVE 1 GB RAM , THE OS USES MOST OF THE RAM ...SO THE ACTUAL USER AVAILABLE RAM IS DIFFERENT FOR THE PHONES...HTC SENSE UI USES MORE RAM SO ABOUT 450 MB IS AVAILABLE TO THE USER WHEREAS THE S3 USES A LIGHT VERSION OF TOUCHWIZ AND IT HAS ABOUT 550 MB RAM AVAILABLE FOR THE USER ( I CHECKED IT MYSELF ) ...SO OVERALL S3 WINS...UNLESS U WANT GOOD BUILD QUALITY, GO FOR S3...THE SLIGHT DIFFERENCE IN PRICE IS WORTH IT

label: Galaxy S3
Sentences:
GOT MY S3 ON 25TH JUNE, FLIPKART-AWESOME SERVICE, THE 2ND BUSINESS NOON, THE PHONE WAS IN MY HANDS. TOOK IT WITH 3 MONTHS EMI SCHEME ON MY CREDIT CARD, EXTRA 100RS FOR IT, TOTAL PAID 39K FOR THIS MACHINE. FLIPKART DID A GREAT JOB OVER ALL.
      
      
      ABOUT THE MOBILE:
      
      FIRST LOOK, IMPRESSIVE, AWESOME FEEL, NOT TOO MANY PEOPLE WITH THIS BEAUTY IN HAND, SO FEELS GREAT. THE WATER THEME SCREEN SAVER IS AN EYE CATCHER, DEFINITELY.
      
      SCREEN SENSITIVITY IS AWESOME. GOT THE FLIP COVER FOR 1500, SCREEN GUARD FOR 500....A LOT OF MONEY SPENT....
      
      
      1.4 QUAD PRCESSOR, 1 GB RAM - FEELS GOOD...DEFINITELY FASTER THAN OTHER PHONES/PDA'S WHATEVER YOU CALL IT.
      
      YOU NEED A MICRO SIM FOR THIS PHONE, SO HAD TO RUSH TO THE VODAPHONE STORE AND GET ONE, GOT IT IMMEDIATELY AND THE PHONE WAS UP AND RUNNING. 2 MONTHS FREE 3G WAS ACTIVATELY REALY FAST, VODAFONE OFFER. ANDROID ICS IS GOOD...
      
      
      DONT REALLY NEED MY LAPTOP ANYMORE, IT VIRTUALLY HAS EVERYTHING, HAD A 8GB MEM, PLAN TO UPGRADE IT TO 64 GB SOON, OUT OF CASH RIGHT NOW...
      
      
      GREAT CAMERA, CLEAR GOOD PICTURES, HD VIDEO'S ARE GREAT.
      
      ALL IS WELL....NOW THE PROBLEMS: I HAVE EXPERIENCED A FEW:
      
      
      1. HEATING PROBLEM - ITS REAL, THE PHONE GETS HEATED UP REAL FAST, THANKS TO THE FLIP COVER THAT I HAVE THAT I FOLD AROUND ITS BACK SO I DONT FEEL IT MUCH, BUT OTHERWISE, IT BECOMES REAL HOT.
      
      
      2. 3 DAYS BACK, IT REFUSED TO GET CHARGED; I TRIED DIFFERENT SAMSUNG CHARGERS, NO GOOD, IT JUST REFUSED TO RECOGNIZE THE   CHARGER, AFTER A FEW HOURS, I TRIED THE USB CHARGING MODE THROUGH MY LAPTOP AND IT WORKED, LATER IT WAS NORMAL AND WAS CHARGING WITH AN ELECTRIC CHARGER. THAT WAS STRANGE BEHAVIOUR.
      
      
      3. LAST NIGHT, THE PHONE WAS 80% CHARGED, I SET AN ALARM AND SLEPT, BUT THE PHONE WAS DEAD IN THE MORNING, I DONT KNOW WHY, NOTHIN WAS ON, 3G, WIFI....EVERYTHING WAS DISABLED, I DONT KNOW WHY THE BATTERY DRAINED COMPLETELY.
      
      
      4. THIS PHONE DOES NOT SLEEP BEFORE YOU DO - THE ADVT SAYS THAT....DINT QUITE EXPERIENCE IT, IT DOES SLEEP! THAT FEATURE IS NOT WORKING QUITE WELL.
      
      
      5. TALK TO YOUR S3 - TELL HER THAT YOU NEED TO SLEEP A LITTLE WHILE MORE AND ALL THOSE INTERACTIVE FEATURES, DINT REALLY FIGURE OUT HOW THAT WORKS....HAVE TO EXPLORE...
      
      
      HOPE SAMSUNG GETS ALL THESE ISSUES FIXED....ONE YEAR WARRANTY, I'LL WAIT FOR 2-3 MONTHS, IF THEY HAVE A FIX AND DECIDE HOW TO FIX THE ISSUE'S OF THE SOLD PHONES LIKE MINE, GOOD, ELSE I'LL CLAIM MY WARRANTY!
      
      AFTER PAYING 40 FREAKING THOUSAND, I DONT WANT NO ISSUE WITH THIS MACHINE!
      
      
      THIS IS THE MOST DESCRIPTIVE I COULD GET, ANY SPECIFIC QUESTIONS, SHOOT!

label: Galaxy S3
Sentences:
HELLO ANDROID FANS,
      
      
      HERE IS WHERE WE ARE HEADED AND HERE IS HOW THINGS WOULD GO WRONG IF WE DONT REALLY DEMAND THE ABSOLUTE BEST. I KNOW YOU MIGHT ASK IF IT IS ABOUT THIS MONSTER OF A SAMSUNG PHONE OR ANDROID IN GENERAL, I WOULD PITCH MORE TO SAY, "BOTH". EVER WONDERED WHAT DO YOU REALLY USE YOUR PHONE FOR. HERE IT IS, "MEDIA CONSUMPTION?, CALLS, SMS, IM, GAMING, INTERNET BROWSING AND SOME MAPS ETC. HOW SATISFIED ARE WE WITH SAMSUNGS, HTCS, SONYS OR LGS OR MOTOS, I DOUBT IF WE HAVE AN ANSWER TO THAT.
      
      
      BEFORE YOU TRIGGER ME WITH MORE STARES, LET ME PUT A QUESTION, ALL ANDROID PHONES HAVE A "BACK" BUTTON AND THE STUTTER WE FEEL WHEN WE JUST HAVE TO GO BACK TO A PREVIOUS STATE LEAVES THE PHONE CRYING FOR MORE RAM AND THAT IS WHY WE HAVE MORE AND MORE RAM BEING CRAMMED INTO. FIRST IT WAS 512 MB, NOW 1GB IS COMMON AND EVEN THIS PHONE HAS 2GB IN JAPAN, NTT DOCOMO AND FOR CANADA VERSION.
      
      
      ABOUT THE SCREEN REAL ESTATE, YES IT IS BEAUTIFUL AND BIG AND REALLY AN ENTICIG PROPOSITION. THEN THE QUESTION COMES ABOUT IT BEING USED DAY IN AND OUT, WITH A DEMAND TO HAVE MORE PRODUCTIVITY OUT OF IT. IMAGINE HAVING TO CLEAN A HUGE SLAB OF GLASS AFTER A LONG CALL WITH HER, THE SWEATS, THE SMEARS OF FINGER PRINTS, HOW HAPPY THAT FEELS? I DOUBT IT. YES WHEN WE SEE A VIDEO AND PLAY A FPS GAME LIKE MODERN COMBAT IT FEELS A BOON. BUT WE DO INTEND TO DO IT ALL DAY? DO WE REALLY WANT A 4.8" SCREEN? WHY WOULD WE NEED TWO HANDS TO USE IT? I AGREE, THE GUYS AT INDUSTRIAL DESIGNS KNOW THE FACT AND ARE LEAVING NO CORNER TO CUT THE SLIGHTEST OF THE EXTRA SPACE AND GIVING IT AN OPTIMIZED FOOT PRINT, STILL THE DILEMMA OF AN OPTIMIZED SIZE OF A SCREEN WILL RING TRUE FOR A LONG TIME TO COME!! THINK WHY THE SCREEN AND KEY DIMENSION OF AN IPHONE HAS NOT GONE FOR A CHANGE FOR OVER 5 YEARS, YEAH, EXACTLY...I STILL FEEL A SCREEN SIZE OF 4~4.2 INCH IS PRETTY GREAT AND MANAGEABLE DAY IN AND OUT.
      
      
      NOW THE SOFTWARE PART, HERE IS SAMSUNG GOES ARROGANT!! WHY DO THEY HAVE TO TAKE A BEAUTY LIKE ICS AND TURN INTO AN UGLY TOUCHWIZ? I CAN NEVER GET THAT. THE ICONS LOOK HILARIOUS AND BAD, THE NOTIFICATION AREA IS HEAVILY CROWDED. THE MUSIC HUB, THE GAME HUB, THE SOCIAL HUB ARE OVERKILL. S-VOICE IS A JOKE, EVEN A WORSE JOKE THAT SIRI. CONSIDERING SAMSUNG HAD FULL ACCESS TO GOOGLE SERVICES, IT WOULD HAVE BEEN PHENOMENAL IF WELL IMPLEMENTED. SEEMS A FEATURE TO FEATURE MATCH GAME SAMSUNG WANTS TO PLAY.
      
      
      LAST AND NOT THE LEAST, ABOUT THE HARDWARE DESIGN. IT IS UGLY, PERIOD.
      
      
      OKAY, NOW SOME GOOD POINTS-
      
      
      1) BEAUTIFUL SCREEN, INFINITE CONTRAST, NATURAL COLORS AND A REFINE PENTILE ARRANGEMENT
      
      2) HOLD TO CALL, SWIPE TO CALL/SMS, SMART STAY ARE GREAT STUFF. APPLE SHOULD FEEL ENTICED TO COPY THEM :)
      
      3) S BEAM, GREAT WAY TO TRANSFER HEAVY FILES. SAMSUNG SHOULD ADVERTIZE THIS EVEN MORE TO MAKE PEOPLE KNOW IT IS GREAT. IT SHOULD ALSO HAPPEN WITH LOWER SPEC?ED DEVICES AS WE GO FURTHER
      
      
      NOW THE REAL DEAL, SHOULD YOU BUY IT. GO FOR IT IF YOU WANT A FLAGSHIP DEVICE AND YOU DON?T LIKE AN IPHONE. IT IS MUCH BETTER THAN ONE X. ONE X HAS A DISAPPOINTING BATTERY LIFE AND SOME STRANGE YELLOW TINT ON SCREEN ISSUE!!
      
      
      JAGANNATH.
