label: Galaxy S3
Sentences:
ITS BEEN A WEEK I BOUGHT THIS PHONE, AND TRUST ME GUYS, THIS IS A BEAST!!!
      
      THE FIRST THING YOU WILL NOTICE ABOUT THIS PHONE IS, WELL,ITS SIZE. ITS HUGE TO SAY THE LEAST, AND PHONES SHOULDN'T REALLY GET ANY BIGGER THAN THIS. PERSONALLY I FEEL THE SIZE IS BIG FOR A PHONE, AND IS SIMPLY RISKY FOR ONE HANDED USE. ON THE OTHER HAND, THE LARGER SCREEN ESTATE DOES HELP WHEN BROWSING THE INTERNET, OR WATCHING A VIDEO, ETC.
      
      MANY PEOPLE HAVE BEEN COMPLAINING ABOUT THE BUILD QUALITY OF THIS PHONE, SAYING ITS CHEAP PLASTIC N ALL. WHILE IT DOESN?T LOOK AS PREMIUM AS OTHER FLAGSHIPS, BUT ITS NOT THAT BAD EITHER. YOU WILL BE FOOLED IF YOU JUDGE THE PHONE'S APPEARANCE BY THE PICTURES; IN HAND, IT REALLY LOOKS AND FEELS MUCH BETTER AND STURDY. ALSO, ITS POLYCARBONATE, THE SAME MATERIAL USED ON THE HTC ONE X, SO YOU CAN COMFORTABLY FORGET ABOUT THE BAD COMMENTS ON QUALITY OF MATERIALS.
      
      THE DISPLAY IS ONE OF THE THE BEST DISPLAYS RIGHT NOW IN THE MARKET, PERIOD. SUPER AMOLEDS ARE KNOWN FOR THEIR RICH COLORS AND DEEP BLACKS, AND TRUST ME, YOU HAVE TO SEE IT TO BELIEVE IT IF YOU HAVEN?T ALREADY. THE BLACKS ARE IMPENETRABLE, AND COLORS POP OUT TO THE EYES. YOU CAN TWEAK DISPLAY SETTINGS IF YOU LIKE MORE NATURAL LOOKING COLORS. FINALLY, THOSE WHO ARE WORRIED ABOUT THE PENTILE NATURE OF THE DISPLAY, DON'T BE. AT PIXEL DENSITY OF 306 PPI, YOU WON'T EVEN NOTICE THE GRAININESS IN DAY TO DAY USE THAT WAS PREVALENT ON GALAXY S, UNLESS YOU SEE FROM VERY CLOSE RANGE.
      
      THE ICS 4.0.4 UI IS SKINNED BY SAMSUNG TOUCHWIZ NATURE UX. THIS IS NOTHING LIKE WHAT TOUCHWIZ USED TO BE COUPLE OF YEARS BACK, AND REALLY BRINGS A FRESH FEEL TO USER EXPERIENCE, NOT VERY VISUALLY APPEALING AS HTC SENSE, BUT NOT BAD EITHER. THE SOFTWARE RUNS ON EXYNOS QUAD CORE PROCESSOR, THAT COUPLED WITH A MALI 400 GPU AND 1 GB OF RAM, THIS PHONE LITERALLY EATS MOST OTHER PHONES FOR BREAKFAST. I HAVEN'T SEEN ANY ANDROID DEVICE THIS SMOOTH, THE UI LITERALLY FLIES WITH YOUR TOUCH, AND APPS LAUNCH IN A FLASH; IT JUST REFUSES TO GIVE UP, ITS INSANELY FAST! ALL OF THIS IS POWERED BY A 2100 MAH BATTERY, WHICH IS A REMOVABLE ONE TOO. IT EASILY LASTS A DAY AND A HALF WITH MODERATE TO HEAVY USAGE, AND THE LONGEVITY IS CERTAIN TO INCREASE AFTER A COUPLE OF CHARGE/DISCHARGE CYCLES.
      
      STORAGE OPTION IS PLENTY, AS THIS PHONE COMES WITH 16 GB ONBOARD. IF YOU CRAVE FOR MORE, IT SUPPORTS MICROSD CARD SLOTS OF UPTO 64 GB CAPACITY, SO STORAGE SHOULDN?T BE A PROBLEM FOR MOST.
      
      THE DEFAULT VIDEO PLAYER, AS USUAL, HAS VERY RICH CODEC SUPPORT. I HAVE EXPERIENCED SOME ISSUES WITH .MKV FORMAT, AND REALLY HOPE THIS TO BE FIXED SOON WITH AN UPDATE. THE OTHER POPULAR FORMATS, DIVX/XVID,MP4, FLV, ALL PLAYED WITHOUT ANY ISSUES. 1080P VIDEOS PLAYED SMOOTHLY WITHOUT ANY HICCUPS. THIS PHONE REALLY IS ONE CAPABLE VIDEO PLAYER OOTB.
      
      SAMSUNG HAS INCORPORATED THE TOUCHWIZ MUSIC PLAYER, WITH NEW, POLISHED LOOK. THE PLAYER SUPPORTS ALL POPULAR FORMATS, AND THE PHONE REALLY EXCELS IN THE AUDIO DEPARTMENT, WITH A TOP NOTCH AUDIO OUTPUT. BUY A PAIR OF GOOD HEADPHONES AND YOU ARE GOOD TO GO.
      
      CAMERA HAS THE SAME PIXEL COUNT AS ITS PREDECESSOR, THE S2 (8 MP), BUT SAMSUNG HAVE IMPROVED ON THE SENSORS FOR BETTER PICS, WHICH IS A SMART MOVE. FOR ALL WHO ARE TALKING ABOUT THE ABSENCE OF A 12 MP UNIT, UNLESS YOU ARE PLANNING TO PRINT BILLBOARD SIZE PHOTOS, ITS REALLY NOT NECESSARY. IMAGE QUALITY DEPENDS ON THE SENSORS. THE ZERO SHUTTER LAG FEATURE WORKS AS EXPECTED. THE CAMERA HAS A COUPLE OF USEFUL SHOT MODES (BURST SHOT, PANORAMA, ETC), WHICH ARE HANDY, BUT I FOUND THAT NOT ALL OF THEM USES THE FLASH, LIKE THE BURST SHOT MODE, SO FORGET IT IF YOU ARE PLANNING TO MAKE A BURST SHOT IN LOW LIGHT CONDITIONS. THE FRONT CAMERA IS A 1.9 MP MODULE, AND IS PRETTY DECENT AS WELL.
      
      THE CAMERA IS CAPABLE OF RECORDING 1080P VIDEOS IS MP4 FORMAT, AND YOU CAN ACTUALLY CAPTURE 8 MP STILLS WHILE RECORDING THE VIDEO SIMULTANEOUSLY, WHICH IS A NICE FEATURE. I WON'T COMMENT MUCH ON THIS SINCE I HAVEN'T SHOT VIDEOS YET, BUT THE ONLINE REVIEWS HAVE BEEN POSITIVE ABOUT THE VIDEO RECORDER. THE FRONT MODULE IS CAPABLE OF SHOOTING VIDEOS IN 720P.
      
      A COUPLE OF NEGATIVES THAT I HAVE COME ACROSS:-
      
      1) SOME OF THE FEATURES I FEEL ARE MORE OF MARKETING GIMMICKS, LIKE THE SMART STAY FEATURE ONLY WORKS IN A WELL-LIT ENVIRONMENT, AND THAT TOO, THE OPERATION IS NOT GUARANTEED (I PERSONALLY WAS ANNOYED ABOUT THIS FEATURE, AND SAMSUNG ITSELF WARNS ABOUT THE SAME).
      
      2) SURPRISINGLY, SAMSUNG HAS REMOVED/DISABLED THE ICS FEATURE OF DRAG-N-DROP ONE APP SHORTCUT ON ANOTHER TO CREATE A FOLDER, SO YOU HAVE TO GO THE OLD-FASHIONED GINGERBREAD WAY OF CREATION OF FOLDERS.
      
      3) YOU CANNOT MOVE INSTALLED APPLICATIONS TO MEMORY CARD.
      
      IF YOU CONSIDER THE OVERALL EXPERIENCE, THERE ARE NOT MANY PHONES IN MARKET RIGHT NOW WHICH CAN DARE TO STAND TOE-TO-TOE WITH THIS BEAST. ITS NOT PERFECT,  BUT ITS FAR FROM BEING BAD EITHER. IF YOU HAVE THE POCKET AND DO NOT WANT TO GO FOR ANYTHING ELSE BUT THE BEST, YOU CANNOT GO WRONG WITH THIS PHONE. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!!

      7>AVERAGE BATTERY: BATTERY LIFE IS AVERAGE. AND WITH 3G ITS BELOW AVERAGE.

label: Galaxy S3
Sentences:
1. PRICE
      
      
      SAMSUNG ACHIEVED TOP POSITION IN MOBILE WORLD DUE TO BEST HARDWARE AT AGGRESSIVE PRICING BUT HTC ONE-X IS QUAD CORE TOO CLOCKED AT 1.5 GHZ AND AVAILABLE AT LESSER PRICE.
      
      
      2. RESOLUTION
      
      
      RESOLUTION OF 720 X 1280 PIXELS IS VERY PROMISING AND PRODUCES A REALISTIC DISPLAY QUALITY WITH HIGH CONTRAST AND SHARP LOOKING IMAGES.
      
      
      3. SCREEN
      
      
      ACCORDING TO A CONSUMER SURVEY 4 INCH SCREENS ARE MOST APPROPRIATE FOR SINGLE HAND USE WHEREAS SCREENS LIKE 5.3 OF NOTE AND 4.8 OF S3 HAVE REDUCED THE MOBILITY COMFORT IN MOBILES. PEOPLE END UP USING BOTH HANDS TO OPERATE SUCH LARGE SCREENS. NOT TO MENTION THE INCREASED RISK OF SCREEN CRACKING DUE TO INEVITABLE ROUGH USAGE. OTHERWISE AMOLED SCREEN QUALITY IS PHENOMENAL.
      
      
      4. BATTERY
      
      
      BATTERY (2100 MAH) IS QUITE IMPRESSIVE AND WORKS BEYOND EXPECTATIONS ON HEAVY DUTY OF SUCH LARGE SCREEN AND QUAD CORE PROCESSOR.
      
      
      5. BUILD QUALITY
      
      
      PEOPLE MIGHT LIKE ROUNDED CORNERS AND PLASTIC FINISH BUT PERSONALLY I FEEL THE CHEAP LOOKING PLASTIC DESIGN IS TOY LIKE AND DOESN'T GIVES A PREMIUM LOOK. ITS A MATTER OF INDIVIDUAL TASTE.
      
      
      6. CAMERA
      
      
      CAMERA IS 8MP SAME AS THAT OF GALAXY S2 WITH IMPROVED INTERFACE AND COLOR SHARPNESS. COURTESY- ANDROID V4 ICS. FRONT CAMERA IS ALSO PROVIDED.
      
      
      7. GRAPHICS
      
      
      GRAPHICS HAVE NOT BEEN IMPROVED, SAME OLD MALI-400MP AS THAT OF GALAXY S2. BUT QUAD CORE MAKES ITS OWN CONTRIBUTIONS.
      
      
      8. OTHER FEATURES
      
      
      HOWEVER SAMSUNG HAS ALWAYS AMAZED ITS CUSTOMERS BY SETTING NEW BENCHMARKS IN MOBILE WORLD. ANDROID ICE-CREAM SANDWICH IS ICING ON THE CAKE. S VIEW AND S STAY THOUGH NEW FEATURES BUT ARE LITTLE UNREAL IN THE FAST WORLD WHERE WE CANT WAIT AND PRESS FOR LONG, SPEAK TO MIKE, WAIT FOR SYSTEM RESPONSE AND THEN AFFIRM. PHEW ! A BIT LENGTHY PROCESS, I WOULD RATHER TOUCH THE APP ICON.
      
      
      9. FINAL WORDS AND LOGICAL PREDICTIONS.
      
      
      S3 IS SO FAR BEST IN HARDWARE BUT ALL ITS EXPENSIVE FEATURES ARE NOT MUCH USABLE IN MARKET LIKE INDIA FOR EXAMPLE THEIR IS HARDLY ANY APP THAT CAN USE ALL THE FOUR QUADS OF ITS PROCESSOR. BUT YES THIS IS A FUTURE PROOF HANDSET AT OVERPRICED TAG. PRICES ARE BOUND TO FALL IN COMING MONTHS BECAUSE:
      
      1. FESTIVAL SEASON IS COMING
      
      2. INDIAN RUPEE IS WEAKEST AT THE MOMENT
      
      3. HYPE OF GALAXY S3 HAS INFLATED ITS INITIAL PRICE
      
      
      ITS PASSIONATE TO BUY THIS PHONE BUT NOT WISE.

label: Galaxy S3
Sentences:
A LITTLE BACKGROUND - I BOUGHT THE SG TAB 7.0, 8.9 AND 10.1 (YES ALL 3 FOR ME AND MY FAMILY MEMBERS) SINCE FEB 2011. SO I KNOW THE TECHNOLOGY, THE SPECS, THE H/W THE S/W AND ALL..I HAVE BEEN USING THE 7.0 TAB EVERYDAY FOR LAST 1.5 YRS. AM A TECHIE, A MAJOR GADGET BUFF - AND HARDCORE SAMSUNG LOYAL (I CONVINCED MY FAMILY WHO WANTED IPADS THAT SAMSUNG TABS WERE MILES AHEAD).
      
      
      I HAD BEEN LOOKING FORWARD TO THE S3 VERY EAGERLY (EVEN TUNED INTO THE LIVE BROADCAST OF PRODUCT LAUNCH ON MAY 3RD). I WAS ABSOLUTELY SURE THAT I WOULD BUY THIS PHONE - NO QUESTIONS. BUT I AM HAPPY THAT I DID NOT PREORDER AND WAITED FOR IT TO HIT THE STORES.
      
      
      A LOT OF PEOPLE HAVE COMMENTED ABOUT PAYING 39K FOR PLASTIC - LET ME CLARIFY A BIT - THE ACTUAL FRONT AND REAR COVER IS QUITE SLICK AND DOES NOT LOOK CHEAP. HOWEVER THE SILVER BAND BETWEEN THESE 2 HAS A SCRATCHED-METAL LOOK - AND IT REEKS OF A PLASTICY LOOK - ITS SO BAD THAT YOU CAN SEE JOINTS AT THE LOWER END (NOT VISIBLE IN PHOTOS - POSSIBLY PHOTOSHOPPED OUT).
      
      
      THAT ASIDE I REALLY DONT SEE TRUE "VALUE" OF PAYING 39K FOR THE S3 - S VOICE IS EASILY SUBSTITUTED BY NUMEROUS (AND EVER IMPROVING) VOICE-ASSISTANT APPS ON GOOGLE PLAY. THERE ARE OTHER SENSOR-BASED APPLICATIONS TO SPRUCE UP YOUR CURRENT ANDROID SMARTPHONE TO ALMOST S3 LEVELS. POP-UP PLAY THOUGH GOOD IS IMPRACTICAL.
      
      
      BASICALLY IF WE WERE TO HONESTLY ASSESS THE NEW S3 FEATURES AND THEIR ACTUAL VALUE ADDITION TO IMPROVING YOUR DAILY LIFE - IT IS ALMOST NEGLIGIBLE - IMHO.
      
      
      IF IT IS THE NOVELTY FACTOR OR TOY/AMUSEMENT FACTOR OF HAVING THE LATEST AND POP-UP, SMART STAY, SMART DIAL ETC THEN BY ALL MEANS GO AHEAD - ITS ALL THERE (AND IN MY OPINION BETTER THAN HTC ONE X). BUT IF YOU ARE LOOKING FOR "VALUE" FOR YOUR HARD EARNED 39K THEN I SUGGEST GO WITH SOMETHING ELSE.
      
      
      39K IS AN ATTEMPT TO MILK THE INDIAN CONSUMER AND A LOYAL FAN BASE. 30-32K WOULD HAVE BEEN A GOOD PRICE POINT FOR THIS PHONE - IT WOULD HAVE SMASHED ALL RECORDS! PERSONALLY I AM VERY DISAPPOINTED BY SAMSUNGS PRICING. I CANNOT SAY I AM AS STRONG A SAMSUNG LOYAL AS BEFORE - I SHALL NOW BE OPEN TO EVALUATING OTHER OPTIONS ESP. HTC.

I AM AN XPERIA S USER. I WILL NOT SAY IT IS THE BEST BUT WHEN U COMPARE THE FEATURES WITH S3, IT COMES AS A ALTERNATIVE.

      THE DEVICE HEATS UP BADLY EVEN AFTER USING IT FOR ONLY 15-20 MINS.

      HAVING A TOUGH TIME KEEPING MY PATIENCE HANDLING THE LAG AND OTHER DYSFUNCTIONALITIES, COZ DEVICES LIKE S3 ARE NOT EXPECTED TO GIVE SERVICE LIKE THIS.
      
      
      SOME OF MY COLLEAGUES FACED SAME PROBLEM WITH ANDROID V4.1.1.
      
      HOPEFULLY THE NEXT UPDATE V.4.1.2 RESOLVES THE ISSUES.

label: Galaxy S3
Sentences:
OVER PRICED!
      
      
      YEAH WHEN YOU COMPARE THE FEATURES. ITS OVER PRICED. BETTER TO CHOOSE HTC.
      
      
      1. PRICE
      
      
      SAMSUNG ACHIEVED TOP POSITION IN MOBILE WORLD DUE TO BEST HARDWARE AT AGGRESSIVE PRICING BUT HTC ONE-X IS QUAD CORE TOO CLOCKED AT 1.5 GHZ AND AVAILABLE AT LESSER PRICE.
      
      
      2. RESOLUTION
      
      
      RESOLUTION OF 720 X 1280 PIXELS IS VERY PROMISING AND PRODUCES A REALISTIC DISPLAY QUALITY WITH HIGH CONTRAST AND SHARP LOOKING IMAGES.
      
      
      3. SCREEN
      
      
      ACCORDING TO A CONSUMER SURVEY 4 INCH SCREENS ARE MOST APPROPRIATE FOR SINGLE HAND USE WHEREAS SCREENS LIKE 5.3 OF NOTE AND 4.8 OF S3 HAVE REDUCED THE MOBILITY COMFORT IN MOBILES. PEOPLE END UP USING BOTH HANDS TO OPERATE SUCH LARGE SCREENS. NOT TO MENTION THE INCREASED RISK OF SCREEN CRACKING DUE TO INEVITABLE ROUGH USAGE. OTHERWISE AMOLED SCREEN QUALITY IS PHENOMENAL.
      
      
      4. BATTERY
      
      
      BATTERY (2100 MAH) IS QUITE IMPRESSIVE AND WORKS BEYOND EXPECTATIONS ON HEAVY DUTY OF SUCH LARGE SCREEN AND QUAD CORE PROCESSOR.
      
      
      5. BUILD QUALITY
      
      
      PEOPLE MIGHT LIKE ROUNDED CORNERS AND PLASTIC FINISH BUT PERSONALLY I FEEL THE CHEAP LOOKING PLASTIC DESIGN IS TOY LIKE AND DOESN'T GIVES A PREMIUM LOOK. ITS A MATTER OF INDIVIDUAL TASTE.
      
      
      6. CAMERA
      
      
      CAMERA IS 8MP SAME AS THAT OF GALAXY S2 WITH IMPROVED INTERFACE AND COLOR SHARPNESS. COURTESY- ANDROID V4 ICS. FRONT CAMERA IS ALSO PROVIDED.
      
      
      7. GRAPHICS
      
      
      GRAPHICS HAVE NOT BEEN IMPROVED, SAME OLD MALI-400MP AS THAT OF GALAXY S2. BUT QUAD CORE MAKES ITS OWN CONTRIBUTIONS.
      
      
      8. OTHER FEATURES
      
      
      HOWEVER SAMSUNG HAS ALWAYS AMAZED ITS CUSTOMERS BY SETTING NEW BENCHMARKS IN MOBILE WORLD. ANDROID ICE-CREAM SANDWICH IS ICING ON THE CAKE. S VIEW AND S STAY THOUGH NEW FEATURES BUT ARE LITTLE UNREAL IN THE FAST WORLD WHERE WE CANT WAIT AND PRESS FOR LONG, SPEAK TO MIKE, WAIT FOR SYSTEM RESPONSE AND THEN AFFIRM. PHEW ! A BIT LENGTHY PROCESS, I WOULD RATHER TOUCH THE APP ICON.
      
      
      9. FINAL WORDS AND LOGICAL PREDICTIONS.
      
      
      S3 IS SO FAR BEST IN HARDWARE BUT ALL ITS EXPENSIVE FEATURES ARE NOT MUCH USABLE IN MARKET LIKE INDIA FOR EXAMPLE THEIR IS HARDLY ANY APP THAT CAN USE ALL THE FOUR QUADS OF ITS PROCESSOR. BUT YES THIS IS A FUTURE PROOF HANDSET AT OVERPRICED TAG. PRICES ARE BOUND TO FALL IN COMING MONTHS BECAUSE:
      
      1. FESTIVAL SEASON IS COMING
      
      2. INDIAN RUPEE IS WEAKEST AT THE MOMENT
      
      3. HYPE OF GALAXY S3 HAS INFLATED ITS INITIAL PRICE
      
      
      ITS PASSIONATE TO BUY THIS PHONE BUT NOT WISE.

label: Galaxy S3
Sentences:
SINCE HTC ONE X AND SGIII ARE CURRENTLY THE BEST ANDROID PHONES IN THE MARKET HERE'S A SHORT COMPARISON BETWEEN THE TWO...IT MAY HELP U TO DECIDE FOR OR AGAINST ONE OF THESE PHONES.
      
      
      1. FORM
      
      I PERSONALLY LIKE THE POLYCARBONATE UNI-BODY DESIGN OF THE HTC ONE X..BOTH BROWN GRAY AND WHITE LOOK BRILLIANT AND DON'T FEEL CHEAP IN YOUR HAND....THE SGIII GIVES U A PLASTIC-LIKE FEEL....NOTHING PREMIUM ABOUT THE BODY OF THIS SAMSUNG.
      
      
      2. BATTERY
      
      ONE OF THE MOST IMPORTANT ISSUES FOR ANY USER...THE BATTERY LIFE OF BOTH PHONES IS AROUND 8-9 HOURS, WHICH INCLUDES MODERATE GAMING, MUTIMEDIA USAGE, INTERNET SURFING, CALLS AND SMSES. THE BATTERY OF THE HTC IS A BIT POOR BUT AFTER A FIRMWARE UPDATE IT PERFORMS REALLY WELL...HOWEVER, BATTERY OF THE ONE X DOES DRAIN QUITE FAST WITH HEAVY/ CONTINUOUS GAMING. SGIII HAS A BIGGER BATTERY OF 2100 LI-ION MAH BATTERY COMPARED TO A LI-PO, 1800 MAH ON THE HTC ONE X....BUT REMEMBER A BIGGER BATTERY DOESN?T MEAN A BETTER BATTERY LIFE...BATTERY LIFE DEPENDS ON THE ENERGY UR PHONE CONSUMES ON RUNNING DIFFERENT FEATURES.
      
      
      3. SCREEN
      
      ALMOST THE SAME SIZE...SUPER LCD 2 ON THE ONE X AND HD SUPER AMOLED ON THE SGIII. WELL, IF U AREN'T A GEEK....BOTH SCREENS ARE AWESOME AND VIEWING ANGLES ARE BRILLIANT AND IF YOU ARE A GEEK THEN YOU DO KNOW THAT BOTH SCREENS HAVE SOME ADVANTAGES AND DISADVANTAGES.
      
      4. USER INTERFACE
      
      THE HTC SENSE IS MUCH BETTER THAN TOUCHWIZ....BUT THEN U CAN GET USED TO ANY OF THE TWO WITHIN A COUPLE OF DAYS.
      
      
      5. PROCESSOR
      
      SINCE THE SPECS ARE GIVEN ABOVE....IT'S ENOUGH TO SAY BOTH PHONES WILL RUN MULTIPLE APPS SUPER SMOOOTHLY. HERE I'D LIKE TO ADD THAT QUAD CORE PROCESSORS ARE CERTAINLY VERY FUTURISTIC BUT AS OF NOW...THERE'S ALMOST NO GAME/APP THAT A DUAL CORE WILL NOT RUN...BENCHMARKS APART, FOR THE GENERAL USER BOTH PROCESSOR CAN HANDLE ALMOST ANYTHING THAT U THROW AT THEM.
      
      
      6. CAMERA
      
      I'D LIKE TO BELIEVE THAT THE ONE X HAS A BETTER 8 MP CAMERA...PICS TAKEN FROM THE SAMSUNG APPEAR A BIT WARM..YET BOTH CAMERA'S ARE AWESOME...THE FRONT CAMERA'S ALSO DON?T DIFFER TOO MUCH IN TERMS OF THEIR QUALITY...AND U WILL ANYWAY USE THESE AS A MIRROR OR FOR VIDEO CHAT....
      
      
      7. MEMORY
      
      BOTH PHONES HAVE 1 GB RAM. THE INTERNAL STORAGE ON THE HTC ONE X IS AROUND 26 GB AND IT HAS NO MEMORY CARD SLOT. THE 16 GB GSIII HAS A MEMORY CARD SLOT AND ONE CAN USE AN SD CARD OF UP TO 64 GB.
      
      
      VERDICT: MAKE UR OWN CHOICE?.BUT PERSONALLY I WOULD PREFER THE HTC FOR THE NOVELTY FACTOR AND FOR BEING A VALUE FOR MONEY PHONE. THE ONE X?S NON-REMOVABLE BATTERY MAY BE A CONCERN FOR SOME BUT FRANKLY HOW MANY TIMES DO WE ACTUALLY REMOVE BATTERIES AND REPLACE THEM WITH SPARE ONES? ALSO, 26 GB ON PHONE AND 26 GB ON DROPBOX FOR TWO YEARS IS MORE THAN ENOUGH STORAGE?GSIII AT RS. 43, 180 (MARKET PRICE) IS TOO EXPENSIVE AND HAS A HOST OF NOT-SO-GREAT FEATURES. THE S VOICE IS APPLE?S EQUIVALENT OF SIRI AND IS EVEN WORSE (CALL IT A MARKETING GIMMICK) AND BY THE WAY HOW LONG WILL U TALK TO UR PHONE ANYWAY? THE SMART STAY FEATURE THAT KEEPS THE PHONE AWAKE AS LONG AS U LOOK AT IT MAY BE GOOD ON PAPER BUT MOST OF US WILL USE OUR FINGERS TO SCROLL THE SCREEN (WHICH IN TURN KEEPS THE SCREEN AWAKE)?.ALSO IT EATS UP A LOTTA BATTERY LIFE. IF YOU?RE BUYING A SMARTPHONE FOR THE FIRST TIME OR WANT TO UPGRADE TO A QUAD-CORE SUPERPHONE?GO FOR THE HTC ONE X?.YOU?LL LOVE THIS BEAST.

      THE GALAXY S3 HAS A 4.8 INCH SCREEN , A PLASTIC BODY WHICH THE SAMSUNG CLAIMS THAT MADE WITH NATURE .... HUH AND THE SAME 8MP CAMERA AND SO ON
      
      
      IF COMPARED WITH S2 ITS JUST A QUAD CORE CPU , A 0.5"BIGGER SCREEN , SOME FUNKY AND TRENDY FEATURES LIKE SMART STAY ,  SBEAM ETC... AND SOME CAMERA AJUSTMENTS AND THESE COST A 10K HIGHER THAT THE S2
      
      
      IF COMPARED WITH NOTE ITS ITS 0.5" SMALLER , AND WELL DESIGN WISE I LIKE MY GALAXY NOTE VERY MUCH !
      
      
      IF COMPARED WITH ONE X ITS 0.1 GHZ LESS THAN IT , AND A 0.1 " BIGGER AND ALSO HAS A MEMORY CARD !
      
      
      THE MAIN ADVANTAGES FOR THE SAMSUNG TO SEL THIS PRODUCT IS -
      
      1. THE BRAND NAME SAMSUNG S SERIES
      
      2. CAMERA ADJUSTMENTS
      
      3. A 64GIG MEMORY CARD SLOT
      
      4. FUNKY FEATURES LIKE NFC , SMART STAY , WIRELESS STREAMING
      
      
      BUT THE CONS ARE -
      
      1. NO 64GIG INTERNAL MODEL IN INDIA
      
      2. PLASTIC BODY
      
      3. ONLY 1GB RAM DISAPOINTING PEOPLE WHO THOUGHT FOR 2 GB
      
      4. ONLY 8MP CAMERA LIKE ITS OLDER ANCESTORS
      
      
      SO THOUGHT OF BUYING THIS PRODUCT BUT NOW FEELING HAPPY WITH MY ALAXY NOTE AND MY NEWLY BOUGHT ONE X

label: Galaxy S3
Sentences:
I BOUGHT THIS PHONE AFTER I USED S2 FOR ALMOST 11 MONTHS. I WAS VERY MUCH HAPPY WITH S2. THE HYPE OF S3 MADE ME BUY IT. NOW I AM REGRETTING IT. YOU ALL MUST BE AMAZED TO KNOW ITS THE MOST LAGGED PHONE I HAVE USED. S2 WAS FAR SUPERIOR TO IT. I WILL TELL YOU SOME FACTS WHICH SAMSUNG WILL NEVER. THEY JUST FOOL PEOPLE.
      
      FIRST AFTER YOU UPACK THE PHONE AND INSTALL 3-4 APPS AND START USING IT. YOU WILL SEE THAT IN JELLY BEANS UPDATE YOUR PHONE WILL BE RUNNING AT 700-750 MEMORY USAGE.ITS MAX USAGE IS 833MB. S2 WAS FAR SUPERIOR IN MEMORY MANAGEMENT. INCASE YOU START MULTITASKING AND OPEN 10-11 APPS PHONE WILL RESTART AS MEMORY WILL BE FULL. THEY SAY 1GB RAM BUT ACTAUL AVAILABLE IS 833MB. THIS PHONE IS DEAD IN MULTITASKING. IF YOU ARE PLAYING A GAME OR USING AN APP AND INCOMING CALL COMES BY THE TIME U PICK UP YOU WILL HAVE ATLEAST 7-10 SEC LAG. YOU WILL FEEL LIKE PHONE GETS HANGED.
      
      SECOND IMPORTANT THING IS YOU CAN TEST YOURSELF. THIS PHONE IS SO SLOW IN OPENING BASIC THINGS LIKE PHONE MANAGER,CONTACTS,EMAIL AND SMS.
      
      A TEST YOU CAN DO YOURSELF AND YOU WILL GET A SHOCK OF YOUR LIFE.
      
      IF YOU HAVE HTC ONE X OR S2 THEN PLEASE RESTART S3 AND S2. AFTER RESTARTING OPEN 2-3 APPS FOR MULTITASKING, THEN SIMULTANEOUSLY OPEN PHONE MANAGER AT SAME TIME IN S2 AND S3. BINGO YOU WILL SEE THE DIFFERENCE. S3 WILL TAKE ALMOST 5-7 SEC TO OPEN A SIMPLE PHONE MANAGER WHILE S2 WILL DO IT IN LESS TIME. DO THIS TEST TO OPEN EMAIL,SMS AND CONTACTS.
      
      YOU WILL UNDERSTAND THAT THIS PHONE IS FRUSTRATING SLOW BECAUSE OF POOR MEMORY MANAGEMENT BY SAMSUNG AND ONLY 833MB RAM.
      
      SO MY ADVISE IT THIS PHONE IS ONLY GOOD IN TERMS OF MOVIES,CAMERA,PLAYING GAMES AS IT IS QUADCORE,MUSIC.
      
      BUT SIMPLE FEATURES LIKE CALLING SOMEONE BY SWIPING RIGHT,WRITING SMS,OPENING PHONE MANAGER,CONTACTS ,MULTITASKING THIS PHONE IS DISGUSTINGLY SLOW AND PATHETIC. I HATE THIS PHONE AND I WILL NEVER BUY SAMSUNG NEXT TIME UNLESS THEY PROVIDE FASTER MEMORY MANAGEMENT AND GOOD RAM. QUADCORE IS USELESS. NO USE AS THERE ARE HARDLY ANY APPS. WHILE SAMSUNG KNEW THIS MEMORY PROBLEM. THEY CLEVERLY PUT 2GB RAM IN US,EUROPE AND KOREA. IN ASIA THEY RELEASED SAME MODEL WITH 1GB RAM. GUYS ITS TIME TO SHOW SAMSUNG THAT INDIA IS NOT STUPID AND WE ARE NOT FOOLS.

label: Galaxy S3
Sentences:
I USE MY PHONE FOR WORK AND NEED TO SEND A LOT OF EMAILS EVERYDAY. I SWITCHED FROM IPHONE 3GS TO THE S3 IN JAN. HERE IS MY FEEDBACK AFTER COMPARING WITH IPHONE 3GS, MICROMAX CANVAS HD.
      
      
      IPHONE 3GS: 800 MHZ, SINGLE CORE, 512 MB RAM, 8GB STORAGE.
      
      GALAXY S3: 1.4 GHZ, QUAD CORE, DEDICATED DUAL CORE GRAPHICS AND 1GB RAM.
      
      CANVAS HD: 1.2 GHZ, QUAD CORE, DEDICATED DUAL CORE GRAPHICS AND 1GB RAM
      
      
      MY COMPARISON OF THESE 3 PHONES BASED ON MY PERSONAL EXPEIENCE OVER MONTHS IS AS FOLLOWS. . .
      
      
      1. SCREEN QUALITY:
      
      THE S3 HAS SLIGHTLY BETTER VISIBILITY IN SUNLIGHT. HOWEVER, SAMSUNG'S AMOLED NEEDS A LOT OF IMPROVEMENT. I HAVE CONFIRMED THAT MAGENTA, CYAN ETC COLORS ARE DISPLAYED INCORRECTLY VS COMPARING IT TO MY LAPTOP'S PHOTOSHOP CALIBERATED HD SCREEN. IT LOOKS LIKE A LITTLE GREEN IS MIXED WITH ALL COLORS.
      
      CANVAS HD SCREEN IS VERY POOR IN COMPARISON AND LOOKS TERRIBLE WITH VERY LOW PIXEL DENSITY.
      
      THE 3GS HAS A SCREEN IN BETWEEN BOTH OF THESE. JUST FOR COMPARISON, THE IPHONE 4S IS ALMOST THE SAME PRICE, BUT HAS A MUCH BETTER SCREEN WITH GREATER PIXEL DENSITY THAN THE S3.
      
      
      2. CALL QUALITY: I AM REALLY FED UP OF PEOPLE TELLING ME TO CALL THEM BACK WHEN I HAVE A BETTER SIGNAL. EVERYONE TELLS ME THAT THERE IS AN ECHOING NOISE IN THE BACKGROUND.
      
      CANVAS HD OR IPHONE 3GS DID NOT HAVE THIS PROBLEM.
      
      3. PHONE BECOMES HOT DURING CALLS. THE TOP RIGHT SIDE WHERE SAMSUNG USES A POWERFUL IR LED WITH THE PROXIMITY SENSOR. IT BURNS MY EARS AFTER 5 MINS.
      
      CANVAS HD OR IPHONE 3GS DID NOT HAVE THIS PROBLEM.
      
      4. EXTREME LATENCY / LAG IN ALMOST ALL APPLICATIONS: FOR EG, IF YOU LAUNCH THE PHONE APP, IT TAKES 3 SECONDS TO LAUNCH. EMAIL APP ALSO TAKES 3-4 SECONDS TO LAUNCH. IN CONTRAST, MY 3 YEARS OLD IPHONE 3GS USED TO TAKE 1/4TH OF A SECOND TO LAUNCH BASIC APPS. IN SPITE OF BEING 4 TIMES MORE POWERFUL THAN THE 3GS, IT IS STILL SLOWER.
      
      INTRESTINGLY, THE CANVAS HD DOES NOT HAVE THIS PROBLEM EITHER AND LAUNCHES BASIC APPS WITHIN HALF A SECOND.
      
      BATTERY LIFE IS CONSIDERABLY REDUCED IF YOU KEEP 2-3 APPS OPEN IN THE BACKGROUND TO AVOID THIS LAG.
      
      5. SAMSUNG BLOATWARE: MY PHONE NEEDED 2 RECHARGES DAILY UNTIL I ROOTED IT, AND REMOVED ALL SAMSUNG BLOATWARE USING TITANIUM. I HAVE DISABLED NFC, SAMSUNG KEYBOARD, ALLSHARE, ETC AND NOW MY BATTERY LIFE HAS MORE THAN DOUBLED.
      
      FLIPKART POLICY DOES NOT PEMIT ME TO POST THE LINK TO XDA. PLEASE GOOGLE. :)
      
      CANVAS HD OR IPHONE 3GS DID NOT HAVE THIS PROBLEM.
      
      6. WIFI SIGNAL: THIS PHONE KEEPS DROPPING AND RECONNECTING TO WIFI. LIKE ONCE EVERY 2 MINS WHILE WATCHING A MOVIE ON YOUTUBE. THE ANTENNA IS ON THE TOP LEFT SIDE, SO IF YOU KEEP YOUR HAND THERE, SIGNAL DROPS FROM 5 BARS TO 3 BARS.
      
      THE IPHONE 3GS HAD THIS PROBLEM BUT TO A LESSER EXTENT.
      
      THE CANVAS HD DOES NOT HAVE THIS PROBLEM
      
      7. CAMERA QUALITY IS GOOD, BUT IT IS PROBABLY 5MP TRUE AND NOT 8. COMPARED TO MY FRIEND'S 7 MP SONY CYBER SHOT CAMERA, THE PICS HERE ARE SOMEWHAT GRAINY AND OFF COLORED.
      
      THE 3GS AND CANVAS HD BOTH HAVE VERY POOR QUALITY CAMERAS NOT WORTH TALKING ABOUT.
      
      8. RANDOM RESTARTS WHILE BROWSING, MAKING CALLS, SMS, EMAILS, ETC. NOT SURE WHY, FACTORY RESET DID NOT HELP.
      
      WARRANTY:
      
      SAMSUNG: THE EXPERIENCE IN THE SAMSUNG SERVICE CENTER WAS RATHER POOR. THE ENGINEERS STRAIGHT AWAY TALK ABOUT FACTORY RESET AND MOTHERBOARD CHANGE. THEY HAVE NO OTHER SOLUTIONS AND ARE RATHER RUDE.
      
      MICROMAX: SIMILAR TO SAMSUNG. LONG WAIT TIMES TOO.
      
      IPHONE 3GS: MY 3GS WAS REPLACED TWICE, FREE OF COST DUE TO MY OWN FAULT. APPLE DOES NOT REPAIR, BUT REPLACES THE PRODUCT WITH A REFURBISHED PIECE. ONCE, I DROPPED THE PHONE AND THE VOLUME BUTTON FELL OUT. ANOTHER TIME, THE BACK COVER BROKE DUE TO A FALL. BOTH TIMES, APPLE REPLACED IT WITH A SMILE.
      
      
      CONCLUSION: THE S3 IS A TIMEPASS PHONE, GOOD FOR MOVIES AND GAMES. NOT DEPENDABLE FOR EMAILS, OFFICE WORK.
      
      MICROMAX HD = SAMSUNG S3 WITH POOR SCREEN AND CAMERA MINUS LAG. 1/3RD THE PRICE. VALUE FOR MONEY.
      
      IPHONE 3GS: NO LONGER AVAILABLE.

Sentences:
IF YOU ARE GOING FOR THIS PHONE ONLY FOR OFFICE USE THEN IT IS A WRONG PHONE.
      
      A SIMPLE EXAMPLE IS THAT WHEN U TRY TO OPEN A PDF OF 35MB APPROX SIZE AND TRY TO OPEN FOR READING, THE PHONE WILL BE DAM SLOW AND YOU HAVE TO WAITE FOR ALMOST 1 MIN  TO SCROLL EACH PAGE AND READ.

label: Galaxy S3
Sentences:
S3 IS A GREAT STEP AHEAD IN INNOVATION AND DESIGN AND IT IS GOOD TO ALWAYS INNOVATE. BUT I AM NOT SURE IF IT IS DESIGNED FOR HUMANS, AS EVERY OTHER PHONE IS ALSO DESIGNED FOR HUMANS AND NOT FOR ANIMALS, THE SAME THING APPLIES EVEN FOR OTHER PRODUCTS OF SAMSUNG.
      
      
      THE PRICING IS INSANELY HIGH, ONE CAN GET A VERY GOOD LAPTOP WITH THE SAME PRICE, WITH INTEL CORE I3, 500GB HARD DISK, 4GB RAM AND 14 INCH HIGH RESOLUTION LED DISPLAY AND DO REMEMBER A PROCESSING POWER OF A LAPTOP CAN NEVER BE MATCHED BY A SMARTPHONE.
      
      1. THERE IS NO SECURITY ON A SMARTPHONE, MORE AND MORE HACKING ATTEMPTS ARE MADE ON ANDROID PHONES, SO CAN YOU DO ONLINE BANKING ON YOUR SMART PHONE?
      
      
      2. THE SCREEN SIZE OF 4.8 INCH IS NO MATCH TO 14 INCH DISPLAY ON A LAPTOP AND FRANKLY SPEAKING, HOW MUCH TIME ONE WOULD SPEND READING ON A SMARTPHONE SCREEN, WHATEVER IT IS(SAMOLED ETC)
      
      
      3. CAN YOU RUN SOFTWARE ON A SMARTPHONE, CAN YOU RUN MATLAB, CAN YOU RUN CAD, CAM. OR FOR SIMPLE MATTER, CAN YOU RUN C COMPILER. NO
      
      
      4. WHAT IS THE PRIMARY FUNCTION OF A MOBILE, TO CALL, BUT THERE IS NO MENTION OF HOW THE CALL QUALITY IS OR HOW THE SIGNAL STRENGTH VARIES. ONE SHOULD NOT FORGET ABOUT THE CALL QUALITY.
      
      
      5. IF ONE FEELS A LAPTOP IS BULKY THAN A SMARTPHONE, THEN I WOULD SAY, HOLDING A 4.8 INCH SMARTPHONE IS ODD TO SAY THE LEAST.
      
      
      6. ALSO THE NFC FEATURE FOUND ON THIS IS FOUND ON NOKIA 603, WHICH IS PRICED AT RS 12860 AND IT HAS IPS-LCD SCREEN, WHICH IS MORE EFFICIENT THAN SAMOLED DISPLAYS.
      
      
      7. COMING TO APPS, APPS ARE IMPORTANT, BUT HOW MANY APPS ONE WOULD USE EVERYDAY AND HOW MANY APPS ARE REALLY SO USEFUL?
      
      CONCLUDING, KUDOS FOR SAMSUNG FOR A VERY GOOD SMARTPHONE, BUT THE PRICING IS INSANE. WHEN WORLD AROUND IS SUFFERING FROM A SEVERE FINANCIAL CRISIS AND EURO ZONE CRISIS AND INR AT ALL TIME LOW VIS-A-VIS WITH DOLLAR, IT IS TIME TO INTROSPECT, IF THE PRICING IS PRAGMATIC. IT GOES FOR ALL MOBILE PHONE MANUFACTURERS.

label: Galaxy S3
Sentences:
LET'S START WITH THE POSITIVES FIRST.
      
      1. THE SCREEN IS GOOD TO LOOK AT, NICE RESOLUTION, BUT IT'S A PENTILE DISPLAY I.E. NOT AS SHARP AS THE RESOLUTION SUGGESTS.
      
      2. LIGHT WEIGHT.
      
      4. SLIM.
      
      5. DECENT AUDIO OUTPUT.
      
      6. THAT'S IT.
      
      
      NOW THE CONS.
      
      1. AS I SAID EARLIER, THE SCREEN COULD HAVE BEEN A LOT BETTER, PENTILE SCREENS ARE CHEAP AND POOR TO LOOK AT.THE CONTRAST RATIO IS PATHETIC.
      
      2. VIRTUALLY UNREADABLE IN DIRECT SUNLIGHT.
      
      3. YES IT'S LIGHT WEIGHT, HENCE IT FEELS CHEAP, AND IS FRUSTRATINGLY DELICATE. I COULDN'T KEEP IT IN MY JEAN'S POCKET WITHOUT FEARING THAT IT WOULD BREAK APART. IT ACTUALLY MADE CRACKLING NOISES WHEN HELD IN LANDSCAPE WHILE TYPING A MESSAGE.
      
      4. LOOKS AWFUL. HONESTLY, S2 LOOKED WAY BETTER THAN THIS EYESORE OF A PHONE.
      
      5. LAGS, YES! LAGS!. A QUADCORE MIGHT SUGGEST FLUID PERFORMANCE. BUT IT DOESN'T DELIVER. THOUGH IT FEELS FASTER THAN THE S2, BUT THE PERFORMANCE IS WAY BELOW THE QUADCORE NORMS.
      
      6. I WAS SO EXCITED TO PLAY GTA III AND MAX PAYNE ON THIS, BUT SADLY FOR SOME UNKNOWN REASONS, NEITHER OF THEM WORK FLUIDLY. GTA III LAGS REALLY BADLY. AND MAX PAYNE CRASHES RANDOMLY. (RANDOM = A LOT)
      
      7. THE PHONE HEATS UP!. EVEN WHEN I LISTENED TO MUSIC, IT GOT HOT!.
      
      
      SOLD MY S3 AND BOUGHT AN 808 PUREVIEW. BEST MOVE.
      
      
      I'M OFF THE ANDROID BOAT NOW. WINDOWS PHONE SEEMED LIKE A BETTER OPTION, BUT I DIDN'T LIKE THE LUMIA 800, AND AS THE LUMIA 900 WASN'T AVAILABLE I WENT FOR THE NOKIA 808 PUREVIEW INSTEAD AND I'M HAPPY! THE BEST CAMERA, BEST SUNLIGHT LEGIBILITY. AND BEST AUDIO OUTPUT, DOLBY SURROUND BABY, YEAH!
      
      
      I'LL WAIT AND SEE WHAT THE S4 BRINGS TO THE TABLE. TILL THEN, BYE BYE ANDROID.
      
      
      SHOULD YOU BUY THIS? WELL, IT DEPENDS ON HOW YOU USE IT. IF YOU JUST WANT A BIG SCREEN IN A PHONE, THEN GO BUY IT. BUT FOR EVERYTHING ELSE, SKIP IT!

label: HTC One V T320
Sentences:
IF U DONT KNO ALREADY.. THIS PHONE ORIGINALLY LAUNCHED WITH A LOWER PRICE TAG OF 18,299..N LATER DROPPED TO A MUCH COOLER PRICE OF 17,435.. BUT RECENTLY.. BECAUSE OF ITS POPULARITY N VOLATILITY OF STOCK, HTC INDIA WAS BOUND TO BOUNCE THE PRICE UP..SO I HAD TO BUY IT FRM SOMEWHERE ELSE AT A LOWER PRICE.. IF U WANNA KNO WHY THIS PHONE GAINED THIS MUCH POPULARITY..THEN READ ON..
      
      
      AFTER 7 DAYS WITH THIS PHONE..I CAN SAY FINALLY CONVINCE SOMEONE THAT THE RACE IS NOT ALL DUAL-CORE/QUAD-CORE, BUT ALSO DESIGN.. THE LATTER IS WHERE HTC HAS HIT PERFECTLY..
      
      
      IN TERMS OF DESIGN.. U GET A VERY PREMIUM UNI-BODY PHONE..PART WHICH MEANS THE BATTERY IS NOT USER-REMOVABLE AND PART WHICH GIVES U THE REALLY THIN BODY..
      
      THE DESIGN IS EXCELLENT AND THE ONE V IS ITSELF THINNER THAN THE IPHONE..THE 'CHIN' OF THE PHONE GIVES IT A UNIQUE LOOK..
      
      CONTRARY TO WHAT/HOW IT LOOKS LIKE IN PICTURES, IT LOOKS VERY GOOD IN REAL LIFE.. INFACT PROTECTS THE DISPLAY WHEN LYING ON THE FACE..
      
      
      THE BACK OF THE CHIN IS WHERE THE FULL SIZE SIM CARD IS LOADED AND ALONGSIDE A MICROSD SLOT.. ALTHOUGH HTC DOES NOT ADVERTISE THIS, BUT U DO GET A FREE 8 GB MICROSD CARD..
      
      
      ALSO THERE IS A SMALL STRIPE OF NOTIFICATION LED BESIDE THE 3.5 MM JACK.. IT IS ALONG THE EDGE SO IT CAN BE VIEWD WHEN THE PHONE IS LYING ON EITHER FACE..
      
      
      THE MATERIAL USED FOR THE BODY IS ANODISED ALUMINIUM N THE DISPLAY IS PROTECTED BY GORILLA GLASS..
      
      
      NOW FOR THE INTERNALS AND PERFORMANCE..
      
      
      THIS IS THE BEST U CAN GO WITHOUT BREAKING THE BANK AND GETTING A FULLY LOADED ICS PHONE.. SURELY.. BUT BEFORE U SCREAM 'XPERIA SOLA' LET ME REMIND U THAT SOLA HAS ONLY 1320MAH BATTERY..WHICH WOULDNT LAST EVEN HALF A DAY WITH ALL THE WHITEMAGIC N BRAVIA JUNKIES.. I HAVE USED DUALCORES BUT THE RESPONSIVENESS OF THE OS IS PRETTY MUCH THE SAME.. THE ONLY DIFFERNCE IS WHEN U PLAY GRAPHICS HUNGRY  GAMES (WHICH IS NOT FOR EVERYONE).. GAMES UPTO 'TEMPLE RUN' PLAY WELL..ANGRY BIRDS R CHILDS GAME FOR IT.. BUT  NOVA N THE LIKE DONT PLAY WELL (IT DOES NOT EVEN APPEAR IN THE PLAY STORE)..
      
      
      BENCHMARKS SAY THAT THE PHONE IS A MIDRANGER N LIES SOMEWHER BETWN THE SOLA N THE ORIGINAL GALAXY  S BUT THE PHONE FEELS QUITE FLUID ON ITS OWN.. IT SCORES 29FPS IN NENAMARK2..COMPARE THAT TO SOLA AT 27.7FPS.. SUNSPIDER (LOWR IS BTR) 3299 (ONE V) VS 2837 (SOLA)..
      
      
      BATTERY IS AN IMPORTANT ASPECT TO B CONSIDERD N THIS IS WHER D 1500MAH WINS.. SINGLE CORE ONE V GOT ME THROU 1.5 DAY UNDER NORMAL USAGE (BRIGHTNESS ON AUTO, WCDMA/GSM AUTO, WIFI ABT 1 HR, GAMING 20 MIN, MUSIC 3HRS)
      
      
      IN TERMS OF OS AESTHETICS.. U GET HTC SENSE 4.0..THE SAME ONE IN THE HTC ONE X BUT WITH SOME MISSING FEATURES..LIKE DLNA N THE RECENT APPS (WHICH IS VANILLA ICS, N IS BETTR THAN THE HTC VERSION) N NO. OF HOMESCREENS (LOCKED TO 5, STRANGELY)..
      
      
      OTHER THINGS MISSING R THE MAGNETOMETER (READ DIGITAL COMPASS) N THE FRONT-FACIN CAM.. WHILE THESE MAY APPEAR SERIOUS BLANK SPACES IN THE SPEC-SHEET (TO SOME) BUT I DOUBT HOW MANY TIMES A DAY ONE MIGHT ACTUALLY USE THEM..
      
      
      HTC NOTES INTERNAL MEMORY AS 4GB BUT WHAT U GET IS EXACTLY 962 MB OF APP STORAGE AND 95.23 MB OF PHONE STORAGE.. SOME MIGHT NOT BE HAPPY WITH THIS.. BUT U HAVE TO ADD THAT U STILL GET 100 MB OF STORAGE FOR YOUR RINGTONES N WALLPAPERS AND A FREE 8 GB FOR MUSIC N VIDS N MOVIES.. SHOULD BE ENUF FOR NEWBIES..
      
      
      SOLVING SOME ISSUES THAT OTHER REVIEWERS POSTED..
      
      
      1. OVERHEATING: YES.. THE PHONE OVERHEATS TO ABT 40 C.. BUT OTHERS DID NOT MENTION WHEN..!! THE PHONE OVERHEATS WHEN MISHANDLED.. LIKE PLAYIN WITH D PHONE DURING CHARGING.. TAKING FOR LONG HOURS WITH THE HAND COVERING THE ENTIRE BACK.. EXCESSIVE FIDDLING LIKE WIFI USAGE/HEAVY GAMING FOR LONG HOURS WITH BACK OF THE PHONE LYING ON THE PALM.. THUS NOT COVERING THE ENTIRE BACK CAN SIGNIFICANTLY BRING TEMPERATURES DOWN..
      
      
      2.YELLOW DISPLAY: I LOOKED REALLY CLOSELY BUT DID NOT FIND ANY SUCH PROBLEMS.. ACCORDING TO HTC, PRODUCTS SHIPPED BEFORE APR BATCH HAD PROBLEMS..
      
      
      CONCLUSION.. ALL SAID.. THIS IS CERTAINLY THE DROID U R LOOKING FOR IF U WNT SMOOTH ICS PERFORMANCE N PREMIUM BUILD QUALITY.. IF U R STIL INTO DUALCORES.. GO WASTE SOMEONE ELSES TIME..

IT HAS BEEN A DAY USING THIS PHONE AND I LIKE EVERYTHING ABUT THIS PHONE.ITS A MONSTER PHONE WHICH ITS LOTS OF BATTERY BUT STAND UPTO MY EXPECTATION FROMA 17K PHONE.

Sentences: IT'S A GREAT PHONE. THERE ARE NO HEATING PROBLEMS TOO.. WI-FI WORKS SUPERBLY AND CAMERA IS EXCELLENT. THE ONLY THING I DIDN'T LIKE IS THE OPTIONS BUTTON WHICH WE HAD IN THE OTHER PHONES... IT'S ALSO IMPORTANT TO GET A NICE COVER SO THAT THE GREAT BACK METAL BODY DOESN'T LOOSE IT'S GREATNESS. MOREOVER WE GET AN 8GB MEMORY CARD FREE WITH THIS PHONE!!

label: HTC One V T320
Sentences:
ORDERED AND GOT FROM FLIPKART ON APRIL, THE WEEK IT GOT RELEASED. ASUSUAL FLIPKART DOES PUT EXTRA EFFORT ON PACKAGING. I HAVE USED MANY ANDROID PHONES BUT ITS MY FIRST OF MY OWN. MANY DIDNT PREFER THE HANDREST DESIGN AT FIRST BUT I JUST LOVED IT. THE LOOK AND FEEL WAS JST AMAZED ME. FROM MY VIEW HERE ARE THE +VS AND -VS.
      
      PROS:-
      
      1) DISPLAY JUST ROCKS. PROCESSING SPEED IS AWESOME AND IN THIS CASE, HTC ONE V IS A CHARM.
      
      2) NO FRAMING OR LAGS IN GAME/APPS. HATS OFF (I AM BIG GAME FREAK SO I JUST LOVE IT)
      
      3) BATTERY IS REASONABLE BUT I DONT KNOW WHETHER ITS A PRO OR CON BUT I STAY ON NEUTRAL SIDE WHEN IT COMES TO BATTERY LIFE, ITS REASONABLE.
      
      4) VID QUALITY WAS JST ASTONISHING AND I HOPE ALL HTC ONE USER WILL JST LOVE THE VID+PIC CAPTURING FEATURE. ITS NEW TO THE BOARD.
      
      5) UNSCRATCHABLE DISPLAY -HMM I DUNO WHETHER ITS TRUE IT HAS GORILLA DISPLAY WHICH CANNOT BE SCRATCHED. BUT I HOPE SO COS IT DIDNT GOT SCRATCHD FOR ME EVEN WHEN I PUT MY KEYS AND MY PPHONES IN SAME POCKET, WHICH ELIMINATES THE NEED OF SCRATCH GUARD.
      
      6) SENSITIVTY IS JST AMAZING. I HATE TOUCH PHONES BUT WITH HTC ONE V IT JST TURNED THE TABLE.
      
      
      CONS-
      
      1)I MIGHT HAVE LOST MY EYE POWER BY PLAYING GAMES IN THIS DISPLAY FR JST 2HRS OR SO. ITS NOT VERY FRIENDLY IN THIS CASE.
      
      2) THERE ARE SOME USABILITY ISSUES HERE AND THERE, WHERE AT THIS COST IT MUST BE AVOIDED.
      
      
      OVERALL I AM VERY HAPPY I GOT THIS PHONE EARLY AS POSSIBLE, NOW THE PRIZES HAVE GONE UP. CHEERS TO HTC ONE V :)

label: HTC One V T320
Sentences:
SAW..  DID SOME RESEARCH.. THEN BOUGHT IT...
      
      
      FLIPKART SERVICE... NICE... VERY GOOD...
      
      
      ABOUT THE PHONE:
      
      YOU MAYBE KNOW THE PROS ALREADY... YEAH THIS ONE HAS A HELL OF A CAMERA. THE PICTURES PRODUCED ARE SUPERB. AND IF ONE TWEAKS WITH THE SETTINGS (CAMERA SETTINGS) A BIT, HE/SHE WOULD GET EVEN MUCH BETTER PICTURE.
      
      
      CONS:
      
      1)LOW LIGHT IMAGES HAS NOISE. ONE CAN IDENTIFY THE NOISES IN THE IMAGE. STILL ITS SOMETHING A NORMAL USER CAN IGNORE.
      
      
      2) PLEASE KNOW THIS.. THIS PHONE HAS 1 GHZ SINGLE CORE PROCESSOR ... SO, WHEN ONE HAS THE WI-FI/MOBILE INTERNET SWITCHED ON AND IS TRYING TO PLAY GAMES OR EVEN TRYING TO DIAL SOMEONE .. IT LAGS THEN..  EVEN WHILE YOU BROWSE IT RESPONDS SLOW, AND LAGS A LOT. THIS IS THE BIGGEST ISSUE, I WOULD ASK OTHERS TO GO FOR A DUAL CORE PROCESSOR. (DUAL CORE ARE COMFORTABLE TO HANDLE MULTITASKING )
      
      
      3) THIS PHONE HANGS .. LIKE IN EVERY 5-6 DAYS OF CONTINUOUS RUNNING , YOU NEED TO RESTART THE PHONE TO KEEP IT RUNNING SMOOTHLY.[ THIS IS WHAT I SAW, ACTUALLY ]
      
      
      TO BE PRECISE....  I PLAYED A LOT OF GAMES ON THIS PHONE FOR THE FIRST 2-3 MONTHS.. THEN SLOWLY AND SLOWLY LOST INTEREST IN GAMING. NOW ALL I DO IS CALL AND PHOTO-SHOOT/VIDEO RECORDING... SO SINCE THE CAMERA IS SUPERB, IT WORKS FOR ME... AND WITH ONLY 3-5 GAMES INSTALLED, IT DOESN'T HANG SO MUCH...
      
      DO GET A SCREEN (SCRATCH GUARD) WHILE PURCHASING THIS, TO BE ON THE SAFE SIDE.. :)

label: HTC One V T320
Sentences:
THIS IS A HONEST REVIEW AND I DON'T GO BY THE THE CERTIFIED TAG. I HAVE SEEN THE REVIEWS ON THE INTERNET COMPREHENSIVELY. I HAVE SEEN THE RESULTS ON YOUTUBE AS WELL. I TYPED IN HTC ONE V FOR A WEEK ON YOUTUBE JUST TO WATCH ALL THE REVIEWS AND IN THE END I DECIDED TO BUY NOT FOR THE MONEY PART BUT FOR THE TECH PART OF THIS PHONE. I COULD'VE BOUGHT A NOKIA LUMIA 800 OR EVEN A SAMSUNG OMNIA W IF I WANTED A WINDOWS BASED PHONE BUT ANDROID 4.0 ICS IS AWESOME.
      
      
      HERE GOES THE CLICHED PROS AND CONS.
      
      
      PROS
      
      1. GREAT BUILD, GOOD TO HOLD AND FEEL.
      
      2. GREAT SCREEN, AS TOLD BY MANY WHOM I SHOWED THE PHONE.
      
      3. GOOD BATTERY LIFE FOR A HTC, I'VE SEEN PEOPLE TALK BAD ABOUT BATTERY LIFE IN HTC PHONE BUT SURPRISINGLY IT IS GOOD ENOUGH.
      
      4. GOOD PHONE NAVIGATION FOR ICS WHICH WAS ABSENT IN GINGERBREAD BUT IT IS NOT AS GOOD AS WP7 MANGO
      
      5. GREAT CAMERA WITH GREAT FEATURES IN IT SHOOT AND CAPTURE IS THE WAY IT IS.
      
      
      NOW, FOR THE CONS I WOULDN'T REALLY COMPLAIN BUT IT IS AN AREA OF IMPROVEMENT TO BE DONE BY THE HTC PEOPLE.
      
      
      CONS
      
      1. GETS HEATED WHEN PLAYING GRAPHIC INTENSE GAME, BUT NOT SO MUCH TO BOTHER ABOUT AS IT DOESN'T BURN, IMAGINE THE HEAT IN YOUR COMPUTER'S CPU OR EVEN YOUR LAPTOP'S CPU RUNNING A HIGH GRAPHIC GAME, CONSIDERING THAT SCALE IT IS GOOD ENOUGH.
      
      2. INBUILT BATTERY IS NOT A CON BUT IT IS DEFINITELY BOTHERING, IT STAYS IN YOUR MIND, WHAT IF MY PHONE FAILS TO BOOT UP BECAUSE THE BATTERY JUST WENT DEAD EVEN AFTER CHARGING( WORST CASE SCENARIO ).
      
      3. INTERNAL MEMORY, I WOULDN'T COMPLAIN BUT MANY PEOPLE WOULD BECAUSE IT IS A MAJOR THING. NOT MANY DO BUY AN SD CARD OF HIGH CAPACITY AND THANKS TO FLIPKART THEY ARE GIVING 16 GB OF MICROSD .SO IT IS WORTHY THE PRICE.
      
      4. THE SCREEN IS TOO GLOSSY FOR IT TO SUSTAIN SCRATCHES.
      
      
      OTHER THAN ALL OF THESE MINOR ISSUES I WOULDN'T COMPLAIN MUCH, INFACT THESE ARE NOT EVEN MY COMPLAINS, THESE ARE PRETTY COMMON ONES I SEE IN PLACES.
      
      
      THE PHONE IS GREAT FOR THE PRICE IN FLIPKART AND THE SERVICE. I WOULDN'T MIND PAYING 18K BECAUSE IT IS WORTH IT.
      
      
      WORD OF ADVICE----------->> DON'T GO BY LOW PRICES. GO BY THE QUALITY OF SERVICE DONE, IT ALWAYS HELPS.

THE HTC SENSE UI WORKS WELL AND AGAIN TAKING IPHONE 4 AS THE BENCHMARK, IT COME UP BETTER. HTC INCLUDES A 8 GB SD CARD WITH THE BOX.
      
      
      ONLY LOW POINT IS THE SPEED. I WAS EXPECTING FASTER PERFORMANCE GIVEN THAT THE ONE V HAS A 1GHZ ENGINE UNDER THE HOOD. BUT IT IS A TAD SLOW. SWITCHING BETWEEN APPS, OR CLOSING ONE AND HEADING FOR THE HOME SCREEN BRINGS UP THE 'LOADING' SIGN VERY FREQUENTLY, ALTHOUGH ONLY FOR A SECOND OR TWO. ANOTHER AREA OF IMPROVEMENT IS THE MUSIC SPEAKER VOLUME. THOUGH I UNDERSTAND HTC WENT FOR QUALITY AND NOT QUANTITY HENCE THE BEATS AUDIO. A LITTLE HIGHER SPEAKER VOLUME WOULD HAVE ALLOWED THE MUSIC TO BE PLAYED ON ITS OWN IN A ROOM INSTEAD OF PLUGGING IN THE SPEAKERS.
      
      
      SO IF YOU CAN LIVE WITH A LITTLE LAGGING CPU AND A NOT SO GREAT SPEAKER VOLUME, THIS PHONE IS AN AWESOME BUY.

label: HTC One V T320
Sentences:
I HAVE BEEN USING THE PHONE SINCE PAST TWO WEEKS AND THIS REVIEW IS MY OWN EXPERIENCE WITH THE PHONE.I AM NOT GOING TO EXPLAIN ANY TECHNICAL DETAIL ON THIS BUT WILL ONLY TELL YOU THE ACTUAL USAGE FUNCTIONS OF THE PHONE.
      
      
      DISPLAY: THE 3.7 INCH SCREEN IS HUGE AND IS BRIGHT,CLEAR AND CRISP.IT DOESN'T PIXELATE AND WATCHING VIDEOS AND PLAYING GAMES IS ENJOYABLE.THE TOUCH IS BRILLIANT AND IS ANYTIME BETTER THAN ANY SAMSUNG PHONE OR ANY OTHER COMPETITOR.
      
      
      SOUND: THE BEATS AUDIO ENHANCEMENT IS AN ADDON WHILE PLAYING MUSIC OR WATCHING VIDEOS, BUT THE ORIGINAL HEADSET DOESN'T SEEM TO BE A GOOD OPTION TO ENJOY THE EXPERIENCE.
      
      RATHER PREFER THE MONSTER IBEATS ALONG WITH THE PHONE.THE OVERALL SOUND CLARITY IS GOOD ENOUGH.
      
      
      CAMERA: I GOT DISAPPOINTED HERE...!!!..I WISH HTC WOULD HAVE WORKED A BIT MORE ON THE LENS PART.THE 5 MGPXL CAMERA COMES WITH A LED FLASH,BUT THE IMAGES PIXELATE WHEN ZOOMED IN.IF YOU DONT USE CAMERA A LOT AND WANT TO COMPROMISE ON THIS THEN THE PHONE IS AWESOME IN ITSELF.ALSO THE SECONDARY CAMERA IS NOT PROVIDED,SO FOR ALL THOSE WHO WANT THE VIDEO CALLING OPTION, THIS ONE IS NOT FOR YOU.
      
      
      MEMORY: THE COMPANY SAYS THE PHONE HAS GOT 4GB INTERNAL MEMORY, BUT THE USER ONLY GETS 1GB USAGE.ALSO ANOTHER DISAPPOINTING THING IS THAT WHEN I TRIED SENDING A 200MB VIDEO FROM MY TABLET IT COULDN'T GET SAVED IN THE PHONE.THEN I REALIZED THAT, THE 1GB USER MEMORY IS ONLY FOR THE APPS THAT YOU DOWNLOAD ON THE PHONE.OTHER FILES GET SAVED IN THE PHONE'S INTERNAL MEMORY WHICH IS ONLY 100MB, SO YOU CANNOT RECEIVE BULKY FILES FROM OTHER BLUETOOTH HANDSETS.HOWEVER, YOU CAN STILL SAVE BULKY FILES TO YOUR MEMORY CARD BY CONNECTING YOUR PHONE TO A COMPUTER TO USING A MEMORY CARD READER.
      
      
      BATTERY: THE PHONE HAS AN INBUILT BATTERY WHICH MANY MAY NOT LIKE BUT THAT IS NOT A MAJOR PROBLEM THOUGH UNLESS YOU DONT END UP IN SHORT CIRCUITING YOUR HANDSET (RARE CASES).THE OVERALL BATTERY USAGE IS MEDIOCRE.IT LASTS FOR ABOUT 4-4.5 HOURS ON A FULL CHARGE (IF YOU ARE PLAYING MUSIC/VIDOES,PLAYING GAMES,SURFING THE INTERNET ALL AT ONCE).BETTER KEEP YOUR TRAVEL CHARGER WHILE ON THE GO.
      
      
      CALLS AND TEXTS: MANY SAY THAT HTC PHONES DOESN'T PROVIDE GOOD NETWORK CAPABILITIES.WELL I NEVER THOUGHT SO.TILL NOW I HAVEN'T GOT ANY CALL DROPS.THE CALL CLARITY IS GOOD ENOUGH.THE TEXT THREADS ARE ALSO BRILLIANT AND THE PREDICTIVE DICTIONARY IS AN ADVANTAGE FOR YOU TO NOT MAKE SPELLING MISTAKES WHILE TYPING MESSAGES OR EMAILS.
      
      
      WIFI AND INTERNET: THE REGULAR 2G (WAP/GPRS) CONNECTION ON YOUR PHONE IS NOT A GOOD OPTION IF YOU WANT TO CONTINUOSLY DOWNLOAD STUFF TO YOUR PHONE BECAUSE ITS VERY SLOW.HOWEVER WHEN I USED THE 3G AND THE WIFI,I GOT IMPRESSED.THE BROWSER IS BRILLIANT AND SURFING IS A WORTHWILE FEATURE ON THE PHONE.I DOWNLOADED AROUND 20 APPS (10MB-122MB SIZED) FROM THE APP STORE IN LESS THAN HALF AN HOUR.
      
      
      GAMING: HTC WINS HERE...!!!..INSPITE OF THE PHONE HAVING AN OUTDATED 1GHZ PROCESSOR,IT MAKES WONDERS ON THE GAMING PART.IT HAS THE ADRENO 205 GPU WHICH IS A LITTLE OUTDATED BUT IT WORKS AWESOME ON THIS PHONE.I COULD PLAY GRAPHIC INTENSE GAMES LIKE THE SHADOWGUN AND FRONTLINE COMMANDO WITH ANY HITCH AND LAGS.BASIC ANDROID GAMES LIKE ANGRY BIRDS AND OTHERS ARE JUNIORS FOR THIS PHONE.THE CLARITY IS SUPERB AND THE SOUNDS ARE ALSO BRILLIANT.
      
      
      MISCELLANEOUS: SOME OTHER USERS HAVE SAID THE PHONE GETS HEATED A LOT WHILE RUNNING HEAVY APPS AND GAMES OR ALSO WHILE MAKING CALLS.YES, I DO AGREE TO THIS FACT BUT THEN IT DOESN'T HEATS UP TO SUCH AN EXTENT THAT IT WOULD BLAST IN YOUR HAND.HEATING UP OF THE PHONE IS PROBABLY BECAUSE THE PHONE HAS A METAL BODY AND AN INBUILT BATTERY.ALSO THE AMOUNT OF HEAT DEPENDS ON THE SURROUNDING TEMPERATURE.I USE THE PHONE IN AN AIR-CONDITIONED PLACE,I DID NOT FIND THE PHONE TO GET OVER HEATED.THE HTC SENSE 4.0 USER INTERFACE IS A BRILLIANT FEATURE OF THE PHONE.CHECK YOUTUBE FOR HTC SENSE 4.0 FOR MORE DETAILS.
      
      THE PHONE IS A MID-RANGE PHONE WITH SOME HIGH-RANGE FEATURES.I PERSONALLY FEEL IT IS WORTH BUYING AND I DID NOT MADE A MISTAKE BY CHOOSING THIS PHONE.
      
      SOME TIPS I WOULD LIKE TO GIVE IF ANYONE OF YOU IS INTERESTED IN BUYING THE PHONE :
      
      KEEP YOUR SCREEN BRIGHTNESS TO MEDIUM AS IT IS SUFFICIENT ENOUGH FOR YOU TO SEE WHATS HAPPENING ON THE SCREEN.
      
      DO NOT PLAY MUSIC ON FULL VOLUME, AS THIS PHONE BURTS OUT WHEN YOU LISTEN TO MUSIC WITH BEATS AUDIO.
      
      DO NOT KEEP APPLICATIONS RUNNING IN THE BACKGROUND AS IT WILL DRAIN YOUR BATTERY IMMENSELY.
      
      DO PURCHASE A SCRATCH GUARD (WILL COST YOU AROUND 400 RUPEES) FOR THE SCREEN ALONG WITH THE PHONE ITSELF, SO THAT YOU DO NOT DETEROIRATE THE SCREEN SOON.

label: HTC One V T320
Sentences:
OKAY, SO I DON'T CONSIDER MY PURCHASE OF ONE V THE SMARTEST BUY, BUT I THINK IT WAS THE BEST IN PRICE RANGE BACK WHEN I PURCHASED (7 MONTHS AGO)
      
      
      THE PHONE FUNCTIONED REALLY WELL FOR THE FIRST FIVE MONTHS, BUT THEN IT STARTED HANGING ONLY IN PHONE APP, WHICH MADE ME UNABLE TO EVEN TO EVEN MAKE A PHONE CALL. ALSO THE NETWORK CONNECTION DROPPED AND CAUSED CALLS TO END RANDOMLY.
      
      
      FIRST, I PERFORMED A FACTORY RESET, THE PHONE NO LONGER HANGS. THOUGH, I HOPE IT KEEPS THAT WAY FOR AT LEAST 6 MONTHS. I DONT MIND DOING A FACTORY RESET EVERY 6 MONTHS, IN FACT, ITS MUCH FASTER THAN BEFORE (JUST LIKE NEW).
      
      SECOND, FOR THE NETWORK PROBLEM, I SELECTED 'GSM ONLY' INSTEAD OF 'GSM/WCDMA AUTO' IN MOBILE NETWORK SETTINGS, AND NOW IT GIVES ME 100% SIGNAL AND CALLS DONT DROP. I THINK IT WAS A PROBLEM WITH BSNL 3G BEING POOR.
      
      
      I STILL DONT KNOW IF IT HAS GORILLLA GLASS OR NOT, FKRT HAD MENTIONED WHEN I BOUGHT IT BUT NOW THEY REMOVED IT. SOME REVIEWS SAY IT HAS IT BUT OTHERS SAY IT DOESNT. (ITS NOT IN THE LIST OF OFFICIAL DEVICES HAVING GORILLA GLASS.)
      
      
      NOW FOR THE OTHER PARTS, I REALLY LIKE THE PHONE, THE SCREEN IS AWESOME, THE CAMERA IS SERIOUSLY UNBEATABLE, YOU CAN TAKE MULTIPLE SHOTS OF ANY PLACE VERY QUICKLY, THE VIDEO RECORDING QUALITY IS ALSO GOOD FOR A MOBILE DEVICE. I WATCH TC SHOWS WITH SUBTITLES WITH MX PLAYER, THEY PLAY SMOOTH. IT ALSO PLAYS 720 WELL (THOUGH WATCHING 720P ON A 480P SCREEN IS PLAIN STUPID, UNLESS IT IS AN EMERGENCY) AND ITS METAL UNIBODY LOOKS FANTASTIC (SAMSUNG DEVICES ARE UGLY AS HELL, AND THEY ARENT EVEN VALUE FOR MONEY, THOUGH THEY ARE VERY POPULAR WHICH HAS ITS OWN BENEFITS). (AND FOR THAT GUY WHO SAYS 'NEVER BUY A PHONE WHOSE BATTERY CANNOT BE REMOVED', YOU CAN HOLD THE POWER BUTTON FOR AROUND 10 SECONDS AND THEN THE TOUCH BUTTONS' LIGHTS START BLINKING, AFTER THAT, IT BEHAVES AS IF THE BATTERY WAS REMOVED AND RESTARTS. I HAVE DONE THIS SUCCESSFULLY AND I AM PRETTY CONFIDENT THAT MOBILE MANUFACTURERS ARENT THAT STUPID)
      
      
      OVERALL, ITS A 'GOOD' DEVICE, WOULD HAVE BEEN BETTER IF HTC GAVE IT A DUAL CORE PROCESSOR. IT HAS SOME ISSUES, BUT I AM SURE OTHER MOBILES HAVE THEM TOO. ANDROID IS AN OPEN PLATFORM, YOU MAY RUN INTO SOME OF ITS DISADVANTAGEOUS ISSUES ON ANY DEVICE.

label: HTC One V T320
Sentences:
I PURCHASED THE HTC ONE V A FEW MONTHS AGO FROM FLIPKART AFTER THOROUGHLY RESEARCHING THE PRODUCT. THIS IS NOT MY FIRST HTC, ITS MY THIRD. THE LAST ONE WAS THE EXPLORER AND HAVING USED THAT FOR ABOUT A YEAR I FELT THE NEED TO UPGRADE.
      
      EVERYTHING ABOUT THE ONE V SOUNDED SUPERB TO ME. HAVING USED IT FOR SOME TIME NOW, I CAN SAY:
      
      
      THE SIZE - CAN OPERATE WITH ONE HAND AND VERY POCKET FRIENDLY.
      
      DESIGN - I QUITE LIKED THE CHIN AND THE UNIBODY CONSTRUCTION....ROCK SOLID.
      
      HTC SENSE - IS LEGENDARY, WORKS GREAT AND I LOVE IT.
      
      DISPLAY - FANTASTIC AND SHARP AS IS THE TOUCH INTERFACE, FOR A PHONE AT THIS PRICE POINT.
      
      CAMERA - AGAIN PRETTY GOOD AND I DON'T HAVE ANY CAUSE TO COMPLAIN. THE PICS ARE SHARP, GREAT COLORS AND IF ITS THE ONLY CAMERA YOU HAVE ON A TRIP, YOU'LL BE FINE. THE IN-CAMERA SETTINGS ARE CLASS LEADING.
      
      
      SO IF THIS PHONE DOES EVERYTHING SO WELL, WHY DO I FEEL COMPELLED TO WRITE THIS REVIEW? BECAUSE THE ONLY DRAWBACK OF THIS PHONE IS THAT IT IS SO SO SO SLOW. CHANGING BETWEEN APPLICATIONS IS AN HERCULEAN TASK FOR THIS PROCESSOR.
      
      
      FOR EXAMPLE, TO SWITCH FROM YOUR PHONE BOOK OR CAMERA OR EMAIL OR JUST BACK TO HOME PAGE OR BETWEEN ANY OTHER APPLICATION JUST TAKES FOREVER. IN TERMS OF TIME, SWITCHING BETWEEN APPLICATIONS WHICH SHOULD NORMALLY BE A TAP AWAY, TAKES NOTHING LESS THAN 5 TO 6 SECONDS. MY EXPLORER WAS FASTER BY AT LEAST 10 TIMES WITHOUT EXAGGERATION.
      
      SO BE WARNED, THIS PHONE IS THE TYPE THAT DOES EVERYTHING SO WELL, YOU WANT TO LOVE IT.
      
      BUT IT IS JUST SO PAINFULLY SLOW, IT'LL MAKE YOU GRIND YOUR TEETH IN AGONY.

label: HTC One V T320
Sentences:
SIMULATE A BATTERY PULL
      
      SINCE THE HTC ONE V DOES NOT HAVE A REMOVABLE BATTERY, THERE IS AN ALTERNATE METHOD TO SIMULATE THE PROCESS OF PULLING THE BATTERY TO KILL POWER TO THE DEVICE. TO DO THIS, PRESS AND HOLD THE POWER KEY FOR 10 SECONDS. THE CAPACITIVE BUTTONS ON THE BOTTOM OF THE SCREEN SHOULD BEGIN FLASHING FOR 5 SECONDS BEFORE THE DEVICE WILL POWER OFF COMPLETELY AND THEN RESTART.
      
      
      HTTP://WWW.HTC.COM/CA/SUPPORT/HTCONEV-BELL/HELP/TIPS-AND-TRICKS

      IF YOU WANT THE BRAND NAME YOU CAN BUY THIS FOR THE PRICE, BUT ASK YOURSELF AREN'T THERE MUCH BETTER PHONES IN THE PRICE RANGE(15K-20K), FOR EG SAMSUNG GALAXY S ETC.
      
      
      WITH THE FEATURES AFOREMENTIONED I CAN EASILY RELATE THE HARDWARE TO MOTOROLA DEFY/DEFY+, WHY? JUST HAVE A LOOK AT THE SPECS, THEY ARE BASICALLY THE SAME, EXCEPT OFCOURSE ICS AND SENSE UI 4.0.
      
      
      HTC SHOULD HAVE GIVE A BIT MORE IN THE HARDWARE SECTION, ITS NOT LIKE ITS NOT A GOOD PHONE, BUT MY ADVICE RATHER SAVE UP THE EXTRA 2K-3K FOR ACCESSORIES AND BUY DEFY OR SOME OTHER PHONE WITH SAME(CHEAPER)/EXTRA FEATURES.
      
      
      COMPARISON(DEFY+ VS ONE V) -
      
      
      ONE V (PLUS POINTS AGAINST DEFY+):
      
      ======
      
      - HTC SENSE UI V4.0
      
      - BLUETOOTH V4.0 WITH A2DP
      
      - CAMERA HD RECORDING @ 720P (CAN BE ACHIEVED IN DEFY TOO THROUGH MODS)
      
      - ANDROID OS, V4.0 (ICE CREAM SANDWICH)
      
      
      DEFY PLUS (PLUS POINTS AGAINST ONE V):
      
      ===========
      
      - SCREEN 3.7 INCHES WITH ~265 PPI PIXEL DENSITY(ONE V HAS 252PPI)
      
      - 2 GB INTERNAL AND 1GB ROM
      
      - 1700MAH BATTERY
      
      
      REST IS YOUR DECISION.
      
      
      *NOW FOR REASONS WHY ONE SHOULD BUY HTC ONE V :
      
      
      ONE V IS A STYLISH, PETITE, ENTRY-LEVEL MODEL THAT WILL HOPEFULLY DRAW IN ANYONE LOOKING FOR A NEW PHONE RUNNING ANDROID'S LATEST. A GREAT PHONE FOR FIRST TIME ANDROID BUYERS. PHONE HAS A STURDY BUILT - ALUMINIUM UNIBODY AND GORILLA GLASS, DONT WORRY ABOUT THE SCRACTHES ON THE PHONE, FROM BOTH FRONT AND BACK, YOU WILL ALSO NOTICE SCREEN IS SLIGHTLY RAISED OFCOURSE COATED BY THE GORILLA GLASS. THE REAR HAS PLASTIC COVERING, CASING FOR MICROSD AND SIM SLOTS, ALTHOUGH THERE IS NO BATTERY ACCESS. SCREEN HAS 800 X480 RESOLUTION, A 3.7-INCH SCREEN WITH SUPER LCD 2 PANEL. DENSITY IS A BIT LOW ~252PPI ALTHOUGH THE SCREEN IS NOT TOO GRAINY, GOOD VIEWING ANGLES. 5 MP CAMERA(F/2.0 LENS) WITH AMAZING FEATURES LIKE SLOW-MOTION. BLUETOOTH IS V4.0 SO YOU CAN EXPECT SOME GOOD DATA TRANSFER SPEEDS VIA BLUETOOTH.
      
      
      PROS -
      
      
      - STYLISH LOOKS, GREAT BODY
      
      - BLUETOOTH V4.0
      
      - USER-INTERFACE IS EXCELLENT
      
      - GREAT BOOT UP TIME
      
      - GOOD PERFORMANCE FOR A 1500MAH BATTERY
      
      - TRIBAND AND QUADBAND SPEEDS ARE GOOD
      
      - CLEAR CALLS
      
      - MEDIOCRE CAMERA, BUT PACKED WITH GOOD SOFTWARE
      
      - ANDROID V4 ICE CREAM SANDWICH
      
      - SCRATCH RESISTENT BODY AND SCREEN
      
      
      CONS -
      
      
      - 1GHZ SINGLE CORE PROCESSOR, THE PHONE STUTTERS SOMETIMES WHILE BROWSING MENUS
      
      - LOW INTERNAL MEMORY
      
      - CAMERA QUALITY IS NOT UPTO THE MARK
      
      - STRUGGLES IN HEAVY-GRAPHICS GAMES
      
      - WEB BROWSING
      
      - REMOVABLE MEMORY CARDS ARE A NECESSITY
      
      - NO FRONT CAMERA
      
      - NO DIGITAL COMPASS
      
      - NO HTC MEDIA LINK HD
      
      
      CONCLUSION : IF ITS YOUR FIRST TIME BUYING AN ANDROID PHONE - GO FOR IT.
      
      OTHERS CAN WAIT FOR PRICES TO COME DOWN OR GATHER SOME MONEY TO GO FOR BETTER PHONES, LIKE GALAXY S OR EVEN SII.
      
      REALLY NOT A PHONE TO BE PRICED RS.18299(SUBJECT TO CHANGE)

label: HTC One V T320
Sentences:
I MUST SAY THE MAIN FEATURE THAT MADE ME BUY THIS PHONE WAS ITS PRICE. GETTING SUCH FEATURES COMBINED WITH LOOKS AND DESIGN AT THIS COST WAS A REAL PLUS. BUT NOW AFTER HAVING USED IT FOR 2 MONTHS I DONT FEEL THE PHONE WAS WORTH THE MONEY. HERE ARE THE PROS AND CONS:
      
      
      CONS FIRST:
      
      1. HTC HASNT RELEASED ANY OFFICIAL STATEMENT AS TO WHEN THE JELLYBEAN UPGRADE WILL BE AVAILABLE FOR ONE V(JELLYBEAN HAS BEEN CONFIRMED FOR ONE X AND S THOUGH). SO ONE WOULD PROBABLY HAVE TO ROOT THE PHONE TO UPGRADE TO NEWER ANDROID VERSIONS.
      
      2. THIS PHONE'S BATTERY NEEDS TO BE MAINTAINED REALLY CAREFULLY, IM NO EXPERT WITH ANDROID DEVICES BUT THIS IS WHAT I DISCOVERED. IN THE FIRST MONTH OF USE, I HAD BEEN CHARGING THE PHONE IRREGULARLY (AND EVEN WHEN I WOULD, I WOULDNT DO IT COMPLETELY MOST OF THE TIME) LEADING TO THESE OBSERVATIONS:
      
      A) PHONE WOULD GET HEATED UP RAPIDLY WHILE PLAYING ANY GAME, IN ABOUT 45 MINS.
      
      B) BATTERY WOULDNT LAST MORE THAN 24 HRS.
      
      C) YELLOW DOTS WOULD APPEAR AT TIMES ON THE RIGHT CORNERS OF THE SCREEN.
      
      THEN SINCE THE PAST MONTH IV KEPT A PROPER CHARGING ROUTINE FOR THIS PHONE (DRAIN COMPLETELY, THEN CHARGE COMPLETELY WITHOUT RUNNING ANY APPS IN BETWEEN OR DISCONTINUING CHARGING), AND I HAVNT SEEN ANY OF THE ABOVE. THE BATTERY NORMALLY LASTS 48HRS WHICH IS GOOD ENOUGH.
      
      3. A MAJOR BUG I DISCOVERED WITH THIS PHONE WAS WITH ITS CONTACTS. THIS THING HAS HAPPENED A NO. OF TIMES WHEN I WOULD ADD A CONTACT, SAVE IT TO THE PHONE(OR SIM) AND THEN WHEN I SEARCH FOR IT LATER IT WOULDNT BE THERE(EVEN AFTER SELECTING ALL PHONEBOOK OPTIONS FB,WHATSAPP,PHONE,SIM,ETC)
      
      4. ONLY 1 GB OF THE INTERNAL MEMORY IS AVAILABLE TO THE USER AND NOT 4.
      
      5. NOT ALL LIVE WALLPAPERS ARE SUPPORTED ON THIS PHONE.
      
      6. SEVERAL DEFAULT APPS ARE TOO PRIMITVE LIKE MUSIC PLAYER, OFFICE, ETC(THR R ALWAYS ALTERNATIVES THOUGH)
      
      7. CAMERA DOESNT WORK TOO WELL IN DARK.
      
      
      PROS ARE ANYWAY MENTIONED IN THE FEATURES AND IN PREVIOUS REVEIEWS - SLEEK DESIGN, BEATS AUDIO SPEAKERS, EXPANDABLE MEMORY, ETC).
      
      
      THE PHONE IS BEST SUITED FOR LIGHT USERS, TECH SAVVY GUYS WOULD KNOW NOT TO GO FOR THIS. THUMBS DOWN FROM ME.

      PRESS THE PEOPLE (CONTACTS) BUTTON - MAKE SOME TEA - COME BACK AND CHECK YOUR CONTACTS LIST
      
      PRESS THE EMAIL BUTTON - IRON YOUR SHIRT - THEN START READING YOUR EMAIL.
      
      PRESS THE SMS BUTTON - CHECK OUT ALL THE TV CHANNELS - THEN REPLY TO THE SMS.
      
      
      BOTTOMLINE : THIS PHONE IS SLOW. JUST TOO SLOW. INCREDIBLY SLOW EVEN TO OPERATE. EVEN SLOWER WHEN  THE NUMBER OF APPS START INCREASING (I NEVER USE HEAVY WEIGHT APPS LIKE GAMES, ETC).
      
      
      THE CAMERA IS GOOD. OF COURSE I AM USING THE ANDROID APPS. BUT SPEED IS THE SINGLE MOST IMPORTANT FACTOR - AND THIS PHONE FAILS MISERABLY HERE.
      
      
      CONCLUSION : IF A PHONE CAN'T GET THE BASIC FEATURES RIGHT - THEN IT IS NOT WORTH IT. BUY IT IF YOU WANT TO USE ONLY THE "SMART" PART OF THE PHONE, AND NOT THE BASIC FEATURES.

label: HTC One V T320
Sentences:
I BOUGHT THIS PHONE ABOUT A MONTH BACK - POSSIBLY THE WORST BUY I HAVE EVER MADE. POSSIBLY I WAS UNFORTUNATE ENOUGH TO GET A FAULTY MODEL, BUT FROM THE REVIEWS HERE AND ELSEWHERE, THE PROBLEMS I HAVE FACED SEEM PRETTY COMMON.
      
      THE PHONE SUFFERS FROM TERRIBLE NETWORK ISSUES, I USE A VODAFONE PREPAID SIM THAT HAS WORKED FINE ON EVERY OTHER HANDSET I HAVE USED. WITH THIS ONE, THE SIGNAL KEEPS DISAPPEARING. AT ONE POINT, IT WOULD HAPPEN EVERY TIME I MADE A PHONE CALL, 5 SECONDS INTO THE CONVERSATION. IT RECONNECTS ONLY AFTER THE PHONE IS RESTARTED (THAT TAKES AROUND 2-3 MINS BY THE WAY), AND OFTEN MULTIPLE RESTARTS ARE REQUIRED BEFORE IT CAN RECONNECT TO THE NETWORK.
      
      THE OTHER WAY TO RECOVER SIGNAL IS TO TOGGLE FLIGHT MODE ON AND THEN OFF BUT AGAIN, THIS IS NOT VERY RELIABLE. AND EVEN WORSE, ATTEMPTING TO TOGGLE FLIGHT MODE OFTEN CAUSES THE PHONE TO HANG AND RESTART. THIS BRINGS ME TO THE SECOND PROBLEM - FREQUENT, RANDOM RESTARTS; HAPPENED WHILE SHOOTING VIDEO, TAKING PHOTOS, AFTER SENDING SMS, WHILE MAKING A PHONE CALL.
      
      SO I TOOK IT TO THE HTC SERVICE CENTER IN KOLKATA. THE FIRST TIME, THEY FLASHED THE PHONE BUT THAT DIDN'T SOLVE THE PROBLEM. I WENT BACK THE NEXT DAY AND THIS TIME THEY KEPT IT FOR 4 DAYS AND REPLACED SOME COMPONENTS. AGAIN, THIS DIDN'T HELP. FURTHERMORE, THE REPAIRED PHONE WAS NOTICEABLY SLOWER THAN IT HAD BEEN BEFORE. FOR EXAMPLE, BEFORE REPAIR I COULD PLAY TEMPLE RUN 2 WITH NO LAG OR FREEZES. NOT SO AFTER TEH REPAIR.
      
      AT THE END OF THIS, I HAD HAD ENOUGH. I ASKED FOR A REPLACEMENT AND AFTER FOUR DAYS OF NEEDLESS DALLYING, THEY FINALLY AGREED AND SAID THAT THEY WILL PROVIDE A REPLACEMENT WITHIN 10 DAYS.
      
      THE 10 DAYS ARE ALMOST OVER AND HTC HAS NOT YET GIVEN ME ANY UPDATE ON WHEN AND IF I CAN EXPECT A DELIVERY. A CALL TO THE HTC SERVICE CENTER IN KOLKATA RESULTS IN A RUDE REPLY "WE DO NOT HAVE ANY NEWS. PLEASE CALL HTC CUSTOMER CARE." HTC CUSTOMER CARE IS SLIGHTLY MORE POLITE BUT EQUALLY UNHELPFUL.
      
      
      EVEN IF THE REPLACED PHONE WORKS FINE, WHICH I SERIOUSLY DOUBT, I AM NOT BUYING HTC EVER AGAIN IN MY LIFE.

label: HTC One V T320

I WENT TO THE SERVICE STATION AND THEY KEPT IT FOR AROUND 15 DAYS CHANGED THE DISPLAY AND IT STILL DID NOT WORK . THEY THEN REPLACED IT WITH A NEW PHONE. I GOT THE NEW PHONE FROM HTC AND AGAIN IN A WEEK THE DISPLAY STARTED TO FLICKER AND GRADUALLY THE ENTIRE PHONE WENT DEAD. I WENT TO THE SERVICE CENTRE AND THEY SAID THAT WATER WAS LOCKED INSIDE WHICH WAS NOT TRUE. THEY ARGUED AND SAID THAT I WOULD HAVE TO SPEND A FURTHER 4000 RUPEES FOR THE DISPLAY. THAT WAS NOT ALL. label: HTC One V T320
Sentences:
WITH ALL THE LOADED FEATURES, THIS DOES SEEM LIKE A PERFECT LOW-RANGE ANDROID PHONE. BUT DON'T BE FOOLED BY JUST THAT.
      
      
      1. THE PHONE INTERNAL MEMORY IS REALLY BAD. WITH THE ANDROID 4.0 OS, YOU WOULD EXPECT ALL KINDS OF APPS TO FUNCTION ON IT BRILLIANTLY. BUT THIS IS SHORT LIVED. EVEN WITH A DECENT NUMBER OF APPS INSTALLED, THE PHONE BECOME SLUGGISH TAKING ALMOST A MINUTE FOR A NEW WINDOW TO OPEN.
      
      
      2. DO NOT EVER BUY A PHONE WHOSE BATTERY YOU CAN"T REMOVE! APART FROM THE SIM CARD AND MEMORY CARD SLOT, EVERYTHING ELSE IS BUILT IN. SO WHEN THE PHONE HANGS, YOU LITERALLY HAVE TO WAIT FOR IT TO RECOVER. YOU CAN'T JUST REBOOT IT.
      
      
      3. BATTERY PROBLEM - RECENTLY, I FORGOT TO CHARGE MY PHONE AT NIGHT AND WOKE UP THE NEXT MORNING TO FIND THE PHONE COMPLETELY DISCHARGED AND SWITCHED OFF (QUITE NATURAL). SO I PUT IT FOR CHARGING AND IT WASN'T CHARGING PROPERLY. FOR A WHOLE DAY IT WAS HOOKED TO THE CHARGER BUT THE PHONE WAS STILL OFF. I CONTACTED THE NEAREST SERVICE CENTER AND THEY SAID THE BATTERY WOULD NEED TO BE REPLACED COZ IT WAS COMPLETELY DISCHARGED. HENCE, IT DIED. (?????). MY PHONE WAS ANYWAY IN WARRANTY (7 MONTHS), SO I GAVE IT TO THEM TO FIX IT AND 10 DAYS LATER I GET A MAIL FROM THE COMPANY THAT MY PHONE IS OUT OF WARRANTY BECAUSE OF 'CUSTOMER MISUSE/ABUSE' AND GAVE A QUOTATION FOR RS. 8640 FOR THE REPAIRS. SINCE EVERYTHING IS BUILT-IN, THEY CAN'T JUST REPLACE THE BATTERY, HENCE THEY CHARGE YOU FOR REPLACING ALL THE OTHER COMPONENTS AS WELL (WHICH YOU NEVER REALLY SPOILT IN THE 1ST PLACE!!)
      
      
      4. WARRANTY STATEMENT FAULTY - IF YOU READ THE WARRATY STATEMENT IT CLEARLY SAYS THAT THERE 1 YEAR WARRANTY FOR THE PHONE AND 1 YEAR FOR THE ACCESSORIES. 2 MONTHS AFTER MY PHONE GOT SPOILT, MY EARPHONE CONKED OUT AS WELL. I WENT BACK TO THE CENTER, BUT THEY VERY RUDELY  INFORMED ME THAT SINCE THE PHONE IS OUT OF WARRANTY THE ACCESSORIES ALSO CEASE TO BE COVERED BY IT. THIS STATEMENT IS NOWHERE PRESENT IN THE WARRANTY STATEMENT, WHICH IS MISLEADING (YOU CAN CHECK OUT THE STATEMENT ON THE HTC INDIA SITE)
      
      
      OVERALL, THE HTC SERVICE IS REALLY BAD. THE LOW PRICE OF THE PHONE AND THE FEATURES IS WHAT PROMPTED ME TO BUY THIS. BUT THIS PHONE WILL NOT LAST YOU MORE THAN A YEAR. THIS IS MY PERSONAL EXPERIENCE AND OF SOME OF MY FRIENDS.

label: HTC One V T320
Sentences:
WITH MUCH EXCITEMENT AND ENTHUSIASM I HEADED FOR THE PLANET-M RETALIERS TO GET FOR MYSELF A HTC ONE-V AFTER READING ALL POSSIBLE REVIEWS FROM ALL POSSIBLE SITES ON THE WEB. THE PROCEEDINGS WENT ON WELL AND I OWNED A PIECE FOR MYSELF AT THE END OF THE DAY. I FORGOT TO CHECK FOR THE EAR-PIECE VOLUME(IN-CALL VOLUME) THE SAME DAY OF PURCHASE AS THE PHONE WAS RUNNING OUT OF CHARGE. THE NEXT DAY WHEN I GOT A CALL FROM MY FRIEND I FOUND THAT THE SPEAKERS WERE PROBLEMATIC. I WASNT ABLE TO HEAR WHAT THE OTHER PERSON SPEAKS ON THE OTHER SIDE. IT WAS SO FEEBLE AND WAS SO DISTORTING. INITIALLY, I THOUGHT THIS MIGHT BE DUE TO FLECTUATING NETWORK ISSUE, BUT LATER FOUND TO HAVE PROBLEM WITH THE SPEAKERS.
      
      
      I BOUGHT THIS MODEL AT CHENNAI AND BY THE TIME I SENSED AN ISSUE WITH THE HAND SET I WAS IN BANGALORE. I TOOK THIS TO THE AUTHORIZED HTC SERIVE CENTRE AT CHENNAI TRAVELLING DOWN TO CHENNAI AVAILING A DAY'S LEAVE AND GOT A DAO CERTIFICATE FOR THE SAME WHICH SAYS THAT THE MODEL WOULD BE REPLACED ASAP. I GOT THE CERTIFICATE AS WELL. I WAS THE SIXTH CUSTOMER AND BELIEVE IT OR NOT ALL THE OTHER FIVE CUSTOMERS TURNED UP TO THE SERVICE CENTER WITH THE SAME PROBLEM. I WAS AMAZED.
      
      
      HTC HAS COME UP WITH AN AWKWARD PROCESS OF GETTING IT REPLACED WITH THE SAME STORE WHERE I PURCHASED THE HANDSET. WHAT IF I GOT IT IN DELHI AND SENSE A PROBLEM COMING ALL THE WAY TO BANGALORE? AND THEY DO NOT HAVE A TIME LIMIT (NUMBER OF DAYS) WITHIN WHICH THE DAO NEEDS TO BE SERVICED.
      
      
      SO IT HAS BEEN TEN DAYS NOW AND I HAVENT GOT THE REPLACEMENT PIECE FOR MYSELF. I DUNNO IF THE PROBLEM IS WITH THE RETAILER OR HTC, BUT THIS IS ANNOYING. THIS IS REALLY ANNOYING. HTC COULDNT HELP ME OUT IN THIS AS WELL.
      
      
      THIS IS GONNA BE MA FIRST AND LAST HTC HANDSET.
      
      
      HTC HAS POOR SERVICE AND A LOT OF MANUFACTURING DEFECTS. SO GUYS DO NOT GO BY APPERANCE, BETTER OPT FOR A DIFFERENT MAKE.
      
      
      HTC - POOR SERVICE AND MANUFACTURING BUG

ALSO ALLOWS SELECTING BEST SHOT FROM 3 SHOTS CLICKED CONTINUOUSLY. THERE ARE INSTAGRAM TYPE PHOTO TOOLS WHICH CONVERT PHOTOS INTO SEPIA / B & W AND NUMEROUS OTHER.

HAVE USED THE PHONE FOR OVER A MONTH NOW, HERE ARE THE HIGHLIGHTS.
      
      
      1. THIS IS A PIECE OF ART, NOT JUST A PHONE. AN ANDROID ANSWER TO THE APPLE AESTHETICS.

      4. ALL THOSE WHO MENTION BATTERY IS A CONCERN SHOULD UNDERSTAND THAT THIS IS A 4.7 INCH SCREEN SMART PHONE. IT IS BOUND TO DRAIN BATTERY(1800 MAH).
      
      THE BATTERY CAN HIT 100 TO 0 IF THE SCREEN IS ON FOR 7.5 HRS STRAIGHT.
      
      BUT, THIS IS BOUND TO HAPPEN WITH ALL PHONES, EXCEPT THE MOTO RAZOR MAXX WITH ITS HUGE 3300 MAH BATTERY.
      
      I USE JUICEDEFENDER, AN APP AVAILABLE ON THE PLAY STORE, THIS MANAGES MY BATTERY AND GIVES ME A FEW EXTRA HOURS.
      
      I AM A HEAVY USER OF THE PHONE, AND THE BATTERY LAST 24 HOURS, SERVES MY NEED.

      9. DUE TO THE POLYCARBONATE CASING THE BATTERY CANNOT BE DETACHED. THIS COULD BE A CONCERN AT A LATER POINT OF TIME, BUT I DECIDED TO TAKE THE RISK.
      
      
      THE ONLY COMPETITOR FOR THE ONEX IN THE MARKET IS THE SAMSUNG S3.
      
      1.WOULD CHOSE THE ONEX POLYCARBONATE FINISH OVER THE SAMSUNG PLASTIC.

label: HTC One X E720
Sentences:
HI ALL,
      
      
      I HAVE NOT BOUGHT THE HTC ONE X FROM THE FLIPKART SITE, BUT HAVE BEEN USING THIS PHONE NOW FOR THE PAST 2 MONTHS. IT'S AN AWESOME PHONE AND SPECIFICATION-WISE HAS THE BEST STUFF IN IT'S CATEGORY. WHILE YOU CAN READ UP ALL ABOUT THE SPECIFICATIONS ON THSI SITE, HERE IS SOMETHING I WANT TO ADD FROM MY PERSONAL EXPERIENCE.
      
      
      1. BLAZING FAST UI AND PROCESSOR - FROM THE LOCK SCREEN IT GETS INTO YOUR HOME SCREEN AND ANY APP IN LESS THAN A SECOND. ONE CAN DIRECTLY ENTER AN APP BY DRAGGING IT INTO THE LOCK RING AND I FIND THIS SO CONVENIENT WHEN I WANT TO CHECK MY GMAIL OR TAKE A PHOTO. PLUS YOU CAN CUSTOMIZE WHICH APPS TO SHOW NEXT TO THE LOCK RING. BY CONTRAST THE SAMSUNG S3 TAKES MORE TIME TO GET TO THE HOME SCREEN ON UNLOCKING. I GUESS THAT'S DUE TO ITS QUAD CORE 1.5 GHZ PROCESSOR. SAMSUNG USES A 1.4 GHZ QUAD CORE PROCESSOR OF A DIFFERENT MAKE.
      
      
      2. ABSOLUTELY STUNNER OF A HD CAMERA THAT RECORDS AT FULL 1080 P AS OPPOSED TO THE SAMSUNG S3, WHICH RECORDS AT 720P ONLY. THE 8 MEGAPIXEL CAMERA TAKES REALLY GOOD STILL IMAGES, ALTHOUGH STABILIZATION IS NECESSARY TO REALLY GREAT PICTURES. THE BEST THING I LIKED ABOUT THE CAMERA IS THAT YOU CAN SPECIFY WHICH PART OF THE IMAGE YOU WANT TO FOCUS ON, BY JUST TAPPING THAT PART OF THE IMAGE ON THE SCREEN. TH EFFECT IS THAT YOI CAN ACTUALLY TAKE POTRAITS WITH ALL THE BACKGROUND BLURRED OUT, JUST LIKE IN A DSLR.
      
      
      3. THE HTC SENSE 4.0 UI IS BUTTERY SMOOTH, INTIUTIVE AND MAKES IT A PLEASURE TO MULTITASK. THE ANDROID ICS IS A BIG IMPROVEMENT OF THE PREVIOUS ANDROID VERSIONS AND BRINGS IT VERY CLOSE TO THE IOS EXPERIENCE, ALTHOUGH THE IOS IS DEFINITELY SUPERIOR IN TERMS OF EXPERIENCE VS PROCESSOR BANDWIDTH USE.
      
      
      4. THE ONLY DOWNSIDE I SEE IS THE 1250 MAH BATTERY THAT LASTS FOR JUST 10 HOURS WITH MODERATE TO HEAVY USAGE. THE SAMSUNG GALAXY S3 HAS A BIGGER BATTERY THAT LAST MUCH LONGER. SO IT'S A QUESTION OF WHETHER YOU LIKE TRAVELING WITH THE CHARGER USB CORD ALL THE TIME OR NOT.
      
      
      5. THE LACK OF A MICRO SD SLOT ON THE PHONE IS NOT REALLY A DAMPER IN THE SENSE THAT THERE ARE VERY FEW OCCASIONS FOR USERS TO EXCEED 32 GB IN STORING APPS OR FILES, UNLESS THEY ARE INTO HEAVY GAMING AND MOVIES ON THE MOBILE.
      
      
      GIVEN THE CURRENT PRICING OF THE SAMSUNG S3, I PERSONALLY FELT THAT THE HTC ONE X IS BETTER, GIVING YOU THE SAME FEATURES, BETTER UI AND CAMERA THAN THE S3 FOR A LESSER PRICE.
      
      
      BEST WISHES,
      
      DEV

      3. HAS 32 GB STORAGE,BUT U CAN USE AROUND 25GB FOR DATA..SINCE IT DOESNT HAV AN SD CARD EXPANSION..ITS A BLESSING IN DISGUISE SINCE THINGS LOAD UP MUCH FASTER WITH THE ONBOARD MEMORY.

label: HTC One X E720
Sentences:
I HAVE BEEN USING THIS PHONE FOR A FEW MONTHS NOW, AND MY EXPERIENCE HAS BEEN FANTASTIC. TYPICAL USAGE SCENARIO IS: BLUETOOTH + WIFI ENABLED, 2G DATA CONNECTION. THIS IS PERHAPS HOW MOST PEOPLE WOULD USE THE PHONE, AND IN THIS CASE, THE PHONE NEEDS TO BE CHARGED TWICE A DAY. WITH 100% BATTERY, THE PHONE DRAINS OUT COMPLETELY ABOUT LATE EVENING, AND NEEDS TO BE RECHARGED. IT'S ADVISABLE TO HAVE A CAR CHARGER HANDY, OR KEEP A SEPARATE CHARGER FOR WORK AND HOME.
      
      
      I GUESS ALL THOSE AMAZING FEATURES, POWERFUL PROCESSOR AND INHERENT MULTITASKING ALL TAKE ITS TOLL ON BATTERY LIFE. BUT THE SATISFACTION OF USING THIS PHONE EVERYDAY, HELPS OVERLOOK THE BATTERY ISSUE. I READ SOMEWHERE THAT A 3,000 MAH (INSTEAD OF 1,800 MAH) BATTERY WOULD HAVE REALLY BOOSTED BATTERY LIFE. BUT FITTING IT INSIDE SUCH A SLEEK BODY WOULD BE A SEPARATE ENGINEERING CHALLENGE.
      
      
      OVERALL, A GREAT PHONE. IF YOU DRIVE, KEEP A CAR CHARGER HANDY, AND YOUR PHONE WILL NEVER RUN SHORT OF JUICE.

I COULD NOT SAY THAT IT HAS A MAMMOTH BATTERY LIFE.
      
      IT IS EASIER TO CARRY THE USB CABLE WHICH YOU CAN PLUG IN YOUR DESKTOP OR LAPTOP ANY TIME YOU NEED. IF YOU FIND A POWER SOCKET AROUND YOU, THEN YOU CAN USE THAT AS WELL. NEVERTHELESS, HTC COULD HAVE USED A 2500MAH BATTERY FOR THE BUNDLE IT IS OFFERING.

      THIS ENGINE INSIDE YOUR HTC ONE X MAKES THE PHONE "SUPERSONIC".
      
      YOU NEED TO CONTROL YOUR TOUCH INPUTS INTIALLY TO GET USED TO THE CAPACITIVE INTERFACE. BLAZINGLY FAST AND A SURE WINNER OVER GNOTE AND SII.

      DISPLAY:

label: HTC One X E720
Sentences:
IM USING HTC ONE X SINCE ABOUT 2 MONTHS AND I ALSO HAVE AN IPHONE 4S THAT I HAVE SINCE GIVEN TO MY WIFE. MY REVIEW IS MAINLY TO GIVE YOU A FIRST HAND COMPARATIVE INSIGHT BETWEEN IOS AND ANDROID.
      
      
      AS A TELEPHONING DEVICE....THE ONE X IS SUPERIOR. BECAUSE OF HOME SCREEN CUSTOMIZATION, I HAVE MY WIFI/ DATA/ DATA/ BLUETOOTH WIDGETS ON THE HOME SCREEN. IOS DOESN?T ALLOW THIS. MANY OTHER WIDGETS AND APPS MAKE LIFE MUCH EASIER AND VARIED IN THE ANDROID IOS. THE LEVEL OF CUSTOMIZATION IS LIMITLESS. ITS A GEEKS TOY.
      
      
      IF YOU NEED TO TRANSFER DATA FROM AN OLD PHONE TO AN ANDROID, ITS EASY/ POSSIBLE. YOU CAN SHARE A CONTACT VIA BLUETOOTH WITH...SAY A NOKIA. YOU CAN SEND A FILE TO ANOTHER PHONE. YOU CAN'T DO THESE THINGS WITH AN IPHONE.
      
      
      THE CAMERAS ARE COMPARABLE...BUT I FEEL THE PICTURE QUALITY IN AN IPHONE IS MORE REALISTIC COMPARED TO ONE X.
      
      
      AS FAR AS APPS GO....THE IPHONE WINS HANDS DOWN. GOOGLE PLAY IS STILL NASCENT AND NEEDS A LOT OF WORK IN THIS AREA. LOT OF SHITTY APPS AND PORN AS WELL. IT NEEDS TO GET RID OF THESE. I'LL BE SCARED IF MY 7 YEAR OLD ACCIDENTALLY OPENS GOOGLE PLAY.
      
      
      IOS IS MADE ONLY FOR IPHONE AND VICE-VERSA. ITS A VERY TIGHT FIT. THINGS ALMOST NEVER GO WRONG. IN ANDROID, THEY DO.
      
      
      MOST IMPORTANT: TWO OF THE MOST ICONIC FEATURES OF IOS, SIRI AND ITUNES, ARE OF NO USE IN OUR COUNTRY. ( IM TALKING ITUNES FOR MUSIC). ANDROID HAS SOME GREAT APPS FOR MUSIC LOVERS; INTERNET RADIO/ REGULAR RADIO AND BESIDES SAAVN AND SOUNDHOUND.
      
      
      BATTERY LIFE IS BAD IN BOTH. I HAVE A CHARGER AT HOME, WORK AND CAR FOR BOTH PHONES
      
      
      TIP: IF YOU?RE A HEAVY PHONE/ APP USER, DON'T GO FOR A ENTRY LEVEL ANDROID. THEY'RE CRAP.

label: HTC One X E720
Sentences:
THERE CANNOT BE A GREATER PROOF OF PHOTOS DOING A GADGET INJUSTICE THAN HTC ONE X. AS YOU HOLD THE REAL THING, YOU CAN NOT HELP BUT ADMIRE ITS ALL POLYCARBONATE UNI-BODY WITH PREMIUM MATTE FINISH, SPECIALLY AT THE BACK. TURN THE THING AROUND AND FEAST YOUR EYES ON ARGUABLY THE BEST SCREEN AROUND.THE 4.7 INCH HD SUPER LCD 2 WITH RGB MATRIX MAKES THE SCREEN SUPER SHARP, WITH GREAT COLORS AND VIEWING ANGLES. AND IT IS NOT AS IF THE DUO ARE TRYING TO HIDE INSIDE: THE PHONE ROCKS A TEGRA 3 T30 CHIP WITH 4 CORES CLOCKED AT 1.5GHZ AND A CAPABLE ULP GEFORCE GPU.
      
      
      HERE IS A LIST OF PROS AND CONS:
      
      PROS:
      
      1. ABSOLUTELY GORGEOUS HARDWARE. THERE ARE NO TWO WAYS ABOUT IT.
      
      2. 4.7 INCH SUPER LCD 2 BRINGS IN A PHENOMENAL BALANCE OF OVER-SATURATION AND TRUE COLORS. IT HAS GREAT CONTRAST FOR A LCD SCREEN AND VERY GOOD VIEWING ANGLES. RGB MATRIX MEANS IT HAS THE FULL SET OF 3 SUB-PIXELS TO FLAUNT.
      
      3. TEGRA 3 MIGHT NOT BE THE FASTEST CPU ANY MORE BUT IT STILL SCREAMS HIGH END. ALSO, THERE ARE MANY THD GAMES EXCLUSIVELY FOR TEGRA BASED MOBILES AND GADGETS ON THE PLAY STORE.
      
      4. 1GB RAM AND 32 GB INTERNAL MEMORY(NO MICRO SD CARD SLOT THOUGH).
      
      5. GREAT VIDEO PLAYER, WHICH PLAYS EVERYTHING YOU THROW AT IT(WOULD HAVE BEEN A SHAME OTHERWISE, GIVEN THE PLEASANT SCREEN).
      
      6. BEATS AUDIO
      
      
      CONS:
      
      1. HTC PREFERS SLIMMER WAISTLINE MORE THAN A CAPABLE BATTERY. THE DOWNSIDES OF SUCH A DISPOSITION ARE APPARENT IN ONE X. 1800 MAH MAY NOT SOUND VERY MEASLY, THE REAL LIFE PERFORMANCE MAY SOMETIMES BE FRUSTRATING. LCD SCREENS GENERALLY NEED MORE JUICE, AND THE BATTERY SIMPLY FAILS TO STAND AGAINST THE COMPETITION.EVEN WITH NORMAL USE, IT MAY NOT LAST A DAY. BUT WOULD YOU BUY A ONE X TO PUT IT TO NORMAL USE?
      
      2. IT (STILL)RUNS ANDROID 4.0.4. CONSIDERING THAT QUITE A FEW PHONES RUN 4.1.1, AND NEXUS GADGETS ARE ALREADY RECEIVING 4.1.2, IT IS NOT SOMETHING FOR ONE X OWNERS TO BE PROUD OF.
      
      3. UNIMPRESSIVE CAMERA AND VIDEO RECORDING CAPABILITIES. TRADITIONALLY, THIS HAS BEEN AN AREA WHERE HTC HAVEN'T MADE MUCH EFFORT. OSTENSIBLY, ONE X IS A VICTIM OF THAT.
      
      
      COMPETITION:
      
      1. ANY HTC ONE X REVIEW WOULDN'T BE COMPLETE WITHOUT A REFERENCE TO SAMSUNG GALAXY S3. THE DUO ARE FIGHTING IT OUT AT THE TOP. ALTHOUGH S3 DOESN'T STAND A CHANCE IN TERMS OF BUILD QUALITY, IT OOZES PERFORMANCE IN EVERY SENSE OF THE WORD. EXYNOS QUAD IS A BETTER PERFORMING SOC WITH AN EQUALLY GOOD-IF NOT BETTER CPU AND A VASTLY SUPERIOR MALI 400 GPU. IT HAS GREAT BATTERY BACKUP, BETTER IMAGING CAPABILITIES. ON THE SCREEN FRONT, S3 PRODUCES AMBITIOUS COLORS, BUT SOME PEOPLE MAY PREFER IT. ALSO, SAMSUNG IS DOING A BETTER JOB AT BRINGING OUT UPDATES, NOW THAT S3 IS ALREADY UPDATED TO JELLY BEAN. HOWEVER, FOR PEOPLE LOOKING FOR A BETTER LOOKING PHONE AND WILLING TO LIVE WITH THE UNDER PERFORMING BATTERY, HTC ONE X MAY SUIT BETTER.
      
      2. NOKIA LUMIA 920 IS ON THE VERGE OF HITTING STORES. IT IS NECK AND NECK IN TERMS OF LOOKS AND OVERALL BUILD QUALITY HERE. 920 HAS A MUCH ADVERTISED SCREEN AND CAMERA. THE SNAPDRAGON S3 POWERED BY DUAL KRAIT CORES IS QUITE CAPABLE AS WELL. ALTHOUGH WINDOWS PHONE HASN'T HAD A GREAT START, TO BE FAIR WITH THE LUMIA, WINDOWS 8 PROMISES TO BRING A LOT ON THE TABLE WITH THINGS LIKE NATIVE CODE SUPPORT ETC. NEVERTHELESS, IF YOU ARE LOOKING FOR AN ANDROID DEVICE, YOU MIGHT WANT TO GIVE THIS A MISS.
      
      3. SAMSUNG GALAXY NOTE 2 IS ANOTHER ALTERNATIVE. WITH PROBABLY THE MOST POWERFUL SOC TO DATE(OPTIMUS G IS YET TO BE RELEASED) AN AMPLE SCREEN, IT WILL DEFINITELY BE BETTER AT WATCHING VIDEOS OR SURFING THE NET. ON THE DOWNSIDE, YOU MAY HAVE TO TAILOR ALL YOUR APPARELS TO SUIT THE HUMONGOUS PHONE.
      
      4. LAST BUT NOT LEAST, APPLE'S NEW IPHONE 5 MAY LOOK TINY, BUT IT CERTAINLY PACKS A PUNCH. WITH AN ALL CONQUERING GPU AND MANY MILLION APPS, IT WILL NEVER BE A BAD BUY.

label: HTC One X E720
Sentences:
WHOA!!!!! HTC FINALLY COMES INTO ITS MARKET-RULING PHASE. MY DAD GIFTED IT TO ME A FEW DAYS AGO AND TRUST ME, I FEEL LIKE KILLING ANYONE WHO SAYS HTC SUCKS.
      
      PROS OF THIS CELL:
      
      1. ICS 4.0, CHECK. ANDROID IS RULING THE MARKET AN HTC IS RUNNING ON ITS SUCCESS.
      
      2. QUAD-CORE, BRING ON THE HEAVY LOAD. GAMING ON THIS BABY IS MIND-BLOWING.
      
      3. SCREEN, PERFECT FOR EVERYONE. I HAD A GALAXY NOTE BEFORE THIS AND IT WAS AWKWARD. YES, IT WAS FUN TO BROWSE ON IT BUT IT FELT WEIRD WHEN YOU ARE TALKING TO SOMEONE ON IT. IPHONE'S 3.5" IS WAY TOO SMALL. HTC FITS INTO THE SLOT PERFECTLY. IT'S NOT TOO SMALL NOR TOO LARGE. PLUS THE SCREEN IS EFFING CRISP.
      
      4. BEATS AUDIO. DO I REALLY NEED TO SAY ANYTHING?
      
      5. THE CAMERA. ALL OF YOU MUST HAVE SEEN THE "NICK JOJOLA" AD. AND I COMPLETELY SUPPORT THAT GUY. I THINK ONLY THE NOKIA PUREVIEW 808 BEATS THIS CELL'S CAMERA (CONSIDERING THAT IT IS 1 MP, I AM NOT SHOCKED)
      
      
      CONS:
      
      1. THE BATTERY LIFE. WHEN YOU ARE USED TO A GALAXY NOTE, YOU FEEL DISAPPOINTED WHEN YOU ARE USING THIS BEAST. BUT IT'S NOT THAT BAD.
      
      2. THE MONEY FACTOR. I HAD NO PROBLEMS GETTING THIS (I LOVE YOU DAD!), BUT THE COST IS WAYYYY TOO MUCH.
      
      3. I REALLY THINK IOS IS BETTER THAN ANDROID.
      
      4. MICROSIM. ONCE YOU CUT YOUR SIM, THERE'S NO GOING BACK.
      
      5. STORAGE. I THINK 32 GB IS NOT THAT MUCH. I'VE ALREADY FILLED IN ABOUT 27 GB (BUT THEN AGAIN, I AM ONE AWKWARD GUY. NORMAL PEOPLE WON'T HAVE ANY PROBLEMS)
      
      
      IN ALL, IT IS A CELL THAT WILL RAISE YOUR STATUS, GIVE YOU AWESOME PERFORMANCE, PICTURES AN MUSIC, AND MAKE YOUR FRIENDS JEALOUS WHEN YOU TAKE IT OUT. SO, IF YOU HAVE THE MONEY, THEN GO FOR THIS WITHOUT ANY DOUBT. IF NOT, WELL... START COLLECTING FOR THIS!!!
