label: HTC One X E720
Sentences:
YES, THAT IS MY ONE WORD FOR MY HTC ONE X, "POWER". ANDROID PHONES HAVE LONG BEEN RESTRICTED BY PROCESSING, WHETHER DOING MULTITASKING OR NOT. I OWNED SONY XPERIA NEO V BEFORE THIS AND I OFTEN FELT A HINT OF LAG WHEN SWITCHING BETWEEN APPS OR CLOSING A GAME OR SOMETHING. BUT THE DAY I OWNED HTC ONE X, I FELT THAT UNMATCHED POWER, SMOOTHNESS BEYOND COMPARISON, APPS OPENING, SWITCHING LIKE STACK OF CARDS WITH ABSOLUTE ZERO LAG IN BETWEEN. SO WITHOUT GOING ALL GAGA OVER MY NEW PHONE I WOULD LIKE TO MENTION SOME PROS & CONS(BARELY) THAT I FOUND WITH MY 1 MONTH USAGE OF THIS PHONE:
      
      
      PROS:
      
      1. A BEAUTIFUL SEAMLESS POLY-CARBONATE BODY: YOU CANNOT SIMPLY GET A PRETTIER LOOKING PHONE THAN THIS.
      
      2. POWERFUL: NVIDIA TEGRA, 1.5 GHZ QUAD-CORE PROCESSOR WITH ULP GEFORCE GPU. GAMES LIKE SHADOWGUN, GTA IV, TEMPLE RUN, BECOME OBSESSION ON THIS PHONE SO BEWARE.
      
      3. BRILLIANT DISPLAY: YES IT BEATS SAMOLED TECHNOLOGY EASY WAY. ITS CALLED SUPER IPS LCD2, WITH RGB MATRIX AND A PIXEL DENSITY OF 312 PPI, WHICH PRODUCES MORE NATURAL, MORE VIVID DISPLAY, UNLIKE PENTILE MATRIX OF SAMOLED WHICH HAS DISARRAYED PIXELS.
      
      4. BEATS AUDIO: THE BEATS AUDIO BY DR DRE REALLY PUTS A PUNCH IN THE AUDIO QUALITY. LIKE IT SAYS, THE BASS IS DECENT CREATING A MORE BALANCED OUTPUT, WITH NEITHER TOO BIASED ON LOWS, MIDS OR HIGHS.
      
      
      THESE ARE THE 4 BASIC, MOST PROMINENT STRENGTHS OF THIS PHONE, WHICH CANNOT BE MATCHED BY SAMSUNG GALAXY S3 OR IPHONE. PEOPLE WHO COMPARE SGS3 WITH ONE X ARE FOOLS, MISGUIDED BY THE SAMSUNG GALAXY LEGACY PHONES, WHO DON'T RESEARCH AND LOOK UPON FACTS BEFORE COMPARING THEM.
      
      NOW I WILL HONESTLY STATE THE CONS, WHICH I THINK ARE RESTRICTING THE PHONE A LITTLE, BUT AGAIN ITS MY OPINION.
      
      
      CONS:
      
      1. BATTERY: PLEASE DO NOT EXPECT 4 DAY BATTERY LIFE OF AN ANDROID TOUCH PHONE. THAT SAID, ONE X PROVIDES A FULL 2 DAY BATTERY BACKUP WITH DECENT USAGE WHICH INCLUDES MAKING CALLS, BROWSING, PLAYING TEMPLE RUN, MUSIC, LITTLE BIT OF VIDEO PLAYBACK.
      
      2. AUDIO PLAYER: I FOUND A LITTLE GLITCH IN THE DEFAULT MUSIC PLAYER OF THIS PHONE. WHILE PLAYING SONGS, THE ONLY WAY YOU CAN GO BACK TO THE SONG LIST IS HIT THE TOP LEFTMOST BUTTON TO GO BACK. OR YOU CAN SIMPLY PLAY BACK THROUGH THE PLAYLIST CONTINUOUSLY. WELL THIS CAN BE AVOIDED BY INSTALLING ANY MUSIC PLAYER APP LIKE POWERAMP, PLAYERPRO OR WINAMP.
      
      3. NOTHING!
      
      
      FOR ME, ITS THE BEST ANDROID DEVICE TILL DATE WITH THE BEST VALUE FOR MONEY YOU CAN GET. UNLIKE 4K BUCKS COSTLIER SGS3. AND I DON'T FIND ANY VIABLE REASON FOR PURCHASING SGS3 OVER THIS PHONE. ITS HAVING A LITTLE BIGGER BATTERY THAT'S ALL. DON'T THINK SGS3 WOULD GIVE YOU A 4 DAY BACKUP WITH THAT, IN CASE YOU'RE THINKING.
      
      
      HOPE THIS WAS HELPFUL. THANKS!

label: HTC One X E720
Sentences:
REASONS I LIKE IT:
      
      1.	CAMERA: ONE WORD, HONEST. NO PRETENSIONS, NO FALSE BOOSTING OF COLORS, OVERSHARPENING OR ANYTHING ELSE. THOUGH, THERE IS A BUG IN ZOOM FUNCTION (IN BOTH THE HANDSETS I USED); WHENEVER I ZOOM, IT SHOOTS TO THE MAXIMUM LEVEL OF ZOOM, DOESN?T STOP AT INTERMEDIATE LEVELS
      
      2.	SOUND: THIS PHONE SAVED ME 9K INR THAT I WOULD HAVE SPENT ON BOSE. THE HIGHS, MIDS OR LOWS; I MISS NONE.
      
      3.	BUILT: I AM NOT SURE BUT THIS IS CALLED UNIBODY DESIGN RIGHT? THOUGH I HAD TO SACRIFICE THE PLEASURE OF REPLACEABLE BATTERY, BUT WHEN I SEE AT THIS SEAMLESS WHITE SHELL; IT IS WORTH SPENDING FEW BUCKS ON A PORTABLE POWER BANK. THE POLYCARBONATE IS BETTER THAN METAL OR ANY NONSENSE KEVLAR THING. THOSE AWFULLY BOXY SAMSUNGS CAN SUCK ON THESE CURVES.
      
      4.	PERFORMANCE: THE SECOND ONE X HAS NEVER LET ME WAITING FOR ANYTHING TO OPEN. AGAIN, I DIDN?T TEST ANY BIG GAMES SO FAR, BUT SO FAR IT HAS BEEN AWESOME IN MULTITASKING.
      
      
      REASONS I AM REPLACING THIS:
      
      
      1.	HEATING ISSUE: I HAVE PLAYED NO GAMES SO FAR ON THIS PHONE, BUT THE AREA AROUND THE LENS GETS HOT WHILE I AM BROWSING WEB OVER 2G. AND THE TEMPERATURE IS ENOUGH TO MAKE ME WAIT FOR A MINUTE OR TWO BEFORE BRINGING IT NEAR MY EAR. REASON CERTAINLY IS NOT THE SCREEN, BECAUSE PLAYING THE VIDEO NEVER HEATS IT UP.
      
      2.	THE SCREEN: THIS IS MY SECOND PHONE (REPLACED PREVIOUS ONE DUE TO A LOT OF BUGS). AND SO FAR I HAVE OBSERVED STRANGE WHILE LINES/GREY SHADES ON THE EDGES OF THE DISPLAY. SIMILAR ISSUE WAS PRESENT IN THE PREVIOUS ONE AS WELL. AND THE DEALER WAS RIGHT WHEN HE SAID, ?IT IS SCRATCH RESISTANT, NOT SCRATCH PROOF?.
      
      3.	THE CAMERA: YESTERDAY, I LAUNCHED THE CAMERA AND THE SCREEN FLASHED BRIGHTLY IN WHITE, RED BLACK FOR A MINUTE, AND THEN THE CAMERA STARTED.
      
      4.	DOWNLOAD: GOT MY MICRO SIM REPLACED TWICE, BUT DOWNLOADING FILES OF ANY KIND (ATTACHMENT FROM GMAIL/YAHOO, APPS FROM PLAYSTORE, OR SIMPLE SOFTWARE UPGRADE) IS NOT POSSIBLE. ATTEMPTS IN SAFEMODE ALSO FAILED. THE SAME SIM WORKS FINE IN OTHER PHONES.

label: HTC One X E720
Sentences:
WELL, MUCH HAS BEEN SAID ABOUT THE PHONE AND YOU CAN PROBABLY GET PLENTY DETAILS IN OTHER REVIEWS. SO, I WILL JUST SUM UP MY EXPERIENCE AFTRE 7 MONTHS OF USE.
      
      
      PROS :
      
      ------
      
      - THE UI (HTC SENSE) MAKES IT THE BEST ANDROID EXPERIENCE AMONGST ALL ITS PEERS
      
      - THE "PHONE FUNCTIONS" OF THE PHONE WORK WELL. CONNECTIVITY IS FAR BETTER THAN MOST OTHER SIMILARLY PRICED PHONES, THOUGH A CHEAP NOKIA WILL STILL GET YOU A SIGNAL WHERE THIS WON'T.
      
      - THE CAMERA IS GREAT. THE HDR MODE IS A FANTASTIC FEATURE
      
      - 32GB OF BUILT-IN MEMORY IS MORE THAN SUFFICIENT
      
      - WORKS SMOOTHLY WITH NO LAG. I HAVE LOTS OF APPS, MANY RUNNING CONSTANTLY. PHONE HAS HUNG ONLY ONCE IN 7 MONTHS. RESTART WAS NO ISSUE.
      
      
      CONS :
      
      -------
      
      - BATTERY LIFE IS PATHETIC. YOU WILL BE LUCKY IF IT LASTS YOU ANYTHING CLOSE TO YOUR WORKING DAY. I HAD TO BUY A CAR CHARGER AND A PORTABLE BATTERY PACK TO ADDRESS THIS ISSUE. I CHARGE IT AT EVERY OPPORTUNITY. SO, THE BATTERY LIFE HAS ME CONSTANTLY WORRIED. TAKES ALL THE PLEASURE OUT OF USING THE PHONE. 3G, WIFI & POOR SIGNALS DRAIN THE BATTERY EVEN MORE QUICKLY. FIRMWARE / OTA FIXES FROM HTC HAVE HARDLY HELPED.
      
      - THE MIC IS NOT GOOD. NO COMPLAINTS WHEN TALKING, BUT POOR PERFORMANCE AS A VOICE RECORDER
      
      - I TRAVEL A LOT AND PICK UP SIMS ABROAD WHEN POSSIBLE. ITS BEEN A PAIN CUTTING UP SIMS TO MICRO-SIM SIZE. IF THE GALAXY S3 COULD MANAGE WITH A REGULAR SIM, WHY COULDN'T HTC. SWITCHING SIMS BETWEEN MY PHONES IS A PAIN BECAUSE OF THIS.
      
      
      SUMMARY :
      
      -----------
      
      - BUY IT, BUT THEN BUY A BACKUP BATTERY CHARGER TOO (A PORTABLE ONE, LIKE WHAT BELKIN OFFERS). THE ANDROID EXPERIENCE IS FANTASTIC ON THIS PHONE
      
      - WOULD RECOMMEND THE HTC ONE X+, BUT I HAVE HEARD EVEN THAT PHONE'S BATTERY DOESN'T INSPIRE CONFIDENCE.
      
      
      I WISH HTC WOULD HAVE MADE THE PHONE 2MM THICKER AND 20GMS HEAVIER, BUT USED THAT FOR A BIGGER BATTERY AND A FULL SIZED SIM. AN EXTERNAL SD CARD SLOT WOULD HAVE HELPED TOO. UNFORTUNATELY THE SEALED BODY MEANS I CANNOT CARRY AROUND & EXCHANGE THE INTERNAL BATTERY. I DO HOPE WHEN I GO TO CHANGE THE BATTERY IN A FEW MONTHS TIME, I CAN GET ONE OF A HIGHER CAPACITY.

label: HTC One X E720
Sentences:
DEBATING BETWEEN THE GALAXY S3 AND THE HTC ONE X, I FINALLY SETTLED FOR THIS. I HAVE OWNED THE S2 PRIOR TO THIS, SO I AM NO STRANGER TO POWERHOUSE PHONES. I HAVE TO ADMIT HERE THAT I WAS, AND STILL AM, A HUGE FAN OF THE GALAXY S2 - I DID NOT WANT TO UPGRADE IN FACT, BUT THIS WAS A GIFT :-).
      
      
      PROS:
      
      1. PERFORMANCE - AS GOOD AS ONE CAN EXPECT FROM THIS KIND OF CONFIGURATION, BUT THEN EVEN WITH THE S2 I NEVER FOUND ANY APPLICATION THAT WAS SLOW. PERHAPS THE SOFTWARE NEEDS TO CATVH UP WITH THE HARDWARE HERE.
      
      2. THE DISPLAY - I THOUGHT THE SAMOLED ON THE S2 WAS BRILLIANT, BUT IT'S PEDESTRIAN COMPARED TO THIS. THIS WAS ONE OF THE MAJOR FACTORS THAT TILTED ME IN FAVOUR OF THIS COMPARED TO THE S3.
      
      3. SENSE UI - SAMSUNG'S TOUCHWIZ IS HORRIBLE, TO PUT IT MILDLY. SENSE IS WAY BETTER, ALTHOUGH I'D STILL PREFER THE CLEAN LOOK OF CYANOGEN.
      
      4. BATTERY LIFE - THE BATTERY WILL SUFFER IF YOU'RE PLAYING WITH IT ALL THE TIME (PROBABLY BECAUSE OF THE FANTASTIC DISPLAY), BUT THE STANDBY BATTERY TIME OF THIS PHONE IS ABSOLUTELY AMAZING (WITH CUSTOM ROMS OF COURSE). I HAVE SEEN IT LOSE LESS THAN 1% OVERNIGHT.
      
      
      CONS:
      
      1. NOT AS ROOT-FRIENDLY AS SAMSUNG: IT'S HARDER TO ROOT AND CHANGE ROMS, AND BECAUSE OF THE STUPID CID RESTRICTION, FIRMWARE LEAKS ARE NEXT TO USELESS FOR MOST CUSTOMERS. HOPEFULLY THERE WILL BE S-OFF IN THE NEAR FUTURE.
      
      2. GORILLA GLASS 2??: AFTER 18 MONTHS OF (AB)USE THE SCREEN ON MY S2 IS STILL PRISTINE. THE ONE X HAS 2 HUGE SCRATCHES IN ONLY 2 MONTHS. I HAVE NOT USED A SCREEN COVER WITH EITHER PHONE.
      
      
      SO-SO:
      
      1. THE SOUND - IT'S CLEAR, BUT NOT AT ALL LOUD. I DON'T LISTEN TO MUCH MUSIC ON THE PHONE, BUT BEATS AUDIO IS GOOD FROM WHAT I COULD MAKE OF IT. IN THE SOUND DEPARTMENT SONY'S XLOUD PHONES ARE THE BEST I HAVE HEARD.
      
      2. THE CONSTRUCTION - IT'S SLEEK AND ALL THAT, BUT IT'S ALSO VERY SLIPPERY. THIS IS ESPECIALLY BAD CONSIDERING THE WEAKER(?) SCREEN. I'M NOT A BIG FAN OF THE FIXED STORAGE AS WELL, ALTHOUGH THAT CAN PROBABLY BE FIXED BY USING THE USB HOST FEATURE AVAILABLE ON SOME CUSTOM KERNELS.

label: HTC One X E720
Sentences:
UNFORTUNATE BAD EXPERIENCE WITH HTC ONE X!
      
      -----------------------------
      
      BAD THINGS FIRST...
      
      IS IT WORTH 30K PLUS? DEFINITELY NOT!!!
      
      
      I BOUGHT THIS PHONE LAST WEEK, THE SAME DAY THE PROXIMITY SENSOR STOPPED WORKING- WHICH MEANS WHEN YOU ON A PHONE CALL THE SCREEN GOES TOTAL BLANK- YOU WILL NOT BE ABLE SEE SECOND CALL, SWITCH LOUD SPEAKER, YOU CAN'T USE NUMBER PAD (E.G. CHOOSE AN OPTION DURING AN AIR TEL 121 CALL, ETC.)
      
      
      AFTER PLAYING WITH THE PHONE FOR 15MIN, I GOT CALL AND IT WAS VERY UNCOMFORTABLE TALKING - THE SCREEN WAS WARM (I WOULD SAY BIT HOT) IT WAS VERY ANNOYING, WHEN I KEEP THE VOLUME LITTLE LESS THAN MAX I COULD FEEL A LITTLE VIBRATION IN BACK CASE BEHIND THE SPEAKERS.
      
      
      I LOVED THE TOUCH DURING DEMO. BUT AFTER TWO DAYS OF USAGE I WOULD RATE IT AVERAGE (DEFINITELY BETTER THAN OTHER SMARTPHONES THOUGH)
      
      
      DEFINITELY THERE IS LITTLE MORE THAN AVERAGE HEAT BOTH IN THE BACK CASE AND FRONT SCREEN. IN SMART PHONES YOU SHOULD EXPECT SOME AMOUNT OF WARM/HEAT, BUT ONE X IT WAS WAY ABOVE WHAT IT SHOULD HAVE BEEN ON A 35K PHONE.
      
      
      3RD DAY WITH MY NEW PHONE- I WENT TO A SERVICE CENTER RECOMMENDED BY HTC TOLL FREE HELP-LINE. SURPRISE, THERE IS NO SUCH SERVICE CENTER. HTC WEBSITE IS NOT UPDATED AND HELP-LINE DOESN'T KNOW WHERE THEY SERVICE. THE SERVICE CENTER IS PATHETIC. IT WAS LIKE A HOSPITAL QUEUE! AFTER SPENDING 35K I HAVE TO WAIT IN QUEUE FOR FEW HOURS BEFORE I GET A CHANCE TO EXPLAIN THE PROBLEM.
      
      
      EMAIL LAYOUT IS GOOD BUT WHEN U ACTUALLY OPEN AN EMAIL IT KIND OF SUCKS....E.G. IT WON?T SHOW A TABLE IN THE BODY OF THE MESSAGE, SOMETIMES IT DOESN'T CROP A MESSAGE TO FIT THE SCREEN
      
      
      TURN ON MAPS AND THE BATTERY DRAINS SUPER-FAST... 5MIN ON MAPS AND I LOT APPROX. 8% OF MY BATTERY!
      
      
      ----------------------------
      
      GOOD STUFF ABOUT HTC ONE X......
      
      
      HTC SENSE UI IS JUST BRILLIANT. I LOVED IT.
      
      THE INTEGRATION WITH GOOGLE, FACE BOOK AND OTHER SOCIAL NETWORK IS AMAZING. GO TO CONTACTS AND YOU GET EVERYTHING ABOUT YOUR BUDDIES- THEIR LAST FB UPDATE, BIRTHDATE, PHOTOS, ETC.
      
      
      THE SCREEN IS AMAZING- SHARP AND PERFECT FOR WATCHING MOVIES AND PHOTOS
      
      
      LOOKS BIT STYLISH AND NEAT.
      
      
      CAMERA- NO COMPARISON?  TOO GOOD
      
      
      MUSIC- SHARP AND ENJOYABLE ... VERY GOOD
      
      
      INTERNET SURFING IS SUPER-FAST (ONLY IF YOUR NETWORK/WI-FI IS FAST)
      
      
      -------
      
      SUMMARY:
      
      
      HTC ONE X IS NOT FOR AN EMAIL PERSON, FOR SOMEONE SPENDING 3-4 HRS/DAY ON PHONE, FREQUENT TRAVELER. ASK YOURSELF IF YOU NEED A BRILLIANT CAMERA AND A GOOD MUSIC/VIDEO EXPERIENCE?  OR SMART PHONE?
      
      HTC ONE X - 35K IS JUST FOR A BRILLIANT CAMERA, MUSIC PLAYER AND LARGE SCREEN VIDEO WATCHING. (I WOULD RATHER BUY A TABLET AND A GOOD CAMERA!!! OR A 32 INCH TV!!! )
      
      
      I WAS BIT CONCERNED WHEN I SAW FEW MORE PEOPLE (AT LEAST 4) WITH ONE X IN THE SERVICE CENTER (ALL LESS THAN 5 MONTHS OLD). I PERSONALLY HAD A BAD EXPERIENCE (PHONE AND SERVICE). MAY BE ITS JUST ME!!!
      
      
      I GOT A DOA FROM SERVICE CENTER AND REPLACED MY PHONE. I AM NOT USING HTC ANYMORE.
      
      
      I USE SMART PHONES FOR THE LAST 6 YEARS AND I AM BUSINESS KIND OF USER.
      
      IF YOU ARE A FIRST TIME SMART PHONE BUYER AND NOT A BUSINESS KIND OF USER THEN IGNORE MY REVIEW. YOU ARE JUST GOING TO LOVE THIS PHONE.

      THE IPHONE 5S IS ONE OF THE BEST LAUNCHES OFFERED BY APPLE INC. FOR ITS CUSTOMERS ACROSS THE GLOBE. THE PHONE HAS SOME CUTTING EDGE TECHNOLOGIES YET THE ELEGANCE SEPARATES IT FROM OTHER PRODUCTS.

THE PHONE FEATURES A TOUCH ID TOO WHICH ALLOWS USERS TO UNLOCK THE DEVICE USING THEIR FINGERPRINTS, SOMETHING I ENJOY EVERY TIME I UNLOCK MY DEVICE.
      
      PHONE FEATURES A FIRST X64 BIT ARCHITECTURE IN HARDWARE OFFERING WHICH MAKES IT TRULY CLASSY. IT BOOSTS ITS PERFORMANCE SO MUCH THAT ONCE YOU USE IT, YOU FORGET ABOUT ANY OTHER DEVICE.

label: IPhone 5S
Sentences:
BUILD QUALITY: UNMATCHED (THE CLOSEST COMPETITOR WOULD BE THE HTC ONE)
      
      
      DISPLAY: MANY PEOPLE COMPLAIN THAT THIS 4-INCH RETINA DISPLAY OFFERING IS JOKE WHEN COMPARED TO WHAT OTHER MANUFACTURERS OFFER THESE DAYS. BUT THIS IS NOT A PHABLET; IT'S COMPARATIVELY MUCH EASIER TO USE WITH ONE HAND AND THE COLOR TONE OF THE 5S IS MUCH BETTER THAN THE OVERLY SATURATED DISPLAYS ON THE GALAXY S4 AND GALAXY NOTE 3.
      
      
      PROCESSOR AND RAM: THE 5S HAS ONLY 1GB RAM AND A DUAL CORE PROCESSOR WHICH SEEMINGLY PALES IN COMPARISON TO WHAT OTHER FLAGSHIP PHONES HAVE TO OFFER. BUT IF YOU ARE A SERIOUS BUYER, DON'T BE FOOLED BY THESE SPECS BECAUSE THE IPHONE 5S IS ACTUALLY "THE FASTEST PHONE EVER TESTED" TILL DATE. THE REASON WHY THE IPHONE 5S BLOWS AWAY THE COMPETITION IS BECAUSE IT'S PROCESSOR IS MADE SPECIFICALLY FOR THE PHONE AND IT UTILIZES AND SQUEEZES PROCESSING POWER IN THE MOST EFFICIENT WAY UNLIKE OTHER PHONES WHOSE PROCESSORS ARE GENERIC AND USED ACROSS VARIOUS MANUFACTURERS WITHOUT REALLY UTILIZING AVAILABLE POWER TO IT'S FULL EXTENT.
      
      
      CAMERA: THE 5S HAS A EXCELLENT CAMERA BUT IT IS NOT THE BEST IN THE MARKET.
      
      
      CALL QUALITY: NORMAL CALLS ARE JUST AS GOOD AS ANY OTHER PHONE. BUT NOT MANY PEOPLE ARE AWARE OF THE NEW FACETIME AUDIO HD CALLING FEATURE ACROSS IOS 7 USERS, THE CLARITY IS ALMOST TOO MUCH! YOU CAN EVEN HEAR A PERSON SWALLOW OR SMACK HIS/HER LIPS. LITTLE TOO INTIMATE IF YOU ASK ME :-)
      
      
      SPECIAL FEATURE: FINGERPRINT SCAN AND UNLOCK YOUR PHONE. PEOPLE MAY ARGUE OVER THE PROS AND CONS OF SUCH A FEATURE BUT I WOULD PERSONALLY PREFER SUCH A FEATURE WHICH I WILL CERTAINLY MAKE USE OF; INSTEAD OF AN ALMOST USELESS FANCY FEATURE WHICH I RARELY USE. (EG: TOUCH TO SHARE)
      
      
      
      PRICE: CONSIDERING THAT THE MANUFACTURING COST OF THE IPHONE 5S IS JUST ONE DOLLAR MORE THAN THAT OF THE IPHONE 5 WHOSE MANUFACTURING COST IS AROUND INR 13,000; I WOULD HAVE LIKED THE 5S TO BE PRICED AT 40,000. IT IS WITHOUT DOUBT EXPENSIVE!

label: IPhone 5S
Sentences:
I HAVEN'T BEEN AN IPHONE USER SINCE THE IPHONE 3G. DURING THIS TIME I HAVE USED EVERY SINGLE HIGH-END ANDROID PHONE ON THE MARKET , STARTING WITH THE HTC DESIRE HD AND ENDING WITH THE GOOGLE NEXUS 4.
      
      THE REASON I WAS ON ANDROID WAS BECAUSE OF THE FLEXIBILITY THAT ANDROID OFFERS. I AM STILL AN ANDROID USER & FAN AND STILL CONSIDER KITKAT TO BE SUPERIOR IN FEATURES & USABILITY THAN IOS 7. HAVING SAID THAT I GIVE A LOT OF IMPORTANCE ON HOW A DEVICE LOOKS & FEELS. IF I AM PAYING A PREMIUM FOR A PREMIUM DEVICE, I EXPECT IT TO LOOK NOTHING LESS THAN PREMIUM. THIS IS ONE OF THE REASON I REFRAIN FROM BUYING SAMSUNG PHONES AS THEY FEEL VERY CHEAP COMPARED TO THE COMPETITION.
      
      
      NOW THE ONLY DEVICES ON THE MARKET THAT MAKES ME DROOL ARE THE HTC ONE & THE IPHONE 5S GOLD. THAT IS WHY I WONT FEEL SHAME TO ADMIT THAT THIS IPHONE 5S PURCHASE WAS AN IMPULSIVE ONE. I JUST COULDNT RESIST THE TEMPTATION OF A GORGEOUS DEVICE AT A LURING PRICE. YES FOLKS I BOUGHT THIS GORGEOUS PHONE WHEN IT WAS LISTED FOR SOME STRANGE REASON FOR A PALTRY 45K.
      
      
      FLIPKART SERVICE WAS GREAT AS USUAL. DELIVERED THE PHONE IN TWO DAYS. HAVENT FOUND ANY DEFECTS IN THE PHONE AS OF NOW, BUT IN CASE I DO, I WILL SURELY UTILIZE THE 30 DAYS REPLACEMENT POLICY OF FK. THIS IS THE REASON I PREFER BUYING EXPENSIVE GADGETS FROM FK - PEACE OF MIND.
      
      
      COMING TO THE PHONE, FOLLOWING ARE THE PROS & CONS:
      
      
      PROS
      
      
      1. GORGEOUS
      
      2. NEAR PERFECT BUILT ( THERES A TINY CHIP AT THE BACK EDGE, BUT NOTHING MAJOR)
      
      3. GREAT DISPLAY QUALITY
      
      4. FAST
      
      5. THE GOLD VERSION IS THE MOST SEXY THING I HAVE EVER SEEN INCLUDING KATRINA KAIF ;)
      
      
      CONS
      
      
      1. NEEDS A BIGGER DISPLAY
      
      2. IOS 7 HAS A LOT OF TEETHING BUGS
      
      3. NEEDS A BIGGER BATTERY
      
      4. APPLE QA/QC NEEDS TO BE BETTER. A BRAND NEW DEVICE CANT SHIP WITH SMALL IMPERFECTIONS SUCH AS CHIPS OR DENTS OUT OF THE BOX.
      
      
      I HAVE PUT A SCRATCH GUARD ON BOTH FRONT & BACK & AM USING A SOFT TPU BACK COVER TO PROTECT MY INVESTMENT.

THE PHONE IS PREMIUM TO HOLD AND ITS VERY LIGHT (112G). THE GOLD COLOR IS AWESOME AND IOS7 MAKES THE PHONE EVEN BETTER. BATTERY WILL LAST FOR A DAY IF YOU USE THE PHONE ON WIFI, IF YOU ARE USING 3G THEN IT WOULD BE 10 HRS MAX.
      
      
      THE PHONE CHARGING IS SUPERFAST, AS THE NAME SUGGEST ITS A LIGHTNING CHARGER, OTHER THAN THIS THE PHONE HAS ALL OF APPLE'S PROPITIATORY FEATURES. THE TOUCH ID IS GOOD BUT I DON'T FIND IT AMAZING AND ITS NOT WORTH THE REASON FOR THE PHONE'S COST.
      
      
      THE PHONE IS INSANELY COSTLY, THAT TOO IN INDIA. ACCORDING TO STATS THE PHONE IS 22% COSTLIER THAN THE AVERAGE INCOME OF AN INDIAN.
      
      
      I STARTED USING SMARTPHONES IN 2008 AND MY FIRST SMARTPHONE FOR IPHONE 2G, I GOT TO REPLACE THIS SINCE THE SCREEN GOT CRACKED. THE I SWITCHED TO 4 SMARTPHONES (GALAXY S(I9000), GALAXY NOTE1, BLACKBERRY CURVE, LUMIA 820,) AND NONE OF THEM WERE COMFORTABLE AS IPHONE.

label: IPhone 5S
Sentences:
THERE IS SOMETHING A PROSPECTIVE BUYER SHOULD UNDERSTAND BEFORE EVEN LOOKING TO BUY AN IPHONE 5S.
      
      I'M NO APPLE FANBOY, TRUST ME, BUT IT IS THE BEST PHONE AVAILABLE ON MARKET RIGHT NOW.
      
      NOT THE MOST VALUE FOR MONEY, BUT THE ULTIMATE BEST. THE PRIMERA.
      
      
      LOOKS WISE, I'D SAY ITS NOT A BAD JOB. THE SAME SIGNATURE LOOK THAT IT HAS CARRIED ON SINCE LONG. THE GOLD AND GRAY LOOK FANTASTIC, AND FEELS NICE IN HAND AS WELL. BUT LOOKS AREN'T EVEN THE INTRO TO THE WHOLE STORY.
      
      
      THE A7 CHIP INSIDE IS THE BEST PROCESSOR AVAILABLE ON MARKET FOR MOBILE DEVICES, EVEN BETTER THAN THE TOP OF THE LINE SNAPDRAGON 800 WHICH IS THE BEST ANY ANDROID/WINDOWS PHONE CAN OFFER.
      
      THE PERFORMANCE GAINS ARE NOT SIGNIFICANT ENOUGH TO MATTER TO A CASUAL USER, OR ANY USER UNLESS YOU WERE REALLY LOOKING FOR IT. ITS LIKE SAYING ONES A LOCKHEAD BLACKBIRD AND OTHERS A FALCON HTV2. FYI, THEY'RE BOTH INSANELY FAST AIRCRAFTS. FOR PEOPLE LIKE US, ITS INSIGNIFICANT WHICH IS REALLY FASTER. THE 64BIT ARCHITECTURE WOULDNT MATTER MUCH TO THE NORMAL USER AS LONG AS THE APPLICATIONS DONT MAKE USE OF IT. ITS JUST APPLE BEING PARANOID AS USUAL ABOUT BEING FUTURE PROOF.
      
      IN ADDITION TO THE PROCESSOR CAPABILITIES, A MAJOR PLUS OF APPLE DEVICES IS THAT IOS7 WAS OPTIMIZED FOR A7, WHILE ANDROID(KITKAT OR JBEAN OR WHATEVER) IS NOT. ANDROID RUNS ON A VM WHICH LEECHES OUT A BIT OF THE POTENCY.
      
      THE GPU PERFORMANCE IS COMMENDABLE, AND THE MOTION PROCESSOR M7 IS ALSO A UNIQUE CHARACTERISTIC, THOUGH IF ITS FULL POTENTIAL CAN BE USED IN NORMAL SCENARIO REMAINS TO BE SEEN. YET.
      
      THE FINGERPRINT SCANNER IS A NEW INNOVATION, AND SEEMS TO WORK PRETTY GOOD UNLESS YOUR HANDS ARE TOO SWEATY. CURRENTLY ITS USE IS LIMITED THOUGH IN TIME IN-APP AUTHENTICATION AS WELL AS CREDIT CARD/BANK ACC/WALLET AUTHENTICATION COULD ALSO BE DONE USING IT. LOTS TO LOOK FORWARD TO.
      
      
      DOWNSIDES ARE ALSO THERE, IOS7 NEEDS MORE OPTIMIZATION TO BE BETTER. AND SOME MIGHT PREFER A BIGGER SCREEN TO UTILIZE ALL THAT JUICE INSIDE. THOUGH IMO THE SIZE SEEMS OPTIMUM, NOT TOO BIG FOR A PHONE, AND NOT TOO SMALL TO BE DISAPPOINTED. THE BATTERY COULD BE A BIT IMPROVED TOO, TO LAST MORE THAN A DAY. A7/M7/POWERVR6 DOES DRINK A LOT OF POWER.
      
      
      ALL IN ALL, I5S IS NOT YOUR CASUAL WHIP-IT-OUT-OF-THE-POCKET-AND-THROW-IT-TO-THE-BED SMARTPHONE, ITS A CAREFULLY CONSTRUCTED MARVEL. POWERFUL, FUTURE PROOF UPTO MAYBE 2+YEARS, WHICH IS NOT SOMETHING ANY OTHER PHONE CAN BOAST ABOUT. ONLY TWO THINGS STAND IN THE WAY OF IT BEING THE OPTIMUM PHONE, 1ST BEING ON THE HIGHER SIDE OF THE FOOD CHAIN, AND 2ND THE MORE IMPORTANT ONE, WE DONT NEED THAT MUCH POWER OR PERFORMANCE. YET. THE APP ECOSYSTEM, HOWEVER LARGE AND VARIED IT IS, STILL DOESNT HAVE ANY APPLICATIONS THAT MAKE USE OF THE A7/M7 PROCESSORS INSIDE, OR THE 64BIT ARCHITECTURE FOR THAT MATTER. AND WITHOUT IT, ITS JUST A LAMBORGHINI ON INDIAN ROADS. STILL, IT IS THE MOST EXPENSIVE PHONE ON THE MARKET. AND AGAIN, IT IS BETTER THAN ANY, AND YOU DON'T GET TO BE THE BEST WITHOUT BEATING THE BEST, AND IT COSTS TO DO THAT, LIKE, A LOT.

      OVERALL

PHONES LIKE LUMIA 1020,HTC ONE,LG G2 EACH OF WHICH HAS INNOVATING FEATURES AND DOUBLE THE MEMORY.ONLY TRULY IGNORANT PEOPLE BUYS IPHONES BY THEIR CHOICE.THIS FACT IS HIGH LIGHTED BY THE HIGH MARKET SHARE IPHONE  ENJOYS IN US AND WE KNOW THE LEVEL OF IGNORANCE  AMERICANS HAVE (NOT ALL AMERICANS I MEAN).

ABOUT THE GUI,WELL I MISS XPERIA KEYBOARD AS THE DEFAULT ANDROID KEYBOARD DOESN'T LEARN WORDS. OTHER STUFF IS MORE OR LESS THE SAME.

label: Micromax Canvas 4 A210
Sentences:
IT IS A GOOD MEDIUM RANGE PHONE FROM MICROMAX AND I WOULD  CALL IT A VALUE FOR MONEY ( IF PRICE WAS ARND 15K), HOWEVER THERE ARE COUPLE OF THINGS TO POINT TO WHAT CORNERS ARE CUT TO MAKE IT AFFORDABLE
      
      
      1. THOUGH IT IS TOUTED A QUAD CORE AND HAVING PRETTY MUCH SAME PROCESSOR AS SAMSUNGS GALAXY HIGH ENDS AND ITS SIBLINGS ( LG, HTC ETC), IT IS NOT TRUE. PROCESSOR OF ALL MICROMAX PHONES ARE BASED ON OLD CORTEX A7 ARCHITECTURE. THIS TECHNOLOGY IS FAR BEHIND THE PROCESSOR ARCHITECTURE TECHNOLOGY USED BY LATEST SAMSUNG,HTC AND OTHER SIMLAR RANGE PHONES. JUST TO LET YOU KNOW EVEN A LOW GZ DUAL PROCESSOR BASED ON A9-ARCH IS MUCH BETTER QUAD CORE PROCESSOR BASED ON A7 ARCHITECTURE
      
      
      2.  SCREEN RESOLUTION - 1280 * 720 WAS DEFACTO STANDARD FOR ALL THE OLD SAMSUNGS FLAGSHIP GALAXY PHONES, AND NOW IT IS A MUCH MUCH BETTER ON LATEST SAMSUNG AND OTHER HIGH END PHONES. HOWEVER CANVAS 4 HAS REACHED THIS DEFACTO STANDARD BUT STILL IT IS NOT TOO GREAT IN TERMS OF SCREEN QUALITY.
      
      
      3. MEMORY - 16GB ON BOARD IS MUCH BETTER OPTION THAN PREVIOUS GENERATION CANVAS
      
      
      4. RAM - COULD HAVE BEEN UPGRADED UPTO 2GB ( WAS HOPING 2GB IN NEW MODEL), 1GB IS QUITE OK
      
      
      5. BATTERY - NOT TOO POWERFUL
      
      
      6. LOOKS - BEAUTY AND DOESNT FEELS CHEAP AT ALL
      
      
      FINAL RECOMMENDATION - IT IS MUCH BETTER DEAL THAN SAMSUNG GRAND( AND LOOK ALIKES) AND OTHER LOW END GALAXY, HTC , LG TOCUH SCREEN SMART PHONES, HOWEVER PLEASE DONT COMPARE IT WITH HIGH END PHONES LIKE S4/S3
      
      PRICE - I THINK 15K WOULD HAVE BEEN A RIGHT PRICE FOR IT

label: Micromax Canvas 4 A210
Sentences:
NOTE: THIS REVIEW IS FOR MICROMAX CANVAS A76. BUT WILL SPREAD EQUAL SHADOW ON ALL MICROMAX PHONES
      
      
      I BOUGHT THIS PHONE APPROX 2 MONTHS AGO FROM LOCAL DEALER AFTER READING THE REVIEWS FROM FLIPKART AND OTHER WEBSITES AND ALSO THE PRICE WAS LOW IN LOCAL MARKET. I WAS ASTONISHED BY THE WAY PHONE LOOKS. I MEAN WHO WOULD NOT. IN MERE 8K YOU ARE GETTING A 5 INCH SCREEN, A 1.2 GHZ PROCESSOR AND WHAT NOT. IF YOU COMPARE IT WITH OTHER PHONES HERE ON FLIPKART, ITS SPECS WILL MATCH WITH GALAXY GRAND WHICH IS 17K APPROX RIGHT NOW.
      
      
      NOW I WILL TELL YOU THE TRUTH ABOUT THIS PHONE. AFTER EXACT 16 DAYS OF USE, THE THREE TOUCH BUTTONS OF PHONE STOPPED RESPONDING. NOT EVEN THAT, I HAVE TO REBOOT THE PHONE MAKE THEM FUNCTIONING AGAIN. THEN I FOUND OUT THAT IF I LOCK AND UNLOCK THE PHONE AGAIN, THE BUTTONS AGAIN START WORKING BUT AFTER JUST 3-4 MINUTES OF USAGE, THEY GET UNRESPONSIVE.
      
      NOW I WENT TO THE MICROMAX CARE. WHICH WAS INDEED A TOUGHEST JOB. THE SERVICE HAS NOWHERE WRITTEN A WORD ABOUT MICROMAX. I ASKED NEARBY PEOPLE AND THEY SAID THAT MICROMAX SERVICE CENTER IS ONE WITH THE GREEN DOORS. SO. I FOUND IT AND WENT INSIDE
      
      THE CUSTOMER CARE NOW TOLD ME THAT THE ENTIRE TOUCH SCREEN IS DAMAGED FROM INSIDE AND NEEDS TO BE REPLACED. THEY TOLD ME TO COME BACK AFTER 7 DAYS, BUT I GOT MY PHONE IN 19 DAYS. NOW I WAS AGAIN HAPPY THAT AT LAST IT IS WORKING WELL, BUTTERY SMOOTH ETC.. BUT MY EXPECTATIONS WERE ABOUT TO RISE AND THE CAMERA STOPPED WORKING. I MEAN WHAT THE HELL. I JUST BROUGHT THE PHONE FROM SERVICE CENTER AND THE CAMERA STOPPED WORKING.
      
      NEXT DAY I WENT TO SERVICE CENTRE AGAIN AND ASKED WHAT THE HECK IS PROBLEM AND WHY YOU PEOPLE DON'T CHECK THE PHONE THOROUGHLY BEFORE HANDLING IT BACK! I GAVE MY PHONE, THEY SAID IT WILL TAKE AROUND 1/2 HOUR TO LOCATE THE EXACT PROBLEM. AFTER 1 HOUR, A GUY CAME OUT AND SAID THAT CAMERA MODULE IS DAMAGED AND WILL BE NEEDED REPLACMENT. I GENTLY ASKED HOW MUCH TIME IT WILL TAKE TO REPAIR? THEY SAID, AROUND 10 DAYS. I ASKED WHY SO MUCH TIME? THEY SAID THAT CAMERA MODULE ASSEMBLY IS NOT AVAILABLE, WE NEED TO ORDER IT.
      
      TODAY, 20 DAYS ARE OVER. I CALLED THEM AND THEY REPLY: SIR YOUR PHONE WILL TAKE TIME.
      
      SO, IF YOU CALCULATE THE EXACT DAYS ABOVE, THE PHONE WAS IN SERVICE CENTRE FOR 20+19 = 39 DAYS AND WAS IN MY POCKET FOR ONLY 15 AND 1/2 DAYS.
      
      BEFORE YOU START THINKING THAT THIS PROBLEM MAY OCCUR IN FEW HANDSETS OR I WAS "UNLUCKY" WITH THIS PIECE. I WANT YOU ALL TO FIRST GO TO THE SERVICE CENTRE OF MICROMAX AND SEE HOW MANY PEOPLE ARE STANDING THERE IN QUEUE TO GET THERE PHONES READY. NOT ONLY THAT, I MET 4 GUYS WITH MICROMAX A76 CANVAS WITHE EXACT PROBLEMS AND ONE OF THE GUY WAS SHOUTING BECAUSE HIS PHONE WAS IN SERVICE CENTRE FOR PAST 3 MONTHS.
      
      THE COMPANIES LIKE MICROMAX ARE ONLY BRAND NAME. THEY DONOT MANUFACTURE ANYTHING. WHAT THEY DO IS GIVING LARGE ORDERS TO COMPANIES IN CHINA. THESE COMPANIES ARE ALSO VERY WELL KNOWN AS "CHINA MOBILE". THEY MAKE THE HARDWARE WITH CHEAPEST COMPONENT THEY GET AND SEND THEM TO INDIA. ONCE IT DELIVERS TO INDIA, OUR GUYS PUT A MICROMAX LOGO ON THE PHONE AND SELL IT.
      
      
      THE SAME GOES WITH KARBONN, XOLO, MAXX AND OTHER 'GOD KNOWS' BRANDS.
      
      IF SOME GUY WORKING FOR MICROMAX IS READING THIS REVIEW, I WANT TO PUT SOME POINTS THAT MAY HELP YOU:
      
      YOU GUYS ARE LOOTING THE COMMON MAN'S MONEY. YOU SELL THE PHONE AT VERY LOW COST AND THEN MAKES PROFIT WITH THE AFTER SERVICE.
      
      YOU TOO KNOW HOW SHITTY YOUR PHONES ARE SO PLEASE KEEP STOCKS OF THE ESSENTIAL HARDWARE IN SERVICE CENTRE.
      
      STOP HAVING BIG CELEBRITIES LIKE HUGH JACKMAN IN YOUR ADS. YOUR COMPANY SUCKS AT LEAST DON'T MAKE THEM INFAMOUS. I KNOW THAT HE DO NOT EVEN USE YOUR PHONE.
      
      AND PLEASE HIRE SOME GOOD WORKERS AND DEVELOP SOMETHING HERE IN INDIA. DON'T FOOL US.
      
      MY REVIEW IS WHOLEHEARTEDLY HONEST AND TRUE. IF YOU DO NOT BELIEVE ME YET THEN GO BUY THIS AND SUFFER. I DO NOT HAVE ANY TIME TO JEOPARDIZE ANY ONE HERE I JUST WANT TO PUT THE POINTS WHICH ARE ACTUAL REALITY.

THE SECOND VISIT TO THE SERVICE CENTER THEY SAID THEY WILL CHANGE THE MOTHER BOARD. HOWEVER ON RECEIPT OF THE PHONE WE FOUND THAT THE IMIE NO IS MISSING FOR WHICH SERVICE CENTER MANAGER MR. NAGESWARA RAO SAYS IT THE HARDWARE THEY GOT FROM MICROMAX AND THAT I SHOULD NOT RESET THE PHONE.IN THE THIRD VISIT THEY HAVE RECTIFIED THIS PROBLEM BUT I FOUND THE MICROPHONE AND SPEAKER ARE NOT WORKING THE BASIC PHONE ITSELF IS NOT WORKING NOW. ALL THIS TOOK MORE THAN ONE MONTH AND MY PHONE IS STILL WITH THE SERVICE CENTER.
      
      
      WHEN WE TRIED TO CONTACT MICROMAX GURGAON SERVICE CENTER THEY ARE EVEN MORE WORSE THEY DON'T RESPOND AT ALL AND ARE WORSE THAN THE EXECUTIVE AT A PUBLIC SECTOR BANK.

label: Micromax Canvas HD A116
Sentences:
FIRSTLY I BOUGHT THIS PHONE JUST AS A TEMPORARY PHONE TILL I COULD FIND A BETTER ONE. THE PRICE BEING ABOUT 13500 SOUNDED LIKE A GOOD BUY.
      
      BUT AFTER I RECEIVED THE PHONE I WAS PLEASANTLY SURPRISED, IT LOOKED AND WORKED WAY BETTER THAN I THOUGHT.
      
      
      MY EXPERIENCE AFTER USING THE PHONE FOR ABOUT 2 MONTHS.
      
      
      PROS:
      
      1. GREAT LOOKS
      
      2. LIGHT WEIGHT
      
      3. SUPER FAST ( QUAD CORE PROCESSOR AND 1GB RAM)
      
      4. DUAL SIM
      
      5. GOOD BATTERY LIFE ( LASTS 1 FULL DAY WITH 3G USAGE USING ONE SIM, HAVE NOT TESTED THE BATTERY WITH TWO SIMS)
      
      6. EXPANDABLE MEMORY TO 32GB ( I USE A 16GB MEMORY CARD WITH NO LAG AT ALL)
      
      7. AMAZING HD DISPLAY. BEATS THE LIKES OF GALAXY GRAND HANDS DOWN.
      
      8. GOOD SOUND QUALITY AND LOUDNESS
      
      9. HAS A SURPRISINGLY GOOD CAMERA. WORK A LITTLE ON THE SETTINGS AND YOU CAN WILL BE ABLE TO CLICK GREAT PICTURES AND VIDEOS.
      
      
      CONS :
      
      1) 1 GB INTERNAL SPACE FOR INSTALLING APPS. YOU CAN FIND APPS ON THE PLAY STORE THAT MOVE THE APP TO THE EXTERNAL MEMORY CARD. BUT WHEN YOU INSTALL AN APP OR UPDATE AN APP IT IS FIRST INSTALLED ON THE INTERNAL MEMORY. SO IF YOU DON'T HAVE ENOUGH SPACE IN THE INTERNAL MEMORY YOU WILL NOT BE ABLE TO EVEN UPDATE YOUR APPS.
      
      
      THIS ISSUE MIGHT BE ADDRESSED IN THE LATEST ANDROID UPDATE.
      
      
      2. THE LOUD SPEAKER DURING CALLS IS VERY CLEAR BUT IT COULD HAVE BEEN SLIGHTLY LOUDER. CAN'T REALLY COUNT THIS AS A NEGATIVE BECAUSE IT COULD BE TO ALSO PREVENT THE SPEAKERS FROM GETTING SPOILED.
      
      
      3.NO TASK MANAGER. YOU HAVE TO INDIVIDUALLY KILL APPS. BUT YOU CAN GET A TASK MANAGER APP.
      
      
      ALL IN ALL IT IS A BRILLIANT PHONE. IF YOU CAN MANAGE WITH THE STORAGE ISSUE THEN THIS PHONE IS FOR YOU. I'M SURE THIS SHOULD BE TAKEN CARE OF IN THE NEXT SOFTWARE UPDATE.

label: Micromax Canvas HD A116
Sentences:
AFTER HAVING USED THE PHONE FOR 2 WEEKS, I MUST WRITE A REVIEW TO HELP OTHERS IN DILEMMA. FIRST OF ALL, DON'T PURCHASE IT FROM FLIPKART, AS AFTER GOOD BARGAINING, I WAS ABLE TO GET IT FOR RS 11300. AND OH, IF YOU GET THE OPTION OF EXTRA 1 YEAR WARRANTY, DO TAKE IT. IT MAY COST 1.2K EXTRA, BUT WILL BE HELPFUL LATER IF YOUR PHONE IS DAMAGED. WITH MICROMAX, WE CAN'T REALLY TAKE CHANCES.
      
      NOW I WILL COME TO THE MAIN POINT. CANVASHD IS A REALLY GOOD PHONE FROM MICROMAX, CONSIDERING I GOT IT FOR 11300. WHAT'S EXCELLENT THAT THEY PROVIDE A COMPLIMENTARY FLIP COVER WITHIN THE BOX, SO NO NEED TO SHELL OUT EXTRA 400 BUCKS. ALSO THE TOUCHSCREEN IS 1280X720 IPS LCD WITH GREAT VIEWING ANGLES, AND SHARP CONTRAST. COLORS LOOK ALMOST REAL, AND IT'S SENSITIVE TOO. WHAT'S BETTER, IT IS PROTECTED WITH A GLASS LAYER(NOT GORILLA GLASS...:P), SO IT'S UP TO YOU WHETHER YOU WANT TO BUY A SCREEN GUARD OR NOT. IT HAS A 1.2 GHZ QUAD CORE CORTEX A7 ARMV7 CPU, ON A MEDIATTEK MTK6589 SOC. YEAH I KNOW IT'S NOT SO GOOD BUT SEE THE PRICE GUYS. IT ALSO HAS A POWERVR SGX 544MP GPU CLOCKED AT 286 MHZ. IT SCORES 13600 IN ANTUTU, AROUND 4500 IN QUADRANT STANDARD AND 46.4FPS IN NENAMARK2, ALL UPDATED TO THE LATEST VERSION. BUT THERE'S A CATCH HERE. THE CPU AND GPU ARE CAPABLE OF PLAYING HIGH-END GAMES BUT IT IS THE MEDIATEK CHIPSET THAT BOTTLE-NECKS. HAD IT BEEN A QUALCOMM CHIPSET, THE PHONE WOULD HAVE FLIED.
      
      THE CAMERA IS ABOVE AVERAGE, AND IT IS REALLY WOTH COMPLIMENTING IN HDR MODE. IT CAPTURES 1080P(THAT'S THE FINE MODE IN VIDEO SETTINGS. HIGH STANDS FOR 720P) BUT EVEN A 2 MINUTE VIDEO REQUIRES 110 MB SPACE. THE 4 GB INTERNAL MEMORY, OF WHICH YOU GET 1.7 GB IS TOO LOW. IN LOW LIGHT THE CAMERA JUST MANAGES TO DO AVERAGE WITH THE AVERAGE FLASH. THE FRONT CAMERA IS OKAY FOR SELF PICS AND VIDEO CALLS.
      
      THE PHONE SUPPORTS DUAL SIM. THE CALL QUALITY IS ABOVE AVERAGE, BUT THE PHONE DOES GET REALLY HOT IF YOU TALK MORE THAN 10 MINUTES. THE SPEAKER IS LOCATED AT THE BACK, AND IS NOT VERY LOUD. IN FACT, IT IS REALLY BAD. YOU ARE LIKELY TO MISS SOME CALLS IN MARKETS OR CROWDED PLACES.
      
      MUSIC QUALITY IS NOT SO GOOD, BUT WITH HEADPHONES IT'S NICE. BUT I DON'T KNOW WHY MICROMAX HAS PROVIDED WITH SIMPLE ON-EAR EARPHONES, WHEN EVEN A 6K MOBILE COMES WITH IN-EAR.
      
      IT HAS 1GB RAM, SO NO PROBLEM IN DEMANDING GAMES LIKE ASPHALT 7, GTA VICE CITY, NFS MOST WANTED ETC.. HOWEVER ASPHALT 8 IS NOT OFFICIALLY SUPPORTED ON MEDIATEK DEVICES, SO YOU WON'T SEE IT ON PLAY STORE. MEDIUM GAMES LIKE SUBWAY SURFERS, TEMPLE RUN, FRUIT NINJA ETC WORK FLAWLESSLY.
      
      THE BIGGEST PROBLEM HOWEVER, IS THAT IT HAS A MERE 2000MAH BATTERY. CONSIDERING THE 5'' SCREEN AND THE AMOUNT OF PIXELS IT HAS TO RENDER, IT CONSUMES BATTERY LIKE A FAMISHED DOG CONSUMES IT FOOD. ADD TO THAT THE TEMPTATION OF PLAYING GAMES, AND YOUR PHONE WILL BARELY LAST 8 HOURS ON A FULL CHARGE. I RECOMMEND KEEPING THE BRIGHTNESS AT LOWEST IF YOU WANT THE CHARGE TO LAST AT LEAST A DAY.
      
      
      OVERALL, CANVASHD IS A GOOD PHONE, AND I WILL SURELY RECOMMEND IT, CONSIDERING YOU GET IT WITHIN 12000. IF NOT, THEN DO CONSIDER LAVA IRIS 504Q, OR SHELL OUT ANOTHER 1.5K AND BUY XPERIA M.

label: Micromax Canvas HD A116
Sentences:
BEEN USING HD FOR 3 MONTHS. WHEN I MADE AN ORDERER, IT HIT A SURPRISING LOW OF RS. 11.5K, MAYBE COZ CANVAS 4 WAS TO BE ANNOUNCED. LATER NOTICED THAT IT HAS A VERY UNNOTICEABLE CRACK ON THE METALLIC LINING AROUND IT, MAYBE THAT'S WHY I GOT IT CHEAP AS THE PRICE WAS AGAIN 13.5K THE VERY NEXT DAY.
      
      EVERYONE ELSE HAS SPOKEN HIGHLY OF ITS CAM, PROCESSOR, GRAPHICS AND LOOKS. I FULLY AGREE EVERY BIT. NEVER SO FAR THIS PHONE HAS DISAPPOINTED IN ANY WAY. NEITHER FOR BASIC FUNCTIONALITY, NOR WHILE MULTI TASKING DID I EVER FACE ANY LAG OR MALFUNCTIONING.
      
      HAVE DROPPED IT A FEW TIMES, STILL NO ISSUES.
      
      I HAVE WHITE MODEL (AS THE BLACK ONE COSTED ME 13.5K), AND IT LOST ITS SHEEN AND LUSTRE PRETTY QUICK (JUST THE OUTER BODY, NOT THE SCREEN WHICH I HAVE WELL PROTECTED BY A SCREENGUARD).
      
      THE MATTE FINISH OF BACK COVER MAKES IT A PLEASURE TO HOLD.
      
      
      IF I FORCIBLY FIND A SHORTCOMING IN THIS STATE-OF-THE-ART PRODUCT FROM MMX, I WOULD POINT OUT TO ITS BATTERY WHICH BARELY LASTS FOR ONE DAY OF EVEN A LOW MODERATE USE IN OFFICE.
      
      AND IF THEY COULD COMPLEMENT THE SUPERB VIDEO WITH EVEN A NEARLY DECENT AUDIO, IT WOULD'VE BEEN A STEAL. ALAS, ONE HAS TO COMPROMISE ON THE LOUDNESS OF THE PHONE. THE SOUND QUALITY IS EXCELLENT, THE VOLUME ISN'T THAT GOOD.
      
      
      OVERALL FOR ME, IT'S PROVED TO BE A NICE BUY AS I GOT IT A COUPLE THOUSANDS CHEAPER THAN WHAT YOU GUYS WILL HAVE TO PAY ;-)
      
      MY FRIEND USES IT NOW, AND HE'S REAL BAD AT THE TOUCHES (HE PREVIOUSLY USED RECEPTIVE TOUCH PHONES). SURPRISINGLY, IT SURVIVED HIS HARSH APPROACH TOWARDS IT FOR MONTHS.. SO LETS ADD THAT THIS IS ALSO DURABLY DESIGNED TO LAST FOR A WHILE.
      
      
      JUST BOUGHT A MMX PHONE WORTH RS.999!! AND I THINK IT'S A STEAL TOO..

label: Micromax Canvas HD A116
Sentences:
HI ALL,
      
      
      I BOUGHT THIS HANDSET FOR MY WIFE FROM FLIPKART. FLIPKART DELIVERED IT AS EXPECTED. INITIALLY WE WERE SO SCARED TO GO WITH MICROMAX BRAND DUE ITS SERVICE RELATED CONCERNS BUT THEN WE DECIDED TO GO AHEAD AS THE COST AND SPECS WERE GOOD. I WON'T PLAY MUCH OF GAMES WITH IT BUT I TESTED EACH AND EVERY FUNCTIONALITY OF THE MOBILE. I WILL JUST COMMENT ON MY USAGE AND OBSERVATIONS.
      
      
      SOME OF THE HANDSETS I USED BEFORE THIS WERE HEATING UP WHEN I USE WI-FI TETHERING. BUT THIS HANDSET OUT PERFORMS IN THIS CONTEXT. CAMERA IS JUST AVERAGE. I DON'T ENJOY THE CAMERA QUALITY OF THIS HANDSET BUT I AM ABLE TO TAKE SOME GOOD SNAPS DURING DAY LIGHT CONDITIONS.
      
      
      MICROMAX SMARTPHONES BATTERY JUST LAST ONE DAY MAX AS I HAVE CHECKED ALL MOST ALL THE SPECS OF MOBILES AND DISCUSSED WITH FRIENDS.
      
      
      I WAS UNABLE TO TEST SKYPE FUNCTIONALITY ON THIS MOBILE AS IT DIDN'T WORK. BUT I DON'T BELIEVE IT IS A HANDSET ISSUE. IT MAY BE AN ISSUE WITH CONFIGURATION OR MAY BE MY 3G NETWORK. label: Micromax Canvas HD A116
Sentences:
NAME: HARSH SINGH
      
      PHONE EXPERTISE: MODERATELY HIGH
      
      INTEREST IN GADGETS: TOO MUCH
      
      
      I HAVEN'T BOUGHT THIS DEVICE BUT MY FRIEND HAS AND I USE IT ON A DAILY BASIS. IT IS A VERY GOOD PHONE AT THIS PRICE AND IS FROM MICROMAX WHICH IS THE ONLY INDIAN COMPANY ON WHICH YOU ARE FREE TO EXPECT QUALITY. BUT MICROMAX IS ALSO THE COMPANY FROM WHICH YOU CAN'T EXPECT ANYTHING EXTRAORDINARY AND THAT'S WHERE THIS DEVICE FALLS BACK.
      
      
      BUILD QUALITY (8/10):
      
      THIS DEVICE HAS EXCELLENT BUILD QUALITY. IT IS THIN AND LIGHT. IT FEELS PREMIUM IN HANDS EVEN THOUGH IT IS MADE OF PLASTIC. ONE THING I DON'T LIKE ABOUT THIS DEVICE IS THAT THE CAMERA IS POTRUDING FROM THE BACK DUE TO WHICH WHEN YOU KEEP THE PHONE ON ITS BACK LIKE USUAL, YOU WILL FIND THE PHONE RESTING ON THE CAMERA WHICH IS NOT ALWAYS FEASIBLE, AS THE SURFACE ON WHICH IT IS KEPT, MIGHT BE ROUGH.
      
      
      HARDWARE (10/10):
      
      THIS IS THE PLACE WHERE IT BLOWS MOST OF THE PHONES OUT OF COMPETITION. EXCEPT ONE OR TWO PHONES OUT THERE, THIS BEAST HAS THE BEST HARDWARE YOU CAN GET AT THIS PRICE. A QUAD-CORE CORTEX A9 COUPLED WITH MALI 400 AND 1 GB OF MEMORY MAKES IT A POWERFUL DEVICE WHICH IS CAPABLE OF PLAYING ALL MODERN GAMES SMOOTHLY AND EASILY.
      
      
      SCREEN (10/10):
      
      IT HAS A 720P HD SCREEN WHICH IS AGAIN GREAT CONSIDERING THE PRICE. SO, YOU CAN EXPECT GREAT CLARITY ON THE DEVICE AND NO PIXELIZATION. IT ALSO HAS AN AMBIENT LIGHT SENSOR WHICH ASSISTS IN KEEPING THE BRIGHTNESS TO THE BARE ESSENTIALS WHEN REQUIRED AND PUMPING IT UP TO THE HIGHEST NIT, SO THAT IT IS EASILY USABLE UNDER DIRECT SUNLIGHT.
      
      
      OS (7/10):
      
      IT RUNS ON ANDROID 4.1.2 JELLY BEAN, WHICH IS NOT THE LATEST VERSION OF JELLY BEAN ON THIS DEVICE. KEEPING IN MIND THE SERVICES OF MICROMAX, I DON'T THINK THAT THERE IS GOING TO BE AN OFFICIAL JELLY BEAN 4.2.2 OR HIGHER JELLY BEAN UPDATE AS MICROMAX IS ALREADY LAUNCHING NEW DEVICES IN THIS SEGMENT. ALSO, THIS IS AN INDIA-EXCLUSIVE PHONE, WHICH MEANS THERE IS VERY LITTLE DEVELOPERS UPPORT. THAT MEANS, YOU CAN PROBABLY GET A 4.2.2 UPDATE FROM SEARCHING AT GOOGLE, BUT I DON'T THINK THERE IS MUCH SCOPE OF DEVELOPMENT ON THIS DEVICE AS THE AVAILABLE DEVELOPERS ARE ONLY FROM INDIA.
      
      
      INTERFACE (6/10):
      
      IT'S INTERFACE IS, PUTTING IT DELICATELY, STUPID. IT IS AS CLOSE TO STOCK ANDROID AS POSSIBLE WHICH SHOULD BE A GOOD THING, BUT SOMEHOW MICROMAX HAS MANAGED TO MAKE IT LOOK UGLY. IT HAS NO PROMINENT FEATURES LIKE PHONES FROM SAMSUNG AND SONY, KEEPING IT LIGHTWEIGHT AND JUST AS FUNCTIONAL AS STOCK ANDROID. I WOULD HAVE BEEN OKAY WITH THE NEXUS EXPERIENCE, BUT THE TRUTH IS THERE IS NO NEXUS EXPERIENCE. WHEN PULLING DOWN THE NOTIFICATION PANEL, ONE WILL NOTICE THAT IT HAS THE UGLIEST NOTIFICATION CENTER OUT THERE. ALSO, IT HAS ADDED FEW USELESS APPS WHICH ARE OF NO USE, JUST LIKE SAMSUNG HAS DONE WITH ITS PHONES.
      
      
      CAMERA (CAN'T SAY):
      
      I DON'T HAVE A GOOD KNOWLEDGE ON CAMERAS BUT I KNOW ONE THING FOR SURE, THAT THE 8-MP CAMERA ON THIS DEVICE SEEMS PRETTY NICE. IT IS OBVIOUSLY GOOD ENOUGH FOR DAILY USAGE.
      
      
      BATTERY (10/10):
      
      IT LASTS A WHOLE DAY ON AVERAGE USAGE INCLUDING GAMING, BROWSING, CALLING AND MULTITASKING. THIS IS GREAT POINT OF ATTRACTION FOR THIS DEVICE AS IT PROVIDES POWERERFUL HARDWARE ALONG WITH GREAT BATTERY LIFE.
      
      
      CONCLUSION:
      
      IF YOU ARE A GENERAL USER WHO PLAYS GAMES AND WANTS PRODUCTIVITY OUT OF THEIR DEVICE, IT IS A GREAT PHONE. IT IS GREAT FOR CORPORATE OR OFFICE GOING PEOPLE. BUT, IT IS NOT GREAT ENOUGH FOR ENTHUSIASTS (LIKE ME) WHO LIKE CUSTOMIZING AND WANT TO HAVE A LOT OF OPTIONS AVAILABLE FOR THEIR PHONE THROUGH DEVELOPERS. ALSO IT HAS NOT-UP-TO-THE-MARK SOUND QUALITY AND THOSE WHO DEMAND QUALITY, IT IS AGAIN NOT A PHONE FOR THEM. FOR THEM XPERIA M IS THE BEST OPTION OUT THERE.
      
      BUT, IF YOU ARE WILLING TO BUY THIS PHONE XOLO PLAY IS ALSO NOT A BAD OPTION.

label: Micromax Canvas HD A116
Sentences:
BOUGHT MICROMAX CANVAS HD A WEEK AGO AND IT SEEMS IT HAS SOME ISSUES AND PROBLEMS ACCORDING TO MY PERSONAL EXPERIENCE.
      
      
      MAJOR ISSUES:-
      
      
      1> ITS TOUCH SENSITIVITY IS A MAJOR DRAWBACK. WHILE SCROLLING OR SLIDING OVER SCREEN IT ACCIDENTLY OPENS UP APPS OR DRAGS.
      
      
      2> ITS AUTO ROTATE IS NOT SO RESPONSIVE. WHILE USING AUTO ROTATE IT DOES NOT ROTATE SCREEN IMMEDIATLY AND IT IS REQUIRED TO SHAKE PHONE VERTICALLY AND THEN HORIZONTAL  TO ROTATE THE SCREEN.(WHILE SWITCHING BETWEEN APPS)
      
      
      3> IT HAS NO TASK MANAGER INSTALLED BY DEFAULT.SHOULD BE DOWNLOADED ONE FROM PLAY STORE WHICHEVER ONE YOU LIKE.
      
      
      4> ACCELEROMETER IS NOT EVEN SO SMOOTH. WHILE PLAYING GAME LIKE TEMPLE RUN 2 IT SEEMS THAT I HAVE TO ALSO TILT MYSELF COMPLETELY WITH THE PHONE TO MOVE THE CHARACTER.
      
      
      5>NO UPDATE OPTIONS AVAILABE FOR JELLYBEANS 4.2.(NOW). MAY BE AVAILEBLE IN NEAR FUTURE.
      
      
      6>PHONE UI HANGS WHEN A MESSAGE IS RECIEVED.(FOR 2-3 SECS)
      
      
      7> SOUNDS CUTS OR NOT AUDIBLE ON EITHER SIDES WHEN ON CALL.
      
      ...... AND MIGHT BE MORE TO FIND OUT......
      
      
      MINOR ISSUES:-
      
      
      1> OTHER COMPANY EARPHONES ARE NOT SUPPORTED WITH DEVICE.... TRIED- SAMSUNGS,NOKIA,AND OTHER TYPES OF EARPHONES.
      
      
      2>CAMERA IS NOT LIKE 8MP IN REAR AND 2MP IN FRONT... IT IS JUST OK.
      
      
      3>AUDIO IS OK...NOT SO GOOD.
      
      
      4> REVERSE THREATNING OR INTERNET PASSTHROUGH OPTION IS NOT AVAILABLE LIKE HTC PHONES(SAMSUNG AND OTHER PHONSE ALSO DONT HAVE IT.... SO CAN IGNORE IT)
      
      
      5> NOT SO MUCH ROMS,FIRMWARE,TWEKS,FAN-CLUBS,SUPPORT PAGES AVAILABLE DUE TO AN UPCOMING AND NOT REKNOWN WORLDWIDE.....
      
      
      OTHERWISE ITS A GOOD EXPERIENCE WITH THESE PHONE:-
      
      
      WHAT I LIKE:-
      
      1>CLEAR AND HIGH RESOLUTION SCREEN.ITS 5 INCH BIG SCREEN.
      
      
      2>VIEWING ANGLE ARE PLUS POINTS.
      
      
      3>HARDWARE CONFIG IS THE BEST PART.
      
      
      4>GPU IS VERY POWERFUL.
      
      
      5>GREAT GAMING EXPERIENCE.SUPPORTS AND CAPABLE TO RUN ALL HD GAMES.(SOME GAMES REQUIRE MORE INTERNAL STORAGE TO RUN BUT IT HAS 2GB AVAILABLE..... CAN BE FIXED IF U PREFER TO ROOT UR PHONE)
      
      
      6>CAN PLAY ALL HD VIDEOS.CAN PLAY ALL VIDEO/AUDIO FORMATS WITHOUT LAGS-MKV,FLV,VOB ETC.(REQUIRES AN VIDEO PLAYER OTHER THAN DEFAULT I USE BS PLAYER )WATCHING VIDEOS ON THIS PHONE IS ALSO A GOOD EXPERIENCE.
      
      
      7>CPU IS ALSO A GREAT ADVANTAGE(QUAD CORE CLOCKED AT 1.2 GHZ).ITS REALLLLLY FAST.I CAN INSTALL A APP ABOUT 90 MB IN JUST 5-6 SECONDS.
      
      
      8>DUAL SIM FUNCTIONALITY IS ALSO COOL. SWITCHING BETWEEN SIMS FOR DIFF WORKS IS EASY AND CATCHY(SMS,MMS,INTERNET,CALLS ETC).
      
      
      I AM GOING TO LOVE THIS PHONE IF IT DOES NOT SHOW ME SOME NEW ISSUES AN I GOT FIXES FOR PREVIOUS ISSUES. :)
      
      
      PLEASE SHARE YOUR EXPERIENCE WITH ME AND ALSO SUGGEST POSSIBLE SOLUTIONS WITH ME......
      
      
      GOOD LUCK.
      
      
      IT'S A GREAT PHONE OTHERWISE IN SUCH HANDY PRICE,IF THESE ISSUES ARE FIXED. SPECIALLY TOUCH, AUTOROTATE AND UI HANG ISSUE!!!

label: Micromax Canvas HD A116
Sentences:
HEY GUYS, ILL KEEP IT SHORT.. ONE OF MY RELATIVES PURCHASED MMX CANVAS HD APRIL 1ST WEEK FROM FLIPKART...NO ISSUES WITH FLIPKART BUT PRODUCT HAD TOO MANY GLITCHES AS ALREADY SPOTTED IN SO MANY YOUTUBE N FLIPKART USER REVIEWS.. AFTER 16DAYS OF USING IT "NORMALLY" (ON NORMAL USAGE- NO PLAYING GAMES OR EVEN 3G BROWSING), THE PHONE UI GOT STUCK A LOT OF TIMES, BATTERY GOT DRAINED OFF PRETTY QUICKLY (4-5 HRS) AND SHE COMPLAINED OF A DEVASTATED CAM QUALITY..IT GAVE THE QUALITY OF HER 5233 NOKIA EXPRESS MUSIC CAM 2MP FRONT CAM WAS VGA QLTY... THEN THERE WAS A CREEKING NOISE AT THE BACK AND SHE COULD NOT FIX THE HARDWARE TRIED MANY TIMES.. AND NORMALLY SHEZ AN ANDROID LOVER, SO SHE INSTALLED TOO MANY APPS N HER ROM GOT JAMMED AND PHONE CRASHED UNTIL RESTART 6 TIMES A DAY FOR A WEEK TILL SHE THOUGHT OF GIVING TO CUST SUPPORT... VERY VERY SADLY ENOUGH, SHE TRIED MORE THAN ENOUGH TO GET IN TOUCH WITH ALL THE OFFICES OF MICROMAX IN HER STATE AND ALSO CALLED UP THE NOS GIVEN IN MICROMAXINFO WEBSITE AND ALSO THE DELIVERER IN FLIPKART; BT FLIPKART DIN HAVE THEIR SUPERDEALER NO AND NONE FROM MICROMAX RESPONDED EVER..FORGET ABOUT SUBMITTING THE HANDST FOR RECOVERY...
      
      I WOULD GIVE THE PHONE AN 'OVERALL' RATING OF 2.8/5 OR 2.5/5 BASED ON ITS PERFORMANCE AND QUALITY AND AFTER-SALES PARAMETERS... ITS YOUR PERSONAL CHOICE GUYS, BUT I WOULD RECOMMEND THE XOLO Q800 WHICH IS SELLING LIKE WILDFIRE...AVAILABLE IN EVERY ONLINE MALLS(STORES).. FOR A CHANGE, SEE THE NO OF REVIEWS N RATINGS OF THIS PARTICULAR MODEL IN FLIPKART N READ THE REVIEWS IN YOUTUBE..YOU WOULD BE AMAZED WHAT QUALITY XOLO PROVIDES US WITH WHAT KIND OF SPECS AND WHAT MICROMAX GIVES US...XOLO HS ITS OWN CUSTOMER SUPPORT CENTERS ACROSS SUBURBAN LOCATIONS AS I CALLED THEM RECENTLY, AND THEY WERE FRIENDLY ENOUGH TO ENTERTAIN ME ON MY QUERIES QUITE WELL..
      
      SEE THE "IN-DEPTH REVIEWS" AND SPECIALLY THE "CAM" QUALITIES OF XOLO "Q800" IN YOUTUBE..(THERE ARE 2-3 VIDEOS OF THE SAME) N COMPARE IT WITH CANVASHD (THEY ARE RIVALS) N PLEASE THEN MAKE THE PURCHASING DECISION...ALSO THEY SAY IT'S GOT A HANDSOME "16 HOURS" OF CONTINUOUS TALKTIME IN 2G WHICH IS MINDBLOWING FOR SUCH A PRODUCT.. I HAVE ALREADY ORDERED THE SAME PRDUCT FROM SNAPDEAL AS THAT TIME THE MRP FROM FLIPKART WAS A GRAND MORE THAN THE "OFFER" PRICE THEY ARE GIVING US NOW..SO I ORDERED FROM SNAPDEAL..SCHEDULED TO COME TO ME BY A DAY OR TWO...
      
      Q800 HAS GOOD BUILD UP (SLEEK IPHONE DESIGN), ROBUST BATTERY LIFE, 8 MP CAM WITH CMOS AND BSI SENSORS (WHICH GIVES 10MP QUALITY IN ACTUAL) N FRONT 1MP QUALITY (GIVES 1.3MP QUALITY) N THE BEST THING WHICH I FOUND OUT FROM MANY REVIEWS AT YOUTUBE IS THAT THE INTERNAL MEMORY OF Q800 (WHERE YOUR MAIN APPS AND GAMES GET INSTALLED) CAN BE "SWAPPED" TO YOUR EXTERNAL 32GB SD, WHICH MEANS PRACTICALLY YOU CAN AVAIL THE ENTIRE 32GB SPACE FOR INSTALLATION..THATS THERE IN TOO FEW SMARTPHONES AT THE MARKET. ALSO DO NOT FORGET THE BENCHMARKS SCORES... XOLO Q800 BEATS CANVASHD "HANDS DOWN" IN EACH SCORE... FOR EX. IN NENAMARK2, Q800 SCORES 54FPS WHICH IS 40FPS IN MMXCANVASHD ..
      
      SO GUYS, THERE'S MY FEEDBACK ABOUT MICROMAX CANVS HD WHICH IS LEAST ADVISABLE TO BUY, INSTEAD, THIS EXCELLENT PRODUCT FOR SUCH SPLENDID PRICE OFFERING FROM YOUR OWN INDIAN MANUFACTURER IS A REAL DELIGHT N GIVE IT A THOUGHT OR TWO ON THE DEAL..TC

label: Micromax Canvas HD A116
Sentences:
I BOUGHT THIS PHONE 1 MONTHS BACK. I WENT FOR THIS PHONE AS I THOUGHT IT IS VALUE FOR MONEY. BUT FEW THINGS YOU NEED TO KNOW BEFORE YOU DECIDE TO GO FOR THIS PHONE.
      
      1. PERFORMANCE WISE THIS IS A STELLAR PHONE. THE TOUCHSCREEN IS FAST & RESPONSIVE WITH CRYSTAL CLEAR DISPLAY AND YOU CAN RUN ANY VIDEOS/APPS WITHOUT ANY LAG. EQUALS SAMSUNG S3 IN THAT FRONT.
      
      2. BATTERY IS DECENT. I HAVE TO CHARGE MY PHONE EVERY 36-48 HOURS BASED ON MODERATE USAGE OF 1 HOUR GAMING 2-3 HOURS WIFI & APPS AND 1 HOUR TALKTIME. IT GETS FULLY CHARGED WITHIN AN HOUR. BETTER THAN OTHER SMARTPHONES.
      
      3. NETWORK & CALL QUALITY IS GOOD, BUT LOUDSPEAKER MIKE COULD HAVE BEEN BETTER.
      
      
      CONS:
      
      1. STORAGE IS LOW AND DISAPPOINTED WITH IT. IF YOU DOWNLOAD 6-10 STANDARD APPS AND KEEP AROUND  500MB(~180) OF SONGS, VERY SOON YOU WILL START GETTING LOW STORAGE SPACE POP UPS. THEN YOU HAVE TO CLEAR CACHE OR MANUALLY DISABLE/UNINSTALL CERTAIN APPS. MOREOVER WITH EXTERNAL CARD ALSO THERE ARE ROOTING PROBLEMS FOR APPS. SO HEAVY GAMERS ARE ADVISED TO STAY AWAY FROM THIS PHONE. ADDITIONAL COST OF 800 RS FOR CARD!
      
      2. DON'T GO FOR WHITE COLOR PANEL. IT WILL BE DULL IN 3 DAYS! CAUSE OF ITS MATT FINISH IT ATTRACTS DIRT AND BECOMES PALE WHITE VERY SOON. FLIP PANEL QUALITY IS NOT PAR WITH SAMSUNG PHONES. DOESN'T FEEL ROBUST. ADDITIONAL COST OF PANEL CHANGE 300 RS!
      
      3. HOPE YOU DON'T HAVE TO SERVICE THIS PHONE SOON! BUT NOWADAYS ALL COMPANY SERVICE CENTERS TAKES TIME AND DELAYS ARE EXPECTED.
      
      
      THIS PHONE SUITS FOR MODERATE USAGE, COST SENSITIVE BUYERS WHO CAN HANDLE THEIR PHONE PROPERLY. THIS WEIGHED MY OPTIONS AND I CHANGE PHONES IN AN YEAR OR SO, SO I WENT FOR THIS MOBILE. NOT RECOMMENDED FOR ROUGH USAGE. CHECK ZOLO FO SUPERIOR BUILD QUALITY.

label: Micromax Canvas HD A116
Sentences:
I AM AN EXPERT USER AND I HAVE USED THIS PHONE. LIKE EVERYBODY ELSE, I WAS ALSO CONFUSED BETWEEN MICROMAX CANVAS HD AND SAMSUNG GALAXY GRAND. I HAVE CANCELLED MY BOOKING AND PURCHASED THE GALAXY GRAND. THESE ARE THE REASONS WHY ONE SHOULD NOT PURCHASE THIS PHONE:
      
      
      1. CUSTOMER SERVICE:- MICROMAX IS AN EMERGING COMPANY AND HAS FAILED TO PROVIDE BETTER SERVICE TO THEIR CUSTOMERS. IF YOU HAVE ANY PROBLEM IN YOUR PHONE, THEN FORGET YOUR PHONE FOR 2-3 MONTHS BECAUSE THIS MUCH TIME THE COMPANY TAKES TO REPAIR YOUR PHONE. (THIS IS MY PERSONAL EXPERIENCE AS I HAVE FACED THIS PROBLEM FROM MICROMAX)
      
      
      2. BUILT QUALITY:- THE BUILT QUALITY OF THIS DEVICE IS VERY POOR. SCREEN AND BACK PANEL IS HIGHLY PRONE TO SCRATCHES. THE SCREEN QUALITY IS SO POOR THAT ONCE YOUR PHONE FALLS DOWN BY MISTAKE, THE SCREEN WILL CRACK. AND ALSO THE SPARE PARTS OF THIS DEVICE ARE NOT EASILY AVAILABLE.
      
      
      3.SOMETHING IMPORTANT ABOUT MICROMAX:- MICROMAX IS NOT A CHINESE COMPANY, ITS AN INDIAN COMPANY. BUT THE COMPANY PURCHASES THE SPARE PARTS OF THE PHONE FROM CHINA. YOU MUST BE AWARE HOW THE QUALITY OF THE PRODUCT OF CHINA ARE. THE PHONES ARE MADE IN INDIA IN GURGAON BUT THE PARTS OF THE PHONE ARE PURCHASED FROM CHINA.
      
      
      4. BATTERY :- THE BATTERY OF THIS PHONE IS ONLY 2000 MAH. IT IS VERY LOW BECAUSE IT IS A QUADCORE PHONE AND 4 CORES OF THE PHONE DRAINS A LOT OF BATTERY. ALSO DUE TO HD DISPLAY, IT WILL BE VERY BRIGHT AND IT WILL DRAIN A LOT OF BATTERY. AS MICROMAX HAS MENTIONED THERE IS ONLY 5HRS OF TALKTIME AS IN GALAXY GRAND THERE IS 10HRS OF TALKTIME. 2000 MAH BATTERY IS NOT SUFFICIENT FOR A QUADCORE HD PHONE. IT WILL NOT LAST EVEN HALF A DAY.
      
      
      5.PROCESSOR :- MICROMAX HAS USED MEDIATEK PROCESSOR IN THIS PHONE. MEDIATEK PROCESSORS ARE VERY CHEAP IN QUALITY AND PRICE AND ARE EASILY AVAILABLE IN CHINA MARKET. SOME USERS COMPLAINT THAT MEDIATEK CHIPS JUST BURNED IN THEIR PHONE.
      
      
      6.INTERNAL MEMORY :- EVEN IF INTERNAL MEMORY IS 4GB, ONLY 1.7 GB IS ACCESSIBLE AS THE REMAINING MEMORY IS USED BY THE SYSTEM APPS. AND IN JELLY BEAN, YOU CANNOT MOVE APPS AND GAMES TO MEMORY CARD. SO HOW MUCH THINGS YOU CAN STORE IN 1.7 GB ?
      
      SAMSUNG GALAXY GRAND HAS 8 GB INTERNAL FROM WHICH 4.5 GB IS USER ACCESSIBLE WHICH IS ENOUGH.
      
      
      7. SOFTWARE UPDATES :- THERE IS NO OPTION OF SOFTWARE UPDATES IN THIS PHONE. SO YOU CANNOT UPDATE YOUR ANDROID TO LATEST VERSION. ALSO THE COMPANY HAS FAILED TO PROVIDE SOFTWARE UPDATES TO CUSTOMERS THROUGH SERVICE CENTERS AS THERE ARE VERY LESS NUMBER OF SERVICE CENTERS. SO IT IS A MAJOR DRAWBACK OF THE PHONE.
      
      
      P.S.- THE PHONE HAS MANY RANDOM CRASHES GLITCHES AND BUGS. AND DUE TO LACK OF SOFTWARE UPDATES, YOU CANNOT REMOVE THEM. SO YOU WILL FACE MANY SOFTWARE PROBLEMS ON THIS PHONE.
      
      
      8. CAMERA - THE CAMERA ON THIS PHONE MAY BE 8 MP BUT THE QUALITY IS VERY POOR. YOU WILL FIND YOUR PHOTOS VERY PIXELATED. THE IMAGE QUALITY AND CLARITY WILL BE POOR. AND ALSO THE FRONT CAMERA OF 2MP IS OF VGA QUALITY WHICH IS ALSO VERY POOR. WHERE THE CAMERA OF SAMSUNG GRAND IS VERY GOOD AND ALSO BETTER THAN S3.
      
      
      9. SOUND QUALITY :- THE SOUND QUALITY OF THE LOUDSPEAKER ANS WELL AS THE EARPHONES IS VERY POOR. SOUND OF THE LOUDSPEAKER IS VERY LOW THAT WHEN YOU ARE OUT OF THE HOME YOU CANNOT RECIEVE CALLS. AND ALSO FOR MUSIC LOVERS, THE 3.5 MM JACK IS ONLY COMPATIBLE WITH THE COMPANY EARPHONES AND NOT WITH ANY OTHER EARPHONES. SO YOU WILL REGRET LISTENING TO THE SOUND.
      
      
      10. NETWORKS :- THE PHONE HAS ONLY DUAL BAND 2G NETWORK (GSM - 900, 1800) AND SINGLE BAND 3G NETWORK (UMTS - 2100). HENCE, YOU CANNOT USE YOUR PHONE AT MANY PLACES WHERE THESE NETWORKS ARE NOT SUPPORTED. ALSO THE NETWORK COVERAGE AND CALL QUALITY WILL BE VERY POOR. YOU WILL LOST NETWORK AT DISTANT PLACES MANY TIMES. WHILE SAMSUNG GALAXY GRAND HAS QUAD BAND 2G (GSM - 850, 900, 1800, 1900) AND TRI BAND 3G (UMTS - 850 / 1900 / 2100).
      
      
      11. OTHER PROBLEMS :- THE OTHER PROBLEMS WHICH THE USERS COMPLAINT ABOUT THIS PHONE IS THAT THE GPS IS NOT WORKING PROPERLY. IT SHOWS WRONG POSITIONS. ALSO THIS PHONE SUDDENLY AUTOMATICALLY RESTARTS ANY TIME OR WHILE PLAYING GAMES. IT ALSO CRASHES AND HANGS A LOT WHILE USING CERTAIN APPS.
      
      
      12. PRICE - ALTHOUGH THE PRICE WAS GOOD BUT NOW IT IS 16K. WHY SHOULD YOU SPEND 16K ON MICROMAX WHEN YOU CAN GET THE GALAXY GRAND FOR 19K (FROM A LOCAL STORE NOT FLIPKART). IF ONCE YOUR DEVICE GETS BRICKED THEN YOUR 16K WILL GO WASTE FOREVER. DON'T WASTE YOUR HARD EARNED MONEY ON THIS CRAP AND GO GET A GOOD PHONE FROM A GOOD BRAND LIKE SAMSUNG WHICH IS THE WORLD LEADER IN SMARTPHONES OR ANY OTHER LIKE SONY, HTC, LG. I AM PERSONALLY USING GALAXY GRAND AND IT IS A VERY GOOD PHONE THAN CANVAS HD.
      
      PLEASE DON'T BUY THIS ONE.

label: Micromax Canvas HD A116
Sentences:
IT HAS BEEN 5 MONTHS SINCE IM USING MICROMAX CANVAS HD A116 PHONE.. YES I PURCHASED IT FROM FLIPKART..
      
      PHONE WORKED REALLY WELL ALL THESE TIME, THE CAMERA QUALITY IS JUST EXCELLENT..
      
      THE PROBLEM STARTED AFTER I UPGRADED THE MEMORY CARD FROM 8GB TO 32GB.. WORKED WELL FOR A MONTH WITH 32GB MICRO SD CARD.. THEN OUT OF THE BLUE PHONE STARTED 'UNMOUNTING' THE MEMORY CARD FOR NO REASON.!! FIST I THOUGHT IT MIGHT BE VIRUS, I FORMATTED THE SD CARD, BUT PROBLEM DIDN'T GET FIXED.. AFTER MANY TRIES I GAVE TO TO MICROMAX SERVICE CENTER, THEY GAVE IT BACK THE NEXT DAY TELLING THE PROBLEM IS FIXED WHICH WASN'T.!! I GAVE IT BACK 2 DAYS LATER, ALL THEY DID WAS RESET THE PHONE TO FACTORY SETTINGS AND RETURN.. WHICH DID NOT FIX THE PROBLEM.!!
      
      
      NO THE PROBLEM IS NOT WITH THE MEMORY CARD, BECAUSE THE SAME MEMORY CARD WORKS WELL WITH OTHER DEVICES AND THE PHONE REJECTS EVERY MEMORY CARD I PUT IN.!! SERVICE IS REALLY BAD.!! I WOULD NOT RECOMMEND ANY MICROMAX PRODUCTS UNTILL THEY IMPROVE THEIR SERVICES..!!
      
      
      DO GOOGLE AND CHECK OUT 'MICROMAX CANVAS HD A116 MEMORY UNMOUNT PROBLEM'. YOU'LL FIND MANY PEOPLE FACING THE SIMILAR PROBLEMS.!!

label: Micromax Canvas HD A116
Sentences:
I PURCHASED YOUR PHONE MICROMAX CANVAS HD A116 FROM FLIPKART.COM ON THE 5TH OF AUGUST 2013.
      
      
      ON THE THE 45TH DAY OF THE PURCHASE, WHILE I WAS SETTING UP THE PHONE FOR CHARGING USING THE USB CABLE FROM MY LAPTOP ON MY WORK DESK, THE SCREEN STARTED FLICKERING. I DECIDED TO REBOOT MY PHONE AND THE DISPLAY WENT DARKER AND STARTED FLICKERING EVEN MORE. I TOOK THE PHONE TO THE MICROMAX MOBILE ZONE, DWARKA, DELHI THE SAME DAY. THE MANAGER TOLD ME THAT SCREEN NEEDS TO BE REPLACED AND THAT THE PHONE HAS BEEN PHYSICALLY DAMAGED; HENCE THE REPAIR WOULDN'T BE CONSIDERED UNDER WARRANTY. THE PHONE HAD BEEN DELICATELY HANDLED AND HENCE I DECIDED TO PURSUIT IT FURTHER WITH HIGHER AUTHORITIES. AFTER A LOT OF MAIL EXCHANGES AND TRIPS TO THE SERVICE CENTER THE PHONE WAS FINALLY TAKEN-IN BY THE SERVICE CENTER TO BE REPAIRED UNDER WARRANTY. THERE WAS NO DURATION OF SERVICE MENTIONED AND HENCE I HAD NO IDEA WHEN TO EXPECT MY PHONE BACK.
      
      
      AFTER A LOT OF ENQUIRIES, I WAS ASKED TO RECEIVE MY PHONE AFTER 2 WEEKS. THE 1ST STRIKING OBSERVATION WAS THAT THE PHONE HAD LOST ITS NEW TOUCH AND FEEL AND THERE WAS AN EVIDENT GAP BETWEEN THE NEW SCREEN AND THE FRAME OF THE PHONE. WHEN I CHECKED THE PHONE AT THE SERVICE COUNTER, I FOUND OUT THAT THE NEW SCREEN WAS DAMAGED AND DYSFUNCTIONAL, AND WOULD REQUIRE ANOTHER SCREEN REPLACEMENT.
      
      
      I WAS QUITE DISHEARTENED AND REQUESTED MICROMAX TO EITHER REFUND ME THE MONEY OR AT THE LEAST REPLACE THE PHONE BUT THERE WERE NO FURTHER REPLIES OR CORRESPONDENCE FROM THEIR END. I'M AFRAID I MIGHT HAVE TO PURSUIT THIS FURTHER WITH THE CONSUMER COURTS.
      
      
      FROM MY PERSONAL EXPERIENCE I UNDERSTAND THAT, THOUGH MICROMAX IS AN UPCOMING INDIAN BRAND WHICH HOLDS A LOT OF PROMISE, IT MAJORLY LACKS QUALITY PRODUCTS (PHONES AND EVEN SPARE PARTS). THE COMPANY REALLY FALLS SHORT ON COUNTS OF CUSTOMER AND SERVICE SUPPORT. THOUGH THE PRODUCTS HAVE SOME OF THE BEST VALUE FOR MONEY PROPOSITIONS, THE QUALITY MANAGEMENT AND SERVICE SUPPORT SYSTEMS APPEAR TO BE COMPROMISED.

label: Micromax Canvas HD A116

I RECEIVED THIS PHONE IN 20 HOURS AFTER PLACING THE ORDER. SUPER FAST AND AMAZING DELIVERY SPEED. I SET UP THE PHONE AND OPENED CAMERA. IT STARTED ADDING COLORS TO PICTURES AND VIDEOS ON ITS OWN. I HAVE BEEN USING ANDROID FOR QUITE SOME TIME AND BEING A TECH GUY I UNDERSTAND THINGS UP TO A GREAT EXTENT. I CHANGED ALL CAMERA SETTINGS BUT NOTHING WORKED. I WAS NOT SURPRISED AS I RED THE REVIEWS ON CAMERA OF THIS PHONE. I WAS SURPRISED WHEN I CONNECTED THE CHARGER TO THE PHONE. GUESS WHAT ? IT STARTED LAUNCHING APPLICATIONS ON ITS OWN VERY RANDOMLY. I KNEW THAT THERE ARE FEW BUGS IN THIS VERSION OF ANDRO AND IT WILL GET RESOLVED ONCE IT IS UPDATED TO JB 4.2. I WENT TO SERVICE CENTER NEAR MY LOCATION (ADDRESS WAS GIVEN BY FLIPKART WITH INVOICE COPY) AND FOUND THAT IT WAS CLOSED TWO YEARS AGO. SERVICE CENTER (IN RAJAJI NAGAR, BANGALORE IN CASE IF YOU KNOW) WHICH IS MENTIONED ON MICROMAX WEBSITE IS NOT OFFERING SERVICES TO MICROMAX ANYMORE. I WAS FRUSTRATED AND ASKED FOR A REFUND FROM FLIPKART. THEY SAID THEY WILL PROVIDE ME A REPLACEMENT OF THE PRODUCT AND IF SECOND IS ALSO GIVING THE SAME ISSUE THEN THEY WILL RETURN MY MONEY. I GOT THE SECOND PHONE AND IT WAS DEFECTIVE TOO. WELL, I WILL NEVER BLAME FLIPKART AS THEY WERE VERY FRIENDLY DURING THIS ENTIRE DRAMA AND THEY RETURNED MY MONEY BACK.
      
      TO CONFIRM THIS I ASKED ONE OF MY FRIEND IF HE IS FACING SAME ISSUE ON HIS SAME PHONE. HE SAID YES BUT HE IS SIMPLY IGNORING THOSE PROBLEMS AND USING IT.
      
      BEWARE OF MICROMAX MY FRIENDS.

label: Micromax Canvas Turbo A250
Sentences:
SISTERURBO IS A CAPABLE PHONE. I BOUGHT THIS FOR MY DAD, AND I'VE ONLY USED IT FOR A SHORT TIME NOW, BUT I'LL UPDATE THIS INFO IF I ENCOUNTER ANYTHING INTERESTING LATER ON. HAVING A 1.5GHZ PROCESSOR, ONE WOULD EXPECT SMOOTH OPERATION FROM IT, BUT I THINK THE FULL HD DISPLAY BOGS IT DOWN. MAKE NO MISTAKE, THE PHONE PERFORMS FAST ENOUGH - ONLY THAT ANIMATIONS ARE A BIT CHOPPY (ESPECIALLY QUICK SETTINGS PULL DOWN) AND HIGH END GAMES WILL LAG. MAYBE I'M FEELING SO BECAUSE I'M USED TO MY NEXUS 4 SMOOTHNESS. INDEED, POWERING 1920*1080 PIXELS IS NO MEAN FEAT.
      
      HERE ARE A COUPLE OF REASONS FOR WHICH I'D RECOMMEND THIS PHONE:
      
      1) 2 GB OF RAM. MAIN REASON WHY I CHOSE THIS INSTEAD OF CANVAS MAGNUS. SO CAN EASILY HANDLE LARGE CONTACT BOOK WITH THOUSANDS OF CONTACTS, ALONG WITH HEAVY OFFICE APPLICATIONS ETC.
      
      2) LARGE AND CRISP DISPLAY. THOUGH I BELIEVE THE DISPLAY BOGS THE PERFORMANCE DOWN A BIT, IT IS INDEED A BEAUTIFUL DISPLAY. THE COLOURS DO NOT POP OUT LIKE IN AMOLED DISPLAYS, BUT LOOKS DECENT ENOUGH. I COMPARED IT SIDE BY SIDE WITH A CANVAS HD AND CAM SAY THAT IT'S SHARPER AND CRISPER, WITH WARMER COLOUR REPRODUCTION.
      
      3) THE PHONE LOOKS DECENT. ALUMINUM FINISH IS A NICE TOUCH.
      
      4) OF COURSE, DUAL SIM IS A PRIMARY CONCERN FOR MY DAD.
      
      
      WHY I WOULDN'T RECOMMEND THIS PHONE:
      
      1) CAMERA: EVEN WITH A 13MP SENSOR, IT DOES NOT TAKE GOOD PICTURES. COMPARED WITH MY NEXUS 4 IN INDOOR PHOTOS AND THE TURBO'S PICTURES ARE SOFTER, WITH LESSER OVERALL DETAILS, AND AVERAGE COLOUR REPRODUCTION.
      
      2) NO SD CARD SLOT: STUCK WITH THE 12.5 GB USABLE INTERNAL SD CARD.
      
      
      SO IN GENERAL, IT'S A GOOD BUY IF IT FITS YOUR NEEDS. GOING TO DEVELOPER OPTIONS AND SWITCHING OFF ANIMATIONS DO HELP.

label: Micromax Canvas Turbo A250
Sentences:
WELL, FIRST OF ALL THANKS TO FLIPKART AND WS RETAIL FOR AS USUAL PROMPT DELIVERY (WITHIN 2 DAYS).
      
      
      I COMPARED THE CONFIGURATIONS OF THIS CELL WITH SAME PRICE RANGE MOBILES AND DECIDED TO GO WITH MMX.
      
      
      FIRST THING YOU WILL NOTICE IS VERY GOOD BUILD QUALITY. ALSO IT IS MUCH LIGHTER THAN ITS PREVIOUS MMX CANVAS VERSIONS.
      
      
      PROS :
      
      1) GOOD BUILD QUALITY.
      
      2) VERY SMOOTH PERFORMANCE : I PLAYED FEW HEAVY GAMES LIKE INTO THE DARK, TEMPLE RUN, SUBWAY SURFER ETC. THERE WAS NO LAG AT ALL. THE RESPONSE TIME IS VERY LOW WHICH GIVES VERY GOOD FEEL.
      
      3) IFLOAT APPLICATION : THOUGH SIMILAR APPS ARE PRESENT ON GOOGLE PLAY MARKET, THIS IN-BUILD FUNCTIONALITY LOOKS GOOD. IT ALLOWS YOU TO PERFORM PARALLEL TASKING. YOU CAN SURF INTERNET AND READ SMS AT THE SAME TIME. THIS FEATURE SEEMS VERY COOL TO ME.
      
      4) SPEAKERS : I HEARD IN ITS REVIEW THAT THE SPEAKERS ARE OF NOT THAT MUCH QUALITY BUT WHEN I PLAYED SOME LOUD AND SOME SOFT MUSIC TRACKS, I DID NOT EXPERIENCE ANY BAD QUALITY SOUND. THEY ARE WORKING PERFECTLY FINE.
      
      5) HD SCREEN : THE FULL HD DISPLAY IS JUST AWESOME. YOU WILL ENJOY WATCHING HD MOVIES AND PLAYING HD GAMES ON IT.
      
      6) HD RECORDING : THE VIDEO RECORDING QUALITY IS VERY VERY GOOD.
      
      
      CONS :
      
      1) CAMERA PIC QUALITY : THOUGH 13MP REAR CAMERA IS PROVIDED WITH DOUBLE LED FLASH, THE PICTURE QUALITY UNDER LOW LIGHT (EVEN FOR INDOOR PICS) IS NOT GOOD AT ALL. THIS IS THE MOST DEPRESSING THING FOR A 13MP CAMERA. MMX NEEDS TO WORK ON THIS AREA.
      
      
      2) HEADSET QUALITY : I USED TO LISTEN MUSIC WITH PHILIPS HEADSETS ON MY SAMSUNG GALAXY POCKET. MMX HEADSET QUALITY IS NOWHERE NEAR TO PHILIPS. I INSTALLED SOME MUSIC PLAYERS AND TRIED THEIR EQUILISER OPTIONS TO ENHANCE THE QUALITY (AS IN-BUILD MUSIC PLAYER IS NOT GOOD AND ITS EQUILISER IS AS GOOD AS DEAD). IT MADE THE SOUND QUALITY BETTER BUT NOT UPTO MY EXPECTATION. I MAY BE OVER EXPECTING IN THIS MATTER BECAUSE I LOVE MUSIC AND CANT COMPROMISE WITH SOUND QUALITY AT ALL.
      
      
      3) HEATING : YEAH, THE CELL HEATS UP IN CASE OF HEAVY USE. WELL NOT AN ISSUE BUT IT MAY SEEM TROUBLESOME TO FEW USERS.
      
      
      OVERALL, THE PIC IS VERY GOOD COMPARED TO OTHER CELLS IN THIS PRICE RANGE.

label: Micromax Canvas Turbo A250
Sentences:
I WOULD JUST LIKE TO WARN PEOPLE OF 1 THING BEFORE THEY BUY ANY MOBILE DEVICE OF ANY BRAND.
      
      
      I HAD BROUGHT A MMX 116 FEW MONTHS AGO, WHEN IT WAS HYPED WITHOUT ANY OTHER DETAILS. AFTER USING IT FOR 1 MONTH IN JULY 2013, THE CELL STARTED HAVING SOME ISSUE, USE TO REBOOT ON ITS OWN, SCREEN GOING BLANK OR TOUCH BEING UNRESPONSIVE, I GAVE THE CELL TO MMX SERVICE CENTRE IN PUNE, I WAS ASKED TO CALL BACK IN 10 DAYS, WHEN I CALLED BACK ON 11TH DAY, THEY SAID IT WAS WIP (WORK IN PROGRESS) WILL NEED ANOTHER "COUPLE OF DAY" NEXT TIME I WAITED 5 DAYS AND WENT ON 22ND JULY TO SERVICE CENTRE AND WAS TOLD THE SOC HAD SOME ISSUE, WILL NEED 15 DAYS TO HAVE IT FIXED, I AGAIN WENT BACK TO MMX SC ON 12TH AUG, I WAS AGAIN TOLD TO WAIT, I LOST MY PATIENCE AS I HAD CALLED MMX SC MANY TIMES IN BETWEEN. SO I DECIDED TO GIVE THEM A PIECE OF MY MIND AND SOME OF MY ANGER BY YELLING A BIT
      
      
      I WAITED AGAIN AS I HAD NO OPTION, CALLED AND EMAILED MMX ABOUT THE ISSUE AND DELAY WITHOUT ANY LUCK  AND MET MANY PPL IN MMX SERVICE CENTER WHO HAD GIVEN THEIR HANDSET FOR MINOR REPAIRS AND HAD TO WAIT FOR MONTHS TO GET THEIR HANDSET BACK. YES YOU CAN CHECK IT OUT URSELF AT YOUR LOCAL SERVICE CENTRES OR ASKING YOUR FRIEND WHO HAD TO DEAL WITH SUCH ISSUES. I GOT MY CELL BACK WITH LOT OF SCRATCHES AND UGLY CONDITION ON 17TH OCT 2013 AND NOW I FOUND A NEW PROBLEM, THAT THE CALL JUST DROPS IN MIDDLE OR EVEN WHEN YOU ARE NEAR A AIRTEL TOWER, YOU WILL LOSE THE MOBILE TOWER SIGNAL AND SOMETIMES IN MIDDLE OF TALK THE VOICE JUST DIES
      
      MIND YOU I HAD NOT ROOTED OR DID ANY OTHER CHANGE ON HANDSET AND I USE AIRTEL IN PUNE
      
      
      AFTER SOME RESEARCH I FOUND THAT ALL INDIAN SO CALLED CELL MANUFACTURER ESSENTIALLY BUY A ALREADY DEVELOPED SOC FROM CHINESE MAKERS AND REBRAND THEM WITH THEIR OWN LOGO, 99% OF INDIAN MANUFACTURER WHO DO THIS LACK THE FOLLOWING
      
      -- HAND IN DEVELOPMENT OF ANY HANDSET OR DESIGN IDEA OF THE SOC
      
      -- THEY HAVE NO IN HOUSE R&D OR SOFTWARE DEVELOPMENT
      
      -- THEY HAVE NO TRAINED ENGINEERS OR A INFRASTRUCTURE WHERE THEY CAN FIX THE HARDWARE RELATED ISSUES
      
      -- THEY ARE THEMSELVES CUSTOMER TO THE CHINESE MAKERS SO HAVE TO WAIT FOR THEM TO FIX ISSUE AND HAVE NO PROPER CHANNELS TO COMMUNICATE SO CAN NEVER GIVE YOU CLEAR ANSWER ON WHATS WRONG WITH YOUR HANDSET OR WHEN YOU MIGHT GET IT BACK THEY JUST KEEP ASKING TIME WITH WISHFUL THINKING THAT IT MIGHT BE SOLVED BY THAT TIME
      
      
      SO ALL THESE MAKERS SEND THOSE HANDSETS BACK TO THE MANUFACTURER AND THEN EITHER GET REPLACEMENT OR FACTORY REPAIRED CELLS WHICH THEY USE AS REPLACEMENT AND HENCE THE DELAY. SO BEFORE YOU BUY SUCH SETS BEWARE
      
      
      SO THE MORAL OF THE STORY, WHEN YOU BUY SUCH HANDSETS, PRAY IT DOES NOT GET BAD OR SPEND LITTLE MORE FOR OLD SPEC PHONE FROM BRANDED SET MANU LIKE SAMSUNG, SONY, LG, NOKIA
      
      EITHER WAY ITS A COMPROMISE FOR US AS ALL MANUFACTURER TREAT US AS 3RD GRADE CITIZENS AND THINK WE DESERVE CRAP
      
      
      WE ARE BIGGEST CONSUMER OF GOODS YET WE GET CRAP, JUST GOOGLE HOW SMASUNG TREAT US AND HOW THEY TREAT AMERICANS
      
      EG OCTA CORE SAMSUNG GALAXY  S4 (2 QUAD CORE MADE OCTA LOL) IN INDIA WHILE US GOT S4 WITH SNAPDRAGON 600, THE PRICE OF US VERSION IS APPROX 35,000 INR WHILE WE GET A INFERIOR VERSION AT 40,000)

label: Moto G
Sentences:
AFTER SO MUCH OF WAITING I HAVE GOT MY MOTO G FROM MY FAVOURITE ON-LINE RETAILER FLIPKART. (THOUGH SOME PROBLEMS ARE THERE WITH SHIPPING OF MOTO G, I STILL PREFER FLIPKART). FIRST OF ALL, WE NEED TO APPRECIATE MOTOROLA FOR THE PACKAGE THAT THEY MADE. HOW THEY HAVE MANAGED SUCH A COMPACT AND SMALL PACKET FOR A PHONE, BATTERY AND HEADSET. I WAS AMAZED BY SEEING THE PACKET.
      
      COMING TO THE PHONE, IT IS VERY GOOD FOR THE MONEY THAT WE SPEND. IPS DISPLAY, GORILLA GLASS3, QUAD CORE PROCESSOR, 1 GB RAM ALL THIS FEATURES ARE LESS THAN 15K (13999 ACTUALLY). THE PHONE THAT YOU ARE GETTING IS MUCH MORE WORTH THAN THE MONEY THAT YOU INVEST,
      
      
      POSITIVES:
      
      1. DISPLAY: IT IS HAVING IPS DISPLAY WITH 1280X720 RESOLUTION. CLARITY IS TOP NOTCH.
      
      2. GORILLA GLASS : PROVIDES ADDITIONAL SECURITY TO DISPLAY.
      
      3. PROCESSOR AND RAM : QUAD CORE SNAPDRAGON 400 (1.2 GHZ) WITH 1 GB RAM, WE CAN PLAY SOME HIGH END GAMES WITHOUT ANY PROBLEM.
      
      4. BATTERY: IF YOU CONTINUOUSLY SWITCH TO 2G AND IF WE DO SIMPLE BROWSING AND PLAYING SIMPLE GAMES LIKE CANDY CRUSH WE CAN GET UPTO 24-26 HOURS. I HAVE NOT TESTED WITH A 3G CONNECTION.
      
      
      NEGATIVES:
      
      1. RARE CAMERA: IT IS 5MP WITH 720P VIDEO RECORDING. DAY TIME YOU WILL GET IMAGES WITH FINE CLARITY, BUT NIGHT TIME THE CLARITY OF IMAGES IS NOT GOOD (THOUGH IT IS IN ACCEPTABLE LEVEL).
      
      2. NO SUPPORT FOR EXPANDABLE MEMORY: IT IS COMING WITH 8GB/16 GB INTERNAL MEMORY AND THERE IS NO SCOPE FOR EXTENDING IT. BETTER GO FOR 16GB (USAGE MEMORY WILL BE AROUND 12.5 GB). BUT AFTER KITKAT UPDATE, YOU CAN DIRECTLY CONNECT YOUR PHONE TO ANY PEN DRIVE THROUGH A OTG CABLE WITHOUT ANY THIRD PARTY APP. THEREFORE, YOU CAN PUT ALL YOUR ADDITIONAL DATA IN A PEN DRIVE AND WE CAN CARRY WITH A OTG CABLE.
      
      
      SOME GLITCHES AFTER KITKAT UPDATE:
      
      
      1. I DONT KNOW WHY SOMETIMES IT IS NOT GETTING CONNECTED TO YOUR LAPTOP OR DESKTOP WITH A DATA CABLE. BEFORE KITKAT UPDATE, THERE WAS NO PROBLEM, AFTER UPDATE IF YOU WANT TO CONNECT YOUR PHONE TO A LAPTOP YOU NEED TO RESTART YOUR PHONE.
      
      2. IF YOU ARE USING 2 SIMS, THERE IS SOME PROBLEM IN INCOMING CALLS, SOMETIMES YOU CANNOT RECEIVE CALLS THOUGH YOU HAVE PROPER SIGNAL STRENGTH (THIS I HAVE NOT OBSERVED IN MY PHONE AS I AM USING ONE SIM ONLY BUT I OBSERVED IT IN MY FRIEND'S PHONE)
      
      3. SOME SYSTEMS WIDGETS ARE NOT WORKING PROPERLY AFTER KITKAT UPDATE (LIKE AUTO ROTATION OPTION ON SYSTEM WIDGET ETC.)
      
      4. WHEN YOU RESTART YOUR MOBILE, AUTO SYNC OPTION FOR GMAIL IS CHANGING TO NO SYNC OPTION BY DEFAULT (THIS I OBSERVED SOME TIMES)
      
      
      HOPE MOTOROLA MAY RELEASE SOME PATCH FOR THE ABOVE GLITCHES.
      
      
      OVERALL, THIS PHONE IS VERY GOOD AND BETTER GO FOR 16GB VERSION FOR NO REGRETS.

label: Moto G
Sentences:
AN EXCELLENT DEVICE. YOU MAY BUY THIS WITHOUT A SECOND THOUGHT. I USUALLY RESEARCH AND WINDOW-SHOP FOR AT LEAST A COUPLE OF MONTHS, BUT THIS IS THE FIRST PHONE I'VE PURCHASED ON AN IMPULSE!
      
      
      EVEN WHEN I HAD ABSOLUTELY NO INTENTION OF BUYING THE MOTO G, I WAS DISAPPOINTED THAT IT WENT OUT OF STOCK SO SOON ON THE LAUNCH DAY! I HAPPENED TO NOTICE IT BACK IN STOCK IN THE AFTERNOON, BUT WAS ABLE TO GET ONLY THE 8GB (~5.5GB USABLE). I WAS INITIALLY NOT VERY CONVINCED WITH THE INTERNAL STORAGE AND THOUGHT I'LL EVENTUALLY CANCEL THE ORDER AND WAIT FOR THE 16GB, BUT I HELD ON, SECRETLY WISHING FOR A 100% CASH BACK AMONGST OTHER GOODIES. I HOWEVER GOT THE OTHER LAUNCH DAY OFFERS FOR CLOTHING AND E-BOOKS, AND PURCHASED A ROYAL BLUE BACK COVER FOR RS.270.
      
      
      THE PURE ANDROID OS IS SLICK AND SNAPPY, SHOWING NO SIGNS OF ANY LAG WHATSOEVER, AND IS ACTUALLY ADDICTIVE TO THE POINT WHERE I SOMETIMES SWITCH ON THE DISPLAY JUST TO TOGGLE THROUGH THE HOMESCREENS AND LAUNCHER! THE EXPERIENCE IS SIMPLY SUPERB!
      
      
      AFTER TWO WEEKS OF USAGE, I HAVE ALL BUT FORGOTTEN THAT I DO NOT HAVE MUCH INTERNAL STORAGE LEFT. THIS IS SUCH A BEAUTIFULLY CRAFTED PIECE! I AM PRETTY SURE I'LL MOVE ALL PHOTOS TO THE 65GB GOOGLE DRIVE, KEEP ~2GB OF MP3S, AND SMALL GAMES. I USE THE PHONE MOSTLY FOR BROWSING, TEXTING, SOCIAL NETWORKING, LIGHT GAMING, PHONE CALLS, YOUTUBE, SKYPE, VIBER ETC,. I DO NOT MIND THE NON-EXPANDABLE INTERNAL STORAGE, BUT IT WOULD HAVE BEEN NICE TO HAVE A MICRO SD SLOT.
      
      
      THE JELLYBEAN INSTALL HAD A SMALL BUG WITH THE VOLUME CONTROL. IT WOULD REMAIN LOW TILL ABOUT 90% AND THEN GET VERY LOUD IN THE LAST 10% OR SO. THIS ISSUE IS RESOLVED POST INSTALLING KITKAT, AND THE VOLUME INCREASE IS NOW GRADUAL.
      
      
      AFTER I UPGRADED TO KITKAT, THE BATTERY DROPPED FROM 62% TO 42% AFTER THE INITIAL REBOOT! THE BACKUP SEEMS TO HAVE STABILISED AFTER A FACTORY RESET AND A FEW DAYS OF USAGE, AND HOPEFULLY IT WILL CONTINUE TO REMAIN AN 'ALL DAY BATTERY'.
      
      
      MOUNTING STORAGE THROUGH OTG REPORTEDLY WORKS WELL ON THE INDIAN MOTO G WITH 4.4.2, AS DEMONSTRATED BY USER 'GEEKYRANJIT' ON HIS YOUTUBE CHANNEL. I HAVEN'T TRIED THIS YET, BUT I AM PLANNING TO BUY A CABLE OR AN OTG PEN DRIVE.
      
      
      THE HD DISPLAY IS CRISP AND STUNNING. YOU WILL WANT TO WATCH MOVIES ON THIS THING! WATCHING HD VIDEOS FROM YOUTUBE IS MIND BLOWING, BUT I DO THIS ONLY WHILE ON WIFI AS THE DATA USAGE IS HEAVY FOR SUCH CONTENT. SMALL TEXT IS LEGIBLE AND VERY CLEAR. CORNING GORILLA GLASS 3 IS VERY THIN, SO THE SCREEN IS ALMOST CLOSE TO THE GLASS, MAKING IT ALL THE MORE BEAUTIFUL!
      
      
      THE BUILD QUALITY IS GREAT AND THE PHONE FEELS VERY PREMIUM! THE PHONE FEELS SLIM AND SUFFICIENTLY WEIGHTED AND IT LITERALLY SLIPS INTO THE POCKET. THE VOLUME AND POWER BUTTONS RATTLE A BIT, BUT PROVIDE NICE TACTILE FEEDBACK. THE BACK COVER IS DIFFICULT TO TAKE OFF, BUT THERE IS A ONE MINUTE VIDEO BY USER 'HIMESH123456789' ON YOUTUBE THAT DEMOSTRATES HOW TO DO THIS EASILY.
      
      
      THE NON REMOVABLE BATTERY IS FINE. DUE TO LONG BACKUP, EXPECT LESSER CHARGING CYCLES AND HENCE LONGER BATTERY LIFE. KEEP THE PHONE CHARGED AT 45-90% WITH REGULAR TOP-UPS TO PROLONG ITS LIFE. NEVER DEEP CYCLE (0-100%) YOUR SMARTPHONE BATTERY OFTEN, EXCEPT WHEN THERE IS A NEED TO CALIBRATE, AS DOING SO WILL REDUCE ITS SERVICE LIFE. THERE IS NO 'MEMORY EFFECT', SO YOU CAN CHARGE AT RANDOM.
      
      
      THE CAMERA ISN'T THE BEST, BUT IT DOES THE JOB. THE SECONDARY CAM IS DECENT. THE LED BULB IS VERY BRIGHT AND LIGHTS UP A FAIRLY LARGE AREA.
      
      
      THE LOUDSPEAKER IS VERY SHRILL, AND EXTREMELY LOUD! THIS IS IMPORTANT IN NOISY ENVIRONMENTS WHERE ONE CAN MISS HEARING A RINGTONE. MUSIC IS SURPRISINGLY CRISP AND THE TINIEST OF DETAILS ARE AUDIBLE.THE TREBLE IS EXTREME, BUT THE BASS IS LOW. ONE SHOULD REFRAIN FROM KEEPING THE VOLUME AT 100% WHILE PLAYING MEDIA, AS THE SPEAKER TENDS TO CRACKLE AND DISTORT. 95% IS THE SWEET SPOT FOR CLEAN MAXIMUM VOLUME. AUDIO QUALITY THROUGH HEADPHONES IS ALRIGHT.
      
      
      CALL QUALITY IS NICE. VOICE IS CLEAR AND RECEPTION IS NEAT. THE EARPIECE IS SUFFICIENTLY LOUD. WIFI AND 3G CONNECTIVITY IS GOOD AND I HAVEN'T FACED ANY CONNECTION DROPS TILL NOW. THE BROWSING EXPERIENCE IS SMOOTH. KINETIC SCROLLING AND ZOOM WORK PERFECTLY.
      
      
      THE BUNDLED ACCESSORIES AREN'T OF THE BEST QUALITY AND THE HEADPHONES JUST ADD UP TO THE PILE OF UNUSED WIRED HANDS-FREE DEVICES LYING AROUND SINCE THE FIRST NOKIA DAYS. THE ALL WHITE CHARGER LOOKS NEAT BUT COMES WITH AN AWKWARD LOOKING TWO PIN, LIKE IT WAS PUT TOGETHER IN A HURRY FOR THE INDIAN RETAIL PACKAGING. I WOULD'VE PERSONALLY PREFERRED TO HAVE THE STANDALONE USB CABLE LIKE THE ONE BUNDLED WITH THE US VERSION, BUT I ALREADY HAVE A TOUGH SONY ERICSSON CABLE AND CHARGER THAT CAME WITH THE ST15I. A MICRO USB WALL CHARGER IS HOWEVER A WELCOME ADDITION TO THE COLLECTION IN SOME WAYS, SO ONE CAN BE KEPT PLUGGED IN AT HOME, ONE IN OFFICE, ONE IN THE TRAVEL BAG, ETC,.
      
      
      ALL IN ALL, A NICE PACKAGE! A PURCHASE THAT WOULD BRING YOU UP TO DATE WITH THE FLAGSHIP SMARTPHONE EXPERIENCE, FOR A FRACTION OF THE PRICE.

label: Moto G
Sentences:
EXTREMELY A KILLER FONE FOR THE PRICE.
      
      I GOT IT 2 DAYS BEFORE ASSURED DATE OF DELIVERY.
      
      FOR THIS PRICE YOU CANNOT GET A BETTER PHONE.
      
      MORE THAN WHAT YOU GET IN THIS PHONE, WHAT YOU DO NOT GET HERE WOULD BE MORE RELEVANT.
      
      1. CAMERA IS GOOD ONLY IN FULL BRIGHT LIGHT AND REALLY BAD IN LOW LIGHT CONDITIONS.
      
      2. MEMORY IS 1GB RAM AND 8/16 GB NON-EXPANDABLE. SO YOU CANNOT AFFORD TO HAVE ALL YOUR FOTOS, MUSIC ETC REDUNDANTLY.
      
      3. SPEAKER PHONE IS NOT THAT GREAT, SO IF YOU ARE AVID USER OF SPEAKER FONE, THINK TWICE.
      
      4. BATTERIES ARE FIXED, SO IF YOU HAVE HABIT OF INSTALLING ALL CRAP APPS AND YOUR PHONE HANGS FREQUENTLY. BE CAREFUL WITH FIXED BATTERY PHONES, WHEN YOUR PHONE HANGS YOU MAY NOT BE ABLE TO RESTART BY REMOVING THE BATTERIES AND MUST JUST WAIT PATIENTLY.
      
      
      APART FROM ABOVE,
      
      1. BATTERY LASTS FOR WHOLE DAY & MORE FOR AVG TALK TIME, AVG WIFI USE (FOR MAILS & MESSAGES ) NOT FOR STREAMING AND HEAVY DOWNLOADS.
      
      2. THERES AN OPTION TO ENABLE AND DISABLE THE SIM YOU WISH TO USE FOR DATA TRANSFER & YOU CAN SET LIMIT FOR THE SAME. SO YOU GET WARNING IF YOU CROSS THE LIMIT. YOU CAN USE 2G OR 3G CONNECTION OPTIONALLY. THIS IS GREAT WHEN YOU HAVE LIMITED 3G PLAN AND UNLIMITED 2G PLAN.
      
      3. 4.3 KITKAT UPGRADE IS IMMEDIATELY AVAILABLE AND UI CHANGES ARE VERY GOOD.
      
      4. DISPLAY QUALITY IS EXTREMELY GOOD.
      
      5. DEFAULT AVAILABILITY OF SENDING SMS WHEN YOU CUT CALL IS EXTREMELY USEFUL AND INTUTIVE.
      
      6. I'M FROM TRICHY, A TIER 2 CITY IN TAMILNADU. I WAS WONDERING, HOW WILL MY SERVICING OF PHONE BE TAKEN CARE. SURPRISINGLY, I WAS SENT WITH THE BILL, AN ADDRESS OF LOCAL SERVICE POINT IN TRICHY. I HARDLY DOUBT ABOUT THE NEED FOR SUCH A SERVICE POINT, FOR THE PHONE SEEMS TO BE VERY GOOD.
      
      7. CLEAN MASTER IS ONE INCREDIBLE FREE APP WHICH WILL BE VERY HELPFUL FOR MAKING RAM FREE, WITH LEAST EFFORT.
      
      
      I'M NOT A GAMER SO I CANT SAY MUCH ABOUT SPEED AND RESPONSE. AS SUCH FOR ALL BASIC OPERATIONS, THE FONE WORKS LIKE A CHARM.
