label: Nokia Lumia 620
Sentences:
I PURCHASHED THIS PRODUCT FROM FLIPKART 2 WEEKS BACK AND AS SCORES OF PEOPLE HAVE HIGHLIGHTED, THEIR SERVICE IS REALLY GOOD. I GOT THE PHONE SHIPPED WITHIN 3 WORKING DAYS OF PLACING ORDER.
      
      
      NOW ABOUT THE PHONE ITSELF, LUMIA 620 LOOKS ELEGANT AND ITS CLEAR BLACK SCREEN STANDS OUT. SO DOES THE WINDOWS 8 LIVE TILE INTERFACE.THE PROCESSOR IS FAST BUT SOMETIMES IT BECOMES SLOW WHILE DOING MULTITASKING. I HAVENT PLAYED GAMES ON THIS YET SO CANT TALK ABOUT THAT.
      
      
      BATTERY BACK UP IS NOT GREAT EVEN FOR A SMARTPHONE STANDARD. THE PHONE HANGS UP SOMETIMES AND RESTARTS ITSELF. (WINDOWS ACHILES HEEL)
      
      
      CAMERA QUALITY IS NOT THAT GREAT AND FRONT CAMERA REMINDS THAT OF NOKIA 6600.
      
      HOWEVER, FEATURES LIKE CINEMAGRAPH, PANORAMA ETC ARE DECENT.
      
      AUDIO QUALITY IS GOOD (ESPECIALLY CALLS). NOKIA HAS IMPROVED ON THIS FRONT.
      
      
      THE APP STORE FOR WIDOWS IS EVOLVING BUT NOT AS EXHASUTIVE AS THE ANDROID OR APPLE ECOSYSTEM. BUT ALL MAJOR REQUIRED APPS ARE AVAILABLE THERE.
      
      
      OVERALL, THE PHONE IS A DECENT BUY. BUT WONT RATE IT AS AWESOME EVEN AT THIS PRICE RANGE.

label: Nokia Lumia 620
Sentences:
I'M NOT A CERTIFIED BUYER FROM FLIPKART BUT I WOULD LIKE TO SHARE MY THOUGHTS FOR THE MOBILE!
      
      HERE WE GO-
      
      
      PROS-
      
      1.AMAZING GUI - DESPITE THE NEGATIVITY, ITS A VERY AMAZING PHONES. GENERALLY I THOUGHT THE LIVE TILES WILL MAKE IT A BORING APPEARANCE BUT IT'S AMAZING. THE TILES JUST GIVE YOU A NEW LOOK AND IS BETTER WHEN IT STARTS MOVING(PEOPLE TILES CHANGING WITH DIFFERENT PEOPLES IMAGE).
      
      
      2.SMOOTH TRANSITION - I REPEATEDLY KEEP SWIPING THE SCREEN LEFT AND RIGHT BECAUSE THE TRANSITIONS ARE JUST SO SMOOTH AND BUTTERY.
      
      
      3.LOCK SCREENS- THOUGH ITS NOT A NEW FEATURE STILL I LOVE THE WAY IT APPEARS.
      
      
      4.REMOVABLE COVERS- THIS IS THE BIGGEST ADVANTAGE TO TO LUMIA 620. BY CHANGING THE BACK COVER YOU CAN SIMPLY GIVE A MORE TRENDY LOOK TO YOUR LUMIA 620.
      
      
      5. PREDICTIVE TEXT- WHENEVER I WRITE A TEXT ON SMS OR FACEBOOK CHAT OR ANY OTHER SOCIAL APPS THE PREDICTIVE TEXTS ARE JUST AMAZING. I DON'T NEED TO TYPE THE WHOLE LETTER AS IT SUGGESTS A BUNCH OF WORDS ON TYPING TWO OR THREE LETTERS.
      
      
      CONS-
      
      1. NO RADIO- THOUGH YOU MAY THINK THAT MUSIC PLAYER WILL DO THE WORK STILL SOMETIMES YOU MAY FEEL LIKE LISTENING TO RADIO TALKIES AND MUSIC WHICH IS ABSENT  IN LUMIA 620.
      
      
      2.CAN'T SEND MUSIC AND VIDEOS- USUALLY SENDING MUSIC AND VIDEOS VIA BLUETOOTH IS THE EASIEST FEATURE WE DISCOVER IN A CELLPHONE BUT ON LUMIA 620 ITS NOT. I LOOKED EACH AND EVERY OPTION BUT I JUST CAN'T SEND MY MUSIC VIA BLUETOOTH. THIS LEAVES A GR8 DISADVANTAGE.(IF ITS POSSIBLE THEN PLEASE WRITE A REVIEW)
      
      
      3.CAN'T PLAY MUSIC WHILE TALKING TO SOMEONE- ALTHOUGH THIS FEATURE IS NOT SO IMPORTANT STILL I PREFER THIS FEATURE TO BE AVAILABLE. BUT ITS ABSENT. ITS NO BIG DEAL.
      
      
      4.CAN'T RECORD CALLS- THIS IS A DISAPPOINTING THING. WHILE TALKING TO SOMEONE I DON'T GET THE OPTION TO RECORD THE CALLS AND THIS FEATURE IS EVEN AVAILABLE ON A RS.4000 CELL. I HOPE WINDOWS PHONE STORE SOLVES THIS ISSUE BY AVAILING SUCH CALL RECORDING APPS.
      
      
      5.WRITING TEXT IS A PAIN- WHEREVER YOU WRITE, SMS, CHAT, NOTE, CALENDER, INTERNET, ETC. TEXTS ARE A REAL PAIN, NOT BECOZ OF TYPING BUT BECOZ OF THE MISTAKE YOU MAY MAKE. SUPPOSE INSTEAD OF "HELLO" IF YOU HAVE WRITTEN "HELO" THEN INSERTING THE CURSOR JUST BEFORE THE 'O' IS NOT POSSIBLE. AS A RESULT, YOU WILL HAVE TO DELETE THE WHOLE TEXT. DISAPPOINTING :/
      
      
      THIS ARE SOME OF THE FEATURES THAT AMAZED ME AND ALSO DISAPPOINTED ME. BUT DON'T GET FINISHED HERE. THERE ARE LOT MORE THINGS ON LUMIA 620 WHICH WILL AMAZE YOU. SO JUST KEEP GAINING REVIEWS FOR THE MOBILE.
      
      
      OVERALL... ITS A SMART CHOICE FOR THOSE WHO ARE TIGHT IN BUDGET! BUT I GIVE IT A 3 STAR BECAUSE OF THE ABSENCE OF RADIO(EVEN DOWNLOADING A RADIO APP DIDN'T SOLVE MY PROBLEM), NOT BEING ABLE TO SEND SONGS AND VIDEOS VIA BLUETOOTH AND MAKING THE TEXT WRITING A BIT COMPLICATE AND TOUGH(SO DON'T MAKE TYPING MISTAKE!)

label: Nokia Lumia 620
Sentences:
IN THE FEW DAYS USAGE , I FOUND THAT
      
      
      1)  THE POWER / SCREEN OFF (MIDDLE) BUTTON IS VERY HARD TO PRESS . WHENEVER I PRESS , IT PROPMTS ME TO SHUT DOWN THE PHONE . SCREEN OFF WILL  NOT WORK MANY TIMES
      
      
      2) ITS VERY DIFFICULT TO OPEN THE PANEL FOR CHANGING THE SIM/SD CARD . I HAVE TO THE PRESS THE CAMERA LENS HARD IN ORDER TO SEPARATE THE PANEL FROM THE BODY
      
      
      3)  THE BATTERY IS LOOSELY FITTED ON TO THE BODY.
      
      
      4)  USING WINDOWS 8 IS THE BEST PART.

label: Nokia Lumia 620
Sentences: LUMIA 620 IS A GREAT PRODUCT BUT BIG DRAWBACK IS THE BATTERY , ON AVERAGE USE BATTERY HARDLY MAKES IT TO NIGHT  AFTER A EARLY MORNING FULL CHARGE , DISPLAY IS GREAT , WINDOWS 8 IS COOL , CAMERA IS AVERAGE . HAVE BEEN USING IT FOR A MONTH , TOUCH FUNCTION IS GOOD BUT AT TIMES NOTICED IT DOES LAG , AT TIME UNABLE TO ATTEND TO INCOMING CALLS BECAUSE THE ANSWERS BUTTON DOES NOT WORK HAVE TO LOCK AND UNLOCK THE PHONE FOR IT TO WORK , SO FAR HAVE SEEN THE PHONE SWITCH OFF BY ITSELF 3 TIMES WITH ENOUGH BATTERY BACK UP. WHEN I RECEIVED THE PHONE IT WOULD NOT DETECT THE SD CARD , HAD CALLED UP FLIPKART , AS PER THEIR ADVICE HAD TO RESTORE TO FACTORY SETTING AND THEN SWITCH OFF AND SWITCH ON THE PHONE FOR THE SD CARD TO BE DETECTED BY THE PHONE , THKS FLIPKART .

label: Nokia Lumia 620
Sentences:
MY REVIEW IS AS FOLLOWS:
      
      PROS:
      
      1. PHONE LOOKS BEAUTIFUL AND WP8 LOOKS EVEN BETTER.
      
      2. BATTERY LIFE IS DECENT. LASTS ROUGHLY 20 HRS WITH DATA ON FOR NEARLY 13 HRS (SWITCH IT OFF AT NIGHT).
      
      3. CALL QUALITY AND SOUND QUALITY IS GOOD.
      
      4. INTERNET BROWSING IS FAST.
      
      5. PHONE DOES NOT LAG EVEN WHILE PLAYING GAMES
      
      6. VERY GOOD CAMERA APPS AVAILABLE FOR THOSE WHO ARE INTERESTED IN PHOTOGRAPHY (LOMOGRAM, CAMERA 360, SMART SHOOT, CINEMAGRAPH, ETC.)
      
      
      CONS:
      
      1. NOT AS MANY APPS AS ANDROID OR IOS. MS NEEDS TO DO SOMETHING TO GET DEVELOPERS INTERESTED.
      
      2. AT JUST 3-4K MORE, LUMIA 720 SOUNDS A BETTER PROPOSITION.
      
      3. 512 MB RAM MEANS GAMES LIKE TEMPLE RUN NOT AVAILABLE - THATS OK WITH ME SINCE I AM NOT TOO MUCH OF A GAMER - BUT FOR MANY IT MATTERS.
      
      4. CAMERA FLASH IS TOO BRIGHT RESULTING IN BRIGHT PATCHES IN PHOTOS. I GET AROUND BY USING NOKIA SMARTSHOOT. I HAVE HEARD THIS HAS BEEN FIXED WITH THE NOKIA UPDATE, BUT YET TO TEST IT.
      
      5. NO FM RADIO HARDWARE SUPPORT..... ALL LUMIA PHONES HAVE THE HARDWARE FOR IT EXCEPT 620. EVEN 520 (BASICALLY IT MEANS THAT AFTER THE GDR2 PHONE UPDATE FROM WP8, FM RADIO WILL BE ENABLED FOR ALL LUMIAS EXCEPT 620) - WHAT THE HELL WAS NOKIA THINKING?????
      
      A GOOD MID-LEVEL PHONE IF YOU ARE NOT A HEAVY USER LIKE ME (INTERNET BROWSING, NEWS, FEW GAMES). BUT IF YOU CAN JUST STRETCH YOUR BUDGET A BIT, PROBABLY 720 MIGHT MAKE MORE SENSE.

label: Nokia Lumia 620
Sentences:
NOKIA LUMIA 620 AND SAMSUNG GALAXY S ADVANCE WERE IN SAME PRICE RANGE, BUT I BOUGHT LUMIA 620 (WP8) FOR NOKIA HW AND MS OS.
      
      
      PROS:
      
      1. GOOD H/W.
      
      2. BLUETOOTH FILE TRANSFER ALLOWED.
      
      3. MEMORY CARD ALLOWED.
      
      4. ALL HARD BUTTONS ARE PART OF OUTER CHANGEABLE CASE.
      
      
      CONS:
      
      I FIND SOME S/W LIMITATIONS OF WP8 LIKE :
      
      1. MANY VIDEO FORMATS ARE NOT SUPPORTED BY DEFAULT PLAYER. AND NO OTHER PLAYER APP IS AVAILABLE.
      
      2. VOLUME CONTROL IS COMMON FOR RING VOLUME, MUSIC AND VIDEO PLAYER.(AND SOME TIMES YOU CANNOT CONTROL THE VOLUME)
      
      3. NO OTHER BROWSER OPTION AVAILABLE EXCEPT IE10 AND UC BROWSER(FAR BETTER).
      
      4. CANNOT USE NFC TO TRANSFER CONTENT WITH OTHER NFC ENABLED MOBILES (NOKIA TO NOKIA NEVER TRIED).
      
      5. MAY GET BORED DUE TO 1 HOME SCREEN THOUGH TILE SIZE AND POSITION CAN BE CHANGED.
      
      6. TILES ARE NOT INTERACTIVE AS GADGETS... THEY ARE JUST FOR DISPLAY OF DYNAMIC CONTENTS.
      
      7. NO FILE EXPLORER.
      
      
      SO ALL I WANT TO SAY IS GO FOR ANDROID IF ANY OF THE ABOVE S/W LIMITATION IS UNACCEPTABLE FOR YOU.

label: Nokia Lumia 620
Sentences:
NOKIA'S CONTRIBUTION TO LUMIA 620 IS GOOD. DECENT HARDWARE CONFIGURATION. BUT WINDOWS OS HAS SEVERAL CONS TOO.
      
      1.NO FILE EXPLORER. UNABLE TO BROWSE THROUGH FILES IN THE PHONE OR SD CARD.
      
      2. BACKGROUND TASKS REMAIN IN SUSPENDED STATE. IT MIGHT BE GOOD FOR SOME APPLICATIONS BUT NOT ALL.
      
      3. AFTER I TRANSFERRED A PDF FILE TO MY PHONE BY BLUETOOTH I HAD NO CLUE WHERE WAS THE FILE STORED AND IT NOT POSSIBLE TO SEARCH FOR A PARTICULAR DOCUMENT.
      
      4. CALL DURATION IS NOT RECORDED.
      
      5. CALL RECORDING IS NOT POSSIBLE, EVEN A BASIC PHONE HAS IT
      
      6. NETWORK RECEPTION IS NOT THAT GOOD AS ITS EXPECTED FROM NOKIA
      
      7. BATTERY IS SLIGHTLY ABOVE AVERAGE.
      
      PROS
      
      PROS ARE
      
      1. SWIFT PERFORMANCE
      
      2. AWESOME GAMES
      
      3. GREAT GRAPHICS

label: Nokia Lumia 620
Sentences:
WELL THIS IS MY FIRST REVIEW AND I HAVE BEEN USING THIS PHONE FOR PAST 20 DAYS. I PURCHASED WHITE COLOR LUMIA 620 FROM LOCAL DEALER AT 13,800, SO ON FLIPKART AT 14230 WITH 16 GB MEMORY CARD IS GREAT DEAL. I HAVE MIGRATED FROM ANDROID.
      
      
      NOW THESE ARE SOME OF THE POINTS, WHICH I FEEL MUST BE KNOWN TO ITS PERSPECTIVE BUYERS:
      
      
      1- BUILD: THE BUILD QUALITY IS EXCELLENT. IT GRIPS WELL IN YOUR HAND AND HAVE ROUND CORNERS. THE BACK COVER FEELS LIKE IT HAS SOME BACK GUARD PUT ON IT.
      
      
      2- CAMERA: EXCELLENT IN OUTDOORS, MODERATE IN INDOORS WITH LIGHTS ON, FLASH IS NOT UP TO THE MARK AT INDOORS. FEW PICTURES WERE TOO GRAINY AT INDOORS.
      
      
      3- SPEAKERS: EXCELLENT, LOUD CRYSTAL CLEAR SOUND. NOKIA HAS REALLY IMPROVED IN TERMS OF SPEAKER QUALITY.
      
      
      4- SCREEN: GOOD, CLEARBACK DISPLAY WITH OPTION TO AUTO ADJUST BRIGHTNESS.
      
      
      5- BATTERY: LASTS MORE THAN A DAY WITH CONSTANT WIFI ON AND MODERATE USAGE.
      
      
      6- CALL QUALITY: GOOD WITH NO DISTORTION HEARD AT BOTH ENDS.
      
      
      7- LAG: ALTHOUGH THIS HAS ONLY 512 MB RAM IT DOES NOT LAG.
      
      
      CONS OR ISSUES
      
      
      1- RINGER VOLUME: RING VOLUME AND MEDIA PLAYER VOLUME ARE LINKED, IF WHILE PLAYING SONG YOU TURN THE VOLUME DOWN TO 15 ON THE SCALE OF 0-30, THE RINGTONE ALSO AUTOMATICALLY TURNS DOWN TO 15 SO YOU MIGHT MISS SOME CALLS.
      
      
      2- VIDEO CALLS: IT DOES NOT SUPPORT 3G NETWORK VIDEO CALLS THOUGH IT HAS FRONT CAMERA. FOR MAKING VIDEO CALLS YOU MUST USE APPS LIKE SKYPE.
      
      
      3- APPS LIST: ONE YOU INSTALLED 40 OR SO APPS IT AUTOMATICALLY SORTS THEM IN A-Z LIST, NO WAY TO TURN IT OFF.
      
      
      4- SMART DIALER: SUPPOSE YOU WANT TO CALL "HOME" SO YOU CAN`T PRESS 4663 AND LIST DOWN MATCHING SUGGESTIONS. YOU MAY USE APPS LIKE TRUE DIALER TO ACHIEVE THIS BUT WINDOWS OS DOES NOT ALLOWS THEM ACCESS TO MISSED AND RECEIVED CALLS.
      
      
      5- FILE MANAGER: THIS PHONE DOES NOT HAVE A FILE MANAGER. SUPPOSE YOU HAVE COPIED 10 PDF/WORD FILES FROM YOUR PC TO PHONE, IT MIGHT NOT RECOGNIZE ALL OF THEM AND MIGHT SHOW ONLY SOME OF THEM IN PDF READER/OFFICE.
      
      
      6- APPS: MANY IMPORTANT APPS ARE NOT YET PORTED TO WINDOWS 8 FROM ANDROID. MANY APPS WHICH ARE FREE IN OTHER OS ARE NOT FREE.
      
      
      7- TORRENT: IT DOES NOT SUPPORT TORRENT CLIENT TO DOWNLOAD TORRENTS DIRECTLY TO PHONE.
      
      
      8- PHOTO ON DIALER: WHILE DIALING ANY CONTACT IT DOES NOT SHOW ITS PHOTO ON SCREEN, WHILE RECEIVING CALL IT DOES SHOWS PHOTO.
      
      
      9- FLASH PLAYER: IT SUPPORTS ADOBE FLASH PLAYER LITE ONLY, SO YOU CAN`T WATCH LIVE STREAMS LIKE LIVE IPL STREAMED ON YOUTUBE. NORMAL  YOUTUBE UPLOADED VIDEOS WORKS FINE.
      
      
      10- MEDIA PLAYER: NOKIA PLAYER IS GOOD BUT DOESN`T SUPPORTS MKV FORMAT. MX PLAYER IS YET NOT AVAILABLE FOR WINDOWS PLATFORM.
      
      
      11- CRASHES: WHILE VISITING SITES WHICH USE HEAVY FLASH, BROWSER MAY CRASHES DISPLAYING 3 SEC VIDEO OF SAYING "RECOVERING MEMORY". IT HAPPENED TO ME QUITE A FEW TIMES.
      
      
      12- BACK COVER: WHITE BACK COVER IS GOOD BUT GETS DIRTY VERY SOON GIVING IT AN OLD LOOK.
      
      
      13- CALL LOG: IT DOES NOT DISPLAY CALL SUMMARY AFTER CALL. DOES NOT DISPLAY HOW MUCH YOU TALKED ON ONE PARTICULAR CALL. ALSO IF YOU CALLED "HOME" 10 TIMES IT SHOWS "HOME", "HOME", "HOME" ..... 10 TIMES.
      
      
      14- MESSAGING: GOOGLE CHAT IS NOT INTEGRATED TO IT, YOU NEED TO DOWNLOAD EXTERNAL APP TO CHAT. SINCE MANY OF US USE GOOGLE SERVICES, I FELT THIS OPTION SHOULD BE THERE.
      
      
      15- AUTO ROTATE: THERE IS NO WAY TO TURN AUTO-ROTATE OFF.
      
      
      16- RING PROFILES: THERE ARE NOT ANY RING PROFILES SUCH AS GENERAL, SILENT, MEETING ETC. YOU HAVE TO TURN VOLUME ALL WAY DOWN TO ACHIEVE SILENT/VIBRATE ONLY MODE.
      
      
      17- NO FM
      
      
      18- NO NOTIFICATION PANEL
      
      
      19- TO SKIP FORWARD A SONG TO PARTICULAR INSTANT ON SONG TIMELINE YOU CANT TAP ON IT, YOU HAVE TO PRESS AND HOLD NEXT.
      
      
      20- CALLING SOMEONE IS A LENGTHY PROCESS... Z...Z...Z..
      
      
      VERDICT: ALTHOUGH LUMIA 620 HAS FEW ISSUES, BUT THESE ARE NOT SHORTCOMINGS, THEY CAN BE FIXED AS AN UPDATE OR NEW APPS CAN BE MADE TO ACHIEVE MORE FUNCTIONALITY.
      
      
      SO IF YOU HAVE NOT USED ANDROID AND WANTS TO OWN A SMARTPHONE OR IF YOU ARE NOT A PRO USER, THIS PHONE IS FOR YOU. AMAZING UI, GREAT FEATURES FOR NORMAL USE, MID RANGE BEST SMARTPHONE YOU CAN GET.   :)

Sentences:
YES I HAVE JELLY BEAN OS GALAXY ,BLACKBERRY AND IPHONE.. FASCINATED BY REVIEWS AND DESIRE TO TRY SOMETHING NEW I REACHED FOR THIS MOBILE.
      
      THE SPECS ARE GOOD VALUE FOR MONEY, DECENT CAMERA , NOKIAS STURDY BRAND AND FRESH OS WAS SIMPLY IRRESTITABLE TO LET IT GO..I LOVE TINKERING WITH APPS AND EVERY NOW AND THEN TRY NEW APPS..
      
      STRONG POINTS
      
      1) FAST OS NO HANGING ( BUT U WILL ENCOUNTER THEM OCCASIONALLY ONCE A WEEK)
      
      2) NOKIA MUSIC AND PODCASTS ARE AMAZING. EXPANDS THE POSSIBILITY OF THE PHONE TO WHOLE NEW LEVEL.
      
      3) PEOPLE APP INSTEAD OF CONTACTS IS WELCOME AND WILL CLEAR THE CLUTTER.
      
      4)THE FEEL AND FINISH OF THE PHONE IS PREMIUM
      
      5) THE SCREEN IS VERY BRIGHT (ONE OF THE BEST) HAS SUNLIGHT READABILITY
      
      
      6) ON BLUETOOTH IT READS THE SMS FOR YOU AND YOU CAN REPLY IN SPEECH.. VERY NICE WHILE DRIVING
      
      WHAT SCREWS IS IT...
      
      
      1)TO CALL SOME ONE IS A PAIN.
      
      UNLOCK PHONE - PRESS PHONE- GO DOWN PRESS CONTACT BOOK- PRESS SEARCH BUTTON- TYPE NAME- SELECT NAME- PRESS CALL MOBILE ( 7 STEPS TO CALL THE PERSON , WINDOWS IS CRAZY, I MEAN I HAD E71 AND LONG PRESS 2 WOULD GET TO MY HOME NUMBER IN ONE SEC.. OHH PLEASE U CANT PIN THE WHOLE DIRECTORY TO FIRST PAGE).. THE BASIC FUNCTION OF PHONE IS PAINFULL..
      
      
      2) DRAINS BATTERY - WITH 3G ON, BLUETOOTH ON AND ALL OTHER LIKE WIFI, GPS, NFC BACKGROUND APPS OFF THE PHONE LASTS MERE 8 HOURS. I HAVE STARTED USING EVERYTHING ON SOS BASIS. I SWITCH ON AND OFF BLUETOOTH, WIFI AND 3G ATLEAST 20 TIMES A DAY.. I MEAN WHO WANTS TO TAKE TENSION YAAR 3G ON RAH GAYA BATTERY KHATAM HO JAYEGA IN LIFE..
      
      
      3) IT ROBS AND DOESNT TELL YOU.. SOME SHITTY BACKGROUND GOES ON. MY FIRST MONTH DATA BILL WAS RS 4565, I AM ON POST PAID AND MY 3G EXCEEDED IN LIKE A WEEK. DAT SENSE IS USELESS.
      
      ONLY WAY IT WORKS IS LIKE BANIYA YOU HAVE SWITCH ON DATA AND SWITCH OFF DATA. ANDROID GIVES SO MUCH FLEXIBILTY HERE.
      
      
      4) CAMERA HAS A GOOD DELAY OF 2 SECS, THATS WHY THEY HAVE SHITTY APPS TO CATCH PERFECT MOMENT COS THEY KNOW U HAVE ALREADY LOST IT. QUALITY IN LITTLE SUNLIGHT OR DARKNESS IS VERY VERY POOR. MAY BE DOES A GOOD JOB IN STUDIO LIGHTING.
      
      
      5) TRY TO SAVE A NUMBER DURING CALL, U WILL BE SHITTING BRICKS..
      
      
      6) CUT PASTE FUNCTION IS VERY POOR, AFTER YOU PASTE IT, IT GETS DELETED AND U HAVE TO GO AND COPY IT  AGAIN TO PASTE ONE MORE TIME. NO CLIPBOARD IS AVAILABLE (ANDROID I MISS YOU SO MUCH)
      
      
      7) FILE MANAGER .. INCREDIBLY NEEDED APP. I DONT KNOW WHERE MY FILES ARE AND I CAN T SEND OR ACCESS THEM.. IT S SCARY IF U CANT SEE UR PHONE FILES NAKED.. NOT EVEN A BASIC FILE DIRECTORY..( YES YES SOME GENIUS WILL GIVE IT TO ME IN SOME CRAZY UPDATE OR I HAVE TO PAY AND DO AWAY WITH EXISTING ONES)
      
      
      FOR SAKE OF BREVITY I AM NOT TOUCHING - GAMES , APPS AVAILABILITY, PHONE SECURITY, TRUE CALLER DOESNT WORK AND SO MANY OTHER MUNDANE THINGS
      
      
      I CONCLUDE .. THAT THE ASSUMPTION YOU WILL BUY THE PHONE AND FEE LIKE MAHARAJA IS JUST A MIRAGE.. U WILL BE STRUGGLING WITH IT AND EVENTUALLY ACCEPT IS YOUR FATE

label: Nokia Lumia 620
Sentences:
19 MAY 2013
      
      I HAD BEEN USING SAMSUNG GALAXY S ADVANCE,FOR 7 MONTHS. LAST WEEK IT WAS STOLEN SO HAD TO BUY A NEW PHONE. AFTER SEEING SUCH A GOOD REVIEWS ON FLIPKART AND SOME OTHER WEBSITES, I BOUGHT LUMIA 620 . IT IS REALLY AN AWESOME PHONE. EASILY FITS IN HAND. CLEAR BLACK DISPLAY MAKES VIEWING EXPERIENCE AWESOME. MUSIC QUALITY IS ALSO GOOD BUT EAR PHONES ARE CHEAP. THEY DO NOT FIT IN EARS. THE PHONE DOESN'T HAVE FM. ABSENCE OF FILE MANAGER MAKES THIS PHONE USELESS. MANY FILES DISAPPEARS EVEN THESE ARE SUPPORTED FILE TYPES (MP4, JPEG). SOME USERS HAVE SAID THAT 512MB OF RAM IS ENOUGH FOR WP. THAT'S NOT TRUE. IT DOES LAG MANY TIMES. NOT TO TALK ABOUT MULTI TASKING, IT EVEN CAN NOT KEEP TWO TABS ALIVE. WHEN I SWITCH BACK TO BACKGROUNDED TAB/APP, THE TAB OR APP RE-STARTS. CAMERA QUALITY IS ALSO NOT AS GOOD AS OF S ADVANCE'S. FRONT CAMERA STANDS NOWHERE IN FRONT OF THAT OF S ADVANCE. WP OS IS NEW SO IT DOESN'T HAVE SO MANY APPS. MANY FAMOUS AND POPULAR APPS & GAMES ARE MISSING EVEN AFTER TWO YEARS OF IT'S INCEPTION. IT DOESN'T HAVE SAME OR ALIKE STATUS BAR OF ANDROID. PHOTO UPLOADING IS NOT SUPPORTED BY IE IN MOBILE VERSION OF FACEBOOK SITE. CAN'T SEND SONGS OR VIDEOS THROUGH WHATSAPP. IF WANT TO SEND ANY AUDIO, WILL HAVE TO RECORD. NO OPTION OF SENDING PRE-RECORDED AUDIO/VIDEO. BATTERY JUICE IS NOT ENOUGH TO LAST MORE THAN 5 HOURS IN CONTINUOUS 3G BROWSING.
      
      
      THIS PHONE IS GOOD ONLY IN TECHNICAL SPECIFICATION, BUT PRACTICALLY IT IS NOT MUCH GOOD. I AM THINKING OF SELLING MY LUMIA 620. GALAXY S ADVANCE AND MICROMAX A116 CANVAS HD ARE BETTER OPTION IN SAME PRICE RANGE.
      
      
      20 MAY 2013
      
      THE PHONE HAS STARTED SHOWING ITS COLOURS. TODAY, IT REBOOTED 3 TIMES, AUTOMATICALLY. NOKIA SHOULD HAVE PATENTED THE 'HANGING' AND 'RE-BOOTING' PROBLEM.

label: Nokia Lumia 620
Sentences:
AFTER USING NOKIA LUMIA 620 WINDOWS PHONE FOR THE PAST 1.5 MONTHS A LOT OF GOOD AND BAD THINGS CAME TO LIGHT. THE MAIN REASON BEHIND BUYING A WINDOWS PHONE, AFTER A LOT OF DIS-ENCOURAGEMENT FROM FRIENDS AND FAMILY, WAS THE THE METRO UI. THE ONE-TONE COLOUR COMBINATIONS WITH DARK OR LIGHT BACKGROUND ALONG WITH THE LIVE-TILE MAKE THE PHONE AESTHETICALLY BEAUTIFUL. ON THAT, SMOOTH ANIMATION ACTS LIKE CHERRY ON TOP. THE USE OF TYPO IS NICE. SEGOE UI FONT GIVES WINDOWS PHONE THE-MAX-READABILITY.  THE INNOVATIVE IN-BUILD APPS, LIKE NOKIA OFFLINE MAPS AND CITY LANCE IS EYE-CANDY FOR TEC-FRICK USERS. MAILS SYNCHRONIZES PERFECTLY.
      
      NOKIA LUMIA 620 CAPTURES FRESH PICTURES AND IT OFFERS DOLBY DIGITAL SOUND QUALITY. BATTERY LIFE IS SIMILAR TO ALL SMARTS PHONE IN ITS RANGE BUT SURPRISINGLY IT RE-CHARGES PRETTY FAST. NOKIA HAS PLAYED ITS PART MODERATELY WELL EXCEPT NETWORK RECEPTION PROBLEM WHICH I AM FACING.
      
      THE MAIN HICCUPS START WHEN YOU START USING IT.
      
      1) IGNORE NUMBER/CONTACT: I CANNOT BLOCK A PHONE NUMBER OF MY MOST ANNOYING FRIEND WHO CALLS AT 2 O'CLOCK IN THE MORNING ON WEEKDAYS. I COULD NOT EVEN FIND A THIRD PARTY APP FOR IT.
      
      2) WE SHOULD ABLE TO PIN ANY SETTING OPTION TO THE START: IT TAKES 6 STEPS/ACTIONS TO UNLOCKING YOUR PHONE AND SWITCH ON/OFF BLUETOOTH IF U ARE NOT USING A THIRD PARTY APP TO CREATE BLUETOOTH SHORTCUT. WHO HAS THAT MUCH TIME?
      
      3) AUDIO FILES DOWNLOADED FROM THIRD PARTY APPS (WHATSAPP OR WECHAT) DO NOT SAVE IN ANY FOLDER.
      
      4) WINDOWS PHONE DEFAULT PLAYER IS NOT IMPRESSIVE. IT IS VERY DIFFICULT TO CREATE A PLAYLIST. I COULD NOT FIGURE IT OUT YET. YOU CAN MAKE A SONG AS UR FAVOURITE BUT YOU WON'T FIND A PLAYLIST NAMED 'FAVOURITES'. WHAT'S THE USE THEN? THERE IS A PROBLEM IN MULTIPLICATION OF AUDIO LIST. EACH SONG IN MY COLDPLAY FOLDER SHOWS 24TIMES!! I SEARCHED THE INTERNET AND FOUND THAT MANY PEOPLE ARE FACING THE SAME PROBLEM WITH NO REMEDY.
      
      5) CANNOT MOVE IMAGES FROM ONE ALBUM/FOLDER TO ANOTHER. YOU CANNOT CREATE FOLDER OR ALBUM FROM PHONE ITSELF.
      
      6) CUSTOMISABLE SOUND VOLUME:  THE MOST ANNOYING THING THAT I HAVE FOUND SO FAR IS THE SOUND VOLUME. IT DO NO HAVE SEPARATE VOLUME CONTROLLER FOR MUSIC/VIDEO PLAYER, GAMES AND RINGTONE. INSTEAD IT HAS ONE MASTER VOLUME CONTROLLER WHICH YOU CAN MANIPULATE BY PRESS THE VOLUME UP-DOWN BUTTONS ON THE PHONE BODY. IF YOU SET YOU PHONE VOLUME 30 THAT MEANS UR PLAYER, GAME SOUND AND YOUR RING TONE SOUND ALL SET TO VOLUME 30. IMAGINE YOU ARE LISTENING TO SONGS IN YOUR OFFICE WITH HEADPHONES ON, IN HIGH VOLUME, AND SUDDENLY SOMEONE CALLS YOU.
      
      7) USUALLY SLOW, SLOWER WHEN MULTITASKING. WHENEVER YOU ARE USING AN APP, LET?S SAY NOKIA DRIVE OR WHATSAPP OR INTERNET EXPLORER. WHENEVER YOU MINIMIZE THE APPLICATION AND THEN MAXIMIZE IT BACK IT TAKES SOME TIME TO RESUME. IT IS VERY ANNOYING WHEN YOU ARE IN A HURRY.
      
      8) PHONE HAS RESTARTED MULTIPLE TIMES EVEN WHEN I AM JUST USING WATSAPP OR VIEWING A TEXT MESSAGE. MY HANDSET DOES NOT HAVE MUCH DATA. 6GB FREE SPACE IN PHONE MEMORY AND 7/8GB FREE IN SD, STILL PHONE HAS FREEZED SEVERAL TIMES.
      
      
      9) *****IT HAS NETWORK RECEPTION PROBLEM******
      
      
      MY GIRLFRIEND IS USING LUMIA 820 WHICH IS COMPARATIVELY FASTER BUT SHE HAS FACED THE RESTART AND FREEZE PROBLEM SEVERAL TIMES. SHE ALSO FACES PROBLEM IN NETWORK RECEPTION.
      
      I WAS A GREAT FAN OF THE WINDOWS METRO UI? NOW I AM NOT. I WISH I HAD BOUGH SOMETHING ELSE.

label: Nokia Lumia 620
Sentences:
FIRST, WP8 IS NOWHERE CLOSE TO IOS OR ANDROID. THE TILE UI IS COOL BUT THAT'S ABOUT THE ONLY POSITIVE THING YOU CAN SAY ABOUT WP8. THERE'RE A COUPLE OF COOL APPS FROM NOKIA (DRIVE AND MUSIC) BUT THEY DON'T COMPENSATE FOR THE LACK OF APPS FOR A LOT OF OTHER THINGS A SMARTPHONE'S SUPPOSED TO DO. LET ME LIST OUT THE BAD STUFF -
      
      
      1) YOU ABSOLUTELY NEED TO CONNECT YOUR PHONE TO A PC TO MANAGE YOUR MUSIC.
      
      2) THERE'S NO FILE MANAGER APP. YOU CANNOT MANAGE STORAGE ON YOUR SD CARD WITHOUT CONNECTING TO A PC.
      
      3) YOU CAN UPLOAD PICS AND VIDEOS, DOCS AND APP LISTS DIRECTLY TO SKYDRIVE (YOU GET 7 GB OF FREE CLOUD STORAGE) BUT THERE'S NO OPTION TO UPLOAD MUSIC. THAT WOULD BE VERY USEFUL TO USE WITH NOKIA'S UNLIMITED MUSIC SUBSCRIPTION FOR 6 MONTHS. YOU DOWNLOAD WHATEVER YOU WANT AND ARCHIVE IT IN THE CLOUD.
      
      4) THE FACEBOOK APP BY MS SUCKS. I DON'T SEE NOTIFICATIONS FOR MESSAGES OR FRIEND REQUESTS. OTHER FACEBOOK APPS ARE EQUALLY BAD.
      
      5) THERE'S NO QUORA APP (YET).
      
      6) CONTACT SYNC WITH GMAIL DOESN'T WORK. I CAN ONLY SEE EMPTY PROFILES OF GMAIL CONTACTS (NO PHONE NUMBERS OR EMAIL IDS).
      
      7) NO TEMPLE RUN. NO INSTAGRAM.
      
      8) FREQUENT CRASHES.
      
      
      FURTHER, THIS PHONE SUFFERS FROM HIGHER THAN NORMAL RETURN RATES.
      
      
      I MYSELF RECEIVED A DEFECTIVE PIECE. IT WORKED FOR A WEEK BUT WITH BATTERY PROBLEMS. BATTERY WOULD DRAIN OUT EXTREMELY QUICKLY - 100% TO 25% IN A COUPLE OF HOURS. SUDDENLY, YESTERDAY THE PHONE WOULDN'T TURN ON. I TRIED CHARGING IT FOR HALF-HOUR BUT IT STILL WOULDN'T TURN ON. I CALLED FLIPKART ABOUT THIS AND ALSO TOLD THEM ABOUT HOW IT COULD BE A FAULTY BATTERY.
      
      
      THEY ASKED ME TO CONFIRM THIS FROM A NOKIA CARE CENTER AND GET A DOA TO GET A REPLACEMENT. I'VE BEEN TO THREE NOKIA CARES AND PRIORITY CENTERS AND NOBODY WOULD GIVE ME A DOA CERTIFICATE. WHEN I INFORMED FLIPKART ABOUT THIS, THEY TOLD ME THEY ESCALATED THE ISSUE TO SOME HIGHER DEPARTMENT AND I SHOULD EXPECT TO RECEIVE A CALL FROM THEM IN A DAY. CALLED THEM TODAY AND THEY ASK ME TO WAIT ANOTHER 24 HRS.
      
      
      THE SAD THING IS THIS WAS SUPPOSED TO BE A GIFT TO MY MOM. I REALLY HOPE FLIPKART RESOLVES THIS SOMEHOW.

      NO DOUBT THIS IS A GOOD PACKAGE EXCEPT  THAT THE BATTERY NEVER LASTED MORE THAN 3 HOURS WHEN I USE THE INTERNET. WHAT DOES A SMARTPHONE MEANS WITHOUT INTERNET? AND WHEN MY INTERNET IS ON MY BATTERY COMPLETELY DRAINS IN JUST 3 HOURS. SO THINK BEFORE YOU BUY THIS PHONE.

Sentences: I PURCHASED LUMIA 620 FROM FLIPKART ABOUT 3 MONTHS BACK . FOR LAST  2  WEEKS , WE HAVE BEEN FACING SOME BIZZARE PROBLEM WITH THIS PHONE. IT REBOOTS AFTER EVERY 2 MINUTES. I HAVE VISITED NOKIA CARE CENTRE TWICE AND STILL NO SOLUTION. I WILL BEAR THE LOSS MYSELF AS NOKIA DOES NOT CARE ONCE THEY HAVE RECEIVED PAYMENT. YOU CANNOT EVEN SWITCH ON IT. label: Nokia Lumia 620
Sentences:
I PURCHASED THIS PHONE IN THE MONTH OF APRIL. EVER SINCE THEN, I HAVE BEEN VISITING NOKIA CARE CENTER EVERY WEEKEND DUE TO SOME OR OTHER ISSUES. THEY UPDATED MY PHONE MANY TIMES. EVEN THEN, SINCE THE ISSUES WERE NOT FIXED COMPLETELY, THEY SENT IT TO CHENNAI AND AFTER 12 DAYS, GAVE ME A REPLACEMENT. THEN IN THE NEW REPLACEMENT PHONE INTERNET SHARING WAS NOT WORKING. I WAS NOT ABLE TO SHARE THE INTERNET WITH MY LAPTOP. THEY SAID THEY HAVE TO SEND IT TO CHENNAI(HEAD OFFICE) AGAIN TO FIX IT. I HAVE TO SURRENDER MY PHONE AGAIN @NOKIA CARE AND WAIT TILL IT COMES BACK FROM CHENNAI. I WOULD NOT SAY LUMIA 620 IS A BAD ONE. AT THE SAME TIME, IT IS NOT A GREAT PHONE EITHER. THAT IS MY EXPERIENCE...FED UP OF VISITING NOKIA CARE CENTER EVERY WEEKEND. IF YOU ARE LUCKY YOU WILL GET A GOOD ONE. OTHERWISE, VISING NOKIA CARE CENTER WOULD BE YOUR WEEKEND ROUTINE....:)
      
      
      THE COMMON DRAWBACKS OF THIS PHONE ARE:
      
      1. PHOTOS TAKEN AT LOW LIGHT ARE NOT SO GOOD. IF FLASH IS USED, THE PICTURES BECOME WHITISH.
      
      2. THE PHONE HAS GOT DOLBY SOUND SYSTEM. BUT THE EAR PHONES NOKIA HAS GIVEN ARE CHEAP QUALITY ONES. WHAT IS THE POINT OF PROVIDING DOLBY SOUND SYSTEM WITH A BELOW AVERAGE EARPHONES? YOU HAVE TO SPEND AGAIN ON GOOD EAR PHONES.

label: Nokia Lumia 620
Sentences:
MY REVIEW WAS DELETED FROM FLIPKART BECAUSE SOMEONE COPY/PASTED MY REVIEW ON ANOTHER POPULAR MOBILE SITE... SO HERE IS MY REVIEW AGAIN AND I HAVE EDITED A BIT.
      
      
      I , LIKE ANY OTHER INDIAN WAITING 3 LONG MONTHS FOR THIS MOBILE AND WAS IT WORTH IT??? LETS FIND OUT....
      
      
      PROS:
      
      1. DECENT CAMERA
      
      2. SUPER SMOOTH AND SENSITIVE TOUCH COMPARABLE TO ANY OTHER HIGH END PHONE IN THE MARKET.
      
      3. GOOD RESOLUTION.
      
      4. AUDIO AND VIDEO RECORDING IS REALLY GOOD, TOP CLASS.
      
      
      CONS: ITS A LONG LIST AND MOST OF THE CONS ARE WP8 CENTRIC...SO HERE WE GO AND I WILL BE VERY HONEST..!
      
      1. MULI TASKING IS A COMPLETE JOKE ON THIS PHONE. ALL THE APPS ARE SUSPENDED IN THE BACKGROUND I.E THEY ARE NOT WORKING BUT JUST WAITING . SO IF YOU ARE DOWNLOADING A FILE AND WANT TO READ A PDF DOC SIMULTANEOUSLY... DONT EXPECT THIS PHONE TO KEEP DOWNLOADING THE FILE IN THE BACKGROUND WHILE YOU READ HAPPILY!! HOW ANNOYING IS DAT??
      
      
      2. INSTALLING APPS IS A REAL PAIN IN THE ASS... YOU HAVE TO LOG IN TO YOUR HOTMAIL ID TO INSTALL APPS.. DAT IS FINE BUT EVEN IF YOU HAV SAVED THE XPS (INSTALLATION FILE) ON YOUR MICRO SD CARD.. YOU NEED TO CONNECT TO YOUR WINDOWS LIVE ACCOUNT TO INSTALL IT..!! SO BASICALLY YOU CANNOT INSTALL AN APP OR GAME OFFLINE EVER!
      
      
      3. IE 10 CANNOT DOWNLOAD AN MP3 FILE ...IT CAN ONLY STREAM IT!!! SO THERE IS NO WAY FOR YOU TO DOWNLOAD ANY MP3 FROM YOUR FAVOURITE MUSIC SITE...LEGAL OR ILLEGAL..! IT CANNOT EVEN SAVE A MP3 IF IT HAS BEEN ATTACHED TO A MAIL IN YOUR INBOX!! YOU CANT DOWNLOAD ANY OTHER FILE FORMAT LIKE AVI, UTUBE VDOS , RAR, ETC "WOW""
      
      ( DOWNLOAD A BROWSER CALLED UC BROWSER, IT ALLOWS US TO DOWNLOAD MP3 FILES AND SAVE THEM IN THE MUSIC FOLDER )
      
      
      4. YOU CANNOT RENAME YOUR PICS, YOU NEED TO DOWNLOAD
      
      "PICTURE INFO" FROM THE STORE TO VIEW FILE DETAILS LIKE SIZE, RESOLUTION, ETC
      
      5. CANNOT SEND VIDEO FILE BY BLUETOOTH...
      
      7. WHATSAPP IS THERE AND INSTALLED BUT ITS STILL A REDUCED VERSION OF THE ANDROID ... THERE ARE NO SMILEYS!!
      
      
      8. NOKIA MUSIC ALLOWS YOU TO DOWNLOAD LATEST BOLLYWOOD SONGS FOR FREE(LEGAL) WOOOWWWW.... BUT THAT IS A HALF TRUTH.... THE SONGS WHICH ARE DOWNLOADED ARE COMPRESSED (A 5-6 MB SONG IS COMPRESSED TO 1.5 MB) AND SO THE QUALITY SUCKS..!!
      
      
      9. THERE IS NO SIGN OF A FILE MANAGER. SO BASICALLY YOU CANNOT VIEW OR KNOW WHERE ALL YOUR FILES ARE ON THE PHONE. SO IF YOU RECIEVE A FILE VIA BLUETOOTH FROM A FRIEND WHICH IS NOT A MP3 OR A VIDEO.... THOSE FILES GET TOTALLY LOST IN SUM MYSTERIOUS PLACE ON YOUR PHONE! THEY EAT UP SPACE AND U CANT EVEN SEARCH FOR THEM AND DELETE THEM.!
      
      
      10. YOU CANNOT EDIT ANY IMAGE ON YOUR PHONE.. THERE ARE APPS AVAILABLE THAT CAN EDIT BUT U NEED TO STAY CONNECTED TO THE INTERNET, UPLOAD YOUR PICS, EDIT THEM ONLINE AND THEN DOWNLOAD THEM AGAIN..!! (WHO HAS THE TIME FOR SUCH NONSENSE??)
      
      
      11. BATTERY LIFE IS BELOW PAR, AS OF NOW IT GIVES ME A BACKUP FOR ONLY A LITTLE MORE THAN 4 HOURS IF I AM ALWAYS CONNECTED THRU INTERNET . AND THIS FIGURE DOES NOT INCLUDE GAMING, PHONE CALLS, ETC..
      
      
      THESE ARE SOME OF THE BUGS THAT I CAN REMEMBER ON THE TOP OF MY HEAD..!! I HAVENT YET EVEN TESTED THE VERY FAMOUS MULTI TOUCH ISSUE..!! DONT GET ME WRONG... I REALLY WANT TO LIKE WP8 BUT BELIEVE ME MICROSOFT HAVE SCREWED UP BIG TIME.! I AM NOT EVEN BLAMING NOKIA FOR THE MESS!!
      
      
      THIS PHONE IS DUMB.. EVEN MY OLD 6600 SYMBIAN PHONE DAT I BOUGHT WAY BACK IN 2006 WAS WAY SMARTER THAN THIS MOBILE. YES IT DID NOT HAVE STEREO SOUND, BIG FAT RAM, 5 MP CAM OR A GIANT PROCESSOR.... BUT IT WAS SMART. IT WS INTUITIVE AND DID NOT FORCE ME TO DO THINGS A CERTAIN WAY..!! IT NEVER FORCED ME TO STAY CONNECTED TO INSTALL A SIMPLE APP ON MY PHONE!!
      
      IT HAD APPS THAT ALLOWED ME TO CREATE PLAYLISTS ON MY PHONE ITSELF...(REMEMBER POWERMP3 ??)  THE POINT IS.. IF YOU ARE SPENDING 15K ON A PHONE... IT SHOULD BE WORTH IT!! I CANNOT FORCE ANYBODY TO NOT BUY THIS PHONE BUT ATLEAST I CAN WARN PEOPLE ABOUT WHAT THEY ARE GETTING INTO. THE REVIEW MIGHT SOUND HARSH BUT THOSE THINGS HAVE ANNOYED ME.!!
      
      THANK YOU :)

label: Nokia Lumia 620
Sentences:
HI ALL,
      
      LET ME TELL ONE THING CLEARLY. DON'T BUY THIS PRODUCT BCOZ OF THE POSITIVE REVIEWS GIVEN IN FP. MOST OF THEM WHO GAVE + REVIEW HAVE USED THE MOBILE ONLY FOR FEW DAYS.I ALSO THOUGHT TO WRITE A POSITIVE REVIEW INITIALLY BUT WAITED TO PUT A VALID REVIEW AFTER USING THE MOBILE FOR QUITE SOME TIME.
      
      YOU WILL FEEL HAPPY ONLY FOR THE FIRST FEW DAYS. THE TOUCH WILL ATTRACT U INITIALLY.THERE WILL NOT BE ANY LAG OR HANGS.
      
      AFTER USING THE MOBILE FOR AROUND 2 MONTHS LET ME GIVE MY EXPERIENCE WITH THE PHONE.
      
      *THE PHONE LAGS AND HANGS A LOT. SOMETIMES IT RESTARTS BY ITSELF WITHOUT REASON. WHEN THE PHONE HANGS YOU CANT RESTART IT THROUGH BUTTONS. THERE IS NO REACTION FROM THE PHONE WHEN U GIVE LONG PRESS FOR THE POWER BUTTON. THE ONLY WAY YOU COULD RECOVER FROM THE HANG IS TO REMOVE THE BATTERY AND PUT IT AGAIN.THE PHONE WILL HANG WHEN THE NET IS ON AND YOU PLAY GAMES. EVEN LAGS WILL BE THERE WHEN TEXTING SMS. THESE PROBLEMS NOT FOUND INITIALLY.
      
      * THERE IS NO CONTROL OF VOLUME THROUGH S/W. YOU CAN MANAGE ONLY THROUGH VOLUME UP AND DOWN BUTTON. NOW MY VOLUME UP BUTTON GONE & I AM NOT ABLE TO INCREASE THE VOLUME.(NOKIA CARE IS ASKING RS.850 TO REPAIR THIS SAYING THAT PHYSICAL DAMAGES NOT COVERED UNDER WARRANTY).
      
      * WORST BATTERY BACKUP. AM CHARGING MY MOBILE TWICE A DAY. NO LONG CALLS. I USED TO SWITCH ON THE INTERNET WHENEVER NEEDED AND SWITCH IT OFF WHEN NOT IN USE. ALL OTHER STUFFS LIKE BLUETOOTH, WI-FI ETC WILL ALWAYS BE OFF. I HAVE ALSO BLOCKED ALL APPS THAT COULD RUN IN THE BACKGROUND. I HAVE ALSO SET TO SYNCHRONIZE THE MAILS MANUALLY. I PLAY GAMES A LITTLE. SO THE BATTERY SHOULD COME AT LEAST FOR 1DAY BUT BATTERY BACKUP COMES HARDLY FOR 12HOURS.THE MOBILE HAS TO BE PLUGGED IN ALWAYS TO USE IT CONTINUOUSLY.
      
      * THE SCREEN BACK BUTTON IS NOT FUNCTIONING PROPERLY. WHEN I PRESS IT, THE SCREEN GOES INSIDE. THESE PROBLEMS WERE NOT THERE INITIALLY.I HAVE TO SWITCH OFF THE SCREEN AND ON IT TO RECOVER.
      
      *THE PHONE GOT RESTARTED WHEN I DROPPED IT OVER A PILLOW WHICH MEANS THAT THE HARDWARE IS NOT STURDY.
      
      * LACK OF FILE MANAGER.AM NOT ABLE TO LOCATE THE PHOTOS SENT BY MY FRIEND THROUGH BLUETOOTH. THIS IS HOW SOFTWARE MANAGES FOR THE FILES US.
      
      * IN ALL THE APPLICATIONS, SELECT OPTION IS GIVEN BUT NOWHERE SELECT ALL OPTION IS GIVEN. WHEN I WANT TO SELECT ALL THE FILES TO DELETE I CANT DO IN SINGLE SHOT.
      
      * WHILE LISTENING TO SONGS, 'ADD TO NOW PLAYING' OPTION HAS BEEN GIVEN BUT WHEN I SELECT SONGS AND GIVE ADD TO NOW PLAYING THEN IT IS NOT GETTING ADDED TO THE PLAYLIST NOR THE SELECTED SONG IS PLAYED.
      
      * MUTE OPTION IS NOT GIVEN EITHER IN THE MUSIC PLAYER OR IN VIDEO PLAYER.
      
      * MAKING CALLS IS NOT USER FRIENDLY. YOU NEED TO HAVE "RAPDIALER" APP TO MAKE CALLS EASILY. CALL DURATION IS ALSO NOT PROVIDED WITH THE CALLER IN THE MOBILE.
      
      * IE IS OK BUT NOT THE BEST. POP-UP BLOCKER HAS BEEN ENABLED AND NO CONTROL IS GIVEN TO DISABLE IT. NO FORWARD BUTTON.SCREEN BACK BUTTON WORKS AS BACK BUTTON FOR IE. TABBED BROWSING IS NOT PROPER. IF YOU WANT TO OPEN ANOTHER WINDOW, YOU NEED TO MINIMIZE THE CURRENT WINDOW AND OPEN A NEW ONE. WHEN U GO BACK TO THE FIRST WINDOW THE PAGE REFRESHES AGAIN. WEBSITES WITH FLASH CONTENT IS NOT LOADING PROPERLY. YOU CANNOT DOWNLOAD FILES THROUGH IE. EVEN UC BROWSER IS NOT GOOD. NOT ABLE EXPORT FILES DOWNLOADED THROUGH UC.
      
      * THERE IS NO INBUILT PDF READER. YOU NEED TO DOWNLOAD IT FROM THE STORE WHICH IS FREE.
      
      * GOOD APPS AND GAMES ARE PAID.YOU NEED WI-FI TO DOWNLOAD SOME GOOD APPS/GAMES.
      
      * THE PHONE HEATS UP LIKE ANYTHING WHEN PLAYING GAMES OR USING NET.
      
      *  HEADSET IS OF AVERAGE QUALITY.
      
      * IF YOU WANT TO GO THROUGH A LIST YOU HAVE TO SCROLL A LOT. OFCOURSE SEARCH OPTION IS GIVEN. ONE PAIN POINT I EXPERIENCED IS THAT WHEN BROWSING I WANTED TO SELECT A VALUE FROM A BIG DROP DOWN LIST WHICH HAD SOME HUNDREDS OF VALUE,I HAD TO SCROLL FOR SOME MINUTES. BUT IN ANDROID YOU CAN HOLD UR FINGER AND GO THROUGH A LIST EASILY.
      
      * YOU NEED "RINGTONE MAKER" TO SET A CUSTOM RINGTONE FOR YOUR PHONE. OTHERWISE IT IS NOT EASY TO SET.
      
      * TOUCH WAS BUTTER SMOOTH ONLY FOR FEW DAYS.
      
      * INBUILT GAMES PROVIDED ARE OF WASTE.
      
      * AS IN ANDROID, YOU CANNOT SWIPE AND OPEN BLUETOOTH, WI-FI, MUSIC PLAYER ETC FROM THE TOP OF THE MAIN SCREEN WHEN IT IS RUNNING.
      
      * ON SCREEN PATTERN LOCKING MECHANISM IS NOT PROVIDED(SECURITY FEATURE).
      
      * EVEN THOUGH FRONT CAMERA IS THERE, VIDEO CALL OPTION IS NOT PROVIDED. I THINK WE NEED TO DEPEND ON SKYPE FOR THIS. NOT YET TRIED IT.
      
      * CAMERA, MAP AND SCREEN QUALITY IS GOOD.
      
      STILL MANY BASIC FEATURES ARE MISSING WHICH I MIGHT HAVE FORGOT WHILE WRITING THIS REVIEW.
      
      THE ONLY THING I FIND MORE USEFUL ABOUT THE PHONE IS THE OUTLOOK.I USED TO CHECK OFFICE MAILS WHICH AM FINDING IT EASY.
      
      INITIALLY I HAD MANY POSITIVE COMMENTS ABOUT THIS PHONE WHICH ALL TURNED INTO NEGATIVE AFTER USAGE OF 2MONTHS.
      
      THIS MOBILE IS NOT WORTH FOR 14K.I FEEL WORRIED THAT I HAD SPEND THIS MUCH MONEY ON THIS FAILURE MODEL.THE MOBILE IS WORTH ONLY FOR 8K.
      
      I WONT RECOMMEND THIS MODEL FOR ANYONE. MAY BE GO FOR LUMIA 520 WHICH YOU COULD GET IT FOR 9K.

label: Nokia Lumia 620
Sentences:
HI ALL,
      
      THANKS TO FLIPKART FOR DELIVERING THIS PRODUCT IN JUST 24 HRS.
      
      THIS PHONE HAS FEW DEMERITS
      
      1:- NO FM RADIO
      
      2:- CAN'T TYPE "$"
      
      3:- CAN'T CHARGE IN SWITCH OFF MODE, IT WILL GET AUTOMATICALLY SWITCH ON
      
      4:-CAN'T HANDEL THE SCREEN ROTATION WHILE YOU ARE AT YOUR BED OR COUCH
      
      5:- NOT ESSENTIAL APPLICATION ARE AVAILABLE.
      
      
      ALL THESE 5 POINTS HAS ALREADY BEEN CONFIRMED BY NOKIA CARE.
      
      
      GOOD FEATURES
      
      1:- NO HANGING ISSUE LIKE ANDROID PHONES
      
      2:- GREAT TOUCH AND CLARITY
      
      3:- EASY FOR OFFICIAL DOCUMENTS WITH OFFICE 2013

label: Nokia Lumia 620
Sentences:
HI,
      
      NOKIA PHONES LAG BEHIND ANDROID PHONES AND LUMIA IS ANOTHER GOOD EXAMPLE FOR THAT.
      
      HERE SOME OF THE PROBLEMS I AM FACING
      
      1. THE PHONE HANGS SUDDENLY AND EVEN POWER BUTTON DOESNT WORK THAT TIME. U NEED TO REMOVE AND KEEP THE BATTERY AGAIN TO RESTART.
      
      2. NO PROPER FILE MANAGER. IT IS REALLY A BIG PROBLEM AS U CANT FIND WHERE THE FILES TRANSFERRED THROUGH BLUETOOTH ARE GOING.
      
      3. NO PROPER PDF READER. ANDROID IS GIVING ACROBAT READER AND WINDOWS PHONES ARE GIVING A READER WHICH CANT EVEN DETECT THE FILES FROM SD CARD.
      
      4. NO PROPER MESSENGERS ALSO. THERE IS NO PROPER GOOGLE CHAT, FACEBOOK CHAT OR YAHOO MESSENGER APPLICATIONS TO CHAT WITH YOUR FRIENDS. ALL THE APPS AVAILABLE NOW ARE VERY SLOW AND HALF THE TIME THEY HAVE PROBLEM WITH CONNECTING TO INTERNET.
      
      5. EVEN THE CAMERA. EVEN TOUGH ITS PROVIDING LED  FLASH, PHOTO CLARITY IS NOT SO GREAT.
      
      6. PERSONALIZATION. YOU CANT HAVE A WALL PAPER AND THERE IS ONLY SCOPE FOR THE BORING WHITE AND BLACK BACKGROUND.
      
      BORING PHONE AND NOT SO GREAT PROS TO DISCUSS. XPERIA, GALAXY AND DESIRE OF HTC ARE BETTER OPTIONS FOR SURE.

label: Nokia Lumia 620
Sentences:
I AM USING NOKIA LUMIA 620 AND I FOUND THESE MANY FAULTS IN THIS OS:-
      
      1. ITS NOT PROPERLY ORGANISED I.E. VIDEOS ARE NOT SAVED IN VIDEOS FOLDER NOR WE CAN MOVE ANY VIDEOS FILE OR ANY OTHER FILE FROM ONE LOCATION TO OTHER(FOLDER).
      
      2. THERE ARE VERY FEW APPS FOR WINDOWS PHONE AS COMPARE TO ANDROID PHONE.
      
      3. WE CAN'T SEND VIDEOS FILE USING WATAPPS, HIKE ETC. NOR WE CAN USE VIBER FOR FREE CALLING
      
      4. YOU CAN'T ABLE TO SEE FILES(LIKE SOFTWARE) WHICH IS BEING TRANSFERRED FROM ONE PHONE TO WINDOWS PHONE.
      
      5. HEADPHONE QUALITY IS BAD I.E. YOU CAN'T HEAR THE SONGS WHILE TRAVELLING.
      
      
      ONLY ONE THING I LIKE ABOUT WINDOWS PHONE IS GUI . IT'S APPEAR ATTRACTIVE TO USE.
      
      
      AT-LAST I WANT TO CONCLUDE IF YOU ARE LOOKING FOR A SMARTPHONE I WOULD SUGGEST YOU TO GO WITH ANY OTHER PHONE OTHER THAN WINDOWS PHONE COZ WE ARE USING SMARTPHONE FOR PLAYING GOOD GAMES , MORE APPS, LISTENING MUSIC ETC. THIS ALL FEATURES ARE NOT PRESENT IN WINDOWS PHONE. SO PLEASE DON'T BUY IT .

I USED THIS  PHONE FOR A WEEK,I JUST FOUND THAT THE UI IS STUNNING.EVERYTHING ELSE LOOKS FINE.

      2)QUALITY APPS ,MISSING EVEN YOUTUBE DOWNLOADER(HAVE TO PAY 55 RS TO GET IT),

      5) IN WHATAPP ,YOU CANT DOWNLOAD VIDEOS TO YOUR GALLERY,ALSO CANT ATTACH IT.BUT YOU CAN FORWARD IT. (WHATSAPP PROBLEM)
      
      
      CONCLUSION IS - WINDOWS 8 NEEDS SOME TIME TO STABILIZE IN TERMS OF APP AND GAME.
      
      ALSO ,WINDOWS 8.1 UPDATE IS IN PROCESS ,IT WILL RELEASE BY END OF THIS YEAR.MY ADVICE IS TO AVOID WINDOWS 8 UNTIL END OF THIS YEAR.GO FOR ANDROID JELLY BEAN 4.1.X .ENJOY APSS AND GAMES FOR FREE.IN WINDOWS 8 EVEN IF YOU GET AFTER SOMETIME ,YOU HAVE TO PAY FOR QUALITY APPS AND GAMES.
      
      IF AT ALL YOU BUY WINDOWS 8 ,MAKE SURE THAT IT HAS HIGHER SPECIFICATION ,SO THAT YOU WILL RECEIVE 8.1 UPDATE .GO FOR SONY/HTC IN ANDROID SEGMENT .THEIR BUILD QUALITY IS SUPERIOR.
      
      THEY PROMISE BETTER ANDROID UPDATE,

      4) RAM: LOTS OF PEOPLE R WONDERING ABOUT 512 MB RAM BUT LET ME TELL YOU GUYS, IT IS NOT AN ISSUE. I HAVE INSTALLED HEAVY GAMES, DONE MANY SIMULTANEOUS TASKS BUT NEVER FELT ANY MEMORY PROBLEM. TRULY SPEAKING 512 MB OF WP RAM IS EQUAL TO 1 GB IN ANDROID PHONE.

label: Nokia Lumia 720
Sentences:
TO CREATE A PLAYLIST., FIRST PLAY A SONG, THEN GO BACK TO ALBUMS OR SONGS, PRESS AND HOLD UR FAVORITE SONGS OR ALBUMS., U WILL GET OPTIONS AS "ADD TO NOW PLAYING" SELECT IT. LIKEWISE DO FOR ALL YOUR FAVORITE ALBUMS/SONGS. AFTER SELECTING, JUMP TO NOW PLAYING SONG., SELECT OPTION., U WILL SEE"SAVE AS PLAYLIST". THATS IT., UR PLAYLIST IS SAVED. YOU CAN VIEW UR PLAYLIST IN MUSIC+VIDEOS. ALSO YOU CAN PIN UR PLAYLIST TO START SCREEN.
      
      
      U CAN SEND SONGS VIA BLUETOOTH, FIRST TURN ON UR BLUETOOTH IN MOBILE, PAIR IT, THEN SELECT THE SONG BY PRESS AND HOLDING IT. U WILL GET A SHARE OPTION. THEN SELECT BLUETOOTH. THATS IT.
      
      
      MANY FEATURES ARE HIDDEN IN WP. SO DONT BLAME THE OS. IF U DONT KNOW WHETHER A FEATURE IS AVAILABLE, GOOGLE IT.., U WILL FIND A SOLUTION.

label: Nokia Lumia 720
Sentences:
WELL, I AM A TECHIE AND A MOBILE ENTHUSIAST WHO HAS BEEN REVIEWING MOBILES AND OSES FOR QUITE A LONG TIME NOW.
      
      TECHNICAL ASPECTS ASIDE, THIS PHONE IS STILL GREAT VALUE FOR MONEY. IF THERE ARE PEOPLE WHO DO NOT BUY THIS PHONE, THE PRIMARY REASON WHY IS BECAUSE OF THE WINDOWS OS "WHICH LACKS APPS".
      
      TO BE HONEST, YOU DONT BUY A PHONE SO THAT YOU CAN USE APPS, YOU BUY A PHONE AND THEN LOOK IF THERE ARE GOOD APPS FOR IT. ALL THE BASIC NECESSARY ONES ARE ALL THERE. AND FOR A PERSON LIKE, IT MAKES NO SENSE TO BUY A PHONE BECAUSE IT SUPPORTS A LOT OF GAMES (MY DESKTOP SERVES THE SAME PURPOSE).
      
      COMING TO THE PROS AND CONS OF IT :-
      
      PROS
      
      1) SUNLIGHT READABILITY IS GREAT. AND GOOD PPI DENSITY OR NOT, TEXTS AND FONTS ARE CLEAR AND PLEASING TO THE EYES. EVEN MY GRANDMOTHER WITH LIMITED VISION FINDS IT VERY EASY TO HER EYES TO READ
      
      2) THE CURVED GLASS MAKES THE ENTIRE TOUCH EXPERIENCE HEAVENLY. IT SEEMS THE SCREEN FLOATS ON THE SURFACE!
      
      3) WINDOWS UI IS VERY SLICK AND FAST. I LOVE THE LIVE TILES AND SURFING THROUGH PAGES AND WINDOWS.
      
      4) BATTERY LIFE IS EXCELLENT FOR A BIG PHONE.
      
      5) LOUDSPEAKER IS BALLISTIC, HEADPHONES ARE DECENT AND THERE ARE EQUALISERS NATIVE TO THE PHONE. SOUND QUALITY IS EXCELLENT AND BEATS BEATS AUDIO HANDS DOWN.
      
      6) CAMERA HAS AN ODD MEGAPIXEL FIGURE BUT REGARDLESS OF IT, IT CLICKS GREAT PICTURES. NO OTHER PHONE COMES CLOSE TO THAT QUALITY. THE CLOSEST IS SONY XPERIA S WHICH IS A GOOD 7K COSTLIER AND STILL LAGS IN LOW LIGHT IMAGING.
      
      7) ENTIRE MICROSOFT OFFICE SUITE IS FREE AND HANDY.
      
      
      CONS -
      
      NOT MANY CONS EXPERIENCED SO FAR, HOWEVER I GUESS OTHERS WHO WANT TO KNOW MORE ABOUT THIS PHONE SHOULD KNOW A FEW THINGS WHICH I THINK ONE MIGHT MISS OUT ON
      
      1) ACCESSORIES FOR LUMIAS ARE PRETTY COSTLY - FLIP COVER COSTS 500 BUCKS, A HARD CASE BACK COVER COSTS 500 BUCKS, SCREEN GUARDS ARE DOUBLE THE PRICE OF OTHERS.
      
      2) THE PHONE DOES NOT COME WITH A SCREEN GUARD IN-BOX.
      
      3) BLUETOOTH, WIFI AND OTHER THINGS CANNOT BE TOGGLED IN ONE SWITCH. YOU HAVE TO REACH TO THE SETTINGS MENU TO TURN THEM ON/OFF.
      
      4) KILLING TASKS AND APPLICATIONS IS A LITTLE DIFFERENT - THE BACK BUTTON HAS TO BE DOUBLE TAPPED IN ORDER TO END THE TASK, ELSE IT REMAINS SUSPENDED IN THE BACKGROUND.
      
      
      BUT THESE NIGGLES ARE VERY SMALL FOR THE VALUE IT RETAINS AND STILL BY AND FAR IS THE BEST VALUE FOR MONEY PHONE YOU CAN BUY IN THE PRICE RANGE. I AM CENT PERCENT SATISFIED WITH IT :-)

label: Nokia Lumia 720
Sentences:
WHAT DO U ACTUALLY EXPECT IN A PHONE PRICED AT 17K? THIS PHONE GOES BEYOND MY EXPECTATIONS. I HAVE BEEN USING THIS PHONE SINCE 2 MONTHS AND I AM VERY HAPPY WITH THIS PHONE. LETS GET DOWN TO THE DETAILS
      
      
      1) GOOD CALL QUALITY : NEEDLESS TO SAY, NOKIA HARDWARE HAS AND ALWAYS HAD GOOD SIGNAL RECEPTION AND CALL QUALITY. I HAVE USED A SONY ERICSSON XPERIA PHONE EARLIER AND THIS PHONE IS MUCH BETTER.
      
      
      2) CAMERA : CAMERA SENSOR IS GOOD CONSIDERING THE PRICE RANGE. IT TAKES GOOD PHOTOS IN WELL LIGHTED PLACES. NIGHT PHOTOGRAPHY, SHUTTER SPEED IS LESS, SO YOU WILL NEED TO KEEP THE CAMERA STILL LONGER TO GET GOOD PHOTOS. I HAVE COMPARED THE SAMSUNG S3 CAMERA, I CAN SAY WITH CONFIDENCE THAT THIS CAMERA BEATS S3 HANDS DOWN. THE FRONT FACING CAMERA IS NOT BAD EITHER. MY FRIEND HAS A 28K HTC PHONE, THE FRONT FACING CAMERA IS NOT EVEN A GOOD AS THE THE 720'S FRONT CAMERA.
      
      THERE ARE SOME FILTERS FOR THE PHOTOS. YOU WILL USE THEM INTIALLY, AFTER THAT THEY ARE QUITE USELESS.
      
      
      3) BATTERY : BATTERY LASTS FOR 2 DAYS WITH NORMAL USAGE (3-4 CALLS DAY, GMAIL AND FACEBOOK USAGE FOR FEW MINUTES EACH, NEWSPAPER APPS FOR ABOUT 15 MIN IN THE MORNING, ALARM AND SOMETIMES YOUTUBE). IF YOU USE JUST FOR CALLS, IT COULD LAST FOR 4 DAYS.
      
      
      4) MUSIC : NOTHING EXTRA-ORDINARY WITH MUSIC, BUT IT MEETS EXPECTATION. IT HAS SOME SOUND ENHANCEMENTS FEATURES LIKE SURROUND SOUND WHICH DEFINITELY MAKES THE SOUND BETTER WHILE USING EAR PHONES OR WHEN CONNECTED TO BIGGER SPEAKERS.
      
      
      5) MAPS : YOU CAN DOWNLOAD MAP DATA AND USE WITHOUT DATA CONNECTION. THIS IS THE BIGGEST ADVANTAGE OVER GOOGLE MAPS ON ANDROID PHONES. THE OTHER ADVANTAGE IS YOU CAN SELECT THE ACCENT OF THE VOICE THAT GUIDES NAVIGATION AND UK ACCENT IS BETTER UNDERSTANDABLE FOR US. WITH GOOGLE MAPS, YOU ARE FORCED TO USE US ACCENT WHICH I FOUND COMPARITIVELY DIFFICULT TO UNDERSTAND. I FEEL NOKIA MAPS ARE BETTER IN TERMS OF USABILITY, BUT THIS MIGHT BE SUBJECTIVE.
      
      
      6) RAM AND PROCESSOR : SOME PEOPLE MIGHT BE DISAPPOINTED SEEING 512 MB RAM. BUT WINDOWS OS IS OPTIMIZED ENOUGH AND I DON'T SEE ANY LAGS EVEN WHEN USING MULTIPLE APPS TOGETHER. A FRIEND SHOWED ME HIS SAMSUNG S3 MEMORY USAGE, WHICH SHOWED AROUND 850MB OF THE TOTAL 1 GB RAM BEING USED BY BACKGROUND PROCESSES ALONE AND THERE WAS NO EASY TO BLOCK THESE PROCESSES, YOU JUST HAVE TO KILL THEM PERIODICALLY. IN WINDOWS, YOU CAN GO TO THE SETTINGS AND JUST BLOCK APPS FROM RUNNING IN BACKGROUND.
      
      
      7)  RESOLUTION & CLEAR BLACK DISPLAY : AT 217 PIXELS PER INCH, THE PIXEL DENSITY IS COMPARITIVELY LESS. BUT WHILE VIEWING THE VIDEOS AND PHOTOS, NO WHERE WILL YOU FEEL LET DOWN. INFACT I HAVE AN IPOD TOUCH WHOSE RESOLUTION IS HIGHER, BUT VIDEO AND IMAGE CLARITY SEEMS TO BE BETTER IN NOKIA LUMIA 720. CLEAR BLACK DEFINITELY INCREASES THE CONTRAST AND MAKES THE DISPLAY CRISP AND CLEAR.
      
      
      8) TOUCH SENSITIVITY: GREAT SENSITIVITY. INFACT WITH 'NORMAL' SENSITIVITY ITSELF, THE PHONE IS EXTREMELY SENSITIVE. WITH 'HIGH' SENSITIVITY YOU CAN TOUCH WITH GLOVES ON.
      
      
      9) OPERATING SYSTEM AND APPS : WINDOWS 8 OS IS THE BEST MOBILE OS AROUND AND THERE CAN BE NO DISPUTE ABOUT THIS. UNLESS YOU USE IT, YOU CAN'T APPRECIATE HOW SMOOTH AND RESPONSIVE THE UI IS. ALSO, THE OS UNLIKE ANDROID IS NOT CENTERED AROUND INDIVIDUAL APPS WHICH ARE QUITE DIFFERENT FROM EACH OTHER AND HAVE THEIR OWN THEME. WINDOWS HAS ONE THEME CUTTING ACROSS APPS. SOCIAL NETWORKING SITES LIKE FACEBOOK ARE INTEGRATED INTO THE OS, MAKING FACEBOOK ACCESS AND UPDATES VERY QUICK. YOUR  MESSAGE, GMAIL, HOTMAIL INBOXES ALL HAVE THE SAME THEME. HOWEVER I MUST SAY THIS, SOME APPS ON THE ANDROID ARE STILL NOT AVAILABLE ON WINDOWS. I MISS PLAYERPRO MUSIC PLAYER FROM MY EARLIER ANDROID PHONE VERY MUCH. BUT MOST OF THE APPS THAT YOU REALLY NEED ARE ALREADY AVAILABLE IN WINDOWS.
      
      
      10) LOOKS : LOOKS ARE STUNNING, ESP THE BLACK ONE. PHONE IS LIGHT WEIGHT. INFACT SOME FRIENDS WHO OWN COSTLY SAMSUNG PHONES (READ AS S3 AND NOTE) WERE SURPRISED WHEN THE HEARD THE PRICE OF THE PHONE.
      
      
      NEGATIVES
      
      1) DOESN'T SUPPORT LINUX OS. SO YOU CAN'T COPY FILES FROM LINUX.
      
      2) APPS. ALTHOUGH NOT A SERIOUS LIMITATION ANYMORE AS MOST OF THE IMPORTANT APPS ARE AVAILABLE, THE FACT THAT MANY APPS ON ANDROID ARE STILL NOT AVAILABLE IS A LIMITATION.

label: Nokia Lumia 720
Sentences:

      FIRST OF ALL NO SPECS NO PROS NO CONS.. WE ALL KNOW THAT. JUST A BIT OF MY EXPERIENCES WITH NOKIA LUMIA THE MOST AMAZING SMARTPHONE EVER.
      
      *USER INTERFACE IS REALLY A BREEZE FROM THE BORING ANDROID/IOS. LIVE TILES ARE REALLY AMAZING. WHAT A BEAUTIFUL PIECE OF CREATION THESE ARE.
      
      THE PHONE IS VERY SMOOTH, NO LAGS LIKE THE LAGDROIDS ONE ( EVEN I HAVE SEEN THE SSG SIII ALSO LAGS SOMETIME.), TEMPLE RUN RUNS PRETTY SMOOTH. THE ANGRY BIRDS SHOULD BE FREE IN THIS PLATFORM.

      AND SOME MYTHS...........
      
      1) FILE MANAGER-  TO SOME POEPLE IT IS THE BIGGEST DRAWBACK. BUT THE REASON MICROSOFT DIDNT PUT THE PROVISION OF FILE MANAGER IS THEY WANT TO MAKE THE OS ROCKSOLID AND TAMPERPROOF AND OBVIOUSLY PIRACY FREE. WELL YOU CAN MANAGE ALL THOSE THINGS IN THIS OS PRETTY WELL WITHOUT A FILE MANAGER.
      
      2) ANTIVIRUS AND FIREWALL- NO YOU DONT NEED THAT. BECAUSE MICROSOFT SCREENS THE APPS BEFORE PERMITTING THEM IN THE STORE AND ALL THE APPS ARE SANDBOXED IN THE OS. THEY CAN;T INTERACT WITH EACH OTHER. SO DNT WORRY ABOUT ANY VIRAL MALFUNCTIONING. AND AGAIN THIS IS A ADVANTAGE OF NOT HAVING A FILE MANAGER.
      
      3) APPS- THERE ARE ALL THE  APPS AVAILABLE IN THE MARKER WHICH ARE NECESSARY DAILY. DONT CRY FOR APPS.I WONDER HOW MANY APPS A PEOPLE NEED IN HIS DAILY MOBILE EXPERIENCE ????  1000000 ???? THATS INSANE MAN !!!!!
      
      4) GUYS PLEASE DONT CRY FOR EXTRA RAM. YOU WONT BE SATISFIED WITH ANY AMOUNT OF RAMS AND CPU CORES. HAD IT BEEN RELEASED WITH 1GB RAM I AM SURE PEOPLE WOULD SCREAM THAT 720, 820, 920 ALL HAVE 1 GB RAM WITH DIFFRENT PRICE TAGS AND NOKIA HAD GONE CRAZYY ETC BLAH BLAH...... IF YOU WANT 1GB RAM THEN DONT BUY 720. COUGH OUT EXTRA BUCKS AND BUY 820 BUT DONT CRY FOR 1 GB IN 720.
      
      **REMEMBER GUYS ONCE UPON A TIME NOKIA WAS THE ONLY COMPANY TO PRODUCE ANY SMARTPHONES.EVERY PHONE NOKIA MANUFACTURED IS A MASTERPIECE. GUYS CAN YOU NAME 5 PHONES OF SAMSUNG/SONY/HTC FROM PAST 10 YEARS ??? ANS IS NO. BUT EVEN THE GREATEST NOKIA HATER WILL ALSO NAME 10 NOKIA MASTERPIECE FROM LAST 10 YEARS.
      
      IF YOU CANT BE LOYAL TO ONE COMAPANY THEN AT LEAST PAY RESPECT TO THE PAST SERVICES RENDERED.
      
      NO BODY IS FORCING YOU TO BUY A NOKIA. ITS YOUR CHOICE. BUT DONT BLAME IT.
      
      5) LASTLY SOME ARE WRITING THAT THEY ARE EXPERIENCING PROBLEMS BUT BLAMING THE COMPANY.I CANT UNDERSTAND WHY ARE THEY DOING SO ????
      
      ANY ELECTRONIC GOODS CAN BECOME FAULTY. THATS WHY COMPANY ARE GIVING MANUFACTURING WARRANTY. ITS COMPLETELY YOUR BADLUCK TO GET A FAULTY PIECE. I HAVE SEEN HTC ONE TO BECOME DEAD WITHIN A WEEK.
      
      
      FINAL WORDS--FLIPKART SHOULD HAVE THE OPTION OF 6 OUT OF 5.(LOL) TO ME ITS THE MOST AMAZING SMARTPHONE EVER IN THIS WORLD TILL DATE. I OWN THE WORLD'S GREATEST CAMERA PHONE NOKIA 808 PUREVIEW. AND NOW I OWN THE GREATEST SMARTPHONE IN THE WORLD. I WISH I HAD ENOUGH MONEY TO BUY THE NOKIA LUMIA 920. :-(

Sentences:
BEFORE U READ MY OPINION ABOUT THIS PHONE LET ME SHARE THAT I AM ALREADY A USER OF THIS PHONE LUMIA 720 SINCE ONE WEEK. AND I AM A TECH SAVVY.
      
      
      THIS PHONE NOKIA LUMIA 720 IS FAR FAR BETTER THAN ANY ANDROID.
      
      EXCEPT FOR A FEW THINGS :
      
      1) YOU CANNOT VIEW THE FOLDERS FROM UR EXTERNAL MEMORY CARD. U NEVER COME TO KNOW WHAT IS WHERE IN UR PHONE WHETHER IN PHONE MEMORY OR SD CARD MEMORY
      
      WHATEVER DATA U RECEIVE THRU BLUETOOTH THAT ALSO U NEVER KNOW WHERE IT GOES.
      
      2) THERE'S NO CALL RECORDER FACILITY AVAILABLE IN ANY WINDOWS PHONE, AND JUST FORGET AUTO CALL RECORDING.
      
      BUT THE WORST OF ALL IS THAT NO CALL RECORDING SOFTWARE OR APP HAS BEEN DEVELOPED BY MICROSOFT FOR THEIR SO CALLED BEST OS WINDOWS 8. NO CALL RECORDING APP AVAILABLE THRU NOKIA STORE.
      
      I ENQUIRED WITH THE EXPERTS AND NONE HAD THE ANSWER.
      
      3) APPLICATIONS THAT U DOWNLOAD GET STORED ONLY ON THE MASS MEMORY (IE; INTERNAL MEMORY). LACS OF APPS AVAILABLE AND U CANT STORE ON SD CARD WHAT'S THE FUN ? 8 GB IS JUST NOTHING. MINE WAS FULL IN JUST 3 DAYS.  WHATS THE USE OF EXPANDABLE 64 GB ?
      
      THOSE WHO DONT FIND THESE FACTORS MORE IMP CAN GO FOR ONE.
      
      IF SOMEONE HAS THE ANSWER TO ANY OF THESE PROBLEMS PLS FEEL FREE TO CONTACT ME ON VIVEKPKAPOTE@GMAIL.COM OR WRITE UR FEEDBACK ON FLIPCART.
      
      I HAVE RETURNED MY LUMIA 720 JUST TODAY AND IT WAS ACCEPTED BACK BY THE NOKIA PRIORITY DEALER. BUT IF SOMEONE HAS THE ANSWER TO MY REQUIREMENTS THEN I SHALL BUY AGAIN, TRUST ME.

label: Nokia Lumia 720
Sentences:
FIRST THINGS FIRST... 10/10 TO FLIPKART FAST SERVICE AND QUICK DELIVERY. ORDERED PHONE ON LATE SUNDAY NIGHT AND HAD MY LUMIA IN MY HAND ON TUESDAY. FIRST SHOPPING EXPERIENCE WITH FLIPKART AND IT WAS AWESOME.
      
      
      TO BE HONEST MY REVIEW IS LITTLE BIASED TOWARDS NOKIA. I AM ONE OF THOSE OLD FASHIONED GUYS WHO STILL MISS THEIR OLD NOKIA 3310S, 1108S, 6600S OR 5800S. I HAVE BEEN USING THIS PHONE FOR LAST ONE WEEK AND NOKIA LUMIA 720 IS AN AMAZING PHONE. IT LOOKS GREAT AND HAS JUST THE PERFECT SCREEN SIZE FOR ME UNLIKE THOSE BIG SAMSUNG GALAXY'S WHICH DON'T EVEN FIT IN MY JEANS POCKETS.  IT HAS ALMOST ALL THE THINGS I EXPECT FROM NOKIA. CRISP AND CLEAR CALL QUALITY, LONG BATTERY BACKUP, BRIGHT SCREEN AND SOLID BUILD QUALITY.
      
      MOST IMPRESSED BY THE CAMERA IN LUMIA 720. IT ANYTIME BEATS MY FRIEND'S IPHONE CAMERA AND TO SOME EXTENT MY OLD CANON DIGICAM TOO IN PICTURE QUALITY. IT GET ME BEST INDOOR AND OUTSIDE PHOTOS. AND LOW LIGHT IMAGES ARE REALLY CRISP.
      
      THIS IS MY FIRST SMARTPHONE SO I AM STILL GETTING USED TO TOO MANY FEATURES IN WINDOWS PHONE 8 AND I AM LITTLE DISAPPOINTED BY WINDOWS FOR THEIR LACK OF BASIC FEATURES. I IS NOT TOO ANNOYING ONCE YOU GET USED TO IT. THEY EVEN MISS FEW GREAT THINGS FROM OLD NOKIA'S SYMBIAN. I HAVE NEVER USED ANY OTHER SMART PHONE SO DON'T KNOW IF OTHER PHONE OS HAVE THESE FEATURES OR NOT.
      
      SPENT ONE WHOLE DAY WONDERING HOW TO CLOSE AN APP. IT DOESN'T HAVE A CLOSE OR EXIT OPTION. THOUGH FOUND IT LATER THAT BACK BUTTON USULAAY CLOSES THE APP.
      
      THEY DON'T EVEN PLACE A REGULAR DIALLER ON THE HOMESCREEN. I MEAN PHONE'S MOST IMPORTANT TASK IS TO MAKE CALLS AND IT IS A LITTLE ANNOYING THAT I HAVE TO MAKE TOO MANY NAVIGATIONS IN THE MENU JUST TO MAKE A CALL. STILL NOT ABLE TO FIND A CALL LOG/REGISTER IN THE PHONE CALL. DISAPPOINTED BY IE10 BROWSER TOO. JUST DON'T LIKE IT. HOPE THEY ADD GOOD BROWSERS LIKE OPERA OR CHROME SOMEDAY TO WINDOWS APP STORE. NOKIA/BING MAPS ARE ALSO NOT AS GOOD AS GOOGLE'S. WISH THEY MAKE MAPS FOR THIS LIKE THEY HAVE ADDED FOR IPHONE.
      
      APPS TOO ARE LIMITED. HOPE MICROSOFT FIXES SOME BASIC THINGS IN NEXT UPDATE.
      
      MY RATING 7/10.
      
      
      PROS:
      
      1. GREAT CALL QUALITY (MOST IMPORTANT THING FOR A PHONE IN MY OPINION)
      
      2. GREAT BATTERY BACKUP. WITH MODERATE TO HEAVY USAGE (1 HOUR GAMING, AROUND 50 MBS DOWNLOAD ON 2G, 2-3 HOURS CALLS, 3 HOURS OF MUSIC AND 1 HOUR OF VIDEO PLAYBACK ALSO BATTERY LASTS ALMOST 1.5 DAYS).
      
      3. AWESOME CAMERA
      
      4. SOLID BUILD
      
      5. SUPER SENSITIVE TOUCH SCREEN
      
      6. GREAT DAYLIGHT VISIBILITY OF SCREEN. RESOLUTION IS NOT MUCH BUT STILL LOOKS VERY GOOD.
      
      7. GREAT PERFORMANCE. NO LAG WITH MULTITASKING (SMOOTHLY RUNS 4-5 APPS TOGETHER).
      
      8. MICROSOFT'S OFFICE SUITE IS GREAT.
      
      
      CONS:
      
      1. RAM IS ONLY 512 MB. SHOULD BE A GIG FOR THIS PRICE POINT.
      
      2. MISSES SOME BASIC FEATURES WHICH I HAVE MENTIONED ABOVE.
      
      3. NO FM
      
      4. HEADPHONES ARE VERY BASIC (SOME 2-3K MICROMAX PHONES COME WITH AMAZING HEADPHONES).
      
      5. FIRST DAY IT ANNOYED ME WITH MICRO-SIM. HAD TO WAIT ONE DAY TO GET MY SIM CUT. I DON'T KNOW WHY DON'T ALL THE PHONE MAKERS FOLLOW SAME STANDARDS.
      
      
      STILL IT IS A GREAT PHONE. I GIVE IT 7/10. GREAT BUY IF YOU DON'T TRUST ANY OTHER PHONE-MAKER WITH YOUR 18000 BUCKS LIKE ME.

label: Nokia Lumia 720
Sentences:
FOR ALL THOSE WHO ARE IN THE MARKET FOR A NEW PHONE WHICH IS REASONABLY PRICED (BETWEEN 15K TO 25K) LUMIA 720 IS PROBABLY YOUR BEST BET.
      
      
      LOOK AND FEEL : THIS IS THE BEST LOOKING PHONE AT ITS PRICE POINT AND LOOKS EXTREMELY WELL FINISHED. THE BACK DOES TAKE FINGERPRINT SMUDGING BUT THAT IS MINOR COMPARED TO THE OVERALL LOOK AND FEEL. THE UNIBODY WITH THE TAPERED GLASS FINISH GIVE IT A SOPHISTICATED LOOK AT PAR WITH SOME OF THE BEST IPHONES AND HTC ONE X.
      
      
      DISPLAY: 480 X 800 DISPLAY ON 4.3INCH SCREEN IS VERY CRISP. IN BRIGHT SUNLIGHT IT IS VERY READABLE AND IN MY OPINION BETTER THAN SOME OF THE AMOLED SCREENS OF MORE EXPENSIVE PHONES. MY NOTE1 HAD A SCREEN THAT WAS BARELY READABLE IN BRIGHT SUNLIGHT. THIS ONE IS MANY TIME BETTER.
      
      
      INTERFACE: THE WINDOWS INTERFACE DOES TAKE SOME GETTING USED TO BUT IT IS FAIRLY INTUITIVE AND EFFECTIVELY FUNCTIONAL. LIVE TILES IS A GOOD IDEA BUT MORE 'LIVE' TILE OPTIONS ARE NEEDED AS NOT EVERY APP HAS A TILE THAT IS 'LIVE. RESPONSE TIME FOR MOST APPS IS FAIRLY GOOD AND BETTER THAN COMPARABLE ANDROID PHONES. I AM NOT SURE IF THIS WILL REMAIN THE SAME AS IN MY LAST ANDROID PHONE THE RESPONSE TIME DEGRADED CONSIDERABLY OVER 6 MONTHS OF USAGE (WITH SAMSUNG NOTE 1).
      
      
      CAMERA: NEEDLESS TO SAY, THIS PHONE HAS ONE OF THE BEST CAMERAS AT PAR OR BETTER THAN PHONES OF A HIGHER PRICE RANGE. YOU CAN DO A QUICK GOOGLE SEARCH AND CHECK COMPARISONS WITH IPHONE V, SAMSUNG S3 ETC. THIS IS A TERRIFIC CAMERA THAT IS AVAILABLE IN AN UNDER 20K PHONE. FREE APPS FROM NOKIA HELP YOU DO ALMOST ALL TYPES OF EDITING, FILTERS LIKE INSTAGRAM ETC.
      
      
      MAPS: I HAVE NOT EXPLORED THIS MUCH BUT SO FAR THE INBUILT NOKIA MAPS DO NOT SEEM AS GOOD AS THE DEFAULT GOOGLE MAPS. BUT REMEMBER, GOOGLE HAS BEEN MAKING MAPS AND IMPROVING THEM FOR OVER 10 YEARS. HERE MAPS BY NOKIA ARE FAIRLY RECENT AND I AM SURE OVER TIME, THEY WILL BECOME BETTER. I HAVE NOT TRIED THE FREE NAVIGATION YET BUT WILL DO SOON.
      
      
      BATTERY LIFE: WITH 2000MAH BATTERY, THIS PHONE SHOULD HAVE ONE OF THE BEST BATTERY LIFE IN COMPARISON TO ALL ITS PEERS. AGAIN, I HAVE NOT TRIED THIS SINCE I RECEIVED THE PHONE YESTERDAY ONLY. BUT SO FAR THE BATTERY LIFE LOOKS PROMISING.
      
      
      FINAL WORD: IT IS BIG CHANGE TO MOVE TO WP8 FROM ANDROID (LIKE ME) OR IOS. BUT AS THE SYSTEM EVOLVES, IT HOLDS THE PROMISE FOR A MUCH MORE REFINED INTERFACE, LONGER BATTERY LIFE AND THE RELIABLITY OF NOKIA. NOT TO MENTION ALL THE FREE EXCLUSIVE NOKIA APPS (LIKE NOKIA MUSIC) MAKE THIS A TRULY WORTHWHILE PHONE. I HAVE GIVEN IT 4 STARS AND NOT 5 AS THE INTERFACE NEEDS SOME MORE REFINEMENT BEFORE IT BECOMES BEST IN CLASS..!!
      
      
      FLIPKART: NEXT DAY DELIVERY... THAT ITSELF IS WORTH THE MONEY SPENT ON THIS WEBSITE..!! ALWAYS GREAT RELIABLE SERVICE..!! NEVER FAILS..!!

label: Nokia Lumia 720
Sentences:
I HAD BEEN COMPARING LUMIA 720 AND 820 FOR A WHILE AND CAME TO A CONCLUSION THAT APART FROM CERTAIN MINOR ASPECTS, THE LUMIA 720 BEATS 820. NOW, ONE SHOULD NOTE CERTAIN THINGS BEFORE BUYING THIS DEVICE.
      
      I)THE PHONE DOES NOT HAVE ANY INBUILT EFFECTS IN IT'S CAMERA LIKE BLACK AND WHITE OR SEPIA ETC. YOU WILL NEED TO DOWNLOAD AN APPLICATION FOR THAT.
      
      II)IF YOU'RE A GAMER AND LOOKING FOR FREE GAMES WITH HIGH GRAPHICS, YOU SHOULD KNOW THAT MOST OF THE GOOD GAMES ARE VERY HEAVY AND WILL HAVE TO BE PURCHASED FROM THE STORE.
      
      III)ANDROID WILL BEAT WINDOWS PHONE IN THE APPLICATIONS DEPARTMENT. WINDOWS DOES LACK SOME GOOD APPS.
      
      IV)THE CAMERA IS GOOD INDEED, SPECIALLY UNDER AMPLE LIGHT, THE PHOTOS ARE EXCELLENT. LOW LIGHT IMAGING IS GOOD TOO, BUT USING FLASH UNDER LOW LIGHT MIGHT RESULT IN A GRAINY IMAGE.
      
      V)THERE IS NO FM RADIO.
      
      VI)THE NEW INTERNET SHARING FEATURE IS A GOOD FEATURE.
      
      VII) BATTERY LIFE IS EFFING AWESOME. BUT DON'T KEEP CHARGING IT EVERY TIME
      
      IF YOU'RE BUYING THE WHITE ONE, THEN MAKE SURE YOU BUY A BACK COVER, BECAUSE THE WHITE COLOUR IS A COATING OVER THE BLACK COLOUR, SO IF YOU HAPPEN TO SCRATCH IT BY ANY CHANCE, THE BLACK COLOR WILL SHOW.
      
      VIII)THE HERE MAPS AND HERE DRIVE IS VERY VERY ACCURATE. HOWEVER, YOU WILL NEED TO DOWNLOAD THE MAP OF YOUR REGION FOR OFFLINE NAVIGATION, WHICH HAPPENS TO BE PRETTY LARGE. YOU WILL BE SUGGESTED TO USE THE WIFI TO DOWNLOAD THE MAP.
      
      IX)THE LUMIA 720 MAKES YOUR SOCIAL LIFE BETTER. YOU WON'T NEED TO GO TO THE BROWSER TO CHECK YOU WALL OR YOUR INBOX OF YOUR MAIL. IT'S ALL THERE WELL ARRANGED AND KEEPS UPDATING.
      
      X) THE INTERNAL MEMORY THOUGH BEING 8GB, THE SOFTWARE AND WIN 8 OS TAKES A LITTLE SPACE AND LEAVES ABOUT 4.69GB FREE. SO YOU MIGHT WANT TO GET YOURSELF A MEMORY CARD. MAKE SURE IT'S COMPLETELY FORMATTED OR ELSE YOUR PHONE MIGHT START MALFUNCTIONING.
      
      XI)MUSIC QUALITY, BOTH WITH HEADPHONES AND WITHOUT IS BOMBASTIC.
      
      XII) IF YOU'RE KIND OF A SHOW OFF, YOU CAN EASILY SHOW IT OFF TO YOUR FRIENDS, AS THE DESIGN IS REALLY GOOD, FITS INTO YOUR HAND LIKE A DREAM AND MAKES YOU FEEL LIKE A MAN (WOMAN IF YOU'RE FEMALE).
      
      XIII) DON'T WORRY ABOUT GETTING BACK YOUR CONTACTS FROM YOUR OLD PHONE. ACTIVATE THE BLUETOOTH ON BOTH THE DEVICES AND THE CONTACTS COME FLOWING IN.
      
      XIV)I SPENT 18100, SPENT ABOUT 300 EXTRA. BOUGHT IT FROM OUTSIDE, ONLY BECAUSE I NEEDED TO SEE THE SETUP AND THE SIM HAD TO BE CUT TO A MICRO SIM. THAT CAN ONLY BE DONE FROM A STORE.
      
      XV)NOW COMES THE FUNNIEST PART. THERE IS SOMETHING VERY FUNNY WITH THE MIC. IF YOU'RE LYING DOWN AND TALKING TO SOMEBODY, THEN DON'T. PERSON AT THE OTHER END WON'T BE ABLE TO HEAR YOU.
      
      NOW, SINCE I'M NOT MUCH OF A GAMER THIS PHONE SUITS ME. I USE THE INTERNET A LOT AND LISTEN TO MUSIC. SO, I NEED THE BATTERY. NOT THAT I DON'T PLAY GAMES AT ALL, I DO HAVE SOME GAMES AND PLAY THEM AND STILL HAVE SOME 5-6 HOURS BATTERY REMAINING. SO, KEEPING THE ABOVE MENTIONED THINGS IN MIND, PICK YOUR PHONE.

label: Nokia Lumia 720
Sentences:
I JUST HAD THE CHANCE TO USE LUMIA 720(PERSONALLY I HAVE LUMIA 920). HERE'S WHAT I FELT ABOUT THE PHONE AFTER A DAY'S USE:
      
      PROS:
      
      1. SCREEN CLARITY: THE MOBILE HAS VERY GOOD SCREEN CLARITY. FRANKLY I FEEL BEST IN MID-RANGE.GO TO ANY SHOP AND COMPARE WITH GALAXY GRAND(TRUE COMP. TO LUMIA 720) AND YOU CAN SEE THE DIFFERENCE. THERE IS LOT OF COMPARISION WITH LUMIA 620 BUT THE VIEWING ANGLES ARE JUST NOT THE SAME. TRUST ME, LUMIA 720, EVEN WITH LOWER PIXEL DENSITY HAS BETTER FEEL TO IT.
      
      2.CAMERA: CAMERA IS REALLY GOOD. BEST IN MID RANGE CLASS. COMPARE IT WITH HTC OR SAMSUNG GRAND 8MP CAMERA....LUMIA 720 IS BETTER IN DAYLIGHT AND MILES AHEAD IN NIGHT
      
      3. WINDOWS: IF ANY OF YOU HAVE EVER USED ANDROID AND THEN OPTED FOR WINDOWS YOU WILL UNDERSTAND THE CLEAR DIFFERENCE, IN TERMS OF SPEED AND RESPONSE. WINDOWS IS WAY AHEAD. ANDROID MIGHT BE HAVING LOT OF APPLICATIONS COMPARED TO WINDOWS BUT BELIEVE ME, YOU WILL NOT KEEP ANY OF THOSE EXTRA APPLICATION FOR MORE THAN A WEEK. REASON IS THE BATTERY CONSUMPTION, AND NOT TO MENTIONS BUGS THAT COME WITH THEM. WINDOWS HAS LESSER APPLICATION BUT ALL OF THEM ARE HIGHLY FUNCTIONAL AND ACTUALLY USEFUL. SOME OF THE APPLICATIONS ARE BETTER THAN THE CONTEMPORARIES IN ANDROID. ONLY APPLE I-PHONE HAS BETTER APPLICATION THAN WINDOWS AT PRESENT BUT THE PRICE OF I PHONE IS TOO MUCH. ALSO THE COMPATIBILITY WITH NON-APPLE DEVICES IS ISSUE. WINDOWS IS SIMPLE AND BRILLIANT
      
      BUILT QUALITY:  THE BUILT QUALITY OF THE MOBILE IS QUITE SUPERB. AFTER BUYING LUMIA 920 I HAVE REALIZED WHAT ACTUALLY IS A WELL BUILT PHONE. LUMIA 720 IS SCALED DOWN  VERSION OF 920. VERY GOOD BUILT QUALITY
      
      NOKIA MAPS: ONE VERY GOOD THING ABOUT NOKIA MAPS IS THAT THEY CAN BE USED OFFLINE ALSO.THIS FEATURE REALLY HELPS WHEN YOU ARE ON BIKING TRIP OR ANY OTHER TRIP. LOOSE YOUR WAY AND HAVE NO MOBILE CONNECTIVITY, THEN NOKIA MAPS REALLY HELP. GOOGLE MAPS IS BEST IN THE WORLD BUT NOKIA IS PRETTY MUCH COMPARABLE TO IT.ALSO YOU CANNOT DOWNLOAD MAPS IN THE GOOGLE
      
      CONS:
      
      512 MB RAM: ALTHOUGH IT IS MORE PSYCHOLOGICAL THAN ACTUAL I DO FEEL THAT RAM SHOULD HAVE BEEN 1 GB.
      
      NO FM: FOR A MID RANGE PHONE THIS IS MUST
      
      THESE ARE THE ONLY TWO MAJOR DRAWBACKS IN LUMIA 720.
      
      
      IF YOU ARE LOOKING FOR A MID-RANGE PHONE THAT LOOKS WAY ABOVE IT'S PRICE, HAS GOOD CAMERA AND CAN LAST LONG...GO FOR LUMIA 720.
      
      IF YOU THINK YOU CAN REALLY SPEND UPTO 10 K MORE THAT I WILL SUGGEST SONY XPERIA SP OR LUMIA 820.BOTH ARE GREAT.

Sentences:
ITS BEEN A WEEK SINCE I HAVE BEEN USING THIS PRODUCT... I WENT FOR THIS PURCHASE AFTER GOING THROUGH THE REVIEWS FROM THE USERS OF THIS PRODUCT.... AND IN GENERAL I FOUND POSITIVE REVIEWS FROM MOST OF THE USERS... SO JUST THOUGHT OF REVIEWING MY EXPERIENCE TOO...I HAD BOTH GOOD AS WELL AS SOME BAD EXPERIENCE WITH THIS PHONE...GOING WITH THE LOOKS AND BUILT UP... THIS PHONE IS AWESOME... BUT I FACED QUITE A FEW ISSUES WHILE USING THIS PHONE..ALONG THIS ONE WEEK USAGE I HAD TO RESTART THIS PHONE MAYBE ATLEAST 5-6 TIMES BECAUSE IT GET HANGS WITHOUT EVEN THE USAGE OF MUCH OF ITS APPLICATIONS.... SECONDLY I AM HAVING A HARD TIME COPPING UP WITH WINDOWS 8... I FIND IT MORE DIFFICULT IN ACCESSING THE THINGS WHEN COMPARED TO MY PREVIOUS NOKIA SYMBIAN SET...I GOT FRUSTRATED WHILE TRYING TO TRANSFER A PDF FILE THAT I DOWNLOADED FROM MY MAIL THROUGH THIS PHONE TO MY PC... I CAN OPEN THIS PARTICULAR FILE IN THE PHONE USING PDF READER.. BUT THERE IS NO OPTION TO SEND IT THROUGH BLUETOOTH OR DATA CABLE TO THE PC... SO I THOUGHT I WOULD DIRECTLY COPY IT FROM THE SD CARD..BUT HUH!! BINGO YOU CANNOT OPEN SD EITHER....WTF!!(MAY BE THERE IS SOME OTHER WAY WHICH I AM NOT AWARE OF) BUT THESE THINGS AREN'T SUPPOSED TO BE THAT HARD... WINDOWS8 SHOULD HAVE MADE IT MORE USER FRIENDLY OR EASY TO ACCESS ITS FILES....AND CAN ANYONE TELL ME HOW TO CHECK THE LOG DETAILS.. LIKE CALL DURATION HISTORY ETC USING THIS SET...
      
      APART FROM THAT CAMERA, MAPS, CONTACTS & MAIL SYNCRONIZATIONS WITH FB, GMAIL ETC... ARE ALL GOOD...TOUCH IS AWESOME...THREADS MESSAGING IS ALSO COOL,
      
      IN GENERAL THE PHONE AND THE BUILT UP SEEMS TO BE GOOD... BUT STILL HAVE TO EXPERIMENT WITH THE WINDOWS8 OS...WHICH HAS BEEN A BIT IRRITATING IN SOME CASES.... HOPE WILL FIND SOME WAY TO GET THESE THINGS DONE ANWAY

label: Nokia Lumia 720
Sentences:
IT'S NOW ALMOST A WEEK THAT I'VE BEEN PLAYING WITH MY LUMIA 720. SO FAR, IT HAS GIVEN ME SATISFACTORY RESPONSES AND PERFORMED REALLY WELL. WINDOWS 8 RUNS WELL, WITH OUT ANY DRAGS OR LAGS AND THE UI IS VERY SMOOTH. THE TOUCH SCREEN IS SUPER SENSITIVE AND RESPONSES REALLY WELL.
      
      
      CAMERA:
      
      SIMPLY SUPERB! THIS IS WHAT MAKES THE PHONE WORTH THE PRICE. THE 6.7 MP CARL ZEISS LENS WITH AN APERTURE OF F1.9 CAPTURES MAXIMUM POSSIBLE LIGHT EVEN IN LOW CONDITIONS COMPARED TO ITS COMPETITORS. NOKIA'S SMART SHOOT IS ANOTHER MAJOR ATTRACTION IN THE PHONE. HELPS REALLY WELL TO GET THE BEST PICTURES BY AUTO-ADJUSTING AMONG THE CAPTURED IMAGES. IT PROVIDES THE USER TO DELETE UNWANTED OBJECT FROM THE IMAGE AS WELL. 5/5 FOR THE CAMERA! NOKIA WINS HERE.
      
      
      BATTERY BACK-UP:
      
      BUILT IN 2000 MAH BATTERY. I CHARGE IT TO 100% IN THE MORNING. MOBILE DATA CONNECTION IS TURNED ON TILL EVENING AFTER WHICH I SWITCH TO WI-FI. MODERATE CALLS, SMS, AROUND 1 HR MUSIC PLAYBACK, WHATSAPP ALMOST EVERY NOW AN THEN. BATTER SAVING IS TURNED ON. I'VE ALSO INSTALLED THE "BATTERY" APP. NOW THE TIME IS 8.30 PM AND THE BATTERY IS NOW AT 56% AND SHOWS A REMAINING TIME OF 18 HOURS!! AND YES, IF NOT 18, THE PHONE DOES NOT RUN SHORT OF JUICE TILL THE NEXT MORNING FOR SURE.
      
      
      VOICE QUALITY:
      
      THIS IS WHERE NOKIA FAILED. I'M CERTAIN THAT MOST OF THE LUMIA USERS MUST HAVE HEARD THE PERSON AT THE OTHER END SAY "HELLO..HELLO" REPEATEDLY WHICH IS BECAUSE THE VOICE FROM THIS END BREAKS IN BETWEEN. THE MIC ISSUE IS CURRENTLY UNDER DISCUSSION IN THE MICROSOFT FORUM. USERS HAVE COME UP WITH DIFFERENT OPINIONS AND FIXES. HOWEVER, IT IS QUITE DISAPPOINTING THAT MICROSOFT HAS NOT COME UP WITH A WORK-AROUND FOR THIS YET. STILL, THE PHONE SELLS LIKE HOT CAKES.
      
      
      MUSIC QUALITY:
      
      LUMIA 720 COMES WITH DOLBY SOUND ENHANCEMENT WHICH CAN REALLY BE ENJOYED BETTER WHEN USED A GOOD QUALITY HEADPHONES OTHER THAN THE STOCK PIECE THAT COMES INSIDE THE BOX. I USE A PAIR OF SENNHEISER MX160 HEADPHONES AND THE QUALITY IS AWESOME!
      
      APART FROM ALL THESE, THE BUILD QUALITY IS VERY SOLID. THE PHONE IS 9MM THICK BUT YOU WILL ACTUALLY FEEL IT THINNER.
      
      PROS:
      
      CAMERA
      
      BATTERY BACK UP
      
      BUILD QUALITY
      
      DISPLAY AND TOUCH
      
      DEDICATED CAMERA BUTTON.
      
      IN-CALL QUALITY
      
      
      CONS:
      
      VOICE BREAK UP DURING A CALL.
      
      
      OVERALL I WOULD TOTALLY RECOMMEND THIS PHONE. HOPING THAT THE VOICE ISSUE WILL BE FIXED SOON

BUT SINCE THE TIME I HAVE REPLACED A NEW SIM THE BATTERY LIFE HAS IMPROVED.

      FINALLY I WOULD SAY THAT THE PHONE IS GOOD ONE WITH GOOD BUILD QUALITY, GREAT BATTERY LIFE AND A DECENT ECOSYSTEM FOR YOUR ENTERTAINMENT. HOPE IT WILL IMPROVE WITH THE AMBER UPDATE.  HOWEVER , IF ONE IS AN AVID APP USER TRYING VARIOUS GAMES AND APPS THEN GIVEN THE CIRCUMSTANCES DROID HAS AN EDJE OVER WP8 .

      CHEERS TO FLIPKART! THX FOR THAT FAST DELIVERY.

BUT IT HAS BECAME SO COMMON(WHAT I FELT) AND THERE NOTHING NEW TO EXPLORE IN YOUR PHONE(I HAVE ALSO ACCESSED THE ANDROID PLATFORM). SO I TOOK A RISK AND AGAIN OPTED MY VERY OWN TRUSTED WITH TIME NOKIA(THIS TIME WITH A WINDOWS PLATFORM).
      
      I GOT THIS PHONE ON THIS TUESDAY AND SINCE THEN I AM TOTALLY INTO IT.
      
      
      SO, AVOIDING THE SPECIFICATIONS(EVERYBODY KNOWS IT), HERE IS WHAT I EXPERIENCED-
      
      
      POSITIVES -
      
      
      - KIDDOS TO WINDOWS FOR THIS NICE, NEW AND ATTRACTIVE UI.
      
      - THE TOUCH IS SUPERB AND I LOVE THOSE LIVE TILES.
      
      - THE PHONE IS SLEEK, HANDY WITH THE SMART LOOK WITH A SUPERB MATTE FINISH(MINE IS BLACK)
      
      - CAMERA IS GOOD WITH AMAZING AND INTERESTING APPS(THE CAMERA APPS).
      
      - FOR THOSE WHO CRITICIZE WINDOWS APPS STOCK GO AND HAVE A LOOK INTO THE WINDOWS STORE. YOU HAVE ALL THE REQUIRED APPS(AT LEAST WHAT I NEEDED).
      
      - CALL QUALITY IS LOUD AND SOOTHING(BOTH ON THE SPEAKER AND ON THE CALL).
      
      - FOR THOSE WHO SAY 'MY PHONE GOT HANGED 4 TIMES WITHIN AN HOUR'....MINE NEVER DID. EITHER THERE IS A PROBLEM SPECIFICALLY IN YOUR SET OR ELSE GO AND LEARN TO USE A PHONE.

      - NOKIA YOU COULD HAVE PROVIDED A BETTER LOOKING HEADPHONES.

      - 512 MB RAM IS NOT A DRAWBACK FOR THOSE WHO DON'T PLAY TOO MUCH GAMES(MY CASE).

label: Nokia Lumia 720
Sentences:
NOKIA LUMIA 720 IS THE MOST SLIMMEST OF ALL THE LUMIAS. WHILE LIKE ALL OTHER LUMIAS, IT HAS ITS UNIQUE CHARACTERISTICS, YET IT TOO SHARE THE COMMON DNA, I.E. IT IS A WINDOWS PHONE 8.
      
      HERE'S WHAT I FOUND GREAT ABOUT THIS BEAUTIFUL PHONE:-
      
      1. BEAUTIFUL DESIGN:- BEING CALLED THE SLIM AND SLEEK, LUMIA 720 WEIGHS JUST 128 GRAM AND IT FEELS GREAT IN YOUR HAND. JUST LIKE 920, LUMIA 720 HAS A UNIBODY DESIGN. FINGERPRINTS SHOULD BE LESS OF A PROBLEM TOO, AS THE 4.3? CLEARBLACK GORILLA GLASS 2.0 DISPLAY HAS EASY TO CLEAN TECHNOLOGY THAT ALSO BOOSTS VISIBILITY FROM DIFFERENT AND WIDER ANGLES. ALSO, IT IS ALSO THE FIRST TO HAVE CURVED GLASS AT THIS PRICE POINT!
      
      2. CAMERA:- THE LUMIA 720 HAS THE MOST EXTRAORDINARY CAMERA AT THIS PRICE POINT. USUALLY, WE GET A 5MP CAMERA, BUT THIS PHONE HAS A 6.7MP CAMERA WITH CARL ZEISS OPTICS. JUST NOT THIS, THE PHONE TOO BOASTS TO HAVE A 1.3MP FRONT FACING CAMERA. I JUST LOVED THE GLAM ME APP WHICH MAKES GREAT USE OF THE FRONT FACING CAMERA!
      
      3. APPS:- LUMIA 720 PACKS GREAT APPS THAT COME PRE-INSTALLED LIKE NOKIA'S EXCLUSIVES, LIKE HERE SUITE, CAMERA LENSES LIKE SMART SHOOT, GLAM ME AND ALSO COMES WITH ONE YEAR SUBSCRIPTION OF NOKIA MUSIC UNLIMITED. THE APPS IN THE WINDOWS PHONE STORE THOUGH NEEDS TO GROW, BUT THEY HAVE ALL THE BIG NAMES.
      
      4. WIRELESS CHARGING:- OKAY, WIRELESS CHARGING IS NOT FULLY BAKED IN NOKIA LUMIA 720. THERE ARE 3 CONNECTORS ON THE BACK OF YOUR PHONE WHICH ARE SOMEWHAT CONNECTED TO BATTERY. IN ORDER TO CHARGE WIRELESSLY, ONE NEEDS 2 THINGS, FIRST- A WIRELESS CHARGER, AND THEN, A WIRELESS CLIP ON COVER WHICH NOKIA HAS SAID DURING THE LAUNCH.
      
      5. STORAGE:- THE PHONE HAS 8GB OF STORAGE SPACE WHICH CAN BE MADE EVEN BIGGER BY ADDING A MICROSD CARD OF UPTO 64GB. THIS IS GREAT.
      
      6. THE TOUCHSCREEN:- THE TOUCHSCREEN IS A 4.3" CLEARBLACK WVGA LCD, 2.25 D GLASS, WITH THE SUPER SENSITIVE TOUCH THAT EVEN WORKS WITH YOUR FINGERNAILS AND CAR KEYS! AND OOPS, I FORGOT TO MENTION, IT HAS CORNING GORILLA GLASS 2.0
      
      7. BATTERY:- THIS IS WHERE NOKIA LUMIA 720 STANDS OUT OF THE CROWD JUST LIKE 920. BOTH OF THEM HAS 2000MAH BATTERY. ON MY USE, I HAVE FOUND THAT A FULL CHARGE ENSURES A GREAT DAY OF USE.
      
      HERE'S WHY IT MAKES YOU TO BUY NOKIA LUMIA 820:-
      
      RAM:- WITH JUST 512MB OF RAM, SOME APPS LIKE TEMPLE RUN ARE NOWHERE TO BE SEEN FOR THIS PHONE. SOME APPS ARE OPTIMISED ONLY FOR PHONES WITH 1GB OF RAM. HOWEVER, DEVELOPERS USUALLY OPTIMISE THEIR APPS FOR 512MB RAM TOO, BUT A LITTLE LATER. SO, RAM CAN BE A ISSUE TO BUY THIS PHONE IF YOU ARE A GAMER. BUT, I'M FINE WITH THIS!
      
      FINAL VERDICT:- NOKIA LUMIA 720 IS A GREAT PHONE, IN SHORT A VERSION OF 920 MADE ON BUDGET. IT HAS A GREAT CAMERA WITH SO MANY LENSES (LENSES ARE THERE ON WINDOWS PHONE STORE). IT HAS GREAT BATTERY LIFE. IT FLAUNTS A UNIBODY DESIGN. IN SHORT, IT HAS THE BEST LUMIA ELEMENTS. BUT YES, WHEN COMPARED TO LUMIA 620, IT HAS NOT MUCH TO OFFER AND THE PRICE DIFFERENCE IS SOMEWHAT THAT MAKES MANY TO BUY 620 OVER THIS. THE 620 IS MADE WITH TEENAGE CROWD IN MIND, WHILE 720 HAS A REALLY SOPHISTICATED LOOK. ALL-IN-ALL, I LOVE MY NOKIA LUMIA 720!

      5. BATTERY: LAST FROM 7.30 AM TO 7.30 PM... WITH DATA CONNECTION ON.. GMAIL, FACEBOOK, HOTMAIL, WHATSAPP AND FACEBOOK CHAT ALL DAY... SYNC CONTINUOUSLY, NETSURFING FOR AROUND 1 HOUR IN A DAY, 15 MIN OF GAMEPLAY, REGULAR PHONE CALLS AND SOME OTHER MISC. USE.

      6. OFF LINE MAPS AND NAVIGATION..!!
      
      7. MS OFFICE IS NECESSARY FOR ME.
      
      8. SKYDRIVE CLOUD STORAGE OF 7 GB FREE.
      
      9. UNLIMITED NOKIA MUSIC SUBSCRIPTION FOR LIFETIME.
      
      
      NOW SOME DRAWBACKS I HAVE FACED..

      2. IN INTERNET EXPLORER... IF U OPEN NEW TAB THEN LOADING IN CURRENT TAB PAUSE...! IT WILL RESUME WHEN YOU SWITCHBACK TO THAT TAB

label: Nokia Lumia 720
Sentences:
TOAST NOTIFICATION DISABLING :
      
      I AM UNABLE TO DISABLE THE TOAST NOTIFICATION. DO ANY OF YOU GUYS KNOW HOW TO DO THAT? IT IS GETTING REALLY FRUSTRATING THAT IT SHOWS UP EVEN WHEN THE PHONE IS LOCKED WITH PASSWORD.IT JUST POPS UP NO MATTER WHAT I AM DOING AND IT WOULD BE EMBARRASSING WHEN A PRIVATE MESSAGE POPS UP WHEN YOUR FRIENDS/PARENTS ARE FIDDLING WITH YOUR NEW PHONE.
      
      
      PASSWORD PROTECTION FOR APPS(MESSAGING) :
      
      CAN I PASSWORD PROTECT INDIVIDUAL APPLICATIONS ESPECIALLY MESSAGING AND CONTACTS? I DON'T THINK THERE IS ANY WAY.IF SO,PLEASE TELL ME.
      
      
      MESSAGING :
      
      CON :
      
      WHILE MESSAGING,IT SEEMS LIKE YOU CANNOT TAKE A CURSOR TO THE MIDDLE OF A WORD AND EDIT IT.EITHER YOU HAVE TO DELETE THE WORD COMPLETELY OR DELETE EACH LETTER FROM THE END OF THE WORD TO REACH THE POSITION WHERE YOU WANT TO EDIT.
      
      KEYBOARD FOR MESSAGING IS STANDARD QWERTY TOUCH.IT WOULD BE BETTER IF THERE IS A DIALER TYPE TOUCH KEYBOARD AS WELL FOR THOSE WHO ARE USED TO BASIC PHONES LIKE ME.SINCE QWERTY HAS SMALL BUTTONS,YOU ARE MOST LIKELY TO PRESS A WRONG LETTER.
      
      (PLEASE CORRECT ME IF I AM WRONG.IF THERE IS AN OPTION FOR THIS,PLEASE LET ME KNOW.)
      
      PRO :
      
      THE SUGGESTIONS THAT IT SUGGESTS IS BRILLIANT.IT EVEN WORKS WELL WITH TRANSLITERATED WORDS.
      
      WHEN THERE ARE MORE OPTIONS TO BE SUGGESTED FOR A HALF TYPED WORD,IT ALWAYS SUGGESTS THE WORD THAT YOU HAVE IN MIND!!WELL.IT DOESN'T READ YOUR MIND BUT LEARNS OVER A PERIOD OF TIME AS YOU USE,I GUESS.
      
      FOR EXAMPLE,WHEN I TYPED "CHA" IT SUGGESTED "CHANGE" WHILE I ACTUALLY MEANT "CHARGE". FROM THE SECOND TIME IT SUGGESTED "CHARGE". WELL.YOU COULD ASK WHAT IF I HAD ACTUALLY MEANT "CHANGE" THE SECOND TIME? MAY BE IT SUGGESTS DEPENDING ON THE CONTEXT.MAY BE NOT.
      
      
      BRIGHTNESS :
      
      YOU HAVE ONLY HIGH,MEDIUM AND LOW.THERE IS NO SLIDER.THIS IS NOT A BIG CONCERN.HOWEVER,IT IS ONE EXAMPLE THAT I KNOW OF THAT WP8 HAS LITTLE CUSTOMIZING OPTIONS.
      
      
      CAMERA :
      
      1. "CINEMAGRAPH" WORKS FLAWLESSLY AS EXPECTED.IT IS COOL THAT YOU YOURSELF CAN SELECT THE REQUIRED AREA OF ANIMATION.
      
      2. "SOFTEN SKIN" FEATURE WORKS SMOOTHLY.IT REMOVES THE ROUGHNESS AND GRAINS IN THE FACE IF ANY.
      
      3. "GLAM ME" IS NICE ALTHOUGH IT CANNOT BE CALLED A VERY USEFUL AND UNIQUE FEATURE."MAGAZINE" AND "DRIZZLES ON A WINDOW" MODE IS QUITE ATTRACTIVE.
      
      4.PICTURE QUALITY IS VERY CRISP AND CLEAR IN THE NORMAL SIZE(FITS THE SCREEN). AFTER ZOOMING,CLARITY GETS REDUCED. MAY BE BECAUSE OF A RELATIVELY LOW MEGA PIXELS OR LOW SCREEN RESOLUTION,I AM NOT SURE.
      
      5. YET TO TEST LOW LIGHT IMAGING,FLASH,SMART SHOOT ...
      
      6. "ERASE OBJECTS" FEATURE SEEMS AWESOME IN THE AD.I HOPE IT IS.I HAVE TRIED WITH SOME MOVING OBJECTS.SO FAR I HAVE HAD NO SUCCESS.
      
      
      CALL QUALITY AND AUDIO OUTPUT:
      
      1.IT IS VERY CLEAR.YET TO SEE ITS PERFORMANCE IN A NOISY PLACE.
      
      
      NOKIA MUSIC : YET TO EXPLORE.
      
      NOKIA CITY LENS : YET TO EXPLORE.
      
      NOKIA DRIVE : YET TO EXPLORE.
      
      NOKIA MAPS  : YET TO EXPLORE. (AND COMPARE IT WITH GOOGLE MAPS)
      
      
      OVERALL THOUGHTS :
      
      I HAVE JUST USED IT FOR A DAY AND HAVE ALREADY STARTED FEELING THAT MICROSOFT HAS COMPROMISED ON PRIVACY AND HAS VERY LITTLE CUSTOMIZING OPTIONS.
      
      
      IF I AM WRONG,PLEASE EDUCATE ME ON THAT.
      
      
      HOWEVER, NOKIA HAS COMPENSATED FOR SOME OF THE FLAWS AND INADEQUACIES CREATED BY MICROSOFT WITH ITS HARDWARE, EXCLUSIVE APPS(THOUGH HAVEN'T EXPERIENCED,IT SOUNDS PROFESSIONAL ON PAPER) AND PROMPT AND SINCERE SERVICE.
      
      
      I SINCERELY HOPE THAT MICROSOFT DOES NOT LET NOKIA DOWN AND THAT IT REALLY BEHAVES LIKE A 3RD BIGGEST MOBILE PLATFORM, BY RECTIFYING ITS FLAWS BY GIVING IMMEDIATE UPDATES.
