label: Nokia Lumia 720
Sentences:
WRITING MY FEEDBACK AFTER USING MY LUMIA 720 FOR 3 WEEKS NOW. OVERALL ITS ABOVE AVERAGE.
      
      WHAT I LIKE
      
      - AWESOME BUILD QUALITY. GREAT LOOKS.. MINE IS RED N LOOKS CHICK...
      
      - SUPERB BATTERY LIFE.. WAS ONE OF THE CRITERIA FOR ME TO SELECT THIS ONE.. IT GIVE ME MORE THAN 2 DAYS ON SINGLE CHARGE WITH WIFI ON FOR 6-7 HRS WHEN I,M AT HOME N ON 3G WHEN I,M OUTSIDE. 5 STARS JUST FOR THE BATTERY PERFORMANCE.
      
      - PERFORMANCE.. ITS BUTTERY SMOOTH.. VERY FLUID... NO LAGS.. NO CRASH SO FAR.. EXCELLENT N DELIVERS WHATS PROMISED. THUMBS UP.
      
      - SCREEN IS JUST BEAUTIFUL.
      
      - THIS IS MY FIRST EXPERIENCE WITH WINDOWS PHONE N I LIKE IT SO FAR.. LOVE THE SIMPLICITY OF IT.
      
      - SOCIAL INTEGRATION IS PERFECT. I DOWNLOADED THE FACEBOOK APP BY MICROSOFT BUT HARDLY USE IT AS THE PEOPLE INTEGRATION DOES ITS JOB.
      
      - CAMERA IS GREAT..  ALL THE IN BUILT APPS N LENSES  FOR IT ARE GOOD... 9 ON 10 FOR CAMERA.
      
      - CALL QUALITY IS VERY GOOD
      
      - SPEAKER OUTPUT IS GOOD
      
      
      WHAT I DONT LIKE OR COULD HAVE BEEN BETTER...
      
      THE HANDSFREE THAT WAS PART OF THE BUNDLE IS ABSOLUTELY USELESS..  I CANT RECEIVE CALLS WITH IT IF I,M DRIVING,.. SO WASTE... BUYING ANOTHER ORIGINAL NOKIA HANDSFREE FOR IT IS ALSO COSTLY... HAVING TOUGH TIME FINDING COMPATIBLE ACCESSORIES FOR IT LIKE A DECENT HANDSFREE ETC.
      
      
      VOLUME CONTROL IS IRRITATING.. IF I CHANGE ONCE IT CHANGES EVERYWHERE INCLUDING ALARMS ETC.. BIG LET DOWN..
      
      NO ASCENDING RINGER... NO PROXIMITY SENSOR THAT COULD CONTROL THE VOLUME LEVELS WHEN YOU REACH OUT TO YOUR HANDSET..
      
      TO RECEIVE CALL I MUST SLIDE UP AND THEN RECEIVE CALL... NOT SMART ENOUGH FOR A SMART  PHONE.  WE SHOULD BE ABLE TO RECEIVE OR REJECT CALLS FROM LOCK SCREEN ITSELF , NO?!
      
      DIAL PAD DOESNT ALLOW ME TO EDIT NUMBER BEFORE I DIAL IN.. AGAIN VERY IRRITATING...
      
      
      ALL THESE SMALL POINTS STOP ME FROM SAYING THAT ITS A GREAT "SMART" PHONE.. CAUSE THERE ARE HARDLY ANY SMART THINGS THAT THIS OR A WINDOWS PHONE DOES..
      
      
      THESE ARE THE MOMENTS WHEN I MISS MY ANDRIOD.. HTC.. N STOP ME FROM RECOMMENDING IT TO ANYONE...
      
      
      OVERALL, I,M HAPPY WITH IT AS IT MEETS MY TOP REQUIREMENTS IN A PHONE, BUILD, PERFORMANCE, BATTERY, CALL QUALITY ETC..
      
      
      GO FOR IT.. IT TAKES A WHILE TO GET USED TO THE WINDOWS INTERFACE BUT AFTERWARDS, YOU ENJOY THE SIMPLICITY OF IT..  NOKIA HAS DELIVERED WELL WITH THIS ONE...
      
      
      HOPE WINDOWS OS GETS SMARTER WITH COMING VERSIONS...

      IN ANDROID YOU CAN USE LAUNCHERS, WALLPAPERS AND CUSTOMIZE YOUR PHONE THE WAY YOU WANT WITHOUT ROOTING. IN WP8 THE CUSTOMIZATION OPTIONS ARE TOO LITTLE.
      
      
      ANDROID IS BETTER THAN WP AT THE MOMENT..AND THAT'S WHY NOKIA IS NOT DOING WELL IN HIGH/MID RANGE MARKET..TRUST ME YOU WILL GET BORED AFTER USING FEW DAYS..WP IS BORING AS HELL..

label: Nokia Lumia 720
Sentences:
AFTER READING THROUGH COUNTLESS PREVIEWS AND TRACKING THIS PHONE FOR A MONTH BEFORE ITS LAUNCH, I GIFTED MYSELF THIS BEAUTY TWO DAYS POST MY BIRTHDAY. FOR THE FIRST TEN DAYS, THE PHONE WORKED JUST PERFECT. AFTER THAT, I STARTED ENCOUNTERING PROBLEMS LIKE SCREEN FREEZE. THE ONLY SOLUTION, WHICH IS POWER RESET, IS ANNOYING. ALSO, THE PHONE RESTARTS AUTOMATICALLY. MY YOUNGER BRO WAS PLAYING ANGRY BIRDS AND XBOX KEPT SHUTTING AUTOMATICALLY.
      
      
      THE PHONE PROMISES TO KICK SOME SERIOUS ASSES OF THE PHONES IN ITS SEGMENT...AND THOSE OF ITS EXPENSIVE COUNTERPARTS TOO. BUT SADLY, THIS STUNNER IS A BIG LET DOWN WHEN IT COMES TO ITS FAULTS. I HAVE READ SIMILAR COMPLAINS FROM OTHER LUMIA 720 USERS TOO. HOPE NOKIA (OR FLIPKART) DOES SOMETHING ABOUT IT.

label: Nokia Lumia 720
Sentences:
AFTER RESEARCH FOR WEEKS AND COMPARISONS BETWEEN ANDROID AND WP I DECIDED TO GO WITH WP. I HAD LUMIA 720 IN MIND CONSIDERING DECENT RAM, PROCESSOR, BEST BATTERY BACKUP OUT OF ALL MID RANGE LUMIAS, BEST CAMERA QUALITY, BEST LOOKS AND ABOVE ALL DECENT PRICE. AFTER RECEIVING IT I USED IT FOR A WHILE, SEARCHED FEW APPLICATION, USED THEM FOUND VERY SMOOTH AND GOOD. IT'S TOO SENSITIVE, EVEN A SLIGHT TOUCH WOULD DO THE WORK. I WAS HAPPY.
      
      THEN LATER ON I THOUGHT OF LOCKING MY PERSONAL PICS AND VIDEOS SO THAT NO ONE ELSE HAS ACCESS TO THOSE. HOWEVER I COULD FIND PHOTO LOCKER BUT NOT THE VIDEO LOCKER. ALL THE LOCKER APPLICATION CAN LOCK VIDEOS ONLY WHEN YOU RECORD THEM THROUGH THAT APP AND THEN LOCK. YOU WILL NOT BE ABLE TO LOCK ALREADY SAVED VIDEOS. I SEARCHED EVERYWHERE BUT COULDNT FOUND. SOMEWHERE IT WAS WRITTEN THAT DUE TO LIMITATIONS IN WINDOWS 8 WE CANNOT CREATE APPLICATION TO LOCK ALREADY SAVED VIDEOS. I THOUGHT THAT WAS IT. BUT THIS LIMITATION FOR VIDEO GOES ON WITH OTHER SOCIAL NETWORKING APPLICATIONS AS WELL. I AM USING WHATSAPP. I CAN SEND PICS AND RECEIVE PICS FROM OTHER AND SAVE THEM IN MY CELLPHONE. HOWEVER I CANNOT SEND ALREADY SAVED VIDEOS IN MY CELLPHONE. I'LL HAVE TO RECORD AND THEN SEND. ALSO I CAN WATCH RECEIVED VIDEOS (AFTER BUFFERING) BUT CANNOT SAVE IT IN MY CELLPHONE. THE VIDEOS REMAIN IN WHATSAPP SERVER. SO IF YOU WANNA WATCH VIDEOS YOU'LL HAVE TO SCROLL UP THE CONVERSATION TO GO BACK TO VIDEO AND PLAY. THIS REALLY SUCKED. I AGAIN CONFIRMED WITH OTHER CHAT APPLICATION WHICH IS GAINING MOMENTUM..WECHAT. IN THAT ALSO I DONT HAVE OPTION TO SEND ALREADY SAVED VIDEOS. I CAN RECORD AND THEN SEND. WHO THE HELL RECORD AND SEND VIDEO. VERY RARELY. WE GUYS SEND ALL KIND OF ALREADY SAVED SHIT TO EACH OTHER.
      
      ALSO I CANNOT CREATE FOLDER IN THE WP. WE DONT HAVE ANY APPLICATION TO CREATE A FILE MANAGER. THIS SUCKED TOO. (HOWEVER I KNEW IT BEFORE BUYING SO IT DOESNT REALLY MATTER MUCH) THE LIMITATIONS  WITH VIDEO HAS TO BE RESOLVED BY WP. I HAVE NOW REALIZED WHY WP IS LAGGING BEHIND ANDROID.
      
      
      THE GOOD THINGS IN PHONE ARE FROM NOKIA AND NOT MICROSOFT. FOR EXAMPLE THE CAMERA IS AWESOMME WITH CARL ZEISS LENS, GURILLA GLASS TOUCH. YOU CANNOT REMOVE BATTERY, THIS IS SOMEHOW GOOD. IT MAKES YOUR CELLPHONE KIND OF WATERPROOF. FEW DAYS BACK WHEN I WAS HAVING DINNER, THE PHONE SLIPPED THROUGH MY HAND AND FELL INTO A BOWL OF DAAL. IT DID HURT :-( I TOOK IT OUT, WIPED IT WITH WET CLOTH. AFTER SOMETIME I TESTED BY CALLING ON OTHER CELLPHONE, IT WORKED FINE, THE CAMERA IS WORKING FINE TOO. MICROPHONE TOO DIDNT GET AFFECTED.
      
      IF YOU ARE VIVID USER TO SOCIAL SITES AND GAMES THEN DONT EVEN THINK OF BUYING WP. ANDROID WILL REMAIN BEST.
      
      HOWEVER IF YOU WANNA GO WITH BUILD QUALITY, LONGEVITY AND DURABILITY, THEN GO WITH LUMIA 720. IT'S GOOD.
      
      
      TRUST ME, IF NOKIA RESORTS TO ANDROID, THEN NOTHING CAN BEAT NOKIA. I JUST DONT UNDERSTAND, IF HTC CAN DO IT (BUILD WINDOWS PHONE AS WELL AS ANDROID) THEN WHY CAN'T NOKIA. NOKIA HAS TO RETHINK BEFORE IT LOOSES IT MARKET SHARE IN INDIA

      1. RAM IS 512MB. THERE ARE NOT MANY GREAT APS AVAILABLE FOR WINDOWS 8 TILL NOW. RUNNING HIGH END GAMES WOULD BE A DREAM ON THIS PHONE. FOR EXAMPLE THE RECENTLY RELEASED TEMPLE RUN2 FOR WINDOWS REQUIRE A MINIMUM RAM OF 1GB.
      
      
      2. LOW PIXES DENSITY
      
      
      THE PHONE IS HAVING A PIXEL DENSITY OF 217 WHICH IS SLIGHTLY DISSAPPONTING. ALTHOUGH WIN8 USED LARGE TILE BASED GUI AND IT WONT CREATE MUCH PROBLEM FOR NORMALL USAGE. YOU SHOULD KNOW THAT IT'S YOUNGER AND CHEAPER BROTHER NOKIA 620 GIVES YOU A BETTER PPI OF 246.
      
      
      3. ANTUTU SCORE LESSER THAN NOKIA 620
      
      
      THE PHONE SCORES AN ANTUTU SCORE OF 7343 WHICH IS LESSER THAN NOKIA 620. NOKIA 620 SCORES 9140 WHILE NOKIA 820 SCORES BETTER 11288. THE MORE YOUR SCORE THE BETTER YOUR PROCESSOR EFFICIENT FOR PROCESSING.
      
      
      4. NO FM RADIO. PERSONALLY I DO NOT LISTEN TO FM BUT THIS PHONE DISSAPPOINT THE FM FANS
      
      
      5. AVERAGE AUDIO QUALITY
      
      
      PHONE HAS AVERAGE AUDIO QUALITY AND NOT EVEN COMPARE WITH NOKIA N8 AND NOKIA 808 PHONES.
      
      
      6. CAMERA WITH AVERAGE IMAGE QUALITY.
      
      
      PERHAPS THIS IS THE MOST DISSAPPOINTING THING FROM NOKIA. ALMOST ALL LUMIA SERIES (EXCEPT NOKIA 920) FAILS TO PRODUCE A BETTER IMAGE QUALITY WITH THE CAMERA. IMAGES ARE APPEARED TO BE GRAINY AND NOISY SOMETIMES.
      
      
      ATHOUGH THERE ARE SOME FEW CONS MENTIONED ABOVE THE PHONE SEEMS TO BE A GOOD BUY FOR THE PRICE. HOPE NOKIA CAN PRODUCE MUCH BETTER PHONES IN THE FUTURE.

label: Nokia Lumia 720
Sentences:
I HAVE BEEN USING THIS PHONE FOR TWO MONTHS NOW AND HARDWARE-WISE IT IS ONE OF THE BEST PHONES UNDER THE 20K RANGE. HERE ARE ITS MAJOR ADVANTAGES:
      
      
      + GREAT UNIBODY DESIGN AND LOOKS
      
      + GREAT DISPLAY
      
      + VERY GOOD CAMERA FOR A SMARTPHONE
      
      + GREAT AUDIO QUALITY
      
      + 2000MAH BATTERY IS VERY ADEQUATE CONSIDERING THE SPECS (LASTS FOR ALMOST 2 DAYS WITH MODERATE USE)
      
      + VERY FLUID OS THAT ALSO LOOKS PLEASING
      
      
      WONDER WHY I GAVE THE PHONE ONLY 3 STARS? WELL IT IS BECAUSE THIS PHONE (OR ANY OTHER WINDOWS 8 PHONE FOR THAT MATTER) IS CRIPPLED WITH SOME SOFTWARE LIMITATIONS. LET ME TELL YOU THAT THESE LIMITATIONS HAVE NOTHING TO DO WITH THE SMALLER WINDOWS APP STORE. THE AVERAGE USER MAY (MORE LIKELY) OR MAY NOT FIND THIS STORE SUFFICIENT BUT THAT IS NOT WHAT I AM TALKING ABOUT. RATHER THESE ARE INHERENT LIMITATIONS OF THE OS BY ITSELF. THESE ARE:
      
      
      - LACK OF A FILE MANAGER (BY WINDOWS OR ANY OTHER 3RD PARTY DEVELOPER): THIS IS ONE DISADVANTAGE SO HUGE THAT IT CAN EVEN MAKE YOU REGRET BUYING THIS PHONE (OR ANY OTHER WINDOWS 8 PHONE). LACK OF A FILE MANAGER TRANSLATES TO THE FOLLOWING DISADVANTAGES:
      
      
      1. NO WAY OF CREATING/MOVING/RENAMING SUBFOLDERS INSIDE YOUR DOCUMENTS OR MUSIC OR PICTURES FOLDER. IN OTHER WORDS THERE IS NO WAY OF ORGANIZING THEM.
      
      
      2. IN FACT THERE IS NO WAY OF EVEN ACCESSING THESE FOLDERS WITHOUT CONNECTING TO A PC WITH THE USB CABLE.
      
      
      SO EVERY TIME YOU NEED TO EVEN RENAME A PDF/MUSIC FILE YOU HAVE TO RUN TO A PC WITH A USB CABLE.
      
      
      3. ABSOLUTELY NO WAY TO TRANSFER MUSIC FILES/PDFS/DOCS FROM YOUR PC THROUGH WIFI OR BLUETOOTH. IN ANDROID THERE ARE 3RD PARTY APPS FOR THESE. BUT WINDOWS COMPLETELY RESTRICTS ANY APP FROM EVEN ACCESSING THE MUSIC/DOCS FOLDERS. HENCE WIRELESS TRANSFER IS NOT POSSIBLE. (FOR PDF/DOCS THERE IS AN OPTION TO TRANSFER IT VIA SKYDRIVE BUT THIS REQUIRES INTERNET. EVEN THEN THIS IS NOT POSSIBLE FOR MUSIC FILES.)
      
      
      4. IF YOU READ A LOT (LIKE I DO) AND HAVE SAY 300+ PDFS THERE IS NO WAY OF ORGANIZING THEM IN FOLDERS BY AUTHOR/GENRE ETC. THIS MAKES ACCESSING YOUR EBOOKS (BY SCROLLING THROUGH A LIST OF 300+ PDFS) CLOSE TO IMPOSSIBLE. AGAIN YOU CAN'T RENAME YOUR EBOOKS UNLESS YOU CONNECT TO YOUR PC.
      
      
      5. AS YOU CANNOT ACCESS THESE FOLDERS, YOU CANNOT ATTACH A WORD OR A PDF FILE IN YOUR EMAIL. IN FACT YOU CAN ATTACH ONLY IMAGE FILES.
      
      
      TO SUMMARIZE, THIS PHONE (OR ANY OTHER WINDOWS 8 PHONE) SIMPLY CEASES TO BE 'SMART' WITHOUT A SUPPORTING PC AND A USB CABLE AND THAT IS NOT HOW A SMARTPHONE WAS INTENDED TO BE.
      
      
      - INABILITY TO CUSTOMIZE AND MICROMANAGE SETTINGS AND FEATURES: THIS IS NOT AS BIG A DISADVANTAGE AS THE PREVIOUS ONE BUT IT DOES PRESENT A GOOD NUMBER OF PROBLEMS. SOME OF THEM ARE:
      
      
      1. YOU CANNOT SET DIFFERENT VOLUME LEVELS FOR ALARM, RINGTONE AND MUSIC. THERE IS JUST THIS ONE UNIVERSAL VOLUME CONTROL. SO SUPPOSE YOU REDUCED THE VOLUME LEVEL WHILE LISTENING TO MUSIC AND FORGOT TO TURN IT BACK TO HIGH, CHANCES ARE THAT YOU WON'T NOTICE YOUR PHONE RINGING IN THE NEXT ROOM OR YOU WON'T BE WOKEN UP BY YOUR ALARM THE NEXT DAY.
      
      
      2. YOU CAN'T CUSTOMIZE THE APPEARANCE OF YOUR START SCREEN VERY MUCH. NOT A PROBLEM FOR ME AS I FIND THE DEFAULT ONE VERY PLEASING.
      
      
      SO TO SUM UP, IF YOU ARE SURE THAT THESE SOFTWARE LIMITATIONS WILL NOT AFFECT OR BRING DOWN YOUR EXPERIENCE WITH AN OTHERWISE FANTASTIC SMARTPHONE THEN GO FOR IT. IF YOU EVEN HAVE THE SMALLEST DOUBT GO FOR AN ANDROID INSTEAD, BECAUSE TRUST ME YOU WILL REGRET AFTERWARDS.

label: Nokia Lumia 720
Sentences:
I HAD NOKIA LUMIA 620 AND I WANT TO WARN THE PEOPLE WHO WANTS TO BUY THIS PHONE..THIS A REVIEW OF A WINDOWS SOFTWARE NOT OF A PHYSICAL REVIEW OF 720.
      
      FIRST OF ALL THERE IS NO DOUBT ABOUT ITS SCREEN CLARITY AND QUALITY..IT IS BEST IN CLASS..AMAZING COLOR REPRODUCTION..AMAZING VIEWING ANGLES...CLEAR BLACK DISPLAY..WHICH MAKES VIDEO LOOKS LIKE TRUE TO LIFE QUALITY.....NOW THIS IS WHERE ROLE OF NOKIA ENDS ...(10 OUT OF 10 )
      
      1. BUT HERE COMES THE FAULTY OS...FIRST OF ALL THERE IS NO ALL IN ONE STATUS AND NOTIFICATION BAR THROUGH WHICH WE CAN CHECK OUR DAILY APPS..MESSAGES OR CALLS...
      
      
      2. ONE HAS TO GO THROUGH EACH TILE AND THEN RECEIVE THE NOTIFICATIONS..I MISSED SO MANY OF MY CALLS....THERE IS NO LED INDICATOR WHICH ALERTS THE USER ABOUT ITS MISSED NOTIFICATION BARS.
      
      
      3. WHAT THE HELL MICROSOFT WERE THINKING....NO FILE MANAGER...HOW THE HELL WE GONNA ARRANGE AND ACCESS OUR FILES AND KEEP THEM ACCORDING TO OUR DESIRE...THIS IS WHERE WINDOW OS IS FAR FAR FAR FAR BEHIND THE MIGHTY ANDROID...
      
      
      4. THIRDLY FILES RECEIVED THROUGH BLUETOOTH CANT BE ACCESS IMMEDIATELY...ONE HAS TO BE HAVE A DETECTIVE SKILLS IN ORDER TO FIND THE FILE..
      
      
      5.THERE IS NO SHORT CUT APP FOR BRINGING THE SETTINGS PARTS MENU TO THE FRONT...U HAVE TO ALL THE WAY HAVE TO GO TO THE SETTINGS AND THEN DO THE JOB
      
      6.TALKING OF AAP STORE...IT IS 100 % TRUE THAT IT IS ONE OF THE PATHETIC STORE OF ALL TIME...THE GAMES WHICH ARE GREAT ARE PAID AND WHICH ARE FREE...NOT EVEN A SINGLE WHICH WILL INSPIRE UI THE MOST...NO DOUBT THE PERFORMANCE AND CLARITY IS THERE...BUT WHAT WILL I DO WITH THE CLARITY WHEN THERE IS NOTHING TO DO....
      
      
      7. SERIOUS I JUST ALL DAY SLIDING THE PHONE UP TO DOWN AND DOWN TO UP..THATS ALL..NOTHING IS THERE...
      
      PEOPLE WHO ARE VIDEO VIEWERS WILL ENJOY THIS PHONE....

label: Nokia Lumia 720
Sentences:
DELIVERY BY FLIPKART TOOK ONLY ONE DAY, SO KUDOS TO FK FOR THAT.
      
      NOW FOR THE PHONE:
      
      PROS:
      
      1. A GREAT HARDWARE.
      
      2. BUILD QUALITY THAT SEEMS TO OUTSHINE EVERY PHONE OUT THERE. TYPICAL OF WHAT YOU EXPECT FROM NOKIA GUYS.
      
      3. GREAT USER INTERFACE. A GREAT RELIEF FROM THE USUAL GRID-APP-CENTRIC LAYOUT OF APPLE/ANDROID DEVICES.
      
      4. DECENT CAMERA. WITH APPS LIKE PHOTO-SYNTH AND A COOL SNAPPER LIKE THIS, IT ALMOST OUTSHINES ALL THE MOBILES IN THIS PRICE RANGE.
      
      
      CONS:
      
      
      1. THE WINDOWS OS SYSTEM IS VERY-VERY LIMITING:
      
      A. YOU CAN'T MAKE ANY OF THE SONGS IN YOUR PHONE AS YOUR RINGTONE. TO DO THAT YOU NEED TO CONNECT IT TO YOUR COMPUTER AND THEN TRANSFER THE SONGS IN THE RINGTONE FOLDER AND THEN THERE ARE ADDITIONAL RESTRICTIONS TO THE FILES THAT YOU CAN TRANSFER.
      
      B. YOU CAN'T SEND PERSONAL DOCUMENTS/BOOKS ON THE KINDLE APP. IN ANDROID YOU CAN.
      
      C. PHOTOS IN EMAILS DO NOT APPEAR AUTOMATICALLY AND SOMETIMES FAIL TO LOAD EVEN AFTER CLICKING DOWNLOAD BUTTON.
      
      D. YOU CANT SHARE SONGS VIA BLUETOOTH.
      
      E. YOU CANNOT MAKE A PLAYLIST OF YOUR SONGS. EVEN MY E63 COULD DO A BETTER JOB.
      
      F. THERE ARE ONLY 3 BRIGHTNESS SETTINGS.
      
      G. IF YOU REDUCE THE SOUND IN SONG/VIDEO PLAYER THE SOUND OF THE WHOLE PHONE REDUCES AS WELL. THERE ARE NO SEPARATE SETTINGS FOR BOTH.
      
      H. LACK OF APPS. EVEN DROPBOX DOESN'T HAVE ITS OFFICIAL APP FOR WINDOWS YET. AND MOST OF THE APPS ARE PAID, EVEN ANGRY BIRDS.
      
      G. KEYBOARD IS NOT AS INTUITIVE AS IT IS FOR ANDROID.
      
      
      2. THE PHONE RESTARTS ON ITS OWN EVERY OTHER DAY.
      
      3. HEATS UP A LOT WHILE DOWNLOADING ANYTHING.
      
      4. BATTERY BACKUP IS PATHETIC TO SAY THE LEAST.
      
      
      CONCLUSION: I AM PRETTY MUCH SURE THAT ITS NOT NOKIA'S FAULT THAT THE DEVICE IS SO BAD.
      
      TO PEOPLE WHO SAY THAT ANDROID LAGS: MY HTC EXPLORER WHICH HAD A 600 MHZ PROCESSOR NEVER HUNG UP. ONE ONLY NEEDS TO BE ABLE TO STOP THE BACKGROUND APPLICATIONS AND ANY PERSON WHO HAS AN IQ OF OVER 100 CAN DO IT EASILY.
      
      IT'S A GOOD TRY BY NOKIA, BUT MS WINDOWS 8 IS A FAR CRY FROM ANDROID. AVOID THIS PRODUCT. SAVE UP A FEW MORE THOUSANDS AND BUY A DECENT ANDROID PHONE.

Sentences:
HI,
      
      
      I BOUGHT NOKIA LUMIA ON 07TH MAY 2013. THE FIRST PROBLEM ENCOUNTERED IN 5 DAYS OF BUYING WAS IT GOT STUCK AND REMAIN DEAD FOR 15 MINS AND AFTER THAT IT RESTARTED AND WORKING FINE. THIS WAS A CONTINUOUS PROBLEM.
      
      
      THEN ON 18TH JUNE 2013 MORNING, AFTER STOPPING THE ALARM, IT STARTED VIBRATING AND THE VIBRATION DID NOT STOP EVEN AFTER SWITCHING THE PHONE DOWN. THEN IT BECAME PERMANENTLY DEAD. I SUBMITTED THE PHONE IN NOKIA CARE ON 19TH JUNE 2013. THE PEOPLE ON NOKIA CARE TOLD ME THAT THE PHONE HAS BEEN SENT FROM JAIPUR TO NOIDA STATING IT NEEDS REPAIR AND IT CAN BE REPAIRED FROM THERE ITSELF.
      
      
      NOKIA LUMIA 720 IS A PATHETIC DEVICE. I WASTED MY 18 GRANDS FOR THIS GOOD FOR NOTHING PRODUCT. THE CURRENT STATUS IS THAT THE PHONE IS BEING SENT TO NOIDA AND IS BEING WORKED ON IT. I AM SKEPTICAL THAT IT WILL BE WORKING FINE.
      
      
      NOKIA HAS QUALITY CHECKS, SIX SIGMA TECHNOLOGY TO ASSESS KAIZEN, MUDAS ETC RELATED TO THE PRODUCT. ANY DEFECTED PIECE IN THE MARKET CLEARLY SIGNIFIES THAT THE EITHER THE PRODUCTION DEPARTMENT OR THE QUALITY DEPARTMENT IS NOT SENSITIVE TOWARDS THE CUSTOMERS THEY ARE SERVING.
      
      
      FOR THE FIRST TIME, I HAVE TO SAY THAT NOKIA IS PATHETIC AND ITS NOT WORTH BUYING THEIR PRODUCTS.
      
      
      IF THE NOKIA CARE IS NOT ABLE TO RESOLVE THE ISSUE, THEN I WOULD ESCALATE THE MATTER TO THE CONSUMER FORUM AS I AM LEFT WITH NO CHOICE.
      
      
      PLEASE IF YOU STILL GO FOR THIS PRODUCT, KINDLY ENSURE THAT THE PRODUCT DESIGN, HARDWARE, SOFTWARES ARE UPTO THE MARK OR NOT.
      
      
      THANKS.

Sentences:
I HAD PLANNED TO BUY THIS PHONE AS SOON AS IT WAS ANNOUNCED BY NOKIA . I WAS EXCITED TO BUY THIS PHONE BECAUSE OF ITS ATTRACTIVE LOOKS , DECENT SPECIFICATIONS, GOOD BATTERY AND AN IMPRESSIVE CAMERA AS PER THE REVIEWS GIVEN BY SEVERAL EXPERTS. SO I SOLD MY GALAXY S2 WHICH I USED IT FOR 1.5 YEARS WITH LOT OF EXPERIMENTATION WITH ANDROID , BRICKED THE MOTHERBOARD :P AFTER ROOTING AND GOT IT REPLACED. ORDERED THE LUMIA 720 ON 6TH JUNE AND GOT IT DELIVERED ON 8TH JUNE (GOOD SERVICE BY FLIPKART). INITIAL 2 WEEKS PHONE WORKED FABULOUSLY , EXCELLENT BATTERY LIFE, DECENT PERFORMANCE ETC ETC. BUT IN THE 3RD WEEK PROBLEMS STARTED TO ARISE,LIKE
      
      1. GETTING HUNG WHILE LISTENING TO MUSIC ,TILL I HAD TO SOFT RESET IT
      
      2.  STARTED TO VIBRATE CONTINOUSLY WITHOUT ANY REASON , UNTIL SOFT RESET
      
      3. SUDDEN DROP IN BATTERY LIFE , SO I HAD TO HARD RESET IT.
      
      ONE FINE NIGHT THE PHONE STARTED TO VIBRATE CONTINOUSLY FOR MORE THAN 1 HOUR WHILE I WAS ASLEEP, IT WAS VIBRATING EVEN WHEN I SWITCHED IT OFF!!!  THEN I DID A SOFT RESET , EVEN THEN IT DIDNT STOP. FINALLY I HAD TO DO HARD RESET TO STOP IT .
      
      SO I COMPLAINED TO FLIPKART ON 4TH JULY AND THEY AGREED FOR REFUND AS CYAN COLOUR WAS OUT OF STOCK, BUT AFTER FEW DAYS WHEN THE STOCKS ARRIVED THEY SENT ME A REPLACEMENT. I GOT THE REPLACEMENT ON 15TH JULY EVENING(BRAND NEW ONE ..... AS PER FLIPKART). ONE WHOLE DAY ITS WAS ALRIGHT. NEXT DAY (17TH JULY) MORNING , AFTER I SWITCHED ALARM OFF IN PHONE , GOT FRESHENED UP AND WHEN I CAME BACK AFTER 15MIN PHONE WAS DEAD !!!!!!!!!!!! NO RESPONSE AT ALL !!!!! . EVEN AFTER I TRIED SOFT RESET , HARD RESET AND TRIED CHARGING BUT NO RESPONSE AT ALL !!!! I CALLED FLIPKART AT THAT MOMENT AND FILED A COMPLAINED , THEY HAVE AGREED FOR A REFUND AFTER THEIR TECHNICAL TEAM VERIFY THE COMPLAINT . WHOM SHOULD I BLAME ????????????? FLIPKART OR NOKIA ?????? TOTALLY DISAPPOINTED

label: Nokia Lumia 720
Sentences:
I HATE NEITHER  WINDOWS 8 NOR NOKIA. BUT I REALLY DO HATE THEIR COMBINATION - NOKIA LUMIA 720. I OWN THIS PHONE FOR MORE THAN A MONTH AND NOW I REALLY WANT TO GET RID OF THIS. I WANT TO DICUSS ONLY THE CONS OF THIS PHONE, AS ALL THE PROS (IF THERE IS ANY) WILL BE IGNORED WITH THE INTENSITY OF THE CONS.
      
      
      1. NO DEDICATED FOLDER STRUCTURE. NOTHING LIKE A "GALLERY" OR "MY FILES". SO THERE IS NO QUESTION OF COPYING FILES FROM ONE FOLDER TO ANOTHER BECAUSE THERE IS NO FOLDER AT ALL.
      
      
      2. ITS TRUE THAN YOU CAN USE A EXTERNAL MEMORY CARD. BUT THE ONLY ACTION YOU CAN PERFORM ON THE FILES IN YOUR MEMORY CARD IS DELETE. NO COPY , PASTE OR EVEN "RENAME". IF YOU HAVE TO DO ANY OF THESE YOU HAVE TO CONNECT THE PHONE TO A COMPUTER.
      
      
      3. YES, BLUETOOTH IS THERE. BUT YOU CANNOT RENAME YOUR BLUETOOTH. OK FINE. WHAT IS THERE IN A NAME! BUT WHAT HAPPENS TO THE FILES YOU RECIEVE VIA BLUETOOTH. IF YOU ARE LUCKY, YOU WILL FIND THEM IN YOUR "SAVED PICTURES" . BUT IN MOST THE CASES YOU WONT SEE YOUR RECIEVED FILES AT ALL.
      
      
      4. YOU CANT DOWNLOAD A VIDEO FILE. ITS TRUE THAT THERE ARE YOU TUBE DOWNLOADER APPLICATIONS. BUT YOU CAN VIEW THESE VIDEOS ONLY WITHIN THESE APLLICATIONS . YOU CANT SAVE THEM TO YOUR SD CARD. SOME MAY ASK WHAT IS THE BIG ISSUE IN IT. BUT GUYS, THESE VIDEO APPLICATIONS USE THE PHONE'S INTERNAL STORAGE MEMORY AND EVENTUALLY THE PHONE BEGINS TO HANG.
      
      
      5. THE MOST FUNNY THING I FOUND IN THIS PHONE IS "FILE MULTIPLICATION". SUPPOSE YOU TOOK A PHOTOGRAPH OR DOWNLAODED A MUSIC FILE TODAY. TOMMORROW YOU CAN SEE 2 COPIES
      
      OF IT IN YOUR PHONE. THE NEXT DAY 3, THEN 4 AND SO ON. BUT IF YOU DELETE ANY ONE OF THESE, ALL WILL BE GONE DONT THINK THAT ANY VIRUS HAS AFFECTED MY PHONE. BACUSE FORM DAY 1 ITS SO.
      
      
      (COMBINING POINTS 4 AND 5 TOGETHER AND A PREVIOUS COMMENT. SOMEBODY SAID ITS POSSIBLE TO DOWNLOAD VIDEOS USING UC BROWSER. FIRST THING , UC BROWSER FOR WINDOWS ITSELF IS A PIECE OF SHIT. IT HANGS EVERY 1 MINUTE. SECOND, IF YOU DOWNLOAD A VIDEO AND EXPORT IT YOUR PHONE, SOMETIMES IT GETS EXPORTED AND SOMETIMES NOT. IF LUCKILY IT GOT EXPORTED, IT BEGINS TO MULTIPLY AS I SAID IN POINT 5)
      
      
      6, THE BATTERY. WITH THE INTERNET AND ALL THE BACKGROUND TASKS OFF, AND WITH NO LIVE TILES ON THE HOME SCREEN, THE MAXIMUM TIME I GOT WITH THE BATTERY IS 11 HOURS. IF I TURN ALL FEATURES ON, IT DRAINS IN 5-7 HOURS.
      
      
      7. YOU CANNOT OPEN THE PDF OR .TXT FILES PRESENT IN YOUR SD CARD. ONLY THOSE PDF FILES YOU DOWNLOAD VIA INTERNET CAN BE OPENED. AGAIN YOU CANNOT PDFS YOU DOWNLOAD IN YOUR SD CARD.
      
      
      8. APPLICATIONS CAN BE SAVED TO PHONE ONLY, NOT IN SD CARD.
      
      
      9. I STILL DONT KNOW WHAT IS HAPPENING TO MY INTERNAL MEMORY AND WHAT IS OCCUPYING IT. ANYWAY ITS FULL NOW. AND ONLY THING I COULD DO IS TO UNINSTALL THE PRESENT APPLICATIONS.
      
      
      10. THESE COMMENTS ARE FROM MY EXPERIENCE FOR MORE THAN A MONTH. TODAY I DONT HAVE THIS PHONE TO EXPERIENCE NOT BACAUSE I SOLD IT, BUT BECAUSE ITS DEAD NOW. FOR ANY OTHER PHONE YOU CAN TRY REMOVING THE BATTERY, RE-INSERTING IT AND RESTARTING. BUT WHAT CAN YOU DO WITH THIS INTERNAL BATTERY?????
      
      
      AGAIN I WANT TO TELL YOU AN AWKWARD EXPERIENCE WITH THIS PHONE. I AM A TECHIE AND HAS A HABIT OF LISTENING TO MUSIC WHILE CODING. ONE DAY IN OFFICE, I CONNECTED THE NOKIA HEADSET AND STARTED THE MUSIC. BUT MUSIC WAS PLAYING VIA LOUDSPEAKER ONLY. IT WAS NOT RECOGNIZING THE HEADSET AT ALL. I TRIED TO STOP THE MUSIC. BUT NONE OF THE KEYS WORKED, NOT THE PAUSE BUTTON, NOT THE VOLUME KEYS, NOT THE BACK BUTTON. I TRIED TO SWITCH THE PHONE OFF. BUT IT DIDNT WORK EITHER. I HAD TO COVER THE LOUDSPEAKER WITH MY FINGERTIP FOR ABOUT 10 MINUTES HELPLESS AND SUDDENLY THE PHONE SWITCHED OFF. WITH RELIEF I REMOVED MY FINGERTIPS AND I COULDNT BELIEVE WHAT HAPPENED . MUSIC WAS STILL BEING PLAYED FROM THE SWITCHED OFF PHONE. AGAIN FOR THE NEXT 2-3 MINUTES I HAD TO COVER THE LOUDSPEAKER BEFORE THE MUSIC STOPPED. I SWITCHED IT ON AGAIN ONLY AFTER REACHING HOME. IF I HAD SOLD THE PHONE THAT DAY ITSELF. I WOULDNO HAVE TO KEEP A DEAD PHONE NOW IN MY HANDS.
      
      
      PS: I GIVE THIS PHONE "A SINGLE STAR" ONLY BACUSE I DONT HAVE ANY LOWER OPTION TO SELECT.

label: Nokia Lumia 920
Sentences:
1. NO 3G VIDEO CALLING -> WHAT IS SKYPE FOR? THERE ISN'T ANY ALTERNATIVE FOR WINDOWS PHONE'S SKYPE INTEGRATION. THEN THERE ARE LOADS OF OTHER VIDEO CALL APPS TOO.
      
      
      2. NO FILE BROWSER. (MICROSOFT'S SMART ANSWER IS : IT'S A CLOSED SOURCE ) THIS ANSWER DOESN'T FULFILL THE USER'S REQUIREMENT -> MICROSOFT NEVER GAVE THAT ANSWER BECAUSE IT DOES NOT MAKE SENSE. WINDOWS DESKTOP HAS FILE BROWSER, SO IS IT OPEN SOURCE? PLEASE UNDERSTAND WHAT OPEN SOURCE IS, IT IS THE ABILITY TO MODIFY SOURCE CODE AND IS COMPLETELY UNRELATED TO FILE BROWSER.
      
      
      WHY IS FILE BROWSER NOT PRESENT IN WP? BECAUSE WP DOES NOT IMPOSE STONE AGE FEATURES ON IT'S USER. WHY BOTHER TO CREATE FOLDERS? WHY MOVE THINGS? WHY DO EVERYTHING MANUALLY WHEN YOUR PHONE DOES IT FOR YOU? THE FIRST SIGN OF A MODERN SMARTPHONE OS IS THE ABSENCE OF FILE MANAGER. THAT IS WHY YOU WON'T FIND ONE ON IOS. ONLY SOME INSECURE, BUGGY OS HAS FILE MANAGER.
      
      
      3. NO LOW BATTERY INDICATION - IT JUST SAY GOOD BYE AND SHUTS DOWN -> COMPLETELY FALSE. IT SHOWS A POPUP SAYING BATTERY IS LOW AND BATTERY SAVER MODE IS TURNED ON. THIS FEATURE IS PRESENT IN EVERY WINDOWS PHONE.
      
      
      4. NO SUPPORT FOR HID BLUETOOTH PROFILE -> SERIOUSLY I DO NOT SEE ANY NEED OF THIS IN TODAY'S WORLD. EVERYBODY IS GOING COMPACT INSTEAD OF USING PHYSICAL KEYBOARDS OR MICE.
      
      
      5.CAN YOU SEEK FORWARD OR BACKWARD IN WINDOWS MEDIA PLAYER WHILE PLAYING MP3, CAN YOU IMAGINE THAT IF YOU CANNOT CONTROL THE SONG -> TIGHT PRESS ON LEFT ARROWS TO SEEK BACK AND RIGHT ARROWS TO SEEK FORWARD.
      
      
      AS I HAVE GIVEN MY ANSWERS KINDLY USE THE PHONE, OR YOU CAN ASK QUESTIONS IN FORUMS. BUT THINGS LIKE SEEK AND BATTERY NOTIFICATION SHOULD BE KNOWN TO ALL, WONDER THEY WERE NOT ANSWERED!
      
      
      BY THE WAY THE PHONE PERFORMS SMOOTHLY AND DOES NOT NEED QUAD CORE PROCESSOR UNLIKE HTC ONE X :)

      - CONS
      
      * VIBRATION MAKES AN ANNOYING RATTLE (THIS IS NOT PARTICULAR TO MY DEVICE). A TRAGEDY FOR A PHONE THAT'S OTHERWISE SO WELL MADE. I HOPE A PATCH FIXES THIS SOON (SHOULD REDUCE THE POWER TO THE MOTOR).
      
      * WHILE ALL THE IMPORTANT APPS ARE THERE, THE GOOGLE VS MS WAR LEAVES A FEW IMPORTANT CASUALTIES (GMAIL APP). THIS IS MORE A LONG TERM CONCERN FOR WP8 OWNERS.

Sentences:
I HAVE BOTH THE PHONES FOR THE LAST 3 MONTHS (NOKIA L920 IS PERSONAL AND SIII FROM WORK) AND HERE IS WHAT I FEEL AS THE PROS AND CONS. FOR FULL DISCLOSURE, I AM BASED IN US WITH LTE ON BOTH PHONES.
      
      
      KEYBOARD: I LIKE NOKIA KEYBOARD ACCURACY MUCH BETTER THAN SIII IN TERMS OF TYPING ACCURACY AS WELL AS PREDICTIONS.
      
      BATTERY: NOKIA LASTS LONGER THAN SIII FOR SURE. IF I USE MY SIII HEAVILY, IT NEEDS CHARGING BY LATE AFTERNOON. ALSO, THE WIRELESS CHARGING ON L920 IS PRETTY COOL.
      
      APPS: GALAXY SIII DEFINITELY HAVE MORE, BUT 90% OF MY USAGE IS EMAILS, FACEBOOK, MUSIC, GAMES WHICH THE LIVE TILES ON 920 GIVE EASY ACCESS TO. ON GSIII, I USUALLY GET LOST ON THE CAROUSEL. THE GOOGLE ECOSYSTEM  (MAPS, STORE ETC.) IS GREAT, AND MICROSOFT/NOKIA IS NOT THERE YET. HOWEVER, I USE ONENOTE AND SKYDRIVE AND PERSONALLY, I FEEL THE EMAIL CLIENT ON NOKIA IS BETTER.
      
      
      BUILD QUALITY: NOKIA HANDS DOWN. THE CHEAP BATTERY COVER ON GSIII IS A DISGRACE TO FLAGSHIPS. THE CERAMIC BUTTONS ON THE 920 ARE SCRATCH FREE AND TOOK CARE OF ONE OF THE MAJOR ISSUES I HAD WITH MY PHONES-THAT IS SCRATCHING THE CHROME BUTTONS WITH MY NAILS. NOT ANYMORE ON L920.
      
      SCREEN: I LIKE BOTH, THE SMOOTH SCROLLING ON L920 IS REALLY NOTICEABLE. ALSO, L920 PERFORMS BETTER IN SUNLIGHT.
      
      WEIGHT: L920 IS A BIT ON THE HEAVY SIDE, GSIII IS DEFINITELY LIGHTER, SO LIGHT THAT I AM AFRAID TO PUT IT IN MY BACK POCKET THAT I MAY BREAK IT INTO TWO WHILE SITTING.
      
      
      CAMERA: BOTH HAVE GREAT CAMERAS AND HAVE THEIR OWN ADVANTAGES. L920 CAMERA PERFORMS BETTER IN LOW LIGHT, BUT GSIII CAMERA IS VERY VIBRANT FOR NORMAL LIGHTING.
      
      
      HARDWARE SPECS AND OS: YOU CANNOT LOOK AT THE TWO SEPARATELY. ANDROID HAS IMPROVED OVER THE YEARS IN TERMS OF PERFORMANCE, BUT THE GSIII STILL STUTTERS ONCE IN A WHILE. THE OS STILL HAVE SOME NIGGLES AND REMINDS ME OF OLD SYMBIAN-JACK OF ALL TRADES, BUT NOT A MASTER BY ANY MEANS. THE OS IS PRETTY HARDWARE INTENSIVE, WHICH IS WHY ANDROID MANUFACTURERS KEEP BUMPING THE SPECS TO OVERCOME THIS WEAKNESS. THE MORE HEAVY THE SPECS, THE MORE BATTERY IT USES AND OBVIOUSLY IT SHOWS. ON THE OTHER HAND, WP8 IS SO SMOOTH AND LIGHT, IT IS SUCH A PLEASURE TO USE. IT IS NOT CUSTOMIZABLE AS ANDROID, BUT THE USER EXPERIENCE IS THE BEST AMONG ALL OS, BAR NONE. FOR THE SAME HARDWARE, WP8 WILL DEFINITELY PERFORM BETTER THAN ANDROID.

Sentences:
I WAS USING ANDROID OS BASED PHONES SINCE LAST 04 YEARS AND THIS IS MY FIRST HAND ON EXPERIENCE ON WINDOWS OS.
      
      DESIGN: THIS PHONE IS A AWESOME PIECE OF DESIGN, ENGINEERING AND CRAFTSMAN SHIP BY NOKIA. A POLY-CARBONATE BODY IS EXCELLENT AND RESISTING ALMOST EVERY SCRATCH. SCREEN SIZE AND RESOLUTION IS WONDERFUL, UNLIKE OTHER NOKIA PHONES THIS PHONE IS QUITE TOUCH SENSITIVE AND RESPONSIVE AND GLASS HAS EXCELLENT CAPABILITY TO AVOID ANY KIND OF SCRATCHES.
      
      OS:  AS I EXPERIENCED, WINDOWS OS IS A 'NO KIDDING' OS UNLIKE ANDROID. ALTHOUGH I FOUND ALMOST EVERY APPLICATION AND GAMES WHICH I USED TO USE ON MY ANDROID PHONE.
      
      BATTERY: AS LIKE EVERY LARGE SCREEN SMART PHONES, IT WORK FOR YOU FOR A DAY IN NORMAL USE CONDITION, WHICH IS NOT BAD.
      
      OVERALL: PROS: SUPERB BUILT QUALITY, EXCELLENT SCREEN, GOOD BATTERY, IMPRESSIVE LOOKS, NOKIA NAVIGATION AND MAPS.
      
      CON: EXPENSIVE, PROCESSOR COULD BE FASTER AND LACK OF NUMBERS OF APPS ON NOKIA STORE SPECIALLY MISSING YOU TUBE.

label: Nokia Lumia 920
Sentences:
I'M A STUDENT OF SCITECH AND I WANTED A PHONE THAT WOULD SIMPLIFY MY LIFE BY REDUCING THE NUMBER OF THINGS I CARRY AROUND IN MY POCKET: TO MERGE A PHONE WITH GOOD RECEPTION, A GREAT CAMERA (CAN SNEAKILY TAKE GREAT PICTURES INSIDE CLASSROOMS EVEN!), A MINI-TABLET THAT READS, WRITES, TAKES NOTES, TRANSLATES ETC, AND EASILY SYNCHS WITH MY LAPTOP. ALSO, INCREDIBLY DURABLE.
      
      
      THE NATURAL CHOICE WAS THE BEST PHONE NOKIA COULD MAKE - FROM PAST EXPERIENCE - AND LUCKILY, IT COMES WITH A GREAT CAMERA.
      
      
      AM I SATISFIED? WELL, HERE ARE THE GOOD POINTS:
      
      
      1)AMAZING TOUCH SENSITIVITY (I CAN NAVIGATE WITH MY FINGER 1MM OFF THE SCREEN) AND RESPONSE - FEELS GREAT TO OWN
      
      
      2)GOOD STORAGE 32GB
      
      
      3)GOOD BATTERY - IT ONLY EATS THE BATTERY WHEN YOU ARE PLAYING GAMES, BUT PERFORMS REASONABLY WELL WITH MOVIES AND YOU CAN HEAR SONGS ON IT ALL DAY. INTERNET SURFING TIME IS PRETTY DECENT. OVERNIGHT, IT WAS CONNECTED TO WIFI AND UPDATED ALL APPS- I HAVE A LOT OF APPS - AND SYNCHED FACEBOOK AND GMAIL - AFTER 24HRS IT HAD LOST 1% BATTERY... BRILLIANT!
      
      
      4) VERY DECENT CAMERA WITH GOOD APPS (LOOK UP NOKIA LENSES). ANDROID MAY HAVE MORE VARIETY THOUGH BUT THEN, THE QUALITY OF IMAGES IS BRILLIANT ONLY ON THE 920 OVERALL, IF YOU CONSIDER IMAGE RESOLUTION, QUALITY, AND STABILIZATION. THERE IS A BUTTON FOR CAMERA AND THE CAMERA CAN BE ACCESSED EVEN WHEN THE SCREEN IS LOCKED WITH A LONG PRESS OF THE BUTTON - I DON'T KNOW HOW MANY OF YOU WILL APPRECIATE THE IMPORTANCE OF THIS.
      
      
      5) I LIKE THE TILES - LIFE IS A LOT MORE SIMPLER, BUT MISS THE LIVE-WALLPAPER ON ANDROIDS (NOT LIKE I USED IT ANYWAY, TO CONSERVE BATTERY!) THE INTERFACE IS VERY SIMPLIFIED AND NOTHING REALLY IS MISSING, UNLESS YOU ARE A HELLBENT ON HAVING THE ANDROID SCREENS. IN FACT, THERE IS A NICE FEATURE CALLED "HUBS" WHICH GROUPS DIFFERENT KINDS OF APPS TOGETHER, WHICH DOES LOOK LIKE THE ANDROID OR IOS SHELLS - BUT YOU CAN'T MODIFY IT. STILL, LIFE IS SIMPLER - THE PRE-PROGRAMMED GROUPING IS CONVENIENT.
      
      
      6) I KNOW THE APPS ARE TERRIBLY INCOMPETENT COMPARED TO ANDROID BUT FACE IT - THE GROWTH CURVE IS SHARPER FOR WP8. I LIKE THE APPS (BUT MOST OF THE GOOD ONES ARE NOT FREE, SO BEWARE). MOST OF THE ONES IMPORTANT TO ME ARE THERE. THE NOKIA SPECIFIC APPS ARE COOL ESPECIALLY CITYSCAPE. SO DONT GET VERY WORRIED THAT WP8 IS PRIMITIVE COMPARED TO ANDRD AND IOS (READ: 10 WINDOWS PHONE 8 FEATURES THAT WOULD MAKE ANDROID EVEN SWEETER BY KAVAFIAN)
      
      
      7) SYNCHS PRETTY WELL WITH WINDOWS7
      
      
      8) LOOKS BEAUTIFUL, LOOKS AMAZING (I HAVE MATTE BLACK), IS VERY STRONG AND IT'S A LITTLE HEAVY BUT UNLIKE WHAT I FEARED - YOU DON'T FEEL THE WEIGHT, EVEN IN YOUR POCKET. IT'S ABOUT 50-60G HEAVIER THAN WHAT MOST PEOPLE ARE USED TO. CMON, THAT'S SERIOUSLY NOT MUCH!
      
      
      SOME DRAWBACKS.
      
      
      1) NON-REMOVABLE BATTERY, SO YOU CANNOT CARRY A SPARE ONE AROUND.
      
      2) HEATS UP RANDOMLY - WHILE WIRELESSLY CHARGING, WHILE PLAYING FOR SOME WHILE...
      
      THESE ARE SYNONYMOUS WITH THOSE OF OTHER HIGHEND, HEAVYDUTY SMARTPHONES ALSO. WE'VE BEEN REDUCED TO PEOPLE WHO NEED TO CHARGE EVERYDAY AND HAVE STARTED CALLING A GOOD BATTERY ONE WHICH SEES YOU THROUGH AN ENTIRE DAY. WELL, IF YOU AREN'T GAMING, LM920 IS GOOD IN THAT RESPECT, BUT AN HOUR IDLING AWAY PLAYING GAMES IS A SERIOUS ISSUE - EATS UP 20-30%!
      
      
      3) ONE TERRIBLE SHORTAGE...
      
      THERE IS NO ****** DOCUMENT MANAGER. SURE IT READS YOUR PDF'S AND AFTER A LABOURIOUS PROCESS, READS YOUR EPUBS ALSO, BUT WHAT SUCKS IS THAT YOU CANNOT MANAGE ALL THESE IN FOLDERS! SO IF YOU ARE LIKE ME - THIS MEANS SCROLLING THROUGH ABOUT 4000 FILES IN ONE LIST (HAVEN'T UPLOADED THEM YET FOR THIS PRECISE REASON). I WOULD REALLY LIKE A FOLDER SYSTEM - WP8 DEVELOPPERS DO SOMETHING!THIS IS WHY I WOULD NOT RECOMMEND A WP8, NOT JUST THE LUMIA 920.
      
      
      SO AM I IN LOVE WITH LM920? YES! BUT GIVEN A CHANCE TO GET THE MONEY BACK AND INVEST IN A DIFFERENT PHONE (LIKE SAMSUNG NOTE2?) WOULD I DO IT? YES. DEFINITELY. THIS IS BECAUSE I REALLY MISS THE FOLDER SYSTEM AND THE LM920 IS MAKING LIFE HARD HERE. ALTHOUGH, IT'S REALLY FANCY AND WILL SERVE ME WELL IN PARTIES AND TRAVEL TRIPS (AS LONG AS I CARRY A CHARGER). SO YEAH, IF YOU DON'T REALLY CARE ABOUT THESE CONS - LM920 IS THE PHONE YOU WANT.

label: Nokia Lumia 920
Sentences:
I'M WRITING THIS REVIEW AFTER A WEEK OF USAGE WITH MY BLACK LUMIA 920. THE PHONE IS HAVING VERY GOOD BUILD QUALITY AND IS THERE TO LAST. I HAVEN'T FELT ANY DISCOMFORT WITH THE WEIGHT RATHER IT GIVES A PREMIUM FEEL.(PLEASE NOTE THAT I HAVE USED S3 AND IPHONE4). THE OS IS A NEW AND PLEASANT EXPERIENCE AND IT MAY TAKE SOME TIME TO GET USED TO BUT ONCE YOU DO, YOU'LL START LOVING IT. THE USER INTERFACE IS GREAT AND RESPONDS VERY WELL WITHOUT ANY DELAY. AND I STRONGLY RECOMMEND YOU TO GO AND READ THE USER GUIDE AT THE NOKIA SITE -THERE IS ONE IN THE PHONE AS WELL- TO KNOW MANY MINUTE YET SIGNIFICANT DETAILS. REGARDING THE APPS, I'M SATISFIED WITH THE CURRENT COLLECTION AS IT SERVES MY PURPOSE WELL. AND I STRONGLY FEEL THIS WP8 PLATFORM WILL BRING IN MORE COOL FEATURES GOING FORWARD.
      
      
      NOTE: I HAD SOME ISSUES WITH THE BATTERY LIFE INITIALLY WITH THE BATTERY GETTING DRAINED QUICKLY. BUT IT WAS OUT OF MY IGNORANCE; THE TIPS ON EXTENDING BATTERY LIFE MENTIONED IN THE GUIDE AS WELL AS SOME GOOGLING HELPED ME SORT OUT THE PROBLEMS AND ALL IS WELL NOW.
      
      
      GOOD
      
      1) SCREEN - EXCELLENT VISIBILITY AND TOUCH SENSITIVITY
      
      2) CAMERA - VERY GOOD LOW LIGHT PICS, SMART SHOOT, CINEMAGRAPH, PHOTOBEAMER ETC
      
      3) NOKIA MUSIC - UNIQUE AND ONE OF A KIND EXPERIENCE.
      
      4) NAVIGATION - NOKIA MAPS, DRIVE, CITY LENS
      
      5) MS OFFICE
      
      6) SPECS - DUAL CORE PROCESSOR WITH 1GB MEMORY IS SUFFICIENT ENOUGH FOR A SMART PHONE IN MY OPINION FOR CURRENT GENERATION USE. ULTIMATELY, ITS UP TO THE OS AND THE APPS TO MAKE USE OF IT AND WP8 SHINES IN THIS DEPARTMENT.
      
      
      NOT SO GOOD
      
      1) MUSIC PLAYER - THE INTERFACE FOR PLAYBACK AND ITS CONTROLS IS NOT SO GOOD.
      
      
      BAD
      
      NONE SO FAR :)

Sentences: NICE PHONE WITH VERY GOOD BUILD QUALITY, AND TERRIFIC SCREEN CLARITY, USER FRIENDLY, ALL AROUND I HAVE GIVEN 5 STAR RATING FOR THIS PHONE. HD LCD SCREEN HAS SUPURB CLARITY. YES I RECOMEND THIS PHONE. JUST YOU USE IT ONE HOUR AND YOU WONT LIKE ANY OTHER PHONE.

label: Nokia Lumia 920
Sentences:
NOKIA BEING ON ITS LAST LEGS HAS DECIDED TO GO ALL OUT ON THEIR LUMIA SERIES WITH THE HOPE OF CAPTURING THE EARLY GLORIES OF ITS HEY DAY. GUESS WHAT, IT SHOWS THROUGH ON THEIR PHONES, BE IT ERGONOMICS, DESIGN, STYLE OR APPLICATION.
      
      
      WHEN YOU SWITCH ON THE PHONE, THE FIRST THING THAT STRIKES YOU IS THE INNOVATIVE AND BEAUTIFULLY DESIGNED TILES THAT SETS IT APART FROM ANY OF ITS COMPETITORS. COMBINE THAT ALONG WITH THE OPTION OF CHANGING THE TILE COLORS, SIZE AND LOOK, YOU'VE GOT THE FREEDOM OF CUSTOMIZING TO SUIT YOUR NEEDS. DON'T GET ME STARTED ON THE RESOLUTION. IT EASILY IS ABOVE THE IPHONE 5 OR SAMSUNG S3. THE TILES ARE CONSTANTLY CHANGING AND WHEN YOU PLAY A TRACK ON THE PHONE, THE MUSIC TILE SCROLLS THE NAME OF THE SONG AND THE ARTIST. CERTAIN APPS LIKE DICTIONARY (FREE) KEEPS CHANGING AND THE LAST VIEWED WORD IS CONSTANTLY ON THE TILE. THIS HELPS BELIEVE IN LEARNING ONE WORD A DAY. SMALL CHANGES LIKE THESE MAKE THIS A VERY PRACTICAL PHONE.
      
      
      THE PHONE IS ALSO EXTREMELY USER FRIENDLY AND OFFERS MANY SMALL BUT INNOVATIVE CHANGES THAT MAKE THE PHONE SUCH A JOY TO USE. ALMOST ANYTHING (CONTACTS, VIDEOS, PHOTOS, APPS, INDIVIDUAL TRACKS ETC) CAN BE "PINNED" TO THE MAIN SCREEN FOR EASY ACCESS. THIS HAS MADE MY LIFE A LOT EASIER AND CAN HELP IN QUICKLY ACCESSING THINGS THAT I OFTEN USE. THE BEST PART ABOUT THIS PHONE IS ITS MULTI TASKING ABILITY. I HAVE OFTEN OPENED 5 OR 6 DIFFERENT WINDOWS (APPLICATION, CONTACTS, MUSIC, MESSAGING) AT THE SAME TIME AND HOLDING THE BACK BUTTON FOR A SECOND SHRINKS ALL THE WINDOWS "MAC STYLE" AND THE DESIRED WINDOW CAN IMMEDIATELY BE ACCESSED WITHOUT LOSING THE CURRENT WINDOW. EVEN WHEN MULTIPLE WINDOWS ARE OPENED (5 -6), THE PHONE NEVER SLOWS DOWN.
      
      
      THE NOKIA APP STORE, THOUGH NOT AS DIVERSE AND LOADED LIKE THE APPLE STORE, STILL PROVIDES A LOT OF USEFUL APPLICATIONS. NOKIA MAPS PROVIDES THE OPTION OF DOWNLOADING A MAP OF ANY COUNTRY AND CAN BE ACCESSED OFFLINE. THIS IS SUCH A BLESSING WHEN I NEED DIRECTIONS AND DON'T HAVE GOOD INTERNET CONNECTION. NOKIA MUSIC PROVIDES 1 YEAR OF UNLIMITED SUBSCRIPTION AND CAN BE USED TO DOWNLOAD ALBUMS FREE OF COST.
      
      
      AS FAR AS PRACTICALITY GOES, THIS PHONE IS RIGHT THERE AT THE TOP. I HAVE USED IOS FOR THE LAST 4 YEARS AND I FOUND THE TRANSITION FROM APPLE TO NOKIA SEAMLESS. THE CONTACT LIST IS ALPHABETICALLY ARRANGED AND THE TILE CAN BE CLICKED ON TO BRING ABOUT THE ENTIRE ALPHABET LIST TO QUICKLY NAVIGATE TO THE DESIRED CONTACT. WHILE THE IPHONE HAS THE CLOSELY PACKED SIDE BARS WHICH QUITE OFTEN MISSES THE CORRECT INPUT AND TAKES ME EITHER TO THE PRECEDING OR THE SUCCEEDING ALPHABET.
      
      
      THE ENTIRE HISTORY OF A CONTACT CAN BE ACCESSED EITHER THROUGH THE CALLS LIST OR THE CONTACT LIST (SWIPING EITHER SIDE WILL LEAD TO THE ENTIRE MESSAGE THREAD, PHOTO ALBUM, FACEBOOK, MAIL ETC OF THE CONTACT). SUCH SMALL CHANGES MAKE A HUGE DIFFERENCE WHEN USING THE PHONE. THE ONLY GRIPE I HAVE WITH THIS PHONE IS THE ABSENCE OF CUSTOMIZED LABELS WHICH IOS PROVIDES. YOU ARE PRESENTED ONLY WITH GENERIC CONTACTS TITLES (HOME 1, OFFICE 1 ETC) WHICH LEADS TO CONFUSION ESPECIALLY WHEN YOU HAVE FRIENDS WHO USE 2 OR 3 PHONES.
      
      
      THE CAMERA IS ONE OF THE KEY FEATURES OF THE PHONE AND HAS ONE OF THE BEST LOW LIGHT PERFORMANCE OF ANY PHONE ON THE MARKET TODAY. BEING A PHOTOGRAPHER, I CAN CONFIDENTLY SAY THAT THIS PHONE IS A SOLIDWHEN IT COMES TO CAPTURING PHOTOS WITH VERY LITTLE LIGHT AND ITS LOW LIGHT PERFORMANCE IS VERY WELL AHEAD OF ANY PHONE. FOR THE GEEKS, THE CAMERA GOES UPTO ISO 800.
      
      
      THERE IS SO MUCH TO BE SAID ABOUT THIS PHONE BUT I THERE IS NOTHING LIKE THE JOY OF DISCOVERY. I AM NOT A NOKIA FANBOY (THE LAST NOKIA PHONE I HAD WAS THE 7610 WAY BACK IN 2006). I HAVE BEEN WAITING FOR QUITE SOMETIME TO BUY THIS PHONE SINCE IT WAS INTRODUCED AND I AM GLAD. THE PHONE HAS EXCEEDED MY BEST EXPECTATIONS.
      
      
      PRO'S:
      
      EXCELLENT ERGONOMICS
      
      BEAUTIFULLY DESIGNED
      
      THE SCREEN RESOLUTION IS SIMPLY AMAZING
      
      HUGELY CUSTOMIZABLE
      
      PRACTICAL
      
      VERY GOOD CAMERA
      
      SMALL INNOVATIVE TWEAKS THAT GO A LONG WAY
      
      
      CONS:
      
      NO CUSTOMIZABLE CONTACT LABEL
      
      32GB WITH NO EXTERNAL MEMORY SLOT
      
      SLIGHTLY BIG (BUT YOU'LL GET OVER IT SOON ONCE YOU SEE ITS RESOLUTION AND THE QUALITY)
      
      LIMITED APP STORE
      
      
      FOR THOSE OF YOU WHO ARE SAVING UP FOR A SMART PHONE, GO AHEAD AND BUY THIS PHONE WITHOUT A THOUGHT, YOU'LL LOVE IT. EVERYONE (FRIENDS, FAMILY) WHO'VE SEEN THIS PHONE HAVE FALLEN INSTANTLY IN LOVE WITH ITS ALLURING BEAUTY AND ONCE I'VE GIVEN THEM A TASTE OF WHAT THIS PHONE CAN DO, THEY ARE HOOKED. THESE ARE GUYS WHO USED IPHONE'S AND SAMSUNG FOR YEARS. NOKIA IS BACK WITH THE SAME INNOVATIVE MINDSET THAT HELPED THEM ESTABLISH A MONOPOLY ON THE MOBILE MARKET IN INDIA OVER A DECADE AGO.
      
      
      I VERY RARELY POST REVIEWS OF PRODUCTS I HAVE PURCHASED AND I DECIDED TO POST THIS BECAUSE I AM BIT PARTIAL TO NOKIA (MY FIRST PHONE WAS A NOKIA) AND HOPE THIS REVIEW CONVINCES SOMEONE TO BUY THIS BRILLIANT PHONE THAT MAY OTHERWISE BE BURIED UNDER THE OVER SATURATED, BIG BRAND NAME MARKET OF THE SMART PHONE

NOT EXACTLY PROS AND CONS BUT THINGS WORTH LOOKING AT LUMIA 920 ARE:

label: Nokia Lumia 920
Sentences:
PROS:
      
      1. SMOOTH OS. FLUID UI.
      
      2. DISPLAY IS 720P AND 330PPI+ WHICH IS WONDERFUL TO LOOK AT. THE BLACKS OUT DEEP AND DARK.
      
      3. NOKIA PHONES ARE ALWAYS BUILT TO LAST. FIT AND FINISH IS AWESOME. ITS BUILT LIKE A TANK.
      
      4. THE FINISH MAKES IT DIFFICULT TO SCRATCH AND THE COLOURS ARE INHERENT.
      
      5. YOU GET MS OFFICE FREE
      
      6. NOKIA DRIVE NOKIA MAPS ARE AVAILABLE OFFLINE WHICH IS A BIG BONUS.
      
      7. NOKIA MUSIC IS ALSO GREAT AND HAS A MASSIVE LIBRARY.
      
      8. 1GB RAM IS MORE THAN ENOUGH TO RUN ALL GAMES. XBOX GAMES ARE IMPRESSIVE
      
      9. LESS MALWARE APPS ON WINDOWS PHONE UNLIKE ANDROID WHERE IT IS EASY TO COMPROMISE THE SAFETY OF YOUR DEVICE WITH MALWARE
      
      10. ALL ESSENTIAL APPS ARE AVAILABLE ON WINDOWS PHONE LIKE WEATHER, ESPN, FOX, BBC, SPORTS, BUSINESS, NEWS, MOVIES. ALTHOUGH THE NUMBER OF APPS IS LESS THAN ANDROID YOU WONT FEEL THE STORE LACKING.
      
      (ANDROID HAS MULTIPLE APPS FPR THE SAME CATEGORY LIKE SAY FOR WEATHER IT HAS DOZENS OF THEM WHILE WINDOWS HAS ONLY A FEW. NEVERTHELESS YOU WILL GET THE MOST ACCURATE WEATHER ON WINDOWS AS PROMINENT WEATHER WEBSITES HAVE APPS. THE NUMBER OF APPS DOESN'T CORRESPOND TO THE STORE BEING BETTER. REMEMBER QUALITY IS MORE ESSENTIAL THAN QUANTITY.)
      
      
      11. THE OS DOES NOT LAG.
      
      12. THE PUREVIEW CAMERA IS AWESOME AND SHOOTS WONDERFUL PICTURES AND VIDEOS
      
      13. WIRELESS CHARGING CAPABILITIES.
      
      
      CONS:
      
      1. SOME MIGHT NOT LIKE THE WEIGHT OF THE DEVICE BUT THATS A PERSONAL CHOICE. PEOPLE COMPLAIN ABOUT SAMSUNG'S BUILD BEING PLASTICKY AND SO ON.
      
      2. THE DIMENSIONS MIGHT BE THICKER THAN OTHER DEVICES BUT AGAIN THATS A PERSONAL CHOICE (SLIMMER LUMIA 925 COMING SHORTLY TO RECTIFY THAT)
      
      3. MICROSOFT NEEDS TO PAY MORE ATTENTION TO THE OS. UPDATES ARE FEW AND FAR BETWEEN. Q4 UPDATE EXPECTED TO BRING NOTIFICATION CENTRE ETC.
      
      4. CLOSING APPS REQUIRES YOU TO SELECT AN OPEN APP AND PRESS BACK TO CLOSE. MIGHT BE IRRITATING IN IE WHERE YOU HAVE TO GO THE FIRST PAGE TO CLOSE.

label: Nokia Lumia 920
Sentences:
ABSOLUTELY UNUSABLE IN BED, THE CORNERS PRICK MY HAD WHEN I TRY TO TYPE, AND WINDOWS PHONE 8 DOESN'T LET ME TURN OFF SCREEN ROTATION WHICH IS A PAIN (HOPE THIS COMES IN A FURTHER UPDATE)!
      
      
      THE PHONE IS BUILT ROCK SOLID AND FEELS VERY PREMIUM, MY BROTHER HAS A SGS3 AND COMPARATIVELY MY 920 IS MUCH BETTER.
      
      
      THE BRIGHTNESS CAN BE ADJUSTED TO ONLY THREE LEVELS, LOW, MEDIUM AND HIGH. WITH LOW STILL BEING PRETTY BRIGHT. AUTO BRIGHTNESS WORKS LIKE A CHARM AND BRINGS BRIGHTNESS TO A MUCH LOWER LEVEL THAN THE DEFAULT "LOW" SETTING, BUT I WISH I COULD HAVE DONE THAT MANUALLY SO AS TO CONSERVE MY BATTERY.
      
      
      BATTERY LASTS A DAY IF USED JUDICIOUSLY. IT WAS VERY AVERAGE FOR THE FIRST TWO DAYS, WHICH DISAPPOINTED ME, BUT IT IMPROVED DRASTICALLY AFTER A COUPLE OF FULL CHARGES AND DISCHARGES! :O
      
      
      NOKIA MUSIC, NOKIA MAPS AND NOKIA CITY LENS. DAMN!! LOVE THESE. AND ALSO THE FACT THAT I GET A FREE SUBSCRIPTION TO NOKIA MUSIC FOR AN YEAR (LEGAL, HQ MUSIC) GETS ME EVERY TIME. IT EVEN HAS MALAYALAM AND TAMIL MUSIC APART FROM HINDI AND WORLD.
      
      
      I CAN DOWNLOAD ATTACHMENTS FROM EMAIL BUT I DO NOT KNOW WHERE IT GETS STORED, WHICH MEANS THAT I CANNOT DELETE THEM MANUALLY. THEY GET DELETED AUTOMATICALLY AS AND WHEN THE EMAIL GETS DELETED FROM MY INBOX (SYNC SETTINGS ALLOW YOU TO SYNC EMAIL FROM THE PAST 3 DAYS, PAST 7 DAYS, PAST 2 WEEKS AND ANY TIME).
      
      
      THERE ISN'T A FILE MANAGER WHICH LETS ME BROWSE THROUGH THE FILES ON MY PHONE. YOU CANNOT FIND ONE ON THE WINDOWS MARKETPLACE EITHER.
      
      
      BUT OF COURSE, YOU CAN DRAG AND DROP FILES TO AND FROM YOUR PC WHICH MAKES TRANSFERRING SONGS AND VIDEOS BETWEEN MY PHONE AND PC VERY EASY.
      
      
      WINDOWS PHONE 8 IS FLUIDIC, DOES NOT CRASH OR HANG AND IS EXTREMELY USER FRIENDLY (MIGHT TAKE YOU A DAY OR TWO OR EVEN THREE TO GET USED TO IT THOUGH). THE FACEBOOK, TWITTER AND EMAIL INTEGRATION WORKS LIKE A CHARM. IT IS MUCH CLEANER AND EXCITING THAN ANDROID, THOUGH NOT AS CUSTOMISABLE.
      
      
      COMING FROM A SAMSUNG GALAXY SII RUNNING JELLYBEAN, THESE ARE THE THINGS I LIKED AND DISLIKED ABOUT THE LUMIA 920.
      
      
      OVERALL I AM SATISFIED WITH THE 920, AND DOES NOT REGRET MY DECISION TO BUY A WINDOWS PHONE.

label: Nokia Lumia 920
Sentences:
I GOT THIS PHONE JUST A DAY AFTER ITS LAUNCH( WILL TELL LATER WHY I GOT IT FROM NOKIA PRIORITY)
      
      
      THIS IS THE BEST PHONE FROM NOKIA TILL NOW...
      
      PROS:-
      
      ITS BLACK MAT FINISH AT THE BACK IS GOOD, HOWEVER MIGHT GET TINY SCRATCHES.
      
      BEST PART IS ITS CAMERA AND THE CLEAR BLACK DISPLAY. ITS TRUE THAT IN SUNLIGHT THIS PHONE HAS THE BEST DISPLAY. CAMERA HAS BEST PICTURES IN LOW LIGHT FOR WHICH ITS FAMOUS.

      LAUDSPEAKER IS DESCENT ENOUGH AND SPECIALLY THE DOLBY ENGINE IS VERY GOOD ONCE YOU ARE WITH EARPHONES.( BUY MONSTER EARPHONES FROM NOKIA AVAILABLE IN NOKIA PRIORITY)
      
      A BIT HEAVY BUT NOT TOO MUCH THAT YOU WILL FEEL ITS A BRICK ;)
      
      
      PEOPLE SAY THAT THERE ARE VERY LESS APPS IN WINDOWS, I MAY NOT COMPLETELY AGREE BUT YES TO SOME EXTENT YOU FEEL THAT THE REQUIRED APPS LIKE PRODUCTIVITY APPS AND BANKING APPS(SPECIALLY FOR INDIA) ARE NOT PRESENT.
      
      
      CONS:-
      
      WINDOWS OS STIL NEEDS A LOT OF UPDATES.
      
      THE BATTERY SIGN SHOWING AT THE TOP WILL NEVER SHOW YOU PERCENTAGE SO ITS DIFFICULT WITHT E TINY PIC OF BATTERY TO JUDGE HOW MUCH ITS LEFT.
      
      THERE IS NO SHORTCUT BY NOKIA FOR DAILY OPTIONS SUCH AS WIFI, MOBILE DATA, BLUETOOTH(BLUETOOTH WORKS FINE TOO), AIRPLANE MODE, SCREEN ROTATION TURN ON/OFF.

SHOULD HAVE A NOTIFICATION AREA WHERE YOU HAVE ALL THE SHORTCUTS AND PUSH NOTIFICATIONS.... YES I KNOW THERE ARE LIVE TILES BUT HOW MANY TILES WILL YOU PUT ON A 4.5 INCH SCREEN AND ITS NOT A COMBINED TILE FOR ALL NOTIFICATIONS
      
      
      BELIEVE ME DONT TAKE THIS PHONE IF YOU ARE A GAMER. ITS SOMEHOW NOT A VERY GOOD EXPERIENCE WITH GAMES AND THERE ARE VERY LESS IN THE WINDOWS MARKETPLACE
      
      I DONT PLAY GAMES ON CELL PHONE SO AS OF NOW APART FROM FEW WINDOWS DRAWBACKS THE PHONE IS GOOD..
      
      
      YES AND ONE MORE VERY PATHETIC EXPERIENCE IS THE MUSIC PLAYER OF WINDOWS ... ITS VERY POORLY DESIGNER. IF I HAVE 899 ODD SONGS ON MY PHONE AND I WANT TO SEARCH A SONG WITH A KEYWORD WHICH THEN I CANNOT.
      
      YOU HAVE TO SEARCH WITH THE STARTING LETTER OF THE SONG ONLY. THERE IS NO SEARCH BUTTON OR SEARCH WINDOW EVEN TO SEARCH THE SONGS.
      
      THERE ARE LETTERS LIKE A,B,C,D AND THEN CLICK ON A LETTER TO SEARCH SONGS STARTING FROM THAT LETTER.... VERY VERY SAD WINDOWS MUSIC PLAYER

label: Nokia Lumia 920
Sentences:
I HAVE USED LUMIA 920 FOR ABOUT 4 WEEKS. THE WINDOWS 8 INTERFACE IS SILKY SMOOTH. OS HAS NOT HANGED EVEN ON HEAVY USAGE. THE HD - 1280 X 768 PIXELS DISPLAY MAKES WATCHING VIDEOS AN AWESOME EXPERIENCE.
      
      THE PURE-VIEW CAMERA FEATURE IS A NEVER BEFORE EXPERIENCE. AUTOMATICALLY CLEARS OUT THE BLURS AND LOW LIGHT IMAGE CAPTURES ARE GREATLY ENHANCED BY THE APERTURE OF F/20, WHICH IS HIGHEST IN CURRENTLY AVAILABLE SMART PHONES.
      
      THE BATTERY SAVER OPTION ALLOWS SUFFICIENT CHARGE TO BE AVAILABLE FOR ENTIRE DAY EVEN IF I HAVE USE 3G TO SURF AND PLAY GAMES.
      
      MUSIC DOWNLOADS FROM THE NOKIA MUSIC STORE HAPPEN AT BLAZING SPEED AND STORE OFFERS A HUGE COLLECTION.
      
      HOWEVER THE PHONES QUICKLY GETS HEATED UP ON PLAYING GAMES FOR 20 MINS. ALTHOUGH NOKIA CARE SAYS THAT THE HEATING IS WITHIN THE ALLOWABLE LIMITS, BUT I PERSONALLY FIND IT DIFFICULT TO PLACE IT ON MY EARS IN SUCH CONDITION. HAVE TRIED TO TRANSFER A IMAGE TO ANOTHER LUMIA720 THROUGH NFC BUT WAS UNSUCCESSFUL. IN FACT 720 HANGED AND WAS REQUIRED TO BE HARD REBOOTED.
      
      AND A CONSIDERABLE FACT IS THE AVAILABILITY OF LESS NUMBER OF WINDOWS MOBILE APPLICATIONS AS COMPARED TO ANDROID.

label: Nokia Lumia 920
Sentences:
I WAS A NOKIA USER A LONG TIME AGO, N8 TO 808 AND 808 WENT TO MY WIFE AND I GOT THE GALAXY S3. HERE ARE THE REASONS I SWITCHED FROM S3 TO WINDOWS PHONE NOKIA 720 TO 920
      
      THE 720 GOT WET IN THE RAIN AND IS BEYOND REPAIR:(, AND THEN I MOVED TO 920 BY SELLING MY GALAXY S3.
      
      THE POINT NUMBERS MATCH B/W THE S3 AND THE 920
      
      1. THE PHONE USED TO RANDOMLY REBOOT AT TIMES
      
      2. AFTER ABOUT 100 HOURS OF USAGE THE PHONE WOULD BECOME VERY SLOW I HAD TO REBOOT
      
      3. UNPREDICTABLE BATTERY LIFE, I LIKE TO KEEP WIFI ON THROUGHOUT THE DAY. SUPPOSE YOU FORGET TO CLOSE SOME APP, IT DRAINS YOUR BATTERY VERY QUICKLY
      
      4. UI OF THE APPS IS TOO CLUTTERED YOU HAVE ONE BIG SCREEN WITH LOTS OF BUTTONS HERE AND THERE AND EACH APP CAN CHOOSE WHERE IT CAN PLACE THE BUTTONS. WITH THE HUGE SCREENS OF THE S3/4 YOU HAVE TO REACH YOUR FINGER TO THE BUTTON FROM CORNER TO CORNER, SINGLE HANDED USE IS IMPOSSIBLE.
      
      5. NOTORIOUS APPS THAN CAN SUCK YOUR DATA PLAN AND BATTERY
      
      6. CALL DROPS INSIDE ELEVATORS AT WORK (SIGNAL BOOSTERS INSTALLED IN WORK PLACE)
      
      7. LOUSY AND PICS/VIDEOS ON THE CAMERA
      
      
      AFTER SWITCHING TO LUMIA
      
      1. EXCELLENT STABLITY, I DON'T KNOW WHEN MY PHONE REBOOTED OR WHEN I REBOOTED, REBOOTS ONLY WHEN I RUN OUT OF JUICE, WHICH IS AGAIN RARE.
      
      2. EXCELLENT STANDBY TIME. I UNPLUG IN THE NIGHT AND LEAVE THE PHONE ON (WIFI AND MOBILE DATA SHUTOFF) IT IS STILL 100 % IN THE MORNING. I USE GPS TRACKING FOR 30 MINS WHEN I CYCLE TO WORK, I REACH OFFICE AND IT STILL IS AT 100 %!! THAT IS INSANE. I NEVER TURN OFF GPS
      
      3. WINDOWS PHONE, THE OS HAS THIS THING CALLED FREEZE, IT SHUTS DOWN APPS THAT ARE NOT IN BACKGROUND IF THERE IS NO ACTIVITY, THAT WAY EVEN IF I LEAVE AN APP RUNNING IT DOES NOT DRAIN BATTERY.
      
      4. EXCELLENT UI AND ALWAYS PREDICTABLE KNOW WHERE THE MENU'S ARE LOCATED, AND A SIMPLE SWIPE TO RIGHT OR LEFT WILL GET THE JOB DONE. I ALWAYS LIKE THE SINGLE HANDED USE OF THE LUMIA 720, 920 IS A BIT LARGE BUT I CAN STILL MANAGE.
      
      5. APPS ARE NOT MUCH, BUT MORE THAN ENOUGH FOR ME, WHAT EVER APPS ARE AVAILABLE THEY BEHAVE CORRECTLY AND INTEGRATE WELL WITH THE OS. MS HAS BEEN DOING SOME STRICT MONITORING.
      
      6. I HAVE NOT HAD A SINGLE CALL DROP IN ELEVATORS AT WORK. IF THERE IS NO SIGNAL, WELL NOTHING CAN BE DONE ABOUT THAT, PHONE INDICATES THAT THERE IS NO SIGNAL.
      
      7. EXCELLENT PICS AND VIDEOS, I HAVE THE LATEST FIRMWARE, THE OLDER FIRMWARE HAD ISSUES WITH COLOURS AND DAYLIGHT PHOTOGRAPHY. I GET EXCELLENT INDOOR SHOTS AS GOOD AS SOME COMPACT CAMERAS
      
      
      I AM A POWER USER, I HAVE CONFIGURED 4 EMAIL ID'S ON THE PHONE, MY WORK EMAIL IS SET SYNC AS THE MAIL ARRIVES ALL OTHER EMAIL SYNC EVERY HOUR, FACEBOOK, GOOGLE CONTACTS, I HAVE ABOUT 10 GAMES, I PLAY ABOUT 15 TO 30 MINS DAILY. I MAINLY USE FOR FACEBOOK AND EMAIL. SOMETIMES YOUTUBE. MS TOOK THE YOU-TUBE APP OFF :(
      
      I AM IMPRESSED WITH THE PHONE,
      
      THE ONLY THING NAGGING ME IS THE VOLUME CONTROL, THE VOLUME CONTROL FROM SPEAKER AND HEADPHONE IS THE SAME :( IT IS THE STUPIDEST THING IN THE PHONE. I HOPE IT GETS FIXED IN THE UPCOMING UPDATE FROM MS.
      
      BTW I DID NOT BUY THE PHONE FROM FLIPKART.

label: Nokia Lumia 920
Sentences:
I WAS WAITING FOR BUDGET TO BUY THIS PHONE, EXPECTING THAT THE EXCISE DUTY WILL BE REDUCED. BUY THIS PHONE RIGHT AFTER GOVT ANNOUNCES 5% INCREASE(AGAINST EXPECTATION) IN DUTY ON PHONE MORE THAN RS.2000.
      
      DELIVERY OF THE PHONE WAS REALLY QUICK, GOT THE PHONE VERY NEXT DAY.
      
      
      EVERYONE HAS SAID MUCH ABOUT ITS QUALITIES AND YES THEY ARE TRUE. BUT I WOULD LIKE TO MENTION CERTAIN DRAWBACKS.
      
      1. 2000MAH BATTERY. REQUIRE 2 TIMES FULL CHARGE IN A DAY. ALSO BATTERY IS INBUILT SO KEEPING AN ADDITIONAL BATTERY IS OUT OF EQUATION.
      
      2. CAN'T SHARE VIDEOS VIA BLUETOOTH.
      
      3. CAN'T SHARE AUDIO AND VIDEO IN YOUR PHONE USING WATSAPP.
      
      4. CAN'T PICK YOUR FAV. RINGTONES, ONLY NOKIA AND WINDOWS RINGTONES ARE ALLOWED.
      
      6. IF YOU ARE DOWNLOADING SOMETHING OTHER THAN NOKIA MUSIC STORE, IT WONT BE SHOWN IN YOUR MUSIC, VIDEOS OR PICTURE.
      
      7. NO OPTION TO CREATE FOLDER OR MOVING OBJECT FROM ONE FOLDER TO ANOTHER IN THE PHONE, CONNECT WITH COMPUTER THAN YOU CAN.
      
      
      MY STAND IS EXCEPT BATTERY OTHER DRAWBACKS ARE NEGOTIABLE. I JUST GET TO KNOW THOSE CONS AFTER USING THIS PHONE. SO KEEP THIS THINGS IN MIND WHILE BUYING WINDOWS PHONE.
      
      NOW WHAT IS EXCITING.
      
      EXCELLENT PHONE TO USE, GREAT BUILD, POLYCARBONATE FEEL GR8 TO HOLD, REFRESHING OS.
      
      CAMERA IS THE BEST PART OF IT. LOTS OF APPLICATIONS(THOUGH LESS THAN ANDROID AND IOS BUT IF YOU COMPARE THE INITIAL VERSION OF ANDROID AND IOS, WINDOWS DID PROVIDED A LARGE NO OF APPLICATION AND INCREASING DAY BY DAY).
      
      OVERALL A GOOD OPTION TO GO.
      
      THIS PHONE AND WHOLE SERIES OF LUMIA WILL AGAIN ESTABLISH NOKIA IN THE MARKET. I HAD GIVEN 4 STARS CZ THERE IS NO OPTION TO GIVE 4.5.

label: Nokia Lumia 920
Sentences:
POSTING IN LIST FORMAT ABOUT FEATURES I CAN THINK OF.
      
      
      -PHONE  BUILD QUALITY- SUPERB (WAS THERE ANY DOUBT?). IF YOU CAN LIVE WITH THE SIZE, IT FEELS AWESOME.
      
      
      -CALL QUALITY- ALSO OUTSTANDING
      
      
      -USER INTERFACE- IT'S DIFFERENT, BUT NOTHING WORRYING, HAS A VERY SHORT LEARNING CURVE AND ONCE ONE GETS USED TO IT FEELS JUST AS GOOD AS ANY COMPETING PLATFORM. IT'S REALLY A MATTER OF PERSONAL CHOICE ON THIS ONE, AND IMO, IS NOT A POSITIVE OR NEGATIVE ASPECT, UNLESS IT'S OVERLY CUMBERSOME. WHAT IS GOOD THOUGH IS THE FLUIDITY OF THE UI IN ALL REGIONS. AGAIN, THAT'S NOTHING TO BOAST ABOUT NOW, BECAUSE COMPETING PLATFORMS ARE AT PAR TOO.
      
      
      -APPS- THE SITUATION IS NOT AS DIRE AS NAY- SAYERS WOULD LIKE TO HAVE US BELIEVE, BUT LET'S FACE IT, IT ISN'T EXACTLY BRIMMING WITH APPS EITHER. I SEE THIS AS A VERY TEMPORARY ISSUE THOUGH, BECAUSE WITH MSFT POURING MONEY INTO THE PLATFORM, THERE IS A NOTICEABLE FORWARD PUSH. THERE ARE ALL THE CORE APPS ONE COULD NEED AND PLENTY MORE ARE INCOMING. THE DOWN SIDE IS THE MARKET INTERFACE ITSELF. WHILE IT WORKS PERFECTLY AND IS INFORMATIVE ENOUGH,  A LITTLE MORE DATA, LIKE ON ANDROID WOULD BE GOOD, LIKE TOTAL NUMBER OF DOWNLOADS, VERSION RATING AND RATING FOR YOUR DEVICE. THAT HAVING BEEN SAID, IT'S STILL DECENT AND NO WHERE NEAR AS BAD AS PEOPLE WHO GET EMOTIONALLY INVESTED IN A COMPANY OR PRODUCT, BECAUSE THEY BOUGHT IT (DON'T WANT TO CALL THEM FANBOYS/ GIRLS) LIKE TO BELIEVE.
      
      
      -MULTITASKING- THIS IS THE ONE SEMI DOWNSIDE TO THIS PLATFORM. IT WORKS FOR CORE APPS, AND WP HAS HAD IT SINCE MANGO (WP7.5), BUT FOR SOME REASON A LOT OF DEVELOPERS HAVE NOT BEEN ABLE TO MAKE USE OF IT. I CAN LIVE WITH IT, BUT I'M NOT REALLY PLEASED WITH IT AS IT IS. I'M ONLY HOPING THAT AT SOME STAGE, IT GETS PUSHED A LITTLE MORE TO AT LEAST IOS LEVELS.
      
      
      CAMERA- LOL, I WAS SAVING THIS FOR LAST, BUT THEN I REALISED THAT PRETTY MUCH ANYTHING THAT HAD TO BE SAID HAS BEEN SAID IN COUNTLESS REVIEWS ON THE WEB. TO SUM IT UP, AWESOME LOW LIGHT STILLS AND DAYLIGHT/ LOW LIGHT VIDEO, NOT SO OUTSTANDING, WHILE STILL DECENT, STILLS IN GOOD LIGHT. THE ONLY THING I HAVE TO ADD, IS THAT WHILE THE PORTICO UPDATE WAS SUPPOSED TO FIX THE BLUR, IT HASN'T COMPLETELY ACHIEVED ITS GOAL. CHECK DP REVIEWS ON THAT BECAUSE FOR PHOTOGRAPHY RELATED REVIEWS, THAT'S WHERE ONE GOES, AND NOT TO TECH SITES WHICH CARRY ON THEIR BRAND OF FANBOY JOURNALISM/ BLOGGING.
      
      
      OUTRIGHT NEGATIVE ASPECTS ARE
      
      -NO CORE TIME SUITE (COUNTDOWN TIMER/ STOPWATCH) APP, TIMERS SOMETIMES FAIL TO BUZZ IN THE BACKGROUND OR OUTRIGHT QUIT BECAUSE THE DEVELOPERS DIDN'T CODE PROPERLY. THE MANUFACTURER SHOULD HAVE PROVIDED THIS AS A STANDARD RUNNING IN CONJUNCTION WITH THE PHONE CLOCK.
      
      
      -VOLUME SETTINGS GET REVERTED TO STANDARD AFTER A REBOOT AND IF YOU FORGET TO PUSH IT UP/ DOWN, YOU HAVE A RINGER AT AN UNDESIRABLE SOUND LEVEL. (I HOPE THEY SEE THIS AS AN OBVIOUS FLAW AND FIX IT.)
      
      
      CAN'T REALLY THINK OF MUCH ELSE, AND TO SUMMARISE MY IMPRESSION, I REALLY LIKE THIS DEVICE AND AM HOPEFUL FOR THE PLATFORM. IT HAS A COUPLE OF PROBLEMS, BUT AT THIS STAGE IN IT'S LIFE, I THINK IT IS AHEAD OF WHERE THE COMPETITION WAS.

WHEN I CAME TO KNOW THAT NOKIA HAD LAUNCHED THE LUMIA 920 AS ITS PREMIER AND FLAGSHIP SMARTPHONE, I IMMEDIATELY BOUGHT IT. THE FEATURES OF THIS PHONE HAVE LEFT ME BEDAZZLED. I HAVE BEEN SWOONING OVER THE SLEEK UNIBODY POLYCARBONATE DESIGN AND AM VERY HAPPY AT THE ENVIOUS LOOKS I GET EVERY TIME I TAKE MY PHONE OUT IN PUBLIC. WITH AN 8.7 MP CAMERA THAT FEATURES THE LEGENDARY CARL ZEISS TESSAR LENS, I CAN CLICK AWESOME SNAPS OF ALL MY FAVOURITE MOMENTS. ALONG WITH THE INTEGRATED PUREVIEW CAMERA TECHNOLOGY, MY LUMIA 920 ALSO FEATURES OPTICAL IMAGE STABILISATION THAT HELPS ME RECORD BLUR-FREE VIDEOS. SO BE IT THE BEAUTIFUL LANDSCAPES OR A STUNNING MONUMENT THAT I RECORD FROM A MOVING CAR, THE VIDEO COMES OUT PERFECT. I CAN EVEN CAPTURE EVERY DETAIL AT NIGHT WITH THE DUAL LED FLASH. BEING A SOMEWHAT CLUMSY USER, I WAS A BIT SCARED ABOUT THE LARGE 4.5-INCH LCD TOUCHSCREEN DISPLAY OF MY LUMIA 920. BUT, THIS DISPLAY COMES WITH CORNING GORILLA GLASS 2 TECHNOLOGY THAT PROTECTS IT FROM SCRATCHES. INTEGRATING THE PUREMOTION HD+ TECHNOLOGY, EVERY VISUAL FLOWS SEAMLESSLY AND IN A FLUID MANNER. GAMES, MOVIES, WEB PAGES AND DOCUMENTS ARE RENDERED PERFECTLY. I LOVE THE WINDOWS 8 OPERATING SYSTEM THAT COMES WITH THE VERY CONVENIENT LIVE TILES FEATURE. MY FAVOURITE APPS AND GAMES ARE LOCATED RIGHT ON MY HOME SCREEN OFFERING EASY ACCESS. MS OFFICE DOCUMENTS ARE EASY TO VIEW AND EDIT ON MY LUMIA 920.
      
      I WAS THOROUGHLY SURPRISED BY THE EASE WITH WHICH I COULD MULTITASK OR PLAY GAMES ON MY PHONE. WHEN I REFERRED TO THE MANUAL, I FOUND THE SOURCE OF THIS POWER. THE NOKIA LUMIA 920 INTEGRATES A DUAL-CORE 1.5 GHZ QUALCOMM SNAPDRAGON S4 'KRAIT' MOBILE PROCESSOR COMBINED WITH AN ADRENO 225 GRAPHICS CHIP AND 1 GB RAM. STORING ALL MY DATA INCLUDING MY FAVOURITE MOVIES, SOUNDTRACKS AND WORK-RELATED DATA IS EASY WITH THE 32 GB ON-BOARD STORAGE MEMORY. I HAVE SUBSCRIBED TO SKYDRIVE FOR MY EXTRA STORAGE NEEDS. MY FIANC IS IN LOVE WITH THE NOKIA MAPS AND NOKIA DRIVE APPS ON MY PHONE. THESE APPS HELP US REACH ALL OUR DESTINATIONS ON TIME AND WITHOUT GETTING LOST, AS THEY OFFER TURN-BY-TURN NAVIGATIONAL INSTRUCTIONS. AND, I DON?T EVEN NEED DATA USAGE FOR THAT. MY MUSIC COLLECTION IS ENVIOUSLY LARGE THANKS TO THE NOKIA MUSIC APP. MIX RADIO IS PERFECT FOR LISTENING TO TRACKS ON THE GO. I NOW ACCESS THE WEB ON THE MOVE AND CAN STREAM MULTIMEDIA CONTENT AT HIGH SPEEDS AS MY LUMIA 920 SUPPORTS 3G AND LTE SERVICES. I CAN TRANSFER DATA USING NFC AND BLUETOOTH AS WELL AS ACCESS THE WEB USING WI-FI.

label: Nokia Lumia 920
Sentences:
BOUGHT THIS PHONE FROM FLIPKART, LIKE ALWAYS FLIPKART'S DELIVERY IS AWESOME, THEY DELIVERED IT IN FLAT TWO DAYS.
      
      
      NOW ABOUT THE PHONE, IF YOU ASK ME, I MADE A MISTAKE BUYING IT.
      
      
      CONS
      
      
      1) THE PHONE HANGS SOMETIMES AND THERE IS NO OPTION OTHER THAN DOING A COLD SHUTDOWN BY PRESSING THE VOLUME KEY DOWN AND THE POWER BUTTON.
      
      
      2) THE VOLUME SOMETIMES, STICKS AT 1/30 WHILE PLAYING MUSIC. EVEN IF YOU INCREASE THE VOLUME TO 30/30 NOTHING HAPPENS, THE VOLUME LEVEL STILL REMAINS THERE. YOU HAVE TO RESTART THE PHONE TO MAKE IT FUNCTIONAL AGAIN, THIS ONLY HAPPENS WITH THE MUSIC PLAYER THOUGH, NOT WITH THE VIDEO PLAYER AND NOR WITH THE NOKIA MUSIC PLAYER
      
      
      3) THE BATTERY BACKUP IS NOT GOOD, I DONT HAVE 3G, BUT I USE H (HSPDA) INSTEAD OF E (EDGE) MOSTLY, BECAUSE ITS FASTER, BUT THEN EVEN IF YOU DONT USE IT MUCH, AND ONLY FACEBOOK AND TWITTER ARE CONNECTED, AS I HAVE ADDED THEM TO THE ONLINE ACCOUNTS, THE BATTERY DRAINS REALLY VERY FAST, I WOULD EXPECT A PHONE LIKE THIS THIS TO ATLEAST LAST FOR A DAY(16 HOURS) BUT IT DOESNT.
      
      
      4) THE "OTHERS" FOLDER IS JUST SO ANNOYING, TRANSFER SOMETHING USING BLUETOOTH AND IF YOUR PHONE DOESNT LIKE IT, IT WILL SEND IT TO THE "OTHERS" FOLDER AND THERE YOU ARE, LOST YOUR VALUABLE SPACE, YOU CANT GET IT BACK TILL YOU DO A PHONE RESET.
      
      
      5) NO FILE MANAGER MAKES LIFE REALLY DIFFICULT, LIKE REALLY REALLY.
      
      
      6) OH YEAH! THE FLASH HAS STOPPED WORKING, I GOOGLED IT A BIT AND MOSTLY ON NOKIA FORUMS AND OTHER FORUMS I FOUND OUT THAT THIS IS A COMMON ISSUE, I MEAN COMMON ISSUE WITH SUCH EXPENSIVE HARDWARE?
      
      
      7) ONE NOTE, YOU CAN MAKE NOTES, BUT CANT DELETE THEM? MAYBE YOU CAN OR I AM JUST TOO DUMB TO FIND A WAY TO DELETE THEM. I DON'T KNOW, WELL.
      
      
      8) THE NIGHTMODE IN THE CAMERA IS GOOD, BUT YOU NEED A PAIR OF VERY GOOD HANDS, WHICH DONT SHAKE EVEN A BIT, WHICH MEANS, IF YOU ARE SITTING SOMEWHERE, THE PHOTOS IN NIGHT WILL COME OUT VERY GOOD, BUT IF YOU ARE STANDING AND DONT HAVE VERY STEADY HANDS, FORGET THE NIGHT MODE.
      
      
      9) I WOULD HAVE WANTED A XENON FLASH, THOUGH WELL THE DUAL LED FLASH IS NOT THAT BAD, BUT NOT THAT GOOD EITHER, OH WELL, THE FLASH HAS STOPPED WORKING ANYWAYS, WITHIN LIKE 3 WEEKS OR SO
      
      
      10) THE SITUATION OF APPS IS NOT THAT GOOD, YEAH THE BUNDLED NOKIA APPS ARE GOOD, BUT THE ONES MADE MY MICROSOFT LIKE FACEBOOK. THEY ARE A #FAIL, I JUST PREFER TO USE THE INTERNET EXPLORER FOR FACEBOOK
      
      
      11) THE PHONE IS HEAVY, LITERALLY VERY HEAVY, IF YOU USE IT TOO MUCH, YOU ARE BOUND TO GET A WRIST PAIN, LIKE I DID.
      
      
      12) THERE IS NO SCREEN ROTATION CONTROL, WHAT IF I DONT WANT THE SCREEN TO ROTATE? WELL THIS FEATURE MIGHT BE ADDED IN A FEW MONTHS(LETS JUST HOPE SO)
      
      
      PROS
      
      
      1) THE PHONE IS BUILT LIKE A TANK, DO A DROP TEST, NOTHING WILL HAPPEN TO YOUR PHONE AS COMPARED TO ANY OTHER PHONE, THIS IS REALLY BUILT VERY GOOD.
      
      
      2) VIDEO RECORDING IS FLAWLESS, ON 1080P TAKE A VIDEO SITTING IN A MOVING CAR, THE VIDEO IS NOT AT ALL BLURRY, TAKES VERY GOOD VIDEOS IN PROPER LIGHT.
      
      
      3) THE DISPLAY IS GOOD, READABILITY IN SUN LIGHT IS GOOD.
      
      
      4) WINDOWS OS ISNT MATURE LIKE ANDROID, BUT IT FEELS SLICK AND FAST, THE HOME SCREEN IS AWESOME WITH LIVE TILES FOR VARIOUS APPS.
      
      
      5) THE INTERNET IS VERY FAST EVEN ON 2G, YOU CAN WATCH YOUTUBE VIDEOS WITHOUT THE BUFFER LAG.
      
      
      6) BUNDLED INTERNET EXPLORER IS VERY GOOD, YOU WONT MISS OPERA OR ANY OTHER BROWSER AT ALL, IF YOU ARE USING IT. TRUE ITS NOT THAT FAST LIKE OPERA, BUT ITS JUST AS GOOD

label: Nokia Lumia 920
Sentences:
DEAR READERS,
      
      
      RECENTLY I PURCHASED THIS PHONE FROM CROMA.I LOVE ITS UNIBODY TANK-LIKE BUILD AND SEAMLESS WP8 OS RUNNING ON IT. HOWEVER, THINGS GOT WORSE WHEN I STARTED USING MY PHONE.
      
      1) THE SCREEN FLICKERED PERSISTENTLY, ALMOST MADE IT IMPOSSIBLE TO READ ANYTHING ON IT. I THOUGHT IT WAS DUE TO SENSOR ADJUSTING TO NATURAL LIGHT BUT IT DIDN'T  HELP IN SPITE CHANGING BRIGHTNESS TO LOW FROM AUTOMATIC.
      
      
      2) THE PHONE ON ITS FIRST CHARGE ITSELF OVER HEATED AND DISCHARGED AT A RATE MORE THAN IT COULD CHARGE. ON DAY ONE I CHARGED MY PHONE THRICE WITH EACH CHARGE LASTING FOR 4- 5 HRS APPX.
      
      
      UPON THESE ISSUES I CHECKED ACROSS FORUMS AND FOUND THAT ITS A GENUINE MFG DEFECT WITH THE SCREENS OF LUMNIA 920. THE RETAILER MIGHT SAY THAT IT WOULD BE CORRECTED WITH SOFTWARE UPDATE, BEWARE ITS A SERIOUS ISSUE AMONG OTHER LUMIA USERS IN EUROPE AND US AND HAVE GOT THEIR UNITS REPLACED.
      
      
      SO I TOOK MY NEW LUMIA 920 BACK TO CROMA AND HANDED OVER IT TO THEM AND ASKED FOR REPLACEMENT. FORTUNATELY THEY TOO ACKNOWLEDGED THE DEFECT AND GAVE ME REPLACEMENT.
      
      
      MINE IS FEB 2013 MFG AND IMPORTED MADE IN CHINA.
      
      
      MY REPLACED LUMNIA 920 HAS SO FAR HASN'T GIVEN ANY OF THE ABOVE PROBLEMS AS YET. SCREEN LOOKS AMAZING AND BATTERY LASTS JUST OVER A DAY.
      
      
      I THINK ITS THE BEST SMART PHONE ON THE MARKET FOR ENTERPRISE USERS AND WOULDN'T HESITATE TO RECOMMEND EXCEPT FOR THOSE DEFECTIVE PIECES DOING ROUNDS IN THE WAREHOUSES ACROSS THE GLOBE.

      AFTER 1 MONTH OF USAGE, I AM AGAIN BACK TO ANDROID WITH SAMSUNG GALAXY S3.

label: Nokia Lumia 920
Sentences:
MY FRIEND BOUGHT THIS PHONE 3 DAYS AGO INSTEAD OF BUYING A LAPTOP, WHICH IS PERHAPS THE MOST STUPIDEST DECISION ANYONE CAN EVER MAKE. I HAD SOME TIME TO PLAY WITH IT. THE PHONE HAS SOME AWARD WINING FEATURES LIKE:
      
      
      (OKAY, BEFORE I BEGIN, I MUST SAY, THE PHONE IS SIMPLY GORGEOUSLY TO LOOK AT AND IS A PLEASURE TO HOLD IN HAND. THIS IS PERHAPS THE MOST HYPED PHONE OF THE YEAR.)
      
      
      1) THE PURE MOTION HD PLUS DISPLAY HAS PRETTY STRIKING IMAGE QUALITY...COMPARABLE TO AND IN SOME ASPECTS BETTER THAN THE BEST IN THE INDUSTRY. HIGHEST PIXEL DENSITY ON A MOBILE DEVICE.
      
      
      2) POSSIBLY THE BEST LOW LIGHT PHOTOGRAPHY AVAILABLE IN A MOBILE PHONE. CAN GIVE COMPACT POINT AND SHOOT CAMERAS A RUN FOR THEIR MONEY.
      
      
      3) THE OS INTERFACE IS REALLY AN EYE CANDY TO WATCH. VERY IMPRESSIVE, FLUIDIC AND COLORFUL AND OFFERS MORE CUSTOMIZATION OPTIONS THAN THE IOS.
      
      
      4) THE 1.5GHZ DUAL CORE KRAIT QUALCOMM SNAPDRAGON PROCESSOR ALONG WITH THE ADRENO 225 GPU AND 1GB OF RAM IS PLENTIFUL TO RUN ANY APP AVAILABLE IN THE WINDOWS MARKETPLACE.
      
      
      5) OUT OF THE BOX WIRELESS CHARGING. VERY GOOD NFC INTEGRATION.
      
      
      6) BEST IN INDUSTRY GPS NAVIGATION SOLUTIONS AND CAPABILITIES.
      
      
      BUT..AND A BIG BUT...
      
      
      1) IN TERMS OF CUSTOMIZATION, WP 8 HAS STILL A LOT OF CATCHING UP TO DO IN COMPARISON WITH ANDROID.
      
      
      2) SOUND QUALITY THROUGH HEADPHONES IS MEDIOCRE AND IN NO WAYS UPTO TO THE MARK OF A 38K PHONE.
      
      
      3) NOT THE BEST IN CLASS HARDWARE AVAILABLE AT THAT PRICE POINT.
      
      
      4) BATTERY BACKUP IS UTTERLY UTTERLY BAD.
      
      
      5) TRUST ME WHEN I SAY THIS...THE NUMBER OF GOOD USABLE APPS IN THE WINDOWS MARKET PLACE IS SCARCELY LOW....APP STORE HAS MUCH CATCH UP TO DO IN COMPARISON WITH IOS AND ANDROID.
      
      
      6) DAYLIGHT PHOTOGRAPHY IS DOWNRIGHT AVERAGE. OKAY I SAID IT. I COMPARED IT WITH MY UNCLE'S GALAXY S3 AND MY CANON POWERSHOT PRICED AT JUST ABOUT 10K.
      
      
      9) NO FM RADIO IN A 38K PHONE. I MEAN THAT SUCKS !
      
      
      MY VERDICT: YOU WILL NOT CRY OR BE THOROUGHLY DISSAPOINTED IF YOU BUY THIS PHONE. BUT AT THIS PRICE POINT, THERE IS MUCH MUCH MORE TO BE DESERVED.
      
      
      THE SAMSUNG GALAXY S3 IS A GOOD 7K LESS AND OFFERS A FAR MORE SUPERIOR HARDWARE, MUCH MUCH MORE USABLE APPS, MORE OR LESS THE SAME QUALITY DISPLAY AND GOOD CAMERA AND VIDEO CAPABILITIES PLUS BETTER AUDIO QUALITY AND BIGGER SCREEN.
      
      
      HTC 8S HAS THE INDUSTRY LEADING AUDIO QUALITY AND IS PRICED AT ALMOST HALF THE PRICE OF THE LUMIA 920 AND ALSO COMES WITH WINDOWS PHONE 8.
      
      
      GALAXY NOTE 2 HAS ALL THE BENEFICIALS OF THE GALAXY S3 WITH BIGGER SCREEN, PERHAPS THE MOST POWERFUL HARDWARE ON A MOBILE DEVICE AND A KILLER FEATURE: THE S-PEN. AND IT COSTS 3K LESS THEN LUMIA 920.
      
      
      38K IS A HEFTY HEFTY PRICE TAG, BE A SMART CONSUMER AND DO YOUR HOMEWORK BEFORE YOU MAKE A MOVE. I THINK WITH THAT KIND OF MONEY, ONE SHOULD OBVIOUSLY BUY THE SAMSUNG GALAXY NOTE 2.

label: Nokia Lumia 920
Sentences:
NOT BEING TOO INITIATED INTO THE FIELD OF TECHNOLOGY, BUYING A PHONE HAD ALWAYS BEEN A RELATIVELY SIMPLE DECISION FOR ME. BUT, COMING OF AGE, I WAS SURROUNDED WITH THIS NEED TO STAY CONNECTED AND GET MYSELF A SMART MOBILE DEVICE. WITH HELP FROM MY PALS, I HUNTED AROUND FOR A SMARTPHONE THAT DID NOT JUST LOOK GOOD, BUT WAS ALSO GREAT IN TERMS OF THE FEATURES IT OFFERED. AND I FOUND MY MARK WITH THE NOKIA LUMIA 920. THIS SMARTPHONE IS ABSOLUTELY THE BEST AND BEATS THE COMPETITION HANDS DOWN. I LOVE THE WAY ITS UNIBODY POLYCARBONATE SHELL FEELS IN MY HAND AND INSPIRES CONFIDENCE. I HAVE ALWAYS TRUSTED MICROSOFT FOR THEIR SOFTWARE PRODUCTS AND SO CONSEQUENTIALLY HAVE FALLEN IN LOVE WITH THE WINDOWS 8 OPERATING SYSTEM. JUST THE AMOUNT OF CONVENIENCE AND EASE-OF-USE THAT THIS OS BRINGS TO THE TABLE IS ASTOUNDING. ALL MY PRODUCTIVITY, ENTERTAINMENT AND COMMUNICATION APPS SIT RIGHT ON MY HOME SCREEN; WAITING FOR A TAP OF MY FINGER TO SPRING INTO ACTION. MY CLOSEST PALS HAVE THIS HABIT OF STAYING CONNECTED VIA SOCIAL NETWORKS. WITH THE LUMIA 920, I CAN ARRANGE THEM ON MY HOME SCREEN USING PEOPLE HUB. THIS MEANS I AM INSTANTLY NOTIFIED IF ANY OF THEM POSTS A STATUS UPDATE. I HAVE BEEN ZIPPING THROUGH MY ASSIGNMENTS AT WORK EVEN ON THE MOVE. MY NOKIA LUMIA 920 SUPPORTS VIEWING AND EDITING OF MS OFFICE DOCUMENTS; SO BE IT WORD DOCS, EXCEL SPREADSHEETS OR POWERPOINT PRESENTATIONS, I CAN HANDLE EVERYTHING WITH EQUAL EASE. THIS PHONE ALSO LETS ME STAY AWARE ABOUT CURRENT AFFAIRS AS I CAN BROWSE THE WEB AND STREAM MULTIMEDIA CONTENT AT HIGH SPEEDS VIA 3G AND LTE SERVICES. AT MALLS AND SHOPPING CENTRES, I CAN JUST SWITCH ON MY LUMIA 920?S WI-FI AND CHECK EMAILS OR SURF THE WEB. ADDITIONAL CONNECTIVITY FEATURES LIKE NFC AND BLUETOOTH MAKES LIFE MORE CONVENIENT AND HASSLE-FREE.
      
      AS FOR THE HARDWARE INSIDE MY PHONE, IT COMES WITH A POWERFUL DUAL-CORE 1.5 GHZ QUALCOMM SNAPDRAGON S4 'KRAIT' MOBILE PROCESSOR IN ADDITION TO AN ADRENO 225 GRAPHICS CHIP AND 1 GB RAM. THIS MAKES MULTI-TASKING A DELIGHT AND ALSO LET ME ENJOY HD GAMES WITHOUT ANY LAGS. I LOVE THE 8.7 MP CAMERA ON MY LUMIA 920 THAT RENDERS AWESOME IMAGES AND VIDEOS. WITH A CARL ZEISS TESSAR LENS, PUREVIEW CAMERA TECHNOLOGY AND OPTICAL IMAGE STABILISATION, MY SNAPS AND VIDEO CLIPS COME OUT BLUR-FREE AND CLEAR. ADD A DUAL LED FLASH TO THE MIX AND I CAN EVEN CLICK PHOTOS IN LOW LIGHT. I LIKE THE WAY EVERYTHING IS DISPLAYED ON THE 4.5-INCH LCD TOUCHSCREEN DISPLAY OF MY PHONE THAT IS ULTRA-RESPONSIVE DUE TO ITS INTEGRATED PUREMOTION HD+ TECHNOLOGY. BASIC GAMES LIKE TEMPLE RUN ALSO LAG ON THE LUMIA 920, WHAT MORE CAN YOU EXPECT FROM THE OTHER WINDOWS DEVICES. DON'T BELIEVE ME, JUST CHECK OUT THE REVIEWS ON THE WINDOWS STORE.I HAVE SEEN MID RANGE PHONE LIKE THE GALAXY S ADVANCE (ROOTED) HANDLING GAMES LIKE MC 4 SMOOTHLY AND IT COSTS ONLY 15K.

label: Nokia Lumia 920
Sentences:
I BOUGHT NL 920 THREE WEEKS AGO. SO HERE IS WHAT I FOUND ABOUT NL 920.
      
      
      FIRSTLY I WOULD TALK ABOUT ITS SCREEN ITS BRILLIANT. SUPERB SUNLIGHT VISIBILITY AND AMAZING CONTRAST AND NATURAL COLOURS. IT PRODUCES REAL LOW MOTION BLUR!! I WOULD RATE 10/10.
      
      NEXT ABOUT THE PROCESSOR AND  RAM. SNAPDRAGON PERFORMS VERY WELL AND THE AVAILABLE RAM IS ENOUGH HOWEVER 2 GB WOULD HAVE BEEN  BETTER. I DIDN?T FELT ANY LAG WHILE USING THE PHONE . SO I WOULD RATE
      
      PROCESSOR-10/10
      
      RAM-9/10
      
      NEXT I WOULD COME TO CAMERA. ITS 8.7 MP CAMERA DID PERFORM VERY WELL BUT NOT UPTO EXPECTATION. THE CAMERA INTERFACE  IS POOR . ITS OVERHYPED.
      
      FOR CAMERA-8.5/10
      
      NEXT ABOUT THE BATTERY. ALTHOUGH NL 920 HAS 2000 MAH  BATTERY ITS BACK UP IS BAD. I FOUND ON HEAVY USAGE [USING INTERNET OVER 3G DOWNLOADING, PLAYING  SOME GAMES FOR 10 MINUTES, USING SOME GPS AND SOME OTHER APPS] IT HARDLY LASTED 8 HOURS WHICH IS VERY DISAPPOINTING. MOREOVER THE BACK OF THE PHONE BECOMES VERY HEATED UP. I TESTED  THIS ON LOWEST SCREEN BRIGHTNESS SETTINGS.
      
      FOR BATTERY-5/10
      
      NEXT ABOUT THE CALL RECEPTION AND SIGNAL STRENGTH. DURING MY USAGE IN ALL THESE DAYS I RECEIVED AND DIALLED MANY NUMBERS AND DIDN?T FACE ANY CALL DROP ISSUES.THE SOUND FROM  THE SPEAKER WAS DISTINCT AND CLEAR AND LOUD ENOUGH.
      
      BUT ABOUT THE SIGNAL RECEPTION IT HAS SOME WEAK SIGNAL RECEPTION CAPABILITY NEARLY 8-10% LESSER THAN MY NOKIA 5230 WHICH IS DISAPPOINTING FROM THIS HIGH END PHONE.
      
      FOR CALL QUALITY-10/10
      
      FOR NETWORK RECEPTION-7/10
      
      NEXT ABOUT THE AUDIO AND VIDEO PLAYBACK. VIDEO PLAYBACK QUALITY WAS SUPERB @30FPS BUT UNLIKE GALAXY S3 , GALAXY NOTE2 , HTC ONE X IT SUPPORTS MANY LESS FORMATS. SO YOU WONT BE ABLE TO PLAY ALL THE VIDEOS.
      
      AND ABOUT THE AUDIO PLAYBACK. THE SOUND QUALITY FROM  THE STEREO SPEAKERS REALLY GREAT AND  LOUD ENOUGH. BUT WHEN IT COMES TO THE HEADPHONES IT IS AGAIN DISAPPOINTING. THE RETAIL PACKAGE HEADPHONE WITH IS BAD. I COMPARED WITH MY NOKIA 5230 USING PHILIPS SHE 9550 HEADPHONE. THE THUMP& BASS DEPTH WAS WORSE THAN 5230. EVEN WHILE PLAYING AT HIGHER LEVELS [25+] THE SOUND FROM  HEADPHONES WAS NOT DISTINCT AND  A LITTLE DISTORTED COMPARED TO N 5230. ALTHOUGH NL920 HAS DOLBY DIGITAL SOUND BUT THE RESULT IS NOT UP TO MARK
      
      SO FOR VIDEO PLAYBACK-8/10
      
      AUDIO PLAYBACK-8/10
      
      NEXT THE USER INTERFACE. THE USER INTERFACE IS AMATEUR COMPARED TO ANDROID AND I PHONE. MANY MAJOR THINGS ARE LACKING. EG YOU CANNOT SET ANY RINGTONE VOLUME SEPARATELY, POOR MULTITASKING ETC.
      
      SO FOR USER INTERFACE-6.5/10
      
      NEXT ABOUT THE BROWSER. NL920 HAS THE INTERNET EXPLORER. TRUST ME NL920 HAS ONE OF THE BEST BROWSING CAPABILITIES WITH THE IE . YOU CAN BOOK TICKETS , FILL  ONLINE FORMS , RECHARGE YOUR ACCOUNTS AND ZERO LAG..
      
      FOR BROWSER-10/10
      
      LASTLY ABOUT THE BUILD QUALITY . UNLIKE THE GALAXY NL 920 HAS BEEN  BUILT LINE A PREMIUM PHONE. YOU WOULDN?T FEEL ANY CHEAP PLASTIC FEELING. ITS BUILT LIKE TANK. HEAVY AND STANDARD LOOK . TO ME WEIGHT WAS NOT ANY ISSUE.
      
      FOR BUILD -9.5/10
      
      
      SO OVERALL I WOULD LIKE TO SAY NOKIA HAS TRIED WELL TO CAPTURE THE HIGH END MARKET BUT THERE ARE SOME SERIOUS LACKINGS IN THEIR MOST INNOVATIVE PHONE.
      
      NO DOUBT NL920 IS THE BEST WINDOWS PHONE IN THE MARKET BUT UNLESS YOU ARE A DIE HARD FAN OF WINDOWS OS DONT GO FOR IT!. YOU WILL GET MUCH BETTER SMARTPHONES IN THE 34K RANGE.
      
      SO HERE ARE SOME COMPARATIVE OVERALL RATINGS.
      
      GALAXY S3-92/100
      
      HTC ONEX-91/100
      
      GALAXY NOTE2-94/100
      
      I PHONE 5-89/100
      
      LUMIA 920-85/100
      
      
      RECENTLY ON (3 MARCH) I FACED SOME MAJOR ISSUES. WHILE LISTENING TO MUSIC, PHONE HANGED AND AFTER THAT SCREEN WENT BLACK AND NO RESPONSE. NEITHER I CAN SWITCH IT OFF NOR I CAN REMOVE ITS BATTERY TO RESTART IT DUE ITS INNOVATIVE NON REMOVABLE BATTERY AND ALSO YOU CANNOT DOWNLOAD OFFLINE MAPS OTHER THAN WI FI NETWORK,NO NATIVE VIDEO CALLING MEANS U WILL HAVE TO USE SKYPE AND PAY TO SKYPE FOR VIDEO CALLING. THANK GOD I HAVE MY OLD W910I AND SE HAZEL J20I FOR VIDEO CALLING. MOREOVER THERE IS NO FILE MANAGER , NO DECENT PDF VIEWER.
      
      
      SO MY OVERALL RATING FURTHER GOES DOWN FROM 85 TO 80/100. SO BEWARE

label: Nokia Lumia 920
Sentences:
ALTHOUGH I DIDN'T PURCHASE IT FROM FLIPKART, I WOULD LIKE TO GIVE MY REVIEW AFTER USING IT FOR 5 MONTHS SO THAT NO ONE ELSE FALLS FOR THIS OVERPRICED PIECE OF JUNK LIKE I DID.
      
      PROS:
      
      1. NICE CAMERA
      
      2. GOOD BUILD QUALITY
      
      3. QUICK CHARGING TIME - 15-20% TO FULL IN 1.5-2 HOURS
      
      4. LOUDSPEAKER IS LOUD
      
      
      CONS:
      
      1. AWFUL BATTERY LIFE- USING IT FOR BROWSING FOR 1 HOUR-1.5 HOURS AND IT WILL BE DOWN TO 20-30%
      
      
      2. NO GOOD APPS  - PHONE WAS LAUNCHED NOV. 2012 AND STILL YOU ARE WAITING FOR APPS !!! SHAME ON NOKIA
      
      
      3. SEALED PHONE - IF SOMETHING GOES WRONG, THE ONLY OPTION YOU HAVE IS NOKIA CARE CENTER
      
      
      4. MULTITASKING IS A JOKE - TRY OPENING 6-7 APPS AT ONCE AND THE PHONE HANGS, CRASHES..
      
      
      5. LIVE TILES? 99% OF THE APPS YOU WILL USE CANNOT UPDATE LIVE TILES REGULARLY. (ONLY ONCE IN 1 HOUR). THINK OF LIVE TILES AS NOTHING BUT APP SHORTCUTS
      
      
      6. STUCK ON HARD RESET - MAJOR KNOWN ISSUE - TRY GOOGLING " LUMIA 920 STUCK AT SPINNING GEARS" AND YOU WILL SEE ISSUE. FYI, I HAVE EXPERIENCED IT MYSELF, TRIED ALL STEPS MENTIONED ONLINE, NOTHING WORKED. I AM GOING TO TAKE IT TO A SERVICE CENTER TOMORROW.
      
      
      7. NO CUSTOMIZATION FREEDOM COMPARED TO ANDROID.
      
      
      8. CALLS WOULD DROP ALL OF A SUDDEN EVEN WHEN THE NETWORK SIGNAL STRENGTH IS FULL.
      
      
      9. OS STARTS LAGGING, RANDOM REBOOTS AFTER USING FOR 2-3 MONTHS.
      
      
      WP8 IS A GOOD OS BUT, CURRENTLY ITS NOT AS GOOD AS ANDROID. IT'S PLAGUED BY VARIOUS BUGS, LACK OF APPS. ETC ETC.
      
      MY ADVICE - IF YOU HAVE THE MONEY, GO FOR A GOOD ANDROID PHONE. BUT IF YOU ARE A WINDOWS FAN OR LIKE TO HAVE AN AWESOME CAMERA (WITH PHONE FEATURES), YOU CAN BUY THIS ONE.
      
      
      I AM PLANNING TO SELL OFF MINE AS SOON AS IT GETS IN THE WORKING CONDITION. ANYONE INTERESTED TO BUY LUMIA 920 AT A THROWAWAY PRICE, CONTACT ME

      THE ONLY DRAWBACK THAT I FELT IN IT .. WHENEVER I REBOOT IT, ALL DESIRED SHORTCUTS PLACED ON DESKTOP WILL DISAPPEAR AUTOMATICALLY AND SECOND IN ANY ANDROID IS BEING 1GB RAM. THOUGH YOU CAN DOWNLOAD A LOT OF APPS IN SD CARD BUT IT ALSO CONSUMES MEMORY.
