label: Xperia C
Sentences:
I BOUGHT IT FROM A LOCAL SHOPKEEPER, AS I WAS GETTING IT AT A DISCOUNTED PRICE OF 17100, WITH 1 YEAR SONY WARRANTY. IN THE PAST I HAD BOUGHT GALAXY S2. I WANTED TO UPGRADE TO A 5" PHABLET, BUT COULDN'T FIND ANY SUCH DEVICE WITH GOOD BATTERY BACKUP.
      
      
      ALTHOUGH THE DISPLAY IS NOT COMPARABLE TO THE SUPER AMOLED PLUS IN S2, S3 ETC, BUT IT ISN'T BAD AT ALL. IN FACT, NOW I THINK THE AMOLED SCREEN HAVE HIGH COLOR SATURATION, AND I HAD GOT USED TO THOSE! THE SCREEN RESOLUTION IS DECENT ENOUGH TO PLAY ALL HD GAMES, WATCH HD VIDEOS ETC. I AM NOT A CRAZY FAN OF FULL HD ON MOBILE PHONE, I MEAN MOST OF THE TIMES I USE IT FOR CALLING, BROWSING, GOOGLE MAPS, NOTES, AND GAMING, AND THE RESOLUTION OF XPERIA C IS SUFFICIENT FOR ALL THOSE. ALSO ALL THE PHONES WITH FULL HD (OR QHD) HAVE LOW BATTERY BACKUP. WHEREAS MY PHONE LASTS 2 DAYS EASILY, AND WHEN I TURN ON STAMINA MODE, IT LASTS FOR 3-3.5 DAYS EASILY!!! THIS IS THE MOST IMPORTANT FACTOR FOR ME IN ANY MOBILE DEVICE.
      
      
      I HAVE BOUGHT A PURPLE COLORED PHONE, AND COULDN'T BE HAPPIER CUZ ITS FUNKY AND STILL DOESN'T LOOK GIRLY AT ALL! LOT OF ILLITERATE PEOPLE WHO OWN GALAXY S4, NOTE3 APPRECIATE MY PHONE'S LOOKS, AND ONE GUY EVEN TOLD ME TO EXCHANGE IT!!! BUT IF I WANTED THOSE, I COULD HAVE BOUGHT THEM MYSELF! BTW THESE PPL WERE SO STUPID, THAT EVEN WHEN I TRIED TO EXPLAIN THEM THAT THEIR NOTE3, S4 ARE TOO GOOD IN PROCESSOR, DISPLAY, RAM ETC, THEY WOULD STILL PLACE LOOKS OVER MATTER! AND I TRIED TO SHOW A COMMON PICTURE ON BOTH DEVICES SIDE BY SIDE, STILL THEY COULDN'T MAKE OUT ANY DIFFERENCE! POOR SOULS GOT CONNED BY THE MOBILE SELLERS, CUZ THEY JUST WANTED A SIMPLE PHABLET, YET ENDED UP BUYING S4, NOTE3 ETC!
      
      
      ONE WILL BE FOOLISH TO COMPARE THIS TO GALAXY GRAND, CUZ XPERIA C IS MUCH BETTER THAN THAT. I MEAN GALAXY GRAND HAS GOT PATHETIC SCREEN RESOLUTION, IF U SEE A CIRCULAR IMAGE ON ITS SCREEN, THE BOUNDARY LOOKS SKEWED AND UNEVEN! ALSO ITS PROCESSOR AND RAM ARE BELOW AVERAGE IN PERFORMANCE.
      
      
      NOTE: EVEN TODAY I AM A SAMSUNG FAN, AND MY OPINION IS THAT SAMSUNG PROVIDES BEST VALUE-FOR-MONEY. I ALSO THINK THAT SONY XPERIA RANGE IS SLIGHTLY OVERPRICED, AND THEY CHARGE HIGH PREMIUM FOR THEIR SLIGHTLY BETTER HARDWARE AND BRAND NAME. BUT, NOWADAYS SAMSUNG HAS NOT REMAINED EXCLUSIVE AND PREMIUM ANYMORE, AND I WANTED TO TRY OUT SONY XPERIA RANGE SINCE A LONG TIME. BUT, I WILL NEVER BUY ANY SONY MOBILE PHONE UNLESS I GET IT AT A DISCOUNT, I.E. UNLESS THE PRICE SEEMS FAIR TO ME!

label: Xperia C
Sentences:
I BOUGHT THIS DEVICE FROM MY LOCAL SONY STORE. I DIDN'T GET IT FROM FLIPKART JUST BECAUSE I CANNOT WAIT FOR THAT DELIVERY TIME, GOD THAT DELIVERY TIME! EVEN THOUGH FLIPKART OFFERED IT FOR 1200RS LESS BUT REALLY THAT ISN'T A BIG DEAL. NOW, COMING TO THE REVIEW. LET ME TELL YOU VERY CLEARLY THAT THIS PHONE IS BETTER THAN HTC ONE X WHICH COSTS 24,000RS!. LOOKS: THE DEVICE LOOKS LIKE XPERIA Z EXCEPT FOR THE SCREEN WHICH IS NOT CLEARBLACK, IVE USED LUMIA 820 CLEAR BLACK AND IT LOOKS PRETTY COOL!, BUT NOT TO MENTION THE DISPLAY, CONTRAST AND BRIGHTNESS(NOT TOO BRIGHT THOUGH :(  NOTE: ITS HARD TO SEE THE SCREEN IN THE SUN OR IN  A VERY BRIGHT LIT PLACE, UNLIKE CLEARBLACK, BUT REALLY DISPLAY DOESNT MATTER MUCH THE PERFORMANCE MATTERS!, ALSO THE SCREEN QUALITY IS GOOD. NOW COMING TO THE PERFORMANCE: YOU GET TO USE 974MB RAM OUT OF 1GB OFFERED, WELL... FRANKLY 1GB RAM IS VERY LESS FOR A QUAD CORE PROCESSOR. IT HAS THE 544MP GPU WHICH IS GOOD, PLAYS ALL GAMES SMOOTHLY EVEN GTA SAN ANDREAS!. I ALSO NOTICED SOME LAG IN THE DEVICE, MAYBE IT IS DUE TO THE OPERATING SYSTEM, NOT TO MENTION ANDROID IS THE ONLY MOBILE OS WHICH HAS REAL MULTITASKING AND CAN STILL RUN APPS IN BACKGROUND(FULLY FUNCTIONAL) WHILE YOU ARE DOING SOMETHING ELSE. NOW COMING TO THE CAMERA, I HATE THE FRONT CAMERA! FOR REAL VERY BAD QUALITY!. FOR THE 8MP CAMERA BACK ITS DAMN GOOD! RECORDS FULL HD VIDEOS EXCELLENT!. LET US SUMMARISE THE REVIEW HERE. AND OH WAIT A SECOND! I FELT THE SCREEN TOUCH IS NOT TOO SENSITIVE, AFTER APPLYING THE SCREEN GUARD FEATHER TOUCH IINPUT IS IMPOSSIBRU!
      
      
      PROS: EXCELLENT PERFORMANCE, LARGE SCREEN, LOOKS LIKE XPERIA Z XD, GOOD SCREEN RESOLUTION, EXCELLENT LOOKS
      
      
      CONS: NOT CLEARBLACK DISPLAY, TOUCH INPUT SLIGHTLY SLOW AS COMPARED TO OTHER MOBILE OS LIKE IOS AND WINDOWS PHONE BUT REALLY IT IS JUST THE PROBLEM OF THE OS!, OH MAN! RIDICULOUS HEADSET FOR REAL! ,
      
      
      CONCLUSION: THIS IS PROBABLY THE BEST PHONE IN THE RANGE OF 10-20K YES ! BUT U CAN OPT FOR XPERIA SP JUST SLIGHTLY ABOVE 20K BUT YEA SP DOESNT FALL UNDER 20K FOR REAL! WHY I DIDNT BUY SP? WELL.... MY CHOICE AFTER ALL, C HAS BIG SCREEN ANYHOW. CHEERS!

label: Xperia C
Sentences:
I BOUGHT THIS PHONE 20 DAYS BACK.. I WILL PRECISELY WRITE DOWN THE PROS & CONS
      
      
      PROS :
      
      PREMIUM LOOKS, SLEEK DESIGN, GOOD BODY BUILD..
      
      RAM 1GB IS GOOD ENOUGH FOR MULTI TASKING..
      
      GOOD PLAYBACK OF HD VIDEOS..
      
      CALL QUALITY IS GOOD..
      
      NO ISSUES OF INTERNAL MEMORY WITH ME.. APPS TRANSFERABLE TO SD CARD..
      
      GOOD BATTERY BACKUP 1.5 DAYS USAGE WITH DUAL SIM, 3G AND NORMAL GAMES..
      
      DUAL MICRO SIM ALSO WORKS FINE.. SIM1 SLOT IS 3G ENABLED.. GOOD INTERNET BROWSING, VIDEO CALLS ETC..
      
      NO HEATING OR HANGING PROBLEM.. AT LEAST IN MY SET..
      
      
      CONS :
      
      CAMERA WAS DISSAPPOINTING FOR ME.. REAR 8MP CAM IS FINE FOR DAYLIGHT PHOTOS BUT WITH LOW LIGHT ITS RESULT WAS VERY POOR.. FRONT CAMERA IS WORTHLESS FOR SELFIES BUT FINE FOR VIDEO CALLS..
      
      VIDEO QUALITY ALSO DOESNT LOOK LIKE 1080P.. AND MIC IS SENSITIVE IN RECORDING VOICE FROM DISTANCE.. WITH SOME CAM SETTINGS U CAN IMPROVE PICTURE QUALITY A BIT..
      
      SCREEN RESOLUTION IS QHD.. ALTHOUGH ITS FINE BUT SHUD HV BEEN AT LEAST 1280X720P ON A 5 INCH SCREEN SIZE..
      
      BATTERY DRAINS QUICKLY AFTER IT REACHES 30% SO ALL U HV GOT IS 70-75% OF BATTERY BACKUP..
      
      A LITTLE BIT OVERPRICED.. SHUD HV BEEN AROUND 16000
      
      
      BOTTOMLINE :
      
      
      PHONE IS GOOD FOR DAILY USAGE, CALLING, GAMES N INTERNET..
      
      NOT GOOD FOR PHOTOGRAPHERS..
      
      IF BUYING.. GO FOR THE PURPLE VARIANT.. ITS EYE CATCHING.. I OWN IT..

label: Xperia C
Sentences:
I GOT THE PHONE ALONG WITH THE BIG HEADSET FOR 17870. THE SONY HEADSET WAS A SUPRISE.. I HADN'T NOTICED IT WHILE BUYING.. HOWEVER IT DID OFFSET THE DISAPPOINTMENT WHEN I REALIZED THAT THE STOCK HEADPHONES ARE NOT IN-EAR. THE BIG HEADPHONES THAT I GOT WERE THE OVER THE EAR SONY ONES.
      
      
      SONY IS UNBEATABLE WHEN IT CONCERNS SOUND! THAT'S ITS USP I WOULD SAY AND THIS MODEL KEPT UP TO THE TREND I'VE LONGED OBSERVED.
      
      
      THE CAMERAS HOWEVER, DON'T DO WELL. IT'S NOT SUPRISING THAT THE SELFIES ON THE FRONT CAMERA ARE BAD (LOTS OF NOISE), NOR THE FACT THAT THE 8MP IS OVER ALL 'DECENT' BUT TAKES LOUSY NIGHT, SHOT.. BECAUSE SONY ISN'T REALLY GOOD AT MAKING CAMERAS.. CYBERSHOT WAS AN ERA LONG GONE.. THE CAMERAS THEY MAKE RIGHT NOW SUCK.. I HAVE A SONY CAMERA DSC W210 16 MP AND ALL THAT. VERY NOISY!! AND TAKES SAD PHOTOGRAPHS IN THE NIGHT.
      
      
      COMING BACK TO THE PHONE, THE CAMERA IS OK-OK.. IT'S NOT IPHONE QUALITY. IT'LL GET YOU BY BUT DON'T BE EXPECTING TOO MUCH.
      
      
      REGARDING THE FEEL OF THE PHONE, IT'S LIGHT, EASY TO CARRY ON LONG CALLS.
      
      
      INTERFACE IS PLEASANT, STILL GETTING USED TO IT.
      
      
      CALLS ARE CLEAR, HOWEVER AS USUAL THE SPEAKER ISN'T THAT LOUD. I ALSO HAVE DIFFICULTY COMMUNICATING USING THE MIKE OF THE STOCK HEADSET.
      
      
      SCREEN QUALITY IS DECENT, HOWEVER COULD BE BETTER.
      
      
      HAVING SAID A LOT, I WOULD SAY IF THIS IS A PHONE YOU WANT TO GIVE YOUR PARENTS OR AGED FOLKS WHO WANT A BRANDED PHONE WITH A GOOD SCREENS SIZE FOR WHATSAPP AND WATCHING MOVIES/MUSIC.. IT'S WORTH IT!! GO FOR IT.
      
      
      DON'T BUY ONE FOR YOURSELF THOUGH IF YOU AGREE WITH THE NEGATIVES.

      OVERALL A GOOD PHONE IN TERMS OF DESIGN AND PERFORMANCE BUT THE BIG LET DOWN IS THE BATTERY.

label: Xperia C
Sentences:
BOUGHT THIS PHONE ON DIWALI. BEFORE ORDERING, I WAS QUITE CONFUSED DUE TO SUCH REGULAR PRICE FLUCTUATIONS ESPECIALLY ON THIS PHONE. I'VE SEEN THE SAME PHONE PRICED AT 17200 AND THEN AT 18800 AND THEN AT 19005, 20490 AND MORE, ALL THIS WITHIN THE SPACE OF ONLY A FEW HOURS. THIS ALWAYS GOT MY THINKING WHETHER I SHOULD WAIT OR PLACE THE ORDER RIGHTAWAY. THE MOMENT ARRIVED WHEN I THOUGHT IT'S NOT WISE TO WAIT FURTHER AND BOUGHT IT FOR 20490 WITH AN EXCHANGE OFFER. BUT STILL LEAVES A BAD TASTE IN MY MOUTH WHEN I THINK ABOUT THE 17200 TAG + 15% CASHBACK WHICH I COULDN'T GO FOR AT THAT MOMENT. SO THE LESSON IS, IT'S NOT ALWAYS A GOOD IDEA TO WAIT N WATCH.
      
      
      ANYWAY, FLIPKART DID A GOOD JOB IN DELIVERING THIS. IT REACHED ME WELL BEFORE THEIR EXPECTED TIME.
      
      
      COMING TO THE PHONE NOW. LET'S LOOK AT THE GOOD THINGS:
      
      
      1. LOOKS AND FIRST FEEL: XPERIA C IS A STYLISH PHONE WHOSE SCREEN SIZE IS BOUND TO MAKE YOU LIKE IT INSTANTLY. THE FIRST FEEL OF THE INTERFACE IS QUITE SMOOTH EVENTHOUGH ITS NOT ABSOLUTELY BUTTERY.
      
      
      2. DOES PRETTY WELL ON INTERNET SURFING IF YOU HAVE A GOOD CONNECTION AND BOOTS UP QUICKLY.
      
      
      3. PERFORMANCE - THERE HAS BEEN A LOT OF HUE AND CRY ABOUT THIS HAVING A MEDIATEK PROCESSOR AND HONESTLY I WAS WORRIED ABOUT THAT BEFORE BUYING IT. WHAT I'VE EXPERIENCED AFTER USING IT IS, THAT IT'S SURPRISINGLY GOOD IN PERFORMANCE SO FAR BUT MOST OF ALL IT DOESN'T ANNOY YOU BY OVERHEATING   BY A FEW MINUTES OF USE UNLIKE MANY OTHER PHONES WITH SNAPDRAGON. XPERIA Z WITH THE SAME SCREEN SIZE AND A 1.5 QUAD CORE PROCESSOR PRODUCES UNBEARABLE HEAT WITH THE SAME AMOUNT OF USAGE. THAT'S A BIG RELIEF WITH THIS ONE.
      
      
      4. BATTERY LIFE: ANOTHER HUGE RELIEF IS IT'S LONG LASTING BATTERY LIFE. EVEN WITH SUBSTANTIAL USAGE, THE BATTERY DOESN'T THREATEN TO DIE EASILY. TRUST ME, A GOOD BATTERY LIFE IS A BIG ADVANTAGE TO HAVE IN A PHONE WITH THIS CONFIGURATION AND SCREEN SIZE.
      
      
      5. ANOTHER ADVANTAGE IS THE DUAL SIM FACILITY. I CAN USE MY WORK AND PERSONAL NUMBER IN THE SAME DEVICE. ONE DISAPPOINTMENT IS THE FACT THAT IT DOESN'T SEEM TO RECOGNIZE A CDMA SIM EVENTHOUGH IT SAYS ON THE MICRO SIM SLOT THAT YOU CAN USE A CDMA SIM AS WELL.
      
      
      6. THE CAMERA IS JUST ABOVE AVERAGE, COULD HAVE BEEN BETTER AT THIS PRICE. CAN GIVE YOU NICE SHOTS IN IDEAL LIGHT CONDITIONS. IT HAS GOT THE USUAL XPERIA FEATURES WHICH ARE NO MAGIC WAND.
      
      
      7. THE SCREEN SIZE WOULD MAKE OTHER PHONES LIKE IPHONE LOOK REALLY SMALL IN COMPARISON. YOU WOULD ENJOY GAMING, WANTCHING MOVIES AND PICS ON THIS ONE BETTER THAN ANY OTHER PHONE.
      
      
      8. DAMAGE WARRANTY: ANOTHER PLEASANT SURPRISE I GOT WHEN I RECEIVED IT WAS THAT SONY GIVES A FREE 6 MONTH PHYSICAL DAMAGE WARRANTY, MAKES ME EVEN HAPPIER ABOUT THE PRODUCT.
      
      
      THINGS WHICH YOU MIGHT WANT TO CONSIDER BEFORE BUYING IT:
      
      
      1. LOW INTERNAL STORAGE - 4 GB, VERY LOW USER AVAILABLE. BUT YOU CAN SET THE APPS INSTALLATION TO SD CARD.
      
      2. FRONT CAM IS JUST .3 MP, QUITE LOW AND DOESN'T SHOOT WELL.
      
      3. LOW AUDIO OUTPUT: YOU MUST BE EXPECTING A GREAT SOUND FROM SONY PHONES, BUT THIS ONE DOESN'T GIVE YOU A GREAT EXPERIENCE AS THE AUDIO OUTPUT IS VERY VERY LOW. IF YOU'RE PLUGGED IN A TRAIN, BUS OR SOMEWHERE OUTSIDE WAITING, YOU WOULDN'T BE ABLE TO ENJOY ANY SONGS AT ALL. TO CORRECT THIS, YOU WOULD HAVE TO INSTALL APPS LIKE SPEAKER BOOST, ETC. WHICH WILL SURELY BRING THE AUDIO LEVEL UP CONSIDERABLY.
      
      4. YOU CAN USE DATA SERVICES ON ONLY SIM 1, NOT ON SIM2.
      
      
      OVERALL NOT A BAD PHONE TO OWN!

      I'M GOING TO SHOW A SHORT COMPARISON BETWEEN XPERIA C AND XPERIA L..SORRY , I'M A VERY VERY SIMPLE USER AND MY SON IS AN ANDROID DEVELOPER SO I'M WRITING WHATEVER HE HAD TOLD ME ABOUT THESE TWO PHONE..
      
      
      XPERIA C-
      
      
      1. DISPLAY- THIS HAS AN AMAZING DISPLAY AND HAS VERY RICH COLOURS . IT ALSO HAS VERY GOOD VIEWING ANGLES.
      
      
      XPERIA L
      
      
      1. XPERIA L ALSO HAS A VERY GOOD DISPLAY WITH UPTO THE MARK COLOURS. IT ALSO HAS GOOD VIEWING ANGLES.
      
      
      XPERIA C WINS IN THIS THINGY..
      
      
      _______________________________
      
      
      XPERIA C
      
      
      2. BODY- IT HAS A FINE BUILD QUALITY AND NOT THAT GOOD LOOKS BUT IT'S WAY BETTER THAN THOSE PLASTIC SAMSUNG THINGS AS IT HAS A RUBBER BACK. IT HAS RUBBER BACK IS VERY FINGERPRINT SENSITIVE.
      
      
      XPERIA L
      
      
      2. IT HAS AN AMAZING BUILD QUALITY AND HAS GREAT LOOKS AND IS CURVED FROM THE BACK. IT'S BACK DOES NOT EVEN CAPTURE ANY DUST. IT WILL LOOK NEW EVEN AFTER 1 OR 2 YEARS OF USAGE.
      
      
      XPERIA L WINS BY A MARGIN.
      
      
      ____________________________
      
      
      XPERIA C
      
      
      3. CAMERA - XPERIA C HAS A VERY GOOD CAMERA , WHICH IS ALMOST LIKE XPERIA Z1 .
      
      
      XPERIA L
      
      
      3. XPERIA L'S CAMERA IS NOTICEABLY PIXELATED.. BUT SINCE NO ONE IN MY FAMILY IS A HEAVY CAMERA USER SO IT WON'T MATTER US EVEN IF IT DIN'T EVEN HAVE A CAMERA.
      
      
      XPERIA C WINS HERE
      
      
      _________________________
      
      
      XPERIA C
      
      
      4. SCREEN - CAN BE EASILY BROKEN DOWN. IT IS 5 INCHES AND NOT GORILLA GLASS.STILL IT IS SCRATCH - RESISTANT AND DUST - PROOF.
      
      
      XPERIA L
      
      
      4. STURDY AND STRONG. 4.3 INCHES AND SEEMS QUITE STRONG. ONCE IT WAS TOSSED AWAY BY MY SON (WHO IS ALMOST 6 FEET) AND IT WAS STILL WORKING LIKE NEW.
      
      
      XPERIA L WINS!
      
      
      __________________________________
      
      
      XPERIA C
      
      
      5. HARDWARE AND GPU - IT HAS ONLY 4GB OF ROM. OUT OF WHICH ONLY AROUND 1.5GB IS USABLE. EVEN THOUGH THIS HAS A FINE GPU (IMG SGX544)  YOU CAN'T EVEN DOWNLOAD BIGGER GAMES BECAUSE OF THE LIMITED ROM. THERE IS NO ROOT OF XPERIA C SO YOU CAN'T ALSO PUT APPS IN SD CARD.
      
      
      XPERIA L
      
      
      5. IT HAS 8GB OF ROM. IT HAS A GOOD GPU VIZ ADRENO 305. IT CAN BE ROOTED. WHAT DO YOU NEED MORE :3
      
      
      XPERIA L DOMINATES YET AGAIN.
      
      
      ____________________________________________
      
      
      PLEASE GO FOR XPERIA L. I DID A MISTAKE BY BUYING XPERIA C. DON'T BUY C. IT IS NOT WORTH 20K.
      
      
      YOU CAN STILL GO FOR IT IF YOU ARE NOT A HEAVY USER AND NEED PHONE FOR CALLS, WHATSAPP AND RANDOM GAMES , WHICH IS ME..

label: Xperia C
Sentences:
I HAVE ALMOST PLANNED TO BUY THIS MOBILE, BUT THEN AFTER GOING THROUGH ONE LIVE HANDSET FOR QUITE SOMETIME, I REALIZED THE FOLLOWING DRAWBACKS:
      
      1. THE DISPLAY IS REALLY DISAPPOINTING IF I AM COMPARING IT WITH SAME PRICE GROUP OTHER PHONES FROM OTHER BRANDS. THIS ALONE IS SUFFICIENT TO BE A REASON TO NOT BUY IT.
      
      2. THE ICONS ARE SMALL AND LOOKS MORE LIKE CHEAP CHINESE MANUFACTURERS LIKE MICROMAX AND XOLO. THEY LOOK VERY ORDINARY IN THIS DEVICE, YOU WILL FEEL ONCE LIKE USING OLD ANDROID DEVICE.
      
      3. THE SOUND OUTPUT IS GOOD BUT NOT AS GOOD AS SAMSUNG'S 12000 PRICE GROUP PHONES.
      
      4. THE JELLY BEAN VERSION IS LATEST BUT LOOKS A LOT MESSED AND NOT AT ALL USER FRIENDLY.
      
      5. THE BUILD OF THE PHONE IS ALSO NOT AS GOOD AS SONY PHONES GENERALLY COME.
      
      
      THEREFORE WHAT I CONCLUDE, IT IS A GOOD OPTION IF THE PRICE WOULD HAVE BEEN AROUND 13K.

Sentences:
I WOULD HAVE LOVED TO RATE THIS PHONE 5 STARS BUT ONLY FOR THE MEAGRE 4GB INTERNAL MEMORY. I BOUGHT THIS FOR MY WIFE AND SHE'S BEEN USING THIS PHONE FOR JUST TWO WEEKS AND SHE ALREADY STATED GETTING A NOTIFICATION THAT THE INTERNAL MEMORY IS RUNNING LOW EVEN AFTER ADDING 32GB EXTERNAL SD CARD. THOUGH YOU CAN MOVE MANY APPS TO EXTERNAL MEMORY THERE ARE FEW VERY USEFUL APPS LIKE WHATSAPPS THAT CANNOT BE MOVED TO EXTERNAL MEMORY NOT TO MENTION THE NATIVE GOOGLE AND SONY APPS WHICH CANNOT EVEN BE UN-INSTALLED. AND YOU HAVE TO ACCEPT THE FACT THAT YOU CANNOT UPGRADE THE MEMORY ATLEAST WITH THIS GENERATION OF SMART PHONES. SO END OF THE DAY IT LEAVES YOU FRUSTRATED. SONY COULD HAVE ATLEAST ARM THIS WITH AN 8GB MEMORY. TOO BAD.
      
      
      PERFORMANCE WISE IT IS QUITE GOOD. FAST AND SLICK. DISPLAY IS ALSO QUITE DECENT. NO COMPLAINTS ABOUT THE REAR CAMERA EITHER, BUT FRONT FACING CAMERA IS A JOKE.
      
      
      IF YOU PLAN TO USE THIS PHONE MAINLY FOR THE BASIC FEATURES IT SHOULD SERVE THE PURPOSE, BUT IF YOU INTEND TO DOWNLOAD LOTS OF APPS THEN THIS PHONE IS NOT FOR YOU. IT WILL LEAVE YOU FRUSTRATED.

Sentences:
GOT THIS PHONE FOR 18K FROM FLIPKART - AS USUAL PACKING OF THE PHONE WAS EXCELLENT, FLIPKART TOOK 4 DAYS TO DELIVER. I INITIALLY THOUGHT THIS PRODUCT IS GREAT. WHEN I FIRST STARTED TO GET THE  "INTERNAL STORAGE RUNNING OUT ERROR"   - I THOUGHT, IT MAY BE BECAUSE I DO NOT HAVE THE SD CARD. I GOT CLASS 10 SONY SD CARD WITH 32 G STORAGE. IT STILL KEPT GIVING ME "INTERNAL STORAGE RUNNING OUT ERROR"  DESPITE HAVING 32 G MEMORY CARD, WHICH IS LESS THAN 10% FULL AND AFTER MOVING ALL MY APPS TO SD CARD. THIS IS THE SINGLE BIGGEST COMPLAINT I HAVE FOR THIS PHONE. NOW, I AM NOT ABLE TO INSTALL ANY OTHER APP.  I AM HAVING A FELLING OF BEING LOCKED WITH THIS PRODUCT. I LOOKED UP ON SONY FORUMS ON INTERNET AND THERE WAS NO SOLUTION AVAILABLE .. NOT ONLY IS THIS PROBLEM WITH SONY XPERIA C - THIS IS ALSO CONTAGIOUS TO OTHER SONY PHONES LIKE XPERIA L.  SOME OTHER PROS AND CONS :
      
      
      PROS :

Sentences:
THOUGH THIS PHONE HAS A BETTER SCREEN RESOLUTION STILL VIEWING ANGLE OF THIS PHONE IS NOT GREAT.
      
      
      BUT THE MAIN PROBLEM IS THE PROCESSOR... QUALCOMM IS NO1 CHIP SET MANUFACTURER, HIGHEND SMARTPHONE USES ITS SNAPDRAGON SERIES LIKE HTC ONE,S4,OPTIMUS G,LUMIA920.  GRAND IS USING BROADCOM USA WHICH IS COMPARATIVELY SAME AS QUALCOMM IN TERMS OF QUALITY. BUT XPERIA C USING  MEDIATEK CHIPSET. WHICH IS GREAT IN TERMS OF QUANTITY.  MOST OF THE CHINESE MOBILE COMPANY USE MEDIATEK CHIPSET.AS YOU SEE IN MICROMAX,KARBON,LAVA BUT THEIR QUALITY IS VERY VERY POOR IN TERMS OF PERFORMANCE.IF YOU GO FOR MEDIATEK PROCESSOR AT THIS PRICE THEN WHY DONT YOU GO FOR CHEAP CHINESE CRAP WHICH ARE JUST HALF THE PRICE OF XPERIA C HAVING SAME MEDIATEK QUAD CORE PROCESSOR WHERE C STANDS FOR CHINA.
      
      
      STORAGE IN XPERIA C  4GB INTERNAL EXPANDABLE UPTO 32GB WHEREAS ONLY .97GB+600MB SYSTEM MEMORY AVAILABLE FOR USERS ONLY.WHICH IS VERY VERY LESS ,REALLY ANNOYING FOR THIS PHONE.SO YOU VE VERY LESS OPTION TO STORE HIGH END GAMES OR APPS.
      
      
      FRONT FACING CAMERA IN XPERIA C 0.3MP . 0.3 MP SEEMS TO BE A VGA CAMERA GIVES YOU GRANNY IMAGE WHILE VIDEO CALLING OR FRONT SELF SHOOTING.
      
      
      XPERIA C HAS A BETTER BATTERY BUT DUAL SIM WITH SPECIALLY CHEAP MEDIATEK CHIP SET DONT EXPECT GREAT PERFORMANCE BECAUSE MEDIA TEK QUAD CORE IS HIGHLY BATTERY CONSUMABLE.
      
      
      AND BECAUSE OF UNIBODY DESIGN XPERIA C HAS NON REMOVABLE BATTERY,SO NO OPTION FOR CARRYING AN EXTRA BATTERY TO USE IN EMERGENCY AND WHEN BATTERY DIES YOU VE TO GO TO SERVICE CENTER FOR REPLACEMENT, WHICH COST EXTRA SERVICE CHARGE AND EXPENSIVE THAN THE MARKET PRICE.
      
      
      XPERIA C IS MISSING SOME OF THE IMPORTANT SENSOR LIKE GYROSCOPE WHICH IS USED TO MEASURES THE ORIENTATION OF THE DEVICE. IT CAN SENSE MOTION INCLUDING VERTICAL AND HORIZONTAL ROTATION.USES IN HIGHEND GAMES LIKE COUNTER STRIKE.IN SUCH GAMES, WE ARE REQUIRED TO MOVE IN ALL DIRECTIONS WHICH ALSO INVOLVES ROTATION AROUND GRAVITY. AGAIN WITHOUT THE SUPPORT OF GYROSCOPE,  WE NEED TO DRAG A FINGER ON THE TOUCH SCREEN TO BE ABLE TO MOVE IN THE DESIRED DIRECTION AND WE HAVE TO AGREE THAT AFTER A WHILE WE WILL BEGAN TO REALIZE THE UNFRIENDLINESS OF THE SYSTEM, IN SHORT IT WILL GET ANNOYING.
      
      
      AND MOST IMPORTANT NO ONE NOTICE ABOUT SONY PHONE WHERE BACK AND MENU TOUCH BOTTONS ARE THE PART OF THE SCREEN WHICH BLOCK SOME PART OF THE SCREEN DOESN'T GIVE YOU THE FULL 5INCH SCREEN AS MENTION IN THEIR FEATURE LEFT 4.7INCH SCREEN.
      
      
      SO WITH CHEAP MEDIATEK PROCESSOR THAT SONY USED FIRST TIME WHICH IS NOT SONY STANDARD, VGA FRONT FACING CAMERA AND LOWEST INTERNAL MEMORY AND ALMOST 3000-4000 EXTRA PRICING , NOT RECOMMEND TO BUY.

I WAS LOOKING FOR A PHONE WHERE I WAS NOT INTERESTED TO CARRY CHARGER EVERYWHERE I GO, IT MEANS I NEEDED A PHONE WITH BETTER BATTERY BACKUP, XPERIA J PASSED IN THIS CRITERIA WITH 1700MAH BATTERY, CAPABLE ENOUGH TO KEEP YOU SATISFIED, EVEN IF YOU ARE OUT FOR THE WHOLE DAY ON TRIP.
      
      SECONDLY, I WAS LOOKING FOR A PHONE WHICH GIVES ME GOOD FEELING WHILE NET SURFING. I AM NOT QUITE SURE, HOW THE OTHER MOBILES IN THIS RANGE ARE PERFORMING IN THIS AREA, BUT XPERIA J WILL SURELY KEEP YOU HAPPY, EVEN IF YOU CHECK, THE SURFING SPEED VALUE FOR 2G AND 3G INTERNET PROVIDED BY SONY IS SOMEWHERE HIGHER AS COMPARE TO THE OTHER MOBILES VALUE, AND IT REALLY WORKS THAT WAY, THOUGH I AGREE WITH YOU, THE WORKING INTERNET SPEED IS DEPENDENT ON SERVICE PROVIDER. I CAN WATCH THE COMPLETE VIDEO IN YOUTUBE IN 2G, WITH BUFFERING STOPPAGE OF 3-4 TIMES WHILE BROWSING, BUT GUYS, JUST MARK THE SPEED, IT IS CAPABLE EVEN IN 2G GPRS SERVICE TO SHOW YOU VIDEO. I HAVE BEEN USING INTERNET RADIO AND SAAVN ON REGULAR BASIS TO LISTEN MUSIC VIA, 2G GPRS SERVICE AND IT WORKS ABSOLUTELY FINE.
      
      
      USB TETHERING AND WIFI TETHERING WORKS PERFECT FOR ME.
      
      
      IT'S LOOK IS A KILLER LOOK......I NEVER FOUND THAT NECESSARY THAT MY PHONE SHOULD HAVE BEEN BLESSED WITH 1GB RAM BY SONY, THOUGH IT COULD HAVE REALLY INCREASED THE PERFORMANCE...512MB WORKS GOOD, AND NOWHERE MAKES YOU UNHAPPY.
      
      
      TEMPLE RUN LOVERS, NEED NOT WORRY, THIS PHONE WILL NEVER LAG. IT WORKS FINE.
      
      
      THE ONLY THING I DIDN'T LIKED IS THE ENCLOSED EARPHONE BY SONY, IS NOT WORTH THE QUALITY, BUT YOU CAN ALWAYS HAVE A NEW EARPHONE PURCHASED, AND THIS CANNOT BE THE REASON TO REJECT XPERIA J.
      
      SO GO FOR IT, AND YOU WILL NOT REGRET FOR SURE, WHO WANT'S A DECENT BUY WITH TRUSTWORTHY BRAND.

label: Xperia J
Sentences:
HEY GUYS
      
      XPERIA J IS IS AN AWESOME PHONE IN ITS PRICE RANGE. I WON'T MENTION THE SPECIFICATIONS AGAIN . THE PHONE GIVES A VERY GOOD EXPERIENCE OF ICS AND TIMESCAPE INTERFACE OF SONY.
      
      
      FIRSTLY THE THE PHONE IS VERY HIGH ON LOOKS SPECIALLY THE WHITE COLOUR. YOU CAN ALSO GET SAMSUNG S DUOS FOR SAME PRICE BUT S DOUS WON'T MATCH ITS LOOKS.
      
      IF YOU ARE A BIG MUSIC LISTENER, THE THIS PHONE WAS BUILT FOR YOU! ITS SPEAKERS ARE GREAT. THEY COME WITH SONY'S X LOUD ENHANCEMENT AND ARE LOUD ENOUGH. EVEN AT HIGH VOLUME LEVEL THEIR IS NO SOUND DISTORTION. THE PHONE COMES WITH WALKMAN MUSIC PLAYER WITH A VERY NICE INTERFACE.
      
      GAMING EXPERIENCE IS ALSO GOOD. YOU CAN PLAY ALL THE CLASSICS LIKE ANGRY BIRD, TEMPLE RUN ETC. GRAPHICS ARE GOOD. IF YOU WANT A PRO GAMING EXPERIENCE YOU CAN BUY XPERIA U WHICH IS CHEAPER THAN XPERIA J BUT HAS A SMALL SCREEN AND HAS LOW VOLUME.
      
      CAMERA IS ALSO FINE. THOUGH IT IS NOT THAT GOOD AS COMPARED TO A DIGITAL CAMERA BUT IT IS FINE.
      
      BATTERY IS ALSO GOOD. NO NEED TO CHARGE TWICE A DAY AS IN MOST OF THE ANDROID PHONES. YOU CAN USE IT FOR MULTIMEDIA PURPOSES ALL DAY.
      
      ITS SCREEN IS AMAZING. PIXELS ARE NOT VISIBLE . VIDEO PLAYBACK IS GOOD THOUGH IT CANNOT PLAY HD VIDEOS. IF YOU WAN'T HD VIDEOS PLAYBACK THEN YOU CAN CHECK OUT XPERIA NEO L WHICH IS AROUND RS. 18000.
      
      OVERALL THIS PHONE IS A GREAT PRODUCT FROM SONY.  IF YOU WAN'T A GREAT PHONE IN THIS PRICE RANGE THEN GO FOR IT. YOU CAN ALSO CHECK OUT SAMSUNG GALAXY S DUOS, HTC ONE V, NOKIA 710 AND I PHONE 3G.

Sentences:
HI I HAVE BEEN PLANNING TO BUY A SMART PHONE FOR A LONG TIME AND MY IDEAL PHONE WAS SAMSUNG GALAXY SII BUT DUE ITS HIGH COST ITS OUT OF MY BUDGET, BUT I WOULD LOVE TO HAVE A PHONE WITH ALMOST SAME FEATURES BUT WITHIN 15K, THAT IS RUBBISH ITS NOT POSSIBLE....
      
      AFTER A LOT OF RESEARCH READING ABOUT ALL THE ASPECTS, HARDWARE CONFIGURATION, ANDROID OS VERSION, GPU EFFECTS, SCREEN SIZE, CAMERA CONFIGURATION. I WONDERED WHY THERE CANT BE A SINGLE SET FROM EVERY MANUFACTURE WHICH COULD SATISFY EVERY MENTIONED QUALITY  TO BE PRESENT IN THAT SET AND THAT SHOULD BE THE ULTIMATE IN ITS SEGMENT, THEN I WONDERED IF THAT SET IS LAUNCHED IN THE MARKET WITHIN A RANGE OF 20K THEN EVERY OTHER SET WILL NOT BE SOLD.
      
      
      SO 1ST THING PRIORITIZE WHAT YOU WANT FROM YOUR PHONE AND BELIEVE ME IF YOU WANT IT WITHIN YOUR BUDGET YOU WOULD HAVE TO SACRIFICE/COMPROMISE WITH SOME LESS GRADED OTHER FEATURES.
      
      
      PROS:
      
      1. SCREEN SIZE 4", LOOKS GOOD IN HAND.
      
      2. OS ANDROID V4 (ICE CREAM SANDWICH) MOST PROBABLY UP-GRADABLE TO ANDROID V4 (JELLY BEANS)[BUTTER PROJECT OF GOOGLE, TO IMPROVE THE GRAPHICS, INCLUDE GOOGLE VOICE SEARCH, GOOGLE MAPS OF CITIES CAN BE DOWNLOADED, UNLOCK SCREEN WILL BE CHANGED ETC]
      
      3. PROCESSOR IS FINE AND SO IS THE USER INTERFACE(TIMESCAPE)
      
      4. SCRATCH RESISTANT SCREEN AND SONY BRAVIA ENGINE.
      
      5. WITHIN RANGE UNDER 16500RS
      
      6. CAMERA FOR STILL PHOTOGRAPHS IS GOOD, WITH LED FLASH
      
      7. SECONDARY CAMERA(VGA) FOR VIDEO CALL OVER VOIP, INTERNET.
      
      8. BATTERY IS 1700MAH... PROVIDES BETTER BATTERY BACKUP.
      
      
      CONS:
      
      1. GPU (GRAPHICAL PROCESSING UNIT) IS ADRENO 200, THIS ATLEAST            COULD HAVE BEEN ADRENO220, IF NOT MALI400MP
      
      GPU-> HELPS IN PLAYING HEAVY GAMES, HD GAMES, HIGHER THE GPU   LESSER IS LOAD ON PROCESSOR AND RAM.
      
      2. RAM 512 IDEALY SHOULD HAVE BEEN 1GB, BUT THEN IT WOULD HAVE BECOME AN IDEAL PHONE.
      
      3. VIDEO RECORDING IS NOT HD VIDEO, FOR ME ITS NOT IMP ASPECT I DON'T MAKE THAT MUCH VIDEOS BUT I GUESS VGA VIDEOS ARE NOT THAT BAD.
      
      4. INTERNAL MEMORY IS FINE AS YOU CAN BUY AN EXTERNAL MEMORY CARD AND ICS ALLOWS USER TO SAVE AND RUN APPLICATIONS FROM MEMORY CARD.
      
      
      I HAVE DECIDE TO BUY THIS PHONE BUT IT IS NOT AVAILABLE IN RETAIL STORES.
      
      
      THIS IS A GOOD BUY.
      
      
      U CAN BUY IT IN CHEAP PRICES FROM OTHER SITES BUT THEY WON'T BE GIVING MANUFACTURER'S WARRANTY, THEY WILL GIVE YOU DEALER'S WARRANTY.GOOGLE ABOUT THIS YOU WILL UNDERSTAND.

Sentences:
I HAVE BEEN USING THIS PHONE FOR AROUND 20 DAYS NOW AND I MUST SAY..ITS SIMPLY AWSOME.IT REALLY GIVES THE LOOKS OF A HIGH RANGE PHONE BUT IS VERY MUCH AFFORDABLE.AND THE COMPLIMENTS YOU GET FOR THE PHONE WILL SIMPLY MAKE U NEGLECT THE FEW CONS THAT THIS GORGEOUS PIECE OF BEAUTY HAS.NOW:
      
      PROS:
      
      -AWESOME LOOKS
      
      -VERY IMPRESSIVE AND ATTRACTIVE LED ILLUMINATION.
      
      -GORGEOUS CURVY BACK LOOK AND RUBBER FINISH BACK COVER
      
      -THOUGH ADRENO 200,BUT THE SCREEN IS SIMPLY AWESOME DUE TO HIGH PPI.
      
      -BEST UI AVAILABLE IN MKT.
      
      -CAN HANDLE MOST OF THE NORMAL GAMES.NOT THE ONES HAVING HIGH END GRAPHICS THOUGH.
      
      -DOES NOT HANG A LOT.(I READ SOME REVIEWS SAYING THAT IT HANGS A LOT BUT TRUST ME GUYS IT DOES NOT)
      
      -VERY GOOD ENTERTAINMENT BASIS PERFORMANCE,CAN PLAY HD VIDEOS EASILY.
      
      
      CONS-
      
      -HEADPHONES COULD HAVE BEEN BETTER PLUS THEY GIVE WHITE HEADPHONES WITH BLACK SET,WHICH IS NOT VERY LOGICAL AND PLEASING.
      
      -SLIGHT ECHO WHILE ON CALL SOMETIMES.GOD KNOWS WHY.BUT VERY SLIGHT.
      
      -MAJOR ONE-ITS MIC'S SENSITIVITY GOT REDUCED IN 15 DAYS OF USAGE AND IT STOPPED WORKING.HAD TO GO TO SERVICE CENTRE WHERE THEY REPLACED THE MIC.THIS IS A COMMON PROBLEM IN MANY XPERIA J AS ACCORDING TO SERVICE CENTRE TECHNICIAN THE MICS OF J ARE APPARENTLY NOT THAT SUITABLE TO INDIAN CONDITIONS.BUT NOW ITS BEEN REPLACED AND IS WORKING FINE.
      
      -CAMERA QUALITY IS AWESOME IN DAYLIGHT,NOT THAT IMPRESSIVE WITH FLASH AT NITE TYM OR WITHOUT FLASH TOO.
      
      
      ALL AND ALL I AM VERY MUCH SATISFIED BY MY DEVICE N WILL GIVE IT 5 STARS.ITS A GOOD DEAL.GO AHEAD AND BUY IT.
      
      THANK YOU.

label: Xperia J
Sentences:
I HAVE JUST SWITCHED FROM USING A SAMSUNG CORBY TO THE SONY XPERIA J AFTER MUCH THOUGHT AND READING A MILLION REVIEWS POSTED ALL OVER THE NET.
      
      FIRST AND FORE MOST I WOULD LIKE TO SAY THAT I HAD BOUGHT THIS PHONE FROM FLIPKART ON THE 8TH OF DEC. AND GOT IT IMMEDIATELY ON THE 10TH. SO GREAT JOB BY FLIPKART.
      
      I WOULD SAY THAT PEOPLE WHO CAN AFFORD PHONES WORTH MORE THAN 18K TO PLEASE NOT COMMENT HERE. NOT TO BE RUDE BUT, PHONES BELOW THAT PRICE RANGE ARE COMPLETELY DIFFERENT AND CANNOT  BE COMPARED WITH HIGHER PRICED PHONES.
      
      MOVING ON TO THE PHONE.
      
      THE PHONE HAS A BRILLIANT DISPLAYING 4'' TOUCH SCREEN WHICH FEELS REALLY GOOD IN YOUR HAND AND LOOKS GOOD TO! ;-)
      
      THERE HAVE BEEN MANY SECOND THOUGHTS ON THE PHONE BECAUSE OF ITS SINGLE CORE BUT LET ME MAKE SOMETHING VERY CLEAR,
      
      HEAVY AND HD GAMERS OR THOSE WHO LOVE RUNNING A LOT OF APPS WHICH CONSUME LOT OF RAM TOO, PLEASE STAY AWAY FROM THIS PHONE. REASON BEING THAT IT HAS ONLY SINGLE CORE SO THERE WILL BE LAG.
      
      I WOULD ALSO LIKE TO SAY THAT I HAVE READ MANY COMMENTS ABOUT THE PHONE BEING LAGGY, WHICH IS NOT TRUE. SURE, IF YOU COMPARE IT TO A DUAL CORE YOUR NOT GOING TO LIKE THIS AS MUCH BUT TO TELL YOU THE TRUTH THE LAG(WHICH IS THERE VERY RARELY) IS ALMOST NEGLIGIBLE.
      
      THE CAMERA IS QUITE GOOD FOR A 5MP ONE.
      
      THE NOTIFICATION LIGHT AT THE BOTTOM IS FUN LITTLE THING WHICH I REALLY LIKE.
      
      THE SPEAKERS ARE ALSO QUITE GOOD TOO!
      
      OVERALL I REALLY LOVE THE PHONE WHICH I AM CURRENTLY USING.
      
      AGAIN I WOULD LIKE TO MENTION THAT THOSE WHO CAN AFFORD PHONES MORE THAN THIS ONE PLEASE DO NOT COMMENT.
      
      SO PLEASE MAKE A WISE CHOICE ON CHOOSING YOUR PHONE!
      
      I HOPE THIS ARTICLE IS HELPFUL! :D
      
      THANK YOU,
      
      I AM 15 YEARS BY THE WAY! :-P

I ORDERED THIS PHONE ON 06.03.2013 AT ABOUT 20.25 HOURS AND LO AND BEHOLD I RECEIVED THE SAME ON 09.03.2013, VERY NEATLY AND SAFELY PACKED WITH ALL ACCESSORIES IN TACT. I WAS INITIALLY APPREHENSIVE AS TO HOW THE PRODUCT WOULD BE, BUT I MUST ADMIT THE FLIPKART GUYS ARE PRETTY FAST - AND DO CARE A LOT FOR CUSTOMER SATISFACTION. NOW, ABOUT THE PHONE - IT'S THE BEST IN ITS RANGE -
      
      1. 1 GH SINGLE CORE A5 PROCESSOR IS DAMN GOOD FOR SEVERAL APPLICATIONS (ALTHOUGH SOME WOULD LIKE TO PREFER A DUAL CORE ONE),
      
      2. 512 RAM IS OKAY FOR MOST APPLICATIONS, AND INTERNET BROWSING ALSO.
      
      3. 5 MP CAMERA CAN TAKE STUNNING PICTURES
      
      4. SOME 2.2 INTERNAL USER MEMORY IS ENOUGH TO STORE SEVERAL APPLICATIONS,
      
      5. ELSE, MICRO SD SUPPORT UPTO 32 GB IS AVAILABLE (I GOT A 16 GB MICRO SD CARD WITH THE     PHONE)
      
      6. THE 4" CAPACITIVE TOUCH-SCREEN IS PRETTY GOOD (HAS SCRATCH RESISTANT GORILLA GLASS)
      
      7. COMES WITH MOBILE BRAVIA ENGINE - DISPLAY 16 M COLOURS, AND GOOD PPI DENSITY WONDERFUL VIDEO PLAYS EVEN ON INTERNET,
      
      8. HAS WIFI HOT SPOT - I CHECKED THE INTERNET SPEED THROUGH WIFI BSNL BROAD-BAND, THE SPEED IS PRETTY GOOD.
      
      I KNOW THESE FEATURES ARE MENTIONED ON THE NET TOO, BUT I AM JUST MENTIONING WHAT I CHECKED WITHIN 4-5 HOURS AND FOUND THEM EFFICACIOUS.
      
      ON THE WHOLE A MARVELOUS PHONE! ANYONE CONTEMPLATING TO BUY XPERIA J, JUST GO AHEAD - IT LOOKS BETTER THAN MIRO AND TIPO, AND OTHERS IN ITS RANGE. I HAVEN'T COUNTERED ANY CONS IN THE PHONE YET...
      
      HATS OFF TO SONY!!! AND OF COURSE FLIPKART THANKS FOR THE GOOD SERVICE.

label: Xperia J
Sentences: IF YOU WANT A PHONE WITH A BIG SCREEN, ICONIC PLANO-CONCAVE DESIGN AND A MINDBLOWING BATTERY, XPERIA J IS THE PHONE FOR YOU. THE SMART ILLUMINATION ADDS TO THE CLASSY LOOK OF THIS BABY. IT MAY NOT BE AS POWERFUL AS XPERIA U COZ THIS ONLY HAVE A ARM CORTEX A5 SINGLE 1GHZ PROCESSOR AND AN ENHANCED ADRENO 200 GPU BUT NOT EVERYONE REQUIRES TO RUN HD VIDEO AND HI-DEF GAMES ON PHONES, 480P IS GOOD ENOUGH FOR ME. THE SPEAKER IS SUPERB AS IT DOESN'T CRACKLE EVEN WHEN XLOUD IS TURNED ON. VIDEO PLAYBACK IS SUPERB PROVIDED THEY ARE OF 854X480 PIXELS. THERE IS NO AMBIENT LIGHT SENSOR WHICH IS A BIT OF A BUMMER. THE LOCK BUTTON IS A BIT FLUSHED. IF YOU DON'T WANT A HIGH PERFORMANCE PHONE BUT A GOOD LOOKING PHONE, DEFINITELY GO FOR IT. THE DISPLAY IS CRISP WITH 245PPI ON A 4 INCH TFT GORILLA GLASS SCREEN. IF YOU WANT RAW POWER LIKE THOR, GO FOR XPERIA U. BUT IF YOU WANT STYLE AND PRODUCTIVITY, GO FOR XPERIA J. I'M MORE THAN HAPPY WITH MY DEVICE. label: Xperia J
Sentences:
THIS PHONE HAS OUTDATED HARDWARE WHEN COMPARED TO XPERIA U/SOLA.
      
      
      WHEN COMPARED TO XPERIA SOLA.
      
      
      XPERIA J HAS CORTEX A-5 PROCESSOR WHILE XPERIA SOLA HAS DUAL-CORE CORTEX A-9 PROCESSOR.
      
      
      XPERIA J HAS ADRENO 200 GPU WHILE XPERIA SOLA HAS MALI 400 GPU.
      
      
      XPERIA J HAS QUALCOMM MSM7227A SNAPDRAGON (1ST GENERATION) CHIPSET WHILE XPERIA SOLA HAS NOVATHOR ST U8500 CHIPSET.
      
      
      XPERIA J DOESN'T SUPPORT NFC WHILE XPERIA SOLA DOES.
      
      
      XPERIA J HAS FRONT FACING CAMERA WHILE XPERIA DOESN'T HAVE.
      
      
      XPERIA J HAS 4GB INTERNAL MEMORY (2GB USER AVAILABLE) WHILE XPERIA SOLA HAS 8GB INTERNAL MEMORY (5GB USER AVAILABLE).HOWEVER,BOTH SUPPORTS MICROSD CARD UPTO 32GIB.
      
      
      XPERIA J SHOOTS VGA VIDEO WHILE XPERIA SOLA SHOOTS 720P VIDEO.
      
      
      XPERIA J SUPPORTS HSDPA UPTO 7.2 MBPS AND HSUPA UPTO 5.76 MBPS WHILE XPERIA SOLA SUPPORTS HSDPA UPTO 14.4 MBPS; HSUPA UPTO5.76 MBPS.
      
      
      XPERIA J DOESN'T HAVE FLOATING TOUCH DISPLAY WHILE XPERIA SOLA HAS.BOTH DEVICES HAS MOBILE BRAVIA ENGINE.
      
      
      XPERIA J HAS ICS OUT OF THE BOX PLANNED UPGRADE TO JB WHILE XPERIA SOLA HAS GINGERBREAD OUT OF THE BOX PLANNED UPGRADE TO ICS.HOWEVER SONY IS THINKING ABOUT JB UPDATE BUT NO OFFICIAL CONFIRMATION YET.
      
      
      BLUETOOTH VERSION IN XPERIA J IS 2.1 WHILE IN SOLA IT IS 3.0.
      
      
      XPERIA J HAS 1750MAH BATTERY WHILE SOLA HAS ONLY 1320MAH.
      
      
      TALKING ABOUT DISPLAY.ETS TFT VS LED-BACKLIT LCD.
      
      XPERIA J HAS 4IN DISPLAY WHILE XPERIA SOLA HAS 3.7IN.
      
      
      THERE IS NO BIG DIFFERENCE IN DISPLAY SIZE.
      
      
      WHEN COMPARED HARDWARE OF XPERIA J WITH XPERIA SOLA.XPERIA J IS WAY FAR BEHIND THAN XPERIA SOLA.
      
      
      THE DIFFERENCE I CAN SEE THAT XPERIA J HAS PLANNED UPGRADE TO JB(JELLY BEAN) BUT IN CASE OF SOLA SONY DIDN'T SAY ANYTHING.TILL NOW SOLA WILL NOT GET JB UPGRADE AS PER SONY'S PRESS RELEASE.BUT NEWS FROM INTERNAL SOURCES IS SAYING THAT SONY IS TAKING MEETINGS ON THIS ISSSUE. I CAN'T SAY ANYTHNG WHETHER SONY RELEASES JB UPDATE TO XPERIA SOLA OR NOT.
      
      
      AND SECONDLY, XPERIA J HAS FRONT FACING CAMERA.
      
      
      UM GONNA TO ASK THAT HOW MANY OF YOU DOES/MAKE VIDEO CALL???
      
      
      APART FROM THESE 2 DIFFERENCES XPERIA SOLA STANDS WINNER.
      
      
      REGARDING PRICE XPERIA SOLA IS LITTLE COSTLIER THAN J.BUT IT STAND FOR THE PRICE.XPERIA SOLA IS BEST AND GOOD ANDRIOD CELLPHONE UNDER 20K.

IF YOU WISH TO HAVE VIDEOS SHOT FROM IT, I DONT THINK IT WILL GIVE YOU THAT MUCH QUALITY WHEN COMPARED TO NON HD SAMSUNG MOBILE. BUT PHOTOS ARE AMAZING FULL COLORS.
      
      THE SCREEN IS AMAZING IT HAS 266 PPI PIXEL DENSITY WHICH IS VERY GOOD INDEED, LOT BETTER THAN SAMSUNG GRAND OR S DUOS. PHONE IS LAGGY A BIT COZ OF LOWER PROCESSOR BUT U CAN KILL APPS FREQUENTLY TO KEEP YOUR RAM RUNNING AND HEALTHY.
      
      THE DESIGN IS SLEEK AND AWESOME,
      
      IT IS SLIPPERY SO U NEED TO HAVE A COVER FOR IT.
      
      TEMPLE RUN, GRANNY RUN WORKS FINE, SEE VIDEOS ON YOU TUBE BUT IT ISNT THAT SMOOTH. FRONT CAMERA IS AWESOME WHEN USED WITH SKYPE (SIM CALLING NA), BETTER THAN S DUOS.
      
      YOU SHOULD PREFER IT OVER OTHER PHONES LIKE S DUOS AND ALL, WHICH HAVE SAME CONFIGURATION.
      
      BUT SINCE I DROPPED IT IN WATER AND SHORT CIRCUITED THE MOTHERBOARD SO I AM NOT GOING TO BUY IT AGAIN, WELL I WAS PRETTY HAPPY WITH IT ALTHOUGH BUT I AM GOING FOR DUAL CORE PROCESSOR PHONE.
      
      ALSO NOT TO FORGET, THE PROCESSOR MAY BE PRESENT JUST BACK TO EAR PIECE SO THE PHONE BECOMES HOT AFTER TALKING A WHILE OR A BIT USING IT, YOU WILL FEEL THE WARMTH, BUT I SUPPOSE THAT IS WITH ALL SMARTPHONES.
      
      SRRY FOR MY SPELL MISTAKES :) BYEEE

Sentences:
I AM BEING USING THIS PHONE FROM PAST 3 MONTHS. THIS IS AN AVERAGE PHONE IN ACTUAL WORDS. THE MAIN REASON BEHIND IS THAT IT LAGS (AFTER SPENDING 13K TO 14K).
      
      
      THOUGH IT WILL MAKE YOU FEEL GOOD BUT IT IS NOT CAPABLE FOR RUNNING 3 OR 4 APPS SIMULTANEOUSLY.
      
      GOOD:
      
      1. GOOD LOOKS. IT IS VERY COMFORTABLE TO CARRY.
      
      2. CAMERA IS SOOO GOOD. FRONT CAMERA IS ALSO GOOD(NOT BAD) IN DAYLIGHT.
      
      3. GREAT PICTURE QUALITY.
      
      4. GREAT BATTERY LIFE.
      
      5. ANDROID UPGRADED.
      
      
      BAD:
      
      1. IT LAGS ALOOT WHILE SWITCHING BETWEEN APPS OR EVEN SOME TIME IN OPENING JUST YOUR CONTACT LIST.
      
      2. WHEN CONNECTED WITH AUX WIRE. SPEAKERS WILL SOUND LOW ELSE INBUILD SPEAKERS ARE AVERAGE.
      
      
      AFTER ALL CONS I WILL SAY THAT I PERSONALLY LOVE THIS PHONE. BUT IF THERE IS SOME MORE RAM THEN IT WOULD BE GREAT. IF YOU ARE ABLE TO FIND A BETTER INSTALLED RAM THEN GO FOR IT OTHER WISE ITS ALSO A GOOD OPTION

label: Xperia J
Sentences:
I AM DELIGHTED TO OWN THIS BEAUTY, THE PHONE IS A STYLE STATEMENT OF SORTS WITH DUAL LED . ONE TINY ONE NEXT TO VGA (640X480) FRONT CAM AND OTHER ONE AT BASEL. YOU CAN EVEN CUSTOMIZE THE COLOR NOTIFICATION AS PER NEED. THEN NEXT THING IMPRESSING IS CURVY BACK AND IS ONLY 9MM THIN. CAME WITH ANDROID ICS WHICH I UPGRADED TO JELLYBEAN AFTER SONY RELEASED THE UPDATE VIA PC COMPANION (THERE IS AN ONBOARD APP TO DO IT WITHOUT PC AS WELL).
      
      
      AS FAR AS MY REQUIREMENTS ARE I USE WHATSAPP,FACEBOOK,SKYPE AND MUSIC PLAYER AND THE PHONE SATISFIED PRETTY MUCH OF MY NEEDS. HERE IS A SUMMARY OF WHATS GOOD, WHATS NOT AND WHAT WAS EXPECTED.
      
      
      WHATS GOOD-
      
      -BEAUTIFUL DESIGN, EYE CATCHING, LETS SAY J FOR JEALOUSY,LOVE THE DESIGN.
      
      - EXCELLENT CLARITY SCREEN, I COULD READ MINUTE CHARACTERS ON CHROME CLEARLY.
      
      -MUSIC PLAYER IS SUPERB, WITH PRESETS AND XLOUD FUNCTION,SHUFFLE,PARTY SHUFFLE MODES.
      
      -MULTI TASKING HANDLED WELL, AS AGAINST REVIEWS BY OTHERS, WITH 5-6 APPLICATIONS ARE HANDLED WELL, THOUGHT I CANT DENY SLIGHT NOTICEABLE LAG RIGHT FROM THE TIME I STARTED THE PHONE.
      
      -FRONT CAMERA HAS GOOD CLARITY. MADE SEVERAL VIDEO CALLS ON SKYPE AND EVERYONE SAID VIDEO WAS CRISP CLEAR, ITS VGA OR REALLY IS IT?
      
      -FLUID UI, JELLYBEAN IS A GOOD IMPROVEMENT OVER ICS, BATTERY REMAINING IS DISPLAYED IN PERCENTAGE AND DETAILED VIEWS OF SMS AND EMAILS STRAIGHT FROM DASHBOARD, NO FRILLS INTERFACE.
      
      
      WHATS NOT-
      
      -AMBIENT LIGHT SENSOR ABSENT, FUNNY GIVEN I PAID PREMIUM FOR THIS CELL, THE ADVANTAGE OF SCREENS CLARITY IS NEARLY WIPED OFF WHEN IN SUNLIGHT.
      
      -MUSIC PLAYER SOMETIMES STUTTERS WHEN OTHER APPS ARE IN THE BACKGROUND.
      
      -CHEAP HEADSET PROVIDED IN THE BOX, HAS PLASTIC WRITTEN ALL OVER IT, I COULDNT USE MY IBALL HEADSET WITH IT DESPITE OF IT ALSO BEING 3.5MM
      
      
      WHAT WOULD HAVE BEEN BETTER-
      
      -CAMERA, YOU GUYS ARE RIGHT ABOUT THE CAMERA NOT REALLY BEING ABLE TO FOCUS BEYOND A CERTAIN DISTANCE, THOUGH IT HAS OPTIONS LIKE METERING, WHITE BALANCE PRESETS,PANORAMA AND OPTION TO SWITCH TO FRONT CAM. FOR THOSE WANT LOW LIGHT SHOTS AND POSTCARD QUALITY PHOTOS, CONSIDER PURCHASING A DSLR, A TINY MOBILE CAMERA SENSOR CANT HANDLE LOW LIGHT UNLESS ITS WORTH A BOMB. I DON'T REALLY NEED IT AS I OWN A DSLR MYSELF.
      
      -JELLYBEAN THOUGH FLUID, ISN'T REALLY POWER EFFICIENT.
      
      
      MY VERDICT-
      
      OTHER THAN STYLING AND MODERATE PERFORMANCE, PLEASE DO NOT EXPECT MUCH FROM THIS PHONE. WHILE SPECS LOOK OK OK, IT DOES HAVE SOME GROUND TO COVER UP BEFORE IT BECOMES IDEAL PHONE. I DON'T REALLY SHOOT VIDEOS OR PLAY MUCH GAMES SO I WONT COMMENT ON ANYTHING I DON'T KNOW.
      
      
      PRICE DROPPED BY 1000 INR A WEEK I PURCHASED THIS PHONE, THOUGH IT DOESN'T MATTER AS IT CANT BE PREDICTED. THANKS TO GUYS AT FLIPKART FOR AWESOME EXPERIENCE AND RELIABILITY. I CHECKED OUT THIS CELL AT LOCAL SONY STORE WHICH OFFERED SAME PRICE BUT CHOSE FLIPKART.
      
      
      HOPE YOU FOUND THIS REVIEW HELPFUL :)

label: Xperia J
Sentences:
NEWLY LAUNCHED XPERIA J IS MOSTLY GETTING COMPARED WITH XPERIA GO BY SONY FAN FOLLOWERS.
      
      HERE ARE SOME FACTS:
      
      1. SCREEN: J HAS 4 INCH SCREEN (854X480 FWVGA - FULL WIDE VIDEO GRAPHICS ARRAY) WHERE GO HAS 3.5 INCH SCREEN (480X320 HVGA HALF SIZE VIDEO GRAPHICS ARRAY). THOUGH RESOLUTION OF GO SEEMS TO BE LESSER THAN J, IT HAS MOBILE BRAVIA ENGINE GIVING AWESOME DISPLAY FOR VIDEO, PHOTO ETC. DUE TO MOBILE BRAVIA ENGINE, LOWER SCREEN RESOLUTION DOESN'T MATTER IN GO WHEREAS J DOESN'T HAVE MOBILE BRAVIA ENGINE.
      
      
      2. CPU & GPU: XPERIA GO IS MUCH AHEAD THAN XPERIA J IN CPU AS WELL AS GPU. GO IS EQUIPPED WITH 1 GHZ CORTEX-A9, DUAL CORE AND ARM MAIL 400 WHERE AS J IS EQUIPPED WITH 1 GHZ CORTEX-A5 AND ADRENO 200. HAVING A9 DUAL CORE PROCESSOR, GO IS BETTER PERFORMING THAN J. ALSO MAIL400 AGAIN COVER THE LOW RESOLUTION OF GO COMPARED WITH ADRENO 200 OF J.
      
      
      3. MEMORY: BOTH MOBILES ARE HAVING 512 MB RAM. GO IS INBUILT WITH 8GB MEMORY (APPROX. 4GB USER AVAILABLE MEMORY) AND J WITH 4GB PHONE MEMORY (APPROX. 2.2 GB USER MEMORY). BOTH SUPPORTS UPTO 32GB MICRO SD CARD.
      
      
      4. GO IS HAVING 107KBPS GPRS & 296KBPS EDGE SPEED WHEREAS J SUPPORTS 86KBPS GPRS AND 237KBPS EDGE SPEED. FAST WEB BROWSING IN GO.
      
      
      5. OTHER POINTS: NO FRONT CAMERA IN GO, J DOES HAVE.
      
      HD RECORDING WITH 5MP CAMERA IN GO, J IS HAVING VGA RECORDING WITH 5MP CAMERA.
      
      OS FOR J IS ANDROID 4 ICS WHEREAS FOR GO IT IS ANDROID 2.3 GINGERBREAD. RECENTLY IN NEWS, GO IS NOW UPGRADABLE TO ANDROID 4 ICS.
      
      GO IS WATER RESISTANT AND DUST FREE.
      
      
      OVERALL, EXCEPT ABSENCE OF FRONT CAMERA, GO IS THE CHOICE AS IN MOST OF THE POINTS, GO IS WAY AHEAD THAN J.

label: Xperia J
Sentences:
WHEN MY BLACKBERRY WENT INTO THE WASHING MACHINE WITH MY TROUSER I DESPERATELY NEEDED A PHONE, SMARTPHONE (WITH ATLEAST 4 INCH SCREEN) I SHOULD SAY. BUDGET: 18000-22000, IF CAN FIND A GOOD ONE BUDGET WAS EXTENDABLE. TRULY SPEAKING THERE NO GOOD ALL-IN-ONE PHONE IN THE MARKET AT PRESENT.
      
      
      STARTED WITH NOKIA 820: LOST IN FIRST PHASE, OVERPRICED, BORING OS, UTTERLY DISAPPOINTING CAMERA QUALITY, THOUGH IT WAS BLAZING FAST PERFORMER.
      
      
      SAMSUNG GALAXY S ADVANCE: WAS VERY IMPRESSED. OVERALL, THE BEST PHONE IN MARKET WITH PRICE RANGE 19000-20000. BUT GINGERBREAD, DEEPER POSITION OF SCREEN AND QUITE AN OLD PHONE.
      
      
      HTC DESIRE X: LOW ON SPECS BUT PRICED ALMOST SIMILAR TO GALAXY S ADVANCE, NO FRONT CAM- NOT VFM.
      
      
      SONY XPERIA J: QUITE A LOOKER, CRISP SCREEN, VERY LOW ON SPECS BUT MY HEART WAS SAYING GO FOR IT, MY MIND WAS TELLING NO.
      
      
      SAMSUNG GRAND DUOS: I HATE DUAL SIM. BUT IT'S SPECS ALMOST KILLED ME AND SOLIDLY BUILT TOO. BUT LOOKING AT THE HUGE SCREEN: THE OOMPH, THE ZING IS MISSING. IT'S SCREEN, HOWEVER BIG IT MAY BE, HAS NO LIFE AND WAS TELLING ME "I AM A 'CHEAP' PHONE.
      
      
      ALL OF A SUDDEN WENT TO STORE- BOUGHT XPERIA J. I KNEW ITS CONS, SOME HOW THOSE FAILED TO RESIST ME.
      
      
      REVIEW:
      
      
      LOOK AT THE PHONE: WOW.
      
      LOOK AT THE SCREEN: WOW!!! CRISP, PIXELS HARDLY NOTICEABLE.
      
      BUILD QUALITY: GOOD FEELINGS ON HAND GRIP, BUT SURLY NOT PRECISELY BUILT: ALL-PLASTIC CHEAP FEELINGS ON CLOSER INSPECTION.
      
      CAMERA: GOOD ONE. BUT NOT EXCELLENT. REVIEWS SAYS DISTANCE PHOTOS A BAD, MACROS ARE GOOD. TRUE, UNTIL YOU SET THE FOCUS MANUALLY TO INFINITY. AFTER THAT, CAMERA DOES PERFECT JOB.
      
      SOUND: PRETTY NICE ON SUPPLIED HEADPHONES. EXCELLENT ON SONY MDR-EX100LP.
      
      PERFORMANCE: 1 GHZ SINGLE CORE ADRENO ENHANCED 200 DOES THE DAY-TO-DAY JOB. IT NEVER LAGGED OR HANGED EVEN AFTER INSTALLING 37 APPS. RAM IS ENOUGH. DON'T KNOW WHY PEOPLE KEEP COMPLAINING ABOUT HANGING PROBLEMS, PROBABLY THEY DON'T CLOSE THE PREVIOUSLY USED APPS PROPERLY.
      
      KEYBOARD: VERY NICE AND EASY TO USE.
      
      INTERFACE: VERY SMOOTH AND SMART INTERFACE. LOOKS EXCEPTIONALLY GOOD AND NOWAY BORING.
      
      BATTERY: FAIR ENOUGH FOR 1.5 DAYS. WITH DATA CONNECTION OFF IT LASTS EVEN UPTO 3 DAYS WITH 45 MINS OF TALKING EVERY DAY.
      
      
      WHERE IT LACKS:
      
      IT LAGS WHEN YOU SIMULTANEOUSLY KEEP 4-5 APPS OPEN.
      
      IT HEATS UP ON PLAYING TEMPLE RUN AND WHEN YOU USE MAPS OR DOWNLOADS SOMETHING OVER NET.
      
      IT BECOME UNRESPONSIVE WHEN YOU CONNECT IT TO LAPTOP VIA USB (INSTALLING PC COMPANION S/W HELPS ENOUGH THOUGH TO CURE THIS PROBLEM), NO SUCH ISSUE ON WALL CHARGING.
      
      FRONT CAM PRETTY BAD.
      
      TAKES A BIT TIME TO OPEN HEAVY APPS AND 3 SECONDS TO OPEN CAMERA.
      
      NO AMBIENT SENSOR A BIG DISAPPOINTMENT.
      
      MULTI-TASKING IS A PAIN. IF YOU LISTEN TO MUSIC AND TRY TO DO OTHER THINGS, THE SOUNDS GET DISTORTED- THE PROCESSOR SHOWS LACK OF POWER.
      
      HAND WRITING RECOGNITION ONLY ON CHINESE KEYBOARD INPUT METHOD.
      
      A BIT OVERPRICED COMPARED TO THE OTHER PHONES WITH SIMILAR SPECS. BUT STILL IT STANDS APART.
      
      
      BUT, OVERALL A VERY DESCENT PACKAGE ON SUCH A PRICE. IF YOU ARE NOT A HEAVY GAMER, IT'S A IDEAL STYLISH AND COMPETENT ANDROID PHONE.
      
      
      UPDATE: ON 8/03/2013 I GOT 4.1.2 JELLY BEAN. I WAS APPREHENSIVE BEFORE UPGRADING WHETHER THIS PHONE CAN HANDLE JB. BUT THE TRUE FACT IS THAT, NOW MULTI-TASKING IS A LOT EASIER. NO MORE DISTORTED SOUND OR LAG ON MULTI-TASKING. THE UI HAVE BECOME BUTTERY SMOOTH. NOTIFICATION TOOGLE AND GOOGLE NOW HAVE BEEN ADDED. BECAME A BIT FASTER TOO.

Sentences:
I BOUGHT THIS PHONE LAST WEEK.FEW THINGS YOU SHOULD KNOW ABOUT BEFORE BUYING.I WOULD RECOMMEND IT TO SPECIFIC PEOPLE.HERE IT GOES WHY:-
      
      PROS:-

      3)DESPITE ITS VERY NEGETIVE REVIEW ON CNET ABOUT ITS SLUGGISHNESS,I PERSONALLY FOUND EVERYTHING VERY SMOOTH.
      
      3)ITS ON THE LIST TO BE UPGRADED TO JELLY BEAN.
      
      4)SOUND IS GREAT(SPEACIALLY BECOZ OF WALKMAN APP AND ITS EQUILIZERS).
      
      5)HAS 4" BIG SCREEN ,AND ITS LOOKS ABSOLUTELY AMAZING.
      
      6)CAMERA HAS MANY MODES LIKE NIGHT,BEACH,SPORTS ETC.
      
      7)HAS DLNA(CAN TRAMIT MEDIA TO OTHER PHONES/DEVICES),ITS A MUST HAVE IF YOU HAVE A SONY
      
      WIRELESS COMPATIBLE TV.
      
      8)FACE UNLOCK,I THINK ITS REALLY COOL FEATURE OF ICS OS.
      
      9)TIMESCAPE FEATURES ARE REALLY GOOD.GOOD FOR FACEBOOK,TWITTER ETC.
      
      
      CONS:-
      
      1)HEADPHONES ARE WHITE IN COLOR EVEN WITH BLACK PHONE,IF YOU ARE SPECIFIC ABOUT STYLE WELL..
      
      
      2)IT HAS A 2 GB INTERNAL STORAGE AND 754 MB PHONE MEMORY.IT SUPPORTS EXTERNAL SD CARD(SD-EXT PARTITION).
      
      HERE IT GETS TRICKY,YOU CAN STORE APPS TO ONLY INTERNAL 2 GB MEMORY AND NOT THE EXTERNAL
      
      SD CARD.APP2SD WILL ONLY MOVE IT TO 'INTERNAL MEMOMY' OF 2 GB AND NOT YOUR EXPANDABLE SD CARD.
      
      YOU CAN USE YOUR EXPANDABLE SD CARD FOR STORING MOVIES ,PICS & MUSIC ONLY.
      
      APP DATA WILL GET STORED IN THE INTERNAL STORAGE OF 2GB.
      
      YOU HAVE TO CHANGE THE DEFAULT LOCATION OF BROWSER,WALKMAN,CAMERA TO EXTERNAL SD CARD.
      
      
      3)SHOOTS ONLY VGA VIDEO.
      
      4)DOESN'T HAVE SONY BRAVIA ENGINE,I PERSONALLY DON'T KNOW MUCH BUT HEARD THAT OTHER
      
      PHONES HAVE IT.
      
      5)SILICONE CASE NOT AVAILABLE ON MARKET CURRENTLY DUE TO ITS NEW ARRIVAL IN INDIAN MARKET.
      
      USE CAREFULLY UNTIL IT ARRIVES.

Sentences:
I BOUGHT THIS PHONE ABOUT 5 MONTHS AGO.
      
      I AM A MUSIC LOVER AND BOUGHT THIS PHONE FOR THE-MUCH TALKED ABOUT- "SOUND QUALITY" OF SONY AND THERE IS ONLY ONE WORD I CAN SAY ABOUT IT- PATHETIC, AT LEAST WHEN IT COMES TO THIS PHONE.
      
      THE SOUND IN THE HEADPHONES IS INCREDIBLY LOW AND ALL YOU CAN LISTEN TO IS OUTSIDE SOUND.BUT.....THERE IS ALSO A GOOD SIDE TO THIS- NOW I DONT HAVE TO TAKE MY EARPHONES OUT TO KNOW IF MY MOM IS CALLING ME, I CAN SIMPLY LISTEN TO HER WHILE LISTENING TO MY SONGS, AT FULL VOLUME :D
      
      AT FIRST, THE SONY GUYS SUGGESTED ME HELPLESS SOLUTIONS LIKE ALTERING EQUILISER, ABOUT WHICH, FRANKLY, EVEN CHILDREN KNOW THESE DAYS.
      
      
      BY NOW, I HAVE VISITED TO ALMOST ALL THE SERVICE CENTRES ACROSS MUMBAI AND THE ONLY THING THEY SAY TO EACH AND EVERY PROBLEM IS, "SIR SOFTWARE UPDATE KARNA PADEGA" WHICH, BY THE WAY, IS ALREADY UP TO DATE.
      
      
      APART FROM THIS, WHEN YOU TELL THEM ABOUT THE BAD SOUND QUALITY THEY STRAIGHT AWAY TELL YOU,"MUSIC K LIYE AAPNE YEH PHONE KYU LIYA?" LEAVING ME SPEECHLESS.
      
      NOT ONLY THE QUALITY OF SOUND, YOU CANNOT LISTEN TO A SINGLE WORD OF THE SONG IF U R DOING ANYTHING ELSE IN THE BACKGROUND(FOR EG.BROWSING), BECAUSE OF THE SUPER IRRITATING LAG IN MUSIC.
      
      
      THE ONLY THING GOOD ABT THIS PHONE IS THE PICTURE QUALITY.THE COLORS ARE VERY BRIGHT AND APPEALING, BUT THATS IT.
      
      
      EACH AND EVERY GAME LAGS TERRIBLY, TOTALLY RUINING YOUR GAMING EXPERIENCE.EVEN THE TOUCH SCREEN SUDDENLY BECOMES UNRESPONSIVE WHILE PLAYING GAMES.
      
      
      ALL AND ALL, IF U THINK U R TOO HAPPY WITH YOUR LIFE AND NEED A BIT OF FRUSTRATION, THEN THIS PHONE IS CUSTOM BUILT FOR PEOPLE LIKE U...:P -SERIOUSLY-

Sentences:
I PURCHASED THE PHONE FROM SONY CENTER, BELOW IS THE REVIEW.
      
      
      PROS:
      
      
      1. CURVY SHAPE MAKES IT APPEAR THIN.
      
      2. GOOD QUALITY CONSTRUCTION MATERIAL USED.
      
      3. UPGRADE TO JELLY BEAN 4.1 IS AVAILABLE OUT OF THE BOX FROM SONY'S WEBSITE.
      
      4. CHOICE OF DIFFERENT COLOUR THEMES AVAILABLE FOR THE SONY'S INTERFACE.
      
      5. SMOOTH UI AND NO CHOPPINESS FELT WHILE USING THE PHONE.
      
      6. PHONE COMES WITH A MICRO SIM TO NORMAL SIM ADAPTER WHICH MEANS IT CAN SUPPORT BOTH.
      
      7. MEMORY SPACE IS GOOD FOR THE USER APPS TO BE INSTALLED.
      
      8. WALL CHARGER HAS A USB ATTACHMENT WHICH MAKES IT SMALL AND LESS CUMBERSOME.
      
      9. WALKMAN APPLICATION MAKES MUSIC LISTENING A JOY WITH FULLY CUSTOMIZABLE EQUALIZER.
      
      
      CONS:
      
      
      1. OUT OF THE BOX HEADSET IS NOT WORTH PAYING EXTRA, INSTEAD SONY CAN REDUCE THE PRICE OF THE PHONE.
      
      2. DUAL CORE MISSING, ALTHOUGH AN AVERAGE USER WILL NEVER FEEL THE NEED OF A DUAL CORE BUT STILL NOKIA 620 WHICH IS IN THE SAME PRICE RANGE IS GIVING A DUAL CORE TO THE USER.
      
      3. NO INTERCHANGEABLE BACK COVERS AVAILABLE IN THE MARKET FROM SONY.
      
      4. INTERNAL MEMORY SHOULD HAVE BEEN 8 GB INSTEAD OF 2 GB.

RECEIVED IT ON THE 4RTH DAY OF MY ORDER 4 DAYS BEFORE THE ACTUAL DATE. AT ITS BEST FLIPKART'S SERVICE AND THE QUALITY OF SONY XPERIA HAD IT FOR TWO DAYS NOW HERE ARE MY REVIEWS.
      
      PROS :
      
      1) GREAT DISPLAY EXTRA BRIGHT COMPARED WITH A LOT OF OTHER PHONES BUT NO COMPETITION AT ALL.
      
      2) SO CALLED "ICS" UPDATE IS HERE TOO AND BELIEVE ME ITS AWESOME. AFTER ALL ITS GOOGLE.
      
      3) MEMORY IS 13 GB BUT NO REGRETS ENOUGH FOR ME I GUESS BUT U CAN ADD AN OTG(ONTHEGO) CABLE TO ATTACH PENDRIVE AND ALL.
      
      4) PROCESSOR IS BRILLIANT NO LAG AT ALL EVEN ON THE HIGH END GAMES SUPPORTED BY POWERFUL GPU.
      
      5) VIDEO RECORDING IS 1080P AND IMAGE QUALITY INCLUDING THE FLASH IS GREAT OVERALL GIVES A GOOD CRISP IMAGE.
      
      
      CONS :
      
      1) MAJOR ISSUE IS BATTERY LIFE I HAVE TO KILL APPS AND MINIMIZE THE BRIGHTNESS SO AS TOO KEEP THE BATTERY GOING. 1300MAH IS NOT SUFFICIENT TO KEEP THIS GIANT FUELED UP I GUESS THIS THE MAJOR LAG.

label: Xperia P
Sentences:
I HAVE BEEN USING THIS PHONE FOR 20 DAYS AND THIS BELOW IS WHAT I FEEL.....
      
      I WILL NOT BE DIVIDING INTO PROS AND CONS, PLEASE BEAR..
      
      
      1) THE CAMERA IS EXCELLENT WITH LOTS OF PICS BETTER THAN MY DSC AND FRANKLY SPEAKING, FOR THAT WOW MOMENT YOU WONT HAVE TIME TO BRING OUT, SWITCH ON YOUR DSC TO CAPTURE IT, BUT THIS PHONE DOES JUST THIS WITH AWE. VERY FAST CAPTURE SPEED. JUST ONE PROBLEM, SOMETIMES THERE IS EXTRA LIGHT IN INDOOR NIGHT SHOTS.
      
      
      2) THE UI IS GREAT, SNAPPY AND FAST. AND I HAVE TRIED OTHER LAUNCHERS TOO LIKE GO AND ADW, BUT THE INBUILT ONE FEELS THE BEST WITHOUT ANY SORT OF LAG. FOR ME, THE 5 HOME SCREENS (FIXED) ARE A LITTLE LESS THAN ENOUGH.
      
      
      3) THE DISPLAY IS JUST MINDBLOWING AND COULD GIVE AMOLED A RUN FOR THEIR MONEY, SPECIALLY WITH SONY'S NEW WHITE MAGIC TECHNOLOGY WHICH ENSURES YOU DONT HAVE PAIN WHILE READING OUTDOORS.
      
      
      4) THE LOUDSPEAKER VOLUME IS A LITTLE LOWER HAN EXPECTED AND I FRANKLY DONT KNOW WHAT THAT XLOUD IS THERE FOR, BUT PLUG IN THE PROVIDED HEADSET OR CREATIVE SPEAKERS AND YOU WILL KNOW WHAT SONY IS MADE UP OF. ITS UNBELIEVABLE.
      
      
      5) THE SCREEN HAS ENOUGH AREA FOR AN USER, I JUST DONT FEEL ONE WITH THE 4.7 INCH ONES.
      
      
      6) THOUGH ITS RUNNING GINGERBREAD, ITS GREAT AND STABLE TOO. AND ICS IS ON THE WAY, SO NO PROBLEM THERE. PLEASE DONT REJECT THE PHONE WITH THIS AS AN EXCUSE. SONY HAS ALREADY RELEASED A FIRMWARE UPDATE 6.0.B.3.184 IN THE MEANTIME FOR FIXING SOME NETWORK PROBLEMS I AM GOING TO SPEAK ABOUT LATER.
      
      
      7) WHEN I BOUGHT THE PHONE, I WAS USING AIRTEL AND THERE WAS A SIGNIFICANT NETWORK DROP ISSUE (WHEN I HELD THE PHONE COVERING THE TRANSPARENT STRIP, NETWORK DROPPED TO 1 BAR) THOUGH I DID NOT HAVE DROPPED CALL ISSUE. I WAS INCLINED TO CALL IT DEATH GRIP BUT SINCE IT WASNT HAPPENING OUTDOORS, IT WAS A SOFWARE ISSUE WHICH IS FIXED WITH THE LATEST UPDATE. I USE A VODAFONE NOW AND GET A 3G SPEED OF 2 TO 3 MBPS WITHOUT ANY KIND OF NETWORK DROP, SO I GUESS IT WAS A SIGNAL ISSUE.
      
      
      8) BATTERY LIFE IS GOOD BUT NOT GREAT, WHICH I DONOT EXPECT FROM AN ANDROID PHONE, AND CONSIDERING THAT I AM A HARDCORE USE, IT LASTS ME MORE THAN 1 AND A HALF DAYS WITH EASE.
      
      
      9) I HAVE PLAYED GAMES LIKE ANGRY BIRDS, NFS SHIFT, TEMPLE RUN, WITHOUT ANY LAG, HITCH OR CRASH WHATSOEVER. I USE MOBOPLAYER BUT THE STOCK PLAYER IS AS GOOD. THE MUSIC PLAYER IS EXCELLENT. AND TRACK ID IS JUST SO COOOOOOL.
      
      
      10) FOR THE RECORD, MY PHONE HAS NOT HANGED A SINGLE TIME SINCE I TURNED IT ON WHILE BUYING THE SET.
      
      
      11) IN DISPLAY, I WILL GIVE IT 20 OUT OF 10, JUST FOR ITS INNOVATIVE TRANSPARENT STRIP DESIGN AND METAL FEEL, WITH THE COLOUR.
      
      
      12) SOME GREAT APPS TO DOWNLOAD ARE 3G WATCHDOG FOR MONITORING DATA USAGE, PULSE FOR NEWS FEED, PREY FOR TRACKING DOWN MOBILE, ADOBE READER AND SO ON......
      
      
      13) BELIEVE ME 16 GB ON BOARD MEMORY IS MORE THAN ENOUGH FOR USERS IF YOU PLAN TO USE IT LIKE A MOBILE PHONE AND NOT ANYTHING ELSE.
      
      
      14) CONNECTIVITY: HDMI IS GREAT WITH A DEDICATED TV LAUNCHER PRE INSTALLED, NOKIA HEADSETS ARE NOT WORKING WITH IT ( I USE WH-701),  USB ON-THE-GO IS WORKING LIKE A CHARM, NFC IS ALSO THERE, AND WIFI I HAVENT USED YET.
      
      
      15) ONE OF THE MORE SURPRISING FEATURES IS THE GREENHEART POWER BOOSTER CHARGER. IT EFFICIENTLY CHARGES MY PHONE FROM 15% TO 100% IN 2 TO 3 HOURS.
      
      
      SO THATS ALMOST ALL OF IT. NOW MAKE A WISE DECISION AND DO ADEQUATE RESEARCH, BUT I CAN TELL YOU THIS, IF 25000 IS YOUR BUDGET, CLOSE YOUR EYES AND GO FOR THIS SET, YOU WONT REGRET IT.
      
      
      REGARDS

      6. CHECK YOUR BATTERY LEVEL ALWAYS ...
      
      
      THANKS .. I HOPE YOU ENJOY YOUR PHONE LIKE I DO

      SONY IS ONE OF THE ONLY COMPANIES WHICH ARE TRYING NEW THINGS CONSTANTLY AND PROVIDING A NEWER AND RICHER EXPERIENCE.

      JUSTIFYING 16 GB INTERNAL MEMORY:

      I STORE LOTS OF SONGS AND PLAY GAMES LIKE DEAD SPACE,ASPHALT 6,ME INFILTRATOR THAT ARE MASSIVE GAMES AND I STILL HAVE ABOUT 5GB UNUSED.

label: Xperia P
Sentences:
I AM A SONY FAN, USED W810 FOR 4 YEARS, THEN CEDAR J108I FOR 8-9 MONTHS AND THEN OPTED FOR THIS HEADACHE.
      
      I HAVE BEEN USING THIS XPERIA SET SINCE AUG 2012.
      
      
      PLEASE NOTE THIS HANDSET IS BEAUTIFUL BY LOOKS AND PERFORMANCE AS WELL IN MANY ASPECTS. BUT TIME IS ONLY MATTER TO LOVE/HATE THIS HANDSET.
      
      
      MAJOR DISADVANTAGES OF THIS HANDSET,
      
      1. BATTERY LIFE: ~1350 MAH BATTERY IS NOT ACCEPTABLE. YOU NEED TO CHARGE IT 2-3 TIMES A DAY IF YOU HAVE TO DO VOICE/VIDEO CHAT OR WI-FI/3G ACCESS.
      
      
      2. CHARGER CABLE: ORIGINAL CHARGER CABLE IS TOO SHORT, YOU MAY FACE CHARGING ISSUE ALMOST ALL PLACES. STILL YOU CAN EXTEND IT USING USB F-F CABLE. BUT EXTENSION CABLE SHOULD BE HAVING 1-2FT IN LENGTH, ELSE YOUR CELL WILL NOT CHARGE ITS BATTERY (IT'LL JUST SHOW YOU ABOUT CHARGING). SONY DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS EXTENSION.
      
      
      3) 3G VIDEO CALLING: THERE IS NO 3G VIDEO CALLING SUPPORTED IN THIS HANDSET, ACTUALLY IN MANY XPERIA HANDSETS ITS NOT AVAILABLE. I FORGOT TO GOOGLE THIS BEFORE PLACING ORDER.
      
      YOU CAN USE GTALK/SKYPE VIDEO CHAT AS ALTERNATE - WHICH IS ALSO GREAT OPTION, BUT NO 3G VIDEO CALLING.
      
      
      4) TIMESCAPE: THIS IS BEST FEATURE OF XPERIA, BUT IF YOU CONFIGURE YOUR FACEBOOK, LINKEDIN AND TWITTER ACCOUNTS, THEN YOU SHOULD FIND ACTUAL BEHAVIOR OF 1 GHZ DUAL CORE WITH 1GB RAM SIMILAR TO PENTIUM 386/486 ERA CPU WITH 16/32MB RAM WINDOWS PC.
      
      
      5) HANGING ISSUE: OS WITH 2.3.7 WAS VERY MUCH FAMILIAR WITH HANGING ISSUE, ITS ALMOST RESOLVED IN ICS. BUT SPEED OF GUI IS REDUCED IN ICS. GUI'S REDUCED SPEED IS MUCH MORE CONSIDERABLE. BUT I DON'T WANT TO ROLLBACK TO GINGERBREAD, AS IT WAS HANGING - SPECIALLY CAMERA REGULARLY USED TO GIVE ERROR AS "CAMERA ERROR".
      
      
      6) BROWSER ISSUE: IF YOU ARE FIREFOX FAN, THEN ITS NOT SO GOOD NEWS FOR FF LOVERS, KEYPAD DROPS SUPPORT AT ALMOST MANY TIMES IN FIREFOX. I THINK WE CAN PREVENT GOOGLE ADS IN FIREFOX, SO ANDROID IS NOT SO MUCH SUPPORTING ITS BROWSER RIVAL. ANDROID'S IN-BUILT BROWSER IS NOT GIVING ANY OPTION TO ADD ADD-ONS OR TO REMOVE ADS FROM ITS ADVT FILLED BROWSER.

label: Xperia P
Sentences:
I BOUGHT THIS PHONE IN JUNE FROM SONY INDIA SHOP DIRECTLY. THIS IS MY SECOND ANDROID PHONE AFTER A VERY FRUSTRATING EXPERIENCE WITH HTC SENSATION, WHICH HAD MAJOR NETWORK CONNECTIVITY ISSUES. I WANTED TO MAKE SURE THAT THE PHONE I BUY DOES NOT HAVE ANY NETWORK RELATED ISSUES.
      
      
      AFTER GOING THROUGH A LOT OF REVIEWS OF MANY DIFFERENT MODELS (EXCLUDING HTC), I WAS INTERESTED IN THIS MODEL. THE WHITEMAGIC TECHNOLOGY WAS WHAT INTERESTED ME INITIALLY AND BESIDES IT SEEMED GOOD VALUE FOR MONEY. THE BUILD IS GOOD, THE ALUMINIUM BODY HAS A PREMIUM FEEL (BETTER THAN XPERIA S), THE SPECS ARE FINE FOR MY NORMAL USAGE AND I DON?T FIND ANY LAG. IT HAS GOT GOOD NETWORK CONNECTIVITY COVERAGE. THE DISPLAY IS VERY GOOD WITH GOOD VIEWING ANGLES. THE WHITE MAGIC TECHNOLOGY REALLY WORKS AND EVEN IN BRIGHT SUNLIGHT, CAN SEE THE SCREEN PROPERLY. THE TEXT DISPLAY IS VERY CRISP THANKS TO THE HIGH PPI. THE CAMERA AND VIDEO RECORDING IS GOOD. IT HAS A GOOD MUSIC PLAYER WITH LOT OF SETTINGS.
      
      
      GOT THE PHONE UPGRADED TO THE ICS VERSION IN AUGUST. A PRIOR UPGRADE HAD CAUSED SOME ISSUES WHICH WERE ALL FIXED IN THE ICS UPGRADE. SONY'S CUSTOMIZATION OF ICS IS NOT HEAVY AND THE OVERALL PERFORMANCE HAS IMPROVED FURTHER.
      
      
      THE ONLY NEGATIVE I CAN TALK ABOUT IS THAT THE BATTERY LIFE IS AVERAGE AT BEST. WISH THE CAPACITY WAS MORE THAN 1305 MAH. THE CHARGING IS VERY FAST THOUGH.

label: Xperia P

      I AGREE 16GB IS QUITE A LOT OF MEMORY FOR A PHONE THOUGH...
      
      
      I AM CURRENTLY HUNTING FOR A GOOD PHONE TO HAVE....I LIKE XPERIA SERIES. I LIKE THEIR FRONT DESIGN, BUT THE BACK IS WHAT IS DISAPPOINTING ME IN MOST OF THEM. I WISH THEY WEREN'T CURVED. BUT THAT IS SUBJECTIVE. MAY BE OTHERS LIKE IT THAT WAY.

label: Xperia P
Sentences:
IT WAS A GREAT EXPERIENCE TO USE ANDROID PHONE FOR FIRST TIME. I WAS ASTONISHED BY THE BRIGHT CLEAR DISPLAY AND AMAZING "SONY" SOUND.
      
      THE PHONE IS ALL GOOD AND A BEST BUY EXCEPT FOR A FEW GLITCHES:
      
      BATTERY...IF YOU HAVE A DATA PACK ENABLED...THAT CONTINUOUSLY RUNS THE SYSTEM FOR REGULAR UPDATES, YOUR BATTERY IS DRAINED WITHIN 2 DAYS WITHOUT EVEN A SINGLE CALL.
      
      OLD VERSION OF ANDROID(2.3)... A CONSTANT REMINDER FOR UPGRADE IRRITATES ME, BUT I DON'T UPGRADE COZ OF ISSUES WITH THE UPGRADED VERSION ON THIS PHONE
      
      BUT AS I AM A SONY FREAK, SO THESE STUFF DON'T WORRY ME MUCH, I LOVE OWNING A SONY. REST IS UPTO YOU :)

label: Xperia P
Sentences:
IT'S BEEN 7 DAYS SINCE I STARTED USING THE SONY XPERIA P. PREVIOUSLY I HAD A HTC DESIRE S. SO I AM GIVING MY REVIEW BASED ON MY EXPERIENCE ON BOTH THE MOBILE PHONES.
      
      
      DISPLAY - BOTH DEVICES HAVE HAVE GREAT DISPLAY. I WOULD GIVE AN EXTRA POINT TO XPERIA P.
      
      UI - HTC SENSE IS INCOMPARABLE. THOUGH SONY'S TIMESCAPE IS GOOD ENOUGH BUT HTC SENSE IS THE WINNER BETWEEN THEM.
      
      CAMERA - SONY IS THE CLEAR WINNER IN THIS SECTION. NOTHING TO COMPARE.
      
      MEMORY - XPERIA P IS HAVING 16GB INTERNAL MEMORY AND THERE IS NO SD CARD SLOT PRESENT. OUT OF WHICH A LITTLE MORE THAN 13 GB(1.97GB FOR APPS AND 11.26 GB FOR MEDIA STORAGE) IS AVAILABLE FOR THE USER. WHICH IS MORE THAN SUFFICIENT FOR ANY USER IN REAL TIME. BUT HTC DESIRE S HAS 1.1 GB INTERNAL MEMORY AND A SD CARD SLOT WHICH IS EXPANDABLE UP TO 64 GB. SO I THINK HTC IS BETTER IN THIS CASE.
      
      AUDIO - THOUGH THE QUALITY OF AUDIO IS SAME IN BOTH THE DEVICES, BUT HTC IS MORE LOUD AND CLEAR THAN SONY. THE HEAD PHONE PROVIDED BY HTC IS FAR SUPERIOR THAN SONY. LIKE SO MANY OTHER USERS I AM ALSO NOT SURE WHY SONY HAS GIVEN THAT X-LOUD FEATURE. IT IS OF NO USE. WHETHER YOU ACTIVATE IT OR DEACTIVATE IT YOU WILL FIND NO CHANGE AT ALL.
      
      BATTERY - THIS IS THE MOST IMPORTANT FACTOR WHEN DECIDING TO BUY A SMART PHONE. NO ANDROID PHONE IN THIS WORLD HAS A VERY GOOD BATTERY LIFE. BUT SONY IN THIS FIELD REALLY HAVE TO SPEND A LOT IN THE R&D. THE BATTERY IN XPERIA P IS 1300 MAH BATTERY WHICH REALLY SUCKS. THE BATTERY LIFE IS REALLY VERY POOR. A FULLY CHARGED BATTERY WILL ONLY LAST FOR NO LONGER THAN A DAY. NO MATTER WHAT YOU DO IN THE PHONE IT WILL DRAIN OUT WITHIN A DAY. EVEN IF YOU DON'T DO ANY THING WITH THE PHONE, KEEP THE DATA, WIFI, MUSIC, CAMERA, LIVE WALLPAPER OFF, IT WILL DRAIN OUT WITHIN 24 HOURS. I DON'T UNDERSTAND SONY WHAT IS KEEPING THEM OFF FROM INCREASING THE POWER OF THE BATTERY.
      
      
      SO FRIENDS, ALL IN ALL THE PHONE IS A GOOD BUY ONLY IF YOU ARE READY TO COMPROMISE WITH THE PERFORMANCE OF THE BATTERY.
      
      
      THANK YOU ALL.

label: Xperia P
Sentences:
BOUGHT A SONY XPERIA P YESTERDAY FROM FLIPKART. FEEDBACK ON THE FEATURES EXPLORED ARE:
      
      
      1. SUPERB DISPLAY RESOLUTION.
      
      2. BATTERY IS SEALED. SO SONY'S INTENTION MIGHT BE TO CHARGE 3000-5000 RUPEES WHEN IT GETS DAMAGED AS THE USER CANNOT DO ANYTHING WITH THE BATTERY.
      
      3. GOOD SOUND QUALITY BUT QUITE LOW.
      
      4. FM OPERATION LOOKED TO BE VERY NICE TO ME.
      
      5. A TRADITIONAL PROBLEM WITH SONY : I TRIED 3 DIFFERENT VIDEO FILES WHICH RUNS IN MY SAMSUMG 32 INCH TV.
      
      A) FILE 1 (MKV) WAS PLAYED NICELY UPTO CERTAIN TIME. AFTER THAT IT SAID "CANNOT PLAY".
      
      B) FILE 2 (MP4) WAS NOT PLAYED AT ALL. MESSAGE IS "CANNOT PLAY"
      
      C) FILE 3 (MKV) - VIDEO WAS PLAYED, BUT NO AUDIO.
      
      SO BE AWARE. EXPECT THAT ONLY SOME VIDEO FILES WITH MATAJI'S BLESSINGS CAN BE PLAYED ON XPERIA.
      
      6. ALTHOUGH CLAIMED TO BE 4 INCH, SEEMED TO HAVE LITTLE LESS WIDTH COMPARED TO SAMSUNG GALAXY S I9000 WHICH IS ALSO SAID TO BE 4 INCH.
      
      7. IT ACCEPTS MICRO-SIM WHICH IS NOT AVAILABLE IN INDIAN MARKET, AT LEAST I DIDN'T KNOW ABOUT IT. HAD TO CUT THE SIM WITH A SCISSOR.
      
      8. BACKUP TIME IS UNBELIEVABLY POOR. (I HAVE A SAMSUNG GALAXY S I9000, SO I AM AWARE THAT BATTERY IN ANDROID IS AN ISSUE BUT THIS ONE IS TERRIBLE.)
      
      9. TOUCH SENSE DID NOT MAKE ME HAPPY BUT CAN LIVE WITH IT.
      
      
      FLIPKART SERVICE WAS SUPERB. HOWEVER, THIS PRODUCT IS ENOUGH TO SPOIL MY MOOD PRIMARILY DUE TO POINT 2, 5 & 7.

label: Xperia P
Sentences:
I HAVE BEEN USING THIS PHONE FOR ABOUT 10 MONTHS NOW AND ALL I CAN SAY THAT ITS JUST AN AVERAGE SMART PHONE.
      
      FIRST THE PROS:
      
      -UPGRADING IT TO ANDROID V 4.0 HAS MADE IT MORE USER FRIENDLY.
      
      -THE 16GB INTERNAL MEMORY IS GOOD ENOUGH TO STORE YOUR DATA.
      
      -IT IS LIGHTWEIGHT AND FITS IN THE HAND EASILY AND IS NOT AT ALL BULKY.
      
      -I LISTEN TO MAINLY POP, ROCK AND DUBSTEP AND I FIND THE SPEAKERS AND THE VOLUME ADEQUATE.
      
      -THE SECONDARY CAMERA IS SOMETIMES USEFUL FOR VIDEO CHAT USING SKYPE/TANGO.
      
      
      CONS:
      
      - THOUGH IT HAS A DUAL CORE PROCESSOR BUT ITS A BIT SLOW AND HANGS A LOT. BECAUSE OF THIS I HAVE TO RESTART IT MORE THAN USUAL WHICH IS A BIT ANNOYING.
      
      - I FELT THE TOUCH SCREEN IS A BIT LACKING IN QUALITY AND SHOULD HAVE BEEN MORE RECEPTIVE.
      
      -THE CAMERA COULD HAVE BEEN BETTER WHEN CLICKING PHOTOS BUT IT COMPENSATES WHEN TAKING A VIDEO.
      
      -THE BATTERY DOESNT LAST THE WHOLE DAY WITH THE WIFI CONTINUOUSLY ON SO I  SOMETIMES HAVE TO CHARGE IT BY EARLY EVENING.
      
      
      AS A GREAT FAN OF SONY PRODUCTS, HAVING OWNED SONY TVS, DSLR'S AND LAPTOPS, I WAS ACTUALLY DISAPPOINTED FROM THIS PRODUCT. FRANKLY SPEAKING, THERE ARE OTHER GREAT SMART PHONES FROM HTC/NOKIA. DEFINITELY NOT WORTH THE 25000 THAT I SPENT.

label: Xperia P
Sentences:
PLEASE NOTE THERE IS A SERIOUS PROBLEM WITH THIS PHONE TYPICALLY FOR *SOME* AIRTEL AND VODAFONE USERS. I AM ON AIRTEL, BOUGHT THIS PHONE ON DIWALI (14TH NOV'12) AND GUESS WHAT.. I DIDN'T GET A CHANCE TO USE IT EVEN FOR A WEEK.
      
      
      I GOT ONE REPLACEMENT JUST WITHIN FIRST 10 DAYS OF SUBMITTING THE PHONE TO THEIR SERVICE CENTRE, IT TOOK 10 MORE DAYS TO GET ANOTHER BRAND NEW PHONE AND VERY UNFORTUNATELY THAT PHONE ALSO HAD EXACTLY SAME PROBLEM.. HERE MY STRUGGLE STARTED.
      
      
      THE PROBLEM WAS SIMPLE, THE PHONE WOULD FORGET ITS BASIC PHONE FUNCTIONALITY JUST LIKE THAT, FOR EXAMPLE IF THE PHONE IS IN FRONT OF ME ON MY DESK FOR FEW HOURS WHERE ALL OTHER OPERATIONS ARE FINE AND IT WILL ALSO SHOW NETWORK BUT IF I PICK UP THE PHONE AND TRY TO CALL, THE PHONE WILL SIMPLY STAY IDLE WITHOUT CONNECTING TO THE DIALED NUMBER OR WONT GIVE ANY ERROR.. THEN, I TRY TO CALL THE MOBILE PHONE FROM MY DESK PHONE I AND THAT TOO AGAIN END UP WITHOUT ANY ERROR.. IF I TRY TO SEND A MSG, TURN ON BLUETOOTH, NOTHING HAPPENS AND BELIEVE ME, THIS HAS HAPPENED FOR TWO 'BRAND NEW' XPERIAP PHONES.
      
      
      I KINDLY REQUESTED THE SONY MANAGEMENT TO REFUND MY MONEY AS THE PHONE HAD A FAULT, I WAS TOLD THAT THEY DO NOT HAVE 'REFUND' POLICY AND THAT THE PHONE WORKS WITH OTHER SIM-CARDS SO IT?S BETTER THAT I CHANGE MY SIM CARD :), WHAT A JOKE!!
      
      
      SO I SHOULD CHANGE THE SIM CARD BECAUSE SONY PHONE HAS PROBLEM, GREAT..
      
      NOW THEY HAVE ISSUED SECOND DOA CERTIFICATE, THAT MEANS I SHALL NOW GET THIRD PHONE FROM THE RETAILER BUT I AM PRETTY SURE THAT SONY GUYS HAVEN?T FIXED THIS ISSUE OVER THESE 1 AND HALF MONTHS.. SO PRECISELY IF THE PROBLEM STILL PERSISTS, I SHALL HAVE TO GO TO CONSUMER COURT.
      
      
      UPDATE:
      
      THE RETAILER WAS KIND ENOUGH TO PAY MY MONEY BACK AFTER LISTENING TO ALL THIS STORY. THANKS TO HIM, BUT I SHALL NEVER BUY A SONY PHONE IN FUTURE.
      
      
      THINK TWICE IF YOU DO NOT WANT TO GO THRU WHAT I SUFFERED FROM...
      
      
      NO OPTION BUT TO GIVE ONE STAR.

label: Xperia U
Sentences:
AS SOON I GOT MY HANDS ON THIS PHONE I WAS AMAZED BY THE DISPLAY CLARITY AND THE LIGHT STRIP AT THE BOTTOM WHICH LOOKS SO BEAUTIFUL.
      
      
      I WAS A BIT SKEPTICAL ABOUT THE BATTERY SINCE IT HOUSES A 1320 MAH LI-ION BUT THE BATTERY PERFORMANCE PROVED ME WRONG. ON MEDIUM CONSUMPTION THE BATTERY CAN GO AT LEAST 1.5 DAYS, AND ON LIGHT USAGE IT CAN GO UPTO 2 DAYS WHICH IS PRETTY NEAT LOOKING AT THE PHONE'S FEATURES.
      
      
      THE PHOTOS TAKEN BY THE MAIN CAMERA ARE ABOVE AVERAGE QUALITY. ALTHOUGH THE CAMERA BUTTON IS A BIT RIGID BUT NOTHING MAJOR. I REALLY DON'T CARE AS MUCH ABOUT THE CAMERA IN A PHONE AS OTHER PEOPLE DO. JUST NOTE MP DOES NOT DIRECTLY TRANSLATE INTO QUALITY.
      
      ALSO THE TWO SECOND SLEEP-TO-SNAP FEATURE IS PRETTY SWEET.
      
      
      CALL QUALITY IS GOOD. THE CALLER IS ABLE TO HEAR MY VOICE VERY CLEARLY EVEN WHEN I AM IN A NOISY AREA. BUT THE VOLUME IS A BIT LOW WHICH CREATES A PROBLEM IF I AM IN A NOISY AREA. AS FOR THE EARPIECE, ABSOLUTELY BRILLIANT CLARITY AT BOTH SIDES.
      
      
      IF YOU ARE INTO MUSIC THEN YOU GOING TO LOVE THIS PHONE. EXCELLENT SOUND QUALITY WHEN LISTENING THROUGH THE EARPIECE AND EVEN THROUGH THE SPEAKERS.
      
      
      THE ONLY DRAWBACK WOULD BE THE NO MICRO SD SLOT. BUT IF YOU ARE LIKE ME WHO ONLY COPIES MP3 FILES TO YOUR PHONE THEN THE 4GB PROVIDED BY THIS PHONE IS ADEQUATE ENOUGH.
      
      
      THE PHONE CAME WITH GINGERBREAD, AND AS SOON I OPENED THE PACKAGE I INSTALLED "PC COMPANION" TO UPGRADE TO ICE CREAM SANDWICH. UNFORTUNATELY THAT TOOK 1.5 HRS TO DOWNLOAD BUT EVERYTHING WAS SMOOTH AFTER THAT.
      
      
      I HAVE COMPARED MANY PHONES BASED ON FEATURES BEFORE PURCHASING AND OVERALL I CAN SAY THIS IS THE BEST VALUE FOR MONEY FOR A MID RANGE PHONE.

I AM USING THIS PHONE SINCE 2 MONTHS. I UPDATED IT TO ICS AT FIRST IT WAS LAGGING A LOT BUT WHEN I DID A TOTAL FACTORY RESET (WHICH DELETES ALL DATA) IT STARTED WORKING VERY SMOOTHLY.
      
      NOTE: BEFORE YOU PERFORM FACTORY RESET YOU NEED TO TAKE BACKUP OF YOU PHONE DATA USING SONY COMPANION SOFTWARE.
      
      MY PHONE WAS FALLEN ON ROAD WHEN I WAS ON BIKE WHICH WAS RUNNING WITH SPEED OF MORE THAN 50 KMPH BUT NOT MORE DAMAGE WAS HAPPENED EXCEPT THE SCREEN-GUARD. SCREEN-GUARD WAS FULLY BRUISED BUT IT DID NOT LET SCREEN GET A SINGLE SCRATCH. HATS OFF FOR SONY'S SCREEN-GUARD.
      
      BEFORE FACTORY RESET IT WAS HAVING WI-FI DROP PROBLEM BUT NOW IT HAS SOLVED.ONE MAY HAVE SO MANY PROBLEMS AFTER ICS UPDATE BUT THOSE WILL GET SOLVED AFTER FACTORY RESET.
      
      
      FEATURES:-
      
      1) FAST CAPTURE CAMERA (HOLD CAMERA KEY FOR 4-5 SECONDS DESPITE PHONE BEING LOCKED ).
      
      2) 720P VIDEO RECORDING.
      
      3) MULTI FOCUS CAMERA (NEW BUYERS MAY HAVE FOUND A BIT DELAY IN PICTURE CLICKS NO WORRY          CHANGE FOCUS MODE TO MULTI OR INFINITY IT WILL CLICK PICTURES INSTANTLY)
      
      4)BRILLIANT ULTRA BRIGHT SCREEN WHICH MAKES HD VIDEOS (1080P) TO LOOK VERY CLEAR. (MX PLAYER IS THE BEST APP WHICH PLAYS ALL TYPES OF VIDEOS)
      
      5) DUAL CORE PROCESSOR REALLY WORKS BRILLIANTLY AND PLAYS GAMES VERY SMOOTHLY
      
      6)BATTERY PERFORMANCE WILL BE IMPROVED IF WE INSTALL JUICE DEFENDER APP.
      
      7) SMART CONNECT APP FROM SONY IS VERY HELPFUL AND CAN ALSO READ MESSAGES.
      
      
      CONS:
      
      SONY HAS NOT OPTIMIZED ICS VERSION FOR XPERIA PHONES WE NEED TO STOP SOME APPS IF RAM GOES MORE THAN 400 MB.

label: Xperia U
Sentences:
I BOUGHT THIS PHONE AFTER DOING ALMOST A MONTH OF RESEARCH FOR MOBILES IN THE RANGE OF 13K-15K AND CAME UP WITH THE CONCLUSION THAT, THE SXU IS THE BEST.
      
      THIS MOBILE IS FOR:
      
      - GAMERS
      
      - STYLE SEEKERS
      
      - EVERYDAY USERS
      
      - GPS USERS
      
      - SOCIAL APPERS
      
      
      IT IS NOT FOR:
      
      - PEOPLE WHO RELY SOLELY ON THEIR PHONES FOR MULTIMEDIA BECAUSE OF LIMITED STORAGE (NOTE: USB ON THE GO IS SUPPORTED)
      
      
      I AM A FIRST-TIME USER OF A SMARTPHONE AND I MUST SAY THAT THIS PHONE IS MUCH BETTER THAN I EXPECTED.
      
      
      WHY?
      
      
      - SCREEN : IT HAS AN AWESOME SCREEN - >280PPI PIXEL DENSITY WITH A 16:9 ASPECT RATIO WITH BRAVIA ENGINE. THE SCREEN IS RICH AND VERY SHARP AND HAS A SORT OF SOFTNESS TO IT(COS YOU CANT SEE THE EDGES OF EACH PIXEL). THE PPI IS I THINK, BETTER THAN SXP.
      
      - ILLUMINATION BAR : THOUGH COMPLETELY USELESS IN TERMS OF DAILY USE, IT GIVES THIS PHONE A SOUL OF ITS OWN (AS GSMARENA PUTS IT, "THE ULTIMATE SHOW OFF FEATURE"). THE LED LIGHTING CHANGES WITH YOUR THEME OR PHOTO AND AN APP CALLED 'ILLUMINATION BAR NOTIFICATION' CAN MAKE IT FUNCTION AS A VISUAL NOTIFIER. VERY COOL.
      
      - STYLE: IMO, I'VE NEVER SEEN A BETTER LOOKING PHONE THAN THIS. ITS SHARP EDGED DESIGN APPEALS TO ME MORE THAN THE CURVY PROFILE OF IPHONE OR SAMSUNG.
      
      - DUAL CORE PROCESSOR: A 1 GHZ DUAL CORE PROCESSOR AT THIS PRICE IS RARELY SEEN. THIS PHONE HAS HIGH SCORES IN THE BENCHMARKS BY SITES LIKE GSM ARENA AND OUTSHINES ALL ITS COMPETITORS IN TERMS OF PROCESSING POWER. THIS RESULTED IN LAG-FREE(MOSTLY) BROWSING AND WONDERFUL GAMING.
      
      - ANDROID 4.0 ICS UPDATE : SONY PROVIDES AN UPGRADE FOR ICS AND I AM HAPPY TO SEE THAT THIS UPGRADE BRINGS A LOT OF FEATURES WITH IT. UPGRADING IT ACTUALLY SPEEDS UP THE PHONE AND OPTIMISES RAM USAGE.
      
      - REMOVABLE BATTERY: BEING A TREKKER AND SO A HEAVY GPS USER, I FOUND IT EXTREMELY HELPFUL THAT YOU CAN REPLACE THE BATTERY. THIS IS NOT POSSIBLE IN THE SXP.
      
      - THE MEMORY SPACE: I ALREADY HAVE A SONY MP4 PLAYER AND DID NOT REALLY NEED A LARGE MEMORY SO THIS WASNT AN ISSUE FOR ME AS IT WAS SUFFICIENT FOR A QUITE A FEW SONGS AND SOME VIDEOS.
      
      
      BTW, THIS PHONE IS ONE OF THE TOP 10 PHONES IN GSMARENA (AS ON 9/11/2012)
      
      
      DO NOT BUY THIS IF:
      
      - YOUR BUDGET CAN GO UP TO 22K AS SOME BETTER PHONES ARE AVAILABLE.
      
      - YOU NEED A BIGGER SCREEN. THIS SCREEN IS THE SMALLEST OF THE NXT SERIES OF THE XPERIAS.
      
      - YOU USE IT A LOT AS A MULTIMEDIA PLAYER
      
      - YOU NEED AN EXCELLENT CAMERA. THIS PHONE'S IS PRETTY BASIC AND NOT TOO GREAT WITH LOW LIGHT.
      
      
      SMALL COMPLAINT I HAD: THE NOTIFICATION LIGHT IS TOO DIM (BUT THE APP MENTIONED ABOVE MORE THAN COMPENSATES)
      
      
      ALL IN ALL, A GREAT BUDGET TO MID-RANGE PHONE WHICH WILL NOT BE OUTDATED ANYTIME SOON.
      
      
      REVIEWS:
      
      CHECK OUT GSMARENA AND THEVERGE FOR IN-DEPTH REVIEWS.

label: Xperia U
Sentences:
I HAVE USED THIS PHONE FOR THE OVER 1 MONTH NOW, SO HAVE USED ALL THE GENERAL FEATURES.
      
      
      BATTERY:
      
      LASTS AROUND 3 - 4 HOURS IF YOU ARE CONTINUOUSLY PLAYING A RESOURCE INTENSIVE GAME ( LIKE TEMPLE RUN / 3D CRICKET ). LASTS AROUND 6 TO 8 HOURS IF YOU ARE ROAMING AND CONTINUOUSLY BROWSING INTERNET ( FOR EXAMPLE ON A TRAIN JOURNEY EVERY WEEKEND) . LASTS MORE THAN A DAY IF YOU ARE OCCASIONAL AT READING NEWS, CHECKING FACEBOOK, LISTENING SONGS FOR 1 HOUR AND MAKING PHONE CALLS OF 1 HOURS EACH OFFICE DAY. BATTERY HASN'T BEEN A PROBLEM FOR ME AS I KEEP MY PHONE CHARGED AT OFFICE WHILE ON MY LAPTOP. IF YOU ARE A INDOOR PERSON LIKE ME YOU WILL HAVE NO ISSUES WITH THE BATTERY BACK UP.
      
      
      GRAPHICS QUALITY:
      
      CRYSTAL CLEAR. NO PROBLEMS WHILE PLAYING HD GAMES / MOVIES. NO LAGS AT ALL. THE DUAL CORE PROCESSOR IS A POWER HOUSE. THERE IS A SONY BRAVIA ENGINE IN THE PHONE WHICH DOES ALL THIS.
      
      
      STORAGE:
      
      INTERNAL 4 GB + USER 4 GB. ALSO THERE IS 50 GB FREE CLOUD SPACE. USER 4 GB MAY SEEM LESS, HOWEVER IF YOU ARE AN ORGANISED PERSON 4 GB IS MORE THAN ENOUGH. I HAVE INSTALLED 100 SONGS AND HAVE 20 ANDROID APPS (OF AVERAGE SIZE 5 MB ). STILL HAVE MORE THAN 2 GB LEFT TO USE. OF COURSE IF YOU ARE LOOKING TO STORE PORN IN YOUR MOBILE NOTHING IS ENOUGH !
      
      
      SOUND:
      
      SOUND QUALITY WHILE LISTENING TO SONGS IS VERY SOOTHING. SONY SOUND SYSTEMS ARE A CLASS OF ITS OWN.
      
      IF YOU HAVE THE NOISE CORRECTION FEATURE ON, THEN EARPIECE SOUND IS LOW WHEN YOU ARE OUTDOORS. IF YOU TURN OFF THE NOISE CORRECTION FEATURE, EARPIECE SOUND BECOMES JUST FINE. LOUD SPEAKER IS NOT THAT LOUD. HOWEVER, YOU CAN USE SOUND BOOSTER APPS FROM THE ANDROID MARKET TO BOOST IT. SO, PROBLEM SOLVED AGAIN. :-)
      
      
      CAMERA:
      
      DAYLIGHT SNAPS HAVE GOOD CLARITY FOR A 5 MEGAPIXELS RESOLUTION. LOW LIGHT PHOTOGRAPHY IS ALWAYS A PROBLEM WITH ANY MOBILE CAMERA, SO CAN'T BLAME IT. THERE IS A LED FLASH. A FRONT VGA CAMERA FOR VIDEO CALLS AS WELL. QUITE HANDY ! THERE ARE ANDROID APPS WHICH CAN MAKE THE LED CAMERA FLASH TO BEHAVE AS A TORCH AS WELL. VERY SMART !
      
      
      LED LIGHT BAND:
      
      THE IS A STYLISH LED BAND AT THE BOTTOM WHICH KEEPS CHANGING ITS COLOUR AS PER THE IMMEDIATE THEME ON THE CURRENT SCREEN. MANY ARE AFRAID THAT IT MIGHT BE A POTENTIAL REASON FOR DRAINING OUT BATTERY, HOWEVER IT TOO CAN BE TURNED OFF BY USING AN ANDROID APP ( SCREEN FILTER). NO PROBLEMS AGAIN !
      
      
      TOUCH SENSITIVITY:
      
      NO PROBLEMS WITH TOUCH, EVEN AFTER I HAVE PUT ON A SCREEN GUARD. NOTHING TO WORRY ABOUT
      
      
      ANDROID VERSION:
      
      THE GINGERBREAD VERSION IS UPGRADEABLE TO ICECREAMSANDWITCH IF YOU WISH TO. HOWEVER THERE IS A CAUTION FROM OTHER USERS: THAT THE SYSTEM GETS SLOW, AND IT IS NOT REVERSIBLE ( DOWNGRADE-ABLE ). SO, I HAVE NO PLANS OF TRYING IT.
      
      
      OVERALL:
      
      AN EXCELLENT BUY AT THIS PRICE. LOWER MODELS OF XPERIA STILL HAVE SOME PROBLEMS, IF YOU GO THROUGH THE CUSTOMER FEEDBACKS. HOWEVER XPERIA U IS A SUCCESSFUL LAUNCH. A VERY INTELLIGENT COMBINATION OF ALL GENERAL FEATURES AND THAT TOO MAINTAINING THE QUALITY AT A PRICE CLOSE TO 10K.
      
      
      LOOKING AT THE PRICE + FEATURES PROVIDED + WORKAROUND POSSIBLE FOR THE SHORT COMINGS + QUALITY OF FEATURES, I GIVE IT A 5 ON 5.
      
      
      VERY SATISFIED. JUST GO FOR IT.
