      MAJORITY OF APPS ON PLAYSTORE ARE LESS THAN 10MB. EVEN IF YOU PLAN TO USE 2GB OF 4GB FOR APPS ALONE, YOU CAN STILL STORE MORE THAN 200 APPS. ALTHOUGH I HAVE NOT SEEN PEOPLE MORE THAN 20-25 ADDITIONAL APPS IN THEIR PHONES.
      
      
      ADVANTAGES
      
      I PERSONALLY GOT THIS PHONE COZ OF 1GHZ DUAL CORE CORTEX A9 WITH MALI 400. IN S3 YOU HAVE THE  1.4GHZ QUAD CORE INSTEAD OF 1 GHZ DUAL CORE, SO YOU CAN IMAGINE THE VALUE FOR MONEY YOU GET WITH SONY. IT REALLY BRINGS IT CLOSER TO THE HIGH END PHONES.
      
      
      THERE IS NO LAG WHILE SWIPING. TEMPLE RUN RUNS FLAWLESSLY. LOADS HEAVY WEBPAGES EASILY WITH 14+MBPS SPEED. BIG WEBPAGES (NYTIMES) DO LAG A BIT BUT THATS NEGLIGIBLE.
      
      
      THE UI, THEME IS GREAT, IT WILL ATTRACT YOU TO SWIPE THE SCREEN AND SEE ITS LIVE WALLPAPER COME TO LIFE.
      
      
      MIND BLOWING BASS QUALITY. UFF I CAN'T DEFINE IT GUYS. YOU HAVE TO LISTEN TO IT YOURSELF. SUPER CLEAR BASS. NOT AT ALL MUDDY!
      
      
      280 PPI SCREEN GIVES RAZOR SHARP IMAGES.
      
      
      BATTERY LASTS FOR 2 DAYS WITH REDUCED BRIGHTNESS AND LIMITED USAGE.
      
      
      SUPERB RUBBERY FINISH. MUCH BETTER THAN HTC AND PLASTICY SAMSUNG SETS.
      
      
      STRONG RESPONSIVE KEYS
      
      
      DISADVANTAGES
      
      
      THE SCREEN GETS A BIT GREASY.
      
      ICS WOULD HAVE BEEN BETTER THAN GINGERBREAD
      
      
      CONCLUSION
      
      MIDRANGE PHONES ARE A TRICKY BUY. UNLIKE THE HIGH END PHONE WHERE YOU GET THE BEST HARDWARE AND ONLY FIGHT ON THE BASE OF SOME SPECIAL FEATURES, HERE PEOPLE NEED TO KNOW ABOUT THE HARDWARE INSTALLED IN THEIR PHONES.
      
      SAMSUNG MAY HAVE BEEN MARKETING AGGRESSIVELY, BUT AFTER A LOT OF RESEARCH I FOUND BUYING A SAMSUNG PHONE IN THIS RANGE (DONT REMEBER THE MODEL , ITS FOR 15500 IN FLIPKART ONLY) IS NOT AT ALL WORTH. QUALCOMM CHIPS WITH ADRENO 200 GRAPHICS???? THAT TO MORE THAN 15K? JUST NOT ACCEPTABLE. MOREOVER THE SCREENS ARE ALSO DULL IN SAMSUNG MIDRANGE PHONE.
      
      
      ON THE OTHER HAND HTC TURNED ME DOWN ON A FEW FEATURES. I WANTED TO GO FOR HTC FRO ITS SCREEN SIZE AND ICS BUT STEPPED BACK COZ OF SEC CAM AND I GHZ DUAL CORE BUNDLED WITH A 280 PPI SCREEN I GOT BUYING U.
      
      
      AT LAST, THE ILLUMINATION STRIP AT THE BOTTOM DIFFERENTIATES THIS LITTLE BEAST IN THE CROWD GUYS. ITS REALLY A SIMPLE FEATURE BUT IT MAKES ONE NOTICE THAT ...?ITS U? :)

Sentences:
SONY XPERIA U HAS BEEN ONE THE TOP SELLING AND THE MOST POPULAR PHONE FROM SONY.
      
      SONY PROVIDES QUALITY PRODUCTS. ALL THE PRODUCTS INSIDE THE BOX ARE OF TOP NOTCH QUALITY.

      POSITIVES:
      
      
      -> EXCELLENT SCREEN RESOLUTION. IMAGES ARE INDEED VERY CRISP AND CLEAR (ALTHOUGH THE COLOUR SATURATION IS SLIGHTLY ON THE HIGHER SIDE). EQUIPPED WITH MOBILE BRAVIA ENGINE.
      
      
      -> ILLUMINATION STRIP. EYE CATCHER AND IS GOOD FOR NOTIFICATIONS. LOTS OF APPS AVAILABLE ON GOOGLE PLAY TO CHANGE THE COLOUR OF ILLUMINATION STRIP FOR DIFFERENT NOTIFICATIONS/APPS.
      
      
      -> PRETTY FAST PROCESSOR. 1GHZ + DUAL CORE NEVER LETS YOU DOWN ON PERFORMANCE
      
      
      -> MALI 400MP GPU - ONE OF THE BEST GPUS AROUND. PROVIDES SMOOTH GAMING EXPERIENCE. THE QUADRANT BENCHMARK SCORES FOR MY XPERIA U TURNED OUT TO BE 2828, WHICH IS BETTER THAN HTC ONE V.
      
      
      -> TOUCHSCREEN - EXCELLENT TOUCH RESPONSES INTERCEPTED BY THE SCREEN. NO LAGS AT ALL. OH YES, THE SCREEN IS SCRATCH RESISTANT AND THERE IS AN ANTI-REFLECTION COATING ON THE MINERAL GLASS TOO.
      
      
      -> CAMERA - CLICKS FABULOUS PHOTOS UNDER DAYLIGHT BUT SOMEWHAT GRAINY PHOTOS UNDER LOW LIGHT CONDITIONS. FLASH LIGHT IS EXCEPTIONALLY BRIGHT. THERE IS PANORAMA, 3D PANORAMA, SMILE DETECTION AND LOTS OF OTHER FEATURES WHICH MAKE A VERY GOOD CAMERA PACKAGE.
      
      SECONDARY CAMERA WORKS FINE WHEN MAKING VIDEO CALLS OVER WIFI OR 3G.
      
      VIDEO RECORDING @720P - GREAT VIDEO QUALITY.
      
      
      -> OS - COMES WITH GINGERBREAD OUT OF THE BOX BUT YOU CAN UPDATE THE OS TO ICS USING SONY COMPANION PC SOFTWARE. SONY HAS BEEN ONE THE MOST LOYAL MANUFACTURERS THAT ROLLS OUT UPDATES FOR ANY BUG FIXES, IF REQUIRED, UNLIKE MICROMAX, KARBONN WHICH WILL BE PERMANENTLY STUCK WITH BUGS IN THEIR OS.
      
      
      -> NETWORK RECEPTION - NO ISSUES WITH NETWORK RECEPTION. 2G AND 3G DATA WORK FLAWLESSLY.
      
      
      -> BATTERY - ALTHOUGH IT HOUSES A SLIGHTLY SMALLER BATTERY (1320 MAH) THAN EXPECTED, IT CAN LAST A DAY EASILY. WITH THE ICS UPDATE COMES AN 'EXTENDED STANDBY MODE'. TURN IT ON AND YOUR BATTERY STANDBY TIMES INCREASE 3 FOLD. WITH HEAVY USAGE, THE JUICE LASTS A DAY, BUT WITH MODERATE USAGE IT LASTS 1.5 DAYS EASILY.
      
      
      -> IN BUILT APPS - A FEW INBUILT APPS ARE GOOD BUT THE REST CAN BE REMOVED. YES, SONY HAS BEEN GENEROUS ENOUGH TO ALLOW ITS USERS TO REMOVE INBUILT APPS. INTERNAL MEMORY FOR APPS IS 2 GB !!!!
      
      
      -> WALKMAN - MUSIC IS WAY BETTER THAN THOSE MICROMAX, SAMSUNG PHONES. GOOD PRE-SET EQUALIZERS + 3D SOUND ENHANCEMENTS + GOOD ENOUGH RINGO EARPHONES + ILLUMINATION STRIP MAKE YOUR MUSIC EXPERIENCE WONDERFUL.
      
      I AM USING SOUNDMAGIC ES 18 EARPHONES WITH XPERIA U (THAT MAKES A DEADLY COMBINATION :D)
      
      
      -> USB OTG- ON THE GO (OTG), LETS YOU CONNECT YOUR PENDRIVE, USB MOUSE/KEYBOARD WHICH IS NOT AVAILABLE ON EVEN HIGHER PRICE BRACKET PHONES.
      
      
      -> BUILD QUALITY - GOOD RUBBERIZED FINISH AT THE BACK MAKES YOU FEEL GOOD WHILE HOLDING. BUILD IS FAR BETTER THAN THOSE PLASTICY SAMSUNG PHONES.
      
      
      NEGATIVES:
      
      
      -> 3.5 " SCREEN MAY CAUSE PROBLEMS FOR SOME PEOPLE WHILE TYPING BUT SONY XPERIA U HAS SWYPE KEYBOARD PRE-INSTALLED WHICH MAKES TYPING MUCH EASIER.
      
      
      -> NO OS UPGRADATION - YES, ITS OFFICIAL, THERE WILL BE NO JELLY BEAN FOR XPERIA U. BUT, THERE ARE NO DRASTIC CHANGES IN JELLY BEAN AS COMPARED TO ICS SO I GUESS ICS IS FAIR ENOUGH. THERE ARE A FEW BUGS IN ICS BUT SONY IS GOING TO ROLL OUT UPDATES FOR XPERIA U, SOLA AND GO TO RECTIFY A FEW BUGS. THE UPDATES HAVE BEEN CERTIFIED AND SHALL BE AVAILABLE SOON.
      
      
      -> FIXED STORAGE MEMORY OF 8GB - USER MEDIA STORAGE IS JUST 4GB BUT WITH USB OTG YOU CAN EXPAND YOUR MEMORY WHENEVER YOU WANT.
      
      
      OVERALL, I WOULD HAPPILY GIVE 4.5 STARS AND WOULD RECOMMEND THIS TO THOSE WHO SEEK QUALITY, GOOD ENOUGH PERFORMANCE, GOOD CAMERA, MODERATELY SIZED SCREEN AND AN EXCELLENT MUSIC EXPERIENCE.....

label: Xperia U
Sentences:
THE PHONE PERFORMS SLOWER THAN USUAL BECOZ OF LESS FREE RAM.
      
      1) AFTER UPGRADING CHECK UR FREE RAM....SETTINGS->APPS->RUNNING (IT WILL SHOW ~50 MB)
      
      2) SWITCH OFF THE PHONE AND REMOVE THE SIM.
      
      3) TURN ON THE PHONE AND RESET FACTORY SETTINGS (NO NEED TO DELETE DATA THOUGH)
      
      4) LET THE PHONE RESTART AND THEN TURN IT OFF
      
      5) INSERT SIM AND START THE PHONE
      
      6) CHECK FREE RAM ( SHUD BE ~150 MB)
      
      AND U R DONE............THIS IS THE PROBLEM FOR ALL ANDROID PHONES AFTER UPGRADING.

label: Xperia U
Sentences:
I AM WRITING THIS REVIEW AFTER USING THE PHONE FOR A WEEK.
      
      TO START THINGS OFF, LET ME CLEAR THE AIR ABOUT ITS BUILT IN  MEMORY. ITS GOT A TOTAL OF 8GB INTERNAL MEMORY,(NOT EXPANDABLE)  OF WHICH :
      
      2GB IS FOR THE OS;
      
      2GB IS ALLOCATED ONLY FOR APPS(WITH ABOUT 1.5GB FREE).
      
      REMAINING 4GB IS FOR USERS.
      
      I FEEL THIS IS ENOUGH FOR MOST USERS. THOSE WHO WANT TO WATCH LOTS OF MOVIES CAN USE "USB ON THE GO". SO THE MISSING SD CARD SLOT IS NOT A BIG PROBLEM.
      
      
      PROS:
      
      1.ITS GOT AN AMAZING MUSIC PLAYER(AS WITH MOST SONY DEVICES).
      
      
      2.THE PROCESSOR(DUAL-CORE 1 GHZ CORTEX-A9) HANDLES ANYTHING YOU THROW AT IT. ITS GOT AN ABOVE AVERAGE GPU(MALI-400MP) THAT CAN RUN MOST HD GAMES WITHOUT LAGGING.
      
      
      3.THE BRAVIA ENGINE POWERED DISPLAY IS CRISP, AND COLOURS ARE RICH.
      
      
      4.THE ILLUMINATION BAR IS REALLY COOL. IT CAN BE CUSTOMIZED USING THE ILLUMINATION BAR APP.
      
      THE BACK COVER IS MADE FROM RUBBERIZED PLASTIC WHICH GIVES IT A PREMIUM FEEL.
      
      THE BUTTONS ON THE SIDE WORK WELL AND HAVE GOOD FEEDBACK.
      
      FOR THE COLOUR OBSESSED PEOPLE OUT THERE ,THE BLACK PLASTIC BENEATH THE SEE-THROUGH STRIP CAN BE UNCLIPPED AND REPLACED WITH SOMETHING BRIGHTER.
      
      ALL OF THIS COMES TOGETHER TO GIVE THE SONY XPERIA U A QUALITY, WELL-MADE FEEL, THAT APES THE DESIGN OF THE HIGH-END SONY XPERIA S WELL.
      
      
      CONS:
      
      1.ITS CAMERA ISNT THE BEST AROUND. BUT FOR THE PRICE POINT IT SHOOTS GOOD PHOTOS AND AVERAGE VIDEOS.
      
      
      2.IT SHIPS WITH THE OLDER GINGERBREAD OS. EAGERLY WAITING FOR ICS UPDATE WHICH PROMISES BETTER BATTERY LIFE, AND PERFORMANCE.
      
      
      IT IS 12MM THICK. SOME COMPETITORS ARE SLIMMER. BUT IT DOSE'NT FEEL VERY BULKY.
      
      
      IN CONCLUSION,
      
      IT IS THE BEST PHONE IN THE MARKET FOR THE 16000 PRICE POINT. ANY PHONE IN THE MARKET COMES WITH  ITS OWN PROS AND CONS, BUT IN XPERIA U  PROS OUTWEIGH CONS, SO JUST GO AHEAD AND BUY IT.

label: Xperia U
Sentences:
I BOUGHT MY XPERIA U ABOUT 1 YEAR BACK, AND NEEDLESS TO SAY, I HAD SO MANY PEOPLE TELLING ME TO GO FOR OTHER MODELS LIKE A SAMSUNG GALAXY S, OR A MOTOROLA DEFY. I STARTED GETTING INFLUENCED BY PEOPLES REMARKS ABOUT ITS LOW BATTERY LIFE, AND LACK OF EXTERNAL STORAGE.
      
      
      BUT TO BE HONEST, THE PHONE COMPENSATES FOR ALL THAT IT LACKS.
      
      
      I BOUGHT IT FOR ABOUT RS. 15,000 WHEN IT FIRST CAME. IM IMMENSELY HAPPY WITH THE NIFTY DESIGN, AND HOW SUPER-LIGHT IT IS. THE BACK FEELS GOOD TO HOLD, AND A PHONE WITH A DUAL CORE PROCESSOR UNDER 16K IS QUITE HARD TO FIND, AT LEAST NOT UPTO THE QUALITY OF SONY.
      
      
      THE BUILD IS GREAT, FUNCTIONS ARE SMOOTH, AND HAS A REALLY GREAT DISPLAY, THOUGH SMALLER THAN I WANTED, BUT THATS OK. I LOVE TAKING PHOTOS WHEREVER I GO, AND XPERIA U IS A GREAT DEVICE TO DO SO. SHARP PHOTOS, WITH AUTO-ZOOM, AND A 720P HD VIDEO RECORDER, IT STILL AMAZES ME HOW SONY PUT UP THIS PHONE FOR A LOW PRICE. PLUS, NOT THAT ITS IMPORTANT OR ANYTHING, THE LITTLE COLOUR-CHANGING TRANSPARENT STRIP AT THE BOTTOM, IS A UNIQUE AND EXCITING FINISH TO WHAT IS A GREAT PHONE.
      
      
      AFTER ONE YEAR, IM STILL CONTENT WITH MY XPERIA U. IVE HAD NO PROBLEMS WITH IT SO FAR, AND AM COMPLETELY HAPPY WITH IT.
      
      
      I HAVE TO ADMIT, I AM A LITTLE DISAPPOINTED WITH THE LACK OF SPACE, AS I USE MY PHONE LARGELY FOR LISTENING TO MUSIC, AND AM LIMITED TO THE NUMBER OF SONGS I HAVE. AND THE BATTERY LIFE COULD DEFINITELY BE BETTER.
      
      
      BUT OVERALL, XPERIA U IS A GREAT PHONE FOR PEOPLE HAVING A LOW BUDGET IN MIND, AND STILL WANTING THE QUALITY OF A SONY PRODUCT.
      
      
      IF YOU'RE LOOKING AT A PHONE AROUND 10-15K, BY ALL MEANS, XPERIA U IS A GREAT PHONE.
      
      DONT LET SOME MINOR DEFECTS PUT YOU OFF (OR OTHER PEOPLES NEGATIVE COMMENTS)!

      PROS:
      
      1) HIGH PPI SCREEN - TEXT IS SHARPER
      
      2) FANCY ILLUMINATION BAR
      
      3) RUBBERISED FEELON THE BACK - GOOD GRIP
      
      4) REMOVABLE BATTERY

      GUYS I'M USING IT FROM ALMOST 4 MONTHS & I'M VERY MUCH SATISFIED WITH THE PERFORMANCE OF THIS PHONE FROM SONY .... FOLLOWING ARE SOME OF THE MAIN HIGHLIGHTS OF THIS PHONE

      2. PERFORMANCE : DUAL-CORE @ THIS PRICE RANGE IS RARE TO FIND. I'VE ENCOUNTERED VERY LESS NO. OF OR RARELY ANY LAGS, FREEZES WHEN PLAYING COMPARATIVELY HEAVY-GRAPHICS GAMES LIKE BLOOD & GLORY
      
      3. CAMERA : PICTURE QUALITY OF IMAGES IS JUST ABOVE AVERAGE, BUT 720P VIDEO QUALITY IS VERY GOOD... PROVIDED YOU SHOULD BE CAREFUL/ SLOW WHILE PANNING ... OTHERWISE YOU'LL HAVE TO SUFFER SOME WOBBLES

      CONS:
      
      1. MEMORY : I WONT SAY ITS A REAL DEAL-BREAKER. 6 GIGS IS STILL FARE AMOUNT OF STORAGE. BUT IF YOU'RE A GADGET-GEEK & LIKE SPEND 4-5 HRS A DAY ... PLOWING FINGERS THRO PHONE, THEN THIS MEM-CONSTRAINT MAY END-UP IN FRUSTRATION

      IF YOU ARE LOOKING FOR AN EXTREMELY SLICK ANDROID PHONE AND WANTS TO  BROWSE, SIMULTANEOUSLY RUN SOME APPLICATIONS OR TO PLAY GRAPHIC RICH GAMES WITH EXTREME EASE THEN LOOK ELSEWHERE

label: Xperia U
Sentences:
FIRST THINGS FIRST - FLIPKART DELIVERY
      
      ORDERED THIS PHONE FOR MY WIFE, DELIVERY TOOK A BIT LONGER THAN MY PREVIOUS FLIPKART EXPERIENCES. WONDER WHY?
      
      
      COMING TO THE MAIN POINT
      
      I OWN A GALAXY NOTE FROM LAST 4 MONTHS. I ALWAYS ADMIRE HOW SAMSUNG CHANGED THEIR PRODUCTSCAPE IN LCD/LED TELEVISION AND MOBILE MARKET AND I REALIZED WHY WHEN I UNBOXED THE SONY XPERIA U.
      
      
      I WAS FRANTICALLY SEARCHING EVERYWHERE TO UNDERSTAND HOW TO TAKE THE BATTERY COVER OUT. ON CONTRARY THIS WAS THE FIRST THING I NOTICED WHEN I UNBOXED GALAXY NOTE. THEN YOU TUBE CAME TO THE RESCUE.
      
      
      NOT THAT I AM DEPENDENT ON THE MANUAL FOR OPERATING, BUT, MY WIFE WANTED SOME BASIC "HOW TO" AND SHE HAD TO DEPEND ON ME OR GOOGLE.
      
      
      SONY GROW UP! IF YOU WANT TO REMAIN IN COMPETITION, A LOT OF THINGS LIKE THIS MATTERS.
      
      
      THE PHONE PER SE IS GOOD. I LIKED THE BODY, IT DOESN'T HAVE  CHEAP PLASTIC FEEL. THE SIZE IS OK. CALL QUALITY WAS GOOD. STANDARD ANDROID INTERFACE FOR CONTACTS.
      
      
      THE HOME KEY, BACK KEY IN THE BOTTOM PART OF THE PHONE DOES NOT SEEM TO HAVE EVEN A "HOME","BACK" SYMBOL TO IDENTIFY. IT TOOK A WHILE FOR ME TO REALIZE THAT PLACEMENT OF THESE KEYS.
      
      
      MAY BE BECAUSE I HAVE BEEN USING GALAXY NOTE, THE SCREEN SEEMED TO BE TOO SMALL. BUT IT IS DECENT.
      
      
      THEY HAD GIVEN A SCREEN GUARD WITH IT, WHICH I COULDN'T FIX IT MYSELF, SO I ENDED UP WITH BUBBLES AND HAD TO FINALLY THROW IT. I AM USING IT WITHOUT THE SCREEN GUARD,  I DON'T KNOW IF IT IS NEEDED OR PRESCRIBED BY SONY.  AGAIN A MANUAL WOULD HAVE HELPED.
      
      
      IS IT A CORNING GUERILA GLASS - I DON'T KNOW, COULDN'T FIND IT?
      
      
      HAD TONS OF USELESS APPS PRE-LOADED. FELT SPAMMED THE MOMENT THE PHONE WENT ALIVE DUE TO THIS. UNINSTALLED EVERYTHING.
      
      
      DON'T KNOW HOW TO GET AN ICS UPGRADE. AGAIN NOTHING MENTIONED. I KNOW GOOGLE WILL RESCUE.
      
      
      I MADE A CONFERENCE CALL, AND IT WAS UNSUCCESSFUL DUE TO THE NETWORK ISSUE. BUT WHEN I CALLED MY FRIED AFTER THIS, I COULDN'T HEAR THE VOICE FROM THE OTHER SIDE. I HAD TO RESTART MY PHONE TO FIX IT. BUG? I GUESS SO.
      
      
      PRETTY SLOW BROWSING EXPERIENCE EVEN OVER A GOOD WIFI NETWORK.
      
      
      OVERALL, I UNDERSTAND I CAN'T EXPECT A NOTE FOR HALF ITS PRICE, BUT SAMSUNG LINE US IS TOUGH COMPETITION TO THIS PHONE. THE ONLY REASON I WENT FOR THIS IS TRUSTING THE DUAL CORE, AND ANDRIOD OS.
      
      PHONE IS AVERAGE I WOULD SAY, EVEN WHEN COMPARED TO THE SIMILAR SEGMENT, BUT THE EXPERIENCE SUCKS.

Sentences:
HI ALL,
      
      
      JUST TO MAKE THE REVIEW SIMPLE, I WOULD RATE THIS 7/10. IF THE CAMERA WAS GOOD ENOUGH, I WOULD HAVE LIKED A 8/10 PHONE. FOR, THE COLOUR SATURATION IS POOR, AND CLARITY/FOCUS ALSO NOT UPTO THE MARK.
      
      
      PROS: GOOD VALUE FOR MONEY, I HEARD ICS ANDROID 4.0 UPGRADE IS ASSURED.
      
      
      CONS:
      
      1. CAMERA IS NOT UPTO THE MARK FOR THIS 16K PHONE, ISSUES WITH COLOUR SATURATION AND CLARITY. THE EARLIER VERSION OF XPERIA MINI PRO, HAS BETTER CAMERA. THIS IS NOT NOTICEABLE IN THE LED SCREEN OF THE PHONE, WHICH ACTUALLY ENHANCES THE PICS. WHEN YOU LOAD AND VIEW ON PC, YOU WILL NOTICE.
      
      2. LIMITED 4 GB INTERNAL STORAGE IS NOT AN ISSUE FOR ME, IT HAS USB ON THE GO - I HAVE TRIED AND IT WORK FINE - A CABLE FOR RS 150 IS REQUIRED.
      
      3. OTHER MINOR SOFTWARE ISSUES - WHICH OBVIOUSLY NO ANDROID USERS NEED TO WORRY, AS FIXES WOULD BE AVAILABLE FREE. I FACED CALLS GOING MUTE A FEW TIMES, BUT NOT AFTER ONE UPGRADE. PERHAPS IT IS NOT AN ISSUE ANYMORE.
      
      
      PROS: OTHER THAN THAT, IT IS GOOD ONE. VERY SMOOTH DISPLAY, FAST RESPONSIVE DUE TO 1 GHZ PROCESSOR, VERY GOOD RESOLUTION, BATTER LIFE/POWER EFFICIENCY IS GOOD FOR AN ANDROID PHONE. HAS GOT FRONT CAMERA, WHICH IS BETTER THAN MISSING MEMORY CARD SLOT (MEMORY SLOT CAN BE MANAGED WITH USB ON THE GO, BUT NOT FRONT CAM.

Sentences:
I BOUGHT THIS PHONE IN NOVEMBER AND USING IT SINCE.
      
      
      PROS:
      
      1. GUD SCREEN CLARITY.
      
      2. NO SUPPORT TO MEMORY CARD, STOPS YOU FROM KEEPING ALL JUNK ITEMS AND YOU KEEP YOUR PHONE DATA CLEAN.
      
      3. USB ON THE GO SUPPORT (THIS HELPS WHEN YOU RUN INTO MEMORY ISSUES FOR MOVIES)
      
      NOTE: USB ON THE GO IS NOT SUPPORTING CARD READERS.
      
      
      CONS:
      
      1.LOW SPEAKER SOUND. MANY A TIMES WITHOUT XLOUD ON, I WONT BE ABLE TO HEAR RINGTONES OUTSIDE.
      
      2. LOW SOUND IN HEADPHONES TOO.
      
      3. CAMERA TAKES A COUPLE OF SECONDS TO TAKE PHOTO AFTER YOU CLICK.
      
      4. BATTERY BACKUP IS LITTLE LOW.
      
      5. SCREEN LOVES FINGERPRINTS AND KEEPS THEM SAFE. YOU HAVE TO USE A NAPKIN TO WIPE THE SCREEN CLEAN.
      
      6. AT TIMES,PHONE LAGS FOR NO APPARENT REASON.
      
      
      A GUD PHONE, BUT BETTER PHONES ARE IN MARKET NOW.
      
      PLS THINK TWICE BEFORE BUYING

label: Xperia U
Sentences:
I TOOK THIS PHONE ON FEB 2013, I FELT VERY AWESOME TO USE THIS PHONE BECOZ ITS MY FIRST ANDROID PHONE. EVEN THOUGH THE BATTERY BACKUP SUCKS, I NEVER FELT ANY BAD DUE TO ITS AWESOME FEATURES. IT FULFILLED ALL MY EXPECTATIONS WITH A GOOD PERFORMANCE, RESOLUTION, SPEED ETC. I GOT AMAZED WITH THE FEATURES OF SCREENSHOT AND CAMERA BUTTON(BY WHICH U CAN TAKE PICS ON A SINGLE PRESS EVEN THE SCREEN IS LOCKED). IT WORKED MY FINE WHILE I WAS NAVIGATING TO  UNKNOWN PLACES. BUT SUDDENLY THINGS WENT WRONG...
      
      IT WENT ON FEW DROPS OF WATER WHILE I WAS WASHING MY HANDS, I IMMEDIATELY TOOK THE BATTERY OFF AND TOOK IT TO SERVICE CENTER, THEY KEPT IT A DAY AND REPLIED ME AS "IT IS WATER DAMAGED, NO ONE CAN DO ANY THING". I WAS SHOCKED TO LISTEN THAT, I THOUGHT THEY ARE NOT CORRECT BECOZ MY STRONG FEELING IS "HOW CAN A 15K PHONE BECOME DEAD WITH A FEW DROPS OF WATER, IT MAY NOT BE FULLY WATER RESIST, BUT WOULD BE ENOUGH RESIST FOR SMALL SORT OF DROPS.' I TOOK TO 2 TO 3 SERVICE CENTERS AND EVEN LOCAL CENTERS, I SPENT ONE COMPLETE WEEK IN MAKING UP THIS PHONE BETTER, BUT THINGS DOESNT WENT GOOD.
      
      IT WAS GONE AND IT WILL BECOME OK IF U CHANGE COME MOTHER BOARD(WHICH WORTH 7 TO 8K). IT BECAME USELESS AND NOW I DONT HAVE ANY INTREST TO BUY ONE MORE PHONE. I WENT BACK TO MY NOKIA 7210.
      
      MY SINCERE SUGGESTION IS PLEASE DONT TAKE THIS PHONE IF U CANNOT HANDLE IT PROPERLY(BECOZ IT SHOULD BE HANDLED SUCH THAT NO DUST, NO WATER SHOULD TOUCH IT).... :-(

      POOR TOUCH SCREEN(IT'S TOUCH SCREEN IS NOT SO GOOD.TOUCH SENSITIVITY IS VERY POOR AT A PORTION)
      
      POOR QUALITY INBUILT SPEAKER(BUT, SOUND OUTPUTTED THROUGH IT'S 3.5MM JACK IS GOOD.)
      
      
      MY OPINION ABOUT THIS PHONE:
      
      
      HEY GUYS,
      
      I BOUGHT THIS PHONE FROM FLIPKART... IN THE BEGINNING, IT WORKED WELL.. THE MOST WONDERFUL THING IN IT IS IT'S USB OTG SUPPORT... THIS FEATURE IS NOT AVAILABLE IN MOST OF THE OTHER SMARTPHONES.. BUT LATER, I NOTICED IT'S POOR TOUCH SCREEN.. TOUCH SENSITIVITY IS VERY POOR COMPARED TO OTHER COMPETETORS..IT IS DUE TO THIS REASON THAT TYPING IS DIFFICULT IN IT. (BUT, YOU CAN CONNECT EVEN A COMPUTER USB KEYBOARD TO IT)
      
      THE PROCESSOR DOES A GOOD JOB.. BUT, IT DOSENT SUPPORT 1080P VIDEOS.. PLAYING 1080P VIDEOS ARE LAGGING, EVEN IF WE HAVE MX PLAYER IN IT..
      
      HOWEVER, OVERALL LOOKS ARE GOOD.. CAMERA QUALITY TOO..
      
      IT'S CAMERA IS SIMILAR TO THE SONY CYBERSHOT. WE CAN EVEN TAKE 3D PHOTOS WITH IT.. DAYLIGHT PHOTOS ARE AWESOME.. BUT, LOW LIGHT PHOTOS ARE POOR.. IT'S 720P VIDEOS ARE ALSO GOOD.
      
      
      SO, IF U NEED A BETTER CAMERA, SPEED AND USB CONNEVTIVITY, AND DO NOT CARE ABOUT TOUCH SENSITIVITY, GO FOR IT..

label: Xperia Z
Sentences:
AFTER MANY YES'ES AND MANY NO'S, I'M REALLY HAPPY AND GLAD THAT I OWN THIS SMARTPHONE. WELL IF YOU'RE HERE, SEEKING ABOUT REVIEWS OF THIS PHONE THEN YOU MUST HAVE ALREADY HEARD A LOT OF NEGATIVE REVIEWS LIKE IT HAS POOR VIEWING ANGLES, GETS HEATED UP AND BLA BLA. I WOULD JUST ADVISE YOU, ONLY GO WITH REVIEW WHICH HAS A CERTIFIED REVIEW BADGE AND THE ONES WHO'VE BOUGHT THE PHONE IN REAL AS HERE, MOST OF THE REVIEWERS DON'T EVEN HAVE THE PHONE NOR PLAN TO HAVE IT BUT STILL ARE WRITING REVIEWS TO DOWNTRODDEN THE ONES WHO'RE WILLING TO BUY IT. BEING AN OWNER OF THE XPERIA Z, HERE'S MY PERSONAL NOTE REGARDING THE SAME-
      
      
      1. IT'S A SMARTPHONE. THERE ISN'T ANY SMARTPHONE OUT THERE WHICH DOESN'T GETS HEATED UP WHEN YOU PLAY LOW/HIGH GRAPHICS GAMES, SURF THE INTERNET FOR A LONG TIME, WATCH MOVIES/VIDEOS, CALL UP SOMEONE AND TALK WITH THEM FOR QUIET A LONG TIME ETC. OF COURSE, ANY DEVICE WOULD GET HOT IF YOU DO THE ABOVE MENTIONED THINGS. BUT THE COOLEST THING ABOUT THIS DEVICE IS, WHEN IT HEATS UP YOU CAN COOL IT UP QUICKLY BY PLACING IT IN A BOWL OF WATER. THIS BEATS 'EM ALL.
      
      
      2. NO WONDER PEOPLE USE THEIR PHONES EITHER IN PORTRAIT MODE OR IN LANDSCAPE MODE, NO MATTER IN WHATEVER POSTURE THEY'RE. IF WE TALK ABOUT THE POOR VIEWING ANGLES THEN YES IT IS TRUE BUT I DON'T GET ONE THING, WHAT WOULD ONE GET BY VIEWING THEIR PHONE DIAGONALLY? I MEAN THERE WOULD HARDLY ANYONE WHO USES HIS/HER PHONE DIAGONALLY FROM A CERTAIN ANGLE.
      
      
      3. XPERIA Z COMES WITH A JELLY BEAN VERSION OF 4.1.2 AND STILL THIS IS BIG QUESTION FOR MANY OF THE PEOPLE THAT WHY IT DOESN'T COMES WITH THE LATEST VERSION OF 4.2? GUYS, CAN'T YOU HAVE SOME PATIENCE? IT'S BEEN SAID THAT THE PHONE CAN BE UPGRADED TO 4.2 SO WHY NOT JUST WAIT FOR THE OFFICIAL UPDATE OTA? WITH 4.1.2 THE DEVICE PERFORMS EXTREMELY WELL AND SMOOTH, THERE AIN'T NO LAGS DURING NAVIGATION, EASE SCROLLING AND PROVIDES A GOOD USER EXPERIENCE.
      
      
      4. SOUND QUALITY IS AVERAGE. SONY IS WELL KNOWN TO PROVIDE RICH SOUND EXPERIENCE ON EARPHONES RATHER ON IT'S SPEAKERS. ACTUALLY, THE PLACEMENT OF THE SPEAKER IS NOT WELL. DUE TO IT'S ALIGNMENT IN THE BOTTOM RIGHT, IT FEELS LIKE THE MUSIC PLAYS ON ONE HALVE OF THE SPEAKER. BUT ANYWAYS, THE SOUND IS SUPERB ON ANY EARPHONES.
      
      
      5. CAMERA QUALITY IS SUPERB, BOTH PRIMARY AND SECONDARY ONE. I ESPECIALLY LOVED, FRONT CAMERA'S CLARITY. SKYPING IS MUCH CLEAR WITH THE 2.2 MP CAM!
      
      
      6. BATTERY'S STAND BY TIME IS A BIT ABOVE THE AVERAGE AT IT'S BEST. THE PHONE TAKES AROUND 30 MINUTES TO GET FULLY CHARGED WHILE AT IT'S DISCHARGED STATE. BEING A SMARTPHONE, THE BATTERY WILL DRAIN THE MOMENT YOU START PLAYING GAMES, WATCHING VIDEOS OR SURFING THE INTERNET. STILL IT'S TOTALLY COOL COZ THE AVERAGE USAGE OF THE BATTERY IS AROUND 4-5 HOURS IF YOU USE IT CONTINUOUSLY. IN THE END, BATTERY LIFE IS DECENT FOR HEAVY USE.
      
      
      7. THE PHONE'S DURABILITY IS THE HIGHLIGHTS OF THIS DEVICE. I  BET YOU MUST HAVE DEVELOPED YOUR ENGROSSMENT WHEN YOU'D HAVE SEEN IT GETTING WASHED WITH WATER. BOOYEAH! THE WATERPROOF AND DUST RESISTANT FEATURES ARE THE TOP NOTCH MERITS OF XPERIA Z. EVERY PORT HAS IT'S SAFETY GEARS WHICH HELP THEM FROM STAYING OUT OF THE WATER. THE SPEAKER AND MIC ARE MADE WATERPROOF SO IT DOESN'T NEEDS ANY ATTENTION IF WATER GETS INTO IT. MAKE SURE THAT ALL YOUR FLAPS ARE CLOSED WHEN YOU DIP IT IN THE WATER FOR A TEST OR IT GETS WET DUE TO RAIN OR SOMETHING ELSE AS SONY WON'T HOLD ANY RESPONSIBILITIES IF THE PHONE IS MADE CONTACT WITH WATER WITH THE FLAPS OPEN. AS IT WILL MAKE YOUR PHONE SUFFER!
      
      
      8. VOICE AND CALL CLARITY IS AS CLEAN AS WATER. WITH SONY'S MICROPHONE NOISE SUPPRESSION, ONE CAN REDUCE THE BACKGROUND NOISE DURING A CALL. YOU CAN ALSO SET THE CALL EQUALIZER TO BRIGHT OR SMOOTH FOR MORE BETTER SURROUNDING SOUND. YOU CAN ALSO GET A RICHER VOICE LISTENING EXPERIENCE DURING CALLS BY ENABLING SPEAKER VOICE ENHANCEMENT.
      
      
      9. INTERNAL MEMORY IS OF 16GB OUT OF WHICH USER AVAILABLE IS 11 GB. THIS IS WELL ENOUGH FOR YOUR MUSIC AND PICTURES. FOR STORING YOUR HD MOVIES, YOU CAN UPGRADE YOUR STORAGE WITH A 32GB/64GB CARD.
      
      
      10. THE UI IS SOOTHINGLY RESPONSIVE AND LUSTROUS. IT PROVIDES A GOOD UX AND THE ALIGNMENT OF THE SHORTCUTS, WIDGETS AND APPS IS VERY WELL. THE DRAGON TRAIL GLASS ON THE BACKSIDE OF THE PHONE MAKES IT LOOKS ELEGANTLY SEXY. THE FRONT ONE IS A SHATTERPROOF GLASS WHICH IS NOT AVAILABLE YET ON ANY OTHER PHONES.
      
      
      TIPS:
      
      
      - WHILE PUTTING THE PROVIDED SCREEN GUARD ON TO THE PHONE, DON'T USE THE GIVEN PLASTIC PIECE AS WHILE YOU'RE FLATTENING THE SCREEN FROM ONE SIDE, THE OTHER SIDE MAY RESULT IN HAVING BUBBLES. USE A CREDIT/DEBIT/ID CARD HORIZONTALLY WHILE APPLYING THE LAMINATION SO AS  THE SCREEN STICKS APPROPRIATELY TO BOTH SIDES WITHOUT LEAVING BEHIND ANY BUBBLES.
      
      
      CONCLUSION:
      
      
      THIS SMARTPHONE IS WORTH OF YOUR EVERY BUCKS AND GIVES YOU A SUPERIOR PERSONALITY WHEN YOU HOLD IT. YOU WON'T LIKE TO PAY AROUND 45-50K FOR A PHONE WITH SIMILAR DESIGN ARCHITECTURE OF IT'S PREDECESSORS. THE ONLY PHONE WHICH CAN GIVE XPERIA Z A CLOSER COMPETITION WILL BE THE HTC ONE.

label: Xperia Z
Sentences:
HEY EVERYONE,
      
      
      THIS IS MY FIRST ANDROID SMARTPHONE.
      
      
      I AM PROUD TO OWN MY LOVELY XPERIA Z.
      
      
      IT HAS MADE ME FAMOUS AMONG MY FRIENDS AND COLLEAGUES AND THE PEOPLE WHO LOOK AT IT START WITH A WOW EXPRESSION ON THEIR FACE. AS I MENTIONED BEFORE THIS IS MY FIRST SMARTPHONE SO I AM JUST PUTTING MY EXPERIENCES WITH THIS PHONE WHICH IS NOT A TECHNICAL REVIEW LIKE OTHERS.
      
      
      DESIGN: THE DESIGN IS STUNNING. YOU WON'T FEEL LIKE HOLDING AN ORDINARY PHONE, IT IS RIGID, STRONG, DURABLE AND ABOVE ALL WATER PROOF. I WON'T COMMENT ON OTHER PHONES AS I HAVE NOT USED THEM.
      
      
      I AM QUITE SCARED ABOUT DOING DROP TEST OR WATER RESISTANCE TEST AS I HAVE PAID A HUGE MONEY FOR THIS. BUT I HAVE TESTED IT BY PUTTING IT INSIDE A WATER MUG AND NOTHING HAPPENED WHICH SHOULD BE APPRECIATED.
      
      
      BATTERY: THE BATTERY DRAINS VERY QUICKLY WHICH IS VERY DISAPPOINTING. I KNOW ALL SMARTPHONES ARE LIKE THIS BUT I EXPECTED MORE FROM SONY. THE BATTERY STAMINA MODE DOES NOT MAKE MUCH DIFFERENCE OR NO DIFFERENCE AT ALL. I AM NOT USING MY PHONE FOR GAMING OR ANY PROCESSING RICH APPS BUT STILL THE BATTERY LASTS ONLY FOR AROUND 8-9 HOURS. I JUST BROWSE FOR AROUND 1 HOUR WHICH INCLUDES CHECKING MAILS, MAKING ONLINE TRANSACTION THROUGH NETBANKING, NOTHING MUCH.
      
      
      CAMERA: THE CEMERA IS GOOD BUT NOT SO GREAT. IN LOW LIGHT THE CLARITY IS NOT THERE AND I CAN SEE A LOT OF NOISE. OTHER THAN THIS, I HAVE NO ISSUES WITH THE CAMERA. IT HAS GOT A LOT OF FEATURES WHICH OTHER COMPETITORS ARE STILL SCRATCHING THEIR HEAD FOR.
      
      
      THE PHONE GETS HEATED UP SO MUCH THAT I CAN'T HOLD IT IN MY HANDS. THIS IS RIDICULOUS. IT MAY SOUND FUNNY BUT I PUT IT INTO WATER TO COOL IT DOWN. THEY SHOULD HAVE DONE SOMETHING TO PREVENT THE PHONE FROM GETTING SO HOT.
      
      
      CALL QUALITY: THE VOICE QUALITY ENHANCEMENTS IN THE SETTINGS SERIOUSLY WORKS AND IT MAKES A LOT OF DIFFERENCE. I HAD A LG GD510 BEFORE WHICH IS SO NOISY AND I HAD TO SCREAM FOR MY VOICE TO BE HEARD FOR THE PERSON ON THE OTHER SIDE. BUT THIS PHONE IS SO COOL, I CAN SPEAK WITH MY FRIENDS VERY SLOWLY AND STILL MY VOICE IS HEARD. THEY EVEN TOLD ME THAT MY VOICE IS CLEAR AND AUDIBLE THAN BEFORE EVEN THOUGH I SPOKE VERY SLOWLY. I AM VERY HAPPY WITH THIS.
      
      
      AUDIO: I HAVEN'T USED MY PHONE TO LISTEN SONGS MUCH TILL NOW. BUT I CAN TELL YOU THIS, THE SONGS ARE CLEARLY HEARD AND I CAN GET LOST WITH IT. BUT IT IS NOT SO LOUD LIKE OTHER PHONES WHICH I HAVE USED EARLIER. MY PREVIOUS PHONES, NOKIA BASIC SETS HAD A MUCH HIGH SOUND OUTPUT THAN THIS. BUT I AM NOT CONCERNED ABOUT THIS AS IT IS LOUD ENOUGH FOR ME TO HEAR IN MY HEADPHONES.
      
      
      THE HEADSET PROVIDED ALONG WITH THE PHONE AND THE SONY HEADPHONE WHICH IS PROVIDED FREE OF COST IS COOL, AWESOME AND I JUST LOVE IT. IT CAN BE TURNED, TWISTED AND ITS VERY FLEXIBLE. IT IS A GOOD CONTRIBUTION FROM SONY SIDE.
      
      
      I DO NOT SEE ANY ISSUES WITH THE VIEWING ANGLE, IT IS VISIBLE FOR ME. I HOPE OTHERS HAVE PROBLEMS WITH THEIR EYES. BUT THE SCREEN IS NOT SO VISIBLE WHEN I AM OUTSIDE SAY IN BRIGHT SUN LIGHT. I HAVE TO KEEP MY HAND OVER THE PHONE TO HAVE A CLEAR VIEW OF THE DISPLAY OR MOVE TO SHADY PLACE. I DO NOT SEE THIS AS A ISSUE AS IT IS THERE IN OTHER PHONES TOO.
      
      
      I LIKE KEEPING WALLPAPERS OF MY FAVORITE ACTRESSES BUT IT DRAINS BATTERY VERY BADLY SO I ENDED UP HAVING A BLANK DISPLAY WITH NO WALLPAPER. THIS IS BIG DISAPPOINTMENT FOR ME.
      
      
      THE POSITION OF THE SPEAKERS AT THE RIGHT BOTTOM IS SOMEWHAT WRONG WHICH IS ALREADY DISCUSSED IN MANY REVIEWS ON INTERNET. THE PROBLEM WITH THIS DESIGN IS YOU CAN'T HEAR THE SOUND WHEN YOU ARE PLAYING GAMES AS MOST PEOPLE TEND TO KEEP THEIR FINGERS OVER THE FOUR CORNERS OF THE PHONE WHICH BLOCKS THE SOUND COMPLETELY. I HAVE GOT USED TO IT BUT NOT SURE ABOUT THE OTHERS. THE ONLY ADVANTAGE I CAN SEE FROM THIS DESIGN IS THAT THE RINGTONE CAN BE HEARD EVEN IF THE PHONE IS DEEP INSIDE THE POCKET.
      
      
      SOME PEOPLE HAVE REPORTED THAT THE WIFI IS TURNED OFF WHEN THE SCREEN IS LOCKED BUT I DON'T HAVE ANY SUCH ISSUE.
      
      
      THERE IS A HOLE LOT OF FEATURES AVAILABLE IN THE PHONE. I HAVE USED ONLY FEW OF THEM AND THERE IS A LOT YET TO BE DISCOVERED.
      
      
      SONY HAS PROVIDED THE PHONE SOFTWARE UPDATE VERY QUICKLY AS PROMISED BUT THEY SHOULD MAKE IT QUICK LIKE SAMSUNG AND DELIGHT THEIR CUSTOMERS.
      
      
      I AM TELLING YOU THIS AGAIN, I AM NOT REVIEWING THE PHONE, I AM JUST PUTTING WORDS ABOUT MY EXPERIENCES WITH THIS PHONE TILL NOW.
      
      
      IT HAS BEEN 2 WEEKS ON AND I LOVE MY XPERIA Z VERY BADLY. PEOPLE ARE CRAZY ABOUT MY PHONE.
      
      
      GO FOR IT, I STRONGLY RECOMMEND IT TO EVERYONE.

label: Xperia Z
Sentences:
I AM USING THE SONY XPERIA Z FOR MORE THAN A MONTH NOW, AND MY REVIEW IS THE RESULT OF THAT USER EXPERIENCE.
      
      
      WHAT'S HOT:  THE IMPRESSIVE FULL HD SCREEN.  PHOTOS AND VIDEOS RENDER BETTER ON THIS SCREEN THAT ON THE COMPUTER MONITOR.  A RECENT FIRMWARE UPDATE THAT ENABLES CALIBRATING THE SCREEN WARMTH HAS IMPROVED MATTERS EVEN FURTHER.  WHILE PLAYING GAMES, I USE THE "SCREEN FILTER" APP TO FURTHER DARKEN THE SCREEN.
      
      
      WHAT'S NOT: THE ABYSMAL LIFE OF THE BATTERY.  WHILE IT MAY BE 2300 MAH, WHEN HANDLING HD GAMES, THE DRAIN IS SIGNIFICANT.  WHILE THIS IS DUE TO THE POWER CONSUMPTION OF THE FULL HD SCREEN, IT MEANS THAT ONE NEEDS TO CART AN ENERGY BANK ALONG, IF YOU ARE USING THE PHONE CONTINUOUSLY THROUGH THE DAY RATHER THAN INTERMITTENTLY.
      
      
      POINT-BY-POINT:
      
      
      [1]  THE DUST AND WATER RESISTANCE FEATURES OF THIS PHONE ARE SUPERB.  I ACTUALLY USED THIS PHONE OUTDOORS DURING A DOWNPOUR FOR PHOTOGRAPHY.  WHILE IT DIDN'T GET ALL RAINY WET, THERE WAS WATER EXPOSURE, SO YES, THIS FEATURE DID COME HANDY.  ACTUALLY, THE EXISTENCE OF THIS FEATURE ENCOURAGED ME TO USE IT FOR PHOTOGRAPHY IN THE RAIN!
      
      
      [2]  I CAME FROM AN AMOLED SCREEN TO THIS SCREEN, SO I SET THE SCREEN TINT SLIGHTLY BLUISH.  IT SURELY HOLDS ITS OWN.  FULL HD VIDEOS LOOK GREAT ON THIS 5 INCH SCREEN, WITH THE BRAVIA ENGINE ENABLED.
      
      
      [3]  THE LOUDSPEAKER ON THIS PHONE HAS RECEIVED CRITICISM FOR ITS PERFORMANCE.  IN MY EXPERIENCE, IN A QUIET PLACE, ONE HAS TO ACTUALLY TONE DOWN THE VOLUME.  BUT, WITH CITY NOISE, PERHAPS THEY COULD IMPROVE ON THE VOLUME.  FOR MOST PURPOSES, THE SPEAKER WORKS; BUT FOR GOOD BASS YOU WILL NEED TO USE THE EARPIECE.
      
      
      [4]  THE IN-EAR HEADPHONES ARE GOOD.  THERE IS ALSO AN ADDITIONAL SET OF HEADPHONES THAT CAME FREE BACK THEN, [THAT OFFER SEEMS TO HAVE BEEN DISCONTINUED], AND THOSE GIVE AN EVEN BETTER MUSICAL EXPERIENCE.
      
      
      [5]  FOR THE FIRST DAY OR TWO, I USED THE FREE PHONE CASING.  BUT, THE PHONE'S PURPLE BODY COLOUR FELT SO RICH WHEN I GLANCED AT ITS TOP WHILE LOOKING AT MY SHIRT POCKET, IT CONTRASTED WITH THE FEEBLE WHITE OF THE CASE, AND I'M NOT USING THAT CASE ANY MORE.
      
      
      [6]  THE STRUCTURE OF THE PHONE IS GOOD, ESPECIALLY WHEN ONE PLACED IT ON THE DESK.  ITS NOT VERY HEAVY EITHER, AND I CAN EASILY HOLD IT IN ONE HAND.
      
      
      [7]  THE QUAD-CORE PROCESSOR MEANS THAT EVERYTHING WORKS IN A SNAP.  WHILE THE NERDS MIGHT COMPLAIN THAT IT DOESN'T HAVE THE "LATEST" JELLYBEAN, WHAT IT HAS IS GOOD ENOUGH FOR EVERYTHING.  THE 2 GB RAM ALSO SPEEDS UP THINGS.
      
      
      [8]  WHILE INTERNATIONALLY, SONY PROVIDES FREE SUBSCRIPTION TO "VIDEOS UNLIMITED", IN INDIA THEY SEEM TO HAVE SUBSTITUTED THAT WITH "SONY LIV" WHICH BASICALLY PROVIDES RERUNS OF SHOWS ON SONY TV CHANNELS.  I TRIED OUT ONLY A COUPLE OF THEM, AND BOTH WERE UNIFORMLY POOR IN VIDEO CAPABILITY, AND VERY LO-RES TO BOOT.  THERE IS ALSO A TEMP FREE SUBSCRIPTION TO SONY MUSIC, ANOTHER APP IN DEVELOPMENT.  ITS "TOP SONGS" LISTING IS AT VARIANCE WITH THE HOTTEST ITEMS ON MUSIC CHANNELS, AND ITS SEARCH FEATURE DOESN'T ALLOW YOU TO KEY IN TEXT.  INSTEAD YOU HAVE TO SEARCH ALPHABETICALLY, WHICH GETS TO BE VERY CUMBERSOME.
      
      
      [9]  THE CAMERA ON THIS PHONE IS SUPERB, AS WELL AS THE FULL HD VIDEO CAMERA.  THERE IS A SUPERIOR AUTO MODE ON THIS CAMERA, WHICH TAKES BETTER SHOTS THAN THE ONES I TRIED WITH MANUAL SETTINGS.  BUT THEN, I'M NOT AN EXPERT PHOTOGRAPHER.
      
      
      [10]  CALL QUALITY IS GOOD, DATA TRANSFER IS NOT A PROBLEM.
      
      
      [11]  THE FM RADIO IS GOOD WITH SUPERB STEREO; BUT THEIR FM RADIO APP IS WANTING.  THE ONE ON MY PREVIOUS SAMSUNG GALAXY S HAD A BETTER INTERFACE AND USABILITY FEATURES.
      
      
      [12]  THE BEST FEATURE ON THIS PHONE IS ITS NEAR STOCK-ANDROID THAT ENABLES INSTANT START-UP.  COMING FROM THE ENDLESS MINUTES WAITING FOR THE SAMSUNG TO COME TO LIFE, THIS WAS A REFRESHING CHANGE, AS THE PHONE IS READY TO USE LITERALLY WITHIN SECONDS.
      
      
      [13]  SO, WE COME TO THE END OF THE LINE, AND THAT IS THE AWFUL BATTERY.  PERHAPS THERE IS SOME GENUINE PROBLEM IN THEIR BATTERIES, OR MAYBE THE FULL HD SCREEN IS A GAS GUZZLER; BUT, AT ANY RATE, YOU WILL NEED TO CARRY ALONG A LARGISH ENERGY BANK IF YOU ARE USING THIS PHONE THROUGHOUT THE DAY WITH ITS SCREEN ON.  THERE IS A STAMINA MODE ON THE PHONE, BUT IF YOU ARE USING WIFI, AND GAMES, AND WHAT NOT, ITS NOT GOING TO BE OF ANY HELP.  IF YOU ARE WILLING TO SHUT THESE DOWN, AND USE THE PHONE IN DUMB MODE, JUST FOR CALLING, THEN ONE SINGLE CHARGE WILL RUN FOR 4 DAYS AND 21 HOURS.
      
      
      THE MANUFACTURERS CLAIM A 550 HOUR STANDBY TIME, WHICH IS MISLEADING, BECAUSE MY TESTS INDICATE SOMETHING IN THE RANGE OF 270-330 HOURS AT BEST.  THE STAMINA MODE WILL GIVE 120 HOURS AT MOST.  SO, THEY EITHER NEED TO REVIEW THE DATA IN THEIR WHITE-PAPER, OR GO BACK TO THE DRAWING BOARD ON MAKING THE BATTERY SWAPPABLE/ HOT-SWAPPABLE.
      
      
      SO, THAT'S MY EXPERIENCE.  WOULD I BUY A SONY XPERIA Z AGAIN?  MOST DEFINITELY YES, DESPITE THAT POOR BATTERY.  AND THE PURPLE COLOUR DOES LOOK KEWL.

label: Xperia Z
Sentences:
I PURCHASED THE XPERIA Z FROM A STORE AFTER SPENDING HOURS LOOKING THROUGH THE SPECS ON FLIPKART - A DECISION I REGRETTED QUICKLY WHEN I REALIZED THEY ONLY HAD THE LEATHER CASE IN WHITE (WHICH REALLY IS NOT USE WHEN THE PHONE YOU'RE BUYING AS JET BLACK).
      
      
      ANYWAY...I HAVE USED SONY PHONES BEFORE, FROM THE TIME WHEN THEY WERE SONY ERICSSON AND APPLE WAS YET TO LAUNCH THE IPHONE. MY EXPERIENCE WITH THAT UN-SMART PHONE WAS PRETTY GOOD (STREETS AHEAD OF THE MOTOROLA AND SAMSUNG PHONE I HAD THE MISFORTUNE TO USE), AND SO WHEN I TOO GOT ON THE ANDROID BANDWAGON, IT WAS WITH AN XPERIA NEO V (WHICH I DID PURCHASE FROM FLIPKART).
      
      
      I DID CONSIDER SEVERAL OPTIONS WHEN LOOKING TO BUY A NEW PHONE, AND LOOKED VERY CLOSELY AT THE SAMSUNG RANGE (GRAND, S3, NOTE2), BEFORE BEING DAZZLED BY THE MONOLITHIC BEAUTY OF THE XPERIA Z, SO REMINISCENT OF 2001: A SPACE ODYSSEY (AND THE SPECS, OF COURSE. I'M NO LUDDITE)
      
      
      ANYWAY, TO GET DOWN TO IT:
      
      THE GOOD:
      
      1. THE DEVICE IS A THING OF BEAUTY. THE PHOTOS DO NOT DO JUSTICE TO HOW THE XPERIA Z LOOKS IN THE HAND. WHEN YOU SEE IT, YOU ARE LEFT WITH NO DOUBT WHATSOEVER THAT THIS IS A PREMIUM PRODUCT. NOT SINCE THE IPHONE 4 HAS A PHONE BEEN SO OBVIOUSLY CLASSY.
      
      2. THE SCREEN IS BEAUTIFUL. I KNOW, THE SPECS ALONE INDICATE IT TO BE AHEAD OF THE COMPETITION, BUT SEEING IS BELIEVING. IF YOU LIKE YOUR SCREEN TO LOOK LIKE AN EPISODE FROM A CHILDREN'S CARTOON, YOU MAY PREFER THE SAMSUNG PHONES, BUT IF ELEGANCE IS WHAT YOU STRIVE FOR, THE XPERIA Z HAS IT IN DOLLOPS.
      
      3. PERFORMANCE HAS BEEN STELLAR SO FAR. I'VE BEEN USING THE PHONE FOR TWO WEEKS AND AM A VERY HEAVY USER. THERE HASN'T BEEN A HINT OF LAG.
      
      4. THE CAMERA HAS BEEN EXCEPTIONAL IN GOOD LIGHTING CONDITIONS. HOWEVER, I HAVE NOT USED IT IN DIM LIGHTING YET.
      
      
      BAD:
      
      1. SOUND VOLUME IS ON THE LOWER SIDE AND THE SPEAKER IS AWKWARDLY PLACED, MAKING IT EASY TO COVER WITH YOUR HAND.
      
      2. THE SCREEN ATTRACTS SMUDGE MARKS LIKE FISH ATTRACTS CATS. HAVING SAID THAT, YOU CAN JUST WIPE THE SCREEN SMOOTH IF YOU HAVE A SOFT SCREEN CLOTH, SO THAT'S NOT REALLY A DISADVANTAGE.
      
      3. GLASS SURFACES ON BOTH SIDES = HIGH POTENTIAL FOR SCRATCHING. FOR ALL ITS RUGGEDNESS ONE ENDS UP USING IT VERY CAREFULLY FOR THIS REASON ALONE.
      
      4. BRILLIANT AS IT IS, THE PRICE COULD HAVE DONE WITH A HAIRCUT OF A COUPLE OF GRAND IN ORDER TO REALLY GRAB THE MARKET. AS IT STANDS, IT'S UNLIKELY TO TAKE SERIOUS MARKET SHARE FROM THE SAMSUNG-LOVING MASSES.
      
      
      UGLY:
      
      WELL, NOTHING REALLY, EXCEPT THAT, THANKS TO THE ADVERTISING CAMPAIGN, EVERYONE YOU SEE WANTS TO DUMP THE PHONE INTO WATER TO SEE IF IT'S REALLY WATER-RESISTANT.
      
      
      ALL IN ALL, IF YOU'RE LOOKING FOR A TOP-OF-THE-LINE PHONE, THE Z IS PROBABLY THE BEST VALUE FOR MONEY IN THE MARKET AT THE MOMENT. SINCE SONY DOES NOT TYPICALLY CUT PRICES TOO MUCH, THIS IS AS GOOD A TIME AS ANY TO BUY.

label: Xperia Z
Sentences:
I RECEIVED THE PHONE FROM FLIPKART 3 DAYS BACK. BUSINESS AS USUAL, THEIR SERVICE IS VERY GOOD.
      
      
      EXCELLENT PERFORMANCE IS EXPECTED FROM FLAGSHIP PHONES.
      
      SO, I WOULD LIST THE CONS FIRST: I FOUND THE CAMERA TO BE OUTRIGHT TERRIBLE. SURPRISING CONSIDERING MOST OF THE TOP MANUFACTURERS INCLUDING APPLE AND SAMSUNG USE A SONY CENSOR. THE IMAGE QUALITY IS SO BAD THAT IT CAN BE A DEAL BREAKER FOR THE ONES WHO CLICK A LOT OF PICS ON PHONE. HOPE, SONY COMES OUT WITH A SOLUTION FOR THIS AS SOON AS POSSIBLE.
      
      
      NOW THE PROS:
      
      1)THE DISPLAY IS VERY CRISP DETAILED AND NOT VERY REFLECTIVE. IMAGES AND VIDEOS AND TEXT ARE AMAZINGLY CLEAR, BUT THE DISPLAY MAY NOT BE VISUALLY APPEALING OVER IPS AND CURVED GLASS DISPLAYS. I PREFER THIS FOR DAILY USE (MORE KIND WITH THE EYES) OVER EYE POPPING DISPLAYS AND ONES WITH A LOT OF COLOR SATURATION.
      
      2) THE BUILD FEELS SOLID. I DID NOT GET A CHANCE TO CHECK IF IT CAN WITHSTAND FALLS YET.
      
      3) THE PERFORMANCE IS VERY SNAPPY. I HAVE USED IT HEAVILY IN THE PAST THREE DAYS. I DID NOT EXPERIENCE ANY LAG OR HANG. ITS DIRECT COMPETITORS LIKE S4 AND ONE WILL HAVE BETTER PROCESSORS, BUT IF SHEER BENCHMARKS ARE NOT YOUR CONCERN, THIS SPEED SHOULD SUFFICE.
      
      4)THE INTERFACE IS MINIMAL YET VERY POLISHED (AS POLISHED AS THE PHONE IS STYLISH) MAKING THE EXPERIENCE OF OPERATING THE PHONE A JOY.
      
      5) THE AUDIO QUALITY IS VERY GOOD BUT NOT LOUD ON SPEAKERS. THE VOICE CALL QUALITY IS VERY GOOD.
      
      6) IT MAY NOT BOAST SPECIAL FUTURISTIC FEATURES APART FROM IP 55 AND 57 CERTIFICATION, BUT IT HAS APPS AND TWEAKS TO ENHANCE BATTERY MANAGEMENT AND CUSTOMIZE PHONE THAT COULD BE USEFUL TO AT LEAST A FEW IN ONE OR THE OTHER WAY.
      
      7) ONE FULL BATTERY CHARGE CAN BE SUFFICIENT FOR MORE THAN A DAY BUT LESS THAN 2 DAYS WHICH IS RESPECTABLE FOR SMARTPHONES. IN THE LITTLE TIME I SPENT, I AM HAPPY WITH THE SEEMINGLY ABOVE AVERAGE BATTERY.
      
      
      I READ ONLINE THAT THERE ARE PHONE DEATH AND BATTERY HEATING ISSUES, WHICH I DID NOT FACE AND HENCE, I CANNOT COMMENT ON THEM.
      
      
      SUMMARY: THE EXPERIENCE IS SOLID DESPITE NOT HAVING A MILLION EXTRA FEATURES THAT IS THE NORM FOR FLAGSHIP PHONES. THE PHONE IS STYLISH NOT ONLY ON THE OUTSIDE BUT ALSO ON THE INTERFACE FRONT. DISPLAY AND CAMERA QUALITY ARE I THINK THE MOST IMPORTANT CONSIDERATIONS THAT PROSPECTIVE BUYERS MAY HAVE TO TAKE A CALL ON BEFORE MAKING THE DECISION. REST OF THE PHONE IS A SUPERB PACKAGE.

label: Xperia Z
Sentences:
JUST BOUGHT THE XPERIA Z (PURPLE) A FEW DAYS AGO. SO HERE GOES MY REVIEW:
      
      # DESIGN #  - SMOOTH, MINIMALISTIC AND VERY PREMIUM. IT TRULY IS ONE BEAUTIFUL PHONE.
      
      
      #SIZE & WEIGHT #  - IT IS A 5-INCH PHABLET SO PLEASE DONT EXPECT TO OPERATE IT WITH SINGLE-HANDEDLY. BUT IT DOES HAVE A GOOD FEEL TO IT AND A FIRM GRIP DESPITE IT HUGE SIZE, AS IT IS NARROW ENOUGH TO HOLD IT COMFORTABLY. IT MAY WEIGH 146G, BUT SURE FEELS VERY LIGHT!
      
      
      # DISPLAY #  - THE BIGGEST POSITIVE ABOUT SONY IS ITS BRAVIA 2 DISPLAY. MOVIES AND VIDEOS LOOK VERY LIFELIKE, YOU CANT HELP BUT GASP AT THE AMAZING READ HD DISPLAY QUALITY.
      
      
      # SPEED #  - A QUAD-CORE THAT PROVED LAG-LESS WITH EVERY TOUCH. I KEPT SEVERAL APPLICATIONS ON AT A TIME, AND STILL IT WORKED SMOOTHLY WITHOUT ANY GLITCHES.
      
      
      # CAMERA # - WORKS EFFECIENTLY, THE EXMOR RS TECH IN IT HELPS A LOT AND YOU CAN CLICK SHARP PHOTOS WITHOUT ANY WAIT ON PROCESSING. ALTHOUGH THE CAMERA APP DOES TAKE TIME TO START IN THE FIRST PLACE, BUT AFTER THAT ITS SMOOTH SAILING.
      
      
      # MUSIC # - ALTHOUGH IT HAS ONLY A SINGLE, MONO SPEAKER TUCKED IN ON THE SIDE..THE WALKMAN WORKS WONDERFULLY. YES, THIS DOESN'T GIVE A VERY LOUD SOUND AT THE HIGHEST VOLUME SETTING BUT IT DOES GIVE A VERY SMOOTH SOUND WHICH IS CLEAR ON AND OFF THE HEADPHONE USE USING THE 'CLEARAUDIO+' FEATURE BUILT IN.
      
      
      # APPS # - NOT MUCH BUILT IT, (BUT WHAT IS GOOGLE PLAY AND THE INTERNET FOR?) - THERE ARE SOME INTERNET BASED APPS LIKE EVERNOTE AND WHICH ARE NOT OF MUCH USE TO ME. THE OFFICE SUITE, NOTES (WITH BUILT IN AUDIO RECORDER!),ADOBE READER,VOICE DIALER HELP WITH DAILY DUTIES. THE X4 PLAYER PLAYS ALL KINDSA MOVIES THAT YOU UPLOAD ONTO YOUR PHONE/SD MEMORY.SOCIAL APPS - FACEBOOK, YOUTUBE (WITH WIDGET), SOCIALIFE, GMAIL, MESSENGER,GOOGLEPLUS, EMAIL ETC ARE BUILT IN.
      
      
      # GAMING # - SMOOTH AND CLEAR. THERE IS THE HOOKED,PLAYUP,GOOGLE PLAYSTORE,PLAY NOW APPS THAT HELP U DOWNLOAD/PLAY YOUR FAVOURITE GAMES.
      
      
      # TRAVEL # - NAVIGATE, LOCAL, WISEPILOT GUIDE YOUR JOURNEY OUTDOORS.
      
      
      # POWER # - BEING A PHABLET, AFTER SOME MEDIUM USAGE (CAMERA, A COUPLE OF VIDEOS AND SOME SONGS AND GENERAL PHONE USE) THE PHONE LASTED ABOUT 15 HOURS. WITH THE STAMINA MODE ON(WHICH SHUTS ALL UNNECESSARY APPS), IT WILL LAST A BIT MORE THAN A DAY WHICH IS FINE.
      
      
      SO HERE'S THE VERDICT -
      
      #PROS: SUPERB DISPLAY, GOOD CAMERA, PREMIUM BUILD AND DESIGN, VERY GOOD GAMING, SUPER FAST PROCESSING, SMOOTH AND CLEAR SOUND, THE MOVIES ARE FANTASTIC WHEN PLAYED ON XPERIA Z.
      
      P.S: THE FREE GOODIES LIKE THE HEADSET(VERY HIP!!!), EXTRA SCREEN GAURDS AND PREMIUM CASE THAT COME WITH IT ADD THE CHERRY ON TOP. I CAN TAKE THIS PHONE OUTDOORS AND EVEN ON A TRIP WITHOUT STRESSING ABOUT WEATHERING IT DOWN (THANKS TO THE DUSTPROOF, WATERPROOF TECH)
      
      
      #CONS: IF THERE BE ANY CON - SHOULD HAVE COME WITH SOME DECENT GAMES BUILT IN (COME ON,SONY - YOU OWN PLAYSTATION!), A MOVIE OR TWO FOR FREE. EARPHONES ARE A BIT FLIMSY. THERE OUGHT TO HAVE BEEN DOUBLE-SIDED SPEAKERS. GOT A BIT HEATED UP AFTER ABOUT 20 MIN OF FIDDLING WITH THE CAMERA APP. YEAH, ITS A FINGERPRINT MAGNET BUT ITS COVERED IN PREMIUM GLASS, SO THATS A GIVEN - USE A SOFT CLOTH TO CLEAN THE SURFACE ONCE IN A WHILE.
      
      
      SAMSUNG S4 MIGHT HAVE ALL THE COOL APPS, BUT THE PLASTIC BUILD IS NOT WORTH THE MONEY. BESIDES, IT WILL NOT GIVE YOU THE CONFIDENCE OF TAKING IT OUT DURING A HOLIDAY, WITHOUT WORRYING ABOUT MESSING IT UP. AND YES, I HAVE KNOWN SAMSUNG MOBILES TO BE VERY SCRATCHY AT HIGH VOLUMES, NOT SMOOTH AND CLEAR. I VOTE FOR SONY XPERIA Z

Sentences:
THIS IS TO ALL THE PEOPLE WHO ARE LOOKING FOR A "SMARTPHONE".
      
      SONY XPERIA Z IS THE SMARTPHONE U NEED TO BUY. GREAT PHONE.
      
      EVERYBODY MIGHT BE WELL AWARE OF THE SPECIFICATIONS BUT HERE IS SOMETHING FROM THE EXPERIENCE.
      
      
      - I HAVE BEEN USING XPERIA Z FROM PAST FEW WEEKS. THE FIRST THING WHICH AMAZES YOU THE CRYSTAL CLEAR DISPLAY. THE 1080P RESOLUTION SCREEN HAS TRULY MADE IT LOOK IT AMAZING. SONY'S BRAVIA ENGINE DISPLAY SIMPLY ENHANCES THE PICTURE QUALITY AND PLEASES YOUR EYES.
      
      
      - THE NEXT BEST THING ABOUT Z IS THE TOUCH SENSITIVITY. I HAVE USED SAMSUNG SIII AND HTC ONE X BUT THE TOUCH SENSITIVITY IS NOT EVEN CLOSE TO Z.
      
      
      - CAMERA. SONY HAS ALWAYS BEEN AHEAD IN THE CAMERA FEATURES. 13 MP CAMERA IS SERIOUSLY AWESOME. CAPTURING SPEED HAS REALLY IMPROVED AS COMPARED TO ITS PREVIOUS FLAGSHIP XPERIA S. GREAT PICTURE QUALITY. ALSO THE LOW-LIGHT IMAGING IS PERFECT. YES, YOU MAY FIND SOME NEGATIVE REVIEWS ACROSS INTERNET FOR CAMERA OF Z WHEN COMPARED TO HTC ONE, BUT IT GIVE SUCH MINUTE DETAILS OF THE SPECIFICATION THAT A NORMAL PERSON(WHO IS NOT A PHOTOGRAPHER) WOULD NOT EVEN BOTHER TO READ IT AND STRAIGHT AWAY REACH TO THE CONCLUSION. I HAVE PERSONALLY COMPARED THE CAMERA OF Z WITH SIII AND ONE X. IT HAS AN UPPER HAND...
      
      
      - BATTERY BACKUP. THE AVERAGE BATTERY BACK UP IS AROUND 14-16 HOURS WITH CONTINUOUS 3G USAGE. BROWSING, SOCIAL NETWORKING AND GAMING IS ALSO TAKING INTO CONSIDERATION. BUT WITH CONTINUOUS GAMING IT MIGHT DISCHARGE IN 5-6 HOURS, WHICH IS NORMAL FOR ANY SMARTPHONE OF THIS CALIBER. ALSO, IN ORDER TO SUPPORT THE HIGH SPECS AND AMAZING DISPLAY, BATTERY POWER MIGHT BE REQUIRED RIGHT ?
      
      
      -OVERHEATING. I FOUND MANY REVIEWS COMPLAINING ABOUT OVERHEATING. COME ON GUYS ALMOST EACH AND EVERY SMARTPHONE GETS HEATED AFTER CONTINUOUS USAGE. I PERSONALLY DID NOT FIND IT OVERHEAT EXCEPT WHILE PLAYING NFS ON IT. OFFCOURSE YOU CAN DIP IT IN WATER AND IT WILL COOL OFF. :) AGAIN YOU CAN RESUME WITH GAMING,ETC.
      
      
      -CLEAR SOUND. THE INCOMING CALL VOICE IS SUPERBLY CLEAR. THE NOISE REDUCTION WORKS VERY EFFICIENTLY. REGARDING THE MUSIC, YOU CANNOT ARGUE WITH SONY'S "WALKMAN". ITS JUST AWESOME.
      
      
      - SOME DRAWBACKS. THE AWKWARD POSITION OF SPEAKERS. SONY COULD HAVE FOUND A BETTER PLACE FOR SPEAKERS AS ONE MAY COVER IT WHILE WATCHING VIDEOS OR PLAYING GAMES.
      
      MANY PEOPLE COMPLAIN ABOUT THE COVERS FOR THE HEADPHONES SLOT. COME ON. THERE HAS TO BE SOMETHING IN ORDER TO PROTECT IT TO MAKE IT WATER-RESISTANT RIGHT ?
      
      APART FROM THIS, I PERSONALLY DID NOT FIND ANY OTHER FLAWS.
      
      
      ITS TOTALLY WORTH THE PENNY.
      
      
      YOU WON'T REGRET AFTER PURCHASING IT..!! THUMBS UP...!!

      ARE YOU SERIOUS? I HAVE A GALAXY NOTE WHICH HAS A RES OF 1280X800 AND IT'S VISIBLY BETTER THAN NOTE 2. MY WIFE' BROTHER HAS EXPERIA Z. I CAN'T BEGIN TO DESCRIBE HOW MUCH MORE VIVID AND BRIGHT THE NOTE N7000'S DISPLAY IS COMPARED TO EXPERIA Z. THE WORTHY UPGRADE TO NOTE N7000 WILL BE NOTE 3, SO I'M WAITING...

THE KICKER IS I DIDN'T EVEN KNOW I HAD DROPPED IT! AFTER ABOUT 5 MINUTES, I REALISED IT WAS MISSING. I TRACED MY STEPS BACK AND FOUND THE PHONE LYING AT THE BOTTOM OF THE BUCKET THAT WAS FULL OF WATER. THEN I RESTARTED IT AND IT WORKED PERFECTLY (A LINE OF MOISTURE WAS VISIBLE ACROSS THE DISPLAY WHICH DISAPPEARED AFTER ABOUT AN HOUR OF USE)! AFTER IT WAS UNDER WATER FOR MORE THAN 5 MINUTES! THE ONLY COMPETITOR FOR XPERIA Z AT PRESENT IS HTC ONE. THEREFORE, I'D LIKE TO MENTION OUT THE PROS AND CONS OF THIS PHONE---
      
      
      PROS:
      
      1. GREAT UI.
      
      2. AWESOME DISPLAY (THANKS TO BRAVIA ENGINE 2).
      
      3. HEADPHONES ARE THE BEST!
      
      4. DESIGN.
      
      5. STAMINA MODE WORKS VERY WELL.
      
      6. LIGHTNING-FAST PROCESSOR.
      
      7. WATER AND DUST RESISTANT.
      
      8. HDR MODE FOR CAMERA.
      
      9. GIVES YOU A 'RICH FEELING' WHILE IN YOUR HANDS AS ITS MADE OF GLASS, AND NOT CRAPPY PLASTIC.
      
      10. UPGRADE TO ANDROID 4.2.2. IN A COUPLE OF MONTHS.
      
      
      CONS:

      2. THE SPEAKER QUALITY IS DISAPPOINTING.
      
      3. PLAYSTATION MOBILE REMAINS WOEFULLY UNDERDEVELOPED.
      
      4. FINGERPRINT MAGNET.
      
      5. MEDIOCRE ERGONOMICS.
      
      
      FOR RS.37000, THIS IS UNDOUBTEDLY THE BEST BUY IN INDIA. BUT I'D ADVICE COST-CONSCIOUS PEOPLE TO WAIT FOR THE RELEASE OF HTC ONE, AS IT WILL BE CHEAPER AND HAVE ALMOST SAME FEATURES OF XPERIA Z.
      
      AND BUYERS, PLEASE DON'T EVER CONSIDER A SAMSUNG PHONE PRICED ABOVE RS.30000. THEY PUT USELESS FEATURES INTO YOUR MOBILE, WHICH YOU WON'T EVEN KNOW OF AND FOOL YOU INTO BUYING THEM.

label: Xperia Z
Sentences:
TO START WITH I'LL JUST SAY I LOVE THE PHONE - THE FORM FACTOR, THE FINISH, THE STYLE STATEMENT AND THE 6.9 MM GIRTH WILL BLOW YOU AWAY THE MOMENT YOU HOLD IT. I LIKE ALL THINGS BLACK SO I GOT ME A BLACK ONE AND CAN?T STOP ADMIRING IT. THE PHONE IS ALMOST PERFECT BUT FOR A FEW QUIRKS AND HERE THEY ARE:
      
      1. I DO FEEL THE BATTERY CAPACITY IS INADEQUATE. THE PHONE SHOULD HAVE HAD AT LEAST 2600 MAH TO SCRAPE THOUGH THE DAY
      
      2. TIMESCAPE UI IS CLOSE TO STOCK UI - BUT SOME OF THE SKINNING IS STILL INTRUSIVE. ALSO, I LIKE DARK THEMES ON THE UI WHICH WILL HELP SAVE BATTERY LIFE - TIMESCAPE HAS QUITE A LOT OF APPS WITH BRIGHT BACKGROUND - DOESN'T HELP BATTERY LIFE
      
      3. ONE OF THE EDGES ON THE PHONE COULD HAVE BENEFITED FROM A LANYARD HOLE ! SINCE ITS WATERPROOF I WAS PLANNING TO TAKE ON BOARD A RAFT NEXT TIME I WENT RAFTING OR PARA SAILING OVER WATER
      
      4. THE 5 INCH SCREEN IS AN ENORMOUS AMOUNT OF REAL ESTATE. SONY COULD HAVE DOWNSIZED THE GRID TO HAVE ANOTHER ROW INCLUDED - THE SPACING BETWEEN ICONS IS AN ENORMOUS WASTE OF PRECIOUS AND BEAUTIFUL REAL ESTATE - MAYBE IT?S JUST ME THINKING THIS WAY
      
      5. YOU KNOW HOW ICONS GET GROUPED INTO A FOLDER ON THE HOME SCREENS IN JB 4.1.X - TIMESCAPE MESSED WITH IT AND THE RESULT IS A NOT SO IMPRESSIVE LOOKING FOLDER (ACTUAL FOLDER ICON). ALSO, THE HOME SCREEN INDICATOR DOTS ON THE TOP OF THE SCREEN ARE ANNOYING (THIS IS ME BEEN AN ANDROID PURIST)
      
      6. THE WIFI RADIO DOES SEEM TO HAVE A PROBLEM - CATCHES LOW SIGNAL EVEN IF THE ROUTER IS ONLY IN THE NEXT ROOM - HOPE THIS GETS FIXED BY A FIRMWARE UPGRADE
      
      7. EMAIL APP DOES NOT HAVE A CONVERSATION VIEW ! CREATES SUCH A CLUTTER. I PERSONALLY THING GOOGLE SHOULD MAKE THEIR OWN VERSION OF BB HUB / UNIVERSAL INBOX WITH CONVERSATION VIEW.
      
      
      THINGS THAT ARE REALLY COOL ABOUT THE XPERIA Z:
      
      1. LOVE THE MINIMALIST FORM FACTOR AND THE WATER-PROOFING
      
      2. WALKMAN APP IS AMAZING - INTEGRATES WITH GRACENOTE TO EDIT MUSIC INFO
      
      3. ABILITY TO THROW MULTIMEDIA CONTENT TO OTHER CONNECTED DEVICES - BLUETOOTH, TV ETC.
      
      4. SMALLAPPS ! THESE ARE SO CONVENIENT, I HOPE THEY MAKE MORE.
      
      5. POWER BUTTON ON THE SIDE ! AND WHAT A LOVELY POWER BUTTON IT IS.
      
      
      THINGS I THOUGHT I SHOULD WORRY ABOUT BUT DIDN'T BOTHER ME THAT MUCH:
      
      1. VIEWING ANGLES ? YES THEY ARE NOT GREAT, BUT IT?S NOT THAT BIG A BOTHER
      
      2. PHONE HEATING UP - IT CAN RUN A LITTLE WARM IF YOU ARE USING NETWORK DATA - BUT THEN AGAIN YOU CAN WASH IT IN COLD WATER !
      
      3. BIG FORM FACTOR - SOMETIMES IT CAN BE INCONVENIENT FOR SINGLE HAND USE - BUT YOU'LL SOON GET USED TO IT
      
      5. VOICE QUALITY - I READ BAD REVIEWS ABOUT IT, BUT FOUND IT TO BE JUST FINE ON THE PHONE.
      
      6. THE PORT COVERING FLAPS. THEY STILL ANNOY ME A LITTLE AT TIMES - FORTUNATELY YOU HAVE AN OPTION IN THE ZL
      
      
      IN SUMMARY ? I?M A VERY HAPPY XPERIA OWNER. HOWEVER, I?VE BEEN A LONG TIME MOTO ATIRX 2 / ICS USER AND DO MISS IT SOMETIMES ? MAYBE IT?S JUST SEPARATION ANXIETY ( SO LONG  MOTO .. :( ).

Sentences:
THIS IS AN INCREDIBLY FAST PHONE. IT IS FASTER AND MORE POWERFUL THAN THE COMPUTER I USE FOR DEVELOPMENT AT MY WORK PLACE. WITH A DROID YOU USUALLY EXPECT IT TO LAG SOMEWHERE BUT NOT THIS PHONE.
      
      
      IT'S INCREDIBLY FAST. THIS IS INDEED ONE OF THE BEST PHONES YOU CAN GET IN THE ANDROID WORLD TODAY. I TOOK THE PURPLE ONE. SETTING THE AMETHYST THEME IN IT MADE IT LOOK STUNNING.
      
      
      THE GUI IS BEAUTIFUL. I LIKE IT THAT SONY PUTS GOOD DEAL OF EFFORT INTO MAKING A GOOD LOOKING UI FOR THE ANDROID PHONE AND NOT SHOVE THE STOCK UI FROM GOOGLE'S ANDROID REPO.
      
      
      CAMERA IS ALRIGHT. THE PHONE TAKES INCREDIBLY BIG PHOTOS. I CAN'T SAY THEY ARE REALLY HIGH RESOLUTION THOUGH. THEY JUST SEEM LIKE REALLY BIG IMAGES THAT HAVE MODERATE LEVEL OF CLARITY.
      
      
      NOT A "WASHED OUT" SCREEN
      
      
      PEOPLE TOLD ME SOMETHING ABOUT THE PHONE'S SCREEN SEEMING "WASHED OUT" WHEN HELD IN A DIFFERENT ANGLE. I DON'T KNOW WHAT IS THAT SUPPOSED TO MEAN. I DIDN'T NOTICE ANYTHING. I HELD MY PHONE IN DIFFERENT PERSPECTIVES AND I AM ABLE TO SEE THE SCREEN CONTENT JUST FINE.
      
      
      VERY BAD SOUND
      
      
      IN AN EFFORT TO MAKE IT A GOOD WATER PROOF PHONE (BECAUSE AT THIS DAY AND AGE IT IS VERY COMMON FOR PEOPLE TO GO SWIM WITH OUR PHONES IN 1M DEEP WATER BODIES) THEY'VE COMPLETELY SCREWED UP THE SOUND. IF YOU MADE IT THIS FAR, YOU'RE PROBABLY WONDERING WHY I BOUGHT THIS PHONE - BECAUSE I LOST MY ARC AND I NEEDED A GOOD LOOKING STATE OF THE ART SMART PHONE.
      
      
      THAT'S DEFEATED.
